Abadar's Flawless Scale.name: Abadar's Flawless Scale
Abadar's Flawless Scale.description:
This immaculate golden set of merchant's scales is considered a divine instrument among Abadar's most faithful. Unlike most scales, this one has only a single dish for placing small objects, and calculates value rather than weight. On the other side of the fulcrum, a steel arrow indicator points to various numbers engraved on the side of the scale.

By placing an object of light Bulk onto the dish, you can determine its value in gold pieces in the market in which the scale was made (most of these scales are made in Katapesh or Absalom), based on its material composition and artisanship.

For example, after placing a gemstone on the dish, the scale will indicate the fairest (average, in most cases) price you can expect to fetch in the market to which the scale is calibrated, but the scale wouldn't detect the gemstone's historical significance or any magical properties. Abadar's flawless scale can be calibrated to a different market by performing a 1-hour ritual in the proximity of that market.

Ablative Armor Plating (Greater).name: Ablative Armor Plating (Greater)
Ablative Armor Plating (Greater).description:
Ablative armor plating is additional plating, combined with springs, clever clockwork, and improvised padding, to absorb damage by knocking the additional pieces free. The pieces slowly come apart on their own with time and movement. The process of attaching the plating takes 10 minutes and grants the wearer of the armor the 20 Hit Points for 1 hour or until lost. Removing the plating early destroys it.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.DlqcczhwjfaEf7G1]{Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Greater)}

Ablative Shield Plating (Greater).name: Ablative Shield Plating (Greater)
Ablative Shield Plating (Greater).description: Ablative shield plating is an amalgam device that provides a layer of additional protection for a shield. Ablative shield plating is cobbled together from parts of other shields, wires, scraps, and bits of detritus, adding mass to a shield. The process of attaching ablative shield plating takes 10 minutes, and you can't attach ablative shield plating to a shield that has any other attached item, such as a shield boss or shield spikes. When the shield is damaged, this additional material crumples, breaks, and falls apart, absorbing some of the energy of the blow. Otherwise, the additional material slowly crumbles over time. Applying the plating grants the shield 20 temporary Hit Points that last for 1 hour or until lost. Removing the plating early destroys it.

Abysium Buckler (High Grade).name: Abysium Buckler (High Grade)
Abysium Buckler (High Grade).description:
These glowing shields are crafted to ensure that the abysium used is safely contained within a durable outer shell. If the shield breaks, however, the toxic metal becomes exposed. When you use the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction against an adjacent creature's melee Strike, if the shield breaks, the creature is exposed to the abysium and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.

Craft Requirements abysium worth at least 4,000 gp

Abysium Buckler (Standard Grade).name: Abysium Buckler (Standard Grade)
Abysium Buckler (Standard Grade).description:
These glowing shields are crafted to ensure that the abysium used is safely contained within a durable outer shell. If the shield breaks, however, the toxic metal becomes exposed. When you use the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction against an adjacent creature's melee Strike, if the shield breaks, the creature is exposed to the abysium and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}.

Abysium Chunk.name: Abysium Chunk
Abysium Chunk.description:
A blue-green metal with an eerie green luminescence, abysium radiates power that's inimical to life. Careless exposure to the material can lead to long-term damage to the immune system; as such, mining abysium is hazardous, as large quantities of the metal in an area cause all nearby creatures to become sick.

A creature carrying an abysium object is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} for a standard-grade object of light Bulk, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} for a standard-grade object of 1 Bulk or more or a high-grade object of light Bulk, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 3} for a high-grade object of 1 Bulk or more. This and all other sickening effects of abysium are poison effects.

Crafters can use 1 abysium chunk to create up to 6 doses of poisonous @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.sav38slFFlUVu75Z]{Abysium Powder}. Unscrupulous smiths have harnessed abysium's toxic properties to create noxious weapons and deadly substances.

All objects crafted from abysium shed dim light in a 10-foot radius.

High-grade 10 40 20

Abysium Powder.name: Abysium Powder
Abysium Powder.description:
Activate D Interact

This faintly glowing powder rapidly induces the symptoms of abysium poisoning.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:27]

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 6 minutes

Stage 1 [[/r {8d6}[poison]]]{8d6 poison damage} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (1 minute)

Stage 2 [[/r {9d6}[poison]]]{9d6 poison damage} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} (1 minute)

Stage 3 [[/r {10d6}[poison]]]{10d6 poison damage} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 3} (1 minute)

Craft Requirements abysium worth at least 75 gp.

Acid Flask (Greater).description:
启动 A 打击 Strike

这个装满强酸的烧瓶会造成1点强酸伤害，3d6点强酸持续伤害和3点强酸溅射伤害。你在攻击骰上获得+1的物品加值。

Acid Flask (Lesser).description:
启动 A 打击 Strike

这个装满强酸的烧瓶会造成1点强酸伤害，1d6点强酸持续伤害，和1点强酸溅射伤害。

Acid Flask (Major).description:
启动 A 打击 Strike

这个装满强酸的烧瓶会造成1点强酸伤害，4d6点强酸持续伤害和4点强酸溅射伤害。你在攻击骰上获得+1的物品加值。

Acid Spitter.name: Acid Spitter
Acid Spitter.description:
This tin clockwork lizard is activated when a creature moves adjacent to it, at which point it spits out a glob of acid. The target must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:20] saving throw or take [[/r {3d6}[acid]]]{3d6 acid damage}.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes full damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and [[/r {5}[persistent,acid]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Acid Damage}.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and [[/r {10}[persistent,acid]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Acid Damage}.

Acrobat's Staff.name: Acrobat's Staff
Acrobat's Staff.description:
This +1 striking bo staff is particularly long, making it useful as a balancing pole. While you wield it, the acrobat's staff releases chalk dust to make your grip more secure, granting you a +1 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC against checks to Disarm you of it.

Activate R command

Trigger You fail or critically fail an Acrobatics check to Balance and would fall

Effect Reroll the Acrobatics check and take the better result.

Adamantine Buckler (High-Grade).name: Adamantine Buckler (High-Grade)
Adamantine Buckler (High-Grade).description:
Adamantine shields are particularly sturdy, and when used for a shield bash, they are adamantine weapons.

The shield has Hardness 11, HP 44, and BT 22.

Craft Requirements adamantine worth at least 4,000 gp

Adamantine Buckler (Standard-Grade).name: Adamantine Buckler (Standard-Grade)
Adamantine Buckler (Standard-Grade).description:

The shield has Hardness 8, HP 32, and BT 16.

Craft Requirements adamantine worth at least 50 gp

Adamantine Chunk.description:
Mined from rocks that fell from the heavens, adamantine is one of the hardest metals known. It has a shiny, black appearance, and it is prized for its amazing resiliency and ability to hold an incredibly sharp edge.

Adaptive Cogwheel.name: Adaptive Cogwheel
Adaptive Cogwheel.description:
Activate f envision

Requirements You're wielding the affixed firearm.

This tiny copper gear is attached to the side of a firearm with a matching bolt or pin. When you activate it, the affixed weapon magically transfigures itself into the form of any simple or martial firearm to which you have access, harmlessly ejecting any contained ammunition in the process. Any runes or attached items present on the affixed weapon remain active unless incompatible with its new form, in which case they're suppressed for the duration of the transformation. The effect lasts until the beginning of your next turn.

Addiction Suppressant (Greater).name: Addiction Suppressant (Greater)
Addiction Suppressant (Greater).description:
Activate A Interact

When you use a dose of addiction suppressant, it suppresses the effects of that addiction for 1 day, as if you had taken an actual dose of the drug but without any of the drug's effects, and it doesn't increase the addiction DC. You also gain a +3 item bonus against the ongoing save against the drug's addiction depending on the type of addiction suppressant.

For every drug, a specific suppressant must be crafted- no generalized addiction suppressant yet exists. In order to create an addiction suppressant, you must begin with a dose of the drug to be suppressed, then use alchemical reagents to generate an elixir that can be used to fight that drug's addiction. An addiction suppressant must be a higher level than the drug it is meant to suppress in order to work.

Addiction Suppressant (Lesser).description:

Addlebrain.name: Addlebrain
Addlebrain.description:
Certain Scarlet Triad poisoners use toxins like addlebrain to keep captured prisoners docile and compliant for short periods of time until they can be properly shackled and imprisoned. Addlebrain is distilled from a hallucinogenic lichen that can often be found growing in the sewers below particularly large cities like Katapesh.

Once soaked in special reagents and then dried, a dose of addlebrain must be either lit with flame or tossed into a fire to activate, whereupon it unleashes a cloud of toxin as normal for an inhaled poison.

Activate A Interact (Inhaled)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25]

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 1 day

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (10 minutes)

Stage 2 Enfeebled 2 and stupefied 2 (1 hour)

Stage 3 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}, enfeebled 4, and stupefied 4 (1 day)

Admonishing Band.name: Admonishing Band
Admonishing Band.description:
Activate a envision

Requirements You're trained in Intimidation.

This wide strip of treated lizard hide is wrapped around the grip or stock of the affixed weapon, augmenting the unease that your gunshot creates. When you activate it, you fire your gun into the air with the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.XQEoKoFtq8n3wgA3]{Warning Shot}. If you already have the Warning Shot feat, the target doesn't become temporarily immune to your Demoralize, potentially allowing you to Demoralize them again.

Advanced Book of Translation (Tien).name: Advanced Book of Translation (Tien)
Advanced Book of Translation (Tien).description: The book is leather-bound and decorated with the symbol of the Lantern Lodge. Red and gold cords wrap around the book and tie to keep it shut. Each volume offers translation for a different language. When working with a book of translation, you can attempt Diplomacy checks to Gather Information or to Make an Impression with creatures that speak the language featured in the book, even if you do not speak the language. Such checks take 10 times longer to complete. An advanced book of translation features more complex phrases, local colloquialisms, and assumes a rudimentary understanding of the featured language. Checks attempted while using an advanced book of translation do not take a circumstance penalty.

Adventurer's Pack.name: 冒险装备包 Adventurer's Pack
Adventurer's Pack.description: 这个物品是冒险者的入门套件，包含探索和生存的基本物品。 负载值是整个装备包的数值，但必要时请参阅各个物品的说明。

Adze.name: Adze
Adze.description: A common cutting tool, an adze resembles an axe—but the cutting edge is horizontal, rather than vertical. The adze's shape makes it popular among wood workers, and grippli builders often use them to construct their treetop homes. The tool also serves as an effective weapon, due in part to the immense strength required to swing it.

Aeon Stone (Agate Ellipsoid).name: 万古石（玛瑙椭圆体） Aeon Stone (Agate Ellipsoid)
Aeon Stone (Agate Ellipsoid).description:
这个万古石可以让你每天施放一次2级的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{卜筮术 Augury}，作为一个神术的天生法术。

共振的力量为来自万古石的卜筮术总是能在DC6的纯骰检查中取得成功，以给出"没有"以外的答案。

Aeon Stone (Azure Briolette).name: 万古石（天蓝梨珠体） Aeon Stone (Azure Briolette)
Aeon Stone (Azure Briolette).description:
这个万古石必须被启动才能提供好处。

启动 R 想象

触发 一个敌人对你用你的一个法术槽施展的心灵法术的检定失败

效果 你获得相当于该法术环位两倍的临时HP，直到你的下一个回合。

启动 2 指令，交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你获得一个 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.mAMEt4FFbdqoRnkN]{惊吓之触 Chill Touch} 奥术戏法的效果。

Aeon Stone (Black Pearl).name: 万古石（黑珍珠） Aeon Stone (Black Pearl)
Aeon Stone (Black Pearl).description:
这颗黑珍珠闪烁着光芒。共鸣的力量允许你每天施展@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.R9xqCBblkS5KE4y7]{短讯术 Sending} 一次。

启动 R 想象

触发 你成为一个心灵效果的目标

效果 你对抗触发效果的豁免检定获得+4状态加值。

无论该豁免检定结果为何，万古石尝试一次 [[/r {1d20+30} #Counteract]]{1d20+30]] 的反制检定来复制一份该效果反射给原施术者。各项数值都如同原施术者自己制造该效果一样，除了这份复制的施术者为你。

你每次启动这颗万古石时，尝试一次DC为5的纯骰检定。如果失败，万古石就会碎裂，并永远失去它的魔法特性。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.p2aGtovaY1feytws]{效果：万古石（黑珍珠）}

Aeon Stone (Clear Spindle).name: 万古石（无色纺锤体） Aeon Stone (Clear Spindle)
Aeon Stone (Clear Spindle).description:
当你绑定了这颗万古石后，你不再需要摄入食物和水。这颗万古石的效果必须在你持续穿戴和绑定其一周后才会产生。如果它被其他人绑定，将重新开始计算这一周。

共鸣能力能让你以原能内在法术的形式施展 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.W69zswpj0Trdy5rj]{气泡术 Air Bubble} ，每天一次。

Aeon Stone (Dull Grey).name: 万古石（暗灰色） Aeon Stone (Dull Grey)
Aeon Stone (Dull Grey).description:
暗灰色万古石已经失去了其所有特殊的魔法属性，有时是来自于使用过度的碧绿色球体万古石或淡紫苏色椭球体万古石。如同其他的万古石一样，它仍然会环绕着你的头部旋转，因此可以创造性地对其施展一些目标为物品的法术来解放双手，例如不灭明焰（Continual Flame）。

暗灰色万古石没有共鸣能力。

Aeon Stone (Dusty Rose Prism).name: 万古石（土红角柱体） Aeon Stone (Dusty Rose Prism)
Aeon Stone (Dusty Rose Prism).description:
这块万古石允许你以奥术天生法术的形式施展一环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{护盾术 Shield} ，将自己包围在粉红色的能量中。

共振的力量为使你的万古石的护盾术所防止的伤害从5增加到10。

Aeon Stone (Gold Nodule).name: 万古石（金色节体） Aeon Stone (Gold Nodule)
Aeon Stone (Gold Nodule).description:
当一个金色节体万古石被创造出来时，创造者选择一种他掌握的语言储存到这颗石头之中。当你绑定该石头，你能够理解，说和写该语言。

共鸣能力能让你以异能内在法术的形式施展 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vTQvfYu2llKQedmY]{理解语言 Comprehend Language}，每天一次。

Aeon Stone (Lavender and Green Ellipsoid.name: 万古石（紫苏及绿色椭球体） Aeon Stone (Lavender and Green Ellipsoid)
Aeon Stone (Lavender and Green Ellipsoid.description:
如同淡紫苏色椭球体万古石，但它能施展8环的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic} ，反制检定为 [[/r 1d20+31]]。

共鸣能力能让你以奥术内在法术的形式任意施展 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{侦测魔法 Detect Magic} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OhD2Z6rIGGD5ocZA]{阅读灵光 Read Aura}。

Aeon Stone (Orange Prism).name: 万古石（橙色球体） Aeon Stone (Orange Prism)
Aeon Stone (Orange Prism).description:
你必须启动橙色球体万古石以获得它的好处。共鸣能力让你在奥法Arcana、自然Nature、神秘Occultism或宗教Religion检定上获得+2物品加值，获得加成的技能与你最近一次利用该石头强化的法术所属的施法根源相匹配。

启动 A 想象

效果 如果你的下一个动作是施法Cast a Spell，该法术环级在用来反制或被反制时提高1级（最高10级）。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.yvabfuAO74pvH8hh]{效果：万古石（橙色球体） (奥法)}

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.etJW0w4CiSFgMrWP]{效果：万古石（橙色球体） (自然)}

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.vOU4Yv2MyAfYBbmF]{效果：万古石（橙色球体） (神秘)}

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.FbFl95WRpzrrijh3]{效果：万古石（橙色球体） (宗教)}

Aeon Stone (Pale Lavender Ellipsoid).name: 万古石（淡紫苏色椭球体） Aeon Stone (Pale Lavender Ellipsoid)
Aeon Stone (Pale Lavender Ellipsoid).description:
你必须启动这颗万古石以获得它的好处。共鸣能力让你可以以奥术内在法术的形式施展 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OhD2Z6rIGGD5ocZA]{阅读灵光 Read Aura} 戏法。

启动 R 想象

频率 每天一次

触发 一个法术以你为目标

效果 这颗石头施放一次6环的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic} 以尝试反制触发的法术，反制调整值为 [[/r 1d20+22]]。这只能作用于明确以你为目标的法术，不能作用于无目标的区域法术。若检定成功，且除了你以外该法术还有其他的目标，它会为该法术的所有目标反制这个法术。

你每次启动这颗万古石时都需要尝试一次DC 5的纯骰检定。如果失败，这颗石头将永久转变成一颗暗灰色万古石。

Aeon Stone (Pale Orange Rhomboid).name: 万古石（淡橙长菱体） Aeon Stone (Pale Orange Rhomboid)
Aeon Stone (Pale Orange Rhomboid).description:
在你每天第一次死亡的时候，你的生命和精神精华会混合在一起，并暂存在这块万古石中。你对目前在这块石头30英尺范围内有多少生命体有一个模糊的感知，你可以用它来决定什么时候可以安全地调用这块石头的力量。在你的身体死亡后的下一个小时内的任何时候，你都可以花1分钟的时间集中精力，以便回到你的身体。

只要你的身体还完好无损，你就不再是死人了--你的生命值恢复到1，并获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{毁灭 Doomed 3} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{受伤 Wounded 3} 状态。你在一天内只能从一个淡橙长菱体万古石的效果中获益。

共振的力量为使你可以等待超过一个小时的时间来使用永生石返回你的身体；只要寻路仪还在身上，你的身体就不会腐烂，你可以在任何时候返回。

Aeon Stone (Pearlescent Pyramid).name: 万古石（多彩锥形体） Aeon Stone (Pearlescent Pyramid)
Aeon Stone (Pearlescent Pyramid).description:
在绑定时，这块万古石能使你的武器和非武装攻击获得 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{幽冥符文 Ghost Touch} 的好处。

共振的力量为给予你一个特殊的启动能力。

启动 1 想象

频率 每分钟一次

效果 你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{识破隐形 See Invisibility} 的效果，持续一轮。

Aeon Stone (Pearly White Spindle).name: 万古石（珍珠白纺锤体） Aeon Stone (Pearly White Spindle)
Aeon Stone (Pearly White Spindle).description:
当你绑定这个万古石时，它就会慢慢开始治疗你的伤口，每分钟恢复1HP。

共振的力量为你提供1点负能量抗力。

Aeon Stone (Pink Rhomboid).name: 万古石（粉色斜方体） Aeon Stone (Pink Rhomboid)
Aeon Stone (Pink Rhomboid).description:
当你绑定这颗石头时，你获得15点临时生命值。如果石头的效果被压制，你失去剩余的所有临时生命值，直到石头的效果回来。临时生命值会在你进行每日准备时刷新；但在下一次每日准备之前，临时生命值不会在你重新绑定这颗石头，或绑定其他粉色斜方体万古石时刷新。

共鸣能力让你可以以神术内在法术的形式施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SnjhtQYexDtNDdEg]{稳定伤势 Stabilize} 戏法。

自动生效:

  • 获得15点临时生命值

Aeon Stone (Tourmaline Sphere).name: 万古石（碧绿色球体） Aeon Stone (Tourmaline Sphere)
Aeon Stone (Tourmaline Sphere).description:
当你即将死于 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{濒死 Dying} 状态时（通常是达到濒死Dying 4的时候），这颗万古石会自动启动，并将你的濒死Dying数值降低到比你死亡时的数值低1点的程度（通常是降低到濒死Dying 3）。这颗石头之后就会永久性地转变成暗灰色万古石。你一天只能从这个效果中获益一次，无论你有多少颗这样的石头。

共鸣能力让你可以以神术内在法术的形式施放1环的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{治疗术 Heal}，每天一次。

Aeon Stone (Western Star).name: 万古石（西方之星） Aeon Stone (Western Star)
Aeon Stone (Western Star).description:
这个万古石必须被启动才能提供一个好处。

启动 2 想象,交互

效果 当你启动万古石获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{幻象伪装 Illusory Disguise}的效果。

其共振的力量允许你使你所有的万古石和你的寻路仪在启动获得幻象伪装的效果时 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible} 。

Air Bladder.name: Air Bladder
Air Bladder.description:
Bulk L (1 if inflated)

This weighted animal bladder can be inflated with air in preparation for a dive. It holds enough air to breathe for one round. As a free action, you can inhale the contents of the air bladder, which resets the number of rounds you can hold your breath. You can inflate the bladder or remove its attached weight as an Interact action. An unattached inflated bladder without the weight will float toward the surface of the water at a rate of 60 feet per round.

Air Cartridge Firing System.name: Air Cartridge Firing System
Air Cartridge Firing System.description: Air cartridge firing mechanisms use a container of compressed air affixed to a sealed system that releases the air in a small burst to propel ammunition, and they're the default used in Arcadian air repeaters. Any firearm can be modified to replace its normal firing mechanism with an air cartridge firing system, allowing the weapon to be fired underwater or in other conditions that would normally prevent the ignition of black powder. The air cartridges lack much of the propulsive power of black powder, however, imposing a -10-foot penalty to the attached firearm's range increment. Weapons with the kickback trait don't gain that trait's benefits when using an air cartridge firing system. Attaching an air cartridge firing system takes one hour, though this time can overlap with the standard time required to maintain and clean your firearm to prevent misfires.

Air Repeater.name: Air Repeater
Air Repeater.description: A thin-barreled firearm that uses a container of pressurized air instead of black powder to propel small metal bullets from an attached cartridge, the air repeater has fallen out of common use in Arcadia due to its poor stopping power, though it's still used occasionally for casual hunting and sport shooting. The air repeater and its longer-ranged, two-handed variant are still valued by some for their ability to allow a shooter to fire multiple rounds without needing to stop to reload or crank to a new chamber. A typical air repeater magazine holds 6 pellets.

Aklys.name: Aklys
Aklys.description: The aklys is a throwing club with a hook on one end and a lengthy cord attached to the other. Though aklyses aren't available in most shops, one might be purchased for 5 gp from a vendor that specializes in strange weapons.

Alarm Snare.name: 警报圈套 Alarm Snare
Alarm Snare.description: 你把一个或更多能发出噪音的物体绑在一条绊绳或一个压力板上以制作一个警报圈套。当你制作一个警报圈套时，你指定一个100尺到500尺的范围，在其间的生物可以听到警报。当一个小型或更大的生物进入方格，圈套会发出足以被范围内所有生物听见的噪音。

Alchemical Atomizer.name: Alchemical Atomizer
Alchemical Atomizer.description:
Khismar developed this unique atomizer that allows for the distribution of elixirs, oils, and potions as a fine spray or mist. The atomizer can hold a single elixir, oil, or potion. An atomizer contains enough reagents to use it up to 10 times before the reagents must be replaced. A new batch of reagents costs 5 gp and requires an Interact action to replace.

Activate A Interact

Effect You spray the contents of the atomizer on yourself or an adjacent willing ally or unattended object. The target gains the effects of the applied elixir, oil, or potion. The target must be a valid target for the effect, such as food or drink for a nectar of purification, or the consumable is lost.

Activate 2 Interact

Effect You cause the atomizer to mix its reagents and fire its held consumable at a square within 30 feet. The consumable forms a cloud that fills the space. The first willing valid target to enter the space automatically gains the effect of the consumable. If there are multiple valid targets, such as with multiple weapons for aligned oil, the creature entering the space determines how the effect is applied. The cloud is consumed upon contact with a willing valid target or at the start of your next turn, whichever comes first.

Alchemical Crossbow.name: Alchemical Crossbow
Alchemical Crossbow.description:
This crossbow can deliver alchemically infused bolts. The strange weapon has a metal bracket mounted on the side of the stock near the lath. As an action, you can load a single lesser alchemical bomb into the bracket; this bomb must be one that deals energy damage (such as an acid flask, alchemist's fire, bottled lightning, frost vial, or thunderstone).

The next three attacks made with the crossbow deal [[/r 1d6]] damage of the bomb's damage type in addition to the crossbow's normal damage. If the second and third attacks are not all made within 1 minute of the first attack, the bomb's energy is wasted. These attacks never deal splash damage or other special effects of the bomb and are not modified by any abilities that add to or modify a bomb's effect.

The addition of the bracket serves to unbalance the weapon, reducing its range to 30 feet. It otherwise functions as a crossbow (when determining damage, reload, and so on). Creatures use their crossbow proficiency when using the alchemical crossbow.

Alchemist Goggles.name: 炼金护目镜 Alchemist Goggles
Alchemist Goggles.description:
这副黄铜护目镜框架上雕刻着火焰的图案，并有着十分厚重的镜片。

穿戴时，它会为制作炼金物品的手艺Crafting检定提供+1物品加值，并为使用炼金炸弹进行的攻击检定提供+1物品加值。

你在使用炼金炸弹进行打击Strike时也能忽略轻度掩蔽。

自动生效:

  • 制作炼金物品的手艺Crafting检定+1物品加值
  • 使用炼金炸弹进行的攻击检定+1物品加值

Alchemist Goggles (Greater).name: 高等炼金护目镜 Alchemist Goggles (Greater)
Alchemist Goggles (Greater).description:
这副黄铜护目镜框架上雕刻着火焰的图案，并有着十分厚重的镜片。

穿戴时，它会为制作炼金物品的手艺Crafting检定提供+2物品加值，并为使用炼金炸弹进行的攻击检定提供+2物品加值。

你在使用炼金炸弹进行打击Strike时也能忽略轻度掩蔽。

自动生效:

  • 制作炼金物品的手艺Crafting检定+2物品加值
  • 使用炼金炸弹进行的攻击检定+2物品加值

Alchemist Goggles (Major).name: 上等炼金护目镜 Alchemist Goggles (Major)
Alchemist Goggles (Major).description:
这副黄铜护目镜框架上雕刻着火焰的图案，并有着十分厚重的镜片。

穿戴时，它会为制作炼金物品的手艺Crafting检定提供+3物品加值，并为使用炼金炸弹进行的攻击检定提供+3物品加值。

你在使用炼金炸弹进行打击Strike时也能忽略轻度掩蔽。

自动生效:

  • 制作炼金物品的手艺Crafting检定+3物品加值
  • 使用炼金炸弹进行的攻击检定+3物品加值

Alchemist's Fire (Greater).name: 高等炽火胶 Alchemist's Fire (Greater)
Alchemist's Fire (Greater).description:
启动 A 打击 Strike

炽火胶是一种接触空气就会剧烈燃烧的爆炸性液体混合物。你在攻击骰上获得+2的物品加值。这枚炸弹造成3d8点火焰伤害，3点火焰持续伤害和3点火焰溅射伤害。

Alchemist's Fire (Lesser).name: 次等炽火胶 Alchemist's Fire (Lesser)
Alchemist's Fire (Lesser).description:
启动 A 打击 Strike

炽火胶是一种接触空气就会剧烈燃烧的爆炸性液体混合物。这枚炸弹造成1d8点火焰伤害，1点火焰持续伤害和1点火焰溅射伤害。

Alchemist's Fire (Major).name: 上等炽火胶 Alchemist's Fire (Major)
Alchemist's Fire (Major).description:
启动 A 打击 Strike

炽火胶是一种接触空气就会剧烈燃烧的爆炸性液体混合物。你在攻击骰上获得+3的物品加值。这枚炸弹造成4d8点火焰伤害，4点火焰持续伤害和4点火焰溅射伤害。

Alchemist's Fire (Moderate).name: 中等炽火胶 Alchemist's Fire (Moderate)
Alchemist's Fire (Moderate).description:
启动 A 打击 Strike

炽火胶是一种接触空气就会剧烈燃烧的爆炸性液体混合物。你在攻击骰上获得+1的物品加值。这枚炸弹造成2d8点火焰伤害，2点火焰持续伤害和2点火焰溅射伤害。

Alchemist's Lab.name: 炼金实验室 Alchemist's Lab
Alchemist's Lab.description: 在休整期，你需要一个炼金实验室来制作炼金物品。

Alchemist's Lab (Expanded).name: 炼金实验室(专家) (Expanded)
Alchemist's Lab (Expanded).description:
在休整期，你需要一个炼金实验室来制作炼金物品。

专家级炼金实验室为你在制作炼金物品的工艺（Craft）检定上提供+1物品加值。

自动生效:

  • 制作炼金物品 +1 物品加值

Alchemist's Tools.name: 炼金工具 Alchemist's Tools
Alchemist's Tools.description: 这组方便携带的安瓿和化学物能用来进行简单的炼金工作。如果你穿戴着炼金工具，你可以作为使用它的动作的一部分将它拿出来。

Alcohol.name: Alcohol
Alcohol.description:
Alcohol is a common substance available in stunning variety. The Price of a dose of alcohol depends on the specific beverage. You can't recover from the sickened condition from alcohol while affected.

If you fail a saving throw against alcohol other than initial saves, the affliction's stage doesn't increase; the only way to increase the stage of alcohol's affliction is to consume more alcohol.

Activate A Interact (Ingested)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:12]

Onset 10 minutes

Stage 1 +1 item bonus to saving throws against fear (10 minutes)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}, +1 item bonus to saving throws against fear effects (10 minutes)

Stage 3 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, flat-footed, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} (10 minutes)

Stage 4 clumsy 2 and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} (10 minutes)

Stage 5 clumsy 2, sickened 2, and stupefied 2 (10 minutes)

Stage 6 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} (8 hours)

Stage 7 death

Aldori Dueling Sword.name: 奥多里决斗剑 Aldori Dueling Sword
Aldori Dueling Sword.description: 奥多里决斗剑是一种细长的单锋决斗剑，有轻微的弧度和锋利牢固的剑尖。

Aligned Oil.name: 阵营油 Aligned Oil
Aligned Oil.description:
启动 A 交互

这种油能在武器中灌注一个阵营的强大力量。每种阵营油Aligned Oil都与一个阵营关联：混乱、邪恶、善良、守序（例如善良阵营油）。涂抹了这种油的武器获得与阵营匹配的性能符文效果： @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.65YL6nk1jIzCWutt]{混沌 Anarchic} (混乱), @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.6xu6dPIaUZ7edKEB]{公理 Axiomatic} (守序), @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.DH0kB9Wbr5pDeunX]{神圣 Holy} (善良), 或 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.gmMrJREf4JSHd2dZ]{邪恶 Unholy} (邪恶)。该效果持续1分钟。

Alignment Ampoule (Greater).name: Alignment Ampoule (Greater)
Alignment Ampoule (Greater).description:
(Default is good damage)

This glass sphere is divided into four quarters, each of which contains a different material aligned with good, evil, chaos, or law, such as shavings from a holy relic or dried flowers that grew near a planar rift to the Abyss.

When an alignment ampoule strikes a creature with a weakness to good, evil, chaos, or law, it deals the listed damage, which matches the creature's highest weakness. This damage is always based on the weaknesses of the initial target of the attack. If a creature has multiple eligible weaknesses, randomly determine the damage type.

An alignment ampoule has no effect against creatures that don't have a weakness to the ampoule's associated alignment types.

You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 2d4 damage and 3 splash damage.

Alignment Ampoule (Lesser).name: Alignment Ampoule (Lesser)
Alignment Ampoule (Lesser).description:
(Default is good damage)

This glass sphere is divided into four quarters, each of which contains a different material aligned with good, evil, chaos, or law, such as shavings from a holy relic or dried flowers that grew near a planar rift to the Abyss.

When an alignment ampoule strikes a creature with a weakness to good, evil, chaos, or law, it deals the listed damage, which matches the creature's highest weakness. This damage is always based on the weaknesses of the initial target of the attack. If a creature has multiple eligible weaknesses, randomly determine the damage type.

An alignment ampoule has no effect against creatures that don't have a weakness to the ampoule's associated alignment types.

The ampoule deals 1 damage and 1 splash damage.

Alignment Ampoule (Major).name: Alignment Ampoule (Major)
Alignment Ampoule (Major).description:
(Default is good damage)

This glass sphere is divided into four quarters, each of which contains a different material aligned with good, evil, chaos, or law, such as shavings from a holy relic or dried flowers that grew near a planar rift to the Abyss.

When an alignment ampoule strikes a creature with a weakness to good, evil, chaos, or law, it deals the listed damage, which matches the creature's highest weakness. This damage is always based on the weaknesses of the initial target of the attack. If a creature has multiple eligible weaknesses, randomly determine the damage type.

An alignment ampoule has no effect against creatures that don't have a weakness to the ampoule's associated alignment types.

You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 3d4 damage and 4 splash damage.

Alignment Ampoule (Moderate).name: Alignment Ampoule (Moderate)
Alignment Ampoule (Moderate).description:
(Default is good damage)

This glass sphere is divided into four quarters, each of which contains a different material aligned with good, evil, chaos, or law, such as shavings from a holy relic or dried flowers that grew near a planar rift to the Abyss.

When an alignment ampoule strikes a creature with a weakness to good, evil, chaos, or law, it deals the listed damage, which matches the creature's highest weakness. This damage is always based on the weaknesses of the initial target of the attack. If a creature has multiple eligible weaknesses, randomly determine the damage type.

An alignment ampoule has no effect against creatures that don't have a weakness to the ampoule's associated alignment types.

You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 1d4 damage and 2 splash damage.

Alluring Scarf.name: Alluring Scarf
Alluring Scarf.description:
This thin, multicolored scarf shifts between hues in almost dizzying patterns.

Activate d Interact (emotion, enchantment, mental, visual)

Frequency once per day

Effect You Stride. All creatures within 10 feet of you when you started the Stride must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:24|traits:emotion,mental,visual] save. On a failure, a creature becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} and must spend at least one of its actions on its next turn to move toward you. A fascinated creature can attempt another Will save if you move more than 30 feet away from them, and as normal, acting hostile to a creature or its allies breaks fascination automatically. Creatures that critically failed their save don't receive further saves if you move more than 30 feet away, and acting hostile to such a creature's allies allows them to attempt another save, rather than automatically ending the fascination. You can Sustain the Activation for up to 1 minute.

Alluring Scarf (Greater).name: Alluring Scarf (Greater)
Alluring Scarf (Greater).description:
This thin, multicolored scarf shifts between hues in almost dizzying patterns.

Activate d Interact (emotion, enchantment, mental, visual)

Frequency once per day

Effect You Stride. All creatures within 20 feet of you when you started the Stride must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:29|traits:emotion,mental,visual] save. On a failure, a creature becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} and must spend at least one of its actions on its next turn to move toward you. A fascinated creature can attempt another Will save if you move more than 30 feet away from them, and as normal, acting hostile to a creature or its allies breaks fascination automatically. Creatures that critically failed their save don't receive further saves if you move more than 30 feet away, and acting hostile to such a creature's allies allows them to attempt another save, rather than automatically ending the fascination. You can Sustain the Activation for up to 1 minute.

Alluring Scarf (Major).name: Alluring Scarf (Major)
Alluring Scarf (Major).description:
This thin, multicolored scarf shifts between hues in almost dizzying patterns.

Activate d Interact (emotion, enchantment, mental, visual)

Frequency once per day

Effect You Stride. All creatures within 30 feet of you when you started the Stride must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:35|traits:emotion,mental,visual] save. On a failure, a creature becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} and must spend at least one of its actions on its next turn to move toward you. A fascinated creature can attempt another Will save if you move more than 30 feet away from them, and as normal, acting hostile to a creature or its allies breaks fascination automatically. Creatures that critically failed their save don't receive further saves if you move more than 30 feet away, and acting hostile to such a creature's allies allows them to attempt another save, rather than automatically ending the fascination. You can Sustain the Activation for up to 1 minute.

Aluum Charm.name: Aluum Charm
Aluum Charm.description:
This ornate pendant of brass is adorned with a vibrant blue gemstone. An aluum charm grants control over a particular aluum and lesser influence over other such constructs. As long as you wear an aluum's linked aluum charm, that aluum follows your verbal commands, including somewhat nuanced orders like "subdue this target" or "strike anyone wearing a blue robe."

Activate D command

Frequency once per round

Effect The charm grants you control over an aluum you can see within 60 feet, with a level equal to or lower than the charm. This has the effect of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OsOhx3TGIZ7AhD0P]{Dominate} and allows a @Check[type:will|dc:28] save. If the aluum is currently under the control of someone wearing its linked charm, it gets a result on its saving throw one degree higher than what it rolled.

You can control only one aluum at a time using this activation, and controlling a new aluum ends the effect for one you had previously affected.

Amaranthine Pavise.name: Amaranthine Pavise
Amaranthine Pavise.description:
This tower shield was developed by followers of Ketephys, the elven god of the hunt. It's distinct for having a central ridge, and for being made from only wood and hide. AC increases to +4 if you are using the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover} action.

Hardness HP BT
9 54 27

Ketephys's religious symbol, a hawk rising over a silver crescent, is painted on the hide stretched across the front of the shield. Each amaranthine pavise is blessed by Ketephysian priests to aid in liberating Tanglebriar and defeating the nascent demon lord Treerazer. While you have the shield raised, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against the innate spells and special abilities of demons. When your allies have cover from the amaranthine pavise, the circumstance bonus they gain from cover to Reflex saves against area effects also applies to Fortitude and Will saves against demons' area effects.

Activate 2 command

Frequency once per day

Effect Ketephys's wrath descends upon your foes. The shield casts good @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.hVU9msO9yGkxKZ3J]{Divine Wrath} with a DC of 27.

Ambrosia of Undying Hope.name: Ambrosia of Undying Hope
Ambrosia of Undying Hope.description:
This elixir is usually stored in a small metal flask or miniature stein. The dark liquid sparkles as if it were full of stars and is considered sacred to @Compendium[pf2e.deities.v67fHklTZ6LoU54q]{Cayden Cailean} and to the cults of the Failed in Absalom.

The next time you would die from damage within 8 hours after you drink the ambrosia, it prevents you from dying, you regain [[/r 20]] Hit Points, the elixir's benefits end, and you become temporarily immune to the ambrosia of undying hope for 24 hours.

The ambrosia can't protect you from death effects or disintegration, but it can protect against almost any other form of death via damage. You can only be under the effect of a single ambrosia of undying hope at a time.

Anarchic.name: 混沌 Anarchic
Anarchic.description:
混沌符文满是锯齿和不对称感，能引导混乱能量。拥有该符文的武器对守序目标额外造成1d6点混乱伤害。若你为守序阵营，你在携带或持握该武器时获得力竭2（enfeebled）。

当你用该武器对守序生物的打击成功重击时，骰1d6。若为1或2，你造成最小伤害的双倍；若为3或4，正常造成双倍伤害；若为5或6，你造成最大伤害的双倍。

制造需求 你是混乱阵营

Ancestral Echoing.name: Ancestral Echoing
Ancestral Echoing.description:
The wisdom of this weapon's past owners flows into your mind, amplifying your own abilities with the weapon. Your proficiency rank with this weapon is one step higher than normal, to a maximum of the highest proficiency rank you have in any weapon. For instance, if you had master proficieny with martial weapons and expert proficiency with advanced weapons, you would have master proficiency with advanced weapon that had this rune.

In addition, while wielding the ancestral echoing weapon, you have expert proficiency in one Lore skill relevant to one or more of the weapon's previous owners. This is typically Dwarven Lore but is ultimately determined by the GM depending on the weapon's history.

Anchor Spear.name: Anchor Spear
Anchor Spear.description:
The tip of this +2 greater striking spear is large and wickedly barbed, and the haft is inlaid with fine silver lines that run the length of the weapon. Wielded by specially trained xulgath cavalry, anchor spears are used to prevent the escape of gogiteths or other monsters capable of climbing or burrowing.

Activate A command

Effect The anchor spear extends into a +2 greater striking longspear or back to its original form as a +2 greater striking spear.

Activate R command

Frequency once per 10 minutes

Trigger You damage a creature using the anchor spear

Effect The spear embeds itself into the creature, and the spear's haft splits along the silver lines to become a series of hooks attached to a thin but strong cable. As long as the anchor spear remains embedded in the creature, any time the creature burrows or climbs, it treats normal terrain as difficult terrain and difficult terrain as greater difficult terrain. The creature can spend an Interact action to attempt a DC 32 Athletics check to remove the spearhead.

Critical Success The anchor spear is removed, becomes broken, and falls to the ground in the creature's space.

Success The anchor spear is removed, the creature takes [[/r {1d8}[piercing]]]{1d8 piercing damage}, and the spear falls to the ground in a random space adjacent to the creature.

Failure The anchor spear remains in place, and the creature takes [[/r {1d8}[piercing]]]{1d8 piercing damage}.

Critical Failure As failure, except the creature takes [[/r {2d8}[piercing]]]{2d8 piercing damage}.

Anchoring.name: Anchoring
Anchoring.description: This rune prevents enemies from escaping your grasp by @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} to other planes. If you critically hit a target with an anchoring weapon, the weapon casts @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ksLCg62cLOojw3gN]{Dimensional Anchor} on the target (@Check[type:will|dc:27|name:Dimensional Anchor]{DC 27 Will}, counteract modifier [[/r 1d20+17 #counteract]]{+28}).

Anchoring (Greater).name: Anchoring (Greater)
Anchoring (Greater).description:
This rune prevents enemies from escaping your grasp by @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} to other planes.

When you critically hit a target with a weapon with the anchoring rune, the weapon casts 8th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ksLCg62cLOojw3gN]{Dimensional Anchor} on the target (@Check[type:will|dc:38|name:Dimensional Anchor]{DC 38 Will}, counteract modifier [[/r 1d20+28 #counteract]]{+28}), except that if the target critically succeeds at its Will save, instead of having no effect, the dimensional anchor lasts for 1 round. When you hit a target with the weapon but don't critically hit, the target is affected by 4th-level dimensional anchor for 1 round without a save (this still uses a counteract modifier of +28).

Ancient dragon skull etched with mystic.name: Ancient dragon skull etched with mystic sigils

Animal Staff.name: 动物法杖 Animal Staff
Animal Staff.description:
这根法杖上雕刻着动物和怪兽的头部。持握该法杖时，你用自然技能鉴别动物时获得+2环境加值。

启动 施放法术

效果 你消耗一定充能从法杖法术列表中施放法术。

  • 戏法 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tXa5vOu5giBNCjdR]{指北术 Know Direction}
  • 1环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EE7Q5BHIrfWNCPtT]{魔牙术 Magic Fang} @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4YnON9JHYqtLzccu]{召唤动物 Summon Animal}

制造需求 为列表上所有法术提供1次对应环级的施法。

自动生效:

  • 自然技能鉴别动物时获得+2环境加值

Animal Staff (Greater).name: 高等动物法杖 Animal Staff (Greater)
Animal Staff (Greater).description:
这根法杖上雕刻着动物和怪兽的头部。持握该法杖时，你用自然技能鉴别动物时获得+2环境加值。

启动 施放法术

效果 你消耗一定充能从法杖法术列表中施放法术。

  • 戏法 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tXa5vOu5giBNCjdR]{指北术 Know Direction}

  • 2环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yhz9fF69uwRhnHix]{动物信使 Animal Messenger} @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.BBvV7qoXGdw09q1C]{动物交谈 Speak with Animals} @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4YnON9JHYqtLzccu]{召唤动物 Summon Animal}
  • 3环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{动物形态 Animal Form} @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4YnON9JHYqtLzccu]{召唤动物 Summon Animal}

Animal Staff (Major).description:
这根法杖上雕刻着动物和怪兽的头部。持握该法杖时，你用自然技能鉴别动物时获得+2环境加值。

效果 你消耗一定充能从法杖法术列表中施放法术。
