容量 150 负载

Bag of Weasels.name: Bag of Weasels
Bag of Weasels.description:
This item appears to be and functions as a type I bag of holding, until you try to retrieve an item from the bag. Whenever you retrieve an item from the bag of weasels, roll a DC 11 flat check. On a success, you retrieve the item as normal. On a failure, the item you retrieve is transformed into a weasel; this doesn't affect artifacts, cursed items, or other hard-to-destroy items.

This weasel has the statistics of a giant rat, except that it is Tiny and exudes an aura of transmutation magic. The weasel has no loyalty to you and typically attempts to escape as quickly as possible. If the weasel is targeted with a remove curse spell or a similar magical effect, it transforms back into the original item that was taken from the bag of weasels. If it dies or is slain, the weasel disappears and the item is permanently destroyed. Because the weasel is a transformed item, you don't gain any benefit you would receive from attacking a creature, defeating one, damaging one, or the like, but you do gain any benefit you would gain from destroying an item.

Balisse Feather.name: Balisse Feather
Balisse Feather.description:
Activate F Envision

Trigger You deal damage using the affixed weapon to a creature you have seen commit an evil act.

This long, fire-red feather seems to catch flame every time the weapon it adorns strikes a purveyor of evil. When you activate the feather, the creature you damaged burns with holy light. The creature must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:29] save or take a -2 status penalty to AC and saving throws and reduce its resistances by 5. These effects last until the end of your next turn.

Ball.name: Ball
Ball.description: Toy balls come in a variety of shapes, sizes, and compositions, such as with squishy fabric, bouncy rubber, or lightweight wicker, or forms like bean-filled sacks and hard-hide balls.

Bandalore.name: Bandalore
Bandalore.description: Similar to a spool of string, a bandalore consists of two wooden disks connected to a central axle wound with string. By holding the end of the string and releasing the bandalore, a skilled user can move the bandalore up and down, performing a variety of tricks.

Bane.name: Bane
Bane.description:
A bane rune causes a weapon to grant you improved understanding of creatures of a particular type, allowing you to deal more damage to those creatures. The crafter chooses aberration, animal, beast, celestial, construct, dragon, elemental, fey, fiend, giant, monitor, ooze, or both fungus and plant. The weapon deals 1d6 additional damage of the weapon's damage type to creatures with the chosen trait or traits. The benefit doesn't apply against creatures of the chosen type disguised as other creatures. It's up to GM discretion whether the bane rune applies against a creature disguised as a creature of the chosen type.

The GM might allow bane runes for other creature traits, such as astral, dream, or demon. However, humanoids, undead, and specific types of humanoids (such as elves) are never a valid option.

Barbed Vest.name: Barbed Vest
Barbed Vest.description:
Viciously sharp spiked chains wrap around this @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.ewQZ0VeL38v3qFnN]{Studded Leather Armor} that can be used to magically harm the wearer and channel supernatural abilities without somehow tearing at the leather itself.

The barbed vest doesn't fuse to you in the usual way. It can be removed and discarded, but 1 day after doing so, you feel driven to recollect the vest at any cost until the curse is removed with a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OyFCwQuw8XRazsNr]{Remove Curse} spell.

Anytime you activate the barbed vest, its chains tighten around you, dealing [[/r {1d6}[persistent,piercing]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Piercing Damage}. You can remove this persistent damage as normal, but only after deactivating the item's magic as a single action.

Activate 2 Interact;

Frequency Once per day;

Effect The barbed vest casts @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Fq9yCbqI2RDt6Orw]{Spiritual Weapon}, summoning a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zi9ovfoRp2fMhfpO]{Spiked Chain} to fight for you.

Barding of the Zephyr.name: 西风马铠 Barding of the Zephyr
Barding of the Zephyr.description:
这副轻盈的马铠上复有风格化的流风图纹。当你为你的动物伙伴穿戴上这副马铠，它会自动调整形状以契合你的动物伙伴。

当你的动物伙伴坠落时，风会从下方接住它；它获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{羽落术 Feather Fall}的效果。

启动 D 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你的手指划过马铠上的流风图纹，给予穿戴马铠的动物伙伴30尺的飞行速度Speed，持续10分钟。即使伙伴没有骑乘特殊能力，它也可以在被骑乘时飞行。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.P7Y7pO2ulZ5wBgxU]{效果：西风马铠}

Barkskin Potion.name: 树肤药水 Barkskin Potion
Barkskin Potion.description: 在你喝下这瓶苦涩的药水之后，你的皮肤如树皮一样变得粗厚。你获得2环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YWrfKetOqDwVFut7]{树肤术 Barkskin}的效果，持续10分钟。

Barricade Stone (Cube).name: Barricade Stone (Cube)
Barricade Stone (Cube).description:
Activate 2 command, Interact

The ancient inhabitants of Bloodsalt crafted these magic rocks to construct defenses quickly. In its stone form, a barricade stone appears to be a simple pebble with an unnaturally geometric shape. The size and shape of the stone's final form depends on the type of barricade stone.

When you activate the barricade stone, you drop it on the ground, throw it up to 20 feet away, or sling it using a sling weapon.

Upon landing, the stone instantly and permanently expands. The stone grows to its maximum size. While normally items with the structure trait put creatures in their area inside the structure, this effect creates solid stone, so it can't be placed in an area where there are creatures. While it's likely to take some time even with the right tools, an activated barricade stone can be destroyed the same as any normal stone structure (Hardness 14, HP 56).

Type: Cube

This seemingly simple six-sided die was designed to block a corridor. When activated, it grows to fill a solid square or rectangular space no more than 20 feet on any side. The cube fills spaces well enough that Tiny creatures can't slip through, but it's far from a perfect seal. Liquids, gases, and minuscule creatures such as insects can still find ways around it. Depending on the irregularities of the space the cube fills, it might be possible to see or hear past it.

Barricade Stone (Cylinder).name: Barricade Stone (Cylinder)
Barricade Stone (Cylinder).description:
Activate 2 command, Interact

The ancient inhabitants of Bloodsalt crafted these magic rocks to construct defenses quickly. In its stone form, a barricade stone appears to be a simple pebble with an unnaturally geometric shape. The size and shape of the stone's final form depends on the type of barricade stone.

When you activate the barricade stone, you drop it on the ground, throw it up to 20 feet away, or sling it using a sling weapon.

Upon landing, the stone instantly and permanently expands. The stone grows to its maximum size. While normally items with the structure trait put creatures in their area inside the structure, this effect creates solid stone, so it can't be placed in an area where there are creatures. While it's likely to take some time even with the right tools, an activated barricade stone can be destroyed the same as any normal stone structure (Hardness 14, HP 56).

Type: Cylinder

When activated, this cylinder expands to a diameter of 5 feet, 10 feet, or 20 feet, depending on the command, with respective maximum heights of 80 feet, 40 feet, and 20 feet. If a dimension can't be reached due to contact with another solid surface, the cylinder ceases to grow in that direction.

You can activate the cylinder horizontally instead of vertically. If you do, the cylinder moves similarly to the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.RBjyD36IrrFOwFXR]{Barricade Stone (Sphere)}, with the following changes: both DCs increase to 27, the damage increases to [[/r {6d6}[bludgeoning]]]{6d6 bludgeoning damage}, and a creature that critically fails its Reflex save against the rolling cylinder gains the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded 1} condition (or increases the value of its wounded condition by 1).

Barricade Stone (Sphere).name: Barricade Stone (Sphere)
Barricade Stone (Sphere).description:
Activate 2 command, Interact

The ancient inhabitants of Bloodsalt crafted these magic rocks to construct defenses quickly. In its stone form, a barricade stone appears to be a simple pebble with an unnaturally geometric shape. The size and shape of the stone's final form depends on the type of barricade stone.

When you activate the barricade stone, you drop it on the ground, throw it up to 20 feet away, or sling it using a sling weapon.

Upon landing, the stone instantly and permanently expands. The stone grows to its maximum size. While normally items with the structure trait put creatures in their area inside the structure, this effect creates solid stone, so it can't be placed in an area where there are creatures. While it's likely to take some time even with the right tools, an activated barricade stone can be destroyed the same as any normal stone structure (Hardness 14, HP 56).

Type: Sphere

This smooth marble keeps its shape when activated, growing into a spherical boulder 10 feet in diameter. If stationary, the boulder can be pushed 5 feet with a successful @Check[type:athletics|dc:24|name:Push the Barricade Stone check]. If the marble was thrown or slung, the boulder retains its momentum, moving 25 feet away from you each round. A creature in the boulder's way takes [[/r {4d6}[bludgeoning]]]{4d6 bludgeoning damage} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:20|basic:true|name:Avoid the Barricade Stone] save; on a failure, the creature is knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}).

Basic Cane.name: Basic Cane
Basic Cane.description: A basic cane is a straight cane with a curved handle, shaped like the tip of a hook. Its simple design helps with balance and only slightly assists with taking weight off the affected opposite leg. The cane is typically 2 to 3 feet long but can be lengthened or shortened as needed.

Basic Chair.name: Basic Chair
Basic Chair.description: This common wheelchair is ideal for everyday use but isn't designed for strenuous activity. Basic chairs are most common among non-adventurers.

Basic Corrective Lenses.name: Basic Corrective Lenses
Basic Corrective Lenses.description: A set of corrective lenses might take the form of eyeglasses or specialized goggles. You can don or remove your corrective lenses as an Interact action.

Basic Crafter's Book.name: 基本匠人书籍 Basic Crafter's Book
Basic Crafter's Book.description: 包含CRB中所有常见物品的制造公式

Basic Crutch.name: Basic Crutch
Basic Crutch.description: Crutches come as singles or a pair depending on how much support you need while walking. A crutch fits under your armpit, and you use your hand and the swing of your arm to move with them.

Basic Hearing Aid.name: Basic Hearing Aid
Basic Hearing Aid.description: A basic hearing aid rests on the ear and is made from carved wood, shaped metal, or even small clockwork pieces. The shape of the device aids those that are hard of hearing, and you can wear one or two depending on your hearing loss. You can attach or remove your hearing aids as an Interact action.

Basic Prosthesis.name: Basic Prosthesis
Basic Prosthesis.description: A basic prosthesis replaces a missing or damaged body part. Typical prostheses include artificial feet, eyes, hands, and limbs, though a basic prosthesis can be designed as a replacement for any body part. A prosthesis has a number of belts or cuffs that keep it attached to your body. You can attach or remove a prosthesis as an Interact action.

Basilisk Eye.name: Basilisk Eye
Basilisk Eye.description:
Activate F Envision

Trigger You @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} a melee attack with the affixed shield.

This slimy green stone glows with a strong light whenever the shield it adorns blocks a melee attack. When the eye is activated, the attacker must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25] save or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute as its body slowly stiffens in partial petrification.

Bastard Sword.name: 变种剑 Bastard Sword
Bastard Sword.description: 这种宽刃剑，有时被称为半手剑，有较长的握柄，因此可以一手握住或双手使用，以提供额外的刺穿或切割力。

Battle Axe.name: 战斧 Battle Axe
Battle Axe.description: 这些斧子被明确设计成武器，而不是工具。它们通常重量较轻，轴由金属带或螺栓加固，刀片更锋利，非常适合切碎四肢而不是木头。

Battle Lute.name: Battle Lute
Battle Lute.description: This reinforced lute is suitable both for use as a handheld musical instrument and for bashing heads should a crowd turn sour. Its strings are finely braided wires that run along its sturdy metal neck.

Bayonet.name: Bayonet
Bayonet.description: This blade or spike can be attached to a crossbow or firearm but, unlike other attached weapons, can be wielded in one hand as its own weapon. When used as a separate weapon, it can't benefit from any runes or abilities that function only for attached weapons.

Beacon Shot.name: 信标箭矢 Beacon Shot
Beacon Shot.description:
启动 A 交互

信标箭矢的杆上装点着闪闪发亮的宝石微粒。当一支启动的信标箭矢命中了一个目标，它牢牢嵌入目标体内并喷出火星，持续1分钟。如果目标是 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}的，他在本来不能看到他的生物眼中变成了 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden} 。如果目标处于 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} 状态，火星也能抵消掉该状态。

生物可以通过一个交互Interact动作，并成功通过一个DC 20的运动Athletics检定以移除嵌入体内的箭或矢。

Beckoning Cat Amulet.name: Beckoning Cat Amulet
Beckoning Cat Amulet.description:
Activate F envision

Trigger You use a feat or ability to reroll a failed or critically failed Reflex saving throw (such as Cat's Luck or Halfling Luck).

This clay figurine resembles a white cat with a paw outstretched. When it's activated, any allies within 10 feet who also just failed or critically failed a Reflex saving throw from the same source (such as a fireball spell) can also reroll their saving throw and use the better result.

Belladonna.name: 颠茄 Belladonna
Belladonna.description:
颠茄有时候也被称作 "死亡龙葵"，它是一种被广泛使用的毒物，通常从类似番茄的植物中提取而出。

启动 D 交互 (摄入)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]

潜伏期 10 分钟

最大持续时间 30 分钟

阶段 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} (10 分钟)

阶段 2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 毒素伤害} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (10 分钟)

阶段 3 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 毒素伤害}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}和 恶心 sickened 1 (1 分钟)

Bellflower Toolbelt.name: Bellflower Toolbelt
Bellflower Toolbelt.description:
Different versions of this belt are customized to appear to suit specific trades, so a belt used for carpentry would look somewhat different than a belt for baking.

Activate D envision, Interact

Effect You place an object of up to 1 Bulk into the belt, transforming that object into a tool befitting the trade for which the belt was created. As long as there are enough transformed items, the belt can be used as artisan's tools for that trade.

Each object remains transformed until it has been removed from the belt for 24 hours or someone uses a single Interact action to return it to its normal form.

Belt of Giant Strength.name: 巨人力量腰带 Belt of Giant Strength
Belt of Giant Strength.description:
这条厚重的皮革腰带上面装饰着镶嵌着闪耀石英的搭扣，石英被雕刻成了拳头的形状。你在运动Athletics检定上获得+3物品加值，并在用来提重物，逃脱Escape，以及破拆Force Open的运动Athletics检定中获得+2环境加值。

若绑定了该腰带，你能将你的力量Strength提升2点，或将其提升至18点，选择结果更高的选项。

启动 R 交互

触发 你是一次投石攻击的目标，或者有一块石头正要砸中你

效果 尝试一次运动Atheletics检定以抓住触发的石头。使用投石者的运动DC、灾害或其他效果的DC等，如果没有其他适用的DC，则将DC定为35。你必须空出一只手才能抓住这块石头，但作为这次反应的一部分，你可以放开Release任何手上抓着的物品以空出手来。

成功 你成功抓住这块石头，不受到任何伤害，并正在持握着这块石头。

失败 你受到一半的伤害

大失败 你受到完整的伤害

自动生效:

  • 运动Athletics检定上获得+3物品加值
  • 在用来提重物，逃脱Escape，以及破拆Force Open的运动Athletics检定中获得+2环境加值

Belt of Good Health.name: Belt of Good Health
Belt of Good Health.description: When you put on this belt, its silver buckle begins to glow, which slowly spreads into the heart-shaped jewel in the center. You increase your maximum Hit Points and current Hit Points by 4. If you remove the belt, you immediately decrease both your maximum and current HP by 4.

Belt of Regeneration.name: 再生腰带 Belt of Regeneration
Belt of Regeneration.description:
这条橙色绿色相间的腰带是由富有弹性的巨魔皮制成的。当你在一天之内首次绑定该腰带时，你获得15点临时生命值。若绑定了该腰带，你能将你的体质Constitution提升2点，或将其提升至18点，选择结果更高的选项。

启动 A 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你将腰带束紧一档以获得一个再生效果。在接下来的 [[/r 2d4]] 内，在每轮你的回合开始时你会恢复 [[/r 15]] 点生命值，除非在你的前一回合开始之后，你承受了强酸或火焰伤害。

自动生效:

  • 获得15点临时生命值

Belt of the Five Kings.name: 五王腰带 Belt of the Five Kings
Belt of the Five Kings.description:
这条沉重的腰带由互相链接的金板和银板制成，上面雕刻了五位矮人王者风格化的微型头像。你在使用交涉Diplomacy检定，试图对矮人建立印象Make a Impression或提出请求Request时能够获得+1环境加值。你也能在针对巨人和兽人的威吓Intimidation检定中获得+1环境加值。

这条腰带也能给予你黑暗视觉以及理解，读，写矮人语的能力。

启动1 交互

频率 每天一次

需求 你是一个矮人

效果 你扣紧腰带上的一个锁扣，获得等同于你等级的临时生命值，并为你20尺以内的盟友提供黑暗视觉的效果。这两个效果都持续10分钟。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.cg5qyeMJUh6b4fta]{效果：五王腰带（穿戴者）}

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.fbSFwwp60AuDDKpK]{效果：五王腰带（队友）}

自动生效:

  • 对矮人建立印象Make a Impression或提出请求Request时能够获得+1环境加值
  • 对巨人和兽人的威吓Intimidation检定中获得+1环境加值
  • 你获得黑暗视觉

Berserker's Cloak.name: 狂战士披风 Berserker's Cloak
Berserker's Cloak.description:
这张熊皮上附带着熊头以及裸露的熊牙。当你穿上这件披风时，披风会复盖你的头部和肩膀，向你灌注熊的凶猛力量。

如果你拥有狂暴Rage动作，当你狂暴时你会获得造成1d10穿刺伤害的啮咬以及造成1d6挥砍伤害，并具有灵巧Agile特征的爪击。这种变化属于变形效果，啮咬以及爪击都是无武装攻击，属于搏击武器组。你的这些攻击也会获得一个+1武器潜能符文以及一个强击符文的效果（在攻击骰上获得+1物品加值，并提供一个额外的武器伤害骰）。

如果你有动物本能（见野蛮人职业介绍）以及兽性狂暴本能能力，你的这些攻击会获得一个+2武器潜能符文以及一个高等强击符文的效果（在攻击骰上获得+2物品加值，并提供两个额外的武器伤害骰）。

制造需求 你是一个拥有动物本能的野蛮人。

Berserker's Cloak (Greater).name: 高等狂战士披风 Berserker's Cloak (Greater)
Berserker's Cloak (Greater).description:
这张熊皮上附带着熊头以及裸露的熊牙。当你穿上这件披风时，披风会复盖你的头部和肩膀，向你灌注熊的凶猛力量。

如果你拥有狂暴Rage动作，当你狂暴时你会获得造成1d10穿刺伤害的啮咬以及造成1d6挥砍伤害，并具有灵巧Agile特征的爪击。这种变化属于变形效果，啮咬以及爪击都是无武装攻击，属于搏击武器组。你的这些攻击也会获得一个+2武器潜能符文以及一个高等强击符文的效果（在攻击骰上获得+2物品加值，并提供两个额外的武器伤害骰）。

如果你有动物本能（见野蛮人职业介绍）以及兽性狂暴本能能力，你的这些攻击会获得一个+3武器潜能符文以及一个上等强击符文的效果（在攻击骰上获得+3物品加值，并提供三个额外的武器伤害骰）。

制造需求 你是一个拥有动物本能的野蛮人。

Bestial Mutagen (Greater).name: 高等野性突变药剂 Bestial Mutagen (Greater)
Bestial Mutagen (Greater).description:
启动 A 交互

你转化出某种野兽的特征并长出膨大的肌肉，但这个粗壮的形态同样十分笨拙。

好处 你在运动（Athletics）检定和无武装攻击骰上获得+3物品加值。你获得啮咬（jaws）无武装攻击 ([[/r {1d8}[slashing]]]{1d8 挥砍伤害}) 以及带有灵巧（agile）特征的爪抓（claw）无武装攻击。 ([[/r {1d10}[piercing]]]{1d10 穿刺伤害})。

缺陷 你在AC上承受-1的减值，并在反射豁免上承受-2的减值。

Duration 1 小时

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.kwD0wuW5Ndkc9YXB]{效果：高等野性突变药剂}

Bestial Mutagen (Lesser).name: 次等野性突变药剂 Bestial Mutagen (Lesser)
Bestial Mutagen (Lesser).description:
启动 A 交互

你转化出某种野兽的特征并长出膨大的肌肉，但这个粗壮的形态同样十分笨拙。

好处 你在运动（Athletics）检定和无武装攻击骰上获得+1物品加值。你获得啮咬（jaws）无武装攻击 ([[/r {1d4}[slashing]]]{1d4 挥砍伤害}) 以及带有灵巧（agile）特征的爪抓（claw）无武装攻击。 ([[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 穿刺伤害})。

缺陷 你在AC上承受-1的减值，并在反射豁免上承受-2的减值。

Duration 1 分钟

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.fIpzDpuwLdIS4tW5]{效果：次等野性突变药剂}

Bestial Mutagen (Major).name: 上等野性突变药剂 Bestial Mutagen (Major)
Bestial Mutagen (Major).description:
启动 1 交互

你转化出某种野兽的特征并长出膨大的肌肉，但这个粗壮的形态同样十分笨拙。

好处 你在运动（Athletics）检定和无武装攻击骰上获得+4物品加值。你获得啮咬（jaws）无武装攻击 ([[/r {1d8}[slashing]]]{1d8 挥砍伤害}) 以及带有灵巧（agile）特征的爪抓（claw）无武装攻击。 ([[/r {1d10}[piercing]]]{1d10 穿刺伤害})。 你获得爪抓和啮咬的武器专精，如果你已经拥有无武装攻击的武器专精，那么你会转而获得爪抓和啮咬的高等武器专精。

缺陷 你在AC上承受-1的减值，并在反射豁免上承受-2的减值。

Duration 1 小时

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.1ouUo8lLK6H79Rqh]{效果：上等野性突变药剂}

Bestial Mutagen (Moderate).name: 中等野性突变药剂 Bestial Mutagen (Moderate)
Bestial Mutagen (Moderate).description:
启动 A 交互

你转化出某种野兽的特征并长出膨大的肌肉，但这个粗壮的形态同样十分笨拙。

好处 你在运动（Athletics）检定和无武装攻击骰上获得+2物品加值。你获得啮咬（jaws）无武装攻击 ([[/r {1d6}[slashing]]]{1d6 挥砍伤害}) 以及带有灵巧（agile）特征的爪抓（claw）无武装攻击。 ([[/r {1d8}[piercing]]]{1d8 穿刺伤害})。

缺陷 你在AC上承受-1的减值，并在反射豁免上承受-2的减值。

Duration 10 分钟

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.xFQRiVU6h8EA6Lw9]{效果：中等野性突变药剂}

Bestiary of Metamorphosis.name: Bestiary of Metamorphosis
Bestiary of Metamorphosis.description:
This grimoire fancifully illustrates the spells you inscribe within it with illuminated drawings of creatures that have never existed, the pictures changing to depict new ones from time to time.

Activate 1 envision (polymorph, transmutation)

Frequency once per day

Requirements You're under the effect of a polymorph spell you prepared from this grimoire that offers a choice of multiple forms

Effect You transform into a different form allowed by the polymorph by bending and molding the spell's energy. This reduces the spell's remaining duration by half.

Bi-Resonant Wayfinder.name: Bi-Resonant Wayfinder
Bi-Resonant Wayfinder.description:
A bi-resonant wayfinder is inlaid with intricate platinum wires in a complex array of conduits for magical energy. These conduits control the resonant interference of aeon stones.

A bi-resonant wayfinder works just like a regular @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder} except it has two aeon stone slots, and the aeon stones in both slots grant their resonant powers without interfering with each other. The bi-resonant wayfinder and the two aeon stones count as two items toward your investiture limit.

Big Boom Gun.name: Big Boom Gun
Big Boom Gun.description:
Developed by a goblin weaponsmith who missed the 'hand' part of 'hand cannon', this comically-oversized gun has a heavily reinforced barrel and is loaded with a worrisome quantity of gunpowder.

This hand cannon is a martial weapon, instead of a simple weapon. It has the fatal d12 trait and a range of 20 feet. It also has the following modified critical failure condition:

Critical Failure The attack misses, the weapon misfires, and you take [[/r {1d12}[fire]]]{1d12 fire damage} as it explodes in your face.

Big Rock Bullet.name: Big Rock Bullet
Big Rock Bullet.description:
Ammunition sling bullet

Activate 1 Interact

A big rock bullet is a sling bullet made of heavy granite, but each piece of ammunition feels much more dense than it appears. When activated, a big rock bullet transforms into a giant rock just before hitting the target. The target takes [[/r {4d6}[bludgeoning]]]{4d6 additional bludgeoning damage} on a successful hit. Even on a failed attack roll (but not a critical failure), the target takes [[/r {2d6}[bludgeoning]]]{2d6 bludgeoning damage}. Creatures with the @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.uG0Z8PsyZtsYuvGR]{Catch Rock} reaction can use it against a big rock bullet.

Big Rock Bullet (Greater).name: Big Rock Bullet (Greater)
Big Rock Bullet (Greater).description:
Ammunition sling bullet

Activate 1 Interact

A big rock bullet is a sling bullet made of heavy granite, but each piece of ammunition feels much more dense than it appears. When activated, a big rock bullet transforms into a giant rock just before hitting the target. The target takes [[/r {8d6}[bludgeoning]]]{8d6 additional bludgeoning damage} on a successful hit. Even on a failed attack roll (but not a critical failure), the target takes [[/r {4d6}[bludgeoning]]]{4d6 bludgeoning damage}. Creatures with the @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.uG0Z8PsyZtsYuvGR]{Catch Rock} reaction can use it against a big rock bullet.

Big Rock Bullet (Major).name: Big Rock Bullet (Major)
Big Rock Bullet (Major).description:
Ammunition sling bullet

Activate 1 Interact

A big rock bullet is a sling bullet made of heavy granite, but each piece of ammunition feels much more dense than it appears. When activated, a big rock bullet transforms into a giant rock just before hitting the target. The target takes [[/r {12d6}[bludgeoning]]]{12d6 additional bludgeoning damage} on a successful hit. Even on a failed attack roll (but not a critical failure), the target takes [[/r {6d6}[bludgeoning]]]{6d6 bludgeoning damage}. Creatures with the @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.uG0Z8PsyZtsYuvGR]{Catch Rock} reaction can use it against a big rock bullet.

Binding Coil.name: Binding Coil
Binding Coil.description:
Activate f envision

Trigger Your Strike with the affixed weapon damages a creature

Requirements You're an expert in Athletics.

This talisman, a bright red coil that's warm to the touch and faintly resembles a serpent, wraps entirely around your weapon. When you activate this talisman's effect, attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} the creature you hit. On a success, rather than the normal Grapple effects, the coil instead wraps itself around the target with one end remaining attached to your weapon. Your opponent must succeed at a DC 20 Escape check to break free. The coil breaks if you move any further away from the bound opponent, but not if you move any closer.

Binding Coil (Greater).name: Binding Coil (Greater)
Binding Coil (Greater).description:
Activate f envision

Trigger Your Strike with the affixed weapon damages a creature

Requirements You're an expert in Athletics.

This talisman, a bright red coil that's warm to the touch and faintly resembles a serpent, wraps entirely around your weapon. When you activate this talisman's effect, attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} the creature you hit. On a success, rather than the normal Grapple effects, the coil instead wraps itself around the target with one end remaining attached to your weapon. Your opponent must succeed at a DC 30 Escape check to break free. The coil breaks if you move any further away from the bound opponent, but not if you move any closer.

Binding Snare.name: Binding Snare
Binding Snare.description:
When a creature enters the snare's square, several strands of strong wires ending in jagged hooks latch onto it before hauling it to the ground. The snare deals [[/r {2d6}[piercing]]]{2d6 Piercing Damage}, and the targeted creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:28] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is knock @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 round (Escape DC 28).

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage, is knocked prone, and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} for 1 round (Escape DC 28).

Biting Snare.name: 刺骨圈套 Biting Snare
Biting Snare.description:
这圈套的尖牙利齿能够咬住踏入其中的生物的腿。这个圈套对第一个进入所在方格的生物造成5d6穿刺伤害；该生物必须尝试一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:18]豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响

成功 该生物承受一半的伤害

失败 该生物承受完整的伤害

大失败 该生物承受双倍伤害，并在成功恢复至少1点生命值之前都必须在速度Speed上承受-10尺状态罚值。

Bitter.name: Bitter
Bitter.description: While you wear this acrid armor, any creature that Engulfs you or Swallows you Whole is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}; if it spends an action retching to reduce the sickened condition, you can attempt to Escape as a reaction.

Black Adder Venom.name: 黑蝰毒 Black Adder Venom
Black Adder Venom.description:
蝰蛇毒液是强化武器的一种简单却有效的方式。

启动 D 交互 (受伤)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18]

最大持续时间 3 轮

阶段 1 [[/r {1d8}[poison]]]{1d8 毒素伤害} (1 轮)

阶段 2 [[/r {1d10}[poison]]]{1d10 毒素伤害} (1 轮)

阶段 3 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6 毒素伤害} (1 轮)

Black Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult).name: 成年黑龙龙息药水 Black Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult)
Black Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult).description:
这种液体包含了黑龙的血。你饮下这瓶调和物之后的一小时内，你可以喷出黑龙的吐息武器。吐息的效力基于药水的类型，是根据提供龙血的龙的年龄来决定的。药水拥有和吐息武器伤害类型一致的特征。

释放龙息要花费一个动作。你喷出范围为 @Template[type:line|distance:30] 的强酸龙息，造成 [[/r {6d6}[acid]]]{6d6 酸液伤害}。每个区域内的生物都必须尝试一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true|name:Adult Black Dragon's Breath Potion] 豁免检定。

使用了一次吐息武器之后，你在 [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 轮}内无法再次使用。

Black Dragon's Breath Potion (Wyrm).name: 古黑龙龙息药水 Black Dragon's Breath Potion (Wyrm)
Black Dragon's Breath Potion (Wyrm).description:
这种液体包含了黑龙的血。你饮下这瓶调和物之后的一小时内，你可以喷出黑龙的吐息武器。吐息的效力基于药水的类型，是根据提供龙血的龙的年龄来决定的。药水拥有和吐息武器伤害类型一致的特征。

释放龙息要花费一个动作。你喷出范围为 @Template[type:line|distance:30] 的强酸龙息，造成 [[/r {10d6}[acid]]]{10d6 酸液伤害}。每个区域内的生物都必须尝试一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:37|basic:true|name:Wyrm Black Dragon's Breath Potion] 豁免检定。

使用了一次吐息武器之后，你在 [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 轮}内无法再次使用。

Black Dragon's Breath Potion (Young).name: 青年黑龙龙息药水 Black Dragon's Breath Potion (Young)
Black Dragon's Breath Potion (Young).description:
这种液体包含了黑龙的血。你饮下这瓶调和物之后的一小时内，你可以喷出黑龙的吐息武器。吐息的效力基于药水的类型，是根据提供龙血的龙的年龄来决定的。药水拥有和吐息武器伤害类型一致的特征。

释放龙息要花费一个动作。你喷出范围为 @Template[type:line|distance:30] 的强酸龙息，造成 [[/r {4d6}[acid]]]{4d6 酸液伤害}。每个区域内的生物都必须尝试一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:23|basic:true|name:Young Black Dragon's Breath Potion] 豁免检定。

使用了一次吐息武器之后，你在 [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 轮}内无法再次使用。

Black Lotus Extract.name: 黑莲汁 Black Lotus Extract
Black Lotus Extract.description:
黑莲汁能够引发严重的内出血。

启动 A 交互 (接触)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:42]

潜伏期 1 分钟

最大持续时间 6 轮

阶段 1 [[/r {15d6}[poison]]]{15d6 毒素伤害} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} (1 轮)

阶段 2 [[/r {17d6}[poison]]]{17d6 毒素伤害} 和 流失drained 1 (1 轮)

阶段 3 [[/r {20d6}[poison]]]{20d6 毒素伤害} 和 流失drained 2 (1 轮)

Black Powder (Dose or Round).name: Black Powder (Dose or Round)
Black Powder (Dose or Round).description:
Activate 1 Interact

Black powder is a volatile and explosive alchemical substance commonly used in the production of firearm munitions. Black powder becomes inert and useless when wet and must be kept in a sealed, water-tight container.

The smallest unit of black powder that still has a simple use, a dose can be a simple package paper parcel around black powder or it can be packaged with a metal bullet or pellet to be used as ammunition. When ignited with a fuse or exposed to direct flame, a dose of black powder explodes. This isn't powerful enough to deal damage but makes a loud sound and could trigger further explosions. A fuse for a dose can be created with a few twists of paper and causes the dose to explode the round after it's lit.

Black Powder (Horn).name: Black Powder (Horn)
Black Powder (Horn).description:
Activate 1 Interact

Black powder is a volatile and explosive alchemical substance commonly used in the production of firearm munitions. Black powder becomes inert and useless when wet and must be kept in a sealed, water-tight container.

A horn contains 500 doses worth of black powder. A horn can be detonated by leaving a small trail of black powder and then lighting it. Each 5-foot square requires one dose of black powder to create a trail through. As long as the horn is mostly full (at least 400 doses remaining) it can be detonated to deal [[/r {1d6}[fire]]]{1d6 fire damage} in a @Template[type:burst|distance:5] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:16|basic:true|name:Gunpowder Detonation] save). It takes 1 round per 15 feet of powder trail laid down for a horn to detonate after the trail is lit. If multiple horns detonate simultaneously, it can increase the area of the explosion, but the damage in overlapping areas doesn't increase.

Black Powder (Keg).name: Black Powder (Keg)
Black Powder (Keg).description:
Activate 1 Interact

Black powder is a volatile and explosive alchemical substance commonly used in the production of firearm munitions. Black powder becomes inert and useless when wet and must be kept in a sealed, water-tight container.

A keg contains 5,000 doses of black powder and can be detonated in the same way as a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.sHBk2pY0I6dCW2Mw]{Black Powder (Horn)}. As long as the keg is mostly full (at least 4,000 doses remaining) this deals [[/r {3d6}[fire]]]{3d6 fire damage} in a @Template[type:burst|distance:20] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:20|basic:true|name:Gunpowder Detonation] save). Detonating multiple kegs can increase the area, but not the damage, of this effect; detonating a keg and any horns at the same time in an overlapping area also doesn't increase the damage.

Black Powder Knuckle Dusters.name: Black Powder Knuckle Dusters
Black Powder Knuckle Dusters.description: This pair of knuckle dusters is fitted with an explosive charge of black powder within the hollowed spikes of the weapon and a firing mechanism you hold in your hand while in use.

Black Smear Poison.name: Black Smear Poison
Black Smear Poison.description:
Many calignis use a debilitating poison crafted from subterranean fungi.

Activate T Interact (Injury)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 poison damage} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 As stage 1

Stage 3 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 poison damage}, and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} (1 round)

Blackaxe.name: Blackaxe
Blackaxe.description:
This potent weapon used by Treerazer is a +4 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.vQUIUAFOTOWj3ohh]{Corrosive (Greater)} major striking obsidian greataxe that grants a +4 item bonus to attack rolls, deals an extra 2d6 damage to plants, and has the properties of adamantine.

Activate1 (divination, scrying)

Requirements You aren't wielding Blackaxe and you are its true owner.

Effect You sense the world around Blackaxe as though you were in its location and can use any of your innate spells through the link as if it were the source of the spell. If another creature is wielding Blackaxe, it must succeed at a DC 50 Will save or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} until it relinquishes the weapon.

Activatef command (conjuration, teleportation)

Requirements You aren't wielding Blackaxe and you are its true owner.

Effect Blackaxe appears in your hands, teleporting instantly from its prior location.

Activate1 command (death, healing, necromancy)

Frequency once per minute.

Effect Make a Strike against a living tree with Blackaxe. If it hits, the tree withers to ash and you heal 250 Hit Points and gain the benefit of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SnaLVgxZ9ryUFmUr]{Restoration} (6th) and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Et8RSCLx8w7uOLvo]{Restore Senses}.

Blackfinger Blight.name: Blackfinger Blight
Blackfinger Blight.description:
Activate2Interact

This oily, dark purple powder gives off the distinct odor of boiled leather. When delivered, the poison acts quickly to constrict the victim's blood flow to their extremities and turn their lungs into a soft jelly. A victim of blackfinger blight is recognizable by the pores of their fingertips weeping an inky oil that coats their hands and makes it difficult to hold things. Each round, at the beginning of their turn, a creature affected by blackfinger blight must succeed at a flat DC 5 check or drop one random item they're holding.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:32]

Onset 1 round

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r {6d6}[poison]]]{6d6 poison damage} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r {8d6}[poison]]]{8d6 poison damage} (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r {10d6}[poison]]]{10d6 poison damage} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused}(1 round)

Blade of Four Energies.name: Blade of Four Energies
Blade of Four Energies.description:
This +2 greater striking shifting shortsword is formed of rapidly vibrating air and magical energy, though it uses the same statistics as iron. The wooden hilt is adorned with four gems, representing the energies of acid, cold, fire, and electricity, that sparkle in sequence at random intervals.

Activate f Interact

Frequency once per round

Effect You draw magical energy from one of the gems. Roll [[/r 1d4]]. Until the start of your next turn, the weapon gains the corresponding rune:

  1. @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Wm0X7Pfd1bfocPSv]{Corrosive},
  2. @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.XszNvxnymWYRaoTp]{Flaming},
  3. @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.M5M1WJ5KzbYfRGsY]{Frost}, or
  4. @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.NVst7e69agGG9Qwd]{Shock}.

Activate 2 command, envision

Frequency once per day

Requirements The blade has an energy rune from the first activation

Effect You call upon the energy stored in the blade to explode outward. The blade of four energies casts a 5th-level spell that depends on the active rune:

  1. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.f8hRqLJaxBVhF1u0]{Acid Arrow} for corrosive,
  2. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball} for flaming,
  3. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.3puDanGfpEt6jK5k]{Cone of Cold} for frost, or
  4. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{Lightning Bolt} for shock.

Blade of Four Energies (Greater).name: Blade of Four Energies (Greater)
Blade of Four Energies (Greater).description:
This +2 greater striking shifting shortsword is formed of rapidly vibrating air and magical energy, though it uses the same statistics as iron. The wooden hilt is adorned with four gems, representing the energies of acid, cold, fire, and electricity, that sparkle in sequence at random intervals.

Activate f Interact

Frequency once per round

Effect You draw magical energy from one of the gems. Roll [[/r 1d4]]. Until the start of your next turn, the weapon gains the corresponding rune:

  1. @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.vQUIUAFOTOWj3ohh]{Greater Corrosive},
  2. @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.RSZwUlCzUX7Nb4UA]{Greater Flaming},
  3. @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Sexud7FdxIrg50vU]{Greater Frost}, or
  4. @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.TEa1oKZbwsOvC6TZ]{Greater Shock}.

Activate 2 command, envision

Frequency once per day

Requirements The blade has an energy rune from the first activation

Effect You call upon the energy stored in the blade to explode outward. The blade of four energies casts a 7th-level spell with a DC of 38 that depends on the active rune:

  1. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.f8hRqLJaxBVhF1u0]{Acid Arrow} for corrosive,
  2. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball} for flaming,
  3. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.3puDanGfpEt6jK5k]{Cone of Cold} for frost, or
  4. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{Lightning Bolt} for shock.

Blade of the Black Soverign.name: Blade of the Black Soverign
Blade of the Black Soverign.description:
This +2 greater striking @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.NVst7e69agGG9Qwd]{Shock} greatsword is forged from standard-grade adamantine, with inlays of broken circuitry and a robot's ocular lens on the cross guard. A soft thrum comes from the blade, which you feel as a subtle pulse through the grip when wielding it. It sparks when unsheathed, emitting dim light within 5 feet.

On a hit against a foe made of metal, wearing metal armor, or using a metal shield, if the foe takes electricity damage from the blade, the makes the foe flat-footed for 1 round; if the Strike was a critical hit, it also makes them clumsy 1 for 1 round.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Effect You cast the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kBhaPuzLUSwS6vVf]{Electric Arc} cantrip from the sword as an 8th-level primal spell, using 10 + your melee attack modifier with the Blade of the Black Sovereign as your spell DC.

Blade of the Rabbit Prince.name: Blade of the Rabbit Prince
Blade of the Rabbit Prince.description:
This +2 greater striking @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.DCPsilr8wbPXxTUv]{Dancing} shortsword has a golden handguard resembling a bird with outstretched wings. The sword's blade is broken halfway up its length, but this doesn't impair the sword's function.

Activate 1 command, Interact

Effect You attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} an opponent using Thievery instead of Athletics, and you add the blade of the Rabbit Prince's item bonus to the check. You do not need to have a hand free if you're wielding the blade of the Rabbit Prince, and your target can be up to two sizes larger than you.

Craft Requirements You must craft the blade in the Harrowed Realm.

Bladed Diabolo.name: Bladed Diabolo
Bladed Diabolo.description: This weapon consists of two bladed discs joined by a central axel, and is spun on a rope whose ends are attached to wand-like sticks. The wielder can hurl the diabolo from the rope like a stone from a sling, or swing it on the rope in melee.

Bladed Hoop.name: Bladed Hoop
Bladed Hoop.description: This circular hoop has blades along its outer edge. You can wield it in two hands (using the two-hand damage) or by spinning it around an arm. While you spin the hoop, it gains the free-hand trait. Setting the hoop spinning takes 1 Interact action. In addition to the normal restrictions of the free-hand trait, extended use of the arm for locomotion (such as to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}) interferes with the hoop's spinning and forces you to Release the hoop. You can't spin a hoop underwater. Keeping the hoop spinning requires a free action each round, which has the concentrate and manipulate traits. You can keep a hoop spinning as an exploration activity, but doing so for more than 10 minutes makes you fatigued, similarly to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JuqmIAnkL9hVGai8]{Hustle}.

Bladed Scarf.name: Bladed Scarf
Bladed Scarf.description: The thin metal plates interwoven throughout this long scarf turn a fashion accessory into a deadly weapon.

Blast Boots (Greater).name: Blast Boots (Greater)
Blast Boots (Greater).description:
Activate 1 Interact

These sets of rockets come in pairs and strap onto existing footwear (or a creature's feet). Inserting them and aligning them properly takes 1 minute. When you Activate the greater blast boots to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump}, you can increase the vertical distance of your High Jump by up to 50 feet. When you Activate them to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump}, you can increase the horizontal distance of your Long Jump by up to 75 feet. Additionally, for 1 minute, the greater blast boots continue to boost your jumps. Every time you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap} during the duration, you can move 30 feet in any direction, or your normal Leap distance, whichever is further.

Blast Boots (Lesser).name: Blast Boots (Lesser)
Blast Boots (Lesser).description:
Activate 1 Interact

These sets of rockets come in pairs and strap onto existing footwear (or a creature's feet). Inserting them and aligning them properly takes 1 minute. When you Activate the blast boots, you can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump}, without the need to Stride first.

Blast Boots (Major).name: Blast Boots (Major)
Blast Boots (Major).description:
Activate 1 Interact

These sets of rockets come in pairs and strap onto existing footwear (or a creature's feet). Inserting them and aligning them properly takes 1 minute. When you Activate the major blast boots to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump}, you can increase the vertical distance of your High Jump by up to 80 feet. When you Activate them to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump}, you can increase the horizontal distance of your Long Jump by up to 120 feet. Additionally, for 1 minute, the major blast boots remain active, allowing you to clumsily fly through the air for the duration. You gain a 30-foot Fly speed for the duration, but any time you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Fly}, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until the start of your next turn.

Blast Boots (Moderate).name: Blast Boots (Moderate)
Blast Boots (Moderate).description:
Activate 1 Interact

These sets of rockets come in pairs and strap onto existing footwear (or a creature's feet). Inserting them and aligning them properly takes 1 minute. When you Activate the moderate blast boots to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump}, you can increase the vertical distance of your High Jump by up to 30 feet. When you Activate them to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump}, you can increase the horizontal distance of your Long Jump by up to 45 feet.

Blast Foot.name: Blast Foot
Blast Foot.description:
These prosthetic feet and legs, created by dwarven alchemists and spellcasters together, are engraved with simple but effective evocation symbols on the ball and heel, empowering you to leap to great heights and blast foes with your feet.

Activate 1 envision

Frequency once per 10 minutes

Effect You blast off from the ground, using the force to leap through the air. The blast feet cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Q7QQ91vQtyi1Ux36]{Jump} on you.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You blast from your feet, dealing [[/r {4d6}[force]]]{4d6 force damage} to all creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15], with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:22|basic:true|traits:evocation,magical] save.

Blast Foot (Greater).name: Blast Foot (Greater)
Blast Foot (Greater).description:
These prosthetic feet and legs, created by dwarven alchemists and spellcasters together, are engraved with simple but effective evocation symbols on the ball and heel, empowering you to leap to great heights and blast foes with your feet.

Activate 1 envision

Frequency once per minute

Effect You blast off from the ground, using the force to leap through the air. The blast feet cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Q7QQ91vQtyi1Ux36]{Jump} on you.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You blast from your feet, dealing [[/r {8d6}[force]]]{8d6 force damage} to all creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30], with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:27|basic:true|name:Blast Foot|traits:evocation,magical] save.

Blazons of Shared Power.name: Blazons of Shared Power
Blazons of Shared Power.description: These brass emblems come in a variety of designs, usually customized to the purchaser to reflect the heraldry of a family or guild. Blazons of shared power come in sets of three. When you invest the blazons, you wear one of the three on your chest, and you attach the others to a pair of one-handed weapons, choosing one as the primary weapon and one as the secondary weapon. These weapons can be either melee weapons or ranged weapons. As long as you're wielding both the primary weapon and the secondary weapon, the secondary weapon gains the benefit of the fundamental runes on the primary weapon. A weapon can only have a single blazon of shared power attached to it at a time.

Blazons of Shared Power (Greater).name: Blazons of Shared Power (Greater)
Blazons of Shared Power (Greater).description:
These brass emblems come in a variety of designs, usually customized to the purchaser to reflect the heraldry of a family or guild. Blazons of shared power come in sets of three. When you invest the blazons, you wear one of the three on your chest, and you attach the others to a pair of one-handed weapons, choosing one as the primary weapon and one as the secondary weapon. These weapons can be either melee weapons or ranged weapons. As long as you're wielding both the primary weapon and the secondary weapon, the secondary weapon gains the benefit of the fundamental runes on the primary weapon. A weapon can only have a single blazon of shared power attached to it at a time.

A set of greater blazons of shared power also replicates property runes from the primary weapon, so long as the secondary weapon meets all the prerequisites for a given rune and isn't a specific weapon. The secondary weapon gains the benefits of those runes. All of its own runes are suppressed. When you invest the blazons, you can elect for them to transfer only fundamental runes, in which case they function as standard blazons of shared power.

Bleeding Spines Snare.name: 血棘圈套 Bleeding Spines Snare
Bleeding Spines Snare.description: 当一个生物进入该方格，无数尖锐的棘刺突然窜出刺向该生物，造成8d8点穿刺伤害以及 [[/r {2d8}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续流血伤害}。该生物必须尝试一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:31|basic:true] 豁免。在首次触发后，棘刺会不断收回并再次刺出，持续1分钟。强迫任何进入该方格，或在该方格内结束回合的生物进行一次对抗棘刺伤害的反射Reflex豁免。

Blessed Tattoo.name: Blessed Tattoo
Blessed Tattoo.description:
Activate D envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain the effect of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gMODOGamz88rgHuf]{Protection} against evil.

You can activate the tattoo as a reaction instead of a two-action activity, triggered when a demon attacks you or you attempt a saving throw against a demon's ability.

Blight Bomb (Greater).name: Blight Bomb (Greater)
Blight Bomb (Greater).description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate A Strike

Blight bombs contain volatile toxic chemicals that rot flesh. A blight bomb deals 3d6 poison damage, 3d4 persistent poison damage, and 3 poison splash damage. You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls.

Blight Bomb (Lesser).name: Blight Bomb (Lesser)
Blight Bomb (Lesser).description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate A Strike

Blight bombs contain volatile toxic chemicals that rot flesh. A blight bomb deals 1d6 poison damage, 1d4 persistent poison damage, and 1 poison splash damage.

Blight Bomb (Major).name: Blight Bomb (Major)
Blight Bomb (Major).description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate A Strike

Blight bombs contain volatile toxic chemicals that rot flesh. A blight bomb deals 4d6 poison damage, 4d4 persistent poison damage, and 4 poison splash damage. You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls.

Blight Bomb (Moderate).name: Blight Bomb (Moderate)
Blight Bomb (Moderate).description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate A Strike

Blight bombs contain volatile toxic chemicals that rot flesh. A blight bomb deals 2d6 poison damage, 2d4 persistent poison damage, and 2 poison splash damage. You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls.

Blightburn Necklace.name: Blightburn Necklace
Blightburn Necklace.description: This heavy iron necklace is decorated with tiny gems that resemble the stars in the ceiling high above the Vault of the Black Desert. While you have invested this item, you cannot contract blightburn sickness. It doesn't cure blightburn sickness if you already have it, but the disease's stage can't progress while you wear it.

Blightburn Resin.name: 燃疫松香 Blightburn Resin
Blightburn Resin.description:
这坨黏糊的硬化树液由感染了菌枯病（fungal blights）的树木上收割而来，并已经过明火灼烧。

启动 A 交互 (接触)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:31]

潜伏期 1 分钟

最大持续时间 6 轮

阶段 1 [[/r {8d6}[poison]]]{8d6 毒素伤害} (1 轮)

阶段 2 [[/r {10d6}[poison]]]{10d6 毒素伤害} (1 轮)

阶段 3 [[/r {15d6}[poison]]]{15d6 毒素伤害} (1 轮)

Blightburn Sickness.name: Blightburn Sickness
Blightburn Sickness.description:
Creatures native to the Black Desert are immune, as are creatures who are affected by blightburn sickness but recover from it. The target can't recover from the disease's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} condition except by magic.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:32|traits:disease]

Onset [[/br 1d4 #days]]{1d4 days}

Stage 1 drained 1 (1 day)

Stage 2 drained 1 and sickened 1 (1 day)

Stage 3 drained 2 and sickened 2 (1 week)

Stage 4 drained 3 and sickened 3 (1 month)

Stage 5 increase drained condition by 1 (1 year)

Blightburn Ward.name: Blightburn Ward
Blightburn Ward.description: This heavy iron necklace is decorated with tiny gems that resemble the stars in the ceiling high above the Vault of the Black Desert. While you have invested this item, you cannot contract blightburn sickness. It doesn't cure blightburn sickness if you already have it, but the disease's stage can't progress while you wear it.

Blindpepper Bolt.name: Blindpepper Bolt
Blindpepper Bolt.description:
Ammunition bolt

Activate 1 Interact

The head of this bolt is a vented container that smells strongly of caustic pepper. When an activated blindpepper bolt hits a target, it deals no damage; instead the creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17|showDC:all] save. If the Strike was a critical success, the target takes a -2 circumstance penalty to its Fortitude save. At the GM's discretion, a creature with no eyes or olfactory organs might not be affected by this item.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} until the end of your next turn. It can end the effect early if it spends an action, which has the manipulate trait, to wipe down its eyes.

Failure The target is dazzled for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} until the end of your next turn and dazzled for 1 minute.

Blindpepper Bomb.name: Blindpepper Bomb
Blindpepper Bomb.description:
Activate 1 Strike

Though expensive, these single-use alchemical bombs are often used by police forces to disperse unruly crowds and quell riots without risking permanent physical injury to either officers or civilians.

The bomb can be thrown up to 30 feet, causing it to explode, spraying the aerosolized pepper dust in a 15-foot-radius burst. All creatures in the area must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:18|showDC:all] save to avoid inhaling the dust or getting it in their eyes.

On a failed save, the creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round and then @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

On a critical failure, the creature is blinded for 1 round, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}, and dazzled until it removes the sickened condition.

Blindpepper Tube.name: Blindpepper Tube
Blindpepper Tube.description: This single-use pacification device consists of finely ground hot pepper loaded into a sealed, blowgun-style tube with a one-way valve and a range of 5 feet. To use it, the wielder must tear open the tube's seal as an Interact action, then spend another action to blow the hot pepper into an adjacent creature's face. These actions don't have to be taken in the same round. The target must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:15] save to avoid inhaling the pepper or getting it in their eyes. On a failed save, the creature is blinded for 1 round and then dazzled for 1 round. On a critical failure, the creature is blinded for 1 round, sickened 1, and dazzled until it removes the sickened condition.

Blocks.name: Blocks
Blocks.description: These wooden blocks can be stacked to build flimsy structures. A standard set comes in a small sack with 12 blocks.

Blood Sap.name: Blood Sap
Blood Sap.description:
This potent drug is distilled from a certain tropical vine into a deep-red syrup that, over time, stains the user's lips and teeth a vivid shade of red.

Activate A Interact (Ingested)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16]

Onset 10 minutes

Maximum Duration 3 hours

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}, +1 item bonus to weapon and unarmed attack rolls, Acrobatics checks, and Athletics checks (10 minutes)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} (1 hour)

Bloodbane.name: Bloodbane
Bloodbane.description:
A bloodbane clan dagger is especially vicious against the ancestral enemies of the clan. When you damage an appropriate type of creature with the weapon, that creature takes [[/r {1}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}. The type of creature depends on the clan that made the dagger, but is typically drow, duergar, giant, or orc.

In addition, whenever you inflict persistent bleed damage with a bloodbane weapon (whether from its innate ability or in some other way), the weapon leaves ragged wounds. The bleeding creature must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25] save or become sickened 1. The creature is then temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Bloodbane (Greater).name: Bloodbane (Greater)
Bloodbane (Greater).description:
A bloodbane clan dagger is especially vicious against the ancestral enemies of the clan. When you damage an appropriate type of creature with the weapon, that creature takes [[/r {1d4}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}. The type of creature depends on the clan that made the dagger, but is typically drow, duergar, giant, or orc.

In addition, whenever you inflict persistent bleed damage with a bloodbane weapon (whether from its innate ability or in some other way), the weapon leaves ragged wounds. The bleeding creature must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30|name:Greater Bloodbane] save or become sickened 1. The creature is then temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Bloodeye Coffee.name: Bloodeye Coffee
Bloodeye Coffee.description:
A strong blend including several spices common in the Padishah Empire of Kelesh, bloodeye coffee is a favorite morning drink across the Inner Sea region. The maximum addiction stage of bloodeye coffee never progresses beyond stage 1.

Activate A Interact (Ingested)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:14]

Onset 10 minutes

Maximum Duration 8 hours

Stage 1 +1 item bonus to AC and saves to which you are taking penalties caused by the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} condition (10 minutes)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (1 hour)

Stage 3 can't recover from fatigued (1 day, after which the drug ends)

Bloodhound Mask (Greater).name: Bloodhound Mask (Greater)
Bloodhound Mask (Greater).description:
Activate 1 Interact

Duration 8 hours

This wide, single-use mask is designed to be slipped over your mouth and nose and its alchemical filter activated all with one hand. Once activated, the mask sharpens odors, giving you imprecise scent with a 60 foot range. You can't wear other masks while you're wearing a bloodhound mask.

When you use Survival to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} a creature by its scent, your proficiency bonus is equal to your level even if you're untrained, and the mask grants you a +3 item bonus to your Survival check. The GM sets the Survival DC based on the area's ability to hold scent rather than on visual clues, as normal for using scent.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.MI5OCkF9IXmD2lPF]{Effect: Bloodhound Mask (Greater)}

Bloodhound Mask (Lesser).name: Bloodhound Mask (Lesser)
Bloodhound Mask (Lesser).description:
Activate 1 Interact

Duration 10 minutes

This wide, single-use mask is designed to be slipped over your mouth and nose and its alchemical filter activated all with one hand. Once activated, the mask sharpens odors, giving you imprecise scent with a 15 foot range. You can't wear other masks while you're wearing a bloodhound mask.

When you use Survival to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} a creature by its scent, your proficiency bonus is equal to your level even if you're untrained, and the mask grants you a +1 item bonus to your Survival check. The GM sets the Survival DC based on the area's ability to hold scent rather than on visual clues, as normal for using scent.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.S4MZzALqFoXJsr6o]{Effect: Bloodhound Mask (Lesser)}

Bloodhound Mask (Moderate).name: Bloodhound Mask (Moderate)
Bloodhound Mask (Moderate).description:
Activate 1 Interact

Duration 1 hour

This wide, single-use mask is designed to be slipped over your mouth and nose and its alchemical filter activated all with one hand. Once activated, the mask sharpens odors, giving you imprecise scent a 30 foot range. You can't wear other masks while you're wearing a bloodhound mask.

When you use Survival to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} a creature by its scent, your proficiency bonus is equal to your level even if you're untrained, and the mask grants you a +2 item bonus to your Survival check. The GM sets the Survival DC based on the area's ability to hold scent rather than on visual clues, as normal for using scent.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.wFF0SZs1Hcf87Kk1]{Effect: Bloodhound Mask (Moderate)}

Bloodletting Kukri.name: 放血反曲刀 Bloodletting Kukri
Bloodletting Kukri.description: 这把+1强击反曲刀其刀身在亮光下映照出诡异的深红色。若重击成功，该反曲刀造成 [[/r {1d8}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续流血伤害}。若你在重击成功时若目标身上无持续性流血伤害，你还能获得1d8点临时生命值。

Bloodseeker Beak.name: 觅血者之针 Bloodseeker Beak
Bloodseeker Beak.description:
这根长长的空洞的针状吻是从声名狼藉的觅血者上摘下来的，而且仍然滴着血液。

启动 F 想象

触发 你用附着的武器击中了一个措手不及Flat-footed的生物

当你启动这根针鼻，你在伤害骰上造成额外1d4点精准伤害。如果你对一个生物造成偷袭伤害的话，你还会造成 [[/r {1d4}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续流血伤害}。

Bloodthirsty.name: Bloodthirsty
Bloodthirsty.description:
Usage etched onto a slashing or piercing melee weapon

The magic in this rune sings in time with your attacks and coaxes you into finishing your opponent. When you critically hit a target that's taking persistent bleed damage, your target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.

Activate r envision

Trigger You reduce a creature to 0 Hit Points with the weapon

Effect You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to twice the creature's level. These Hit Points remain for 1 minute.

Blowgun.name: 吹箭 Blowgun
Blowgun.description: 这条又长又窄的管子用来射击吹箭镖，仅仅需要强力呼气的力量。

Blowgun Darts.name: 吹箭镖 Blowgun Darts
Blowgun Darts.description: 这些薄而轻的飞镖通常是用硬木制成的，用羽毛或毛皮固定。它们通常是空心的，所以可以用来喂毒。

Blue Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult).name: 成年蓝龙龙息药水 Blue Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult)
Blue Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult).description:
这种液体包含了蓝龙的血。你饮下这瓶调和物之后的一小时内，你可以喷出蓝龙的吐息武器。吐息的效力基于药水的类型，是根据提供龙血的龙的年龄来决定的。药水拥有和吐息武器伤害类型一致的特征。

释放龙息要花费一个动作。 你喷出范围为 @Template[type:line|distance:30] 的电击龙息，造成 [[/r {6d6}[electricity]]]{6d6 电击伤害}。 每个区域内的生物都必须尝试一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true|name:Adult Blue Dragon's Breath Potion] 豁免检定。

使用了一次吐息武器之后，你在 [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 轮}内无法再次使用。

Blue Dragon's Breath Potion (Wyrm).name: 古蓝龙龙息药水 Blue Dragon's Breath Potion (Wyrm)
Blue Dragon's Breath Potion (Wyrm).description:
这种液体包含了蓝龙的血。你饮下这瓶调和物之后的一小时内，你可以喷出蓝龙的吐息武器。吐息的效力基于药水的类型，是根据提供龙血的龙的年龄来决定的。药水拥有和吐息武器伤害类型一致的特征。

释放龙息要花费一个动作。 你喷出范围为 @Template[type:line|distance:30] 的电击龙息，造成 [[/r {10d6}[electricity]]]{10d6 电击伤害}。 每个区域内的生物都必须尝试一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:37|basic:true|name:Wyrm Blue Dragon's Breath Potion] 豁免检定。

使用了一次吐息武器之后，你在 [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 轮}内无法再次使用。

Blue Dragon's Breath Potion (Young).name: 青年蓝龙龙息药水 Blue Dragon's Breath Potion (Young)
Blue Dragon's Breath Potion (Young).description:
这种液体包含了蓝龙的血。你饮下这瓶调和物之后的一小时内，你可以喷出蓝龙的吐息武器。吐息的效力基于药水的类型，是根据提供龙血的龙的年龄来决定的。药水拥有和吐息武器伤害类型一致的特征。

释放龙息要花费一个动作。 你喷出范围为 @Template[type:line|distance:30] 的电击龙息，造成 [[/r {4d6}[electricity]]]{4d6 电击伤害}。 每个区域内的生物都必须尝试一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:23|basic:true|name:Young Blue Dragon's Breath Potion] 豁免检定。

使用了一次吐息武器之后，你在 [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 轮}内无法再次使用。

Blue Dragonfly Poison.name: Blue Dragonfly Poison
Blue Dragonfly Poison.description:
Boggards brew a potent toxin made from blue dragonflies. Swampseers consume this mixture to awaken their divine powers, but the poison inspires crippling hallucinations in most other creatures.

Activate A Interact (Ingested)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17]

Onset 10 minutes

Maximum Duration 30 minutes

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} (10 minutes)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1} (10 minutes)

Stage 3 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} (1 minute)

Blueblisters.name: Blueblisters
Blueblisters.description:
This flesh-eating disease causes prominent and painful blue blisters on the skin and gums. You can't reduce your sickened condition while afflicted with blueblisters.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17]

Onset 1 day

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (1 day)

Stage 2 sickened 1 and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 day)

Stage 3 sickened 2 and drained 1 (1 week)

Stage 4 sickened 2 and drained 2 (1 week)

Blunderbuss.name: Blunderbuss
Blunderbuss.description: This weapon fires pellets from a trumpet-shaped barrel, making it an excellent choice for hunting brush fowl or dealing damage within a short, broad area. Adventuring gunslingers often carry a blunderbuss to deal with swarms of vermin and similar threats.

Bo Staff.name: 长棒 Bo Staff
Bo Staff.description: 这根粗壮而纤细的棍子末端呈锥形，平衡良好。它被设计成一种攻守兼备的武器。

Boarding Axe.name: Boarding Axe
Boarding Axe.description: This small axe sports a spike opposite the blade that aids in climbing and is useful in clearing obstacles, such as fallen rigging.

Boarding Pike.name: Boarding Pike
Boarding Pike.description: Taking the form of a longspear fitted with crossbars or hooks, a boarding pike provides its wielder a sharp implement that's as adept at shoving enemies off a ship's railings as facilitating the boarding of other vessels. This is a martial melee weapon.

Boastful Hunter.name: Boastful Hunter
Boastful Hunter.description:
Perception +11; precise vision 30 feet, imprecise hearing 30 feet

Communication speech (Common)

Skills Nature +9, Performance +10, Survival +11

Int+0, Wis+2, Cha+3

Will +11

Possessing a boisterous, proud demeanor, this +1 jezail is an aspiring big game hunter, always quick to share a tale of its bold adventures and predatory conquests-although the veracity of such tales is often questionable. A boastful hunter enjoys tracking and hunting animals of all kinds but takes particular pleasure in taking down large, dangerous, or rare animals. Against an animal, the boastful hunter deals [[/r {1d6}[additional]]]{1d6 additional damage}. On a critical hit against an animal, the boastful hunter also deals [[/r {1d6}[persistent,bleed]]]{1d6} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}.

A boastful hunter urges you to face off against tougher and tougher creatures-a challenge the ambitious rifle may not be adequate to deal with. If the boastful hunter goes one week without participating in a hunt against an animal of at least your level, it becomes bored. A bored boastful hunter complains incessantly and imposes a -1 item penalty to attack rolls against non-animal targets. A bored boastful hunter can be appeased by using it in combat against an animal of at least your level.

Unable to accept its own weaknesses, a boastful hunter blames any failed hunts on you, and considers remarks about its strength or quality a terrible insult. An insulted boastful hunter badmouths you to sentient creatures you interact with, imposing a -1 item penalty to Deception, Diplomacy, and Intimidation skill checks, and all attacks with it incur a misfire chance until the weapon is appeased. An insulted boastful hunter can be appeased by complimenting it and succeeding at a @Check[type:diplomacy|dc:21|name:Boastful Hunter Appeasement] check against its Will DC two days in a row. You can only attempt a Diplomacy check to appease the boastful hunter once each day.

Body Recovery Kit.name: Body Recovery Kit
Body Recovery Kit.description:
This small silver tin is filled with a herb-infused salve and a shroud of fine silk fabric. The salve smells of lavender and hyssop and is waxy to the touch. The shroud, made of spun silk, can a hold a Medium or smaller creature.

If you apply the salve and shroud to a creature that died within the past 3 days, a process which normally takes 1 hour, it slows the decomposition process, allowing a creature to be brought back to life with @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IkGYwHRLhkuoGReG]{Raise Dead} up to 1 week after its death.

Bola.name: Bola
Bola.description: This throwing weapon consists of weights tied to the end of long cords, which can be used to bludgeon foes or entangle their legs.

Bolts.name: 矢 Bolts
Bolts.description: 比传统箭短，但结构相似，矢是弩使用的弹药。

Bomb Launcher.name: Bomb Launcher
Bomb Launcher.description: This long, hollow tube is held in two hands and braced over the shoulder. Inside, it contains a small metal basket sized to hold alchemical bombs. A chute in the top delivers an alchemical bomb into the internal basket, while a lever on the underside pulls the basket back and locks it in place. Loading an alchemical bomb into a bomb launcher requires a single Interact action. With a pull of a trigger, the basket speeds forward, allowing you to Strike with the loaded alchemical bomb over long distances. Bombs fired with a bomb launcher have a range increment of 60 feet.

Bomb Snare.name: 炸弹圈套 Bomb Snare
Bomb Snare.description:
你创造一个能够催化三颗同类型的3级中等炼金炸弹的圈套，并能在一个生物进入圈套方格中时引爆炸弹。目标以及所有邻接格子内的生物必须进行一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:26|basic:true|showDC:all]豁免，圈套造成所容纳的一颗炸弹的三倍直接命中伤害（例如，使用瓶装闪电Bottled Lightning的圈套造成 [[/r {6d6}[electricity]]]{6d6 闪电伤害}），但不造成溅射伤害以及其他效果。

大成功 生物不受影响

成功 生物承受一半的伤害并且不受到其他效果

失败 生物承受完整的伤害。生物也会受到一颗炸弹直接命中带来的其他效果（例如瓶装闪电Bottled Lightning带来的措手不及Flat-footed或强酸瓶Acid Flask带来的持续伤害）

大失败 生物承受双倍的伤害，外加直接命中带来的其他所有效果（同失败）。

制造需求 提供六颗相同伤害的3级中等炼金炸弹。

Bomber's Eye Elixir (Greater).name: 高等爆破者之眼灵药 Bomber's Eye Elixir (Greater)
Bomber's Eye Elixir (Greater).description:
启动 A 交互

这瓶酊剂能让你精确定位敌人。在接下来的五分钟，你的炼金炸弹打击（Strikes）将会减少2点你的目标从掩蔽中获得的AC上的环境加值。

Bomber's Eye Elixir (Lesser).name: 次等爆破者之眼灵药 Bomber's Eye Elixir (Lesser)
Bomber's Eye Elixir (Lesser).description:
启动 A 交互

这瓶酊剂能让你精确定位敌人。在接下来的五分钟，你的炼金炸弹打击（Strikes）将会减少1点你的目标从掩蔽中获得的AC上的环境加值。

Bomber's Saddle.name: Bomber's Saddle
Bomber's Saddle.description:
Developed by urdefhans for their skaveling mounts but quickly copied by other races' cavalry, this leather saddle is made from cave worm hide and is designed to fit a variety of flying steeds. In addition to a seat for the rider, the bomber's saddle has a bomb compartment situated underneath the mount.

The compartment can hold up to six alchemical bombs of light or negligible Bulk.

Activate A Interact

Effect You drop a single item from the saddle's compartment, which falls to the ground below. If the item is a bomb, make a ranged Strike with it.

Activate D Interact

Requirements The saddle's compartment is loaded with two to six bombs

Effect You drop the saddle's entire payload, scattering the bombs below. Make a single ranged Strike against an AC of 10. The AC increases by 1 for every 5 feet above the target area you are.

On a failure, the bombs fly away wildly and deal no damage.

On a successful attack roll, the bombs fall and shatter, starting in the target area and moving in a line of 5-foot spaces up to 30 feet long for six bombs, one bomb per space. The bombs don't directly hit any creatures; instead, creatures take splash damage from the bombs as usual, but combine the splash damage from multiple overlapping bombs together before applying weaknesses or resistances. Apply any effects normally applied to splash damage when throwing a bomb (such as the effects of the Calculated Splash feat).

Bonmuan Swapping Stone (Greater).name: Bonmuan Swapping Stone (Greater)
Bonmuan Swapping Stone (Greater).description:
Activate 1 Interact

This small, opalescent stone glows with a light that constantly shifts between colors. When you activate the stone, you throw it into a space within 100 feet. The stone then casts dimension door on you and transports you to itself. This destroys the stone.

You can instead hurl the stone at a creature in an attempt to bring that creature closer to you. Make a ranged Strike against a creature using your highest proficiency with a ranged weapon. The swapping stone has a range increment of 15 feet. On a hit, the stone shatters against the creature, casting dimension door on the creature and causing it to instantly teleport to a space adjacent to you. An unwilling creature can resist this teleportation with a successful @Check[type:will|dc:37|name:Bonmuan Swapping Stone|traits:teleportation|showDC:owner] save.

Bonmuan Swapping Stone (Lesser).description:

The swapping stone has a range increment of 15 feet. On a hit, the stone shatters against the creature, casting dimension door on the creature and causing it to instantly teleport to a space adjacent to you. An unwilling creature can resist this teleportation with a successful @Check[type:will|dc:28|name:Bonmuan Swapping Stone|traits:teleportation|showDC:owner] save.

Book of Lingering Blaze.name: Book of Lingering Blaze
Book of Lingering Blaze.description:
The common saying, "Where there is progress in the field of magic, there is always someone who uses it to set things on fire," is engraved in gold on the cover of this red spellbook.

Activate 1 envision (metamagic)

Frequency once per day

Effect If your next action is to cast an evocation spell dealing fire damage that you prepared from this grimoire, you superheat the flames, allowing the spell to ignore up to 10 resistance to fire of creatures affected by the spell.

Bookthief Brew.name: Bookthief Brew
Bookthief Brew.description:
Activate 1 minute

This concoction mixes into a thick, paste-like substance when shaken. When exposed to air, the substance dries after one minute. If poured over a book, scroll, or other material featuring words written in ink, the brew will make an exact copy of the words it is in contact with while it dries, though it doesn't contain any magical effect or other special properties of the original words. Once dried, you can remove the dried substance as an Interact action. A single vial of bookthief brew can coat two pages from a book, a single scroll, or a similar amount of area for other surfaces, producing a dried sheet as thick as a piece of paper. Unfortunately, the sheet's copy is flipped, requiring a mirror to properly read.

Boom Snare.name: Boom Snare
Boom Snare.description:
By combining a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.yd3kEK21YknZLlcT]{Alchemist's Fire (Lesser)}, a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Xnqglykl3Cif8rN9]{Thunderstone (Lesser)}, and other catalysts with a pressure sensitive trigger, you create a snare that creates a fiery and thunderous explosion when triggered. The target and all creatures in adjacent squares take [[/r {2d6}[fire]+{2d6}[sonic]]]{2d6 fire damage and 2d6 sonic damage} with a basic @Check[type:reflex|dc:19|traits:mechanicle] save. On a failure, they are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds} and take [[/r {1d4}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage}.

Craft Requirements Supply a lesser alchemist's fire and a lesser thunderstone.

Boots of Bounding.name: 弹跳靴 Boots of Bounding
Boots of Bounding.description:
这双结实的皮革靴子有着弹性十足的靴底，能够缓冲你的步伐，令你迈出的每一步都无比轻盈。这双靴子使你的速度获得+5尺物品加值，并使你在跳高High Jump和跳远Long Jump的运动Athletics检定上获得+2物品加值。

另外，如果你使用跳跃Leap动作，在水平跳跃时能使跳跃距离远5尺，在垂直跳跃时能使跳跃高度高3尺。

自动生效:

  • 速度获得+5尺物品加值
  • 跳高High Jump和跳远Long Jump的运动Athletics检定获得+2物品加值

Boots of Bounding (Greater).name: 高等弹跳靴 Boots of Bounding (Greater)
Boots of Bounding (Greater).description:
这双结实的皮革靴子有着弹性十足的靴底，能够缓冲你的步伐，令你迈出的每一步都无比轻盈。这双靴子使你的速度获得+10尺物品加值，并使你在跳高High Jump和跳远Long Jump的运动Athletics检定上获得+3物品加值。

另外，如果你使用跳跃Leap动作，在水平跳跃时能使跳跃距离远5尺，在垂直跳跃时能使跳跃高度高3尺。

自动生效:

  • 速度获得+10尺物品加值
  • 跳高High Jump和跳远Long Jump的运动Athletics检定获得+3物品加值

Boots of Dancing.name: Boots of Dancing
Boots of Dancing.description: These boots act as greater boots of elvenkind, but they react wildly to strong physical exertion. While you wear the boots, the curse activates whenever you attempt an Athletics check or Stride more than once in a single round during an encounter. The boots cast an 8th-level uncontrollable dance spell on you, and you automatically fail your save. Once the curse has activated for the first time, the boots fuse to you.

Boots of Elvenkind.name: 精灵靴 Boots of Elvenkind
Boots of Elvenkind.description:
这双高筒尖头靴是由柔软轻便的黑色或绿色皮革制成的，并装点着金边和金色带扣。穿戴时，这双靴子能够让你更加灵敏地移动，在特技Acrobatics检定上提供+1物品加值。

启动 F 想象

频率 每小时一次

效果 在你这回合结束之前，你在地上移动时忽略困难地形。如果你同时穿戴 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.MNBnZn0b80Q7yHJM]{精灵披风 Cloak of Elvenkind}，你也能在陆地速度上获得+5尺状态加值，直到你的回合结束。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.88kqcDmsoAEddzUt]{效果：精灵靴}

自动生效:

  • 特技Acrobatics检定获得+1物品加值

Boots of Elvenkind (Greater).name: 高等精灵靴 Boots of Elvenkind (Greater)
Boots of Elvenkind (Greater).description:
这双高筒尖头靴是由柔软轻便的黑色或绿色皮革制成的，并装点着金边和金色带扣。穿戴时，这双靴子能够让你更加灵敏地移动，在特技Acrobatics检定上提供+2物品加值。
