@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.88kqcDmsoAEddzUt]{效果：精灵靴}

自动生效:

  • 特技Acrobatics检定获得+2物品加值

Boots of Speed.name: 加速靴 Boots of Speed
Boots of Speed.description:
这双线条流畅的红色靴子能使你的腿感到能量在不断爆发。你在陆地速度上获得+5尺物品加值，该加值也能提供给任何你拥有的攀爬或游泳速度。

启动 A 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你将靴子的后跟互相碰撞，并获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened}效果，持续1分钟。你可以使用这个额外动作进行行进Stride，攀爬Climb或游泳Swim。（除非你拥有合适的移动方式，否则你仍然需要为攀爬Climb和游泳Swim动作进行一次运动Athletics检定）

自动生效:

  • 你在陆地速度上获得+5尺物品加值，该加值也能提供给任何你拥有的攀爬或游泳速度

Bort's Blessing.name: Bort's Blessing
Bort's Blessing.description:
This ornate copper band has a small ruby set in the center, flanked by a pair of dwarven runes. The wearer of this ring gains the ability to understand, read, and speak one common language of their choice, selected each morning as part of their daily preparations.

In addition, the wearer receives a +1 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to Make an Impression.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to Make an Impression.

Bottled Air.name: 瓶装空气 Bottled Air
Bottled Air.description:
尽管看起来就像一只普通的带有软木塞的玻璃瓶，但是这个物品中却容纳着无穷无尽的新鲜空气。你必须先用一个交互动作打开瓶塞后才能启动这个瓶子。

启动 A 交互

效果 你从瓶子里深吸一口气。这让你得以在没有空气或者有毒的环境中呼吸。空气不会从瓶口中逸出，所以把一个开口的瓶子放在真空环境中并不会对环境本身造成任何改变。

Bottled Lightning (Greater).name: 高等瓶装闪电 Bottled Lightning (Greater)
Bottled Lightning (Greater).description:
启动 A 打击 Strike

瓶装闪电里面装满了一接触空气就会创造出强烈电流的不稳定液体试剂。一旦命中，目标还会在你的下一回合开始前陷入措手不及（flat-footed）。你在攻击骰上获得+2的物品加值。这枚炸弹造成3d6点闪电伤害和3点闪电溅射伤害。

Bottled Lightning (Lesser).name: 次等瓶装闪电 Bottled Lightning (Lesser)
Bottled Lightning (Lesser).description:
启动 A 打击 Strike

瓶装闪电里面装满了一接触空气就会创造出强烈电流的不稳定液体试剂。一旦命中，目标还会在你的下一回合开始前陷入措手不及（flat-footed）。 这枚炸弹造成1d6点闪电伤害和1点闪电溅射伤害。

Bottled Lightning (Major).name: 上等瓶装闪电 Bottled Lightning (Major)
Bottled Lightning (Major).description:
启动 A 打击 Strike

瓶装闪电里面装满了一接触空气就会创造出强烈电流的不稳定液体试剂。一旦命中，目标还会在你的下一回合开始前陷入措手不及（flat-footed）。你在攻击骰上获得+3的物品加值。这枚炸弹造成4d6点闪电伤害和4点闪电溅射伤害。

Bottled Lightning (Moderate).name: 中等瓶装闪电 Bottled Lightning (Moderate)
Bottled Lightning (Moderate).description:
启动 A 打击 Strike

瓶装闪电里面装满了一接触空气就会创造出强烈电流的不稳定液体试剂。一旦命中，目标还会在你的下一回合开始前陷入措手不及（flat-footed）。你在攻击骰上获得+1的物品加值。这枚炸弹造成2d6点闪电伤害和2点闪电溅射伤害。

Bottomless Stein.name: Bottomless Stein
Bottomless Stein.description: A magic item regarded as holy by followers of Cayden Cailean, this ornate metallic stein is always filled to the brim with delicious ale, no matter how much is drunk or spilled. If it is emptied (such as by being gulped quickly or upended onto the floor), the bottomless stein will fill again within 1 round as long as it is right side up, though it's impossible to transfer the ale to another container to sell it or store it for later. The exact type of ale with which the stein is filled is determined at the item's creation, and cannot be changed thereafter.

Boulderhead Bock.name: Boulderhead Bock
Boulderhead Bock.description:
Activate A Interact

No one is sure if Gorm brews this malty ale himself, but it seems to be an off-duty favorite of the Grand Archive faction leader. The brew packs a heavy punch, and while Gorm officially discourages drinking on the job, boulderhead bock does makes the drinker more self-assured and protects them from conditions that would addle their mental faculties.

For 1 hour, you gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws against effects that would make you stunned or stupefied. However, you also become less aware of your surroundings, taking a -2 item penalty to Perception for 1 hour.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.2C1HuKDQDGFZuv7l]{Effect: Boulderhead Bock}

Bountiful Cauldron.name: Bountiful Cauldron
Bountiful Cauldron.description:
This mid-sized, silver cauldron is a boon within areas where access to fresh food is limited, for it can be commanded to fill itself with hearty (and delicious) vegetable stew. It can also be put to a much greater use in the pursuit of crafting certain items. When used to Craft alchemical items, potions, or oils, a bountiful cauldron grants a +2 item bonus to the Crafting check.

Activate T command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You stir the cauldron, and it casts a 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Mt6ZzkVX8Q4xigFq]{Create Food} spell, filling itself with enough delicious vegetable stew to feed 12 Medium creatures.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to the Crafting check for alchemical items

Bracelet of Dashing.name: 冲刺手镯 Bracelet of Dashing
Bracelet of Dashing.description:
这只吵闹的银手镯使你的步伐更加轻快，在特技Acrobatics检定上给予你+1物品加值。

启动 A 命令

频率 每天一次

效果 你在速度上获得+10尺状态加值，持续1分钟。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.lLP56tbG689TNKW5]{效果：冲刺手镯}

自动生效:

  • 特技Acrobatics检定获得+1物品加值

Bracers of Armor I.name: I型盔甲护腕 Bracers of Armor I
Bracers of Armor I.description:
这对坚硬的皮革护腕为你在AC和豁免骰上提供+1物品加值，并具有+5的敏捷调整值上限。你可以在盔甲护腕上附着护符，就如其是轻甲一样。

自动生效:

  • AC和豁免骰获得+1物品加值，并具有+5的敏捷调整值上限

Bracers of Armor II.name: II型盔甲护腕 Bracers of Armor II
Bracers of Armor II.description:
这对坚硬的皮革护腕为你在AC和豁免骰上提供+2物品加值，并具有+5的敏捷调整值上限。你可以在盔甲护腕上附着护符，就如其是轻甲一样。

自动生效:

  • AC和豁免骰获得+2物品加值，并具有+5的敏捷调整值上限

Bracers of Armor III.name: III型盔甲护腕 Bracers of Armor III
Bracers of Armor III.description:
这对坚硬的皮革护腕为你在AC和豁免骰上提供+3物品加值，并具有+5的敏捷调整值上限。你可以在盔甲护腕上附着护符，就如其是轻甲一样。

自动生效:

  • AC和豁免骰获得+3物品加值，并具有+5的敏捷调整值上限

Bracers of Missile Deflection.name: 飞弹偏斜护腕 Bracers of Missile Deflection
Bracers of Missile Deflection.description:
这对护腕由耐用的秘银制成，并如夏日的太阳一般闪闪发光。

启动 R 交互

频率 每天一次

触发 一次远程武器攻击命中了你，但并没有达成重击

需求 你意识到了这次攻击，而且没有措手不及

效果 这对护腕偏斜了这次攻击的弹道。你在对抗触发的攻击的AC上获得+2环境加值。如果这会导致攻击失败，那么这次攻击丢失。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.PeiuJ951kkBPTCSM]{效果：飞弹偏斜护腕}

Bracers of Missile Deflection (Greater).name: 高等飞弹偏斜护腕 Bracers of Missile Deflection (Greater)
Bracers of Missile Deflection (Greater).description:
这对护腕由耐用的秘银制成，并如夏日的太阳一般闪闪发光。

启动 R 交互

频率 每10分钟一次

触发 一次远程武器攻击命中了你，但并没有达成重击

需求 你意识到了这次攻击，而且没有措手不及

效果 这对护腕偏斜了这次攻击的弹道。你在对抗触发的攻击的AC上获得+2环境加值。如果这会导致攻击失败，那么这次攻击丢失。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.PeiuJ951kkBPTCSM]{效果：飞弹偏斜护腕}

Brain Cylinder.name: Brain Cylinder
Brain Cylinder.description:
Perception +15; vision (precise) 30 feet, hearing (imprecise )30 feet

Communication speech (all languages known in life)

Skills varies

Int +2, Wis +2, Cha +2

AC 21; Fort +10, Ref +8, Will +15

HP 68; Immunities bleed, disease, death effects, paralyzed, poison; Weaknesses bludgeoning 7, sonic 7; Resistances fire 7, piercing 7, slashing 7

A brain cylinder allows the extracted brain of a Large or smaller creature to continue to function even after it has been removed from the body. As long as the brain remains in the cylinder, the creature remains alive and can continue to think, even though its body is dead. Detachable modules that fit into the base of the cylinder allow the brain to see, hear, or speak using a raspy speaker. So long as these are attached, the brain can speak and understand any languages it knew in life, though nothing within the cylinder compels it to do so if it is unwilling. It also retains its living alignment, and can use Intelligence-, Wisdom-, and Charisma-based skills. A standard brain cylinder has one skill at +15, one at +13, and two at +11, as chosen by the GM.

The brain retains no other abilities it possessed in life, including purely mental ones. Mi-go typically preserve humanoid brains in this manner when they wish to interrogate a creature at a later date, or when they wish to preserve a creature as a resource for consultation or research purposes, as a brain preserved in this manner can live for centuries. If a brain cylinder is destroyed, the brain dies and its soul finally moves on to the Boneyard. Restoring a brain in a brain cylinder to its former body can be done by any effect that restores life (and, in most cases, any capable of creating a new body, since the original is typically missing or long gone).

Note that the level 6 brain cylinder presented represents a level 6 creature's brain. A less powerful or more powerful brain can be placed in a brain cylinder, which can affect the brain cylinder's Perception, mental ability scores, Will save, and skill modifiers (and can drastically alter the value of the brain cylinder), but the physical properties of the brain cylinder remain unchanged. Higher-level brain cylinders can be crafted, with resistances and weaknesses increasing as appropriate to their level. However, they always have low AC and HP and terrible Fortitude and Reflex saves for a creature of the brain cylinder's level.

You can open a brain cylinder by taking three consecutive actions with the manipulate trait. If the brain cylinder contains a brain, the brain dies 3 rounds after it's removed or if the cylinder is left open for more than 10 minutes. You can transfer a brain from one brain cylinder to another with a DC 25 Medicine (expert) or Occultism (expert) check. This is a two-action activity with the manipulate trait. On a critical failure, the brain dies.

Brass Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult).name: 成年黄铜龙龙息药水 Brass Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult)
Brass Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult).description:
这种液体包含了黄铜龙的血。你饮下这瓶调和物之后的一小时内，你可以喷出黄铜龙的吐息武器。吐息的效力基于药水的类型，是根据提供龙血的龙的年龄来决定的。药水拥有和吐息武器伤害类型一致的特征。

释放龙息要花费一个动作。你喷出范围为 @Template[type:line|distance:30] 的火焰龙息，造成 [[/r {6d6}[fire]]]{6d6 火焰伤害}。每个区域内的生物都必须尝试一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true|name:Adult Brass Dragon's Breath Potion] 豁免检定。

使用了一次吐息武器之后，你在 [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 轮}内无法再次使用。

Brass Ear.name: Brass Ear
Brass Ear.description: A brass ear is a short, flared tube with one end narrow enough to comfortably fit against the ear canal. When using a brass ear to listen through a door, window, thin wall, or similar barrier, if the barrier would normally increase the DC of your Perception check to hear sounds on the other side, the DC increases by only half as much as normal.

Bravo's Brew (Greater).name: 高等狂徒醇酿 Bravo's Brew (Greater)
Bravo's Brew (Greater).description:
启动 A 交互

这烧瓶中冒泡的啤酒能带来勇气。在饮用这瓶灵药后的一个小时中，你在意志豁免上获得+3物品加值，在对抗恐惧效果时变为+4物品加值。如果你在对抗恐惧的豁免中成功，你可以将其替换为大成功。

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.q1EhQ716bPSgJVnC]{效果：高等狂徒醇酿}

Bravo's Brew (Lesser).name: 次等狂徒醇酿 Bravo's Brew (Lesser)
Bravo's Brew (Lesser).description:
启动 A 交互

这烧瓶中冒泡的啤酒能带来勇气。在饮用这瓶灵药后的一个小时中，你在意志豁免上获得+1物品加值，在对抗恐惧效果时变为+2物品加值。

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.eh7EqmDBDW30ShCu]{效果：次等狂徒醇酿}

Bravo's Brew (Moderate).description:

这烧瓶中冒泡的啤酒能带来勇气。在饮用这瓶灵药后的一个小时中，你在意志豁免上获得+2物品加值，在对抗恐惧效果时变为+3物品加值。

Breastplate.name: 胸甲 Breastplate
Breastplate.description: 虽然被称为胸甲，但这类盔甲其实是由几块保护躯干、胸部、颈部，有时还有臀部和小腿的部件组成的半身甲。它既提供了一部分板甲的保护，同时兼顾了更大的灵活性和速度。

Breastplate of Command.name: 号令胸甲 Breastplate of Command
Breastplate of Command.description:
青铜为材料，打磨闪亮即成这具+1抗力胸甲，其上更复盖着黄金色的狮头护心镜。穿戴这具胸甲会给与你号令灵光。你的交涉检定获得+2物品加值，但躲藏（Hide）和潜行（Sneak）的隐秘潜行检定和乔装（Impersonate）的欺骗检定都获得-2物品减值。

启动A命令

频率 每天一次

效果 100尺内所有盟友在对抗恐惧效果时获得+2状态加值，持续1分钟。当你启动该能力时，所有受恐惧效果影响的盟友其恐惧值减少1。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.G0lG7IIZnCZtYi6v]{效果：号令胸甲}

自动生效:

  • 交涉检定+2物品加值
  • 躲藏（Hide）和潜行（Sneak）的隐秘检定获得-2物品减值。
  • 乔装（Impersonate）的欺骗检定获得-2物品减值

Breastplate of Command (Greater).description:

Breath Blaster.name: Breath Blaster
Breath Blaster.description:
A breath blaster is a +1 striking blunderbuss most commonly crafted from the trachea of a dragon, though other creatures with breath weapons or the ability to spit energy are occasionally used. The implementation of the dragon's trachea allows the firearm to unleash a torrent of pure energy in the form of gouts of flame or bolts of electricity.

A breath blaster's Strikes deal either acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison damage, depending on the dragon type or other creature from which it was made, though it can otherwise be used like a normal blunderbuss. A breath blaster also can be activated to fire a line of energy in a @Template[type:line|distance:30] or @Template[type:cone|distance:15], chosen when it's created and typically corresponding to the shape of the breath weapon used by the type of dragon or creature from which the breath blaster was created.

In theory, the foundational techniques required to create a breath blaster would allow for other damage types, but such breath blasters would require the trachea from the correct dragon or creature type and additional creation techniques, making such a breath blaster rare rather than uncommon.

Activate 2 Interact (evocation, magical)

Frequency once per minute

Effect You fire the breath blaster, dealing [[/r 4d6]] damage of the appropriate type in the appropriate area. Creatures in the area must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:24|basic:true|traits:evocation,magical|showDC:owner] save (or @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24|traits:evocation,magical|showDC:owner] save if the damage is poison).

Craft Requirements The initial raw materials must include the trachea of a ritually hunted dragon or other creature with a breath weapon with the appropriate damage type and area (line or cone) for the breath blaster.

Breath Blaster (Greater).name: Breath Blaster (Greater)
Breath Blaster (Greater).description:
A greater breath blaster is a +2 greater striking blunderbuss most commonly crafted from the trachea of a dragon, though other creatures with breath weapons or the ability to spit energy are occasionally used. The implementation of the dragon's trachea allows the firearm to unleash a torrent of pure energy in the form of gouts of flame or bolts of electricity.

A breath blaster's Strikes deal either acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison damage, depending on the dragon type or other creature from which it was made, though it can otherwise be used like a normal blunderbuss. A breath blaster also can be activated to fire a line of energy in a @Template[type:line|distance:30] or @Template[type:cone|distance:15], chosen when it's created and typically corresponding to the shape of the breath weapon used by the type of dragon or creature from which the breath blaster was created.

In theory, the foundational techniques required to create a breath blaster would allow for other damage types, but such breath blasters would require the trachea from the correct dragon or creature type and additional creation techniques, making such a breath blaster rare rather than uncommon.

Activate 1 Interact (evocation, magical)

Frequency once per minute

Effect You fire the breath blaster, dealing [[/r 6d6]] damage of the appropriate type in the appropriate area. Creatures in the area must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:31|basic:true|name:Breath Blaster|traits:evocation,magical|showDC:owner] save (or @Check[type:fortitude|dc:31|name:Breath Blaster|traits:evocation,magical|showDC:owner] save if the damage is poison).

Craft Requirements The initial raw materials must include the trachea of a ritually hunted dragon or other creature with a breath weapon with the appropriate damage type and area (line or cone) for the breath blaster.

Breath Blaster (Major).name: Breath Blaster (Major)
Breath Blaster (Major).description:
A major breath blaster is a +3 major striking blunderbuss most commonly crafted from the trachea of a dragon, though other creatures with breath weapons or the ability to spit energy are occasionally used. The implementation of the dragon's trachea allows the firearm to unleash a torrent of pure energy in the form of gouts of flame or bolts of electricity.

A breath blaster also can be activated to fire a line of energy in a @Template[type:line|distance:30] or @Template[type:cone|distance:15], chosen when it's created and typically corresponding to the shape of the breath weapon used by the type of dragon or creature from which the breath blaster was created.

In theory, the foundational techniques required to create a breath blaster would allow for other damage types, but such breath blasters would require the trachea from the correct dragon or creature type and additional creation techniques, making such a breath blaster rare rather than uncommon.

Activate 1 Interact (evocation, magical)

Frequency once per minute

Effect You fire the breath blaster, dealing [[/r 10d6]] damage of the appropriate type in the appropriate area. Creatures in the area must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:38|basic:true|name:Breath Blaster|traits:evocation,magical|showDC:owner] save (or @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38|name:Breath Blaster|traits:evocation,magical|showDC:owner] save if the damage is poison).

Craft Requirements The initial raw materials must include the trachea of a ritually hunted dragon or other creature with a breath weapon with the appropriate damage type and area (line or cone) for the breath blaster.

Breech Ejectors.name: Breech Ejectors
Breech Ejectors.description: These spring-loaded inserts can be fitted into the breech of a double-barreled firearm over the course of 10 minutes or during the firearm's daily maintenance. After the weapon is fired, the ejectors hasten the reloading process by ejecting the spent detritus from the fired rounds. This allows you to reload both barrels of the double-barreled weapon as a single Interact action the next time you reload the weapon as long as you do so before the end of your next turn. However, the ejectors are consumed in the process, and you must spend the time to insert a new set to gain the benefit again.

Brewer's Regret.name: Brewer's Regret
Brewer's Regret.description:
Activate 1 Interact

When a brewer makes a batch of something they'd rather not drink, they often boil it down; add myrrh, mugwort extract, and violet salt; and sell it to chefs looking for cheap sandwich fillings. The thick, salty sourness ruins the taste of most other food, but it also creates a strong desire to live to taste anything else. For 1 hour after consumption, you gain a +2 item bonus to saves against death and negative effects. In addition, your doomed value decreases by 1 (minimum 0). You can reduce the doomed condition with brewer's regret only once per day, and after you do, you can't reduce the doomed condition from the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SnaLVgxZ9ryUFmUr]{Restoration} spell that same day (or vice versa).

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.9e6iVkPpGqJYwMyb]{Effect: Brewer's Regret}

Brewer's Regret (Greater).name: Brewer's Regret (Greater)
Brewer's Regret (Greater).description:
Activate 1 Interact

When a brewer makes a batch of something they'd rather not drink, they often boil it down; add myrrh, mugwort extract, and violet salt; and sell it to chefs looking for cheap sandwich fillings. The thick, salty sourness ruins the taste of most other food, but it also creates a strong desire to live to taste anything else. For 1 hour after consumption, you gain a +3 item bonus to saves against death and negative effects. In addition, your doomed value decreases by 1 (minimum 0). You can reduce the doomed condition with brewer's regret only once per day, and after you do, you can't reduce the doomed condition from the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SnaLVgxZ9ryUFmUr]{Restoration} spell that same day (or vice versa).

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.Ja3PlqLuD9aSaPNZ]{Effect: Brewer's Regret (Greater)}

Brilliant.name: Brilliant
Brilliant.description:
This rune causes a weapon to transform into pure, brilliant energy. The weapon deals an additional [[/r {1d4}[fire]]]{1d4 fire damage} on a successful Strike, as well as [[/r {1d4}[good]]]{1d4 good damage} to fiends and [[/r {1d4}[positive]]]{1d4 positive damage} to undead.

On a critical hit, the target must succeed at a DC 29 Fortitude save or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.

Activate 1 command (light)

Effect You plunge your weapon into darkness to return the light. Attempt a counteract check with a counteract level of 5 and a +19 counteract modifier to end a magical darkness effect whose area is within reach of the weapon.

Brilliant (Greater).name: Brilliant (Greater)
Brilliant (Greater).description:
This rune causes a weapon to transform into pure, brilliant energy. The weapon deals an additional [[/r {1d4}[fire]]]{1d4 fire damage} on a successful Strike, as well as [[/r {1d4}[good]]]{1d4 good damage} to fiends and [[/r {1d4}[positive]]]{1d4 positive damage} to undead. Damage dealt by this weapon ignores the target's fire, good, or positive resistance.

On a critical hit, the target must succeed at a DC 41 Fortitude save or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.

Activate 1 command (light)

Effect You plunge your weapon into darkness to return the light. Attempt a counteract check with a counteract level of 9 and a +31 counteract modifier to end a magical darkness effect whose area is within reach of the weapon.

Brilliant Rapier.name: Brilliant Rapier
Brilliant Rapier.description: This +2 brilliant greater striking rapier is formed entirely out of radiant energy, even more so than a usual brilliant weapon, and has left its physical form behind entirely. Instead of dealing piercing damage, it deals fire damage, and in addition to a rapier's normal weapon traits, it gains the versatile good or positive trait.

Brimstone Fumes.name: 硫磺烟 Brimstone Fumes
Brimstone Fumes.description:
从地狱锻炉中散发出的烟尘将同时耗竭生命与力量。

启动 A 交互 (吸入)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:36]

潜伏期 1 轮

最大持续时间 6 轮

阶段 1 [[/r {7d6}[poison]]]{7d6 毒素伤害} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1 轮)

阶段 2 [[/r {8d6}[poison]]]{8d6 毒素伤害} 和 力竭enfeebled 2 (1 轮)

阶段 3 [[/r {10d6}[poison]]]{10d6 毒素伤害} 和 力竭enfeebled 3 (1 轮)

Bronze Bull Pendant.name: 青铜牛垂饰 Bronze Bull Pendant
Bronze Bull Pendant.description:
启动 F 想象

触发 你尝试一次运动Atheltics检定以进行推撞Shove，但你尚未投掷结果

需求 你在运动Athletics中受训

这条垂饰用粗糙的钢铁制成，上面描绘了一个愤怒公牛的脸。这条垂饰必须附着在胸甲或肩甲处。

当你启动这条垂饰，你在用来推撞Shove的运动Athletics检定中获得+2状态加值，另外如果你在检定中投出了大失败，用失败来替代。

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.Cxa7MdgMCUoMqbKm]{效果：青铜牛垂饰}

Bronze Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult).description:

豁免检定。

这种液体包含了青铜龙的血。你饮下这瓶调和物之后的一小时内，你可以喷出青铜龙的吐息武器。吐息的效力基于药水的类型，是根据提供龙血的龙的年龄来决定的。药水拥有和吐息武器伤害类型一致的特征。

使用了一次吐息武器之后，你在 [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 轮}内无法再次使用。

Brooch of Inspiration.name: Brooch of Inspiration
Brooch of Inspiration.description:
This finely cut garnet brooch fills your mind with vigor and occasional bursts of mental clarity. While wearing the brooch, you gain a +1 item bonus to checks to Recall Knowledge with Lore skills.

Activate 2 envision (fortune)

Frequency once per day

Effect You think hard on a topic and receive a sudden inspiration. You attempt to Recall Knowledge using Lore. On this check, you roll twice and take the higher result.

Brooch of Inspiration (Greater).name: Brooch of Inspiration (Greater)
Brooch of Inspiration (Greater).description:
This finely cut garnet brooch fills your mind with vigor and occasional bursts of mental clarity. While wearing the brooch, you gain a +2 item bonus to checks to Recall Knowledge with Lore skills.

Activate 2 envision (fortune)

Frequency once per hour

Effect You think hard on a topic and receive a sudden inspiration. You attempt to Recall Knowledge using Lore. On this check, you roll twice and take the higher result.

Brooch of Inspiration (Major).name: Brooch of Inspiration (Major)
Brooch of Inspiration (Major).description:
This finely cut garnet brooch fills your mind with vigor and occasional bursts of mental clarity. While wearing the brooch, you gain a +3 item bonus to checks to Recall Knowledge with any skill.

Activate 1 envision (fortune)

Frequency once per 10 minutes

Effect You think hard on a topic and receive a sudden inspiration. You attempt to Recall Knowledge with any skill. On this check, you roll twice and take the higher result.

Brooch of Shielding.name: 护盾胸针 Brooch of Shielding
Brooch of Shielding.description:
这只金质或银质的胸针上装饰着鸢盾的图纹，可以系在一件斗篷或披肩上面。

这枚胸针会自动吸收以你为目标的魔法飞弹Magic Missile法术。一枚护盾胸针可以吸收30发魔法飞弹Magic Missile，接着便会融化且失去功能。在外面找到的护盾胸针，有时已经吸收了一定数量的魔法飞弹了。

Broom of Flying.name: 飞行扫帚 Broom of Flying
Broom of Flying.description:
这把扫帚于重力间有着一股微弱的联系，以至于即使被收起时也会漂浮起来。你可以用一只手控制扫帚而让自己骑在上面，并且除你之外这把扫帚还能再搭载一名乘客。

这把扫帚能够以20英尺的飞行速度移动。扫帚的运力是有限的，携带了超过20负载时它的移动速度会承受-10英尺的罚值，携带了超过30负载时它则会一头栽到地上。

启动 D 命令, 交互

效果 你说出一个位于同位面的目的地，扫帚就会以40英尺的飞行速度朝着你说的方向前进。你必须用两只手抓住扫帚才能让自己骑在上面，要么你就只能撒手让扫帚自个儿过去。如果你对目的地的位置、布局或是大致方向都不甚明了，或者你说的目的地在另一个位面上，那么扫帚只会漫无目的得四处游荡，并且在30分钟后返回起始位置。

如果扫帚携带着一名骑手，那么这个启动效果会在4小时后（通常情况下已经跑了16英里）、或是扫帚到达了目的地、或是你解消启动后结束。如果扫帚上没有骑手，那么这个启动效果会持续到扫帚到达目的地。当启动效果结束后，扫帚将会漂浮在地上，并且在1小时之内都无法被在此启动。

Bubbling Scale.name: Bubbling Scale
Bubbling Scale.description:
Activate 1 Interact

This dark, iridescent scale is about the size of a small coin. When you swallow the scale, you immediately grow a patch of scales that cover the majority of your body.

For 1 hour, you can hold your breath for 15 rounds plus your Constitution modifier (instead of 5 rounds + your Constitution modifier) before drowning. It has no effect in non-aquatic environments that require you to hold your breath.

After this time, the scales wither and fall off your body.

Buckler.name: 小圆盾 Buckler
Buckler.description:
这面小盾牌是决斗者和快速的轻甲战斗者的最爱。它通常由刚制成，绑在你的前臂上。你可以用小圆盾举起盾牌，只要那只手没有被占用，或者拿着轻巧的非武器物品。。

硬度 HP BT
3 6 3

Bullhook.name: Bullhook
Bullhook.description:
A bullhook is a stout rod about 4 feet long with a blunt hook on the end. Too dull to be useful as a weapon, a bullhook is instead used to direct animals in training or in performing their tasks. A bullhook grants you a +2 item bonus to Nature checks to Command an Animal while you are holding it.

Activate D command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You wave the bullhook to produce the effects of a first level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aIHY2DArKFweIrpf]{Command} spell (DC 18). This spell loses the linguistic trait and can target only animals.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of command of the appropriate level.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to Nature checks to Command an Animal

Bullhook (Greater).name: Bullhook (Greater)
Bullhook (Greater).description:
A bullhook is a stout rod about 4 feet long with a blunt hook on the end. Too dull to be useful as a weapon, a bullhook is instead used to direct animals in training or in performing their tasks. A bullhook grants you a +2 item bonus to Nature checks to Command an Animal while you are holding it.

Activate D command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You wave the bullhook to produce the effects of a fifth level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aIHY2DArKFweIrpf]{Command} spell (DC 30). This spell loses the linguistic trait and can target only animals.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of command of the appropriate level.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to Nature checks to Command an Animal

Buoyancy Vest.name: Buoyancy Vest
Buoyancy Vest.description:
This canvas vest has been filled with cork shavings, tightly folded, and sewn shut. Wearing a buoyancy vest allows you to float in water with a lowered risk of sinking. If you end your turn in water while wearing a buoyancy vest and haven't succeeded at a Swim action that turn, attempt a DC 5 flat check.

On a success, you do not sink, though you can still get moved by the current, as determined by the GM. The GM can also determine whether the vest is more or less effective in different weather conditions, raising the DC in rough waters or lowering the DC in calm water.

Burning Badger Guts Snare.name: Burning Badger Guts Snare
Burning Badger Guts Snare.description:
When a creature enters the trapped square, putrefied badger guts coated in hyper-flammable oil and several other incendiary reactants catch fire and are dumped in the snare's square, as well as up to two adjacent squares that you choose when you set the snare. The burning oil deals [[/r {5d8}[fire]]]{5d8 fire damage} to any creatures in the affected squares. Those creatures must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:27|traits:uncommon,damaging-effect|showDC:all] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage and [[/r {1d8}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage}.

Failure The creature takes full damage and [[/r {2d8}[persistent,fire]]] persistent fire damage, and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.

Burnished Plating.name: Burnished Plating
Burnished Plating.description:
These highly polished metal plates can be added to any armor. While wearing armor with burnished plating, you gain the Sunshine! reaction. However, you take a -4 circumstance penalty to stealth checks except in darkness, and your armor's Strength entry increases its value by 2, requiring you to have a higher Strength score to overcome the armor's penalties. Even if you meet your armor's new Strength entry, you still take the penalty to Stealth checks. When you are critically hit by an attack that deals bludgeoning damage, burnished plating stops working until someone spends 10 minutes repairing and polishing it; this doesn't require a Crafting check.

Sunshine! r

Trigger A creature you can see targets you with an attack

Requirements You are in an area of bright light

Effect You twist to reflect light in your foe's eyes. The attacking creature must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:3|name:Sunshine!|traits:visual|showDC:owner] check or the attack fails. The attacker doesn't need to roll this flat check if it has a precise sense other than vision or if it would already need to roll a flat check with a higher DC to target you, such as if you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}.

Burr Shield.name: Burr Shield
Burr Shield.description:
This well-crafted wooden shield is covered in numerous seed pods with long spurs. You can Strike with these burrs as though they were @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.nSO0Z662LkkLfa2u]{+1 Striking Shield Spikes}.

Activate 1 Interact

Requirements Your previous action was a successful Strike with the burrs

Effect One of the burrs catches on the Strike's target, inflicting [[/r {1d10}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}.

Hardness HP BT
5 30 15

Butchering Axe.name: Butchering Axe
Butchering Axe.description: Invented by Belkzen's zealous Steel‑Eaters, the butchering axe has an oversized head and a long, thick haft counterbalanced with steel or stone. The weapon's sweeping strokes inflict immense damage, particularly against groups of foes, and can push dangerous opponents away to a safe distance. All of these qualities are particularly useful against the lumbering zombie hordes of the Whispering Tyrant. Correspondingly, butchering axes are often wielded by orc and half-orc Crimson Reclaimers of Lastwall.

Butterfly Sword.name: Butterfly Sword
Butterfly Sword.description: This short, single-edged sword typically features a cross guard that helps catch oncoming attacks. It is the preferred weapon of Butterfly Blades-highly skilled Gokan assassins.

Buugeng.name: Buugeng
Buugeng.description: A blade of conrasu design, a buugeng has a unique, curved shape that allows it to rotate smoothly in the hand of a trained warrior. This spinning motion makes it easier to attack multiple foes at once with the weapon.

Buzzsaw Axe.name: Buzzsaw Axe
Buzzsaw Axe.description:
With an aerodynamic cutting edge and a curved handle, this +2 striking battle axe is perfectly suited to whirling motions, and in fact seems like it wants to whirl free from your grip. A Strike with this axe that benefits from the sweep trait's circumstance bonus on attack rolls also gains a +2 circumstance bonus to the damage roll.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect You hurl the axe, which spins at great speed as it flies to a distant point and returns to you, leaving a trail of carnage. Each creature in a @Template[type:line|distance:120] must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true|name:Thrown Buzzsaw Axe|traits:axe|showDC:all] save or take damage equal to the weapon's melee damage, including your Strength modifier.

Buzzsaw Axe (Greater).name: Buzzsaw Axe (Greater)
Buzzsaw Axe (Greater).description:
With an aerodynamic cutting edge and a curved handle, this +2 greater striking battle axe is perfectly suited to whirling motions, and in fact seems like it wants to whirl free from your grip. A Strike with this axe that benefits from the sweep trait's circumstance bonus on attack rolls also gains a +3 circumstance bonus to the damage roll.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect You hurl the axe, which spins at great speed as it flies to a distant point and returns to you, leaving a trail of carnage. Each creature in a @Template[type:line|distance:120] must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:34|basic:true|name:Thrown Buzzsaw Axe|traits:axe|showDC:all] save or take damage equal to the weapon's melee damage, including your Strength modifier.

Buzzsaw Axe (Major).name: Buzzsaw Axe (Major)
Buzzsaw Axe (Major).description:
With an aerodynamic cutting edge and a curved handle, this +3 major striking battle axe is perfectly suited to whirling motions, and in fact seems like it wants to whirl free from your grip. A Strike with this axe that benefits from the sweep trait's circumstance bonus on attack rolls also gains a +4 circumstance bonus to the damage roll.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect You hurl the axe, which spins at great speed as it flies to a distant point and returns to you, leaving a trail of carnage. Each creature in a @Template[type:line|distance:120] must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:43|basic:true|name:Thrown Buzzsaw Axe|traits:axe|showDC:all] save or take damage equal to the weapon's melee damage, including your Strength modifier.

Called.name: Called
Called.description:
With this rune, you can instantly retrieve an item in your possession without digging around looking for it.

Activate 1 command

Frequency once per hour

Requirements You have a free hand and the called item is in a bag, pack, pouch, or other container on your person, or unattended within 30 feet

Effect The item teleports to a free hand.

Caltrop Snare.name: 铁蒺藜圈套 Caltrop Snare
Caltrop Snare.description:
这个圈套由装着铁蒺藜的金属圆盒和其连接的一根绊绳组合而成。当圈套被触发，它将铁蒺藜发射到圈套所在的方格内，或邻接圈套的一个方格内。你在设置圈套的时候就要决定是哪一个方格。

如果铁蒺藜发射到生物所处的方格内，该生物必须立刻进行一次特技Acrobatics检定。

制造需求 提供一罐铁蒺藜

Caltrops.name: 铁蒺藜 Caltrops
Caltrops.description: 这些四尖金属钉可能会对生物的脚造成伤害。你可以使用【交互（Interact）动作】在与你相邻的一个空方格中散布铁蒺藜。进入该方格的第一个生物必须成功进行DC 14的特技检定，否则就会受到1d4穿刺伤害和 [[/r {1}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续流血伤害}。受到来自铁蒺藜的持续流血伤害的生物受到-5尺的速度减值。花费一个【交互（Interact）动作】来拔除铁蒺藜可以降低停止流血的DC。 一旦一个生物受到来自铁蒺藜的伤害，足够多的铁蒺藜会被毁掉，后续的其他生物进入这个方格是安全的。如果没有生物受到伤害，可以回收散布的铁蒺藜以再次使用。否则足够多的铁蒺藜会被破坏，这样无法回收。

Camouflage Suit.name: Camouflage Suit
Camouflage Suit.description:
This lightweight mesh fits easily over light armor. The suit is designed to incorporate local flora and ground clutter into the mesh to help you blend in seamlessly with the environment. Due to the abrasive nature of the materials used, this item is unsuitable for use by unarmored characters. You can prepare the suit for use within your current environment by using an exploration activity that takes at least 10 minutes, but sometimes longer if the materials are hard to find or the environment is unusual enough to warrant additional difficulty in preparing camouflage that can blend with it consistently.

A suit prepared in this manner grants you a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks while you attempt to Hide or Sneak in the specific environment it has been prepared for. The suit remains usable in this manner until you rest for the night, though it doesn't grant the benefit whenever you aren't in the appropriate environment. The GM might rule that some environments are unusual enough that you can't create a camouflage suit appropriate for the environment.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.jgaDboqENQJaS1sW]{Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit}

Camouflage Suit (Superb).name: Camouflage Suit (Superb)
Camouflage Suit (Superb).description:
This lightweight mesh fits easily over light armor. The suit is designed to incorporate local flora and ground clutter into the mesh to help you blend in seamlessly with the environment. Due to the abrasive nature of the materials used, this item is unsuitable for use by unarmored characters. You can prepare the suit for use within your current environment by using an exploration activity that takes at least 10 minutes, but sometimes longer if the materials are hard to find or the environment is unusual enough to warrant additional difficulty in preparing camouflage that can blend with it consistently.

A superb camouflage suit is fashioned from especially well-blended materials grants you a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks while you attempt to Hide or Sneak in the specific environment it has been prepared for. The suit remains usable in this manner until you rest for the night, though it doesn't grant the benefit whenever you aren't in the appropriate environment. The GM might rule that some environments are unusual enough that you can't create a camouflage suit appropriate for the environment.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.DfAyZW2vkhTygZVC]{Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb)}

Candle.name: 蜡烛 Candle
Candle.description: 点燃的蜡烛在10尺半径范围内散发出昏暗的光芒，持续8小时。

Candle of Invocation.name: Candle of Invocation
Candle of Invocation.description:
Activate 1 Interact

This golden candle bears the symbol of a specific deity emblazoned on its surface, surrounded by the iconography of that deity's faith. Once lit, this candle burns for 1 hour, and it can't be extinguished.

Characters who cast divine spells and worship the deity emblazoned on the candle can perform their daily preparations within 10 feet of the lit candle to gain two additional spell slots for the day, each at half the highest spell level the character can cast (for example, 4th level slots if the caster can cast 8th-level spells). Prepared casters must prepare spells in these spell slots as they do for all their other spell slots.

A caster's additional spell slots from the candle are lost the next time that caster performs their daily preparations. No one can benefit from more than one candle of invocation in a day, but multiple characters can benefit from a single candle's effects.

Candle of Revealing.name: Candle of Revealing
Candle of Revealing.description:
Activate 1 Interact

When lit, this black candle's eerie blue flame reveals the presence of invisible creatures. Within a 10-foot radius of the lit candle, creatures don't benefit from the invisible condition. Their bodies are outlined, not fully visible, so they are concealed. Once lit, the candle burns for 1 minute, after which the effect ends. If extinguished, it can't be relit.

Candle of Truth.name: 真实蜡烛 Candle of Truth
Candle of Truth.description:
启动 A 交互

这根尖头蜡烛有着金色的烛芯，点燃后会产生白色的火焰。你通过点燃这根蜡烛来启动它，这会让蜡烛周围10尺内的生物难以说谎。范围内的生物在说谎Lie上承受-4状态罚值。

另外，每个生物首次进入该区域时（包括你自己），都必须成功通过一次 @Check[type:will|dc:26] 豁免，否则将不能在范围内刻意说谎。这个效果只要蜡烛还在燃烧就会持续。点燃后，这根蜡烛可以燃烧10分钟，而且无法被熄灭。

Cane Pistol.name: Cane Pistol
Cane Pistol.description: This fashionable cane's handle hides a dueling pistol fired through the thin, painted cap at the bottom of the cane.

Cane of the Maelstrom.name: Cane of the Maelstrom
Cane of the Maelstrom.description:
A large crystal of warpglass floats above the head of this silvery purple +3 anarchic greater striking club. If you successfully Strike a creature, the cane also affects the target with a @Compendium[pf2e.rollable-tables.yRZwPolTnRdnz42V]{Warpwave}.

While you carry the cane, you hear a constant, distracting chorus of laughing, incoherent Protean whispers and sing-song voices in your mind. Blatant acts of self-indulgence or narcissism quell these whispers, from a few minutes up to a full day depending on the scope of the act, but they immediately return when you use the artifact's powers. The gradually rising chorus eventually drives away rational thought and renders the cane's owner insane, even if staved off from time to time with self-centered acts.

As the artifact's abilities pull material from the Maelstrom, it doesn't function in areas where planar connections are severed.

Activater envision

Trigger You are targeted by a ranged attack from an opponent you can see

Effect You draw a temporary shield of chaotic turbulence with a cerulean flash. You gain a +3 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Activate 10 minutes (command, envision, Interact)

Effect The Cane of the Maelstrom casts a 5th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.HBJPsonQnWcC3qdX]{Hallucinatory Terrain} spell and infuses the illusion with quasi-real substance drawn from the primal chaos of the Maelstrom. Creatures that don't disbelieve the illusion treat structures and terrain created through the spell as though they were real, ascending illusory stairs, becoming trapped by illusory quicksand, and so on. If no creature disbelieves the illusion during its duration, the changes become wholly real and permanent when its duration expires.

Activate 1 minute (Interact)

Effect The Cane of the Maelstrom casts a 5th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TUj8eugNqAvB1vVR]{Creation} spell, except the duration is unlimited and you can create delicate or complex objects by succeeding at an applicable Crafting skill check when you activate this ability.

Cantrip Deck (5-pack).name: Cantrip Deck (5-pack)
Cantrip Deck (5-pack).description:
In an effort to spread the knowledge of magic as widely as possible, worshippers of Nethys discovered a way to bind cantrips into cards accessible even to non-spellcasters. The deck contains thick parchment cards, each roughly half the size of a playing card. In precise, no-nonsense script, each card simply states the name of its cantrip, color-coded based on its school.

This pack contains 5 cards of a single common cantrip.

Activate 1 or more (envision, Interact)

Effect You envision your desired cantrip, causing its card to rise to the top of the deck, and draw the card. The deck casts that cantrip as a 1st-level spell, with a DC of 15 and a spell attack modifier of +5. The card crumbles into dust as the cantrip takes effect. The activation takes the same number of actions as the cantrip you chose takes to cast.

Cantrip Deck (Full Pack).name: Cantrip Deck (Full Pack)
Cantrip Deck (Full Pack).description:
In an effort to spread the knowledge of magic as widely as possible, worshippers of Nethys discovered a way to bind cantrips into cards accessible even to non-spellcasters. The deck contains thick parchment cards, each roughly half the size of a playing card. In precise, no-nonsense script, each card simply states the name of its cantrip, color-coded based on its school.

This pack contains 24 cards-one of each cantrip in the Core Rulebook.

Activate 1 or more (envision, Interact)

Effect You envision your desired cantrip, causing its card to rise to the top of the deck, and draw the card. The deck casts that cantrip as a 1st-level spell, with a DC of 15 and a spell attack modifier of +5. The card crumbles into dust as the cantrip takes effect. The activation takes the same number of actions as the cantrip you chose takes to cast.

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gISYsBFby1TiXfBt]{Acid Splash}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.mAMEt4FFbdqoRnkN]{Chill Touch}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kl2q6JvBZwed4B6v]{Dancing Lights}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4gBIw4IDrSfFHik4]{Daze}

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qwZBXN6zBoB9BHXE]{Divine Lance}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kBhaPuzLUSwS6vVf]{Electric Arc}

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tXa5vOu5giBNCjdR]{Know Direction}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.pwzdSlJgYqN7bs2w]{Mage Hand}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLzFcIaSXs7YTIqJ]{Message}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Qw3fnUlaUbnn7ipC]{Prestidigitation}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Ray of Frost}

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.AUctDF2fqPZN2w4W]{Sigil}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SnjhtQYexDtNDdEg]{Stabilize}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]{Tanglefoot}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.60sgbuMWN0268dB7]{Telekinetic Projectile}

Cape of the Mountebank.name: 骗徒披肩 Cape of the Mountebank
Cape of the Mountebank.description:
这件闪耀的金红色披肩上还缝入了一些闪闪发光的金线，可以使人注意力分散。当穿着这件披肩时，你的欺骗Deception检定上获得+2物品加值。

启动 D 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你施展 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{任意门 Dimension Door}。你离开和出现的空间都会冒出烟雾，使其中的任何人都获得隐蔽Concealed，直到他们离开烟雾；烟雾会在你的下一回合结束时消散。强风会立刻吹散烟雾。

自动生效:

  • 欺骗Deception检定获得+2物品加值

Cape of the Open Sky.name: Cape of the Open Sky
Cape of the Open Sky.description:
This cloth of gold cape was originally gifted to one of Goka's emperors centuries ago. Since then, it has spawned many imitations, which are all alike in that they are dyed with an elaborate seal depicting two drakes flanking Goka's palace and the Seven Dragons Bridge. The beautiful cape grants you a +3 item bonus to checks to Lie and to Make an Impression. While you wear the cape, the weather (including wind and fog) doesn't affect your movement or vision. Additionally, whenever you fall while wearing the cape of the open sky, the cape automatically casts @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{Feather Fall} on you.

Activate 2 Interact

Effect The cape becomes a pair of golden drake wings that grant you a fly Speed of 30 feet for 1 hour.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.UzSrsR9S2pgMDbbp]{Effect: Cape of the Open Sky}

Activate 1 command

Frequency once per minute

Effect The cloak pushes you onward. You Stride or Fly up to your Speed, but you can move only in a straight line. You gain a +15-foot status bonus to your Speed and fly Speed for this movement.

Capsaicin Tonic.name: Capsaicin Tonic
Capsaicin Tonic.description:
This translucent, pale-yellow drink has several pepper seeds suspended within it. Although the tonic is painfully spicy when first consumed, the heat soon fades as the tonic coats your throat. In the next hour, you can use the activation below up to three times; the third time you use it, the effects of the capsaicin tonic end. While under the effects of the tonic, you can easily consume even the spiciest of foods without trouble.

Activate A Interact

Effect You belch out a foul-smelling cloud of blisteringly spicy gas that fills a single square adjacent to you. Creatures within the cloud are concealed, and all creatures outside the cloud are concealed to creatures within it. The cloud remains for 1 minute but can be dispersed by a strong wind. The cloud deals 1d4 fire damage to creatures that enter the cloud on their turn, as well as to creatures that start their turn in the cloud (a creature takes this damage no more than once per round, even if it moves back and forth into the cloud multiple times during the round).

Cartographer's Kit.name: Cartographer's Kit
Cartographer's Kit.description: This kit includes a writing set, a compass, a standard astrolabe, a ruler, and a survey map.

Cassock of Devotion.name: 奉献教袍 Cassock of Devotion
Cassock of Devotion.description:
每件奉献教袍都描绘了一种与领域或特定神祗相关的场景。教袍能作为该神祗的圣徽来使用，而且不需要持握就能提供圣徽的好处。你在宗教Religion检定上获得+2物品加值，并在教袍所描述的神祗的偏好技能上获得+1物品加值。

启动 F 想象

频率 每天一次

效果 你获得1点聚能点，但你只能将这点聚能点用来施展牧师的领域法术，而且对应领域必须是教袍所描述的神祗所具有的。如果你在这回合结束前不用掉这点聚能点，则你失去这点聚能点。

制造需求 你是一个信仰与教袍相关联的神祗的牧师。

自动生效:

  • 宗教Religion检定获得+2物品加值

Cat's Eye Elixir.name: 猫眼灵药 Cat's Eye Elixir
Cat's Eye Elixir.description:
启动 A 交互 Interact

在你消耗这瓶灵药之后，你的视线变得锐利，能够感知哪怕最为微小的运动。

在接下来的一分钟，你瞄准藏匿（hidden）生物时进行的裸骰检定减少为5，而瞄准隐蔽（concealed）生物时则不需要进行裸骰检定。这些好处在对抗你周围30尺内的生物时才有效。

Caterwaul Sling.name: 尖叫投石索 Caterwaul Sling
Caterwaul Sling.description:
以光泽明亮的棕皮制作，这件+1强击投石索用一根白色的线将皮革穿起来。

启动 D 交互 (音波)

频率 每天一次

效果 你空挥白线，将投石索回旋甩至最高速度。它会发出一股刺耳的尖叫， @Template[type:cone|distance:30] 内所有生物受到 [[/r 4d6]] 点音波伤害（DC21基础强韧豁免）。所有豁免失败的生物耳聋1轮，大失败则耳聋1小时。

Cauldron of Nightmares.name: Cauldron of Nightmares
Cauldron of Nightmares.description:
Engraved with carvings of tortured souls, this green cauldron has two abilities that allow it to capture nightmares and then unleash them on the world.

The cauldron has an affinity for preying on the minds of captives and prisoners, who take a -2 circumstance penalty to saving throws against it. Good creatures are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying, wielding, or wearing this item crafted by the sea-witches.

Activatea Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect The cauldron casts @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Uqj344bezBq3ESdq]{Nightmare} (@Check[type:will|dc:35|name:Nightmare|traits:mental,arcane,occult]) on a target creature that you know by name. The target must be on the same plane as you. If the target fails its save and is 15th level or lower, you add its nightmare to the cauldron. The cauldron can hold only six nightmares at a time; when you add a new nightmare, you choose which six to keep.

Activate2 Interact

Frequency once per week

Effect You spill the nightmarish contents of the cauldron onto the ground and choose one creature whose nightmare is stored in your cauldron. A nightmare copy of the chosen creature springs to life from the bubbling pile of horror. The cauldron casts @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.73rToy0v5Ra9NvL6]{Duplicate Foe} on the target, ignoring the range restriction, and the target automatically fails its saving throw. All enemies within 20 feet of the cauldron are subjected to a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4koZzrnMXhhosn0D]{Fear} spell (@Check[type:will|dc:35|name:Fear|traits:mental,emotion,fear,arcane,divine,occult,primal]). All other nightmares stored in the cauldron are lost. The cauldron becomes totally inert and can't be used again for 1 week.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of nightmare.

Caustic Deteriorating Dust.name: Caustic Deteriorating Dust
Caustic Deteriorating Dust.description:
Contained in a specially enchanted small leather or hide sack, deteriorating dust is a potent caustic agent and a prized item among Rovagug's more discreet followers.

Activate D Interact

Effect You sprinkle the deteriorating dust over an unattended Medium or smaller object. The dust quickly fades to a transparent color and the object immediately begins to rust, melt, or otherwise fall apart. For the listed time, the object takes constant damage; if the object has a Hardness, then the dust gradually reduces the object's Hardness instead. If the deteriorating dust is still active after the object's Hardness is reduced to 0, it deals damage to the object as previously described. If the object survives, reduced Hardness returns after the dust's duration expires, but any damage remains.

The affected object takes 1 damage per hour (24 damage per day) and its Hardness is reduced by 1 per hour. The effect lasts for 3 days.

Cauterizing Torch.name: Cauterizing Torch
Cauterizing Torch.description:
Activate 1 Interact

This small, clockwork torch device uses a trigger-operated sparker to ignite a flow of flammable gas, creating a short, hot flame capable of rapidly cauterizing wounds and helping to stop bleeding. The cauterizing torch is applied to yourself or an adjacent target. The target attempts an immediate flat check to end any persistent bleed effect with the lower DC for particularly effective assistance.

Celestial Armor.name: 天界甲 Celestial Armor
Celestial Armor.description:
这套+2抗力链甲衫是用一种奇妙的半透明灰色金属制成的白色链环织成，袖套和战裙装饰有羽毛状的流苏。和普通链甲衫不同，天界甲没有速度减值，护甲检定减值为0，负载为1。

你对抗炼狱生物时AC和豁免骰会获得+1环境加值。穿戴该护甲时你看上去在发光，对所有非炼狱生物的交涉检定获得+2物品加值。

若你非善良阵营，穿戴天界甲会事你获得drained2状态。只要穿戴该护甲，你就无法移除该状态。

启动 命令

频率 每天一次

效果 护甲背部长出光之翼，给与你30尺飞行速度。该翅膀发出半径40尺的明亮光芒（向外40尺则为昏暗光）。该翅膀10分钟后黯淡消失。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.gDefAEEMXVVZgqXH]{效果：天界甲}

制造需求 你需为善良阵营。

自动生效:

  • 你对抗炼狱生物时AC和豁免骰获得+1环境加值。
  • 对所有非炼狱生物的交涉检定获得+2物品加值。

Celestial Hair.name: Celestial Hair
Celestial Hair.description:
Activate F Interact

Trigger You critically fail a saving throw or are critically hit by an attack

This strand of hair shimmers like the strands of fate. When you activate the string, it resonates with a single, perfect note.

The triggering saving throw becomes a failure or the triggering attack roll becomes a regular hit, not critical one. If the source of the attack or effect is an evil creature, that creature must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:41] saving throw or be enfeebled 2 and stupefied 2 until the end of its next turn.

Celestial Peach (Life).name: Celestial Peach (Life)
Celestial Peach (Life).description:
Activate 1 Interact

Among Hao Jin's most precious treasures are three living plants, the last surviving celestial peach trees taken from the mountains of Chu Ye. One of the trees grows pearls in place of flowers, but the other two bear fruit that is far more valuable. Eating one of these small red peaches can heal even the most grievous of injuries.

When you place the peach into the mouth of an intact corpse that died within the last year, it casts a 10th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IkGYwHRLhkuoGReG]{Raise Dead} on the corpse.

Celestial Peach (Rejuvenation).name: Celestial Peach (Rejuvenation)
Celestial Peach (Rejuvenation).description:
Activate 1 Interact

Among Hao Jin's most precious treasures are three living plants, the last surviving celestial peach trees taken from the mountains of Chu Ye. One of the trees grows pearls in place of flowers, but the other two bear fruit that is far more valuable. Eating one of these small red peaches can heal even the most grievous of injuries.

You gain the effects of 7th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{Neutralize Poison}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2Vkd1IxylPceUAAF]{Regenerate}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OyFCwQuw8XRazsNr]{Remove Curse}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.RneiyehRO6f7LP44]{Remove Disease} spells. The peach has a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+27]].

Cerulean Scourge.name: Cerulean Scourge
Cerulean Scourge.description:
Made from a carefully distilled blend of serpentine hemotoxins, the fast-acting cerulean scourge is infamous for transforming the blood vessels near the original wound, which glow with a bright blue light before painfully bursting.

Activate 2 Interact (Injuury)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:36]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r {9d6}[poison]]]{9d6 poison damage} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r {12d6}[poison]]]{12d6 poison damage} (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r {15d6}[poison]]]{15d6 poison damage} (1 round)

Chain Mail.name: 链甲 Chain Mail
Chain Mail.description: 一套链甲由链接在一个防护网中的多个小金属环组成。它通常包括链甲衫，护腿，护臂和罩帽，组合起来保护大部分的躯体。

Chain Shirt.name: 链甲衫 Chain Shirt
Chain Shirt.description: 有时也被称为锁子甲，这是一件如同链甲一样，由相同的金属环构成的长衫。然而，它比链甲轻得多，且只能保护穿戴者的躯干、上臂和大腿。

Chain of the Stilled Spirit.name: Chain of the Stilled Spirit
Chain of the Stilled Spirit.description: This 3-foot length of chain is made of a mystical blue-white steel. You can wrap the chain around an item or creature; if a ghost of 9th level or lower is bound to the item or creature via its rejuvenation ability, it cannot rejuvenate if it is destroyed. This chain can't impede a ghost's rejuvenation that is tied to an area, only to an item or creature. At the GM's discretion, thechain of the stilled spiritmight work on abilities similar to Rejuvenation that prevent a spirit from going being fully destroyed.

Chakram.name: Chakram
Chakram.description: Simple, elegant, and portable, the chakram is an open-centered metal discus with a sharpened edge, as well as a grip running along the center so the wielder can hold it safely.

Chameleon Suit.name: Chameleon Suit
Chameleon Suit.description:
Activate 2 Interact

This complex clockwork outerwear, worn over armor or other clothing, is composed of thin, interlocking scales of myriad colors attached to numerous clockwork gears that can rotate between all visible colors and shades.

When activated, the clockwork gears work double-time to temporarily switch and adjust the scales to match the exact coloration of the area around you, allowing you to blend in as long as you stay still. For 1 minute, you can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} without needing cover or concealment to do so. This doesn't allow you to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} without ending your movement in cover or concealment, however, as the clockwork flips over and adjusts the scales to match your background as you move, giving the impression of rippling waves of color and revealing your movement. After the 1 minute, the overworked clockwork and scales fall apart.

Chameleon Suit (Greater).name: Chameleon Suit (Greater)
Chameleon Suit (Greater).description:
Activate 2 Interact

This complex clockwork outerwear, worn over armor or other clothing, is composed of thin, interlocking scales of myriad colors attached to numerous clockwork gears that can rotate between all visible colors and shades.

When activated, the clockwork gears work double-time to temporarily switch and adjust the scales to match the exact coloration of the area around you, allowing you to blend in as long as you stay still. For 10 minutes, you can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} without needing cover or concealment to do so. This doesn't allow you to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} without ending your movement in cover or concealment, however, as the clockwork flips over and adjusts the scales to match your background as you move, giving the impression of rippling waves of color and revealing your movement. After the 10 minutes, the overworked clockwork and scales fall apart.

Chameleon Suit (Major).name: Chameleon Suit (Major)
Chameleon Suit (Major).description:
Activate 2 Interact

This complex clockwork outerwear, worn over armor or other clothing, is composed of thin, interlocking scales of myriad colors attached to numerous clockwork gears that can rotate between all visible colors and shades.

When activated, the clockwork gears work double-time to temporarily switch and adjust the scales to match the exact coloration of the area around you, allowing you to blend in as long as you stay still. For 1 hour, you can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} without needing cover or concealment to do so. This doesn't allow you to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} without ending your movement in cover or concealment, however, as the clockwork flips over and adjusts the scales to match your background as you move, giving the impression of rippling waves of color and revealing your movement. After the 1 hour, the overworked clockwork and scales fall apart.

Channel Protection Amulet.name: 导能防护项链 Channel Protection Amulet
Channel Protection Amulet.description: 这个抛光过的玻陨石块被困在一个细线编织而成的小笼子里，挂在一条丝绳上。当你穿戴这条项链时，如果你是活物，那么你在对抗伤害术Harm时获得抗力5；如果你是不死生物，那么你在对抗治疗术Heal时获得抗力5。

Chatterer of Follies.name: Chatterer of Follies
Chatterer of Follies.description:
This heavy +1 striking khakarra is cast from solid steel and plated with pyrite. Metal charms shaped like grinning idols festoon its great arched ring, and during combat, as tiny tendrils of flame fly off the pyrite, these hanging dolls seem to chatter in tune with the clash and din of battle.

Whenever you complete a move action during your turn, choose a creature adjacent to you at the end of your movement. Until the end of your turn, that creature takes a -1 status penalty to Will saves against your enchantment spells and your illusion spells. Any time you cast your enchantment and illusion spells, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} during your move actions for the rest of the turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.mQJk8R0vHzvpTz0e]{Equipment Effect: Chatterer of Follies}

Cheetah's Elixir (Greater).name: 高等猎豹灵药 Cheetah's Elixir (Greater)
Cheetah's Elixir (Greater).description:
启动 A 交互

这瓶灵药中的混合酶能够刺激并增强你的腿部肌肉。你在1小时内于你的速度（Speed）上获得+10尺状态加值。

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.PeuUz7JaabCgl6Yh]{效果：高等猎豹灵药}

Cheetah's Elixir (Lesser).name: 次等猎豹灵药 Cheetah's Elixir (Lesser)
Cheetah's Elixir (Lesser).description:
启动 A 交互

这瓶灵药中的混合酶能够刺激并增强你的腿部肌肉。你在1分钟内于你的速度（Speed）上获得+5尺状态加值。

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.lNWACCNe9RYgaFxb]{效果：次等猎豹灵药}

Cheetah's Elixir (Moderate).name: 中等猎豹灵药 Cheetah's Elixir (Moderate)
Cheetah's Elixir (Moderate).description:
启动 A 交互

这瓶灵药中的混合酶能够刺激并增强你的腿部肌肉。你在10分钟内于你的速度（Speed）上获得+10尺状态加值。

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.j9zVZwRBVAcnpEkE]{效果：中等猎豹灵药}

Chime of Opening.name: 开锁管钟 Chime of Opening
Chime of Opening.description:
这根长约一英尺的秘银中空管上刻着能够让人联想到开锁或是断链的雕花。管钟在它碎裂失效之前可以被启动十次。

启动 A 交互

效果 你将管钟对准你想要打开的一件容器、一扇门或是一把锁，然后敲响管钟。管钟发出的魔法波动会尝试一次加值为 [[/r 1d20+13]]的贼活检定对抗锁的DC。这种方式一次只能对准一把锁，所以当一个目标拥有多种保护方式的时候，你可能要启动好几次管钟。

Choker of Elocution.name: 雄辩颈圈 Choker of Elocution
Choker of Elocution.description:
这只白金颈圈上刻着一种语言的字母表，能提供一种语言以及相关文化的知识。

你在社群Society检定上获得+1物品加值，并能够理解、说和写这种语言。

你精彩的雄辩能力能够将在耳聋Deafened状态下执行一次听觉Auditory动作的纯骰检定DC从5降低至3。

制造需求 你掌握了颈圈提供的所有语言。

自动生效:

  • 社群Society检定获得+1物品加值

Choker of Elocution (Greater).name: 高等雄辩颈圈 Choker of Elocution (Greater)
Choker of Elocution (Greater).description:
这只白金颈圈上刻着三种语言的字母表，能提供三种语言以及相关文化的知识。

你在社群Society检定上获得+2物品加值，并能够理解、说和写这些语言。

你精彩的雄辩能力能够将在耳聋Deafened状态下执行一次听觉Auditory动作的纯骰检定DC从5降低至3。

制造需求 你掌握了颈圈提供的所有语言。

自动生效:

  • 社群Society检定获得+1物品加值

Chopping Evisceration Snare.name: Chopping Evisceration Snare
Chopping Evisceration Snare.description: An almost-impossible number of axes spring out at a target with lethal force. When a creature enters the snare's square, it's nearly buried beneath a storm of sharpened metal, which deals [[/r {16d8}[slashing]]]{16d8 slashing damage} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:33|basic:true|showDC:all]).

Chronicler Wayfinder.name: Chronicler Wayfinder
Chronicler Wayfinder.description:
Chronicler wayfinders bear a mystical connection to the Pathfinder Chronicles themselves, granting them the ability to assist in situations where unusual lore is needed by drawing on lore from a particular topic. Each chronicler wayfinder is attuned to a specific Lore skill, chosen at the time of creation. In addition to the effects of a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder}, a chronicler wayfinder has the following activation.

Activate A Envision

Effect You tap into the Pathfinder Chronicles on the chronicler wayfinder's attuned topic, gaining the effects of a Recall Knowledge action with the chosen Lore skill. For the Lore check's modifier, use whichever is better of +12 or your own modifier, using your level as your proficiency bonus even if you're untrained in the attuned Lore skill.

Chrysoberyl symbol of an evil eye.name: Chrysoberyl symbol of an evil eye

Cinderclaw Gauntlet.name: Cinderclaw Gauntlet
Cinderclaw Gauntlet.description:
This sharp-taloned +1 striking spiked gauntlet appears to have been crafted from dragon scales, with claws built from iron. In addition to the typical weapon traits, a Cinderclaw gauntlet has the versatile S trait.

On a critical hit, the Cinderclaw gauntlet deals an additional 1d6 fire damage.

Activate R command

Trigger Your attack roll with the Cinderclaw gauntlet is a critical success.

Effect The creature you hit must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19|showDC:owner] save or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} by the gauntlet's acrid smoke. Creatures that don't need to breathe are immune.

Circlet of Persuasion.name: 说服头环 Circlet of Persuasion
Circlet of Persuasion.description:
这优雅的银箍像是包裹着你眉间的卷曲无花果叶。你在欺骗Deception和交涉Diplomacy检定中获得+2物品加值。若绑定了该头环，你能将你的魅力Charisma提升2点，或将其提升至18点，选择结果更高的选项。

启动 D 想象

频率 每小时一次

效果 你施放一次4环的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{魅惑术 Charm} (DC 38)。

自动生效:

  • 欺骗Deception检定获得+2物品加值
  • 交涉Diplomacy检定获得+2物品加值

Clan Dagger.name: 氏族匕首 Clan Dagger
Clan Dagger.description: 这把宽大的匕首由矮人携带，作为武器、工具和氏族标志。对于大多数矮人来说，丢失或不得不交出氏族匕首被认为是一种耻辱。

Clan Pistol.name: Clan Pistol
Clan Pistol.description: The tradition of dwarves displaying their clan affiliations with special clan daggers goes back millennia, but many of the dwarf clans of Dongun Hold have their own take on the tradition, with promising young gunsmiths claiming their adulthood by crafting a specialized personal firearm using the clan's unique smithing traditions. Losing or being forced to surrender their clan pistol is a terrible embarrassment for the dwarves that carry them.

Clandestine Cloak.name: 隐秘斗篷 Clandestine Cloak
Clandestine Cloak.description:
当你拉上这件平凡的灰色斗篷的头罩时（一个交互动作），你失去光彩，变得不引人注意。你在隐秘Stealth检定上获得+1物品加值，以及在用来乔装Impersonate一个无名角色的欺骗Deception检定中获得+1物品加值，例如乔装成一个佣人。但你会在交涉Diplomacy以及威吓Intimidation检定中承受-1物品罚值。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.Uadsb25G18pKdZ2e]{效果：隐秘斗篷}

启动 D 想象, 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你拉上斗篷的头罩并获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{回避侦测 Nondetection} 的效果，持续1小时或直到你把头罩放下。

Clandestine Cloak (Greater).name: 高等隐秘斗篷 Clandestine Cloak (Greater)
Clandestine Cloak (Greater).description:
当你拉上这件平凡的灰色斗篷的头罩时（一个交互动作），你失去光彩，变得不引人注意。你在隐秘Stealth检定上获得+2物品加值，以及在用来乔装Impersonate一个无名角色的欺骗Deception检定中获得+2物品加值，例如乔装成一个佣人。但你会在交涉Diplomacy以及威吓Intimidation检定中承受-1物品罚值。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.uXEp1rPU5fY4OiBf]{效果：高等隐秘斗篷}

启动 D 想象, 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你拉上斗篷的头罩并获得5环的@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{回避侦测 Nondetection} 的效果，持续8小时或直到你把头罩放下。

Class Kit (Alchemist).name: 炼金术士装备包 Class Kit (Alchemist)
