Crystal Shards (Greater).name: Crystal Shards (Greater)
Crystal Shards (Greater).description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate A Strike

This flask holds a pressurized red-brown gas flecked with bits of sublimated crystal. You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls. When the bomb explodes, it deals [[/r {3d4}[piercing]]]{3d4 piercing damage} and [[/r {5}[splash,piercing]]]{5 piercing splash damage} as the mixture suddenly turns into solid crystals flying at high speeds.

Surfaces in the splash area grow brittle, gleaming red crystals that crumble to dust after 1 minute. The crystals on level surfaces are @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7fSnvJ2xoSfa6JXD]{Caltrops}. The crystals on vertical surfaces can be used briefly as handholds, granting the listed item bonus to the next Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb} each space. The crystals in each space crumble after the creature leaves, whether Climbing or moving through the caltrops.

Crystal Shards (Major).name: Crystal Shards (Major)
Crystal Shards (Major).description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate A Strike

This flask holds a pressurized red-brown gas flecked with bits of sublimated crystal. You gain the listed item bonus to attack rolls. When the bomb explodes, it deals the listed piercing damage and piercing splash damage as the mixture suddenly turns into solid crystals flying at high speeds.

Surfaces in the splash area grow brittle, gleaming red crystals that crumble to dust after 1 minute. The crystals on level surfaces are @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7fSnvJ2xoSfa6JXD]{Caltrops}. The crystals on vertical surfaces can be used briefly as handholds, granting the listed item bonus to the next Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb} each space. The crystals in each space crumble after the creature leaves, whether Climbing or moving through the caltrops.

Crystal Shards (Moderate).name: Crystal Shards (Moderate)
Crystal Shards (Moderate).description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate A Strike

This flask holds a pressurized red-brown gas flecked with bits of sublimated crystal. You gain the listed item bonus to attack rolls. When the bomb explodes, it deals the listed piercing damage and piercing splash damage as the mixture suddenly turns into solid crystals flying at high speeds.

Surfaces in the splash area grow brittle, gleaming red crystals that crumble to dust after 1 minute. The crystals on level surfaces are @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7fSnvJ2xoSfa6JXD]{Caltrops}. The crystals on vertical surfaces can be used briefly as handholds, granting the listed item bonus to the next Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb} each space. The crystals in each space crumble after the creature leaves, whether Climbing or moving through the caltrops.

Cunning.name: Cunning
Cunning.description:
Usage etched on a slashing or piercing weapon The weapon performs divination magic on the blood of your foes, granting you insight into their abilities and weaknesses.

Activate F envision

Frequency once per minute

Requirements On your previous action this turn, you used this weapon to hit and damage a creature that has blood or other vital fluids

Effect You learn the secrets the weapon gleaned from the creature's blood. Attempt to Recall Knowledge about the target of the required attack, gaining an item bonus to the Recall Knowledge skill check equal to the weapon's item bonus to attack rolls from its potency rune.

If the required attack was a critical hit, you also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to this check.

Cursebreak Bulwark.name: Cursebreak Bulwark
Cursebreak Bulwark.description:
This tower shield is composed of interlocking hexagonal wooden tiles lined with metal. The tiles are painted a verdant green, and each is marked with a faded rune that protects against curses. While you have this shield raised, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against spells that target you, increasing to a +2 circumstance bonus against curses. You can unleash the energy stored in the shield to destroy a curse before it can affect you.

AC increases to +4 if you are using the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover} action.

Activate r command

Frequency once per day

Trigger You are targeted with a curse spell

Requirements The cursebreak bulwark is raised

Effect You activate the shield's countermeasures. It casts 8th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OyFCwQuw8XRazsNr]{Remove Curse} with a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+27 #Counteract]]{+27} against the triggering curse.

Hardness HP BT
14 56 28

Cursed Dreamstone.name: Cursed Dreamstone
Cursed Dreamstone.description:
A dreamstone can become cursed if left exposed to creatures that corrupt sleep, generate nightmares, or otherwise prey on sleeping or dreaming victims via supernatural methods. A cursed dreamstone seems to function as a normal dreamstone until the bearer falls asleep or is forced to attempt a saving throw against a sleep effect. At this point, the person carrying the cursed dreamstone must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:26] save to resist the curse's effects.

Critical Success The character resists the curse entirely and experiences a vivid dream while sleeping that warns them of the nature of the cursed dreamstone.

Success The character resists the curse.

Failure As long as the cursed character possesses the stone, they are fatigued whenever they wake from sleep, whether natural or magically induced, and they take a -2 item penalty to all saving throws against sleep effects instead of gaining the normal bonus from a dreamstone.

Critical Failure As failure, and whenever the bearer attempts a saving throw against a sleep effect, they get the outcome that is one degree worse than the result of their saving throw.

Cutlery.name: Cutlery
Cutlery.description:
Ammunition for the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.MMYL2rfbYNWT0Rs1]{Spoon Gun}

Users typically upend the entire contents of their cutlery drawer into the gun, aim it in the general direction of the foe, and hope it hits something.

Cytillesh.name: Cytillesh
Cytillesh.description:
Deros use cytillesh in a variety of ways, and some surface-dwellers seek out the fungus for their own use. Memories lost to cytillesh can be restored through modify memory. The save for addiction to cytillesh is DC 20, and the addiction has the virulent trait.

Activate A Interact (Ingested)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:15]

Maximum Duration 8 hours

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (1 minute)

Stage 2 lose all memories made in the previous hour (1 hour)

Cytillesh Oil.name: 碧幻油 Cytillesh Oil
Cytillesh Oil.description:
这种粘稠的物质由能够窃取心灵的碧幻菌（cytillesh fungus）中蒸馏而来，不过它已失去改变记忆的能力。

启动 D 交互 (受伤)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]

最大持续时间 4 轮

阶段 1 [[/r {1d10}[poison]]]{1d10 毒素伤害} (1 轮)

阶段 2 [[/r {1d12}[poison]]]{1d12 毒素伤害} (1 轮)

阶段 3 [[/r {2d10}[poison]]]{2d10 毒素伤害} (1 轮)

Dagger.name: 匕首 Dagger
Dagger.description: 这种小型有刃的武器可以单手持握并在近战中刺伤生物。也可以用来投掷。

Dagger Pistol.name: Dagger Pistol
Dagger Pistol.description: This weapon, favored by rangers and other wilderness wanderers, takes the form of a stoutly built pistol with a dagger blade attached beneath the barrel and extending out past the muzzle.

Dagger of Eternal Sleep.name: Dagger of Eternal Sleep
Dagger of Eternal Sleep.description:
This tiny serrated dagger looks like a miniature sawtooth sabre. Until activated, it is too small and ornamental to function as a weapon, which might allow it to be passed off as a weapon-shaped decoration.

Activate A Interact

Effect You transform the dagger of eternal sleep into a +1 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.qUnDHEXteUQGE8yp]{Grievous} striking dagger and Strike an unconscious target with the dagger.

If you are not in an encounter or otherwise threatened and you roll a hit with your Strike, you get a critical hit instead. The damage from the Strike and the bleed from the critical specialization effect do not awaken the target, though the target becomes temporarily immune to this effect until the next time it wakes up, meaning further daggers of eternal sleep awaken it as normal. The dagger disintegrates immediately after use.

Dagger of Venom.name: 剧毒匕首 Dagger of Venom
Dagger of Venom.description:
这把锯齿刃的+1强击匕首刀身墨绿，刀柄雕成张牙舞爪的蛇头一般。

当用剧毒匕首攻击成功重击时，目标需通过DC19的强韧豁免，否则获得恶心1（sickened）。这是一个毒素效果。

另外，你可以启动匕首制作更有效的毒素来下毒。

启动 F 交互

频率 每天一次

触发 你用剧毒匕首伤害一个生物；

效果 你使命中的生物感染匕首剧毒。

匕首剧毒 Dagger Venom (毒素)

豁免检定 强韧 DC 21

最大持续时间 4 轮

阶段 1 1d8点毒素伤害和力竭1（enfeebled）。

Daikyu.name: Daikyu
Daikyu.description: This asymmetrical bow, made of laminated bamboo, wood, and leather, stands 6 feet or more in height. Using a daikyu while mounted limits its firing range to your left side.

Dancing.name: 舞空 Dancing
Dancing.description:
舞空武器能自动飞舞攻击敌人。

启动 D 命令, 交互

效果 你放开（Release）武器让其飞至空中，和你最后一个攻击过的敌人战斗，若该敌人已被击败，则和离你最近的敌人战斗。每轮你的回合结束时，该武器以最高40尺飞行速度进行飞行，然后可以再飞行一次或打击一个其触及内的生物。

武器占据5尺空间，但它不会阻挡或妨碍敌人穿过它占据的空间，也不会受益于和提供夹击。该武器无法移动穿过敌人的占据空间。该武器无法使用反应动作，它的飞行动作也不会触发反应动作。

启动后，舞空武器进行打击的攻击调整值是+24加上其攻击骰的物品加值。伤害使用武器的正常伤害，但力量调整值是+0。命中或重击时自动触发的武器能力依然有效，但舞空时无法启动该武器的其它能力，它也不会从你的其它能力处获得好处。

每轮该武器结束其动作后，进行一次DC6的纯骰检定。若失败，舞空结束，该武器掉到地面上。你在10分钟内无法再启动该武器的舞空。

Dancing Scarf.name: 舞动围巾 Dancing Scarf
Dancing Scarf.description:
这条不停翻滚的长围巾是由丝绸或轻薄的纤维缝纫而成的，装饰着铃铛或其他叮叮作响的闪耀金属。它在用来跳舞的表演Performance检定中提供+1物品加值。

启动 A 交互

需求 你最近的动作是成功通过了一次跳舞的表演Performance检定

效果 你得到隐蔽，直到你的下一回合开始

自动生效:

  • 用来跳舞的表演Performance检定获得+1物品加值

Dancing Scarf (Greater).name: 高等舞动围巾 Dancing Scarf (Greater)
Dancing Scarf (Greater).description:
这条不停翻滚的长围巾是由丝绸或轻薄的纤维缝纫而成的，装饰着铃铛或其他叮叮作响的闪耀金属。它在用来跳舞的表演Performance检定中提供+2物品加值。

启动 A 交互

需求 你最近的动作是成功通过了一次跳舞的表演Performance检定

效果 你得到隐蔽，直到你的下一回合开始。你也可以以至多一半的速度Speed来行进Stride，或者进行一次快步Step。

自动生效:

  • 用来跳舞的表演Performance检定获得+2物品加值

Daredevil Boots.name: 鲁莽者之靴 Daredevil Boots
Daredevil Boots.description:
这双多彩、闪亮、鞋底柔软的靴子鼓励你进行一些危险的特技，并能让你更加敏捷。这双靴子为你在特技Acrobatics检定上提供+2物品加值，并在翻滚Tumble Through过敌方空间时提供+1环境加值。

这双靴子也能抓住固体表面并防止你跌落，让你可以在双手被占用的时候进行抓住边缘Grab an Edge的反应动作。你能将坠落高度视为减少10尺，如果你拥有 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.LQw0yIMDUJJkq1nD]{猫之落 Cat Fall}专长，将你的特技Acrobatics熟练等级视为高1级以决定专长效果。如果你拥有猫之落Cat Fall专长，且已经达到特技Acrobatics技能的传奇等级，你可以选择你的坠落速度，从每轮60尺到正常的坠落速度。

自动生效:

  • 特技Acrobatics检定获得+2物品加值
  • 翻滚Tumble Through过敌方空间时获得+1环境加值

Daredevil Boots (Greater).name: 高等鲁莽者之靴 Daredevil Boots (Greater)
Daredevil Boots (Greater).description:
这双多彩、闪亮、鞋底柔软的靴子鼓励你进行一些危险的特技，并能让你更加敏捷。这双靴子为你在特技Acrobatics检定上提供+3物品加值，并在翻滚Tumble Through过敌方空间时提供+2环境加值。

这双靴子也能抓住固体表面并防止你跌落，让你可以在双手被占用的时候进行抓住边缘Grab an Edge的反应动作。你能将坠落高度视为减少10尺，如果你拥有 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.LQw0yIMDUJJkq1nD]{猫之落 Cat Fall}专长，将你的特技Acrobatics熟练等级视为高1级以决定专长效果。如果你拥有猫之落Cat Fall专长，且已经达到特技Acrobatics技能的传奇等级，你可以选择你的坠落速度，从每轮60尺到正常的坠落速度。

启动 D 命令

频率 每天一次

效果 这双靴子对你施展 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{行动自如 Freedom of Movement}。

自动生效:

  • 特技Acrobatics检定获得+3物品加值
  • 翻滚Tumble Through过敌方空间时获得+2环境加值

Darkvision Elixir (Greater).name: 高等黑暗视觉灵药 Darkvision Elixir (Greater)
Darkvision Elixir (Greater).description:
启动1 交互

在你饮用这瓶灵药后，你在黑暗中的视线变得格外锐利。你在24小时内获得黑暗视觉。

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.7vCenP9j6FuHRv5C]{效果：高等黑暗视觉灵药}

Darkvision Elixir (Lesser).name: 次等黑暗视觉灵药 Darkvision Elixir (Lesser)
Darkvision Elixir (Lesser).description:
启动1 交互

在你饮用这瓶灵药后，你在黑暗中的视线变得格外锐利。你在10分钟内获得黑暗视觉。

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.7UL8belWmo7U5YGM]{效果：次等黑暗视觉灵药}

Darkvision Elixir (Moderate).name: 中等黑暗视觉灵药 Darkvision Elixir (Moderate)
Darkvision Elixir (Moderate).description:
启动1 交互

在你饮用这瓶灵药后，你在黑暗中的视线变得格外锐利。你在1小时内获得黑暗视觉。

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.bcxVvIbuZWOvsKcA]{效果：中等黑暗视觉灵药}

Darkvision Scope.name: Darkvision Scope
Darkvision Scope.description:
These scopes, popular with snipers and other sneaky sharpshooters who ply their trade in the dead of night, incorporate clouded crystals with magical properties into their design. While relatively useless under normal lighting conditions, these crystals can help bring things into focus when used in dim light. The scope is then given an enchantment to enhance these properties for use in darkness. The scope grants you a +1 item bonus to Perception checks involving sight in areas of dim light visible through the scope (as well as in areas of darkness, if the scope has been activated).

Activate a Interact

Effect You gain darkvision until the beginning of your next turn, as long as you continue to look through the scope.

Darkvision Scope (Greater).name: Darkvision Scope (Greater)
Darkvision Scope (Greater).description:
These scopes, popular with snipers and other sneaky sharpshooters who ply their trade in the dead of night, incorporate clouded crystals with magical properties into their design. While relatively useless under normal lighting conditions, these crystals can help bring things into focus when used in dim light. The scope is then given an enchantment to enhance these properties for use in darkness. The scope grants an item bonus to Perception checks involving sight in areas of dim light visible through the scope (as well as in areas of darkness, if the scope has been activated).

Activate a Interact

Effect The item bonus is +2 and activating the scope grants greater darkvision until the beginning of your next turn, as long as you continue to look through the scope.

Darkwood Branch.name: Darkwood Branch
Darkwood Branch.description:
Darkwood is a very lightweight wood found primarily in old-growth forests in south-central Avistan; it is dark as ebony but has a slight purple tint. A darkwood item's Bulk is reduced by 1 (or to light Bulk if its normal Bulk is 1, with no effect on an item that normally has light Bulk). The Price of an item made of darkwood is based on the item's normal Bulk, not its reduced Bulk for being made of darkwood, but reduce the Bulk before making any further Bulk adjustments for the size of the item.

Darkwood Items

Darkwood Items Hardness HP BT
Thin Items
Standard-grade 5 20 10
High-grade 8 32 16
Items
Standard-grade 7 28 14
High-grade 10 40 20
Structure
Standard-grade 14 56 28
High-grade 20 80 40

Darkwood Buckler (High-Grade).name: Darkwood Buckler (High-Grade)
Darkwood Buckler (High-Grade).description:
Darkwood shields are 1 Bulk lighter than normal (or light Bulk if their normal Bulk is 1, with no effect on a shield that normally has light Bulk).

The shield has Hardness 6, HP 24, and BT 12.

Craft Requirements darkwood worth at least 4,000 gp

Darkwood Buckler (Standard-Grade).name: Darkwood Buckler (Standard-Grade)
Darkwood Buckler (Standard-Grade).description:
Darkwood shields are 1 Bulk lighter than normal (or light Bulk if their normal Bulk is 1, with no effect on a shield that normally has light Bulk).

The shield has Hardness 3, HP 12, and BT 6.

Craft Requirements darkwood worth at least 50 gp

Darkwood Lumber.name: Darkwood Lumber
Darkwood Lumber.description:
Darkwood is a very lightweight wood found primarily in old-growth forests in south-central Avistan; it is dark as ebony but has a slight purple tint. A darkwood item's Bulk is reduced by 1 (or to light Bulk if its normal Bulk is 1, with no effect on an item that normally has light Bulk). The Price of an item made of darkwood is based on the item's normal Bulk, not its reduced Bulk for being made of darkwood, but reduce the Bulk before making any further Bulk adjustments for the size of the item.

Darkwood Items

Thin Items
Standard-grade 5 20 10
High-grade 8 32 16
Items
Standard-grade 7 28 14
High-grade 10 40 20
Structure
Standard-grade 14 56 28
High-grade 20 80 40

Darkwood Shield (High-Grade).name: Darkwood Shield (High-Grade)
Darkwood Shield (High-Grade).description:
Darkwood shields are 1 Bulk lighter than normal (or light Bulk if their normal Bulk is 1, with no effect on a shield that normally has light Bulk).

The shield has Hardness 8, HP 32, and BT 16.

Craft Requirements darkwood worth at least 4,400 gp

Darkwood Shield (Standard-Grade).name: Darkwood Shield (Standard-Grade)
Darkwood Shield (Standard-Grade).description:
Darkwood shields are 1 Bulk lighter than normal (or light Bulk if their normal Bulk is 1, with no effect on a shield that normally has light Bulk).

The shield has Hardness 5, HP 20, and BT 10.

Craft Requirements darkwood worth at least 55 gp

Darkwood Tower Shield (High-Grade).name: Darkwood Tower Shield (High-Grade)
Darkwood Tower Shield (High-Grade).description:
Darkwood shields are 1 Bulk lighter than normal (or light Bulk if their normal Bulk is 1, with no effect on a shield that normally has light Bulk).

The shield has Hardness 8, HP 32, and BT 16.

Craft Requirements darkwood worth at least 5,600 gp

Darkwood Tower Shield (Standard-Grade).name: Darkwood Tower Shield (Standard-Grade)
Darkwood Tower Shield (Standard-Grade).description:
Darkwood shields are 1 Bulk lighter than normal (or light Bulk if their normal Bulk is 1, with no effect on a shield that normally has light Bulk).

The shield has Hardness 5, HP 20, and BT 10.

Craft Requirements darkwood worth at least 70 gp

Dart.name: 飞镖 Dart
Dart.description: 这种投掷武器比箭大，但比标枪短。它通常有一根短的木头轴，末端是一个金属尖，有时被羽毛或毛皮固定。

Dart Umbrella.name: Dart Umbrella
Dart Umbrella.description: This umbrella fires tiny blowgun darts from its ferrule with a twist of the handle. The darts are loaded into the shaft, and though the damage they deal is minimal, the dart umbrella is an inconspicuous weapon easy to slip past inspections.

Day Goggles.name: Day Goggles
Day Goggles.description: The darkened lenses of these goggles protect sensitive eyes from bright light but make seeing in the dark more difficult. While wearing day goggles, you gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws against visual light effects. However, while wearing the goggles, you take a -2 item penalty to visual Perception checks and you treat areas of bright light as dim light and areas of dim light as darkness for the purpose of whether you can see. While this is normally a disadvantage, if you have light blindness, you aren't @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} in bright light as long as you continue wearing the day goggles, since to your eyes, there is only dim light. You can wear the goggles around your neck or on your forehead, granting no benefits, but allowing you to move them over your eyes with a single Interact action, without having to withdraw them first.

Daylight Vapor.name: Daylight Vapor
Daylight Vapor.description:
Activate 1 Interact

This heavier-than-air mist emits a soft glow. While this poison lasts, it causes its victims to shine from within with agonizing, brilliant radiance. This effect has the light trait (although the poison itself doesn't, so only the light effect can be counteracted by darkness effects). The @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} condition from daylight vapor can't be removed while the poison lasts, and when the victim enters an area of magical darkness, the poison attempts to counteract the darkness with a counteract modifier of +21. If the poison fails, it can't attempt to counteract the same darkness again.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:31]

Onset 1 round

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1[[/r {4d6}[poison]]]{4d6 poison damage} and sickened 1 (1 round)

Stage 2[[/r {6d6}[poison]]]{6d6 poison damage} and sickened 2 (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r {10d6}[poison]]]{10d6 poison damage} and sickened 3 (1 round)

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.a3aQxCpoj1q1NQxC]{Sunburst}.

Dazing Coil.name: 晕眩线圈 Dazing Coil
Dazing Coil.description:
每当附着的武器造成伤害时，这圈铜线都会卷成新的形状。当你启动线圈，被伤害的生物必须通过一个 @Check[type:will|dc:31] 豁免，否则陷入震慑Stunned 1。如果它豁免大失败，则陷入震慑Stunned 2。

启动 F 想象

触发 你用附着的武器对一个措手不及Flat-footed的生物造成伤害

Dazzling Rosary.name: Dazzling Rosary
Dazzling Rosary.description:
Activate Cast a Spell

When energy courses through these lustrous beads, they glow brightly in the sacred colors of the spellcaster's faith. A @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Fq9yCbqI2RDt6Orw]{Spiritual Weapon} empowered with this catalyst flashes with bright light when it critically Strikes a target, causing the target to be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} until the beginning of your next turn. The rosary can be used with a spiritual weapon of 4th level or below.

Dazzling Rosary (Greater).name: Dazzling Rosary (Greater)
Dazzling Rosary (Greater).description:
Activate Cast a Spell

When energy courses through these lustrous beads, they glow brightly in the sacred colors of the spellcaster's faith. A @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Fq9yCbqI2RDt6Orw]{Spiritual Weapon} empowered with this catalyst flashes with bright light when it critically Strikes a target, causing the target to be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} until the beginning of your next turn. The rosary can be used with a spiritual weapon of any level.

Deadweight Snare.name: Deadweight Snare
Deadweight Snare.description:
This snare is made of magnetized weights and heavy ropes rigged to a trip wire or pressure plate. When a creature enters the square, the magnets and ropes deploy, weighing down the creature's weapons and limbs. The creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:18|showDC:all] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes a -1 status penalty to attack rolls for 1 round or until it Escapes (DC 18).

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.NYOi1F9cW3axHrdc]{Effect: Deadweight Snare (Success)}

Failure The creature takes a -2 status penalty to attack rolls for 1 minute or until it Escapes (DC 18).

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature drops any metallic items it's holding.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.Gj6u2Za5okFlsTvT]{Effect: Deadweight Snare (Failure/Critical Failure)}

Deafening Music Box.name: Deafening Music Box
Deafening Music Box.description:
Symbols of musical notes decorate this gold-framed wooden cube measuring just under 1 foot by 1 foot. A funnel-shaped trumpet protrudes from the box's top at an angle, though it feels surprisingly light. The box has a large button on its side, and it must be set down on a flat surface in order to activate it; while it's activated, the rumbling and churning gears inside the box make it impossible to carry without dropping it.

ActivateAInteract;Effect You press the button on the side of the music box, causing it to erupt with a cacophonous and discordant melody for 1 minute while it plays its entire melody, and it can't be shut off prematurely. The music is so loud that any creature within 60 feet must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24] save or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for as long as they remain within 60 feet of the music box, and for 1 minute thereafter. On a critical success, a creature need not make any more saves and is temporarily immune to thedeafening music boxfor the next 24 hours; on a success, the creature must attempt a new save each round it remains within 60 feet of the music box.

Death Coil.name: Death Coil
Death Coil.description:
This modified Stasian coil of metal and glass stands about three feet tall. It activates when at least three creatures are within 20 feet of it, or if at least one creature stays within 20 feet of it for more than 1 round. It then lashes out with a torrent of electrical energy dealing [[/r {7d12}[electricity]]]{7d12 Electricity Damage} to all creatures within 20 feet of it. Due to the fact that it doesn't trigger immediately when a creature enters its square, abilities like @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wqrOVv9gnqF4nlLR]{Surprise Snare} don't work with a death coil. Creatures within that area must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:43] saving throw.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2}.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 4}.

Death Knell Powder.name: Death Knell Powder
Death Knell Powder.description:
Activate 2 Interact

This poison is made from toxic spores of death knell mushrooms, which are reduced to a gray powder and suffused with necromantic energy. If you're reduced to 0 Hit Points while under the effect of death knell powder, you must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:34] save or die (this is a death effect). If you die, a random creature adjacent to you is bolstered by your departing life force and gains 20 temporary HP and a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls for 10 minutes.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1[[/r {7d6}[poison]]]{7d6 poison damage} (1 round)

Stage 2[[/r {9d6}[poison]]]{9d6 poison damage} (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r {12d6}[poison]]]{12d6 poison damage} (1 round)

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dLdRqT6UxTKlsPgp]{Death Knell}.

Deathcap Powder.name: 死帽粉 Deathcap Powder
Deathcap Powder.description:
有毒的死帽蕈（deathcap mushroom）可以经由晾晒、研磨制成无味且更具毒性的粉末。

启动 A 交互 (摄入)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:33]

潜伏期 10 分钟

最大持续时间 6 分钟

阶段 1 [[/r {13d6}[poison]]]{13d6 毒素伤害} (1 分钟)

阶段 2 [[/r {17d6}[poison]]]{17d6 毒素伤害} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} (1 分钟)

阶段 3 [[/r {20d6}[poison]]]{20d6 毒素伤害} 和 恶心sickened 3 (1 分钟)

Deathless.name: Deathless
Deathless.description:
These symbols fortify your body's grasp on your soul, keeping it tethered when death approaches.

Activate r envision

Frequency once per day

Trigger You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} condition

Effect You reduce the value of the triggering condition by 1.

Decanter of Endless Water.name: 无尽水瓶 Decanter of Endless Water
Decanter of Endless Water.description:
这件物品看起来就像是一个装满了水的普通玻璃瓶。只有当你说出了该物品的三个命令词之一后才能将瓶塞打开，每个命令词都会让水以不同的方式流出。笔直拉开瓶塞能够创造出淡水，而旋转着扭开瓶塞则能创造出盐水。所有效果都会一直持续下去直到水瓶被塞上（用它自己的塞子、或是一根手指、或是别的什么东西）。

启动 A 命令, 交互

效果 说出 "流水"这个词可以让水以每轮1加仑的速度流出。

启动 A 命令, 交互

效果 说出 "喷泉"这个词可以让水以每轮5加仑的速度喷出5英尺高。

启动 A 命令, 交互

效果 说出 "激流泉"这个词可以让水以每轮15加仑的迅猛势头汹涌而出。你可以将水流对准一个生物，迫使其承受 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jfVCuOpzC6mUrf6f]{水流冲击 Hydraulic Push} 的效果（法术攻击骰+15）。只要激流泉还在持续之中，你每轮都可以重复一次这一行为，但每次都需要花费一个交互动作来引导激流泉。

Deck of Many Things.name: Deck of Many Things
Deck of Many Things.description:
These 22 cards of heavy vellum, usually stored in a box or a pouch, bear images or glyphs depicting symbols of magical power. Looking at a card without activating it shows the card face but has no magical effect. Once the deck is face down, the cards randomize themselves-if you look at the top card multiple times, you may find it changes. Any card removed from the deck goes missing after a few seconds, reappearing in the deck.

Activate A envision, Interact

Effect You declare how many cards you will draw facedown from the deck, then draw your first card. The card takes effect immediately. Any further cards must be drawn within the next hour, and any card you don't voluntarily draw flits off the deck and affects you anyway. You can never activate the same deck of many things again. Once a card is drawn, it produces its effect immediately and then disappears back into the deck, which immediately shuffles itself. (The Dullard and Jester are exceptions, as described in their entries below.) The effects of each card are as follows.

Deck of Mischief.name: Deck of Mischief
Deck of Mischief.description:
This deck of 54 cards appears nearly identical to standard playing cards. Comprised of four thematic suits of 13 cards each, as well as two wildcards, the deck of mischief is a favorite of scoundrels who prefer not to leave their games to chance-or to at least nudge the odds in their favor. If you know how to activate the deck, you can illusorily transform the ace and face cards into other cards in the deck.

The deck is true to its name and less likely to comply with your wishes if not well cared for. While surprisingly resistant to the elements, a waterlogged, dirty, or battered deck may not function as desired, giving you incorrect information about which cards are still in the deck or failing to hold the illusion at a critical moment. If a deck becomes incomplete due to damaged or missing cards, it rapidly loses its deceptive capabilities and might even purposefully sabotage you.

Activate 1 envision, Interact

Effect You learn which of the ace and face cards are still in the deck. You can then swap the apparent face of an ace or face card in your hand (if you have any) with the face of one still in the deck. A creature who Seeks or touches the card can attempt to disbelieve this illusion (Perception DC 20).

Deck of illusions.name: Deck of illusions
Deck of illusions.description:
This set of 34 parchment cards usually comes in a velvet bag or simple leather wrap. Each card depicts a different creature, monster, or other being that, when the deck is activated, immediately appears as a believable, life-size illusion. You can look at the card's artwork, but no magical effect takes place until you Activate the deck, shuffling and drawing randomly.

@Compendium[pf2e.rollable-tables.KiYzBNYqlBwcI11v]{Deck of Illusions Cards}

Activate 1 envision, Interact

Effect You draw a card, chosen randomly from the remaining cards in the deck, and throw it to the ground to create an illusion of the creature depicted. The image is an illusory creature, except it has a range of only 30 feet from where the card was thrown and the illusion lasts until destroyed or until anyone moves or damages the card. The creature takes its actions once on your turn if you're within 60 feet of the card and Sustain the Activation. The illusion ends if you don't Sustain it, or if you activate a new card from the deck.

Deepdread Claw.name: Deepdread Claw
Deepdread Claw.description:
One of a set of four identical spears collectively known as the Four Claws of the Deepdread, this weapon is fashioned from a single seamless piece of matte-black metal with a razored silver edge. In bright light, it functions as a +1 striking spear, but in darkness or dim light, it becomes a +2 greater striking spear. You can upgrade its fundamental runes as normal for a specific weapon, starting from a +2 greater striking spear, but its fundamental runes are always one type worse in bright light.

Activate 1 command

Effect You establish a telepathic link with someone else wielding a deepdread claw, enabling you to telepathically communicate with the creature while they possess the deepdread claw regardless of distance, so long as you remain on the same plane. You can end a telepathic link you create or that you are part of as an action, which has the concentrate trait.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Effect You cast 4th-level darkness. You can see clearly in this darkness.

Deflecting Branch.name: Deflecting Branch
Deflecting Branch.description:
This massive branch has been cut into a general club shape but still bears several knots and has a number of runes carved along its length. The deflecting branch is a +2 greater striking greatclub.

On a critical hit, you knock the target @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Activater Interact

Frequency once per minute

Trigger You are the target of a physical ranged attack

Requirements You're aware of the attack and are not @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against it

Effect You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, you have knocked it away. You can't use this ability to deflect unusually massive ranged projectiles (such as boulders or ballista bolts).

Activate f Interact

Frequency once per hour

Trigger You knock away a physical ranged attack by using the deflecting branch's other activation

Effect You swing the club and reflect the oncoming attack. The attack is redirected toward a creature within 60 feet. Make a ranged attack against the creature using your highest proficiency with a ranged weapon.

Demilich Eye Gem.name: Demilich Eye Gem
Demilich Eye Gem.description:
This glowing gem is harvested from a demilich and has an 8th-level spell magically bonded to it. This item has the traits of the spell it contains.

Activate command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect The gem casts the 8th-level spell it contains. This activation uses the same number of actions as Casting the Spell. Once the spell is cast, the gem's glow fades, but returns 24 hours later, when the spell can be used once again.

Craft Requirements Demilich eye gems can't be crafted.

Demolishing.name: Demolishing
Demolishing.description: A demolishing weapon is made to destroy constructs. Damage inflicted on a construct with a demolishing weapon continues to spread throughout the creature-cracks form, linkages fail, surfaces erode-and otherwise dismantle its body. When you damage a construct using a demolishing weapon, you deal an extra [[/r {1d6}[persistent,force]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Force Damage}. On a critical hit, you deal an extra [[/r {1d12}[persistent,force]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Force Damage} instead

Demon Armor.name: 恶魔甲 Demon Armor
Demon Armor.description:
黑铁锻造，这套+2抗力全身甲被设计成让穿戴者看上去如同长角恶魔一般，脸会从兽型头盔中伸出。

穿戴该护甲时，你可用头盔的角攻击。这是一个拥有+2武器潜力符文效果的军用近战武器。它造成2d8点穿刺伤害并且有致命d12特征。用角重击成功时，目标必须通过DC30强韧豁免检定，否则感染深渊瘟疫Abyssal plague。该角无法蚀刻任何符文。

若你非邪恶阵营，穿戴恶魔甲会事你获得drained2状态。只要穿戴该护甲，你就无法移除该状态。

启动 D 命令

频率 每天一次

效果 你施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{任意门 Dimension Door}法术。

制造需求 你需为邪恶阵营；提供一次任意门的施法。

Demon Dust.name: Demon Dust
Demon Dust.description:
Activate 1 Interact

The save for addiction to demon dust is @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24|name:Demon Dust Addiction|traits:virulent|showDC:owner], and the addiction has the virulent trait.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20|showDC:owner]

Maximum Duration 8 hours

Stage 1 +2 item bonus to Athletics checks and treat up to 4 Bulk as being negligible in weight (1 minute)

Stage 2 +2 item bonus to Athletics checks, treat up to 4 Bulk as being negligible in weight, and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (1 hour)

Stage 3 stupefied 1 (1 hour)

Stage 4 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} (1 hour)

Stage 5 stupefied 2 and all memories made since you were first exposed to this dose of demon dust become hazy and vague (1 hour)

Stage 6 stupefied 2 and all memories made in the previous 24 hours become hazy and vague (1 hour)

Demon Mask.name: 恶魔面具 Demon Mask
Demon Mask.description:
这具可怕的面具像是一张睨视着的恶魔的脸，在威吓Intimidation检定上提供+1物品加值。

启动 D 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 面具施展一次DC为20的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4koZzrnMXhhosn0D]{惊恐术 Fear}。

自动生效:

  • 威吓Intimidation检定获得+1物品加值

Demon Mask (Greater).name: 高等恶魔面具 Demon Mask (Greater)
Demon Mask (Greater).description:
这具可怕的面具像是一张睨视着的恶魔的脸，在威吓Intimidation检定上提供+2物品加值。

启动 D 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 面具施展一次DC为29的3环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4koZzrnMXhhosn0D]{惊恐术 Fear}。

自动生效:

  • 威吓Intimidation检定获得+2物品加值

Deployable Cover.name: Deployable Cover
Deployable Cover.description: This thick mat of canvas, foliage, and wood is mounted on a tripod of flexible metal struts, folded into a baton- like shape, and clamped shut. You can rapidly deploy it on the ground with an Interact action to create cover. Deployable cover is large enough to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover} behind, allowing you (and others) to gain standard cover when you use the Take Cover action. Before it can be used again, deployable cover must be carefully folded and clamped shut, which takes 1 minute.

Deployable Cover (Ballistic Cover).name: Deployable Cover (Ballistic Cover)
Deployable Cover (Ballistic Cover).description:
This thick mat of canvas, foliage, and wood is mounted on a tripod of flexible metal struts, folded into a baton- like shape, and clamped shut. You can rapidly deploy it on the ground with an Interact action to create cover. Deployable cover is large enough to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover} behind, allowing you (and others) to gain standard cover when you use the Take Cover action. Before it can be used again, deployable cover must be carefully folded and clamped shut, which takes 1 minute.

Specially crafted to protect against bullet fire, a ballistic cover also works against other physical projectiles, such as arrows, bolts, and thrown weapons. While a creature has cover from Taking Cover behind a ballistic cover, it gains resistance 2 to piercing damage from ranged weapons and ranged unarmed attacks.

Depth Gauge.name: Depth Gauge
Depth Gauge.description: This simple tool consists of a small iron weight attached to a thin rope that is marked at regular intervals (typically every foot). It can be used to measure the depth of a hole or body of water by dropping the weight down into unknown depths and counting the markings on the rope. It can also be used as a plumb bob.

Detect Anathema Fulu.name: Detect Anathema Fulu
Detect Anathema Fulu.description: Given to undisciplined acolytes at risk of breaking their vows, this fulu activates on its own if its wearer begins to perform an act anathema to a specific deity or cause, decided at the time of crafting. The fulu heats up when activated, giving you enough warning to correct your actions; if you proceed, the fulu immolates in a burst of flame. This deals [[/r {4d6}[fire]]]{4d6 fire damage} and brands your skin until you receive an appropriate @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.7Fd4lxozd11MQ55N]{Atone} ritual. Either way, activating the fulu consumes it.

Detective's Kit.name: Detective's Kit
Detective's Kit.description:
This leather satchel contains empty vials, a pair of tweezers, a supply of small linen cloths, a set of brass calipers and a knotted string for measuring distances, several pieces of chalk, a pen, and a blank notebook for keeping notes.

Every component of a detective's kit is of exceeding quality, and thus a detective's kit adds a +1 item bonus to checks to investigate a crime scene, a clue, or similar details.

Automatically applied effects

  • +1 item bonus to checks to investigate

Deteriorating Dust.name: Deteriorating Dust
Deteriorating Dust.description:
Contained in a specially enchanted small leather or hide sack, deteriorating dust is a potent caustic agent and a prized item among Rovagug's more discreet followers.

Activate D Interact

Effect You sprinkle the deteriorating dust over an unattended Medium or smaller object. The dust quickly fades to a transparent color and the object immediately begins to rust, melt, or otherwise fall apart. For the listed time, the object takes constant damage; if the object has a Hardness, then the dust gradually reduces the object's Hardness instead. If the deteriorating dust is still active after the object's Hardness is reduced to 0, it deals damage to the object as previously described. If the object survives, reduced Hardness returns after the dust's duration expires, but any damage remains.

The affected object takes 1 damage per 3 hours (8 damage per day) and its Hardness is reduced by 1 per hour. The effect lasts for 3 days.

Detonating Gears Snare.name: Detonating Gears Snare
Detonating Gears Snare.description:
This snare uses clockwork stressed almost to the breaking point, which activates with a powerful explosion that deals [[/r {3d8}[piercing]]]{3d8 Piercing Damage} to the first creature entering the snare's square. The creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:19] saving throw.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and [[/r {3}[persistent,bleed]]]{3 Persistent Bleed Damage} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and [[/r {6}[persistent,bleed]]]{6 Persistent Bleed Damage} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}.

Devil's Luck.name: Devil's Luck
Devil's Luck.description:
Devil @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.I4CpyMUsWfFYdpL5]{Imp}

Decipher Writing Arcana, Occultism, Society

You've bargained with an imp, one of the least powerful devils, for a fragment of infernal luck.

Benefit Once per day, you can roll a saving throw twice and use the higher result.

Payment At the termination of your mortal life, your soul must serve the imp for 100 years.

Hidden Condition The “termination of mortal life” clause is carefully worded to hasten your demise. You can't use the benefit against a death effect, and if you roll a failure on a saving throw against a death effect, you get a critical failure instead.

Termination Clause If you critically fail a saving throw against a death effect and do not die, the contract becomes unenforceable on its terms and is voided.

Devil's Trident.name: Devil's Trident
Devil's Trident.description:
This +1 striking returning trident is made of an ancient black metal that glistens unnaturally and is cold to the touch. The prongs of this trident drip with metallic lake water. Strikes with the Devil's Trident trigger the weaknesses of any creature with a weakness to water.

Activate r Command

Trigger You critically hit a creature

Effect The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25|traits:disease,virulent] save or become infected with sewer haze.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect The trident casts 3rd-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.02J0rDTk37KN2sjt]{Quench} with a DC of 25 and a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+15 #Quench Counteract Modifier]]{+15}. You can Sustain the Spell as normal.

Activate 3 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You call upon the corrupted power of the trident to stay a foe. Attempt a Strike. On a hit, the trident casts 3rd-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.DCQHaLrYXMI37dvW]{Paralyze} on the target (DC 25). If the Strike was a critical hit, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} even if it critically succeeds at the save.

Diadem of Intellect.name: 智力头冠 Diadem of Intellect
Diadem of Intellect.description:
一颗精致多彩的宝石被切割成了复杂的几何体，并嵌入一条细窄的金属头箍上，包裹着你的眉间。你在回忆知识Recall Knowledge检定上获得+3物品加值，无论使用了什么技能。

若绑定了该头冠，你能将你的智力Intelligence提升2点，或将其提升至18点，选择结果更高的选项。

这能使你在额外的技能上受训，并掌握一门额外的语言，就如你正常提升了你的智力一样。你在你首次绑定这件物品时就必须指定你希望掌握的技能和语言，此后无论何时你与其绑定，你都会掌握你初次选择的技能和语言。

启动 A 想象

频率 每小时一次

效果 你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ZYoC630tNGutgbE0]{极化认知 Hypercognition}的效果。

自动生效:

  • 回忆知识Recall Knowledge检定上获得+3物品加值

Diluted Hype.name: Diluted Hype
Diluted Hype.description:
A synthetic adrenaline supplement that increases awareness and reaction time. Diluted hype has been mixed with saltwater to allow for cheaper mass production.

Activate A Interact (Ingested)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:21]

Maximum Duration 1 minute

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} and can use the additional action to Step (1 round)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} and stupefied 1 (1 round)

Dimensional Knot.name: Dimensional Knot
Dimensional Knot.description:
Activate Cast a Spell

Shelynites originally crafted this complex knot of vibrant string for bracelets meant to tie the destinies of two people together. Now, however, spellcasters of all religions use them to enhance their capacity with teleportation magic. Adding this catalyst to a 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Dimension Door} spell allows you to bring a single willing adjacent creature along with you; however, the teleportation is somewhat disorienting for them, causing them to become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Dinosaur Boots.name: Dinosaur Boots
Dinosaur Boots.description:
The tough, scaled leather of these heavy boots comes from a mighty dinosaur, granting you the steadiness of a lumbering beast. Any time an action or effect would cause you to make a forced movement, roll a @Check[type:flat|dc:17] check. On a success, the forced movement fails to affect you.

Activate 1 command (magical, morph, transmutation)

Frequency once per day

Effect You grow, gaining the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge} for 1 minute. During that time, you gain dinosaur features; your legs and feet transform into a dinosaur's. You gain a foot unarmed attack that has the same statistics as your fist unarmed attack, except its damage die is increased from 1d4 to 1d6. Once during the duration, you can use the @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.UNah0bxXxkcZjxO3]{Trample} 3-action activity to Trample creatures one size smaller than you or smaller. This deals an amount of damage to each creature equal to that of your foot unarmed attack (including any extra weapon damage dice, bonuses, or additional damage as normal), with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:27|basic:true|name:Dinosaur Trample|traits:uncommon,invested,magical,transmutation|showDC:all] save. You can Dismiss the activation.

Dinosaur Boots (Greater).name: Dinosaur Boots (Greater)
Dinosaur Boots (Greater).description:
The tough, scaled leather of these heavy boots comes from a mighty dinosaur, granting you the steadiness of a lumbering beast. Any time an action or effect would cause you to make a forced movement, roll a @Check[type:flat|dc:17] check. On a success, the forced movement fails to affect you.

Activate 1 command (magical, morph, transmutation)

Frequency once per day

Effect You grow to size Huge if you choose, with the effects of 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge} for 1 minute. During that time, you gain dinosaur features; your legs and feet transform into a dinosaur's. You gain a foot unarmed attack that has the same statistics as your fist unarmed attack, except its damage die is increased from 1d4 to 1d8. During the duration, you can use the @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.UNah0bxXxkcZjxO3]{Trample} 3-action activity to Trample creatures one size smaller than you or smaller. This deals an amount of damage to each creature equal to that of your foot unarmed attack (including any extra weapon damage dice, bonuses, or additional damage as normal), with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:27|basic:true|name:Dinosaur Trample|traits:uncommon,invested,magical,transmutation|showDC:all] save. You can Dismiss the activation.

Diplomat's Badge.name: 外使徽章 Diplomat's Badge
Diplomat's Badge.description:
当被明确地展示，这只黄铜徽章能让别的生物认为你更加讨人喜欢。你在交涉Diplomacy检定上获得+1物品加值。

启动 A 回想知识

频率 每天一次

效果 尝试一次关于某个人类族群、某个非人类族裔、或其他生物类型的回忆知识Recall Knowledge检定，DC为20。如果成功，在当日剩下的时间内，徽章给予的在交涉Diplomacy检定上的物品加值变为+2，只要你交涉的对象属于那个群体。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.pAMyEbJzWBoYoGhs]{效果：外使徽章}

自动生效:

  • 交涉Diplomacy检定获得+1物品加值

Disguise Kit.name: 化装工具包 Disguise Kit
Disguise Kit.description: 这个小木盒子包含化妆品，假面部毛发，快干胶水和一些简单的假发。你通常需要一个化装工具来进行化装，以便使用唬骗技能冒充某人。如果你进行了很多次数的化装，您可以使用适合化装工具包类型的替代化妆品来补充

Disguise Kit (Elite Cosmetics).name: 化装工具包(专家补充化妆品)Disguise Kit (Elite Cosmetics)
Disguise Kit (Elite Cosmetics).description: 这个小木盒子包含化妆品，假面部毛发，快干胶水和一些简单的假发。你通常需要一个化装工具来进行化装，以便使用唬骗技能冒充某人。专家级化装工具包为相关检定提供+1物品加值。如果你进行了很多次数的化装，您可以使用适合化装工具包类型的替代化妆品来补充

Disguise Kit (Elite).name: 化装工具包(专家) Disguise Kit (Elite)
Disguise Kit (Elite).description:
这个小木盒子包含化妆品，假面部毛发，快干胶水和一些简单的假发。你通常需要一个化装工具来进行化装，以便使用唬骗技能冒充某人。

专家级化装工具包为相关检定提供+1物品加值。如果你进行了很多次数的化装，您可以使用适合化装工具包类型的替代化妆品来补充

自动生效:

  • 为相关唬骗检定提供+1物品加值

Disguise Kit (Replacement Cosmetics).name: 化装工具包(补充化妆品) Disguise Kit (Replacement Cosmetics)
Disguise Kit (Replacement Cosmetics).description: 这个小木盒子包含化妆品，假面部毛发，快干胶水和一些简单的假发。你通常需要一个化装工具来进行化装，以便使用唬骗技能冒充某人。如果你进行了很多次数的化装，您可以使用适合化装工具包类型的替代化妆品来补充

Disintegration Bolt.name: 解离矢 Disintegration Bolt
Disintegration Bolt.description:
这支矢的杆部枯黄而焦黑，拿着它会使你的手粘上细密的黑色粉末。当一支启动的解离矢命中了一个目标，它会承受一个 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{解离术 Disintegrate} 效果，并需要通过一个 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34] 豁免检定。攻击骰上的暴击会使得目标的豁免结果下降一级。

启动 A 交互

制造条件 提供一次解离术Disintegrate施法。

Dispelling Sliver.name: 除法碎片 Dispelling Sliver
Dispelling Sliver.description:
这个护符是用处理过的寒铁碎片制成的，能让你反制魔法效果。当你启动除法碎片Dispelling Sliver，它会尝试反制目标身上的一个法术，相当于一个8环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic} 的效果。

如果你通过一个成功的解除削击Dispel Slice启动该护符，则该护符会尝试反制目标身上激活的所有法术（反制调整值为+29）。

启动 F 想象

触发 你的打击Strike伤害了一个目标

需求 你在附着的武器的熟练等级是大师。

Dispersing Bullet.name: Dispersing Bullet
Dispersing Bullet.description:
Ammunition sling bullet

Activate 1 Interact

The metals used to forge this lead shot were taken from a variety of continents and barely stay together. When an activated dispersing bullet hits a target, the bullet scatters into a sphere of metal shards as the metals try to return to their places of origin. All creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] around the target of the attack (and not including the target) must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:21] save or be pushed 10 feet from the target (15 feet on a critical failure).

Disrupting.name: 瓦解 Disrupting
Disrupting.description: 瓦解武器充斥着正能量，对不死生物额外造成1d6点正能量伤害。若重击，目标不死生物直到你的下一回合结束为止获得力竭1（enfeebled）。

Disrupting (Greater).name: 高等瓦解 Disrupting (Greater)
Disrupting (Greater).description:
瓦解武器充斥着正能量，对不死生物额外造成2d6点正能量伤害。若重击，目标不死生物必须进行 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34|name:Greater Disrupting] 豁免检定，并按下列结果处理。这是一个失能（incapacitation）效果。

大成功 目标直到你的下一回合结束为止 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}。

成功 目标直到你的下一回合结束为止 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}。

失败 目标直到你的下一回合结束为止 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 3}。

大失败 目标被摧毁。

Divine Scroll Case of Simplicity.name: Divine Scroll Case of Simplicity
Divine Scroll Case of Simplicity.description:
The four different types of scroll cases of simplicity often bear adornments appropriate to their magical tradition, such as angelic wings or otherworldly lettering. On the inside, intricate runic diagrams spiral out to surround the scroll stored within. A scroll placed within the case can be converted into energy to cast consistently useful spells depending on its type. You must be able to cast spells of a given tradition to use a scroll case of simplicity of a corresponding type.

Activate A Interact

Requirements The scroll case contains a single scroll of a 1st-level spell

Effect You transfer the scroll's energy into the scroll case, consuming the scroll, and you can immediately begin casting one of the scroll case's spells. If you use any action other than to Cast a Spell from the scroll case after activating the scroll case of simplicity, the scroll and its energy are lost.

The scroll case can be used to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qXTB7Ec9yYh5JPPV]{Purify Food and Drink}

Divine art piece created by Shelyn.name: Divine art piece created by Shelyn

Diviner's Nose Chain.name: Diviner's Nose Chain
Diviner's Nose Chain.description:
The diviner's nose chain is worn by attaching piercings to the ear and nose, creating a connection between the senses of hearing and smell. The diviner's nose chain grants you scent out to 30 feet as an imprecise sense, and a +1 item bonus to checks to Seek or Sense Motive.

Automatically applied effects:

  • scent out to 30 feet
  • +1 item bonus to checks to Seek or Sense Motive

Diving Suit.name: Diving Suit
Diving Suit.description: Diving suits are bulky, waterproofed leather outfits with copper helmets, worn by divers and underwater salvagers. The suit grants a +1 item bonus to Swim checks made underwater, and the helmet features tubes for connecting @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7TQw7V1zZKl0a0Xz]{Bottled Air}. When connected to a diving suit, bottled air doesn't need to be held and can be used to breathe as a free action. If you wear armor over a diving suit, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until you remove the diving suit.

Djezet Alloy Ingot.name: Djezet Alloy Ingot
Djezet Alloy Ingot.description:
This rust red metal is liquid at room temperature, making it challenging for all but the most skilled metallurgists to craft with and earning it the name “quickiron” in some places.

Djezet is also extremely reactive to magic, even in its solid, workable alloyed form. It glows when targeted by magic, and objects crafted with djezet alloys glow with scarlet striations, which lead some smiths to nickname it “tiger iron.”

When targeted by spells, objects crafted from djezet alloys exhibit these glowing red markings that last for 1 round or the duration of the spell, whichever is longer. A djezet mass contains enough djezet to refine into up to two @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.bLmuVUkaMeyq5QlI]{Djezet Doses}.

Djezet Alloy Items

Djezet Alloy Items Hardness HP BT
Thin Items
Standard-grade 5 20 10
High-grade 8 32 16
Items
Standard-grade 9 36 18
High-grade 12 48 24
Structures
Standard-grade 18 72 36
High-grade 24 96 48

Djezet Buckler (High Grade).name: Djezet Buckler (High Grade)
Djezet Buckler (High Grade).description:
The burnished red faces of djezet‑alloy shields attract effects made of pure magic.

While you have a djezet shield Raised, you can use the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction when you would take energy damage in addition to the reaction's usual trigger. When taking energy damage from a spell, the shield's listed Hardness doubles.

Craft Requirements djezet worth at least 4,000 gp

Djezet Buckler (Standard Grade).name: Djezet Buckler (Standard Grade)
Djezet Buckler (Standard Grade).description:
The burnished red faces of djezet‑alloy shields attract effects made of pure magic.

While you have a djezet shield Raised, you can use the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction when you would take energy damage in addition to the reaction's usual trigger. When taking energy damage from a spell, the shield's listed Hardness doubles.

Craft Requirements djezet worth at least 75 gp

Djezet Dose.name: Djezet Dose
Djezet Dose.description:
Activate A Interact

Some mages carry vials of djezet for its magic-enhancing properties. When you drink a djezet dose, if your next action is to Cast a Spell, you can apply the effects of the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BWomK7EVY0WXxWgh]{Reach Spell} or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.FoWO4RnHRwfEIC7Q]{Widen Spell} metamagic feats.

Craft Requirements At least 300 gp of djezet.

Djezet Mass.name: Djezet Mass
Djezet Mass.description:
This rust red metal is liquid at room temperature, making it challenging for all but the most skilled metallurgists to craft with and earning it the name “quickiron” in some places.

Djezet is also extremely reactive to magic, even in its solid, workable alloyed form. It glows when targeted by magic, and objects crafted with djezet alloys glow with scarlet striations, which lead some smiths to nickname it “tiger iron.”

When targeted by spells, objects crafted from djezet alloys exhibit these glowing red markings that last for 1 round or the duration of the spell, whichever is longer. A djezet mass contains enough djezet to refine into up to two @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.bLmuVUkaMeyq5QlI]{Djezet Doses}.

Djezet Alloy Items

High-grade 24 96 48

Djezet Shield (High Grade).name: Djezet Shield (High Grade)
Djezet Shield (High Grade).description:
The burnished red faces of djezet‑alloy shields attract effects made of pure magic.

While you have a djezet shield Raised, you can use the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction when you would take energy damage in addition to the reaction's usual trigger. When taking energy damage from a spell, the shield's listed Hardness doubles.

Craft Requirements djezet worth at least 4,400 gp

Djezet Shield (Standard Grade).name: Djezet Shield (Standard Grade)
Djezet Shield (Standard Grade).description:
The burnished red faces of djezet‑alloy shields attract effects made of pure magic.

While you have a djezet shield Raised, you can use the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction when you would take energy damage in addition to the reaction's usual trigger. When taking energy damage from a spell, the shield's listed Hardness doubles.

Craft Requirements djezet worth at least 82.5 gp

Dogslicer.name: 屠狗刀 Dogslicer
Dogslicer.description: 这种短小的、弯曲的、粗糙的临时刀片通常钻有孔洞以减轻重量。它是地精最喜欢的武器。

Doll.name: Doll
Doll.description:
Dolls are found throughout Golarion in a wide variety of forms. Among the most common are miniature painted figurines, plush animals crafted from fur and stuffed with cotton, porcelain dolls with fine clothing and silky hair, fabric hand puppets, and elaborate marionettes.

This price is for an average doll of any type.

Doll (Exquisite surprise).name: Doll (Exquisite surprise)
Doll (Exquisite surprise).description:
Dolls are found throughout Golarion in a wide variety of forms. Among the most common are miniature painted figurines, plush animals crafted from fur and stuffed with cotton, porcelain dolls with fine clothing and silky hair, fabric hand puppets, and elaborate marionettes.

Hiding an object inside this beautifully crafted surprise doll grants you a +1 item bonus on Stealth checks made to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.qVNVSmsgpKFGk9hV]{Conceal an item}, as the compartment is particularly well‑hidden and weighted to ensure the doll doesn't feel off-balance with an item inside.

Doll (Surprise).name: Doll (Surprise)
Doll (Surprise).description:
Dolls are found throughout Golarion in a wide variety of forms. Among the most common are miniature painted figurines, plush animals crafted from fur and stuffed with cotton, porcelain dolls with fine clothing and silky hair, fabric hand puppets, and elaborate marionettes.

These dolls contain a hidden compartment or pouch capable of holding a single object of up to light Bulk—typically a bell, rattle, or dried flowers.

Double Barreled Musket.name: Double Barreled Musket
Double Barreled Musket.description: This flintlock breech-loader has two side-by-side barrels. Though less accurate than a standard musket, a double-barreled musket offers versatility in firing options. Many of Alkenstar's famous shield marshals save their earnings to buy a double-barreled musket as their first personal firearm.

Double-Barreled Pistol.name: Double-Barreled Pistol
Double-Barreled Pistol.description: This flintlock pistol has two side-by-side barrels. Though less accurate than a standard pistol, a double-barreled pistol is a useful and versatile weapon. It's generally banned in areas where duels with pistols are relatively common, in much the same way that arriving at an aristocratic duel with a scattergun would be considered crass, at best.

Doubling Rings.name: 双持对戒 Doubling Rings
Doubling Rings.description:
这件物品包含了两只通过魔法相连的戒指：一只精细锃亮的金戒指，上面镶嵌着一颗切割成方形的红宝石，以及一只厚重朴素的铁戒指。当你用戴着金戒指的手持握着一件近战武器，这件武器的基础符文会被复制到你戴着铁戒指的那只手所持握的任何近战武器上。（基础符文是 武器潜能符文 和 强击符文，分别能够在攻击骰上提供物品加值以及增加额外的武器伤害骰。）带着铁戒指的手所持握的武器上面原本的所有基础符文都会被压制。

复制的效果只会在你同时戴着两只戒指的时候发生，并在你停止持握一只手上的近战武器时消失。因此，复制的效果无法用于投掷攻击，也无法作用于你抓着但未持握的武器上（例如用单手抓起一件需要双手持握的武器）。

Doubling Rings (Greater).name: 高等双持对戒 Doubling Rings (Greater)
Doubling Rings (Greater).description:
这件物品包含了两只通过魔法相连的戒指：一只精细锃亮的金戒指，上面镶嵌着一颗切割成方形的红宝石，以及一只厚重朴素的铁戒指。当你用戴着金戒指的手持握着一件近战武器，这件武器的基础符文会被复制到你戴着铁戒指的那只手所持握的任何近战武器上。（基础符文是 武器潜能符文 和 强击符文，分别能够在攻击骰上提供物品加值以及增加额外的武器伤害骰。）带着铁戒指的手所持握的武器上面原本的所有基础符文都会被压制。

复制的效果只会在你同时戴着两只戒指的时候发生，并在你停止持握一只手上的近战武器时消失。因此，复制的效果无法用于投掷攻击，也无法作用于你抓着但未持握的武器上（例如用单手抓起一件需要双手持握的武器）。

高等双持对戒也会复制戴着金戒指的手上的武器的性能符文，只要铁戒指的手上的武器满足符文要求的全部条件，而且不是一件特殊武器。铁戒指的手上的武器会获得符文带来的好处，它本身所拥有的全部符文都会被压制。当你绑定这对戒指时，你可以选择让戒指只复制基础符文，如同标准的双持对戒Doubling Rings一般。

Dragon Bile.name: 龙胆汁 Dragon Bile
Dragon Bile.description:
这种消化液和绿龙毒腺的混合物能让受害者呕吐不止，仿佛它的肉体从内部被消化一般。

启动 A 交互 (接触)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:37]

Onset 1 分钟

最大持续时间 6 轮

阶段 1 [[/r {6d6}[poison]]]{6d6 毒素伤害} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} (1 轮)

阶段 2 [[/r {7d6}[poison]]]{7d6 毒素伤害} 和 恶心sickened 3 (1 轮)

阶段 3 [[/r {9d6}[poison]]]{9d6 毒素伤害} 和 恶心sickened 4 (1 轮)

Dragon Mouth Pistol.name: Dragon Mouth Pistol
Dragon Mouth Pistol.description: Similar to the blunderbuss, a dragon-mouth pistol fires pellets from a flared barrel. Though less powerful than a blunderbuss, the dragon-mouth pistol is appreciated for its portability and one-handed design. Though the name was coined because of the destructive belch of this handheld scatter weapon, many gunsmiths craft dragon-mouth pistols with elaborate embellishments that resemble a stylized dragon's maw framing the barrel.

Dragon Rune Bracelet.name: Dragon Rune Bracelet
Dragon Rune Bracelet.description:
This polished golden bracelet is formed around the scale of a famous dragon. The bracelet is etched with esoteric symbols or words—always in Draconic—that indicate kinship with dragons. As many types of dragon rune bracelets exist as there are types of dragons, though dragon rune bracelets associated with Uncommon or Rare dragons are Rare.

While wearing a dragon rune bracelet, you gain a +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks while interacting with dragons of the same type as the pendant's scale (such as red dragons or cloud dragons). You also gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against fear effects from any kind of dragon.

Activate f envision

Requirements You can cast bloodline spells from the draconic bloodline, such as from the sorcerer class or sorcerer multiclass archetype

Frequency Once per day

Effect You regain 1 Focus Point, which you can spend only to cast a sorcerer bloodline spell. If you don't spend this Focus Point by the end of your turn, it is lost.

Automatically added effects: +2 item bonus to saving throws against fear effects caused by dragons.

Dragon Turtle Scale.name: 龙龟鳞 Dragon Turtle Scale
Dragon Turtle Scale.description:
启动 A 想象

需求 你在运动Athletics的熟练度至少为专家

这片闪烁着的绿色鳞片通常会挂在金色的扣环或吊链上。

当你启动这片鳞片，在1分钟内你能获得等同于陆地速度Speed一半的游泳速度Speed。

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.4tepFOJLhZSelPoa]{效果：龙龟鳞}

Dragon's Blood Pudding.name: Dragon's Blood Pudding
Dragon's Blood Pudding.description:
Activate 1 Interact

While some unscrupulous chefs claim that this savory pudding is made with real dragon's blood, its crimson color and acrid smell actually come from bloody mandrake paste, ginger root, and distilled terrap sap. This potent combination singes the nostrils and throat, removing effects that make you sluggish. When you consume the pudding, it attempts a counteract check with a [[/r {1d20+6}#Counteract Check]]{+6} counteract modifier to remove the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed} condition from a single source, using the source of that condition to determine the counteract level and DC.

Dragon's Blood Pudding (Greater).name: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Greater)
Dragon's Blood Pudding (Greater).description:
Activate 1 Interact

While some unscrupulous chefs claim that this savory pudding is made with real dragon's blood, its crimson color and acrid smell actually come from bloody mandrake paste, ginger root, and distilled terrap sap. This potent combination singes the nostrils and throat, removing effects that make you sluggish. When you consume the pudding, it attempts a counteract check with a [[/r {1d20+20}#Counteract Check]]{+20} counteract modifier to remove the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed} condition from a single source, using the source of that condition to determine the counteract level and DC. You also become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 round. While taking the additional action from being quickened, you scream, as a result of both the flavor and the mandrake paste's properties. You can use the additional action to Step, Stride, Strike, or Demoralize. If you choose to Demoralize, you gain a +3 item bonus to the Intimidation check.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.F8nQOLVWmpp9G5hZ]{Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Greater)}

Dragon's Blood Pudding (Major).name: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Major)
Dragon's Blood Pudding (Major).description:
Activate 1 Interact

While some unscrupulous chefs claim that this savory pudding is made with real dragon's blood, its crimson color and acrid smell actually come from bloody mandrake paste, ginger root, and distilled terrap sap. This potent combination singes the nostrils and throat, removing effects that make you sluggish. When you consume the pudding, it attempts a counteract check with a [[/r {1d20+31}#Counteract Check]]{+31} counteract modifier to remove the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed} condition from a single source, using the source of that condition to determine the counteract level and DC. You also become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 2 rounds. While taking the additional action from being quickened, you scream, as a result of both the flavor and the mandrake paste's properties. You can use the additional action to Step, Stride, Strike, or Demoralize. If you choose to Demoralize, you gain a +4 item bonus to the Intimidation check.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.0YbNzbW0HSKtgStQ]{Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Major)}

Dragon's Blood Pudding (Moderate).name: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Moderate)
Dragon's Blood Pudding (Moderate).description:
Activate 1 Interact

While some unscrupulous chefs claim that this savory pudding is made with real dragon's blood, its crimson color and acrid smell actually come from bloody mandrake paste, ginger root, and distilled terrap sap. This potent combination singes the nostrils and throat, removing effects that make you sluggish. When you consume the pudding, it attempts a counteract check with a [[/r {1d20+9}#Counteract Check]]{+9} counteract modifier to remove the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed} condition from a single source, using the source of that condition to determine the counteract level and DC. You also become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 round. While taking the additional action from being quickened, you scream, as a result of both the flavor and the mandrake paste's properties. You can use the additional action to Step, Stride, Strike, or Demoralize. If you choose to Demoralize, you gain a +2 item bonus to the Intimidation check.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.19ECULG5Zp593jQX]{Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Moderate)}

Dragon's Breath (1st Level Spell).name: Dragon's Breath (1st Level Spell)
Dragon's Breath (1st Level Spell).description:
This rune depicts a specific type of dragon, resizing after application to fit the surface of the item.

Activate f envision (metamagic)

Requirements You're receiving a bonus to AC from your dragon's breath cape or shield

Effect If your next action is to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} with an area of effect that deals the same type of damage as the depicted dragon's breath weapon, the spell gains the effects of the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.FoWO4RnHRwfEIC7Q]{Widen Spell} feat. The rune can only affect spells of 1st level.

Dragon's Crest.name: Dragon's Crest
Dragon's Crest.description:
This variant on the shield boss is usually shaped like a dragon's head, its jaws open wide enough to wedge a small vessel of liquid within. A dragon's crest can be etched with weapon runes, much like a shield boss or shield spikes, but doesn't otherwise alter your shield's statistics. A shield bearing a dragon's crest can't be combined with an attached weapon, like shield spikes.

You can use an Interact action to wedge an alchemical bomb into the crest's jaws. While a bomb is wedged in the shield, you take a -1 penalty to attack rolls with the shield. When you successfully Strike a creature with the shield, the vessel shatters, exposing the creature you hit-and yourself-to the substance within. This counts as a successful hit with the bomb against the creature if it's adjacent to you or a successful hit against the appropriate adjacent square if it's not. The bomb deals splash damage as normal to surrounding creatures, including you. In addition, the bomb deals full damage to the attached shield.

Dragon's Eye Charm.name: Dragon's Eye Charm
Dragon's Eye Charm.description:
This charm, a dragon-shaped pendant worn like a necklace or set into armor or clothing as a decoration, is warm and smooth to the touch. It must be held in one hand to be used (pressing the palm of one's hand to the charm also works, provided that your hand is otherwise empty). It has four distinct powers.

Activate A Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect The dragon's eye charm manifests fire for you to wield against your foe. You cast a 5th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame} spell with a spell attack roll of +13.

Activate A Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect The charm's pupil becomes plainly visible. You can look through the charm to gain Darkvision for as long as you Sustain the Activation, to a maximum of 10 minutes.

Activate A Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect The dragon's eye charm shrouds you in a faintly glowing layer of golden energy. You gain fire resistance 5 for 10 minutes.

Activate A Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You can speak and understand Draconic as long as you Sustain the Activation, to a maximum of 10 minutes.

Dragonbone Arrowhead.name: Dragonbone Arrowhead
Dragonbone Arrowhead.description:
Usage affixed to a melee weapon or a ranged weapon with the thrown trait

Activate 1 Interact

Requirements You're an expert with the affixed weapon.

This arrowhead, carved from dragon bone, hangs off the shaft of your weapon. When you activate this talisman, until the end of the current turn, the affixed weapon gains the thrown 20 feet weapon trait, and when you make a thrown Strike with it, it flies back to your hand after the Strike completes. If your hands are full when the weapon returns, it falls to the ground in your space.

Dragonfly Potion.name: Dragonfly Potion
Dragonfly Potion.description:
Activate 1 Interact

Your eyes transform into those of a giant dragonfly, the thousands of separate facets wrapping around your head, and a pair of long, delicate, insectile wings grow from your upper back. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed.

Additionally, you gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.DRtaqOHXTRtGRIUT]{Low-Light Vision} and a +2 item bonus to visual Perception checks, and you can't be flanked except by creatures higher level than you are (though lower‑level creatures can still help their higher‑level allies flank). These effects last for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.9j1uTGBGAc7GIhjm]{Effect: Dragonfly Potion}

Dragonhide Buckler (High-Grade).name: Dragonhide Buckler (High-Grade)
Dragonhide Buckler (High-Grade).description:
Dragonhide shields are each immune to one damage type based on the type of dragon.

Dragon Type Immunity
Black or copper acid
Blue or bronze electricity
Brass, Red, or Gold fire
Green poison
Silver or white cold

The shield has Hardness 5, HP 20, and BT 10.

Craft Requirements dragonhide worth at least 4,000 gp

Dragonhide Buckler (Standard-Grade).name: Dragonhide Buckler (Standard-Grade)
Dragonhide Buckler (Standard-Grade).description:

Brass, Red, or Gold fire

The shield has Hardness 2, HP 8, and BT 4.

Craft Requirements dragonhide worth at least 50 gp

Dragonplate.name: 龙鳞甲 Dragonplate
Dragonplate.description:
这套+2高等抗力龙革全身甲，让穿戴者如同怒龙降世。基于10种常见龙的类型，该护甲也有10种不同的类型，不过其它类型也应该存在。

启动 D 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你喷涂出龙息，根据龙革出处类型来决定龙息的形态、伤害类型和需豁免骰。该龙息喷吐武器造成14d6点伤害；所有区域内的生物需要进行DC36的基础豁免检定。

制造需求 原材料必须包含1250gp的龙革。

Dragonscale Amulet.name: Dragonscale Amulet
Dragonscale Amulet.description:
This amulet is made from the scales of five ancient dragons. You gain resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, and poison. If you take damage of one of these types from a dragon's Breath Weapon, the amulet begins to glow brightly; for the next 10 minutes, your resistance against that type of damage increases to 20. If you are subjected to a dragon's frightful presence, you can roll your saving throw twice and use the higher result to determine the aura's effects. This is a fortune effect.

Activate D command

Frequency once per day

Effect You exude an aura that terrifies all foes in a 60-foot radius, as the frightful presence ability with a @Check[type:will|dc:34] save.

Dragonslayer's Shield.name: 屠龙盾 Dragonslayer's Shield
Dragonslayer's Shield.description:
屠龙盾是一面复盖有特定类型龙革的铁盾，每一面屠龙盾都有差异。当举起它时，这面铁盾（硬度8，HP32，BT16）将举盾给与AC的环境加值添加到你对抗区域效果的反射豁免上。

当你持握该盾牌时，在对抗龙的气势凶猛（frightful presence）能力的意志豁免会获得+2环境加值。根据制作这面盾时复盖其上的龙革类型，该盾牌会获得对应伤害类型的10点抗力（见龙革）；该抗力在硬度减伤完后生效，因此当你盾牌格挡时，屠龙盾对对应类型的伤害可以减少18点。你能对造成该类型伤害的攻击使用盾牌格挡。

龙息药水 Dragon's Breath Potion

龙的类型 吐息武器（豁免）
黑龙或赤铜龙 ３０尺直线酸液（反射）
蓝龙或青铜龙 ３０尺直线电击（反射）
黄铜龙 ３０尺直线火焰（反射）
绿龙 １５尺锥形毒素（强韧）
金龙或红龙 １５尺锥形火焰（反射）
银龙或白龙 １５尺锥形寒冷（反射）

Drake Rifle (Acid).name: Drake Rifle (Acid)
Drake Rifle (Acid).description:
A drake rifle is a firearm made from the saliva glands of a drake. The firearm launches small bursts of empowered spittle instead of typical rounds of ammunition. A drake rifle is a +1 weapon. It's a distinct type of martial firearm that deals 1d10 acid damage with a range increment of 150 feet and reload 1. On a critical hit, the spittle clings to the target and they take persistent damage of the same type as the weapon equal to [[/r {1d4+1+@item.data.data.runes.striking}[persistent,acid]]]{1d4 + the number of weapon damage dice}. A drake rifle does not add critical specialization effects.

Activate 3 Interact (evocation, magical)

Frequency once per day

Effect You fire a large, specialized burst designed to hamper your foes. Make a ranged Strike with the drake rifle. As long as the Strike isn't a critical failure, the drake rifle deals [[/r {1}[splash,acid]]]{1 Acid Splash Damage} per weapon damage die to the target and creatures within 5 feet of the target. On a hit, the drake rifle provides the following additional effect:

  • Acid Clinging acid makes it painful and sickening to move. The target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}.

Craft Requirements The initial raw materials must include the saliva glands of a ritually hunted drake with a breath weapon that deals the appropriate damage type for the drake rifle

On a hit, the drake rifle provides the following additional effect:

  • Cold Frozen spittle clings to the target. The target takes a -10-foot status penalty to their Speeds for 1 minute.

Craft Requirements The initial raw materials must include the saliva glands of a ritually hunted drake with a breath weapon that deals the appropriate damage type for the drake rifle

  • Poison Noxious vapors fill the target's lungs. The target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 minute.

Craft Requirements The initial raw materials must include the saliva glands of a ritually hunted drake with a breath weapon that deals the appropriate damage type for the drake rifle

Drakeheart Mutagen (Greater).name: Drakeheart Mutagen (Greater)
Drakeheart Mutagen (Greater).description:
Activate A Interact

Your skin grows tough scales like a drake, your eyesight become sharp and your pupils slitted, and your limbs grow wiry and quick, but your mind and reflexes become slow.

Benefit You gain +6 item bonus to AC, a Dexterity cap of +2 (as usual, use your lowest Dexterity cap if you have more than one), and a +3 item bonus to Perception checks. If you're wearing armor, you still calculate your proficiency bonus to AC based on your proficiency in the armor you're wearing, even if the drakeheart mutagen has a higher item bonus. You also gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EHa0owz6mccnmSBf]{Final Surge} action.

Drawback You take a -1 penalty to Will saves, Reflex saves, and all skill checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge}.

Duration 1 hour or until you use Final Surge, whichever comes first.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.qwoLV4awdezlEJ60]{Effect: Drakeheart Mutagen (Greater)}

Drakeheart Mutagen (Lesser).description:

Dread (Greater).name: Dread (Greater)
Dread (Greater).description: Eerie symbols cover your armor, inspiring terror in your foes. Frightened enemies within 30 feet that can see you must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:38|name:Dread Rune|traits:fear|showDC:all] save at the end of their turn; on a failure, the value of their @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition doesn't decrease that turn, no matter the value.

Dread (Lesser).name: Dread (Lesser)
Dread (Lesser).description: Eerie symbols cover your armor, inspiring terror in your foes. Frightened enemies within 30 feet that can see you must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:20|name:Dread Rune|traits:fear|showDC:all] save at the end of their turn; on a failure, the value of their @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition doesn't decrease below 1 that turn.

Dread (Moderate).name: Dread (Moderate)
Dread (Moderate).description: Eerie symbols cover your armor, inspiring terror in your foes. Frightened enemies within 30 feet that can see you must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:29|name:Dread Rune|traits:fear|showDC:all] save at the end of their turn; on a failure, the value of their @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition doesn't decrease below 2 that turn.

Dread Ampoule (Greater).name: Dread Ampoule (Greater)
Dread Ampoule (Greater).description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate A Strike

This flask is filled with a murky purple gas that briefly interferes with normal brain activity. A dread ampoule deals the listed mental damage and mental splash damage.

On a hit, the target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}, or frightened 2 on a critical hit. Many types also grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 3d6 mental damage and 3 mental splash damage.

Dread Ampoule (Lesser).name: Dread Ampoule (Lesser)
Dread Ampoule (Lesser).description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate A Strike

This flask is filled with a murky purple gas that briefly interferes with normal brain activity. A dread ampoule deals the listed mental damage and mental splash damage.

On a hit, the target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}, or frightened 2 on a critical hit. Many types also grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

The bomb deals 1d6 mental damage and 1 mental splash damage.

Dread Ampoule (Major).name: Dread Ampoule (Major)
Dread Ampoule (Major).description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate A Strike

This flask is filled with a murky purple gas that briefly interferes with normal brain activity. A dread ampoule deals the listed mental damage and mental splash damage.

On a hit, the target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}, or frightened 2 on a critical hit. Many types also grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 4d6 mental damage and 4 mental splash damage.

Dread Ampoule (Moderate).name: Dread Ampoule (Moderate)
Dread Ampoule (Moderate).description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate A Strike

This flask is filled with a murky purple gas that briefly interferes with normal brain activity. A dread ampoule deals the listed mental damage and mental splash damage.

On a hit, the target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}, or frightened 2 on a critical hit. Many types also grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 2d6 mental damage and 2 mental splash damage.

Dread Blindfold.name: 恐惧眼罩 Dread Blindfold
Dread Blindfold.description:
