The triggering creature must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17] saving throw or be moved into an adjacent square (chosen by you when you craft the snare). This is forced movement. On a critical failure, the creature falls @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} in that square.

Exquisite Sword Cane.name: Exquisite Sword Cane
Exquisite Sword Cane.description: An exquisite sword cane is a sword sheathed inside a hollow cane, which itself can be used as a clubbing weapon with or without the sword sheathed inside.

Exquisite Sword Cane Sheath.name: Exquisite Sword Cane Sheath
Exquisite Sword Cane Sheath.description: An exquisite sword cane is a sword sheathed inside a hollow cane, which itself can be used as a clubbing weapon with or without the sword sheathed inside.

Exsanguinating Ammunition.name: Exsanguinating Ammunition
Exsanguinating Ammunition.description:
Ammunition any

Activate 1 Interact

This ammunition includes a small reservoir of a tacky red substance that coats the ammunition when you activate it. The substance makes a creature bleed more freely. For 1 minute after you deal damage to a creature with an activated exsanguinating ammunition that creature gains weakness 1 to persistent bleed damage. In addition, the DC of any flat checks to end persistent bleed damage increases from 15 to 17 (from 10 to 12 when receiving particularly effective assistance) for the duration.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.Fz3cSffzDAxhCh2D]{Effect: Exsanguinating Ammunition}

Exsanguinating Ammunition (Greater).name: Exsanguinating Ammunition (Greater)
Exsanguinating Ammunition (Greater).description:
Ammunition any

Activate 1 Interact

This ammunition includes a small reservoir of a tacky red substance that coats the ammunition when you activate it. The substance makes a creature bleed more freely. For 1 minute after you deal damage to a creature with an activated exsanguinating ammunition that creature gains weakness 3 to persistent bleed damage. In addition, the DC of any flat checks to end persistent bleed damage increases from 15 to 17 (from 10 to 12 when receiving particularly effective assistance) for the duration.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.5lZWAvm0oGxvF4bm]{Effect: Exsanguinating Ammunition (Greater)}

Exsanguinating Ammunition (Major).name: Exsanguinating Ammunition (Major)
Exsanguinating Ammunition (Major).description:
Ammunition any

Activate 1 Interact

This ammunition includes a small reservoir of a tacky red substance that coats the ammunition when you activate it. The substance makes a creature bleed more freely. For 1 minute after you deal damage to a creature with an activated exsanguinating ammunition that creature gains weakness 5 to persistent bleed damage. In addition, the DC of any flat checks to end persistent bleed damage increases from 15 to 17 (from 10 to 12 when receiving particularly effective assistance) for the duration.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.mrwg2XftLtSLj197]{Effect: Exsanguinating Ammunition (Major)}

Extendable Pincer.name: Extendable Pincer
Extendable Pincer.description: This extendable rod features a pincer on one end and clamped handle on the other. By squeezing the handle, the pincer opens or closes. As an Interact action, you can extend or retract the rod by 5 feet to one of three settings, allowing you to Interact to pick up an object with the pincer either within your own space, in an adjacent space, or exactly 10 feet away.

Extended Deteriorating Dust.name: Extended Deteriorating Dust
Extended Deteriorating Dust.description:
Contained in a specially enchanted small leather or hide sack, deteriorating dust is a potent caustic agent and a prized item among Rovagug's more discreet followers.

Activate D Interact

Effect You sprinkle the deteriorating dust over an unattended Medium or smaller object. The dust quickly fades to a transparent color and the object immediately begins to rust, melt, or otherwise fall apart. For the listed time, the object takes constant damage; if the object has a Hardness, then the dust gradually reduces the object's Hardness instead. If the deteriorating dust is still active after the object's Hardness is reduced to 0, it deals damage to the object as previously described. If the object survives, reduced Hardness returns after the dust's duration expires, but any damage remains.

The affected object takes 1 damage per 3 hours (8 damage per day) and its Hardness is reduced by 1 per hour. The effect lasts for 1 week.

Extending.name: Extending
Extending.description:
An extending rune allows you to extend your weapon to impossible lengths.

Activate 2 Interact

Effect You extend your weapon for an instant, giving you an impossible reach. You Strike with the weapon, and you have reach 60 feet for the Strike.

Extending (Greater).name: Extending (Greater)
Extending (Greater).description:
An extending rune allows you to extend your weapon to impossible lengths.

Activate 2 Interact

Effect You extend your weapon for an instant, giving you an impossible reach. You Strike with the weapon, and you have reach 120 feet for the Strike.

Extradimensional Stash.name: Extradimensional Stash
Extradimensional Stash.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.flRXjabqedf6GjuU]{Extradimensional Stash}

When you perform sleight of hand, you fold space so that objects really do disappear. You create a small extradimensional space somewhere within in your clothing that can hold up to 5 Bulk worth of objects. The space functions as a bag of holding, but can hold only up to 5 Bulk, has no Bulk of its own, and can be Interacted with using only one hand.

In addition, when you Palm an Object, you can place it directly into this extradimensional space as long as the space has sufficient free space to hold the object.

Eye of Apprehension.name: 忧虑之眼 Eye of Apprehension
Eye of Apprehension.description:
启动 F 想象

触发 你正准备以察觉Perception进行先攻检定，但尚未投掷结果

需求 你在察觉Perception上达到大师

这枚波光玉内有着丝绸一般的内容物，看起来像猫的眼睛。附着上后，它会让你变得心神不宁。当你启动它时，投两次察觉Perception检定，并使用更高的结果。

Eye of Enlightenment.name: Eye of Enlightenment
Eye of Enlightenment.description:
Activate f envision

Trigger You succeed at a Strike with the affixed weapon

Requirements You're an expert in Arcana, Occult, Nature, Religion, Society, or a Lore skill.

This dried eye was plucked from a magical creature. You combine your observation about your enemy's reaction to your Strike with the stores of magical wisdom within the talisman to try to glean more information about the foe's true nature. When you activate this talisman, you attempt to Recall Knowledge about the creature you hit. If you roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead.

Eye of Fortune.name: 幸运之眼 Eye of Fortune
Eye of Fortune.description:
启动 F 想象 (幸运)

触发 你攻击一个隐蔽Concealed或藏匿Hidden的生物，并还没有进行纯骰检定。

效果 你可以对隐蔽Concealed或藏匿Hidden状态投掷两次纯骰检定，并使用较高的结果。

狩猎之神 @Compendium[pf2e.deities.mm1j6UbHqFCI8fwB]{埃拉斯蒂尔 Erastil}的信徒创造了这只魔法眼罩。幸运之眼前面有一个宝石制成的眼睛标志，这个魔法能让你透过眼罩视物，如同眼罩是透明的一样。

Eye of the Unseen.name: Eye of the Unseen
Eye of the Unseen.description:
This prosthetic eye was designed by elven crafters but comes in a range of appearances for different ancestries. While wearing the eye, you gain a +1 item bonus to visual Perception checks.

Activate 2 command, envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You focus on the eye to see the unseen. The eye casts @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See Invisibility} on you.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.aXDtl9vMp1vIznya]{Effect: Eye of the Unseen}

Eye of the Unseen (Greater).name: Eye of the Unseen (Greater)
Eye of the Unseen (Greater).description:
This prosthetic eye was designed by elven crafters but comes in a range of appearances for different ancestries. While wearing the eye, you gain a +2 item bonus to visual Perception checks.

Activate 2 command, envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You focus on the eye to see the unseen. The eye casts 5th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See Invisibility} on you.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.1ihy7Jvw5PY4WYbP]{Effect: Eye of the Unseen (Greater)}

Eye of the Wise.name: Eye of the Wise
Eye of the Wise.description:
This fist-sized, 12-rayed black star sapphire is sacred to Yueral, the elven goddess of magic and jewels, and most accounts of its creation attribute its crafting to a circle of her worshippers. In addition to the abilities listed below, the gem functions as a portal key for Jewelgate at Alseta's Ring.

Activate A Interact

Effect You touch the Eye of the Wise to a gem worth at least 10 gp, whereupon the Eye of the Wise assumes the appearance of the touched gemstone. While this connection is active, the carriers of the Eye of the Wise and of the other gemstone can communicate telepathically with one another over any distance, as long as both are on the same plane. This connection is broken if the other gemstone is damaged, if the Eye of the Wise becomes attuned to another gemstone, or if the bearer of the Eye of the Wise dismisses the activation.

Activate A Interact

Effect You hold the Eye of the Wise up to your own eye and peer through it. The Eye of the Wise grows transparent and grants you a +2 item bonus to attempts to Decipher Writing, Disable a Device, Identify Magic, Pick a Lock, Seek, or Sense Motive. You can Sustain this activation as long as you hold the gem in place.

Eyes of the Eagle.name: 雄鹰之眼 Eyes of the Eagle
Eyes of the Eagle.description:
琥珀色水晶制成的镜片复盖着你的眼睛。这为你提供昏暗视觉以及在利用视觉的察觉Perception检定上提供+2物品加值。

自动生效:

  • 利用视觉的察觉Perception检定获得+2物品加值

Fade Band.name: 暗淡束带 Fade Band
Fade Band.description:
启动 F 想象

触发 一次攻击未能命中你

需求 你在隐匿Stealth上达到大师

这条轻薄的银色带子捆在你的盔甲上。当你启动束带，它会对你施放一次2环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{隐形术 Invisibility} 。

Fairy Bullet.name: Fairy Bullet
Fairy Bullet.description:
Ammunition round

Activate 2 command, envision

These bullets are seaweed-green, refract light like an emerald, and are covered in a thin film of gray-green powder. When fired, a fairy bullet creates an effect that functions as the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.0qaqksrGGDj74HXE]{Glitterdust} spell in a line between you and your target. This line can be no more than 60 feet long, so if the target is more than 60 feet away from you, the line simply ends after reaching its maximum distance. Since the fairy bullet is fired before the glitterdust can reveal the target, the effects don't affect the flat check for the attack roll with the fairy bullet.

Fake Blood Pack.name: Fake Blood Pack
Fake Blood Pack.description:
Adventurers have found a number of uses for these animal blood-filled bladders, which were originally used in theatrical productions. Whenever you take slashing or piercing damage with the fake blood pack under your clothes or armor, roll a DC 11 flat check. On a success, the blood pack is punctured. You or an ally can puncture the hidden pack intentionally.

When faking an injury, the blood pack grants a +2 item bonus to relevant Deception checks, such as to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ewwCglB7XOPLUz72]{Lie} about being injured. Abilities that trigger when a creature deals bleed damage, determine if a creature is bleeding, or are otherwise based on bleed damage don't trigger or apply for blood from a fake blood pack, which might mean creatures with such abilities automatically realize the ruse.

Falchion.name: 弯刃大刀 Falchion
Falchion.description: 这种武器是一种较重的双手曲刃的弯刀。它的重量倾向刀刃的末端，使之成为一种强大的挥砍武器。

False Death.name: False Death
False Death.description:
Typically used to fake one's death, this poison swiftly causes the imbiber to lose consciousness and suppresses vital signs. A creature examining the unconscious target must succeed at a Medicine check against the imbiber's Deception DC + 4 to determine that the target is alive, and a critical success allows the examiner to determine that a toxin is causing the effect. The false death toxin has an extremely bitter taste (Perception DC 10 to detect), making it difficult to trick a creature into consuming the poison against its wishes.

Activate A Interact

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18]

Onset 10 minutes

Maximum Duration 5 days

Stage 1clumsy 2 (1 round)

Stage 2 unconscious (1 hour)

Stage 3 unconscious (1 day)

False Manacles.name: False Manacles
False Manacles.description: These manacles are nearly indistinguishable from real manacles upon inspection, but contain a hidden release that enables a wearer who knows the location of the release to free themselves with a single Interact action. An observer who examines the manacles and succeeds at a DC 20 Perception check notices their false nature. On a critical success, the observer finds the location of the hidden catch as well.

Familiar Satchel.name: Familiar Satchel
Familiar Satchel.description: This armored case is made to protect any Tiny or smaller creature contained within. It includes air holes (which can be plugged with cork stoppers for underwater travel) and two receptacles for food and water. Any creature inside has neither line of sight nor line of effect to the outside world but also cannot be targeted by attacks that require a line of effect while in the satchel. However, an area effect that deals enough damage to break the case also damages the creature inside. The satchel is made of leather (Hardness 4, HP 16, BT 8). A creature can enter or exit the satchel by using a total of 2 actions: an Interact action to open the satchel and a single action with the move trait to enter or exit.

Familiar Tattoo.name: Familiar Tattoo
Familiar Tattoo.description: This tattoo typically consists of an image of a small animal or of a familiar's name written in runes. Your familiar can meld into your familiar tattoo to be carried in your skin. The familiar must spend a single action, which has the magical, move, and transmutation traits, to meld into or exit your tattoo. It must be adjacent to you to meld into your tattoo, and it exits your tattoo in an open space adjacent to you. Any of the familiar's companion items remain on it, but it can't carry any other items with it. This tattoo is non-magical if you don't have a familiar or if your familiar doesn't remain present for the entire tattooing process. If your familiar dies, this tattoo loses its magic and becomes a mundane tattoo.

Fang Snare.name: Fang Snare
Fang Snare.description:
You set snake fangs, poison stingers, or other venomous animal parts in the ground where they can be touched or stepped on by a creature that enters the snare's square. The first creature to enter the square must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:20] saving throw.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target takes 1 piercing damage and 2d8 poison damage.

Critical Failure The target takes 2 piercing damage and 4d8 poison damage.

Fanged.name: Fanged
Fanged.description:
When etched with this rune, a weapon's hilt or haft becomes engraved with grooves that match the imprints of a wolf's teeth. By putting a fanged weapon in your mouth, you can transform into an animal.

Activate 1 Interact (magical, polymorph, transmutation)

Effect You transform into a Small or Medium animal that wields the fanged weapon in its jaws; the animal matches the animal you are most closely associated with (a lizardfolk would turn into a lizard, a kitsune into a fox, a deer instinct barbarian into a deer, etc.) or a wolf if no specific animal is applicable. While in this form, you can attack with the fanged weapon even though you don't have any hands. However, you can attack only with the fanged weapon and you don't have hands or the ability to hold items. For effects dependent on how many hands you are using to hold the item, such as the two-hand trait, you are holding the weapon in two hands. You can Dismiss this effect, and it ends automatically if you drop the fanged weapon (whether or not of your own volition).

Fanged (Greater).name: Fanged (Greater)
Fanged (Greater).description:
When etched with this rune, a weapon's hilt or haft becomes engraved with grooves that match the imprints of a wolf's teeth. By putting a fanged weapon in your mouth, you can transform into an animal.

Activate 1 Interact (magical, polymorph, transmutation)

Effect You transform into a Small or Medium animal that wields the fanged weapon in its jaws; the animal matches the animal you are most closely associated with (a lizardfolk would turn into a lizard, a kitsune into a fox, a deer instinct barbarian into a deer, etc.) or a wolf if no specific animal is applicable. While in this form, you can attack with the fanged weapon even though you don't have any hands. However, you can attack only with the fanged weapon and you don't have hands or the ability to hold items. For effects dependent on how many hands you are using to hold the item, such as the two-hand trait, you are holding the weapon in two hands. You can Dismiss this effect, and it ends automatically if you drop the fanged weapon (whether or not of your own volition).

In animal form, you gain low-light vision and a +5-foot item bonus to your Speed.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.XzxADtNpUlRff972]{Effect: Greater Fanged Rune Animal Form}

Fanged (Major).name: Fanged (Major)
Fanged (Major).description:
When etched with this rune, a weapon's hilt or haft becomes engraved with grooves that match the imprints of a wolf's teeth. By putting a fanged weapon in your mouth, you can transform into an animal.

Activate 1 Interact (magical, polymorph, transmutation)

Effect You transform into a Small or Medium animal that wields the fanged weapon in its jaws; the animal matches the animal you are most closely associated with (a lizardfolk would turn into a lizard, a kitsune into a fox, a deer instinct barbarian into a deer, etc.) or a wolf if no specific animal is applicable. While in this form, you can attack with the fanged weapon even though you don't have any hands. However, you can attack only with the fanged weapon and you don't have hands or the ability to hold items. For effects dependent on how many hands you are using to hold the item, such as the two-hand trait, you are holding the weapon in two hands. You can Dismiss this effect, and it ends automatically if you drop the fanged weapon (whether or not of your own volition).

In animal form, you gain low-light vision, imprecise scent to a range of 30 feet, and a +10-foot item bonus to your Speed.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.mkjcgwDBeaOUolVe]{Effect: Major Fanged Rune Animal Form}

Fangwire.name: Fangwire
Fangwire.description: This kobold wire is thin and hard to see, making it perfect for an ambush. The wielder wraps the wire around a vulnerable spot, such as the neck, and twists it to inflict potentially fatal lacerations. The name derives from the use of a similar wire in traps, or slow fangs, with the word “slow” removed, as a fangwire gets quick results.

Fashionable Wayfinder.name: Fashionable Wayfinder
Fashionable Wayfinder.description:
Fashionable wayfinders allow you to be dressed for success in almost any situation. In addition to the effects of a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder}, a fashionable wayfinder can attune to up to three sets of mundane clothing in your possession during your daily preparations. A fashionable wayfinder has the following activation.

Activate 1 envision

Effect You call one of the attuned sets of clothing onto yourself, changing clothes instantly and leaving you either holding the old set of clothing or with the old set folded neatly on the floor if you don't have a free hand to hold it. This activation can't change you into or out of a suit of armor of any kind. While the activation can transport the chosen attuned set of clothing onto you from up to 60 feet away, it can't transport any other creatures or items that might have been stored in the clothing.

Fauchard.name: Fauchard
Fauchard.description: A fauchard is similar to a glaive, save that its cutting edge is along the concave side. Fauchards are favored by Crimson Reclaimers for hacking through waves of zombies. The fauchard is a martial melee weapon.

Fear Gem.name: 恐惧宝石 Fear Gem
Fear Gem.description:
启动 D @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lkcM4V3VDAtjlR9P]{威慑打击 Intimidating Strike}

这颗黑曜石内似乎翻滚着黑烟。当你启动宝石，你进行一次威慑打击Intimidating Strike，如战士的同名专长。

如果你有威慑打击Intimidating Strike专长，将惊惧Frightened状态的数值提高至惊惧Frightened 2；如果达成重击，则提高至惊惧Frightened 3。

Fearsome.name: Fearsome
Fearsome.description: When you critically hit, the target becomes frightened 1.

Fearsome (Greater).name: Fearsome (Greater)
Fearsome (Greater).description: When you critically hit, the target becomes frightened 2.

Fearweed.name: Fearweed
Fearweed.description:
Activate 1 Interact

Cultivated by mashing and fermenting toxic weeds found in lonely graveyards, fearweed is a greenish paste magically infused with psychic horror. The @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition from fearweed can't be removed while the poison lasts.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30]

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 6 minutes

Stage 1[[/r {7d6}[poison]]]{7d6 poison damage} and frightened 1 (1 minute)

Stage 2[[/r {8d6}[poison]]]{8d6 poison damage} and frightened 2 (1 minute)

Stage 3 [[/r {9d6}[poison]]]{9d6 poison damage} and frightened 3 (1 minute)

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4koZzrnMXhhosn0D]{Fear}.

Feather Step Stone.name: 轻羽步宝石 Feather Step Stone
Feather Step Stone.description:
这颗通常切割成凸圆形的宝石是一小块里面困着羽毛或飞虫的琥珀。当你启动这颗宝石后，在你的回合结束前可以无视任何困难地形和高等困难地形的效果。

启动 F 想象

触发 你行进Stride或快步Step

需求 你在特技Acrobatics上达到专家

Feather Token (Anchor).name: 羽符（锚） Feather Token (Anchor)
Feather Token (Anchor).description:
每根羽符都像是来自某种奇异禽鸟的一根羽毛。羽毛的杆部用金线刻画了一个简单的奥法符文。启动一根羽符可以让它转化成另一件物品，之后便可以正常使用那件物品。每根羽毛都只能被启动一次，大多数都会永久性地变成描述中的物品。

这根羽毛只能在船上被启动。启动后，羽毛转化成一个沉重的锚，能够让船立刻停下。一天后，锚消失，船也能正常前进。锚与船通过一根魔法的力场链相互连接，这根链条可以通过 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic} 或伤害来移除（硬度30，生命值40）。

Feather Token (Balloon).name: 羽符（气球） Feather Token (Balloon)
Feather Token (Balloon).description: 该羽符不能在水下启动。当启动时，该羽符会变成一个直径3尺、充满热空气的漆布气球。气球底部的把手能让两个体型不超过中型的生物攀附在气球上。在启动后的第一轮，气球以每轮20尺的速度升向空中。在上升3轮之后，气球会在原地漂浮2轮，直到内部的热气冷却，然后以每轮20尺的速度下降。当气球达到它启动时所在的高度时，气球内的空气会漏光。

Feather Token (Bird).name: 羽符（鸟） Feather Token (Bird)
Feather Token (Bird).description:
每根羽符都像是来自某种奇异禽鸟的一根羽毛。羽毛的杆部用金线刻画了一个简单的奥法符文。启动一根羽符可以让它转化成另一件物品，之后便可以正常使用那件物品。每根羽毛都只能被启动一次，大多数都会永久性地变成描述中的物品。

启动 A 交互

启动后，这根羽符变成一只小麻雀，停留在你的指尖等着为你转发长度1分钟以内的信息，你也需要提供收件人的姓名和大概位置。收件人必须是你曾经见过的人，位置也必须是你曾经到访过的位置。收到信息后，这只鸟会飞走并转发信息，以每小时30英里的速度移动，然后在目标地点搜索你指示的收件人。如果这只鸟找到了目标，它会移动到目标旁边，并展示你的话语；接着这只鸟就会飞走并消失。如果它在你指示的位置找了10个小时以上都无法找到你的目标，它也会消失。

Feather Token (Chest).name: 羽符（木箱） Feather Token (Chest)
Feather Token (Chest).description:
每根羽符都像是来自某种奇异禽鸟的一根羽毛。羽毛的杆部用金线刻画了一个简单的奥法符文。启动一根羽符可以让它转化成另一件物品，之后便可以正常使用那件物品。每根羽毛都只能被启动一次，大多数都会永久性地变成描述中的物品。

启动 A 交互

当你使用这根羽符，一个小木箱子出现比立刻打开。这个箱子可以容纳10负载的物品。一旦箱子关上，它会带着储存的所有物品再次发生变化，变成一把钥匙。你可以以一个交互Interact动作旋转钥匙，打开一个想象中的锁，这会让它变回装着所有物品的箱子。一旦钥匙变回了箱子，它就永远保持着箱子的状态。

Feather Token (Fan).name: 羽符（扇） Feather Token (Fan)
Feather Token (Fan).description:
每根羽符都像是来自某种奇异禽鸟的一根羽毛。羽毛的杆部用金线刻画了一个简单的奥法符文。启动一根羽符可以让它转化成另一件物品，之后便可以正常使用那件物品。每根羽毛都只能被启动一次，大多数都会永久性地变成描述中的物品。

启动 A 交互

你需要朝着一个方向扇动这根羽毛以启动它。如果该方向面对着船帆，羽毛会飘到船帆上并开始持续扇风，这能让船的速度Speed获得+10尺状态加值，持续8小时。如果朝其他方向扇动羽毛，它会施展一次 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.g8QqHpv2CWDwmIm1]{造风术 Gust of Wind} (DC 20).

Feather Token (Holly Bush).name: 羽符（冬青木） Feather Token (Holly Bush)
Feather Token (Holly Bush).description:
每根羽符都像是来自某种奇异禽鸟的一根羽毛。羽毛的杆部用金线刻画了一个简单的奥法符文。启动一根羽符可以让它转化成另一件物品，之后便可以正常使用那件物品。每根羽毛都只能被启动一次，大多数都会永久性地变成描述中的物品。

启动 A 交互

当这根羽毛被启动，它立刻变成一棵活着的冬青木，占据一个格子。灌木可以提供标准掩蔽。另外，灌木上有2d4颗亮红色的莓果。虽然冬青果通常有毒，但这些莓果里面灌注了有益的魔法。你可以用一个交互Interact动作摘下并食用一颗莓果以恢复1点生命值。一旦从灌木上摘下，这些莓果会在几秒钟之后失去魔法效力，因此如果你在这个交互Interact动作内不食用莓果，它就再也不能治疗你。

如果在土壤上启动羽毛，这棵植物会继续生长并繁茂（虽然它不会继续提供更多治疗莓果）。如果它在其他地方启动，它会在 [[/r 1d4 #days]]{1d4 天}后枯死。

Feather Token (Ladder).name: 羽符（梯子） Feather Token (Ladder)
Feather Token (Ladder).description:
每根羽符都像是来自某种奇异禽鸟的一根羽毛。羽毛的杆部用金线刻画了一个简单的奥法符文。启动一根羽符可以让它转化成另一件物品，之后便可以正常使用那件物品。每根羽毛都只能被启动一次，大多数都会永久性地变成描述中的物品。

启动 A 交互

启动后，这根羽毛永久变成一个20尺长的梯子。

Feather Token (Puddle).name: 羽符（水坑） Feather Token (Puddle)
Feather Token (Puddle).description: 当启动时，该羽符会转变为两加仑的淡水。如果没人喝它，水会在一天后蒸发。

Feather Token (Swan Boat).name: 羽符（天鹅船） Feather Token (Swan Boat)
Feather Token (Swan Boat).description:
每根羽符都像是来自某种奇异禽鸟的一根羽毛。羽毛的杆部用金线刻画了一个简单的奥法符文。启动一根羽符可以让它转化成另一件物品，之后便可以正常使用那件物品。每根羽毛都只能被启动一次，大多数都会永久性地变成描述中的物品。

启动 A 交互

这根羽毛只能在被扔到巨大水体上时启动，例如扔到湖上或大河上。它会变成一艘天鹅形状的船，能够容纳最多32个中型Medium生物，8个大型Large生物，或2个巨型Huge生物。这艘船在水上以50尺的速度Speed移动，持续1天。

Feather Token (Tree).name: 羽符（树） Feather Token (Tree)
Feather Token (Tree).description:
每根羽符都像是来自某种奇异禽鸟的一根羽毛。羽毛的杆部用金线刻画了一个简单的奥法符文。启动一根羽符可以让它转化成另一件物品，之后便可以正常使用那件物品。每根羽毛都只能被启动一次，大多数都会永久性地变成描述中的物品。

启动 A 交互

这根羽符只能在被放在一块无主的土块上时启动。启动后，这根羽符变成一颗橡树，高60尺并有5尺宽的躯干。只要环境合适，这棵树会继续生长。

Feather Token (Whip).name: 羽符（鞭子） Feather Token (Whip)
Feather Token (Whip).description:
每根羽符都像是来自某种奇异禽鸟的一根羽毛。羽毛的杆部用金线刻画了一个简单的奥法符文。启动一根羽符可以让它转化成另一件物品，之后便可以正常使用那件物品。每根羽毛都只能被启动一次，大多数都会永久性地变成描述中的物品。

启动 A 交互

这根羽符启动后会变成一条 +1 强击 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.DCPsilr8wbPXxTUv]{舞空 Dancing} 鞭。这根鞭子会立刻从你手上跳开并开始攻击你的敌人，持续1分钟，或直到它在舞空Dancing的纯骰检定中失败，之后鞭子便会消失。如果鞭子的目标不是倒地Prone状态，鞭子会使用它的动作尝试摔拌Trip目标，而非进行打击Strike。这根鞭子在打击Strike或摔拌Trip上的总攻击加值是+18，而非一把舞空Dancing武器的正常加值。

Fiendish Teleportation.name: Fiendish Teleportation
Fiendish Teleportation.description:
You tap into the fiendish ability to slip through space. When you Stride, you gain a +3 item bonus to Armor Class against reactions triggered by your movement. Once per day, from any distance, Abrogail Thrune II can call on a provision in your Thrune contract as a single action, causing you to become paralyzed for 1 hour or until Abrogail releases you, whichever comes first.

启动 2 command

Frequency once per day

Effect You recite a subclause of your contract regarding change in venue. You cast dimension door. The space you leave and the one you appear in are filled with the scent of brimstone, dealing 2d6 evil damage to creatures adjacent to both spaces.

Fighter's Fork.name: 斗士三叉矛 Fighter's Fork
Fighter's Fork.description:
这柄+1三叉戟通常刻有鱼鳞状的纹路，对于水生族裔的战士来说是常见的武器。

启动 A 交互

效果 你伸长或缩短三叉戟的握杆。伸长时，它需要双手持握使用，获得长触及特征，但会失去三叉戟正常的投掷特征。

Fighting Fan.name: Fighting Fan
Fighting Fan.description: This fan is useful for elegant dances as well as for slicing unsuspecting foes with the blades along its outer edge. If used in performances, it might be disguised as a frilly accessory, or it might be an obvious, though elegant, weapon.

Fighting Stick.name: Fighting Stick
Fighting Stick.description: This hard but flexible longsword-length piece of wood looks more like a pole than a weapon, but can be deadly in the right hands. While generally not used for combat outside of Song'o culture, some halflings have become so proficient as to make it just as effective as a blade in a fight. Many halflings will even sing to maintain a certain tempo and rhythm during combat. It deals 1d6 bludgeoning damage. A fighting stick is a martial one-handed melee weapon in the club weapon group.

Filcher's Fork.name: 窃贼刺叉 Filcher's Fork
Filcher's Fork.description: 这种半身人武器看起来像长长的两股叉，既是武器也是烹饪工具。

Final Blade.name: Final Blade
Final Blade.description:
A Large or smaller restrained or willing creature can be executed by a final blade.

Activate 1 minute (Interact)

Effect You execute a creature restrained beneath the blade. The creature you execute takes [[/r {11d10}[slashing]]]{11d10 slashing damage} and must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:45|name:Avoid Decapitation] save or be decapitated as though it suffered a critical hit with a natural 20 from a +3 major striking vorpal scythe. The soul of a creature executed with a final blade is trapped, and the creature can't be returned to life, not even by miracle or similar magic. A final blade can hold any number of souls in this way, and a sufficient number of captured souls forms a monster called a gray death.

Destruction A final blade can be destroyed via the rare ritual, blunt the final blade.

Fingerprint Kit.name: Fingerprint Kit
Fingerprint Kit.description:
Rarely found outside of major metropolises, fingerprinting kits are a state-of-the-art, non-magical means of linking suspects to the scene of a crime.

The kit consists of two parts. The first, a delicate brush and a jar of extremely fine dust, is used to reveal fingerprints left behind by most humanoid creatures. The dust sticks to the natural oils left behind on smooth surfaces. When you use the kit to determine whether or not creatures left behind a fingerprint at a crime scene, the GM rolls a secret Thievery check against the Thievery DC of every creature capable of leaving prints that has interacted with the scene. On a success, you locate a clear print from that creature and carefully transfer it to a special sheet of sticky paper. (Note that fingerprints can last for days, and prints collected in this manner often include those of victims, witnesses, and unrelated passersby.) At the GM's discretion, the print-leaving creature might get a bonus to its Thievery DC for taking special precautions. In other cases, finding a print might be impossible (such as if the creature was wearing gloves or if the location has been significantly compromised).

The second part of the kit is a small sheaf of paper and a pad soaked in ink. By forcing a humanoid creature with fingerprints to roll a finger across the pad and then press it to the paper, you can obtain an image of the unique whorls in that creature's fingerprints. These can then be compared to any prints found at a crime scene. Successfully determining whether or not two prints match requires a DC 15 Perception check-the GM should roll this check secretly as well, since a failed check may result in false information.

Fire Box.name: Fire Box
Fire Box.description: Anyone who opens the box triggers a clockwork mechanism that unleashes a @Template[type:cone|distance:15]{15‑foot cone} of fire. The cone issues forth in a random direction determined by the GM but always including the creature who opened the box. Those within the cone must succeed at a basic @Check[type:reflex|dc:17] save or take [[/r {4d6}[fire]]]{4d6 fire damage}.

Fire Lance.name: Fire Lance
Fire Lance.description: This amazingly simple projectile weapon is nothing more than a metal tube packed with black powder and a stopper, attached to the sharpened head of a javelin. A loaded fire lance can be wielded as a normal spear, though it requires an Interact action to regrip the weapon and hold it properly when switching from one use to another. Fire lances are most commonly found in Tian Xia, though occasionally one makes its way all the way to Avistan, typically in the hands of a Tien mercenary or caravan guard.

Fire Poi.name: Fire Poi
Fire Poi.description:
These special poi are made from a rare, light metal or from fire-retardant fibers and can be ignited before being wielded. Igniting a pair of fire poi is an Interact action and requires 1 pint of @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Du05UxCyCM0ZWH8z]{Oil} for every 10 minutes the poi remain ignited.

While lit, fire poi cast dim light in a 10-foot radius; in combat, they deal 1d4 bludgeoning plus 1d4 fire damage. On a critical hit with a lit fire poi, the target takes 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent} fire damage. The fire can be extinguished using the Interact action.

When unlit, the poi deal only the listed bludgeoning damage. Regardless of whether it is lit, the poi's 1d4 bludgeoning damage is the weapon damage dice, so striking runes and other effects don't affect the fire damage.

Fire and Iceberg.name: Fire and Iceberg
Fire and Iceberg.description:
Activate 1 Interact

Fiery Anulite paprika, sunrise cinnamon, and winterbite are hidden inside this salad's translucent leaves, bringing the cool of snow and the heat of steam to every bite. The dueling sensations make some diners sweat and others shiver, but all leave with a lasting sense of heat and cold that make other sources pale in comparison. When you consume the salad, you gain resistance 5 to fire and cold for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.FOZXp7QQDnny1600]{Effect: Fire and Iceberg}

Fire and Iceberg (Greater).name: Fire and Iceberg (Greater)
Fire and Iceberg (Greater).description:
Activate 1 Interact

Fiery Anulite paprika, sunrise cinnamon, and winterbite are hidden inside this salad's translucent leaves, bringing the cool of snow and the heat of steam to every bite. The dueling sensations make some diners sweat and others shiver, but all leave with a lasting sense of heat and cold that make other sources pale in comparison. When you consume the salad, you gain resistance 10 to fire and cold for 5 minutes.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.VsHhBBLApZsOCJRL]{Effect: Fire and Iceberg (Greater)}

Fire and Iceberg (Major).name: Fire and Iceberg (Major)
Fire and Iceberg (Major).description:
Activate 1 Interact

Fiery Anulite paprika, sunrise cinnamon, and winterbite are hidden inside this salad's translucent leaves, bringing the cool of snow and the heat of steam to every bite. The dueling sensations make some diners sweat and others shiver, but all leave with a lasting sense of heat and cold that make other sources pale in comparison. When you consume the salad, you gain resistance 15 to fire and cold for 10 minutes.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.yP45Rqu4jvCfXBkp]{Effect: Fire and Iceberg (Major)}

Fire-Douse Snare.name: Fire-Douse Snare
Fire-Douse Snare.description:
You carefully pack rare, heat-absorbing powders into a specially prepared clay vessel, then bury the vessel in the ground up to its neck. When a creature enters the square, the vessel's neck shatters, dispersing the powders into the air. The powder instantly douses non-magical fires the size of a campfire or smaller within 10 feet of the snare. The creature triggering the snare must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:20] save to avoid getting powder in its face. A creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} by the powder can use an Interact action to attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:10|showDC:owner] check; on a success, it removes the condition. On a failure, it can try again, with a @Check[type:flat|dc:5|showDC:owner] check on the next Interact check. If it fails a second time, it automatically removes the condition with a third Interact action.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is dazzled for 1 round.

Failure The creature is blinded until the end of its next turn and dazzled for 1 minute afterwards.

Critical Failure The creature is blinded for 1 minute and dazzled for 10 minutes afterwards.

Fire-Jump Ring.name: Fire-Jump Ring
Fire-Jump Ring.description:
This dark-red ring is engraved with ashen symbols and smells faintly of smoke.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You Stride (or Burrow or Fly, if you have the corresponding Speed) into any fire large enough to contain you, including magical fires. You vanish into the fire and take no damage from it. You can sense all sufficiently large fires within 100 feet of where you vanish, and you reemerge from any of those fires, either within the fire or adjacent to it. If you end your movement in the fire, it affects you as normal.

Firearm Cleaning Kit.name: Firearm Cleaning Kit
Firearm Cleaning Kit.description: This kit contains cleaning cloth, oil, small steel brushes, and other minor tools necessary for proper cleaning and maintenance of a firearm. Without a firearm cleaning kit, you can't perform the necessary tasks during your daily preparations to ensure that your firearm isn't at risk of misfiring under normal use conditions.

Firestarter Pellets.name: Firestarter Pellets
Firestarter Pellets.description:
Activate Cast a Spell (add 1 action)

These compacted pellets of bat guano, sulfur, and magical accelerants have long been a staple for spellcasters on the battlefield. Adding a firestarter pellet to a fireball spell produces clinging flames that deal [[/r {1d6}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage} to all who fail the saving throw against the effect ([[/r {2d6}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage} on a critical failure).

Firestarter Pellets (Greater).name: Firestarter Pellets (Greater)
Firestarter Pellets (Greater).description:
Activate Cast a Spell (add 1 action)

These compacted pellets of bat guano, sulfur, and magical accelerants have long been a staple for spellcasters on the battlefield. Adding a firestarter pellet to a fireball spell produces clinging flames that deal [[/r {2d6}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage} to all who fail the saving throw against the effect ([[/r {4d6}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage} on a critical failure).

Firestarter Pellets (Major).name: Firestarter Pellets (Major)
Firestarter Pellets (Major).description:
Activate Cast a Spell (add 1 action)

These compacted pellets of bat guano, sulfur, and magical accelerants have long been a staple for spellcasters on the battlefield. Adding a firestarter pellet to a fireball spell produces clinging flames that deal [[/r {3d6}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage} to all who fail the saving throw against the effect ([[/r {6d6}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage} on a critical failure).

Fishing Tackle.name: 渔具 Fishing Tackle
Fishing Tackle.description: 该套工具包括可折叠的钓鱼竿、鱼钩、钓线、鱼饵和渔网。

Fishing Tackle (Professional).name: 渔具(专家) Fishing Tackle (Professional)
Fishing Tackle (Professional).description: 该套工具包括可折叠的钓鱼竿、鱼钩、钓线、鱼饵和渔网。专家级渔具为钓鱼检定提供+1物品加值。

Five-Feather Wreath.name: Five-Feather Wreath
Five-Feather Wreath.description:
Identical feathers radiate from the center of this spellheart, held in place by woven straw. The spell attack roll of any spell cast by Activating this item is +8, and the spell DC is 18.

  • Armor You gain a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics checks and resistance 2 to falling damage. @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.nQ6vM1CRLyvQdGLG]{Equipment Effect: Five-Feather Wreath}
  • Weapon After you cast an air spell by Activating the wreath, you can Fly 5 feet as a single action, or you can Fly 10 feet as a free action if the spell you cast wasn't a cantrip. This must be your next action, and if you don't have a fly Speed, you must end the flight on solid ground or fall.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dDiOnjcsBFbAvP6t]{Gale Blast}.

Five-Feather Wreath (Greater).name: Five-Feather Wreath (Greater)
Five-Feather Wreath (Greater).description:
Identical feathers radiate from the center of this spellheart, held in place by woven straw. The spell attack roll of any spell cast by Activating this item is +14, and the spell DC is 24.

  • Armor You gain a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics checks and resistance 5 to falling damage. @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.ZP9Uq4PVTgzJ3wEi]{Equipment Effect: Greater Five-Feather Wreath}
  • Weapon After you cast an air spell by Activating the wreath, you can Fly 5 feet as a single action, or you can Fly 25 feet as a free action if the spell you cast wasn't a cantrip. This must be your next action, and if you don't have a fly Speed, you must end the flight on solid ground or fall.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dDiOnjcsBFbAvP6t]{Gale Blast}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.it4ZsAi6XgvGcodc]{Wall of Wind}.

Five-Feather Wreath (Major).name: Five-Feather Wreath (Major)
Five-Feather Wreath (Major).description:
Identical feathers radiate from the center of this spellheart, held in place by woven straw. The spell attack roll of any spell cast by Activating this item is +19, and the spell DC is 29.

  • Armor You gain a +2 item bonus to Acrobatics checks and resistance 10 to falling damage. @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.ccMa75bqXo3ZnlHM]{Equipment Effect: Major Five-Feather Wreath}
  • Weapon After you cast an air spell by Activating the wreath, you can Fly 5 feet as a single action, or you can Fly 40 feet as a free action if the spell you cast wasn't a cantrip. This must be your next action, and if you don't have a fly Speed, you must end the flight on solid ground or fall.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dDiOnjcsBFbAvP6t]{Gale Blast}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast 4th level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.it4ZsAi6XgvGcodc]{Wall of Wind}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.b5sGjGlBf58f8jn0]{Air Walk}.

Flail.name: 连枷 Flail
Flail.description: 这种武器是一个木柄通过链条、绳索或皮带链接着带刺铁球或铁柱。

Flame Drake Snare.name: Flame Drake Snare
Flame Drake Snare.description:
The snare takes the form of a Tiny, drake‑like clockwork toy. When a creature enters its square the snare activates, causing the drake to spit a gout of fire in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15]{15‑foot cone} in the direction from which the creature entered.

For instance, if a creature entered the square coming from the east, the cone would point east, to hit any allies behind the triggering creature. Those within the cone must succeed a basic @Check[type:reflex|dc:19] save or take [[/r {6d6}[fire]]]{6d6 fire damage}. After spitting its fire, the snare falls apart.

Flame Navette.name: 焰心宝玉 Flame Navette
Flame Navette.description:
启动 A 想象

需求 你在意志豁免中达到专家

这颗古铜辉石切割成了椭圆形，且两头削尖。其中雕刻着火焰的图纹，并通常佩戴在心脏位置。你每天只能启动焰心宝玉一次。

当你启动这颗宝玉，你获得战士职业专长 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wdkbfWKEjAFXAxto]{毅力 Determination} 的效果，反制调整值是+22。如果你有毅力专长且自己的反制调整值更高，你可以使用自己的调整值。

Flame Tongue.name: 炎舌 Flame Tongue
Flame Tongue.description:
这把+2高等强击 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.XszNvxnymWYRaoTp]{炽焰 Flaming}长剑有着华贵的青铜柄和火焰形状的剑刃。持握它时，剑刃发出淡淡的火光，提供10尺半径的昏暗光。

启动 D 命令, 交互

效果 你通过剑施放7环的奥术 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{燃火术 Produce Flame}，使用你用炎舌进行攻击的近战攻击调整值作为你的法术攻击调整值。

Flame Tongue (Greater).name: 高等炎舌 Flame Tongue (Greater)
Flame Tongue (Greater).description:
这把+3高等强击高等炽焰长剑有着华贵的青铜柄和火焰形状的剑刃。持握它时，剑刃发出淡淡的火光，提供10尺半径的昏暗光。

启动 D 命令, 交互

效果 你通过剑施放9环的奥术 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{燃火术 Produce Flame}，使用你用炎舌进行攻击的近战攻击调整值作为你的法术攻击调整值。

启动 A 命令

频率 每天一次

效果 A @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] 范围被高等炎舌的火光笼罩。范围内你和所有盟友的所有武器与无武装攻击获得炽焰性能符文的效果。

Flaming.name: 炽焰 Flaming
Flaming.description: 该武器用闪烁着的火焰增强了威力。该武器成功的打击命中额外造成1d6点火焰伤害，若重击，还能再造成 [[/r {1d10}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}。

Flaming (Greater).name: 高等炽焰 Flaming (Greater)
Flaming (Greater).description:
该武器用闪烁着的火焰增强了威力。该武器成功的打击命中额外造成1d6点火焰伤害，若重击，还能再造成 [[/r {2d10}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}。

该武器造成的火焰伤害（包括持续火焰伤害）忽略目标的火焰抗力。

Flaming Star.name: Flaming Star
Flaming Star.description:
A sheen of red crosses the surface of this star-shaped goldstone medallion when the light hits it. The affixed armor or weapon is warm to the touch. The spell attack roll of any spell cast by Activating this item is [[/r 1d20+7 #spell attack roll]]{+7}, and the spell DC is 17.

  • Armor You gain resistance 2 to fire.
  • Weapon After you cast a fire spell by Activating the star, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d4 fire damage until the end of your next turn.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame}.

Flaming Star (Greater).name: Flaming Star (Greater)
Flaming Star (Greater).description:
A sheen of red crosses the surface of this star-shaped goldstone medallion when the light hits it. The affixed armor or weapon is warm to the touch. The spell attack roll of any spell cast by Activating this item is [[/r 1d20+14 #spell attack roll]]{+14}, and the spell DC is 24.

  • Armor You gain resistance 5 to fire.
  • Weapon After you cast a fire spell by Activating the star, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d6 fire damage until the end of your next turn.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball}.

@Check[type:reflex|dc:24|basic:true|name:Fireball|traits:spell|showDC:all]

Flaming Star (Major).name: Flaming Star (Major)
Flaming Star (Major).description:
A sheen of red crosses the surface of this star-shaped goldstone medallion when the light hits it. The affixed armor or weapon is warm to the touch. The spell attack roll of any spell cast by Activating this item is [[/r 1d20+19 #spell attack roll]]{+19}, and the spell DC is 29.

  • Armor You gain resistance 5 to fire.
  • Weapon After you cast a fire spell by Activating the star, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d6 fire damage until the end of your next turn.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball}.

@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true|name:Flaming Star Spell|traits:spell|showDC:all]

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IarZrgCeaiUqOuRu]{Wall of Fire}.

Flare Beacon (Greater).name: Flare Beacon (Greater)
Flare Beacon (Greater).description:
Activate d Interact

Flare beacons create an incredibly bright light for a brief period of time. They are often used to signal others to the beacon's location, to coordinate assaults, to request rescue, or for other similar reasons. Higher-level beacons have a radius so large that they can be seen from miles away at night. When you Activate a flare beacon, you can either place it on the ground in a space within your reach or toss it up to 60 feet straight up. A flare beacon in the air falls at a rate of 10 feet per round.

The beacon shines bright light in a 100-foot radius and dim light in the next 100 feet. Creatures within a 20-foot radius of the beacon must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:27|name:Fortitude|traits:dazzle] save or be dazzled until they are no longer within 20 feet of it. Additionally, on a critical failure, they are also blinded for 1 round.

Flare Beacon (Lesser).name: Flare Beacon (Lesser)
Flare Beacon (Lesser).description:
Activate d Interact

Flare beacons create an incredibly bright light for a brief period of time. They are often used to signal others to the beacon's location, to coordinate assaults, to request rescue, or for other similar reasons. Higher-level beacons have a radius so large that they can be seen from miles away at night. When you Activate a flare beacon, you can either place it on the ground in a space within your reach or toss it up to 60 feet straight up. A flare beacon in the air falls at a rate of 10 feet per round.

The beacon then sparks into being, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light in the next 20 feet for 1 minute. Creatures adjacent to a flare beacon must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:15|name:Fortitude|traits:dazzle] save or be dazzled until they are no longer adjacent to it.

Flare Beacon (Major).name: Flare Beacon (Major)
Flare Beacon (Major).description:
Activate d Interact

Flare beacons create an incredibly bright light for a brief period of time. They are often used to signal others to the beacon's location, to coordinate assaults, to request rescue, or for other similar reasons. Higher-level beacons have a radius so large that they can be seen from miles away at night. When you Activate a flare beacon, you can either place it on the ground in a space within your reach or toss it up to 60 feet straight up. A flare beacon in the air falls at a rate of 10 feet per round.

The beacon shines bright light in a 180-foot radius and dim light in the next 180 feet. Creatures within a 30-foot radius of the beacon must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:35|name:Fortitude|traits:dazzle] save or be dazzled until they are no longer within 30 feet of it. Additionally, on a critical failure, they are also blinded for 1 round.

Flare Beacon (Moderate).name: Flare Beacon (Moderate)
Flare Beacon (Moderate).description:
Activate d Interact

Flare beacons create an incredibly bright light for a brief period of time. They are often used to signal others to the beacon's location, to coordinate assaults, to request rescue, or for other similar reasons. Higher-level beacons have a radius so large that they can be seen from miles away at night. When you Activate a flare beacon, you can either place it on the ground in a space within your reach or toss it up to 60 feet straight up. A flare beacon in the air falls at a rate of 10 feet per round.

The beacon shines bright light in a 60-foot radius and dim light in the next 60 feet. Creatures within a 10-foot radius of the beacon must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20|name:Fortitude|traits:dazzle] save or be dazzled until they are no longer within 10 feet of it.

Flare Snare.name: Flare Snare
Flare Snare.description: Using bioluminescent matter or alchemical reagents, you rig a short-lived flare to a trip wire or pressure plate. When a Small or larger creature enters the square, this flare shoots into the sky. To creatures with a clear view of the sky, this flare is visible from up to 2 miles away on a clear day or up to 5 miles away on a clear night.

Flask of Fellowship.name: Flask of Fellowship
Flask of Fellowship.description:
This is a metal drinking flask, 4 inches in diameter and 10 inches tall. Its screw top is covered by four simple metal cups that nest together.

Activate Make an Impression

Effect If you share drinks from a flask of fellowship as part of your Make an Impression action, the drink that pours from the flask happens to be exactly what the target of your efforts would most like to have a dram or two of-wine, spirits, hot ginger tea, or ice cold water with lemon, for example. You gain a +1 item bonus on your Diplomacy check.

The GM can disallow the flask's use if it doesn't make sense in the moment for you to pull out a flask and start pouring, if drinks are inappropriate for the occasion, or if your target is absolutely not interested in sharing a drink with you. Drinks from the flask of fellowship are entirely social; they won't intoxicate anyone, nor alleviate serious thirst.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.cjQHrvoXDCGOsptN]{Equipment Effect: Flask of Fellowship}

Flawed Orb of Gold Dragonkind.name: Flawed Orb of Gold Dragonkind
Flawed Orb of Gold Dragonkind.description:
Each of the legendary Orbs of Dragonkind contains the essence and personality of a powerful dragon. The Orb of Gold Dragonkind was the most powerful of them all, until it was shattered by Mengkare's draconic breath. Reconstructed at great expense by enslaved spellcasters toiling under the Scarlet Triad's watch, the Flawed Orb of Gold Dragonkind is a shadow of its prior self, yet it remains a potent weapon against dragons of all types.

While carried, the Flawed Orb of Gold Dragonkind grants its owner resistance 30 to the Breath Weapons of gold dragons. The owner also can sense if there are any dragons within 10f gold dragons. The owner also can sense if there are any dragons within 10 miles, or any gold dragons within 100 miles. When within 1 mile of a dragon, they can determine the direction to the dragon and the dragon's age category (such as young, ancient, or wyrm).

Activate D envision, Interact

Frequency Three times per day

Effect You attempt to overwhelm a dragon's mind-while you cannot control the dragon, you can render it immobile for a short time. Choose a dragon within 60 feet; the dragon can attempt to resist the orb with a @Check[type:will|dc:30] saving throw (or higher with orb shards). Gold dragons take a -4 circumstance penalty to this saving throw. Any stun from this activation ends if the dragon is attacked or otherwise subject to a hostile act other than that of the orb.

Critical Success The dragon is unaffected.

Success The dragon is stunned 3.

Failure The dragon is stunned for as long as the orb's wielder Sustains the Activation.

Critical Failure As failure, but hostile actions don't end the dragon's stun.

Destruction The Flawed Orb of Gold Dragonkind is resilient, but its imperfect nature leaves it vulnerable. It can be damaged or even destroyed by mundane attacks (Hardness 40, HP 200, BT 100). It has weakness 30 to the Breath Weapons and Strikes of gold dragons.

Flaying Knife.name: Flaying Knife
Flaying Knife.description:
This long, thin +1 striking @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.fo6Yhq5mbQXsnZs0]{Wounding} dagger has a smooth edge on one side and a serrated edge on the other.

Its persistent bleed damage comes from slicing away long strips of the target's flesh, and it deals [[/r {1d8}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} on a hit instead of 1d6. A creature takes a -2 status penalty to saving throws against diseases for as long as it has persistent bleed damage from this knife.

Flayleaf.name: Flayleaf
Flayleaf.description:
The flayleaf plant is relatively common, though the mildly euphoric effects of smoking its dried leaves increase when it's sourced from plants specifically grown to produce such effects.

Activate A Interact (Ingested, Inhaled)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:12]

Onset 10 minutes

Maximum Duration 4 hours

Stage 1 +1 item bonus to saving throws against mental effects (1 hour)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} and +1 item bonus to saving throws against mental effects (1 hour)

Stage 3 fatigued and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (1 hour)

Stage 4 fatigued, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}, stupefied 2 (1 hour)

Fleshgem (Combat).name: Fleshgem (Combat)
Fleshgem (Combat).description:
Originally developed as a body modification by oreads, fleshgems are crystals that can be implanted in the skin of a creature of any ancestry. While a fleshgem can be applied anywhere on the body for cosmetic purposes, the most common usage among adventurers is to implant them at the base of the fingers, to be used like brass knuckles.

These pointed crystal shards embedded in your fingers grant you a fist Strike that deals [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 piercing damage}, is in the brawling group, and has the magical and unarmed traits. Combat fleshgems can be enhanced with the effects of handwraps of mighty blows, as normal for an unarmed attack.

Fleshgem (Earthspeaker).name: Fleshgem (Earthspeaker)
Fleshgem (Earthspeaker).description:
Originally developed as a body modification by oreads, fleshgems are crystals that can be implanted in the skin of a creature of any ancestry. While a fleshgem can be applied anywhere on the body for cosmetic purposes, the most common usage among adventurers is to implant them at the base of the fingers, to be used like brass knuckles.

You siphon your fleshgem's power, and the earth around you erupts in crystal stalagmites.

Activate 1 to 2 command

Frequency once per day

Requirements You are standing on the ground

Effect The ground around you erupts in a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] of knee-high crystal shards that remain for 1 round, or 1 minute if you spent two actions. To all creatures other than you, the area is difficult terrain as well as hazardous terrain. Creatures that move through a space containing crystal shards take [[/r {2}[piercing]]]{2 piercing damage}.

Flingflenser.name: Flingflenser
Flingflenser.description: A flingflenser is a goblin-designed weapon ending in an ovoid tube with a hatch and handle on the narrow end. A cluster of circular blades held together and attached to a black powder packet with a thin leather strap serves as ammunition and is loaded through the hatch before being fired with a flintlock or other external ignition mechanism. The flingflenser's sturdy design also places it among the more reliable goblin weapons.

Flint and Steel.name: 燧石和铁片 Flint and Steel
Flint and Steel.description: 如果你有时间捕捉火花，燧石和铁片可以用来生火，尽管在遭遇过程中使用它们通常太费时间。即使在理想的条件下，使用燧石和铁片来生火也需要至少3次动作，并且通常要更长。

Flintlock Musket.name: Flintlock Musket
Flintlock Musket.description: The most commonly available of firearms in Alkenstar, the flintlock musket includes an external firing mechanism and an efficient and relatively compact frame. Though lacking the range and firing power of the arquebus preferred by Alkenstar and Dongun Hold's military members, the flintlock musket is popular among civilians for its ease of use.

Flintlock Pistol.name: Flintlock Pistol
Flintlock Pistol.description: Though less accurate and powerful than a flintlock musket, the flintlock pistol is a preferred weapon of privateers thanks to its more compact size and affordability. Pirate captains often wear a brace of such pistols in a bandolier so they can draw and fire without stopping to reload.

Floating Shield.name: 浮空盾 Floating Shield
Floating Shield.description:
浮空盾上通常画有翅膀图案。这面小圆盾（硬度6，HP24，BT12）能够自动对你展开保护。

启动 A 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 盾牌用魔法飞离你的手臂，在你四周空中环绕飞行，自动为你提供其加值，如同你已举起盾牌一般。

因你没有持握盾牌，因此你无法用该盾牌使用盾牌格挡反应动作，不过你能在两手皆用的情况下获得其常规效果。

1分钟后，浮空盾掉落在地，浮空效果结束。当浮空盾浮空邻接你时，你可用交互动作抓住它，提前结束浮空效果。

Floating Shield (Greater).name: 高等浮空盾 Floating Shield (Greater)
Floating Shield (Greater).description:
浮空盾上通常画有翅膀图案。这面小圆盾（硬度6，HP24，BT12）能够自动对你展开保护。

启动 A 交互

频率 不限

效果 盾牌用魔法飞离你的手臂，在你四周空中环绕飞行，自动为你提供其加值，如同你已举起盾牌一般。

因你没有持握盾牌，因此你无法用该盾牌使用盾牌格挡反应动作，不过你能在两手皆用的情况下获得其常规效果。

1分钟后，浮空盾掉落在地，浮空效果结束。当浮空盾浮空邻接你时，你可用交互动作抓住它，提前结束浮空效果。

Floorbell.name: Floorbell
Floorbell.description:
This surprisingly sturdy 3-foot-by-3-foot clay tile resembles a thick pressure plate. It can support up to 500 pounds of weight atop it before it is destroyed. Thefloorbell'snature is obvious at a glance, but mundane or magical means can obscure or camouflage the tile (such as by covering it in scattered leaves or by casting an @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2oH5IufzdESuYxat]{Illusory Object} spell) to make it harder to detect.

Activate2command, Interact;Effect Thefloorbellmust be activated on level ground. When you do, specify the amount of weight that triggers thefloorbell'salarm system. When the amount of weight you specify (or more) is placed on thefloorbell, it emits an ear-piercing wail clearly audible to a range of 150 feet. Afloorbellcan also ring an alarm if a weight you specify is removed from thefloorbell, such as if you activated it while a heavy sack was on it.

Flying Blade Wheel Snare.name: 飞刃轮圈套 Flying Blade Wheel Snare
Flying Blade Wheel Snare.description: 当一个生物进入该方格，一个布满旋转利刃的致命飞轮从中射出，以+33的攻击调整值进行一次打击Strike，并造成8d8点挥砍伤害。你的每个回合一次，你可以在距离飞轮120尺内的位置使用一个交互Interact动作，令飞轮向该生物飞行Fly最多60尺，如果飞轮移动后距离该生物的距离不大于5尺，那飞轮还能对该生物进行一次打击Strike（译者：这玩意儿就是血滴子吧？）。1分钟后，飞轮停止旋转并落在地上。生物可以试图摧毁飞轮（AC 37，强韧+29，反射+20，HP 200，硬度 10，物品免疫）。

Focus Cathartic (Greater).name: Focus Cathartic (Greater)
Focus Cathartic (Greater).description:
Activate A Interact

Focus briefly calms your neurons, helping ease mental effects. When you drink this elixir, the elixir attempts a counteract check with a [[/r 1d20+19]] counteract modifier to remove the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} condition from a single source, using the source of that condition to determine the counteract level and DC.

Focus Cathartic (Lesser).name: Focus Cathartic (Lesser)
Focus Cathartic (Lesser).description:
Activate A Interact

Focus briefly calms your neurons, helping ease mental effects. When you drink this elixir, the elixir attempts a counteract check with a [[/r 1d20+6]] counteract modifier to remove the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} condition from a single source, using the source of that condition to determine the counteract level and DC.

Focus Cathartic (Major).name: Focus Cathartic (Major)
Focus Cathartic (Major).description:
Activate A Interact

Focus briefly calms your neurons, helping ease mental effects. When you drink this elixir, the elixir attempts a counteract check with a [[/r 1d20+28]] counteract modifier to remove the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} condition from a single source, using the source of that condition to determine the counteract level and DC.

Focus Cathartic (Moderate).name: Focus Cathartic (Moderate)
Focus Cathartic (Moderate).description:
Activate A Interact

Focus briefly calms your neurons, helping ease mental effects. When you drink this elixir, the elixir attempts a counteract check with a [[/r 1d20+8]] counteract modifier to remove the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} condition from a single source, using the source of that condition to determine the counteract level and DC.

Folding Boat.name: Folding Boat
Folding Boat.description:
This simple carved box can fold or unfold into a boat when activated.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Effect The folding boat can take two shapes. The first is a wooden box that's 12 inches long, 6 inches wide, and 4 inches high; it weighs 1 Bulk and can store up to 1 Bulk of items. The other form is a @Compendium[pf2e.vehicles.l0RfYgabnbNoHnkS]{Rowboat}. If the chosen form can't fit in the space, it takes the largest shape that does fit. You can activate the boat again to revert it to its original shape. If the boat is occupied, the item can't be activated. Much like a magical structure, a folding boat can't harm creatures when it unfolds and creatures within it are set aside harmlessly when it folds.

Any items that were stored inside the box appear in the boat or ship. Items stored on the boat or ship form that are too large to fit inside the box form are ejected from the vehicle and appear on the ground adjacent to the box. A folding boat with the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Broken} condition must be repaired before it can change form again.

Folding Boat (Greater).name: Folding Boat (Greater)
Folding Boat (Greater).description:
This simple carved box can fold or unfold into a boat when activated.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Effect The folding boat can take two shapes. The first is a wooden box that's 12 inches long, 6 inches wide, and 4 inches high; it weighs 1 Bulk and can store up to 1 Bulk of items. The other form is a @Compendium[pf2e.vehicles.Qlvei5jjRXdsXUPo]{Cutter}, piloted and crewed by ethereal sailors. The ethereal sailors don't prevent you from activating the boat to return it to a box. If the chosen form can't fit in the space, it takes the largest shape that does fit. You can activate the boat again to revert it to its original shape. If the boat is occupied, the item can't be activated. Much like a magical structure, a folding boat can't harm creatures when it unfolds and creatures within it are set aside harmlessly when it folds.

Any items that were stored inside the box appear in the boat or ship. Items stored on the boat or ship form that are too large to fit inside the box form are ejected from the vehicle and appear on the ground adjacent to the box. A folding boat with the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Broken} condition must be repaired before it can change form again.

Folding Drums.name: Folding Drums
Folding Drums.description:
You can unfold this @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.yw1kPxsdCoDUzOaE]{Musical Instrument (virtuoso percussion instrument)} into a hand drum (1 Bulk), a marching drum set with a shoulder harness and back brace (3 Bulk), or a large standing drum set with a built-in stool (16 Bulk). Changing the folding drum's size is a 3-action Interact activity, and the drums must have sufficient open space to accommodate their new size.

Activate 1 Interact (concentrate)

Frequency once per hour

Effect You play a pounding rhythm on the drum. If the next action you use is to cast a composition cantrip that has an emanation, increase the area of the emanation by 30 feet.

Folding Ladder.name: Folding Ladder
Folding Ladder.description:
Bulk 1 (3 unfolded)

This multi-hinged, 10-foot ladder is useful for climbing upward or across dangerous pits. You can fold or unfold the ladder with two total Interact actions, which don't need to consecutive.

Follypops.name: Follypops
Follypops.description:
Activate 1 Interact

These savory breaded snacks stuffed with cheese, peppers, and "secret ingredients" of draconic or demonic origin are often offered alongside a challenge-complete a full portion and get a free drink. For 1 hour after consuming follypops, your stomach gurgles and rumbles with magical potential. During this time, you can unleash magic in the area up to three times as a single action, which has the concentrate trait, with an area and damage determined by the type of pop; the third time you use this magic, the effects of your follypops end. All creatures within the area must attempt a DC 27 basic saving throw each time you unleash magic, as noted by the type of pop.

Type hotpops

You begin to sweat profusely after consuming the serving. When you unleash magic, you breathe out a blast of fire in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15]. Creatures in the cone take [[/r {4d6}[fire] #first blast]]{4d6 fire damage} with the first blast, [[/r {2d6}[fire] #second blast]]{2d6 fire damage} with the second blast, and [[/r {1d6}[fire] #third blast]]{1d6 fire damage} with the final blast. The creatures must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:27|basic:true|name:Hotpops Follypop|traits:uncommon,fire|showDC:all] for each blast.

Type rotters

Your breath smells of rotting garbage after you consume the serving. When you unleash magic, you exhale a noxious breath in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15]. Creatures in the cone take [[/r {4d6}[poison] #first blast]]{4d6 poison damage} with the first breath, [[/r {2d6}[poison] #second blast]]{2d6 poison damage} with the second breath, and [[/r {1d6}[poison] #third blast]]{1d6 poison damage} with the final breath. The creatures must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:27|basic:true|name:RottersFollypop|traits:uncommon,poison|showDC:all] for each breath.

Type sizzlers

Your skin crawls and your hair stands on end after consuming the serving. When you unleash magic, you release a bolt of lightning from your hand that travels in a @Template[type:line|distance:30]. The first bolt deals [[/r {2d12}[electricity] #first jolt]]{2d12 electricity damage}, the second [[/r {1d12}[electricity] #second jolt]]{1d12 electricity damage}, and the third [[/r {1d6}[electricity] #third jolt]]{1d6 electricity damage}. The targeted creatures must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:27|basic:true|name:Sizzlers Follypop|traits:uncommon,electricity|showDC:all] for each bolt.

Force Shield.name: 力能盾 Force Shield
Force Shield.description:
这面精心锻造的铁盾（硬度8，HP32，BT16）边缘镶嵌有彩色式样的小玻璃块。

启动 A 命令

频率 每天一次

效果 力能盾在你周围张开一层力场泡来保护你，在1分钟内提供5点物理伤害抗力。力场泡在你不再手持力能盾后消失。

Force Tiles.name: Force Tiles
Force Tiles.description:
Activate Cast a Spell

Light refracts in strange ways through these precisely ground glass tiles, lengthening the refracted force and causing it to push back. Adding this catalyst to a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.7Iela4GgVeO3LfAo]{Wall of Force} spell increases the wall's maximum length to 80 feet and maximum height to 40 feet and causes creatures that try to move into the wall's space (or are Shoved into the wall) to take [[/r {2d6}[force]]]{2d6 force damage}.

Forensic Dye.name: Forensic Dye
Forensic Dye.description:
Activate 1 Interact

Activating this vial of colorless liquid requires inserting a small amount of another chemical or material, such as blood or mud. The vial reacts rapidly, transforming into a murky, reddish-brown substance.

Once activated, the dye remains potent for up to 10 minutes, during which time you can spend 1 minute to brush it onto a single object of up to 1 Bulk or across the ground in a single 5-foot square. Where the dye comes in contact with an exact match for the activating chemical, it takes on a bright blue hue, while staying transparent in areas where there is no activating component present.

Forge Warden.name: 熔炉守卫 Forge Warden
Forge Warden.description:
锻造之神托拉格的印记——一柄矮人式样战锤——雕刻在这面铁盾（硬度6，HP24，BT12）正面。这面盾是托拉格的圣徽。

当你举起该盾时，你和邻接你的盟友获得5点火焰抗力。当你使用盾牌格挡时，熔炉守卫发出如同锤打在铁毡上的声音，圣徽如同点燃的火炉般闪亮。

启动 F 命令 (火)

触发 你用熔炉守卫盾牌格挡了邻接敌人的攻击且盾受到了伤害

效果 攻击者受到2d6点火焰伤害。

Forgefather's Seal.name: Forgefather's Seal
Forgefather's Seal.description:
This rune was created by Torag, god of the forge, protection, and strategy, and shared with his greatest artisans and warriors. Torag designed a small number of these seals as gifts to allied good deities; each one is nearly identical but has a different spell effect when using the reaction activation; for instance, Sarenrae's seal casts sunburst instead of earthquake.

A seal constantly rings with the quiet sound of a hammer striking an anvil when etched onto a runestone. A Forgefather's seal can be etched only onto armor that can bear two or more property runes, and it is so powerful that it takes the place of two property runes. While wearing armor etched with a Forgefather's seal, you gain fire resistance 40. You ignore the armor's check penalty and Speed penalty (if any); if the armor is light or medium, increase its item bonus to AC by 1. In addition, any shield you wield automatically recovers 10 Hit Points at the start of your turn each round.

Activate R Interact

Frequency once per hour

Trigger You are hit by an attack

Effect The Forgefather's seal glows and your armor shakes as it absorbs the blow. The attack's damage is reduced by 100 and you cast earthquake (DC 40), centered directly on the triggering creature. You decide the area of the earthquake when you Cast the Spell, from as small as the size of the creature and up to a @Template[type:burst|distance:60].

Activate T Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You call upon on the restorative powers of the seal to repair an item within reach. The rune instantly restores the item to full Hit Points, even if the item was destroyed, using the effects of the remake spell, so long as the majority of the item is available for the repair. The seal can restore even magic items and artifacts of its level or lower. Once you have used this ability, the seal's ability to automatically repair shields becomes inactive until the next time you make your daily preparations.

Activate F envision

Trigger You have not acted yet on your turn

Effect You call upon Torag to defend your allies and those around you, sacrificing yourself in the process. Creatures of your choosing within 60 feet recover all their Hit Points. If any of the creatures are dead, they are instead brought back to life with half of their maximum Hit Points. The chosen creatures also gain a +4 status bonus to AC and saving throws, and fast healing 15 for 1 hour. You can use this ability to bring back to life a creature that requires a miracle spell or divine intervention to raise from the dead, as long as you choose no other creatures within 60 feet to recover. Once you use this activation, you are turned into a perfect statue made from stone or metal that depicts you in a glorious pose honoring your sacrifice, and you can never be restored. The Forgefather's seal remains on this statue and can be transferred to another suit of armor or a runestone as normal.

Destruction Using the Forgefather's seal ability to bring the dead back to life on an evil demigod causes it to shatter in a violent explosion that destroys the seal and the statue made as part of the sacrifice, erasing all knowledge of the user from existence. It does, however, bring the evil demigod back to life.

Forgetful Ink.name: Forgetful Ink
Forgetful Ink.description:
Activate 1 Interact

Used to write secret messages, a single dose of forgetful ink is enough to pen a page of text, often with flourishes extending to the page's edges. Anyone handling the page is exposed to the poison. This includes casual reading, unless the reader specifically takes precautions not to physically touch it. Unlike other poisons, forgetful ink retains its potency for one year, regardless of the number of victims exposed.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20|traits:secret] (secret)

Onset 1 minute

Stage 1 The reader forgets the contents of the writing, recalling it as blank or as inconsequential text.

Forgotten Shell.name: Forgotten Shell
Forgotten Shell.description:
This +2 resilient @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Gq1cZWSKOtJhKd2p]{Full Plate}, crafted from grim plates of iron, covers the entire body except for small holes for the eyes and mouth.

While wearing the armor, you gain the benefits of a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{Nondetection} spell. Additionally, creatures attempting to Recall Knowledge about a subject involving you must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:30]. On a success, they can attempt the check normally. On a failure, they can still attempt the check, but even if they successfully Recall Knowledge, they don't remember you (although they might remember other details about the event). Creatures that fail their save can make another attempt to Recall Knowledge about you, but they must wait 24 hours to do so.

You can spend 1 hour using blacksmithing tools to bind a helpless Medium humanoid inside the suit, which welds the suit shut and makes it impossible to remove without breaking it (Hardness 9, HP 36, BT 18). The humanoid inside the suit counts as being Invested while bound in this fashion and can't break out of the suit on its own. If the suit is welded shut, the creature gains the benefits above but also the following penalties:

  • Whenever the humanoid attempts a Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, or Performance check, they must roll twice and use the worse result.
  • Additionally, creatures the humanoid encounters have an initial attitude toward them of one degree worse than they normally would (for instance, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.I1ffBVISxLr2gC4u]{Unfriendly} instead of @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fuG8dgthlDWfWjIA]{Indifferent}).
  • Good creatures are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying, wielding, or wearing this item crafted by the sea-witches.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of Nondetection and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KSAEhNfZyXMO7Z7V]{Outcast's Curse}.

Forked Bipod.name: Forked Bipod
Forked Bipod.description: Developed by Alkenstar scouts who often don't have time to break down a tripod when beset by the chaotic mutant monsters of the Mana Wastes, this two-pronged stabbing weapon can be used as a bipod to stabilize a gun with potent kickback. A forked bipod can be deployed or retrieved for use as a melee weapon as an Interact action.

Formula Book (Blank).name: 公式手册 Formula Book (Blank)
Formula Book (Blank).description: 公式手册中包含制作本章中除常用装备以外的物品所必需的公式，炼金术士通常能够免费得到一本。每个公式手册可以容纳最多100个不同物品的公式。公式也可以出现在羊皮纸、黑板和几乎任何其他介质上，只要你可以参阅它们就不需要将它们抄写到特定的书中。

Formulated Sunlight.name: Formulated Sunlight
Formulated Sunlight.description: A leshy can derive nourishment from specially formulated bottles of sunlight instead of natural sunlight.

Fortification.name: 护命 Fortification
Fortification.description: 护命符文对最致命的攻击提供防护。你在穿戴该护甲时每次被重击，都可进行一次DC17的纯骰检定。若成功，该次攻击变为普通命中。该性能会加厚护甲，增加护甲的负载1点，克服减值所需的力量增加2点。

Fortification (Greater).name: 高等护命 Fortification (Greater)
Fortification (Greater).description: 护命符文对最致命的攻击提供防护。你在穿戴该护甲时每次被重击，都可进行一次DC14的纯骰检定。若成功，该次攻击变为普通命中。该性能会加厚护甲，增加护甲的负载1点，克服减值所需的力量增加2点。

Fortifying Pebble.name: Fortifying Pebble
Fortifying Pebble.description:
Activate F envision

Trigger The affixed object would take damage

This small pebble is strangely dense and surprisingly durable, affixed to an object by a sturdy steel chain. When you activate the pebble, the affixed object takes 10 less damage.

Four-Ways Dogslicer.name: Four-Ways Dogslicer
Four-Ways Dogslicer.description:
This +2 striking dogslicer is obviously the work of a brilliant but scrappy artisan who valued versatility over safety. Four toothy gems line the blade's cutting edge, three of which glow-one with fiery red light, one with a chill blue, and one that gives off sparks-while the last is a glistening black. Each of these gems embodies a weapon property rune, but only one rune can be active at a time.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect You twist the gem along the blade corresponding with the desired weapon rune: red for flaming, blue for frost, or yellow for shock. You take 1d6 damage of the type the chosen rune deals. You can instead twist the black gem to disable the active property rune, taking no damage.

Fox Marble.name: Fox Marble
Fox Marble.description:
A gumiho wears a strange green amulet around its neck. This fox marble stores all of the gumiho's knowledge. By focusing on the marble, a gumiho can perfectly recall anything it has experienced in its lifetime. A creature who manages to steal a gumiho's fox marble is lucky indeed, for they can also use it to access the gumiho's memories. However, if the gumiho still lives, the vengeful fox will stop at nothing to recover its marble.

Whoever wears a fox marble gains a +2 item bonus to all checks to Recall Knowledge.

Freezing Ammunition.name: Freezing Ammunition
Freezing Ammunition.description:
Activate 1 Interact

This chilly ammunition is dark blue and cold to the touch. When activated freezing ammunition hits a target, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19] save or be slowed 1 for 1 round by the intense cold (slowed 1 for 1 minute on a critical failure).

Frenzy Oil.name: Frenzy Oil
Frenzy Oil.description:
This oil, which is pressed from vrock spores and mixed with a combination of acacia ash and thistle seeds, seeps into the skin of living creatures, initially inspiring irritability that unpredictably manifests as berserk rage.

Activate A Interact (Contact)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:37]

Onset [[/r 1d6]] minutes

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r {4d6}[mental]]]{4d6 mental damage}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened 1}, attack nearby creatures as if @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r {6d6}[mental]]]{6d6 mental damage}, attack nearby creatures as if confused (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r {8d6}[mental]]]{8d6 mental damage}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}, attack nearby creatures as if confused (1 round)

Frog Chair.name: Frog Chair
Frog Chair.description:
This clockwork traveler's chair is shaped like a wheeled frog, with springs attached to the bottom and an extensible tongue on the front.

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect You activate the wheelchair's springs to make hopping leaps. For 1 minute, whenever you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap} with the wheelchair, you can jump 30 feet in any direction without touching the ground. You must land on a space of solid ground within 30 feet of you, or else you fall after using your next action.

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency Once per minute

Effect You activate the wheelchair's tongue to grab a nearby object and bring it to you. @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to pick up an unattended object within 15 feet and bring it to your empty hand. If you don't have a hand to take the object, it falls in your space instead.

Frost.name: 冻寒 Frost
