This +1 striking returning starknife is made of dark blue metal overlaid with smoky flecks of fused quartz. When you Cast an evocation Spell, your next attack this turn with this starknife reduces the target's cover, changing greater cover to standard cover or ignoring standard and lesser cover.

Activate r envision

Frequency once per 10 minutes

Trigger You successfully Strike a creature with a thrown Strike with guiding star

Effect Soft light outlines the target. At the beginning of your next turn, the guiding star's blades detach and form into darts of starlight, flying up to 40 feet and striking the target unerringly, collectively dealing [[/r {4}[piercing]]]{4 piercing damage} and [[/r {1}[good]]]{1 good damage} before re-forming. The piercing damage increases to [[/r {6}[piercing]]]{6 piercing damage} with a greater striking rune and [[/r {8}[piercing]]]{8 piercing damage} with a major striking rune.

Guisarme.name: 长勾刀 Guisarme
Guisarme.description: 这种长兵通常有长长的单边曲刃，刀刃钝侧伸出一个钩子，可以让使用者在一定距离外摔绊对手。它的柄通常有8英尺长。

Gun Sword.name: Gun Sword
Gun Sword.description: This weapon consists of a large sword with a powerful gun based on a harmona gun down the center. Vanguards and other characters who rely on Strength and Dexterity enjoy the power and flexibility of a gun sword.

Gunner's Bandolier.name: Gunner's Bandolier
Gunner's Bandolier.description:
This incredibly spacious bandolier can hold up to 4 one-handed crossbows or firearms that take no more than 1 action to completely reload (typically meaning that weapons with the capacity or repeating traits won't fit in the bandolier's holsters). A gunner's bandolier can be etched with runes as though it were a ranged weapon. When you invest the gunner's bandolier, you can attune it to each of the 4 weapons holstered in it.

Activate 1 envision

Effect You empower one of the attuned weapons in the bandolier, granting it the runes etched onto the gunner's bandolier and removing the runes from any previously drawn weapon. Then, you Interact to draw the weapon.

Activate 3 envision

Effect All weapons that were attuned to the bandolier when you invested it, not including any weapons you're currently wielding, return to the bandolier, and one of the returned weapons is automatically reloaded.

Gunner's Saddle.name: Gunner's Saddle
Gunner's Saddle.description: Developed by marauders from the Mana Wastes, this clockwork saddle comes with a retractable weapon mount that can be used as a tripod to stabilize a weapon with the kickback trait. Just like a normal tripod, you Interact to deploy the tripod to stabilize the firearm, and then again to retract the tripod to move it. The saddle uses complex hydraulics to protect the steed from the firearm's recoil.

Habu's Cudgel.name: Habu's Cudgel
Habu's Cudgel.description:
Long associated with a notorious crime boss in Nantambu, this stout +1 striking fearsome club is studded with vicious-looking knobs of obsidian and wrapped in cloth for a better grip. It emits a ghastly groan when swung.

Activate 2 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You gesture at a square within 40 feet with Habu's Cudgel. The club causes a frightful wail to unleash from that square and casts @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4koZzrnMXhhosn0D]{Fear} (@Check[type:will|dc:24|name:Habu's Cudgel Fear|traits:enchantment,evocation,emotion,fear,mental,unique]) targeting the creature in that square and all adjacent creatures.

Hag Eye.name: Hag Eye
Hag Eye.description:
This item appears to be an ordinary semiprecious stone and is typically mounted on a brooch or ring, but the stone is, in fact, an eyeball. This illusion can be seen through with true seeing or similar magic, and anyone who interacts with the item feels its wet and sticky surface, allowing them to attempt to disbelieve the illusion (DC 19). Many hags claim a hag eye is more effective if plucked from a living, awake creature, but this is likely just a convenient excuse for sadism.

The hag eye produces no direct benefit for the wearer, but allows the hag who created it, or any member of her coven, can peer through the eye using the Seek action. This has no range limit, provided the hag is on the same plane.

Any damage dealt to the eye destroys it. If this happens while a hag is looking through it, the hag is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 hour.

Craft Requirements You must be a hag.

Hail of Arrows Snare.name: 箭雨圈套 Hail of Arrows Snare
Hail of Arrows Snare.description: 当一个生物进入圈套的方格，圈套会释放出数以百计精心准备的箭矢，对圈套方格周围20尺范围进行散射，造成 [[/r {18d6}[piercing]]]{18d6 穿刺伤害}。范围内的生物必须尝试一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:37|basic:true|traits:piercing] 豁免。

Halberd.name: 戟 Halberd
Halberd.description: 这种长兵相对较短，只有5英尺长。使用的那头是带长钉的斧头。

Half Plate.name: 半身甲 Half Plate
Half Plate.description: 半身甲由大部分全身甲的上半身板件组成，用较轻或较薄的钢板保护臂和腿。它既提供了一部分全身甲的保护，同时兼顾了更大的灵活性和速度。这种盔甲包含一套内衬的布甲（见下文）和一双手套。

Halfling Sling Staff.name: 半身人投石杖 Halfling Sling Staff
Halfling Sling Staff.description: 木杖末端是Y型分岔，挂着一根吊索。当用双手通过吊索投掷石块或弹丸时，长杖提供了极好的杠杆作用力。

Hammer Gun.name: Hammer Gun
Hammer Gun.description: This weapon, favored by dwarves and those who like smashing and shooting, takes the form of a stoutly built gun designed similarly to an arquebus with a hammer head built into the muzzle, decreasing kickback but limiting range.

Hampering Snare.name: 妨碍圈套 Hampering Snare
Hampering Snare.description: 你利用灌木、绳索、粘油或其他材料来妨碍生物的移动。当第一个生物踏入圈套所在的方格内时，圈套方格以及3个邻接方格（构成一个10尺的方形区域）会变成困难地形。这些困难地形会立刻影响该生物的移动，包括触发该圈套的移动，并在触发之后维持 [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 轮}。一个生物可以使用一次交互Interact动作提前清理一格困难地形。

Hand Adze.name: Hand Adze
Hand Adze.description: This is a smaller version of an adze, useful for more delicate woodworking or projects in cramped spaces. Gripplis use the hand adze for crafting and as close quarters weapons.

Hand Cannon.name: Hand Cannon
Hand Cannon.description: Popular among privateers and mercenaries in Goka, hand cannons are little more than a hardened tube with a handle and external ignition attached. A hand cannon can be used to fire almost anything that can be packed into its barrel. The wielder of a hand cannon can change the damage type granted by its modular trait as part of the same Interact action used to reload.

Hand Crossbow.name: 手弩 Hand Crossbow
Hand Crossbow.description: 有时被游荡者和暴徒称为小巷弓，这种小型弩时常用来发射喂毒的小型矢。因为足够小，可以单手使用，但装填依然需要双手。

Hand of the Mage.name: 法师之手 Hand of the Mage
Hand of the Mage.description:
这只木乃伊一样的精灵手挂在一只金色锁链上，其手指扭曲成了一个怪异的形状。

启动 D 命令，想象

效果 你施展 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.pwzdSlJgYqN7bs2w]{法师之手 Mage Hand}。

Handcuffs (Average).name: Handcuffs (Average)
Handcuffs (Average).description:
Developed in Absalom and rarely used except by police forces in major cities due to their significant cost, handcuffs possess a ratcheting lock system in each cuff that allows them to be quickly cinched down on a captive's limbs, even if they're actively resisting.

To apply handcuffs, you must first grab or restrain your opponent, then attempt an Athletics check against the opponent's Fortitude DC. On a success, you lock one of the cuffs around your opponent's wrist. You can lock the other cuff to yourself or a stationary object within reach as an Interact action; to lock it to another creature (either the same opponent you just cuffed or a separate creature altogether), you must first grab or restrain that creature, as before, and then make an Athletics check against its Fortitude DC. The DC to make the Athletics check against your own wrist is 5, or 10 for an unattended object.

If you bind a creature to itself, it takes the same penalties as those imposed by manacles. If you bind a creature to another creature (including yourself), the two creatures are locked together and must remain in adjacent spaces, and both creatures gain the clumsy 1 condition as long as they are handcuffed. If you lock a creature to an immobile object, such as a bar or tree, the creature is immobilized. (For creatures with an unusual physiology such as more or fewer limbs, the GM determines what effects handcuffs have, if any.)

Handcuffs are unlocked via a key and are easier to slip out of than ordinary manacles. The chain between handcuffs can be Broken Open with a single Athletics check.

Escaping requires two successful DC 27 Thievery checks, and the Athletics DC to Break Open the chain between handcuffs is 30.

Handcuffs (Good).name: Handcuffs (Good)
Handcuffs (Good).description:
Developed in Absalom and rarely used except by police forces in major cities due to their significant cost, handcuffs possess a ratcheting lock system in each cuff that allows them to be quickly cinched down on a captive's limbs, even if they're actively resisting.

To apply handcuffs, you must first grab or restrain your opponent, then attempt an Athletics check against the opponent's Fortitude DC. On a success, you lock one of the cuffs around your opponent's wrist. You can lock the other cuff to yourself or a stationary object within reach as an Interact action; to lock it to another creature (either the same opponent you just cuffed or a separate creature altogether), you must first grab or restrain that creature, as before, and then make an Athletics check against its Fortitude DC. The DC to make the Athletics check against your own wrist is 5, or 10 for an unattended object.

If you bind a creature to itself, it takes the same penalties as those imposed by manacles. If you bind a creature to another creature (including yourself), the two creatures are locked together and must remain in adjacent spaces, and both creatures gain the clumsy 1 condition as long as they are handcuffed. If you lock a creature to an immobile object, such as a bar or tree, the creature is immobilized. (For creatures with an unusual physiology such as more or fewer limbs, the GM determines what effects handcuffs have, if any.)

Handcuffs are unlocked via a key and are easier to slip out of than ordinary manacles. The chain between handcuffs can be Broken Open with a single Athletics check.

Escaping requires three successful DC 30 Thievery checks, and the Athletics DC to Break Open the chain between handcuffs is 35.

Handcuffs (Superior).name: Handcuffs (Superior)
Handcuffs (Superior).description:
Developed in Absalom and rarely used except by police forces in major cities due to their significant cost, handcuffs possess a ratcheting lock system in each cuff that allows them to be quickly cinched down on a captive's limbs, even if they're actively resisting.

To apply handcuffs, you must first grab or restrain your opponent, then attempt an Athletics check against the opponent's Fortitude DC. On a success, you lock one of the cuffs around your opponent's wrist. You can lock the other cuff to yourself or a stationary object within reach as an Interact action; to lock it to another creature (either the same opponent you just cuffed or a separate creature altogether), you must first grab or restrain that creature, as before, and then make an Athletics check against its Fortitude DC. The DC to make the Athletics check against your own wrist is 5, or 10 for an unattended object.

If you bind a creature to itself, it takes the same penalties as those imposed by manacles. If you bind a creature to another creature (including yourself), the two creatures are locked together and must remain in adjacent spaces, and both creatures gain the clumsy 1 condition as long as they are handcuffed. If you lock a creature to an immobile object, such as a bar or tree, the creature is immobilized. (For creatures with an unusual physiology such as more or fewer limbs, the GM determines what effects handcuffs have, if any.)

Handcuffs are unlocked via a key and are easier to slip out of than ordinary manacles. The chain between handcuffs can be Broken Open with a single Athletics check.

Escaping requires four successful DC 40 Thievery checks, and the Athletics DC to Break Open the chain between handcuffs is 45.

Handwraps of Mighty Blows.name: 重拳缠手带 Handwraps of Mighty Blows
Handwraps of Mighty Blows.description:
在你绑定这些刺绣的布带时，你必须慢慢仔细地将其包裹住你的双手。这些缠手带可以附加武器符文，为你的无武装攻击提供符文带来的好处，使其如魔法武器一般工作。例如，+1强击重拳缠手带能够为你的无武装攻击的攻击骰提供+1物品加值，并将你的无武装攻击的伤害从一个武器骰提升至两个（通常是从1d4提升至2d4，但如果你的拳头有着不同的武器伤害骰，或者你有其他类型的无武装攻击，则使用那个武器伤害骰）。

你可以升级或添加缠手带上的符文，你也可以将符文转移到缠手带上，或将其从缠手带上转移出去，就如你处理一件武器一样。你也可以在缠手带上附加护符。在这些情况下，你需要将缠手带视为一件近战武器，属于搏击武器组，并具有轻负载。性能符文只能应用在你所使用的符合条件的无武装攻击上。例如，一个必须应用在挥砍武器上的性能符文不会作用于你的拳头攻击，但如果你使用爪击或其他挥砍无武装攻击，你就能得到该符文的好处。

Hardened Harrow Deck.name: Hardened Harrow Deck
Hardened Harrow Deck.description:
The harrow is a traditional fortunetelling deck used by Varisian soothsayers. The hardened harrow deck is a magical version of the deck with cards made of thin metallic plates adorned with all the imagery common in standard harrow decks, but with more angular designs. You can hurl cards from the hardened harrow deck as +2 greater striking darts with the deadly d10 trait. A card used as a weapon isn't destroyed and can be recovered with 1 minute of searching if it can't be recalled back to the deck (see the deck's Activate entry below). However, if even a single card is missing from the deck, the deck can't be used to perform a traditional harrow reading.

As long as you carry more than half the cards in the hardened harrow deck, when you roll a success on a saving throw against a fear effect, you get a critical success instead; if you already have an ability that would make a successful saving throw against a fear effect a critical success, you instead gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against fear effects.

Activate 1 command, Interact

Effect All cards from the hardened harrow deck within 60 feet that you can see fly back into the deck.

Harmona Gun.name: Harmona Gun
Harmona Gun.description: A favored weapon of monster hunters in Arcadia, the harmona gun is a large-bore long gun that fires a heavy, slow-moving round. The gun got its name due to the eerie similarity between the buzzing sound its oversized projectiles make flying through the air and the flight of a fey bird called a harmona.

Harmonic Hauberk.name: Harmonic Hauberk
Harmonic Hauberk.description:
Rose gold and copper rings in this +2 resilient chain shirt form a vague bird shape. The jingling links tinkle musically, almost like birdsong. While you wear the armor, effects with the auditory trait must first counteract the harmonic hauberk or they have no effect on you.

The harmonic hauberk attempts to counteract @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gIdDLrbswTV3OBJy]{Silence} spells cast on you and 4th‑level or higher heightened silence spells the first time the armor enters their area (counteract level 4, counteract modifier [[/r 1d20+20 #Counteract]]{+20}). After failing to counteract a silence spell, the armor can't attempt to counteract the same spell again, even if you leave and enter the spell's area multiple times.

Activate 1 command

Frequency once per day

Requirements You have a pool of Focus Points and at least one composition spell

Effect You gain 1 Focus Point and immediately use the Focus Point to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.irTdhxTixU9u9YUm]{Lingering Composition}, using your Performance check to determine the effects of the spell, followed by the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.bH0kPuf7UKxRvi2P]{Inspire Defense}. You can use this activation to cast those spells even if you don't have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sVjATEo8eqkAosNp]{Lingering Composition} or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sahJHnojXO9eEXVE]{Inspire Defense} feats.

Harrow Carrying Case.name: Harrow Carrying Case
Harrow Carrying Case.description: This elegant wooden case contains a recessed section to hold a simple or common harrow deck and a harrow mat. The case features a watertight seal to protect its contents from the elements and everyday wear and tear.

Harrow Deck (Common).name: Harrow Deck (Common)
Harrow Deck (Common).description:
Used by gamblers and seers alike, this deck of cards comes in several varieties.

Common harrow decks are made from higher-quality paper and feature illustrations-harrow readers typically use these decks.

Harrow Deck (Fine).name: Harrow Deck (Fine)
Harrow Deck (Fine).description:
Used by gamblers and seers alike, this deck of cards comes in several varieties.

Fine harrow decks are made from a variety of materials, such as high-quality paper, woods, bone, ivory, or metal.

Harrow Deck (Simple).name: Harrow Deck (Simple)
Harrow Deck (Simple).description:
Used by gamblers and seers alike, this deck of cards comes in several varieties.

Simple harrow decks are made from low-quality paper and typically have only an icon and a number to signify the suit and alignment. These simple decks are mostly used for games of chance, as the actual image and significance of the cards are irrelevant for such games.

Harrow Mat.name: Harrow Mat
Harrow Mat.description: This leather mat bears intricate designs and symbols embossed into them to enhance the mystique of a harrow reading. The mat provides a +1 item bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, and relevant Lore checks (such as Fortune-Telling Lore or Harrow Lore) to convince a creature that a harrow reading was accurate.

Hat of Disguise.name: 易容帽 Hat of Disguise
Hat of Disguise.description:
这顶平凡的帽子让你能够在幻术中隐藏自己。

启动 1 分钟 (交互)

频率 每天一次

效果 这顶帽子对你施展1环的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{易容幻影 Illusory Disguise}。当你设置易容效果时，你可以将帽子的外观魔幻地变成梳子、丝带、头盔或其他类型的头饰。

Hat of Disguise (Greater).name: 高等易容帽 Hat of Disguise (Greater)
Hat of Disguise (Greater).description:
这顶平凡的帽子让你能够在幻术中隐藏自己。

启动 D 交互

频率 每天任意次

效果 这顶帽子对你施展2环的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{易容幻影 Illusory Disguise}。当你设置易容效果时，你可以将帽子的外观魔幻地变成梳子、丝带、头盔或其他类型的头饰。

Hat of Many Minds.name: Hat of Many Minds
Hat of Many Minds.description:
This pointy, brimmed hat made up of a rainbow patchwork of various materials seems to sit just a little lopsided on your head, no matter how you adjust it. You gain a +2 item bonus to checks to Earn Income.

Activate 3 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You tear off a patch of cloth to manifest it into a copy of yourself, dressed in the color and fabric of the patch. The copy follows your specific instructions and performs a single, straightforward task for up to 30 minutes. It takes the copy three times as long to complete the task as it would you, meaning it can perform a task that would take you a maximum of 10 minutes. It doesn't react quickly enough to be of any use during an encounter, and it can't use your spells or other special abilities-just basic actions and skill actions.

The copy disappears and returns to the hat as a piece of cloth when the given task has been completed, or when you Dismiss the activation.

Hat of the Magi.name: 贤士之帽 Hat of the Magi
Hat of the Magi.description:
这顶帽子有着许多形态，例如多彩的包头巾或者有帽檐的尖头帽，上面描绘了一些记号和符文。它能为你在奥法Arcana检定上提供+1物品加值，并能让你以奥术内在法术的形式施展@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Qw3fnUlaUbnn7ipC]{魔法伎俩 Prestidigitation}戏法。

自动生效:

  • 奥法Arcana检定获得+1物品加值

Hat of the Magi (Greater).name: 高等贤士之帽 Hat of the Magi (Greater)
Hat of the Magi (Greater).description:
这顶帽子有着许多形态，例如多彩的包头巾或者有帽檐的尖头帽，上面描绘了一些记号和符文。它能为你在奥法Arcana检定上提供+2物品加值，并能让你以奥术内在法术的形式施展 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Qw3fnUlaUbnn7ipC]{魔法伎俩 Prestidigitation}戏法。

启动 T 施放法术

频率 每天一次

效果 你施展4环奥术 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.lpT6LotUaQPfinjj]{召唤元素 Summon Elemental}。

自动生效:

  • 奥法Arcana检定获得+2物品加值

Hatchet.name: 短柄斧 Hatchet
Hatchet.description: 这种小斧头可用于近战或投掷。

Hauling.name: Hauling
Hauling.description:
Hauling weapons are adept at moving creatures around the battlefield after a successful attack.

Activate R Command

Frequency once per hour

Trigger You succeed at an attack roll to Strike with a weapon with the hauling rune

Effect The target must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:20|name:Hauling Rune] save or be moved 5 feet in a direction you choose. This is forced movement.

Hauling (Greater).name: Hauling (Greater)
Hauling (Greater).description:
Hauling weapons are adept at moving creatures around the battlefield after a successful attack.

Activate R Command

Frequency once per hour

Trigger You succeed at an attack roll to Strike with a weapon with the hauling rune

Effect The target must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:28|name:Hauling Rune] save or be moved 10 feet in a direction you choose. This is forced movement.

Headband of Inspired Wisdom.name: 卓越感知头带 Headband of Inspired Wisdom
Headband of Inspired Wisdom.description:
无论环境如何，这条简约的头带始终保持崭新和干净。若绑定了该头冠，你能将你的感知Wisdom提升2点，或将其提升至18点，选择结果更高的选项。

启动 A 想象

频率 每天一次

效果 当你思考着接下来的行动时，你会对行动结果的好坏产生一个直觉。你获得一次 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{占卜术 Augury} 的效果，除了你获得的结果是来自于直觉而非外界的存在。

启动 R 想象 (幸运)

频率 每小时一次

触发 你在对抗使你困惑Confused、迷魂Fascinated、呆滞Stupefied的效果的一次豁免检定中失败

效果 卓越感知头带洗涤了你的心灵。你可以重骰这次豁免检定，并使用更好的结果。

Headbands of Translocation.name: Headbands of Translocation
Headbands of Translocation.description:
These silk headbands always come in pairs and usually feature a prominent symbol of a nation or team. If both wearers Invest their headbands at the same time and think of the same symbol while doing so, both headbands change to display that symbol until they are removed. As long as you both have Invested your headbands, you can Aid each other without taking an action to prepare and when you get a critical failure when attempting to Aid an ally with a paired headband, you get a failure instead.

Activate 2 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You remove your headband, which teleports you to a space adjacent to the other Invested wearer's location, if you are within 1 mile of each other.

Healer's Gel (Greater).name: Healer's Gel (Greater)
Healer's Gel (Greater).description:
Activate Cast a Spell

An astringent aroma from rare succulent plants wafts off these soothing cloth patches. Adding this material component to a heal spell bestows an additional 15 temporary Hit Points to one target healed by the spell. These temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.6dsPjRKjCPd9BWPt]{Equipment Effect: Greater Healer's Gel}

Healer's Gel (Lesser).name: Healer's Gel (Lesser)
Healer's Gel (Lesser).description:
Activate Cast a Spell

An astringent aroma from rare succulent plants wafts off these soothing cloth patches. Adding this material component to a heal spell bestows an additional 5 temporary Hit Points to one target healed by the spell. These temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.sOwAqyQ6MaoSqaY1]{Equipment Effect: Lesser Healer's Gel}

Healer's Gel (Moderate).name: Healer's Gel (Moderate)
Healer's Gel (Moderate).description:
Activate Cast a Spell

An astringent aroma from rare succulent plants wafts off these soothing cloth patches. Adding this material component to a heal spell bestows an additional 10 temporary Hit Points to one target healed by the spell. These temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.M3EFomnN5xArdQmV]{Equipment Effect: Moderate Healer's Gel}

Healer's Gloves.name: 医者手套 Healer's Gloves
Healer's Gloves.description:
这双干净的白手套永远不会粘上血迹，即使正在用来缝合伤口或治疗其他疾病时。它们在医疗Medicine检定上提供+1物品加值。

启动 A 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你能愈合一个自愿、存活且邻接的生物的伤口，为其恢复 [[/r {2d6+7}[healing] #Healer's Gloves]]{2d6+7生命值}。这是一个正能量的治疗效果。你不能利用这次治疗伤害不死生物。

自动生效:

  • 医疗Medicine检定获得+1物品加值

Healer's Gloves (Greater).name: 高等医者手套 Healer's Gloves (Greater)
Healer's Gloves (Greater).description:
这双干净的白手套永远不会粘上血迹，即使正在用来缝合伤口或治疗其他疾病时。它们在医疗Medicine检定上提供+2物品加值。

启动 A 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你能愈合一个自愿、存活且邻接的生物的伤口，为其恢复 [[/r {4d6+15}[healing] #Healer's Gloves (Greater)]]{4d6+15生命值}。这是一个正能量的治疗效果。你不能利用这次治疗伤害不死生物。

自动生效:

  • 医疗Medicine检定获得+2物品加值

Healer's Tools.name: 医疗工具 Healer's Tools
Healer's Tools.description: 这套绷带、草药和缝合工具是进行急救、治疗疾病、治疗毒药或治疗伤害的医疗检定所必需的。

Healer's Tools (Expanded).name: 医疗工具(专家) Healer's Tools (Expanded)
Healer's Tools (Expanded).description:
这套绷带、草药和缝合工具是进行急救、治疗疾病、治疗毒药或治疗伤害的医疗检定所必需的。专家级医疗工具为此类检定提供+1物品加值。当你将这套工具转移地点时，你可以用口袋或药水带来随身携带这些组件。

自动生效:

  • 进行急救、治疗疾病、治疗毒药或治疗伤害的医疗检定+1物品加值

Healing Potion (Greater).name: 高等治疗药水 Healing Potion (Greater)
Healing Potion (Greater).description: 治疗药水Healing Potion是一瓶宝石红色的液体，饮用者的伤口会迅速康复，并带来一阵刺痛。当你喝下治疗药水Healing Potion后，你恢复 [[/r {6d8+20}[healing]]]{6d8+20 生命值}.

Healing Potion (Lesser).name: 次等治疗药水 Healing Potion (Lesser)
Healing Potion (Lesser).description: 治疗药水Healing Potion是一瓶宝石红色的液体，饮用者的伤口会迅速康复，并带来一阵刺痛。当你喝下治疗药水Healing Potion后，你恢复 [[/r {2d8+5}[healing]]]{2d8+5 生命值}.

Healing Potion (Major).name: 上等治疗药水 Healing Potion (Major)
Healing Potion (Major).description: 治疗药水Healing Potion是一瓶宝石红色的液体，饮用者的伤口会迅速康复，并带来一阵刺痛。当你喝下治疗药水Healing Potion后，你恢复 [[/r {8d8+30}[healing]]]{8d8+30 生命值}.

Healing Potion (Minor).name: 下等治疗药水 Healing Potion (Minor)
Healing Potion (Minor).description: 治疗药水Healing Potion是一瓶宝石红色的液体，饮用者的伤口会迅速康复，并带来一阵刺痛。当你喝下治疗药水Healing Potion后，你恢复 [[/r {1d8}[healing]]]{1d8 生命值}.

Healing Potion (Moderate).name: 中等治疗药水 Healing Potion (Moderate)
Healing Potion (Moderate).description: 治疗药水Healing Potion是一瓶宝石红色的液体，饮用者的伤口会迅速康复，并带来一阵刺痛。当你喝下治疗药水Healing Potion后，你恢复 [[/r {3d8+10}[healing]]]{3d8+10 生命值}.

Heartstone.name: Heartstone
Heartstone.description:
This gemstone grants its wearer a +2 item bonus to saving throws.

Each heartstone is powered by the spirit of a specific night hag. If it's separated from her for 24 hours (or she's been dead for 24 hours), it becomes a nonmagical gemstone. A heartstone allows the hag to use additional occult innate spells: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.D2nPKbIS67m9199U]{Ethereal Jaunt} (9th level) and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GYmXvS9NJ7QwfWGg]{Bind Soul} at will, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IqJ9URobmJ9L9UBG]{Shadow Blast} twice per day.

Activate 1 command

Requirements You must be touching the heartstone.

Effect The heartstone attempts to counteract one disease affecting you (counteract level 5, counteract modifier [[/r {1d20+18} #Counteract Modifier]]{+18}).

Craft Requirements You must be a night hag.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to saving throws

Heated Cloak.name: Heated Cloak
Heated Cloak.description: This fine cloak is lined with tiny tubes of slowly reacting alchemical reagents. These chemicals generate heat, which is circulated throughout the cloak by the wearer's movements. While active, the wearer is protected from severe cold. The cloak offers no protection from extreme or incredible cold. It operates for 24 hours and can be reset with a simple process that takes 1 minute.

Heavy Crossbow.name: 重弩 Heavy Crossbow
Heavy Crossbow.description: 这种大型弩比普通弩更难装填也更坚固，也有更强的冲击力。

Heedless Spurs.name: Heedless Spurs
Heedless Spurs.description:
These wicked-looking spiked metal wheels fit around the ankles and jingle when the wearer walks, imposing a -1 item penalty on Stealth checks. If used as a weapon, they are treated as a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.YFfG2fMyaIAXkmtr]{Spiked Gauntlet}.

Activate A Interact

Frequency once per 10 minutes

Requirements You are riding a mount

Effect You kick both spurs into your mount's flank. Your mount takes [[/r {2d6}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} and gains the quickened condition for 1 minute or until the persistent bleed damage ends, whichever comes first. It can use the extra action only to Stride.

Automatically applied effects:

  • -1 item penalty on Stealth checks

Hellfire Boots.name: Hellfire Boots
Hellfire Boots.description:
These heavy boots are made of blackened metal and always feel warm to the touch, with streams of glowing embers cascading off their heels. While wearing hellfire boots, you gain resistance 10 to fire damage.

Activate 2 Interact

Frequency once per minute

Effect Stride. Each square you move through during your Stride is scorched with hellish flames, becoming hazardous terrain for 1 minute. A creature that moves through one of these spaces takes 3d6 fire damage.

Hellknight Plate.name: Hellknight Plate
Hellknight Plate.description: Few armors in the Inner Sea region are as memorable as the iconic Hellknight plate. While each order has its own flourishes, Hellknight plate is instantly recognizable to any who know of the Hellknights. Hellknights go to extreme measures to punish non-Hellknights who get their hands on Hellknight plate, and the reward is not usually worth the risk, since for non-Hellknights, the armor is functionally similar to @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Gq1cZWSKOtJhKd2p]{Full Plate}.

Hemlock.name: 毒芹 Hemlock
Hemlock.description:
浓缩的毒芹是一种异常致命的毒物，它能够终止受害者的肌肉活动——包括心脏的跳动。

启动 A 交互 (摄入)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:40]

潜伏期 30 分钟

最大持续时间 60 分钟

阶段 1 [[/r {17d6}[poison]]]{17d6 毒素伤害} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (10 分钟)

阶段 2 [[/r {21d6}[poison]]]{21d6 毒素伤害} 和 力竭enfeebled 3 (10 分钟)

阶段 3 [[/r {26d6}[poison]]]{26d6 毒素伤害} 和 力竭enfeebled 4 (10 分钟)

Herd Mask.name: Herd Mask
Herd Mask.description:
All herd masks are linked to at least one other herd mask and are usually sold in sets of multiple masks. Linked herd masks look similar to one another, with only the slightest of differences to tell them apart.

Activate 2 envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You swap locations with another creature wearing a linked herd mask within 100 feet. If you and the creature you swapped with are disguised as each other, other creatures gain an immediate Perception check against the lower of your or the other wearer's Deception DCs to Impersonate each other. On a failure, they don't realize the swap occurred.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Dimension Door}. You can link a herd mask you create to another herd mask in your possession when you finish crafting it, which causes it to be linked to the chosen mask as well as all other herd masks that are also linked to the chosen mask.

Hide Armor.name: 革甲 Hide Armor
Hide Armor.description: 这种盔甲混合了毛皮、结实的皮革，有时还有成型的熟皮，它的多层皮革提供了保护，尽管它的笨重会减慢穿戴者的速度，并降低其活动性。

Hobbling Snare.name: 缚足圈套 Hobbling Snare
Hobbling Snare.description:
你利用藤条、绳索或铁丝束缚一个触发圈套的生物。第一个进入方格的生物必须尝试一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:20] 豁免。

大成功 生物不受影响

成功 生物的速度Speed承受-5尺状态罚值，持续1分钟或直到它逃脱Escape（DC 18）

失败 同成功，但罚值为-10尺

大失败 同成功，但罚值为-20尺

Holly and Mistletoe.name: 冬青和槲寄生 Holly and Mistletoe
Holly and Mistletoe.description: 具有超自然意义的植物为某些原能施法者（如德鲁伊）提供神力的焦点，以使用某些技能并施放一些法术。必须用一只手拿着一捆冬青和槲寄生才能使用它。对于专注于自然其他方面的德鲁伊来说，存在其他类型的原始神力焦点。

Holy.name: 神圣 Holy
Holy.description:
神圣武器能号令强大的天界能量。拥有该符文的武器对邪恶目标额外造成1d6点善良伤害。若你为邪恶阵营，你在携带或持握该武器时获得力竭2（enfeebled）。

启动 R 命令

频率 每天一次

触发 你用该武器对一邪恶生物重击成功

效果 你获得该邪恶生物等级双倍的HP。这是一个善良、正能量、治疗效果。

制造需求 你是善良阵营。

Holy Avenger.name: 神圣复仇者 Holy Avenger
Holy Avenger.description:
发光的神圣复仇者是强大圣武士的标志性武器。这柄+2高等强击 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.DH0kB9Wbr5pDeunX]{神圣 Holy}寒铁长剑的剑格形似天使之翼。传统认为，那些在神圣复仇者明镜剑身上看到自己倒影的人，会袒露出自己的错误。若你为邪恶阵营，持有或持握它时会获得力竭2（enfeedbled）。

启动 D 命令, 交互

频率 每小时一次

效果 你命令并指定你能看到的一个生物。长剑对其施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.QnTtGCAvdWRU4spv]{侦测阵营 Detect Alignment}里的侦测邪恶，只有目标会被选中，而非区域内所有生物。

圣武士持有者 若你是遵循圣武士事业的神卫，你还能获得下面两个好处。

  • 当你对邪恶生物用神圣复仇者重击成功时，该生物获得缓慢1和力竭2，持续1轮。
  • 你还能用下法启动神圣复仇者。

启动 A 命令

频率 每天一次

需求 你上一个动作用神圣复仇者命中了一个生物；

效果 你如同神卫聚能法术一般施放同环级的@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}。该法术目标必须为你命中的生物制造的幻术或被命中生物穿戴或持有的物品。你尝试反制的法术或物品需距离你120尺以内。

制造需求 你是遵循圣武士事业的神卫；提供施法侦测阵营和解除魔法。原材料必须包括120gp的寒铁。

Holy Prayer Beads.name: 神圣祈祷念珠 Holy Prayer Beads
Holy Prayer Beads.description:
这串看上去平平无奇的念珠散发出柔和的光亮，并且在你第一次握着它施展神术法术的时候变得温热。当你这么做的时候，这串念珠会适应你的神祇，从而将其外观与图纹转变为符合你神祇风格的款式。这串念珠不会为了一名邪恶施法者转变，更不会为其发挥效力。

每当你手持念珠并且使用你的法术位施展神术法术的时候都会恢复1点生命值；这是一个正能量治疗效果。如果你施展一个治疗法术，你可以将此额外的治疗赋予改法术的目标之一，而不是你本人。

启动 施放法术

效果 施放一个@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{祝福术 Bless} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{医疗术 Heal}，每日各1次。

制造需求 你拥有源于神术魔法根源的施法职业能力。

Holy Prayer Beads (Greater).name: 高等神圣祈祷念珠 Holy Prayer Beads (Greater)
Holy Prayer Beads (Greater).description:
这串看上去平平无奇的念珠散发出柔和的光亮，并且在你第一次握着它施展神术法术的时候变得温热。当你这么做的时候，这串念珠会适应你的神祇，从而将其外观与图纹转变为符合你神祇风格的款式。这串念珠不会为了一名邪恶施法者转变，更不会为其发挥效力。

每当你手持念珠并且使用你的法术位施展神术法术的时候都会恢复1D4点生命值；这是一个正能量治疗效果。如果你施展一个治疗法术，你可以将此额外的治疗赋予改法术的目标之一，而不是你本人。

启动 施放法术

效果 施放一个4环的@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{祝福术 Bless}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{医疗术 Heal}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.hVU9msO9yGkxKZ3J]{神圣狂怒 Divine Wrath}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{中和毒素 Neutralize Poison}或@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.RneiyehRO6f7LP44]{移除疾病 Remove Disease}，你可以施放这些法术每日各1次。

制造需求 你拥有源于神术魔法根源的施法职业能力。

Holy Steam Ball.name: Holy Steam Ball
Holy Steam Ball.description:
Activate 1 Interact

The holy steam ball is an odd-looking device that's nevertheless effective at reinforcing its user's mind against fiendish control. It's a hollow black-rubber ball with small, flexible twin tubes sticking out from its center. Sealed within the rubber ball is vapor made from a mixture of evaporated holy water and a special type of incense smoke. The tube's twin prongs are placed into the user's nostrils, after which the user squeezes the rubber ball to activate the device, forcing the vapor into the user's body through their nose. The holy power contained within the vapor strengthens the user's will against creatures that are weak to holy water, making it tougher for malevolent creatures to subvert the user's mind.

When the holy steam ball was first introduced in Mendev fifty years ago, few trusted it's efficacy. The nation had seen many charlatans peddle so-called "anti-demon" products, and most thought this was no different. Only when soldiers of the Mendevian Crusades used the ball and personally testified to its effectiveness did suspicion gave way to enthusiastic use. Nobody remembers who first invented the holy steam ball; they're likely lost to history because most initially thought it was a scam. After receiving endorsement from the Mendevian Crusade, a team of alchemists and inventors were able to determine the vapor's exact composition and mass produce them. The holy steam ball's highly specialized purpose kept it from widespread use outside of the nations that once bordered the Worldwound. Yet with the return of the Whispering Tyrant in the past few years, the growing undead threat presents a new opportunity for more citizens to use holy steam balls for protection against the mind control powers of vampires and other undead.

After using a holy steam ball, you must refill it before the next use in a process that takes five minutes to complete.

Activate 1 Interact

Requirements The holy steam ball is filled with evaporated holy water and incense smoke

Effect You release the stored steam and smoke to grant yourself its protections. Each use of the holy steam ball lasts for 1 hour and gives you a +2 item bonus to Will saving throws against possession effects from fiends and undead and effects from fiends and undead that cause the controlled condition.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.5dhm66yN0LQTOePw]{Effect: Holy Steam Ball}

Holy Water.name: 圣水 Holy Water
Holy Water.description:
这瓶水被一名善良神祗所祝福。你用打击Strike将圣水扔出。它视为一个射程20尺的简易投掷武器。不像炼金炸弹，它不会将操作特性添加到动作中。

圣水 造成 1d6 善良伤害 和 1点 善良溅射伤害。它只会对恶魔，亡灵和其他弱点为正能量的生物造成伤害。

启动 A 打击 Strike

Homeward Wayfinder.name: Homeward Wayfinder
Homeward Wayfinder.description:
Homeward wayfinders are powerful escape tools in the hands of a Pathfinder agent, drawing upon a special connection to the Maze of the Open Road. In addition to the effects of a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder}, a homeward wayfinder attunes itself to the most recent Pathfinder Lodge you've visited and has the following activation.

Activate 10 minutes (command, Interact)

Frequency once per day

Effect You teleport back to the attuned Pathfinder Lodge, as long as you are no more than 100 miles away. This teleportation effect fails if you would bring another creature with you, even if you're carrying it in an extradimensional space.

Honeyscent.name: Honeyscent
Honeyscent.description:
This sweet-scented poison triggers vivid hallucinations in those who succumb to it, causing most to believe swarms of ravenous biting insects are feeding on them. So vivid are these hallucinations that the victims damage themselves by scratching and clawing at the imaginary swarm. At the GM's discretion, a creature incapable of clawing at itself might instead slam against solid objects, in which case the poison inflicts bludgeoning damage.

Activate 1 Interact (Inhaled)

Saving Throw @Check[type:will|dc:30]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r {2d6}[slashing]]]{2d6 slashing damage} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r {2d6}[slashing]]]{2d6 slashing damage} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r {2d6}[slashing]]]{2d6 slashing damage}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}, and stupefied 1

Hongali Hornbow.name: Hongali Hornbow
Hongali Hornbow.description: These immense bows are traditionally made from the horns of great beasts, though modern residents of Hongal, the northernmost nation in Tian Xia, often use composite materials or even small trees as the weapon's base. While Hongali hornbows have a shorter range than other bows, they make up for it by focusing the power of the longbow at a short distance and can be used from horseback-perfect for the skirmishing fighting style of mounted Hongali troops. While it's difficult for those in Avistan to get their hands on these Hongali weapons, a small warband of beast-riding orcs from the Hold of Belkzen managed to arm themselves with Hongali hornbows and cut a bloody swathe through adventurers and neighboring militaries alike for several years before they were finally defeated via a desperate ambush. The stories of that warband spread, causing Avistani adventurers with little knowledge of Tian Xia to associate the bows with orcs. Hongali characters have access to the Hongali hornbow.

Hook Sword.name: Hook Sword
Hook Sword.description: This long sword has a hook near the tip which makes it easy to snag an opponent or their weapons.

Hopeful.name: Hopeful
Hopeful.description: A weapon with a hopeful rune exudes positivity. On a critical hit with this weapon, you inspire your comrades, pushing them to fight harder and stand for your shared convictions. Allies within 30 feet that share at least one alignment component with you gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Horn of Blasting.name: 音爆号角 Horn of Blasting
Horn of Blasting.description:
音爆号角是一只闪亮的黄铜喇叭。它能被作为一种乐器来演奏，同时给你的表演检定提供+2物品加值。

启动 A 交互

频率 每轮一次

效果 当你带着恶意吹响号角时，你能够对准30英尺内的一个目标创造出一阵爆裂音符。这阵爆裂音符能够造成 [[/r {3d6}[sonic]]]{3d6 音波伤害}。 (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|basic:true] 豁免)。

启动 D 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你可以更加大声地吹响号角来制造出一阵爆炸波，对 @Template[type:cone|distance:30] 范围内造成 [[/r {8d6}[sonic]]]{8d6 音波伤害}。 每个生物都需要进行一次 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28] 豁免，并具有以下效果。

大成功 此生物不受伤害

成功 此生物受到一半的伤害

失败 此生物受到全额伤害，并且耳聋Deafened [[/br 2d6 #rounds]]{2d6 轮}。

自动生效:

  • 表演检定获得+2物品加值

Horn of Fog.name: 迷雾号角 Horn of Fog
Horn of Fog.description:
这只巨大的羊角号角上永远都挂着微小的水珠，就好似水汽凝结在这号角上一般。

启动 D 交互

频率 每小时一次

效果 你向号角里猛吹一口气，使其产生出一股低沉的气浪，并且施放了一个 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{隐雾术 Obscuring Mist} 。你能够在任何时候通过一个交互动作再次吹响号角用以消解这阵迷雾。

Horns of Naraga.name: Horns of Naraga
Horns of Naraga.description:
This imposing helm bears the horns of a powerful black dragon. While wearing the Horns of Naraga, you gain greater darkvision and immunity to acid. If you are undead, you gain resistance 40 to positive damage. If you are not undead, the helm quickly saps the life from you, dealing [[/r {10d6}[negative]]]{10d6 negative damage} to you every round. If you die from this damage, you rise as an undead of an equal level in [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Activate F envision

Trigger You touch a creature as part of an unarmed attack or melee spell attack roll

Effect The creature takes [[/r {5d6}[negative]]]{5d6 negative damage}. If you are an undead, you regain Hit Points equal to the negative damage the creature took.

Activate T command

Frequency once per day

Effect The Horns of Naraga transform into Naraga, an ancient black dragon. Naraga appears in an adjacent appropriate space, and if no such space is available, she does not appear. Naraga follows your commands without question. She remains for up to 1 hour or until you use an Interact action to dismiss her, after which she reverts back to the helm. If Naraga is slain, she immediately reverts back to the helm and can't be summoned for 1 week. You don't receive any of the helm's other benefits while it is transformed.

Destruction The helm is utterly obliterated if crushed between the jaws of an ancient black dragon's skull located in a desert while the sun is at its zenith.

Horsechopper.name: 斩马刀 Horsechopper
Horsechopper.description: 地精为了对付马匹而制造的武器，一柄长杆末端是带着钩子的刀刃。

Horseshoes of Speed.name: 加速马蹄铁 Horseshoes of Speed
Horseshoes of Speed.description:
当你将这副简约的铁质马蹄铁附着到马或者其他四足动物伙伴的足部，且该动物伙伴绑定了这副马蹄铁时，该生物的陆地速度获得+5尺物品加值，用来跳高High Jump和跳远Long Jump的运动Athletics检定上获得+2物品加值。

另外，当它使用跳跃Leap动作时，在水平跳跃时能使跳跃距离远5尺，在垂直跳跃时能使跳跃高度高3尺。

自动生效:

  • 陆地速度获得+5尺物品加值
  • 用来跳高High Jump和跳远Long Jump的运动Athletics检定上获得+2物品加值

Horseshoes of Speed (Greater).name: 高等加速马蹄铁 Horseshoes of Speed (Greater)
Horseshoes of Speed (Greater).description:
当你将这副简约的铁质马蹄铁附着到马或者其他四足动物伙伴的足部，且该动物伙伴绑定了这副马蹄铁时，该生物的陆地速度获得+10尺物品加值，用来跳高High Jump和跳远Long Jump的运动Athletics检定上获得+3物品加值。

另外，当它使用跳跃Leap动作时，在水平跳跃时能使跳跃距离远5尺，在垂直跳跃时能使跳跃高度高3尺。

自动生效:

  • 陆地速度获得+10尺物品加值
  • 用来跳高High Jump和跳远Long Jump的运动Athletics检定上获得+3物品加值

Hosteling Statuette.name: Hosteling Statuette
Hosteling Statuette.description:
This soapstone statuette resembles an unidentified lump with a vaguely animal shape, worn on a band or cord around the companion's neck. When your companion invests the item, the statuette changes to appear as a miniature carved soapstone version of the companion.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You touch your companion, merging it into the statuette and ending the activation with the statuette in your hand (or on the ground in your space if you don't have a hand free). While in statuette form, your companion has the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Petrified} condition, and its size is Tiny.

Activate 2 envision, Interact;

Requirements Your companion is in statuette form;

Effect You call forth your companion from the statuette, causing it to unmerge and appear in an unoccupied space adjacent to you.

Hummingbird Wayfinder.name: Hummingbird Wayfinder
Hummingbird Wayfinder.description:
Hummingbird wayfinders blend a few Arcadian secrets into the original wayfinder design, allowing the wayfinder to gain mobility for a time and act as a spy. In addition to the effects of a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder}, a hummingbird wayfinder has the following activation.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect You cause the wayfinder to transform into a Tiny bee hummingbird, only 2 inches long. Other than the wayfinder being a visible bird, this has the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Ek5XI0aEdZhBgm21]{Prying Eye}. In addition to Seeking through the hummingbird, you can activate any aeon stone within the wayfinder as if the wayfinder were still on your person. When the effect ends, the wayfinder transforms back to normal in its current position. Damaging the bird ends the effect but does not destroy the wayfinder.

Hundred-Moth Caress.name: Hundred-Moth Caress
Hundred-Moth Caress.description:
The handles of this +1 striking scythe are made from a dull, gray wood of bone-like consistency, and when you slice with it, a fluttering gust of hundreds of moths' wingbeats fills the air. If you're a devotee of Urgathoa, you can use this scythe as a divine focus, and with every Strike, it exudes a pallid cloud of powdery dust.

Activate f command (divine, necromancy, negative)

Frequency once per round

Effect You deal [[/r {1d10}[negative]]]{1d10 negative damage} to yourself. If your next action is to Strike with the scythe or to Cast a Spell with the disease or negative trait, that Strike or spell deals additional negative damage equal to the damage you took (after any reductions or increases from immunity, resistances, weaknesses).

Hunger Oil.name: Hunger Oil
Hunger Oil.description:
Activate 1 Interact

Rendered from the fat of corporeal undead creatures and infused with ghoulish magic, this yellowish oil causes its victims to experience stabbing hunger pangs that only living flesh can abate. If you eat at least a mouthful of humanoid flesh, you ignore the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition from hunger oil for 1 minute. While under the effect of hunger oil, you regain only half as many Hit Points from healing effects unless you've eaten at least a mouthful of humanoid flesh in the last minute.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30]

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 6 minutes

Stage 1 enfeebled 2 (1 minute)

Stage 2 enfeebled 3 (1 minute)

Stage 3 enfeebled 4 ([[/br 1d4 #minutes]]{1d4 minutes})

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.JhRuR7Jj3ViShpq7]{Ghoulish Cravings}.

Hunter's Arrowhead.name: Hunter's Arrowhead
Hunter's Arrowhead.description:
This arrowhead-shaped charm is not meant to be affixed to an arrow, but instead to be carried in a pocket or inside of a quiver. A hunter's arrowhead is etched with images sacred to the elven god Ketephys.

If you carry one on your person, you are infused with great skill at hunting, and gain a +1 item bonus to Survival skill checks and attack rolls against any creature you've currently designated as your prey for the Hunt Prey ranger ability (note that the bonus to attack rolls is an item bonus, and therefore not cumulative with an item bonus from a magic weapon).

A hunter's arrowhead is also a religious symbol of Ketephys.

Activate R command

Frequency once per day

Trigger You would miss with an attack made with a bow.

Effect You get a +2 circumstance bonus to your attack roll. This can turn a miss into a hit.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Survival skill checks against your Hunted Prey
  • +1 item bonus to attack rolls against your Hunted Prey

Hunter's Bane.name: 猎手之灾 Hunter's Bane
Hunter's Bane.description:
启动 F 想象

触发 一个无踪的敌人用一次攻击命中了你

需求 你在生存Survival中受训

这个护符是一枚干枯树叶编织而成的戒指。当你启动猎手之灾，你感知到了攻击者的确切位置，让他相对于你的状态从无踪Undetected变成藏匿Hidden。如果攻击者躲在铅后面，猎手之灾启动失败并且被浪费掉。

Hunter's Bow.name: Hunter's Bow
Hunter's Bow.description: Stealthy hunters and rogues can use this +1 magic shortbow to attack from hiding. If you use this bow to Strike a target that can't see you and you get a critical hit, the target takes an extra [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 piercing damage} (this is in addition to sneak attack damage if you're a rogue).

Hunter's Brooch.name: Hunter's Brooch
Hunter's Brooch.description:
While wearing this silver religious symbol of Erastil, you can cast the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kcelf6IHl3L9VXXg]{Disrupt Undead} cantrip as an innate divine spell.

Activate 3 command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect By touching a weapon you wield to the symbol and uttering a plea for Erastil's steadying hand, you grant that weapon the deadly d12 trait. Against undead, the weapon instead gains the fatal d12 trait. This blessing lasts for 1 minute, until you score a critical hit with the weapon, or until you aren't wielding the weapon.

Hunter's Dawn.name: Hunter's Dawn
Hunter's Dawn.description:
Hunter's Dawn is a +3 greater striking @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.KnZL0xPWDzQx9vWQ]{Speed} @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} club.

However, the notched head of the weapon marks it as an atlatl, an ancient tool used for throwing darts and javelins. You can use Hunter's Dawn with a mundane dart or javelin like you would use a bow with an arrow; when you do so, the range of the dart or javelin is doubled, and the dart or javelin uses Hunter's Dawn to determine its attack modifier and damage dice.

Activate (Single Action to Three Actions) Interact

Effect You swing Hunter's Dawn and launch a magically conjured javelin at a target within 60 feet, making a ranged Strike.

The javelin has the statistics of a javelin but gains the magical properties of Hunter's Dawn and disappears immediately after hitting or missing its target.

On a successful hit, you deal damage (3d6 piercing, due to the atlatl's greater striking rune, plus your Strength modifier); in addition, a gazelle leaps from the hit target to one or more targets within 20 feet of the first, dealing 2d6 piercing damage plus your Strength modifier. The number of additional targets hit in this way is equal to the number of actions you spend to activate this ability (one additional target if you used one action, two additional targets for two actions, and so forth).

Activate (Reaction)

Trigger You hit a creature with a ranged Strike with Hunter's Dawn

Effect The target is marked. Once per day, you can cast a 5th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.LQzlKbYjZSMFQawP]{Locate} spell on the marked target, regardless of its distance from you or your ability to cast spells. This effect persists until it is dispelled (counterspell DC 46), the creature dies, or a new target is marked.

Activate (Single Action) Interact

Frequency three times per day

ffect You shave a curl of wood from Hunter's Dawn and create a roaring fire within 15 feet. You can choose one of the following shapes for the fire to take: a 10-foot square, a @Template[type:line|distance:20], or a @Template[type:cone|distance:15]. Each creature in the affected squares take [[/r 6d6]] fire damage (DC 46 basic Reflex save).

Destruction Hunter's Dawn can be destroyed only by placing it on the funeral pyre of a dead god.

Hunting Spider Venom.name: 猎蛛毒 Hunting Spider Venom
Hunting Spider Venom.description:
这种毒液能够腐蚀受害者的防御，以便蜘蛛捕食猎物。

启动 D 交互 (受伤)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:21]

最大持续时间 6 轮

阶段 1 [[/r {1d10}[poison]]]{1d10 毒素伤害} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} (1 轮)

阶段 2 [[/r {1d12}[poison]]]{1d12 毒素伤害}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} 和 措手不及flat-footed (1 轮)

阶段 3 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6 毒素伤害}， 笨拙clumsy 2 和 措手不及flat-footed (1 轮)

Hyldarf's Fang.name: Hyldarf's Fang
Hyldarf's Fang.description:
This +2 greater striking hand cannon is carved and crafted from a single large fang, worn with age and cracked with red lines. The tip of the fang has been filed down, but still leaks black fluid occasionally. It was fashioned from the tooth of the tor linnorm Hyldarf by a half-Ulfen gunsmith from Tian Xia who sought the title of linnorm king. Though the smith failed to slay the linnorm, he did claim the mighty dragon's tooth and fashion it into a magic firearm that still drips warm venom. Hyldarf survived the encounter with her attacker and slew the gunsmith years later, though by then the smith had already bequeathed the weapon to his chosen heir and it was far out of her grasp. The linnorm still searches for her missing tooth, portending potential doom for the weapon's owner.

The weapon deals an additional [[/r {2d6}[fire]]]{2d6 fire damage} on a successful Strike, plus [[/r {3d10}[persistent,fire]]]{3d10} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage} on a critical hit. Fire damage dealt by this weapon (including persistent fire damage and damage from Hyldarf's Venom) ignores the target's fire resistance.

Activate 1 command, envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You call upon Hyldarf's power to gain the magic of a linnorm for a brief time. For 1 minute, you gain the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Freedom of Movement}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{True Seeing} as well as fire resistance 20.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.wacGBDbbQ1HaNZbX]{Effect: Hyldarf's Fang}

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency Once per minute

Effect You soak your shot in the fluid of the fang, imbuing it with Hyldarf's venom. The next Strike you make with Hydalf's Fang before the end of your next turn delivers the venom to the target.

Hyldarf's Venom (fire, injury, poison)

Saving Throw DC 34 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34|name:Hyldarf's Venom|traits:fire,injury,poison] save

Maximum Duration 3 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r {3d6}[fire]]]{3d6 fire damage} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}

Stage 2 [[/r {6d6}[fire]]]{6d6 fire damage} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.

Hype.name: Hype
Hype.description:
Activate 1 Interact

A synthetic adrenaline supplement that increases awareness and reaction time.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25]

Maximum Duration 1 minute

Stage 1 quickened and can use the additional action to Step or Stride (1 round)

Stage 2 stupefied 2 (1 round)

Stage 3 drained 2 and stupefied 2 (1 round)

Ice Slick Snare.name: Ice Slick Snare
Ice Slick Snare.description: Using a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.nVvH1ZcM7OwIVIs8]{Frost Vial (Moderate)} as a catalyst, this snare spills out over the ground when triggered to create a slippery patch of ice on the ground. When a creature triggers this snare, it takes [[/r {2d6}[cold]]]{2d6 cold damage} and must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:22|traits:damaging-effect] saving throw.

Ichthyosis Mutagen.name: Ichthyosis Mutagen
Ichthyosis Mutagen.description:
Activate 1 Interact

After you drink this mutagen, your skin continually renews itself, thickening into large, scaly patches.

Benefit For 1 minute, you gain fast healing 2 and automatically succeed at flat checks to recover from persistent bleed damage.

Drawback Your thickened skin makes quick movement difficult, and your excess skin flakes off with the slightest movement. You take a -2 penalty to Reflex saves for 1 minute. Any creature attempting to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} you in the next 24 hours gains a +4 circumstance bonus to their check.

Icy Disposition.name: Icy Disposition
Icy Disposition.description:
Devil @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.kNmRn3WfiWLsuwoe]{Gelugon}

Decipher Writing Nature, Games Lore

Your flesh looks no different, but is cold to the touch.

Benefit You gain cold resistance equal to your level and a +1 status bonus to saving throws against mental effects.

Payment Liquids in your possession, including potions and liquid alchemical items, freeze over the course of 1 minute and thaw 1 minute after they leave your possession. Frozen potions and elixirs take 1 minute to consume.

Hidden Condition (conjuration, teleportation) No more than once per week, the gelugon can move you like a piece on a game board to advance its schemes. The gelugon can appear and transport you and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to a clear space within 500 feet (the gelugon need not see this location, but must know its relative location and distance from you). This effect doesn't transport any other creatures. The gelugon is unlikely to place you in a less dangerous space than the one you left.

Termination Clause The contract provides you the benefits of “the eternal ice of Cocytus.” If you travel to Cocytus, Hell's seventh layer, and stand within an area at least 100 feet across that contains no ice and has a temperature above freezing, the contract is void. Such locations are exceptionally rare in Cocytus, and the efforts to create such an area are likely to attract unpleasant attention.

Ignitor.name: Ignitor
Ignitor.description: An ignitor uses interlocking clockwork to create a small spark in order to ignite flammable materials. While holding the ignitor, you can Interact with it to ignite a flammable object within reach.

Immaculate Holsters.name: Immaculate Holsters
Immaculate Holsters.description:
This pristine leather belt is made of treated and polished black leather with silver fittings; it features a pair of matching leather holsters that can each fit a one-handed firearm or hand crossbow.

Activate 3 envision

Frequency once per day

Effect Up to two firearms currently holstered in the immaculate holsters are instantly cleaned and oiled, protecting them from accidental misfires (though not misfires caused as a result of using a feat or ability). The holstered weapons are also reloaded with non-magical 0-level ammunition appropriate to a weapon of their type; if a firearm has multiple chambers, such as a slide pistol, each empty chamber is loaded. Immaculate holsters can't reload the cartridge of a repeating weapon.

Immolation Clan Pistol.name: Immolation Clan Pistol
Immolation Clan Pistol.description:
This charred and blackened +2 striking clan pistol is coated in a thick layer of soot and grease and its retort sounds uncomfortably like a scream. Clearly at dangerous risk of misfire, this weapon claimed the life of its dwarven crafter shortly after completion and is haunted by that pained spirit. This ever-burning spirit keeps the firearm warm to the touch, regardless of surrounding environment.

No matter how much you clean and maintain it, an immolation clan pistol is always at risk of a misfire, and the flat check to avoid a misfire is DC 7 rather than DC 5. On a misfire, an immolation hand cannon releases a blast of concentrated fire, dealing you [[/r {2d6}[fire]]]{2d6 fire damage} and [[/r {2d6}[persistent,fire]]]{2d6} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage}.

An immolation clan pistol fuses with you when you first fire it. While you're fused with the immolation clan pistol, the pained spirit haunts your dreams, forcing you to relive its death each night. If you fired the immolation clan pistol that day, you are unharmed by these dreams. If you didn't fire the immolation clan pistol that day, but still possess it, you awaken @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}. If you no longer possess the immolation clan pistol, the spirit of its dwarven smith is enraged by your neglect; you awaken fatigued and aflame, taking [[/r {2d6}[persistent,fire]]]{2d6} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage}.

Regardless, these nightmares possess clues to the spirit's life. If you take the immolation hand cannon to the site of its creation and repair it with tools belonging to the tormented spirit, you might be able to break the curse. If the spirit is set free, this weapon becomes a +2 greater striking flaming hand cannon with no other abilities or curses.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You allow yourself to become partially possessed by the immolated spirit bound to the hand cannon. For 1 minute, you look like a flaming corpse. During this time, you gain a +2 status bonus to Intimidation checks and the immolation hand cannon becomes a +2 striking flaming hand cannon.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.bri7UVNCfHhCIvXN]{Effect: Immolation Clan Pistol}

Immovable Arm.name: Immovable Arm
Immovable Arm.description:
The flat iron bar of an immovable rod has been worked into the core frame of this prosthetic arm, a small button discreetly placed at the heel of the hand.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect You curl your fingers inward to press the button on the heel of your hand, anchoring your prosthetic arm in place. Your arm no longer moves, defying gravity if necessary. You can still move the fingers of this hand and your elbow, shoulder, and rest of your body while the magic is in effect, but you can't move your wrist. If you press the button again, the rod inside your arm is deactivated, ending the magic that anchors it in place. While anchored, the arm can be moved only if 8,000 pounds of pressure is placed upon it or if a creature succeeds at a @Check[type:athletics|dc:40|name:Immovable Arm Athletics|traits:magical,transmutation] check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SjmKHgI7a5Z9JzBx]{Force Open} your arm. A creature can notice the button hidden in the hand of the prosthesis with a successful @Check[type:perception|dc:25|name:Immovable Arm Seek|traits:magical,transmutation] check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek}.

Immovable Rod.name: 不动权杖 Immovable Rod
Immovable Rod.description:
这片不伦不类的铁条的表面上显露出了一个小小的按钮。

启动 A 交互

效果 你按下按钮，将权杖锚定在空间中。它无法移动，并且可以无视重力。如果按钮被再次按下，权杖将停止启动从而结束锚定魔法。只有当对其施加8000磅的压力，或是一个生物使用运动技能对其进行一次DC40的破拆检定时才能迫使被锚定的权杖移动。（尽管大多数足够聪明的生物都会简简单单地按下按钮来释放权杖。）

Immovable Tripod.name: Immovable Tripod
Immovable Tripod.description:
This copper tripod with an immovable rod at its core is a perfect example of engineering ingenuity applied to magic items, adapting the eccentric power of an immovable rod for the pragmatic use of stabilizing weapons without the need for solid ground on which to stabilize them. In addition to extraplanar and aquatic environments, these devices have seen use by flying and climbing snipers who would otherwise have no way to mitigate their weapons' fierce kickback.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect You deploy the tripod and press a button to lock it into place via the immovable rod, allowing you to deploy the tripod in midair, underwater, or anywhere else where you don't have a solid horizontal surface available. If you Activate the tripod by pushing the button again, you release and retrieve the tripod. While anchored, the tripod can be moved only if 8,000 pounds of pressure are applied to it or if a creature uses @Check[type:athletics|dc:40|name:Immovable Tripod Force Open|traits:action:force-open]{DC 40 Athletics} to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SjmKHgI7a5Z9JzBx]{Force Open} the tripod with a DC of 40 (though most intelligent creatures can just push the button to release the tripod).

Impact Foam Chassis (Greater).name: Impact Foam Chassis (Greater)
Impact Foam Chassis (Greater).description:
While you're wearing an impact foam chassis wrapped around your body, it Activates automatically whenever you fall at least 10 feet, causing a layer of soft, flexible impact foam to expand beneath and around you to cushion the fall. The impact foam decreases the falling damage by up to the listed amount, taking damage equal to the amount of falling damage the foam reduced. If this is enough to destroy the foam, it disperses immediately. However, if the foam has any Hit Points remaining, it remains surrounding you for up to 1 minute. While you're surrounded in foam, you are immobilized and have standard cover against other creatures, and other creatures have standard cover against you. The foam has an @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} DC of 15; a creature can also remove it by spending three Interact actions. You or others can also attack the foam (the foam has an AC of 12), which disperses if reduced to 0 Hit Points.

A lesser impact foam chassis prevents up to 100 falling damage and has 100 Hit Points.

Impact Foam Chassis (Lesser).name: Impact Foam Chassis (Lesser)
Impact Foam Chassis (Lesser).description:
While you're wearing an impact foam chassis wrapped around your body, it Activates automatically whenever you fall at least 10 feet, causing a layer of soft, flexible impact foam to expand beneath and around you to cushion the fall. The impact foam decreases the falling damage by up to the listed amount, taking damage equal to the amount of falling damage the foam reduced. If this is enough to destroy the foam, it disperses immediately. However, if the foam has any Hit Points remaining, it remains surrounding you for up to 1 minute. While you're surrounded in foam, you are immobilized and have standard cover against other creatures, and other creatures have standard cover against you. The foam has an @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} DC of 15; a creature can also remove it by spending three Interact actions. You or others can also attack the foam (the foam has an AC of 12), which disperses if reduced to 0 Hit Points.

A lesser impact foam chassis prevents up to 20 falling damage and has 20 Hit Points.

Impact Foam Chassis (Major).name: Impact Foam Chassis (Major)
Impact Foam Chassis (Major).description:
While you're wearing an impact foam chassis wrapped around your body, it Activates automatically whenever you fall at least 10 feet, causing a layer of soft, flexible impact foam to expand beneath and around you to cushion the fall. The impact foam decreases the falling damage by up to the listed amount, taking damage equal to the amount of falling damage the foam reduced. If this is enough to destroy the foam, it disperses immediately. However, if the foam has any Hit Points remaining, it remains surrounding you for up to 1 minute. While you're surrounded in foam, you are immobilized and have standard cover against other creatures, and other creatures have standard cover against you. The foam has an @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} DC of 15; a creature can also remove it by spending three Interact actions. You or others can also attack the foam (the foam has an AC of 12), which disperses if reduced to 0 Hit Points.

A lesser impact foam chassis prevents up to 200 falling damage and has 200 Hit Points.

Impact Foam Chassis (Moderate).name: Impact Foam Chassis (Moderate)
Impact Foam Chassis (Moderate).description:
While you're wearing an impact foam chassis wrapped around your body, it Activates automatically whenever you fall at least 10 feet, causing a layer of soft, flexible impact foam to expand beneath and around you to cushion the fall. The impact foam decreases the falling damage by up to the listed amount, taking damage equal to the amount of falling damage the foam reduced. If this is enough to destroy the foam, it disperses immediately. However, if the foam has any Hit Points remaining, it remains surrounding you for up to 1 minute. While you're surrounded in foam, you are immobilized and have standard cover against other creatures, and other creatures have standard cover against you. The foam has an @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} DC of 15; a creature can also remove it by spending three Interact actions. You or others can also attack the foam (the foam has an AC of 12), which disperses if reduced to 0 Hit Points.

A lesser impact foam chassis prevents up to 50 falling damage and has 40 Hit Points.

Impactful.name: Impactful
Impactful.description: This rune thrums with pure magical energy. Weapons with the rune deal an additional 1d6 force damage on a successful Strike. On a critical hit, you can choose to force the target to succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:27|name:Resist Force Push|showDC:all] save or be pushed 5 feet away from you.

Impactful (Greater).name: Impactful (Greater)
Impactful (Greater).description: This rune thrums with pure magical energy. Weapons with the rune deal an additional 1d6 force damage on a successful Strike. On a critical hit, you can choose to force the target to succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:37|name:Resist Force Push|showDC:all] save or be pushed 10 feet away from you.

Impenetrable Scale.name: 不破鳞甲 Impenetrable Scale
Impenetrable Scale.description:
用多层标准纯度的黑光精金甲片重叠锻打而成，这件+2高等抗力 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.8buhFcGwuaJRrp0y]{护命 Fortification}精金鳞甲似乎会针对被命中的位置临时加厚。

当该护甲的护命符文效果成功将重击转化为普通命中后，其中一块甲片会变成紫色。你会获得等同于变成紫色的甲片数的物理伤害抗力，最高为8。

在每天黎明时分，所有紫色甲片恢复正常。

制造需求 原材料中必须包含1600gp的精金。

Implacable.name: Implacable
Implacable.description: This substantial rune makes you difficult to hold back. Whenever you are affected by an effect that lasts until you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} (for instance, from the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} action or a tanglefoot bag), you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened}. You can use the extra action each round only to Step or Escape.

Impossible Cake.name: Impossible Cake
Impossible Cake.description:
Activate 1 Interact

This sleight-of-hand for the taste buds is flavored with absinthe and honey and always resembles something completely unlike a cake, from a pile of armor to a bowl of soup. Eating the cake gives you the confidence to make the impossible seem possible: for 10 minutes after the meal, you gain a +2 item bonus to your Deception checks to Impersonate, as well as to Lie to convince others that you possess knowledge about the type of item that the cake resembles.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.H29JukjrSpHe5DXR]{Effect: Impossible Cake}

Impossible Cake (Greater).name: Impossible Cake (Greater)
Impossible Cake (Greater).description:
Activate 1 Interact

This sleight-of-hand for the taste buds is flavored with absinthe and honey and always resembles something completely unlike a cake, from a pile of armor to a bowl of soup. Eating the cake gives you the confidence to make the impossible seem possible: for 30 minutes after the meal, you gain a +3 item bonus to your Deception checks to Impersonate, as well as to Lie to convince others that you possess knowledge about the type of item that the cake resembles.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.KAEWiyE8TQwofNj9]{Effect: Impossible Cake (Greater)}

Impossible Cake (Major).name: Impossible Cake (Major)
Impossible Cake (Major).description:
Activate 1 Interact

This sleight-of-hand for the taste buds is flavored with absinthe and honey and always resembles something completely unlike a cake, from a pile of armor to a bowl of soup. Eating the cake gives you the confidence to make the impossible seem possible: for 1 hour after the meal, you gain a +4 item bonus to your Deception checks to Impersonate, as well as to Lie to convince others that you possess knowledge about the type of item that the cake resembles.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.ohMdE8BmQHuLs40b]{Effect: Impossible Cake (Major)}

Incense of Distilled Death.name: Incense of Distilled Death
Incense of Distilled Death.description:
Activate 1 Interact

This black incense smells of fresh earth and ash. You activate the incense by lighting it, whereupon it fills a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] with oily smoke and potent negative energy. Undead creatures, including incorporeal undead, gain fast healing 4 while in the area; though this healing comes from negative energy, it doesn't negatively impact living creatures. Once lit, the incense burns for 1 minute, and it can't be extinguished.

Indestructible Shield.name: 不破坚盾 Indestructible Shield
Indestructible Shield.description:
不破坚盾是能承受任何伤害的高纯度精金盾（硬度13，HP90）。只有解离术或和毁灭有关的神器（比如毁灭之球sphere of annihilation）才能对其造成伤害。

制造需求 原材料必须包含4400gp的精金。

Indomitable Keepsake.name: Indomitable Keepsake
Indomitable Keepsake.description:
Activate f envision

Trigger You're critically hit by a firearm attack.

This talisman usually takes the form of a small sentimental object carried in a pocket or attached to the inside of a piece of armor. When you activate it, it slows the attack, and you reduce the damage from the triggering critical hit by 10, as the attack destroys the talisman. This effect only reduces the additional damage from a critical hit; it can't reduce the damage below the amount it would deal on a normal hit.

Indomitable Keepsake (Greater).name: Indomitable Keepsake (Greater)
Indomitable Keepsake (Greater).description:
Activate f envision

Trigger You're critically hit by a firearm attack.

This talisman usually takes the form of a small sentimental object carried in a pocket or attached to the inside of a piece of armor. When you activate it, it slows the attack, and you reduce the damage from the triggering critical hit by 10, as the attack destroys the talisman. This effect only reduces the additional damage from a critical hit; it can't reduce the damage below the amount it would deal on a normal hit.

When you activate a greater indomitable keepsake, you reduce the damage from a firearm critical hit by 20 instead of reducing it by 10.

Indomitable Keepsake (Major).name: Indomitable Keepsake (Major)
Indomitable Keepsake (Major).description:
Activate f envision

Trigger You're critically hit by a firearm attack.

This talisman usually takes the form of a small sentimental object carried in a pocket or attached to the inside of a piece of armor. When you activate it, it slows the attack, and you reduce the damage from the triggering critical hit by 10, as the attack destroys the talisman. This effect only reduces the additional damage from a critical hit; it can't reduce the damage below the amount it would deal on a normal hit.

When you activate a major indomitable keepsake, you reduce the damage from a firearm critical hit by 30 instead of reducing it by 10.

Inexplicable Apparatus.name: 莫测装置 Inexplicable Apparatus
Inexplicable Apparatus.description:
这件奇怪的，错综复杂的背带能十分舒适地贴合躯干。一旦你绑定这件装置，许多人造肢体带着各种各样的工具、夹子和透镜便钻出并开始工作，你可以毫不费力地通过精神指挥这些肢体。

当你使用这件装置，你在用来进行制作Craft，赚取收入Earn Income，以及修理Repair的手艺Crafting检定中获得+3物品加值，你也可以将制作Craft一件物品所需的最短时间降低至1天。如果你的手艺Crafting检定成功，并花费更多的时间在制作一件物品上时，每天你能在剩余原材料上降低的花费总额基于你的等级+1以及你的熟练等级；如果达成大成功，则你视为等级+2。如果你达到了20级，在大成功时你的进展是50gp，100gp，200gp，或350gp，分别来自受训、专家、大师以及传奇的熟练等级。

启动 D 命令, 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你命令这件装置紧急修复一件距离你5尺内的物品。这个物品会被立刻修复，就如同受到了一次3环的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dINQzhqGmIsqGMUY]{修复术 Mending} 法术一样。修复效果持续10分钟，之后这件物品会恢复到之前未被修复的状态，除非你在这之后重新修理Repair它。

自动生效:

  • 在用来进行制作Craft，赚取收入Earn Income，以及修理Repair的手艺Crafting检定中获得+3物品加值

Infernal Health.name: Infernal Health
Infernal Health.description:
You regain triple the normal number of Hit Points when resting (meaning you regain triple your Constitution modifier multiplied by your level). The healing you gain from long-term rest is similarly tripled. Once per day, from any distance, Abrogail Thrune II can recite a voidability clause in your Thrune contract as a 1-minute activity to prevent you from regaining Hit Points from resting for 1 day.

Activate 1 Command

Frequency once per day

Effect You recite a subclause regarding mandatory remediation from your Thrune contract. For 6 rounds, at the start of your turn each round, you recover 25 Hit Points unless you took good damage since the start of your previous turn.

Infiltrator's Accessory.name: Infiltrator's Accessory
Infiltrator's Accessory.description:
This elegant +1 striking sword cane serves equally well as a fashionable accessory and hidden weapon suitable for high-society events where weapons aren't typically permitted.

Activate A Interact

Effect You twist the sword cane's hilt, magically merging the blade into the cane. While the blade is merged, it can't be drawn and gains the benefits of a 3rd-level magic aura spell to appear non-magical. Passive observers can't attempt a check to notice the cane is anything more than a mundane, if superb, fashion accessory. Those carefully examining it can discern the cane is more than it appears, but doing so is extremely difficult (DC 30 Perception). Activating the sword cane again releases the blade, allowing it to be drawn normally.

Infiltrator's Elixir.name: 渗透者灵药 Infiltrator's Elixir
Infiltrator's Elixir.description:
启动 A 交互 Interact

受到密探和诡术师青睐的渗透者灵药能够改变你的容貌。在摄入这份灵药时，你获得符合你体型的类人生物的形态，并且与你有足够大的差别以使你无法被认出。如果你并非一个类人生物，你可能会获得一个比你自己更小的形态，具体由GM判断。由灵药的制造者决定你在摄入这瓶灵药时所转变成的形态的基础容貌，包括瞳色，肤色和发色。灵药无法将你的形态变为特定的个体。在形态改变后，你在接下里的10分钟内保持这一形态。

饮用这瓶灵药视作设下伪装进行模仿。你在避免他人看穿伪装的欺骗（Deception）DC上获得+4的状态加值，即使你在欺骗上未受训你也可以将你的等级加到这个DC上。

Injection Spear.name: Injection Spear
Injection Spear.description: A hollow receptacle inside this spear's head can store a single dose of poison. A sliding trigger along the spear's shaft can inject the loaded poison into a damaged target.

Insistent Door Knocker.name: Insistent Door Knocker
Insistent Door Knocker.description:
This dark iron door knocker comes in a variety of shapes, such as a bird clutching a ring in its talons or a gargoyle holding a ring in its mouth. Placing the door knocker on the surface of a door (an Interact action) causes it to attach and remain in place. While in place, the door knocker whispers hints to you while you attempt to unlock the door, granting a +1 item bonus to Thievery checks to Pick a Lock. Removing the door knocker from a surface requires you to use an Interact action.

Activate D command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You place the door knocker against a wall, floor, or ceiling. The door knocker fuses in place and creates a usable door within the surface. Any creature can move through the door normally, as if the door had always been there. The door can penetrate up to 1 foot of material, so thick material, such as heavy stone walls, can cause this effect to fail, expending its use for the day. A thin layer of metal in a wall, floor, or ceiling also causes the effect to fail. You can use an Interact action to release the door knocker from the surface and return the surface to its previous shape.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Thievery checks to Pick a Lock

Insistent Door Knocker (Greater).name: Insistent Door Knocker (Greater)
Insistent Door Knocker (Greater).description:
This dark iron door knocker comes in a variety of shapes, such as a bird clutching a ring in its talons or a gargoyle holding a ring in its mouth. Placing the door knocker on the surface of a door (an Interact action) causes it to attach and remain in place. While in place, the door knocker whispers hints to you while you attempt to unlock the door, granting a +2 item bonus to Thievery checks to Pick a Lock. Removing the door knocker from a surface requires you to use an Interact action.

Activate D command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You place the door knocker against a wall, floor, or ceiling. The door knocker fuses in place and creates a usable door within the surface. Any creature can move through the door normally, as if the door had always been there. The door can penetrate up to 5 feet of material, so thick material, such as heavy stone walls, can cause this effect to fail, expending its use for the day. A thin layer of metal in a wall, floor, or ceiling also causes the effect to fail. You can use an Interact action to release the door knocker from the surface and return the surface to its previous shape.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to Thievery checks to Pick a Lock

Insistent Door Knocker (Major).name: Insistent Door Knocker (Major)
Insistent Door Knocker (Major).description:
This dark iron door knocker comes in a variety of shapes, such as a bird clutching a ring in its talons or a gargoyle holding a ring in its mouth. Placing the door knocker on the surface of a door (an Interact action) causes it to attach and remain in place. While in place, the door knocker whispers hints to you while you attempt to unlock the door, granting a +3 item bonus to Thievery checks to Pick a Lock. Removing the door knocker from a surface requires you to use an Interact action.

Activate D command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You place the door knocker against a wall, floor, or ceiling. The door knocker fuses in place and creates a usable door within the surface. Any creature can move through the door normally, as if the door had always been there. The door can penetrate up to 10 feet of material, so thick material, such as heavy stone walls, can cause this effect to fail, expending its use for the day. A thin layer of metal in a wall, floor, or ceiling also causes the effect to fail. You can use an Interact action to release the door knocker from the surface and return the surface to its previous shape.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Thievery checks to Pick a Lock

Inspiring Spotlight.name: Inspiring Spotlight
Inspiring Spotlight.description:
An inspiring spotlight is a bulky contraption consisting of a drum-shaped metal housing around several reflective metal plates. Two handles on either side, each with a small button, allow you to aim the spotlight outward from your body.

Activate A Interact

Frequency Once per hour

Effect When you push the left-hand button, the inspiring spotlight emits a beam of bright magical light in a @Template[type:line|distance:120] that hangs in the air and remains in place even if you move the spotlight.
