Magical Hearing Aids.name: Magical Hearing Aids
Magical Hearing Aids.description: These curved hearing aids hook over the top and sit behind your ear, with a receiver that fits into the ear opening. The external part of the device detects sound waves and, using divination magic, transfers them down the receiver and into your ear. You can wear one or two depending on your hearing loss, and you can turn your hearing aids on or off using an Interact action.

Magical Lock Fulu.name: Magical Lock Fulu
Magical Lock Fulu.description:
Usage affixed to a door, window, or container

Duration 1 hour

The symbols on this fulu depict a lock and winding chains. Affixing this fulu over the seam or frame of the target locks it, even if it has no latch or existing lock. As many as nine fulus can be applied to the same target. One fulu equates a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.PBlxTrEyr3qXFBqq]{Poor Lock} (DC 15), three a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JZXCTwoIWoGKjMX6]{Simple Lock} (DC 20), and nine an @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.q2TYVAMaK6UfenbV]{Average Lock} (DC 25).

Magnetic Construction Set.name: Magnetic Construction Set
Magnetic Construction Set.description: This collection of small magnets and metal rods comes in a wooden box. The magnets are strong enough to firmly cling to metal objects but too weak to move or suspend them. The metal rods are a quarter of an inch in diameter and vary in length from 3 to 6 inches. If connected with the magnets, these rods can be used to build flimsy shapes and structures, which collapse if external weight or pressure is applied.

Magnetic Suit.name: Magnetic Suit
Magnetic Suit.description:
Activate 2 Interact

This magnetized suit is strapped to your body over your armor or clothes. When you Activate it, you must choose whether to set it to attract or repel.

While set to attract, you take a -1 item penalty to your AC against attacks made by metal weapons, while creatures within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] other than you gain a +1 item bonus to their AC. If set to repel, you gain a +1 item bonus to AC against attacks made with metal weapons. While attracting metal, you gain a +1 item bonus to Athletics checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb} metal objects and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} metal creatures and a -1 item penalty to Athletics checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} metal creatures. While repelling metal, you gain a +1 item bonus to Athletics checks to Shove metal creatures, but you take a -1 item penalty to Climb metal objects and Grapple metal creatures.

Magnetic Suit (Greater).name: Magnetic Suit (Greater)
Magnetic Suit (Greater).description:
Activate 2 Interact

This magnetized suit is strapped to your body over your armor or clothes. When you Activate it, you must choose whether to set it to attract or repel.

While set to attract, you take a -2 item penalty to your AC against attacks made by metal weapons, while creatures within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] other than you gain a +2 item bonus to their AC. If set to repel, you gain a +2 item bonus to AC against attacks made with metal weapons. While attracting metal, you gain a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb} metal objects and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} metal creatures and a -2 item penalty to Athletics checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} metal creatures. While repelling metal, you gain a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks to Shove metal creatures, but you take a -2 item penalty to Climb metal objects and Grapple metal creatures.

Magnetic Suit (Major).name: Magnetic Suit (Major)
Magnetic Suit (Major).description:
Activate 2 Interact

This magnetized suit is strapped to your body over your armor or clothes. When you Activate it, you must choose whether to set it to attract or repel.

While set to attract, you take a -3 item penalty to your AC against attacks made by metal weapons, while creatures within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] other than you gain a +3 item bonus to their AC. If set to repel, you gain a +3 item bonus to AC against attacks made with metal weapons. While attracting metal, you gain a +3 item bonus to Athletics checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb} metal objects and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} metal creatures and a -3 item penalty to Athletics checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} metal creatures. While repelling metal, you gain a +3 item bonus to Athletics checks to Shove metal creatures, but you take a -3 item penalty to Climb metal objects and Grapple metal creatures.

Magnetite Scope.name: Magnetite Scope
Magnetite Scope.description:
More of a field projector than a scope, this small cylinder of magnetite has been enchanted to spread and accelerate the shrapnel of a scatter weapon further than the weapon's natural capabilities. Furthermore, some of the floating magnetite inside the scope's structure can help you when attempting to determine the your allies' locations. The magnetite scope grants you a +2 item bonus to Survival checks to Sense Direction when using the scope to assist you in navigating. This scope can only be attached to firearms with the scatter trait.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect The next Strike you make this round with the gun to which the scope is attached has its scatter radius increased by 5 feet.

Magnetite Scope (Greater).name: Magnetite Scope (Greater)
Magnetite Scope (Greater).description:
More of a field projector than a scope, this small cylinder of magnetite has been enchanted to spread and accelerate the shrapnel of a scatter weapon further than the weapon's natural capabilities. Furthermore, some of the floating magnetite inside the scope's structure can help you when attempting to determine the your allies' locations. The magnetite scope grants you a +3 item bonus to Survival checks to Sense Direction when using the scope to assist you in navigating. This scope can only be attached to firearms with the scatter trait.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect The next Strike you make this round with the gun to which the scope is attached has its scatter radius increased by 10 feet.

Magnifying Glass.name: 放大镜 Magnifying Glass
Magnifying Glass.description:
这款手持式镜头为你寻找文档、织物及类似物体细节的察觉检定提供+1物品加值。

自动生效:

  • 寻找文档、织物及类似物体细节的察觉检定+1物品加值

Magnifying Glass of Elucidation.name: Magnifying Glass of Elucidation
Magnifying Glass of Elucidation.description:
These well-aged wooden magnifying glasses are engraved with a variety of runes. Each is imbued with a specific language. When you use a magnifying glass to examine writing of its imbued language, it translates the writing into a language you understand. For example, an elf who speaks only Elven using a magnifying glass of elucidation imbued with Dwarven would see Dwarven writing as Elven when observed through the magnifying glass. The magnifying glass only provides direct translations and doesn't automatically allow you to understand codes or extremely esoteric passages-you still need to attempt a skill check to Decipher Writing.

Activate 3 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You scan up to two pages of writing with the magnifying glass of elucidation, imbuing the magnifying glass with the information you scanned. You can use a separate 3-action activity to have the magnifying glass reproduce the imbued information onto blank paper exactly as it appeared when you Activated the magnifying glass. The reproduction is a direct copy of the pages but doesn't imbue the reproduction with any magical effects or other special effects. As such, you can copy the writing of a scroll, for example, but it will only be mundane writing and not have any magical effect. The magnifying glass can only hold one instance of information at a given time; Activating the magnifying glass a second time or reproducing the information clears out the magnifying glass's information.

Craft Requirements You know the language imbued in the magnifying glass.

Magnifying Scope.name: Magnifying Scope
Magnifying Scope.description:
These scopes use magically enhanced lenses to extend the range of your weapon and help spot distant foes. The scope grants you a +1 item bonus to visual Perception checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} creatures through the scope.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect While gazing through the scope, you zoom in on your targets to make it easier to hit them at a distance. You increase the range increment of the weapon to which the scope is attached by 5 feet until the beginning of your next turn or until you're no longer wielding the weapon, whichever comes first.

Magnifying Scope (Greater).name: Magnifying Scope (Greater)
Magnifying Scope (Greater).description:
These scopes use magically enhanced lenses to extend the range of your weapon and help spot distant foes. The scope grants you a +2 item bonus to visual Perception checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} creatures through the scope.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect While gazing through the scope, you zoom in on your targets to make it easier to hit them at a distance. You increase the range increment of the weapon to which the scope is attached by 10 feet until the beginning of your next turn or until you're no longer wielding the weapon, whichever comes first.

Magnifying Scope (Major).name: Magnifying Scope (Major)
Magnifying Scope (Major).description:
These scopes use magically enhanced lenses to extend the range of your weapon and help spot distant foes. The scope grants you a +3 item bonus to visual Perception checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} creatures through the scope.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect While gazing through the scope, you zoom in on your targets to make it easier to hit them at a distance. You increase the range increment of the weapon to which the scope is attached by 20 feet until the beginning of your next turn or until you're no longer wielding the weapon, whichever comes first.

Mail of Luck.name: 幸运护甲 Mail of Luck
Mail of Luck.description:
这套+2抗力板条甲在其最显眼的中心位置有着一颗巨大的绿宝石镶嵌在上。

启动 F 想象

频率 每天一次

触发 你被一次攻击命中或重击，但还未骰伤害

效果 你迫使攻击者重骰攻击检定并使用较差的结果。这个效果拥有厄运（misfortune）特征。

启动护甲效果会让绿宝石变灰并暗淡下去。直到宝石恢复绿色前你无法再次启动护甲效果。宝石会在1周后或一名敌人成功对你造成重击后恢复绿色。若敌人对你造成的重击后被你迫使重骰攻击骰，则该次重击成功不会充能幸运护甲。即便护甲的能量在短于一周的时间内充能，你也无法每天启动它超过1次。

Main-Gauche.name: 格挡匕首 Main-Gauche
Main-Gauche.description: 这种格挡匕首有坚固的刀镡保护使用者的手。

Malleable Mixture (Greater).name: Malleable Mixture (Greater)
Malleable Mixture (Greater).description:
Your bones, muscles, and organs become vastly softer and more pliable. You can fit into and through small or narrow spaces as though you were 2 sizes smaller than your normal size (minimum tiny), and you gain a +3 item bonus to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to Grapple, Shove, or Trip you for 10 minutes.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.kMPPl4AqFb6GclOL]{Effect: Malleable Mixture (Greater)}

Malleable Mixture (Lesser).name: Malleable Mixture (Lesser)
Malleable Mixture (Lesser).description:
Your bones, muscles, and organs become vastly softer and more pliable. You can fit into and through small or narrow spaces as though you were 1 size smaller than your normal size (minimum small), and you gain a +2 item bonus to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to Grapple, Shove, or Trip you for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.cozi2kUELY40Dcv3]{Effect: Malleable Mixture (Lesser)}

Malyass Root Paste.name: 烈赤根糊 Malyass Root Paste
Malyass Root Paste.description:
烈赤根糊可能被用于在运动比赛中阻碍对手，此外也有用于间谍和追踪活动。

启动 T 交互 (接触)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26]

潜伏期 1 分钟

最大持续时间 6 分钟

阶段 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} 和针对所有速度（Speeds）的-10尺状态减值 (1 分钟)

阶段 2 笨拙clumsy 2 和针对所有速度的-20尺状态减值 (1 分钟)

阶段 3 笨拙clumsy 3, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}, 和针对所有速度的-30尺状态减值

Mambele.name: Mambele
Mambele.description: Also known as a hunga munga or danisco, this hybrid knife-axe consists of a hilt and a blade that curves backward toward the wielder. The curve of the blade is such that after a victim has been struck by a mambele, more damage is dealt as the weapon is extracted from the victim's body.

Manacles (Average).name: 手铐(普通) Manacles (Average)
Manacles (Average).description: 根据生物的大小和你应用的手铐数量，你可以将一个愿意或以其他方式怜悯你的人铐起来，花费约10-30秒时间。一个双腿被铐住的的两足生物在速度上受到-15尺环境减值，并且双手被铐住的两手生物必须在任何进行操作动作的时候进行DC 5的纯粹检定，否则该动作将失败。根据手铐约束手的紧密程度，该DC可能更高。被铐到到静止物体上的生物不能移动。对于具有更多或更少肢体的生物，由GM确定手铐有什么效果。将一个生物从普通手铐中解放出来需要四次成功的DC27贼活检定

Manacles (Good).name: 手铐(优质) Manacles (Good)
Manacles (Good).description: 根据生物的大小和你应用的手铐数量，你可以将一个愿意或以其他方式怜悯你的人铐起来，花费约10-30秒时间。一个双腿被铐住的的两足生物在速度上受到-15尺环境减值，并且双手被铐住的两手生物必须在任何进行操作动作的时候进行DC 5的纯粹检定，否则该动作将失败。根据手铐约束手的紧密程度，该DC可能更高。被铐到到静止物体上的生物不能移动。对于具有更多或更少肢体的生物，由GM确定手铐有什么效果。将一个生物从优质手铐中解放出来需要五次成功的DC32贼活检定

Manacles (Poor).name: 手铐(简陋) Manacles (Poor)
Manacles (Poor).description: 根据生物的大小和你应用的手铐数量，你可以将一个愿意或以其他方式怜悯你的人铐起来，花费约10-30秒时间。一个双腿被铐住的的两足生物在速度上受到-15尺环境减值，并且双手被铐住的两手生物必须在任何进行操作动作的时候进行DC 5的纯粹检定，否则该动作将失败。根据手铐约束手的紧密程度，该DC可能更高。被铐到到静止物体上的生物不能移动。对于具有更多或更少肢体的生物，由GM确定手铐有什么效果。将一个生物从简陋手铐中解放出来需要两次成功的DC17贼活检定。

Manacles (Simple).name: 手铐(简单) Manacles (Simple)
Manacles (Simple).description: 根据生物的大小和你应用的手铐数量，你可以将一个愿意或以其他方式怜悯你的人铐起来，花费约10-30秒时间。一个双腿被铐住的的两足生物在速度上受到-15尺环境减值，并且双手被铐住的两手生物必须在任何进行操作动作的时候进行DC 5的纯粹检定，否则该动作将失败。根据手铐约束手的紧密程度，该DC可能更高。被铐到到静止物体上的生物不能移动。对于具有更多或更少肢体的生物，由GM确定手铐有什么效果。将一个生物从简单手铐中解放出来需要三次成功的DC22贼活检定。

Manacles (Superior).name: 手铐(究极) Manacles (Superior)
Manacles (Superior).description: 根据生物的大小和你应用的手铐数量，你可以将一个愿意或以其他方式怜悯你的人铐起来，花费约10-30秒时间。一个双腿被铐住的的两足生物在速度上受到-15尺环境减值，并且双手被铐住的两手生物必须在任何进行操作动作的时候进行DC 5的纯粹检定，否则该动作将失败。根据手铐约束手的紧密程度，该DC可能更高。被铐到到静止物体上的生物不能移动。对于具有更多或更少肢体的生物，由GM确定手铐有什么效果。将一个生物从究极手铐中解放出来需要六次成功的DC40贼活检定。

Manacles of Persuasion.name: Manacles of Persuasion
Manacles of Persuasion.description: These sturdy, average manacles are connected by a thick iron chain that is much heavier than its appearance suggests at a glance. Followers of Zon-Kuthon sometimes employ manacles of persuasion against captured enemies and spies. When the manacles are locked around an immobilized creature's wrists, they begin to sap the life out of the victim, dealing 2 negative damage per hour until the creature falls unconscious. The effect is nonlethal, so the damage doesn't cause the creature to become dying. While the creature is unconscious, the manacles deal no damage and allow the creature to recover Hit Points normally to a maximum of 10 Hit Points, at which point the manacles begin to deal damage once more. The manacles have no effect on a creature that is not immobilized.

Mantle of the Grogrisant.name: Mantle of the Grogrisant
Mantle of the Grogrisant.description:
This long, golden cloak is among the royal regalia of the emperors of Taldor. It was fashioned from the pelt of Grogrisant itself, after being slain by Taldaris, and Grogrisant's mane was fashioned into a thick fringe that runs all along the mantle's edges. The paws of the Grogrisant cross beneath the wearer's throat, giving you an imposing appearance. The Mantle of the Grogrisant grants you fire resistance 15 and physical resistance 5 (except bludgeoning).

Activate 1 envision, Interact (evocation, incapacitation, light, primal, visual)

Frequency once per day

Effect You pull the hood of the mantle over your face, revealing the six eyes of Grogrisant. The mantle gives off a flash of blinding light in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60]. All enemies within this area must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38|name:Blinding Flash|traits:evocation,incapacitation,light,visual] saving throw. On a failure, they're @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 minute. On a critical failure, they're permanently blinded.

Marbles.name: Marbles
Marbles.description: These tiny round balls are made of polished stone and colorful glass, and come in a bag of 200. You can pour marbles in an empty square adjacent to you with an Interact action. The first creature that moves into that square must succeed at a @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:13] check or @Check[type:reflex|dc:13] save (its choice) or fall @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. Once a creature enters a space with marbles, enough marbles are scattered that other creatures moving into that space don't need to attempt a roll to avoid falling.

Mariner's Astrolabe.name: Mariner's Astrolabe
Mariner's Astrolabe.description:
Activate 1 minute (Interact)

Astrolabes can be used for navigation in unfamiliar or featureless locations. To use an astrolabe, the holder must be trained in Survival.

By spending 1 minute to measure the height of the stars and planets, a holder who knows the time and date can determine the latitude, and a holder who knows their latitude can determine the date and time.

An astrolabe also grants a +1 item bonus on checks to identify celestial bodies. A mariner's astrolabe contains additional stabilizers that make it suitable for use on moving surfaces, such as the deck of a ship.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus on checks to identify celestial bodies

Marked Playing Cards.name: Marked Playing Cards
Marked Playing Cards.description: A deck of marked playing cards appears to be an ordinary deck upon initial inspection but bears specific folds, colors, scratches, or other markings on each card that allow an informed user to know what's on the other side of a card. A deck of marked cards grants you a +1 item bonus to Games Lore checks or other relevant checks to gamble with the cards. You can determine that an unattended deck of cards is marked with a successful DC 20 Perception check. Determining that a deck is marked during play is more difficult and is typically determined by a Perception check against the dealer's Games Lore or Thievery DC.

Marking Snare.name: 标记圈套 Marking Snare
Marking Snare.description:
这个圈套能用来标记闯入者，以便接下来的追踪和辨识工作。当你制造这个圈套时，你必须决定使用颜色标记还是气味标记。哪一种标记方法都会为追踪Track该生物的检定上提供+2环境加值，持续24小时或直到标记物被洗去（洗去标记物需要使用10加仑的水清洗10分钟）。一个进入圈套格子的生物必须进行一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:17] 豁免。

成功 该生物不受影响

失败 圈套成功标记该生物

大失败 圈套成功标记该生物，而且该生物到它的下个回合结束前都陷入目盲Blinded。

Martyr's Shield.name: Martyr's Shield
Martyr's Shield.description:
Perception +12; precise vision 30 feet, imprecise hearing 30 feet

Communication speech (Common and Celestial)

Skills Diplomacy +15, Religion +13

Int +0, Wis +2, Cha +4

Will +15

A martyr's shield is a lesser sturdy shield imbued with the compassion of a devout champion of a righteous deity, like Iomedae or Vildeis, who sacrificed themself to save an ally. In addition to good-naturedly attempting to convert you to its religion, the martyr's shield can use 1 reaction each round that, when raised, it uses to Shield Block to protect an ally adjacent to you, with the effects of the Shield Warden feat. The martyr's shield uses this reaction whether you would prefer it did so or not. The martyr's shield can be upgraded to a stronger form of sturdy shield by paying the difference in cost between its current type of sturdy shield and the new type.

Marvelous Calliope.name: Marvelous Calliope
Marvelous Calliope.description:
This large slide whistle appears to be made of fine brass, the sides of which are engraved with musical notes and dancing clowns.

Activate 1 minute (command, envision, Interact)

Effect You blow a tune upon the slide whistle, causing the whistle to expand. The whistle sprouts from one into several, and then creates a large wooden frame and keyboard. By the time the unfolding is complete, the whistle fully transforms into a calliope, a wagon-sized contraption consisting of several steam whistles played like an organ. The calliope is heavy and anchored in place.

You have a +1 item bonus to Performance checks to play the calliope. The calliope has a tendency to produce music for a few seconds after you cease playing it, adding a jaunty and overlong conclusion to your music.

If you use an Interact action to pull the small metal ring on the underside of the marvelous calliope, the calliope collapses back down into a slide whistle.

Activate D Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect You play the calliope, causing it to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{Charm} on one of the listeners.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Performance checks while playing music the calliope

Marvelous Medicines.name: 神奇药箱 Marvelous Medicines
Marvelous Medicines.description:
这套医疗工具包仿佛容纳着无穷无尽的绷带、草药和医疗攻击，这些物品都有着完美的品质，可以为你的医疗检定提供+2物品加值。

启动 A 治疗中毒，或者8小时（治疗疾病）

效果 你能够在治疗毒素时使用这套工具对患者施加 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{中和毒素 Neutralize Poison}的效果，或是在治疗疾病时为患者施加 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.RneiyehRO6f7LP44]{移除疾病 Remove Disease}的效果。

一旦这些药物被用来尝试治愈一名患者的毒素或是疾病之后，便无法再次使用它们来治愈这名患者身上相同的苦难。

自动生效:

  • 医疗检定获得+2物品加值

Marvelous Medicines (Greater).name: 高等神奇药箱 Marvelous Medicines (Greater)
Marvelous Medicines (Greater).description:
这套医疗工具包仿佛容纳着无穷无尽的绷带、草药和医疗攻击，这些物品都有着完美的品质，可以为你的医疗检定提供+3物品加值。

启动 A 治疗中毒，或者8小时（治疗疾病）

效果 你能够在治疗毒素时使用这套工具对患者施加6环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{中和毒素 Neutralize Poison}的效果，或是在治疗疾病时为患者施加6环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.RneiyehRO6f7LP44]{移除疾病 Remove Disease}的效果。

一旦这些药物被用来尝试治愈一名患者的毒素或是疾病之后，便无法再次使用它们来治愈这名患者身上相同的苦难。

自动生效:

  • 医疗检定获得+3物品加值

Mask (Fine).name: Mask (Fine)
Mask (Fine).description:
A mask helps you use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate} action to pass yourself off as someone you aren't.

This well-crafted mask, suitable for a noble at a masquerade, is made with impeccable craftsmanship and expensive material, such as porcelain and gold filigree.

Mask (Ordinary).name: Mask (Ordinary)
Mask (Ordinary).description:
A mask helps you use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate} action to pass yourself off as someone you aren't.

This ordinary mask is made out of cheap material, such as paper-mâché or simple cloth. This can be specially fitted over another mask.

Mask (Plague).name: Mask (Plague)
Mask (Plague).description:
A mask helps you use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate} action to pass yourself off as someone you aren't.

This stylized bird mask is equipped with a basic filter. The plague mask attempts to counteract any inhaled poisons or airborne diseases each round you breathe. The same replacement filters used in @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.kDrlBnkDMVxPrahI]{Water Purifiers} can be used with a plague mask, granting you the counteract modifier and effects of the filter for 20 minutes.

Plague masks are uncommon items because the filters they use to protect from inhaled poisons and diseases are themselves uncommon. As such, you can buy a plague mask without a filter as a common item, though it's usually more cost-effective to buy a fine mask in the shape of a plague mask in that case.

Mask (Rubber).name: Mask (Rubber)
Mask (Rubber).description:
A mask helps you use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate} action to pass yourself off as someone you aren't.

Rubber masks are sculpted to resemble the face of another creature. You can use this mask to help decrease the difficulty of Impersonating a specific creature with a very different face than yours.

Mask of Allure.name: Mask of Allure
Mask of Allure.description:
This mask appears to be a pool of mirrored, shifting silver adhered to a thin metal plate. When you place it against your face, it melds to the shape of your head. The material is breathable and light, and does not obscure vision. You gain a +2 item bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, and Performance checks while wearing the mask.

When you invest the mask, you either increase your Charisma score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever would give you a higher score.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.zZsdex5orF5Odpus]{Equipment Effect: Mask of Allure}

Activate f envision (visual)

Frequency once per day

Trigger You attempt a Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, or Performance check

Effect You gain a +4 status bonus to the triggering check. This ability has no effect if you're under the effects of a disguise that hides the mask of allure. Depending on the skill used, the mirrored silver transforms into one of the following appearances.

  • Deception A swirl of silver, which entirely obscures and conceals your normal features.
  • Diplomacy A kind, gentle and inviting expression.
  • Intimidation A monstrous visage that shocks viewers into paying attention.
  • Performance A jovial humanoid face, the mouth cracked wide with a comedic smile or a tragic frown, depending on the nature of the performance.

Mask of Mercy.name: Mask of Mercy
Mask of Mercy.description:
This porcelain or alabaster mask portrays an angelic visage of kindness and mercy.

Activate F envision (fortune)

Frequency once per day

Trigger You are about to roll a variable number of Hit Points you restore from an action with the healing trait

Effect Roll twice to determine the number of Hit Points you restore and take the higher result.

Mask of the Banshee.name: Mask of the Banshee
Mask of the Banshee.description:
This ice-blue half-mask is adorned with a wicked silver grin that covers the wearer's mouth, leaving the rest of the face uncovered. You gain a +2 item bonus to Intimidation checks.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect The mask emits a soul-chilling scream that deals [[/r 6d10]] negative damage to each living creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:25|basic:true] save).

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of wail of the banshee.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to Intimidation checks

Mask of the Banshee (Greater).name: Mask of the Banshee (Greater)
Mask of the Banshee (Greater).description:
This ice-blue half-mask is adorned with a wicked silver grin that covers the wearer's mouth, leaving the rest of the face uncovered. You gain a +3 item bonus to Intimidation checks.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect The mask emits a soul-chilling scream that deals [[/r 8d10]] negative damage to each living creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:40] (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:41|basic:true|name:Greater Mask of the Banshee] save).

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of wail of the banshee.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +3 item bonus to Intimidation checks

Mask of the Cursed Eye.name: Mask of the Cursed Eye
Mask of the Cursed Eye.description:
These masks are always decorated with at least one wide, staring eye. The first time each day a creature on your plane that you can't perceive targets you with a divination spell, the creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:24] save. This effect is automatic and does not require you to Activate the item.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is unaffected. You know you've been targeted with a divination spell, but the mask gives you no additional information.

Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 minute. You know you've been targeted with a divination spell, but the mask gives you no additional information.

Critical Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} and dazzled for 10 minutes, and the spell is disrupted. You gain a brief mental glimpse of the triggering creature and learn its approximate distance and direction.

Matchmaker Fulu.name: Matchmaker Fulu
Matchmaker Fulu.description:
Activate f envision

Trigger You attempt a Diplomacy check to Make an Impression.

This red fulu contains blessings for one's relationship from Shelyn, goddess of beauty and love. You get a +2 status bonus to the Diplomacy check, and if you roll a critical failure on the check, you get a failure instead.

Material Component Pouch.name: 施法材料包 Material Component Pouch
Material Component Pouch.description: 这个小袋包含那些需要材料的法术的材料成分。虽然组分会随着时间的推移而耗尽，但你可以在休整期内重新补充用过的组分。

Material Essence Disruptor (Greater).name: Material Essence Disruptor (Greater)
Material Essence Disruptor (Greater).description:
Activate d Interact

A material essence disruptor emits bursts of disordered energy to break down the structure of a spell that manipulates material essence. Attempt to counteract an active arcane or primal spell within the listed range, with the listed counteract modifier and counteract level.

The range is 60 feet, the counteract modifier is +18 [[/r d20+18]], and the counteract level is 6.

Material Essence Disruptor (Lesser).name: Material Essence Disruptor (Lesser)
Material Essence Disruptor (Lesser).description:
Activate d Interact

A material essence disruptor emits bursts of disordered energy to break down the structure of a spell that manipulates material essence. Attempt to counteract an active arcane or primal spell within the listed range, with the listed counteract modifier and counteract level.

The range is 30 feet, the counteract modifier is +7 [[/r d20+7]], and the counteract level is 2.

Material Essence Disruptor (Major).name: Material Essence Disruptor (Major)
Material Essence Disruptor (Major).description:
Activate d Interact

A material essence disruptor emits bursts of disordered energy to break down the structure of a spell that manipulates material essence. Attempt to counteract an active arcane or primal spell within the listed range, with the listed counteract modifier and counteract level.

The range is 90 feet, the counteract modifier is +24 [[/r d20+24]], and the counteract level is 8.

Material Essence Disruptor (Moderate).name: Material Essence Disruptor (Moderate)
Material Essence Disruptor (Moderate).description:
Activate d Interact

A material essence disruptor emits bursts of disordered energy to break down the structure of a spell that manipulates material essence. Attempt to counteract an active arcane or primal spell within the listed range, with the listed counteract modifier and counteract level.

The range is 40 feet, the counteract modifier is +13 [[/r d20+13]], and the counteract level is 4.

Mattock of the Titans.name: 泰坦之锄 Mattock of the Titans
Mattock of the Titans.description:
这柄15尺长的精金挖掘工具即便对大体系生物而言都过于巨大。若你是小体型或更大的生物，当你穿戴巨人力量腰带后，则可将其视为合适体型的物品使用，负载视为2B。若你能一定程度持握越型武器，GM也可以允许你持握这柄锄头，例如巨人本能的大型野蛮人或巨型生物。若将其作为武器使用，泰坦之锄使用+3高等强击 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hg3IogR8ue2IWwgS]{锋锐 Keen}精金巨镐的数据。

当你持握泰坦之锄时，你的运动技能检定获得+3物品加值。你能使用它在软土地上刨土，每分钟5立方尺，或在硬石地上掘土，每5分钟5立方尺。

启动 D 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 你用泰坦之锄快速掘地，制造非魔法的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.x7SPrsRxGb2Vy2nu]地震术 {Earthquake}法术效果。

制造需求 你是一名泰坦，原材料中必须包含8100gp的精金。

自动生效:

  • 运动技能检定获得+3物品加值

Maul.name: 大锤 Maul
Maul.description: 大锤是大号的战锤，必须用双手挥舞。

Mechanical Torch.name: Mechanical Torch
Mechanical Torch.description: Powered by electricity, you can turn a mechanical torch on and off by toggling a lever on the torch with an Interact action. When active, the torch sheds bright light in either a 20-foot radius (and dim light to the next 40 feet) or a 40‑foot cone (and dim light to the next 40 feet). Changing this area requires a single Interact action to flip a switch. The torch carries sufficient charge to operate for ten minutes. You can recharge the torch in 1 minute via an integrated crank-charging mechanism, turning the clockwork gears and generating sparks to power the torch, though doing so requires two hands

Medusa Armor.name: Medusa Armor
Medusa Armor.description: This +2 adamantine scale mail appears to have a fortification rune but grants none of its effects. Whenever you are critically hit, after taking damage, you become petrified for 1 round. Once the curse has activated for the first time, the armor fuses to you.

Medusa's Scream.name: Medusa's Scream
Medusa's Scream.description:
The ghastly visage of a slain medusa's head stares out from this steel shield (Hardness 13, HP 52, BT 26). The shield comes with a thick leather cover to conceal the head.

Activate 2 Interact (visual)

Frequency once per day

Effect You reveal the medusa's face, focusing its gaze on one creature within 30 feet. The shield casts flesh to stone with a range of 30 feet.

Craft Requirements The initial raw materials must include the head of a medusa.

Hardness HP BT
13 52 26

Medusa's Scream (Greater).name: Medusa's Scream (Greater)
Medusa's Scream (Greater).description:
The ghastly visage of a slain medusa's head stares out from this steel shield (Hardness 15, HP 60, BT 30). The shield comes with a thick leather cover to conceal the head.

Activate 2 Interact (visual)

Frequency once per hour

Effect You reveal the medusa's face, focusing its gaze on one creature within 30 feet. The shield casts flesh to stone with a range of 30 feet and a DC of 35.

Craft Requirements The initial raw materials must include the head of a medusa.

Hardness HP BT
15 60 30

Memory Palace.name: Memory Palace
Memory Palace.description:
A memory palace is an elaborate magical structure that safely stores memories for easy access. It appears to be a miniature Taldan villa small enough to fit in the palm of a human hand.

Activate (10 minutes) envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect The miniature grows into a building connected to the Astral Plane for 1 hour. The memory palace has a 30-foot-square central courtyard surrounded by 12 10‑foot-square chambers. Arranged within these chambers are various items referred to as the palace's nodes-statues, tapestries, fountains, and other works of art are common, but a node can take other forms at the GM's discretion. As a 10‑minute activity, you can imprint one extended memory onto a node: the contents of a specific simple book, for example, or the events of a recent adventure. When you do, the node changes its shape and appearance to visually represent the memory you have imprinted onto it. If the node was already imprinted with a memory, the old one can be overwritten to repurpose the node.

Memories you have imprinted on a node can be mentally accessed at any time by a creature holding the memory palace in its miniature form, regardless of who imprinted them. This grants a +2 item bonus to Recall Knowledge checks relating to details specifically occurring within the memory. What exactly qualifies is up to the GM's discretion, but a node shouldn't grant the benefits for most uses of a given skill. For example, a node dedicated to a book about trees found in the Mwangi Expanse would help with Recall Knowledge checks for such trees, but it wouldn't grant the benefits for all Nature checks to Recall Knowledge.

A memory palace node can also store the text from a spellbook or magical tome, but these memories aren't a substitute for having the book in your possession. A wizard can't prepare spells from a memory palace, though they could use it as source material to try to Learn a Spell. However, since storing spells in a node would only benefit someone else who later discovers the memory palace, few choose to take such an action. The memories contained within the nodes aren't real, and thus don't cause harmful effects, even if the source of the memory was a mental danger. Many memory palaces have leftover memories from previous users-now long dead-imprinted on their various nodes.

Mending Lattice.name: 修复格栅 Mending Lattice
Mending Lattice.description:
这个强化铁制成的格栅有着完美的八边形外表。当你启动它，它抵消掉即将受到的伤害并立刻完美地修复附着的物品。

启动 F 命令

触发 附着的物品即将受到伤害

需求 你在手艺Crafting上达到大师

Mentalist's Staff.name: 心灵师法杖 Mentalist's Staff
Mentalist's Staff.description:
这根磨光的木杖上有着一个旋转的图案，让人想起大脑的褶皱。持握该法杖时，你在鉴别心灵法术的检定上获得+2环境加值。

启动 施放法术

效果 你消耗一定充能从法杖法术列表中施放法术。

  • 戏法 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4gBIw4IDrSfFHik4]{晕眩术 Daze}
  • 1环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.D442XMADp01qJ7Cs]{讯息传递 Mindlink} @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.R8bqnYiThB6MYTxD]{幻痛 Phantom Pain}

自动生效:

  • 鉴别心灵法术的检定上获得+2环境加值

Merchant's Guile.name: Merchant's Guile
Merchant's Guile.description:
The band of this ring is made from blue-colored iron and has two sharp, decorative protrusions on each side of the red-stone inlay. It feels quite heavy and reliable. Wearing this ring grants you a +2 item bonus to Deception and Diplomacy checks, but only if the associated checks involve haggling or bargaining over a purchase or trade.

Activate T envision, interact

Effect You can determine if an item is magical simply by handling it. You detect no other indication of its power, only whether or not it is magical, granting the effects of a 1st-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic} spell that affects only the object.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to Deception and Diplomacy checks to haggle or bargain

Mercurial Mantle.name: Mercurial Mantle
Mercurial Mantle.description:
This deep red cloak fits lightly about your shoulders, and the edges perpetually twitch slightly, as though caught in a breeze. The cloth feels smoother than silk, rippling and swaying like liquid when in motion. You feel a lively energy infusing your arms and legs. You gain a +3 item bonus to Acrobatics and Stealth, and a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against attacks from reactions triggered by your movement.

When you invest the cloak, you either increase your Dexterity score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever would give you a higher score.

Activate r Interact

Frequency once per hour

Trigger An enemy misses you with a melee Strike

Effect You slip around the attacking creature with ease. You Step, without moving away from the triggering enemy, and then make a melee Strike against the triggering enemy if it's within reach. If you do make a Strike, the target attempts a @Check[type:perception|dc:38|name:Detect Reaction|showDC:all] check before you roll.

Failure This creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against the Strike.

Critical Failure This creature is flat-footed against all your attacks until the end of their next turn.

Activate 2 command, envision (conjuration, teleportation)

Frequency once per day

Effect The cloak hums with power as your whirl it around yourself, disappearing amid a brief flash of light. Teleport up to double your Speed to a location you can see. At the end of the teleportation, you can make a melee Strike against a creature within reach, if there is one.

Mesmerizing Opal.name: 迷心蛋白石 Mesmerizing Opal
Mesmerizing Opal.description:
启动 F 想象

触发 你进行一次用来虚招Feint的欺骗Deception检定，但尚未投掷结果

这枚吊在银链上的蛋白石垂饰洋溢着灿烂的光辉。当你启动它，如果你用来触发的欺骗Deception检定结果是大失败，则改成失败；如果结果是成功，则改成大成功。

Messenger's Ring.name: 信使戒指 Messenger's Ring
Messenger's Ring.description:
这只银质的纹章戒指会发生变化以将其上的纹章转变成你所服侍领主或组织的纹章（或者是你自己的脸，如果你没有服务于任何其他人）。它为你在交涉Diplomacy检定上提供+2物品加值，并让你可以以奥术内在法术的形式随意施展@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLzFcIaSXs7YTIqJ]{短讯术 Message} 。

启动 1 分钟 (想象)

频率 每天一次

效果 戒指会为你施展 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yhz9fF69uwRhnHix]{动物信使 Animal Messenger}。这个动物是一个从戒指中跳出来的魔法生物，它的外表会与你服侍的领主或组织的肖像及纹章含义相匹配。

自动生效:

  • 交涉Diplomacy检定获得+2物品加值

Messenger's Ring (Greater).name: 高等信使戒指 Messenger's Ring (Greater)
Messenger's Ring (Greater).description:
这只银质的纹章戒指会发生变化以将其上的纹章转变成你所服侍领主或组织的纹章（或者是你自己的脸，如果你没有服务于任何其他人）。它为你在交涉Diplomacy检定上提供+3物品加值，并让你可以以奥术内在法术的形式随意施展 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLzFcIaSXs7YTIqJ]{短讯术 Message}。

启动 T 命令

频率 每小时一次

效果 戒指会为你施展 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.R9xqCBblkS5KE4y7]{传讯术 Sending}。

自动生效:

  • 交涉Diplomacy检定获得+3物品加值

Metalmist Sphere (Greater).name: Metalmist Sphere (Greater)
Metalmist Sphere (Greater).description:
Activate A Interact

This sphere contains small fragments of thunderstones within a colloidal suspension of a precious metal. When you twist the sphere, it creates an opaque mist in a burst centered on one corner of your space. Creatures within that area are concealed, and all other creatures are concealed to them. Any creature with a weakness to the precious metal that starts its turn in the mist takes damage equal to its weakness. The mist lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by a strong wind. Most metalmist spheres are filled with silver or cold iron, but more expensive versions containing other ingredients might exist.

The radius of the burst is 15 feet.

Metalmist Sphere (Lesser).name: Metalmist Sphere (Lesser)
Metalmist Sphere (Lesser).description:
Activate A Interact

This sphere contains small fragments of thunderstones within a colloidal suspension of a precious metal. When you twist the sphere, it creates an opaque mist in a burst centered on one corner of your space. Creatures within that area are concealed, and all other creatures are concealed to them. Any creature with a weakness to the precious metal that starts its turn in the mist takes damage equal to its weakness. The mist lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by a strong wind. Most metalmist spheres are filled with silver or cold iron, but more expensive versions containing other ingredients might exist.

The radius of the burst is 5 feet.

Metalmist Sphere (Moderate).name: Metalmist Sphere (Moderate)
Metalmist Sphere (Moderate).description:
Activate A Interact

This sphere contains small fragments of thunderstones within a colloidal suspension of a precious metal. When you twist the sphere, it creates an opaque mist in a burst centered on one corner of your space. Creatures within that area are concealed, and all other creatures are concealed to them. Any creature with a weakness to the precious metal that starts its turn in the mist takes damage equal to its weakness. The mist lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by a strong wind. Most metalmist spheres are filled with silver or cold iron, but more expensive versions containing other ingredients might exist.

The radius of the burst is 10 feet.

Meteor Hammer.name: Meteor Hammer
Meteor Hammer.description: This weapon consists of a long chain connected to a heavy weight at one end. When a wielder swings the weight by the chain, it builds momentum and can serve as a deadly bludgeon with incredible reach.

Meteor Shot.name: Meteor Shot
Meteor Shot.description:
Ammunition round

Activate 1 Interact

This craggy stone ammunition is warm to the touch. When you fire an activated meteor shot, it explodes into a small swarm of meteors as it reaches its target, scorching nearby creatures and littering the ground with rubble. In addition to the weapon's normal damage, the meteor shot deals fire damage and the ground in the area becomes difficult terrain.

The ammunition deals [[/r {3d6}[fire]]]{3d6 fire damage} in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5|damaging:true] around the target (@Check[type:reflex|dc:23|basic:true] save).

In addition, the Strike gains the following critical failure effect.

Critical Failure The weapon misfires.

Meteor Shot (Greater).name: Meteor Shot (Greater)
Meteor Shot (Greater).description:
Ammunition round

Activate 1 Interact

This craggy stone ammunition is warm to the touch. When you fire an activated meteor shot, it explodes into a small swarm of meteors as it reaches its target, scorching nearby creatures and littering the ground with rubble. In addition to the weapon's normal damage, the meteor shot deals fire damage and the ground in the area becomes difficult terrain.

The ammunition deals [[/r {6d6}[fire]]]{6d6 fire damage} in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10|damaging:true] around the target (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true|name:Meteor Shot] save).

In addition, the Strike gains the following critical failure effect.

Critical Failure The weapon misfires.

Meteor Shot (Major).name: Meteor Shot (Major)
Meteor Shot (Major).description:
Ammunition round

Activate 1 Interact

This craggy stone ammunition is warm to the touch. When you fire an activated meteor shot, it explodes into a small swarm of meteors as it reaches its target, scorching nearby creatures and littering the ground with rubble. In addition to the weapon's normal damage, the meteor shot deals fire damage and the ground in the area becomes difficult terrain.

The ammunition deals [[/r {9d6}[fire]]]{9d6 fire damage} in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20|damaging:true] around the target (@Check[type:reflex|dc:37|basic:true|name:Meteor Shot] save).

In addition, the Strike gains the following critical failure effect.

Critical Failure The weapon misfires.

Midday Lantern (Greater).name: Midday Lantern (Greater)
Midday Lantern (Greater).description:
This hooded lantern is made from brilliant, reinforced gold engraved with the image of the sun high in the sky. The lantern uses oil, as a standard lantern, except that any light the lantern emits is magical and similar to sunlight. The lantern doesn't emit dim light, instead only emitting bright light to its normal radius (20 feet for typical lights when using oil). This bright light is close enough to sunlight to open temple doors that require sunlight or similar light, but it doesn't shine direct sunlight, so it doesn't trigger effects such as a vampire's sunlight weakness.

Activate 1 to 3 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You raise the lantern and unleash a blast of powerful sunlight. The blast has the effects of 6th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ZxHC7V7HtjUsB8zH]{Scorching Ray} using a spell attack roll of [[/r {1d20+26} #Midday Lantern (Greater)]]{+26}, with its effect determined by the number of actions you used to activate the lantern.

Midday Lantern (Lesser).description:

This bright light is close enough to sunlight to open temple doors that require sunlight or similar light, but it doesn't shine direct sunlight, so it doesn't trigger effects such as a vampire's sunlight weakness.

Activate 1 to 3 envision, Interact

Mindfog Mist.name: 惑心迷雾 Mindfog Mist
Mindfog Mist.description:
惑心迷雾通常用于针对施法者，因为它能对受害者的心智能力产生迅速而又强力的影响。

启动 A 交互 (吸入)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:35]

潜伏期 1 轮

最大持续时间 6 轮

阶段 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} (1 轮)

阶段 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused} 和 呆滞stupefied 3 (1 轮)

阶段 3 困惑confused 和 呆滞stupefied 4 (1 轮)

Minotaur Chair.name: Minotaur Chair
Minotaur Chair.description:
A minotaur chair is a traveler's chair with chair storage, impulse control, and +1 striking wounding wheel spikes. The wheel spikes can have runes upgraded, transferred, or added as normal. The chair magically stores the kinetic energy from movement throughout the day, allowing you to expend it to make a powerful rushing charge.

Activate 2 Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect You rush forward with the wheelchair in a powerful charge, bowling through foes who stand in the way. Stride in a straight line, moving through enemies' spaces and making an attack with the wheel spikes against every foe in the line. If the foe is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}, the following effects apply: the attack gains a +1 circumstance bonus to damage per weapon damage die, and the wounding rune deals [[/r {1d12}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} on a hit (or [[/r {3d6}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} on a critical hit).

Miogimo's Mask.name: Miogimo's Mask
Miogimo's Mask.description:
The crime lord Miogimo almost always appears with this special mask, crafted with a piece of his soul.

It has two forms. In its first form, the mask depicts a silvery and angelic face; while wearing the mask in this form, your alignment appears as lawful good to creatures attempting to detect your alignment. In its second form, the mask depicts a gold-skinned demonic face; while wearing the mask in this form, your alignment appears as chaotic evil to creatures attempting to detect your alignment. If you die while wearing the mask, a fragment of your soul is trapped in the mask, forming a life link. If there was already a soul fragment in the mask when this happens, you roll a @Check[type:will] save against the Will DC of the person who left the previous fragment. If you succeed, your soul fragment replaces the old one. On a failure, you die normally.

Activate1 envision

Effect You switch the mask to its other form.

Activate2 envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.3x6eUCm17n6ROzUa]{Crisis of Faith} (@Check[type:will|dc:34|name:Crisis of Faith|traits:divine,enchantment,mental]), targeting up to four creatures within 30 feet. If the mask is in its angelic form, you can target only evil and neutral creatures. If the mask is in its demonic form, you can target only good and neutral creatures.

Activate 10 minutes (command, envision, Interact)

Requirements A soul fragment is in the mask

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.FM3SmEW8N1FCRjqt]{Talking Corpse} on the soul fragment, except you communicate telepathically and don't require the fragment's body to speak.

Mirror Robe.name: Mirror Robe
Mirror Robe.description:
Thousands of small, reflective, mirrored glass shards have been carefully stitched down this long silk duster.

Activate 1 Interact

Requirements The mirror robe was last activated to draw attention toward you, or you haven't used the mirror robe today

Effect The mirror robe Creates a Diversion for you with a [[/r {1d20+9} #Mirror Robe Deception]]{+9} Deception modifier.

Activate 1 Interact (visual)

Requirements The mirror robe was last activated to divert attention away from you and you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} by at least one foe

Effect You draw attention toward yourself. Choose one foe to which you were hidden or undetected. You reveal yourself to all, becoming observed. The foe you chose diverts its attention to you, becoming @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} to your allies until the beginning of your next turn. If you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} or otherwise can't become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.1wQY3JYyhMYeeV2G]{Observed}, you can't use this activation.

Mirror of Sleeping Vigil.name: Mirror of Sleeping Vigil
Mirror of Sleeping Vigil.description: This jeweled mirror grants you gain greater control over your dreaming self. While invested, you can watch over your sleeping body from the Dreamlands, letting you see your own body and a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] around you, though you can't hear, smell, or use other senses from your dreaming self. You do not take the -4 status penalty to visual Perception checks in that area or gain the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} condition from being @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} against creatures in that area. As long as you fell asleep voluntarily and not from a sleep effect, you can automatically wake up from sleep if there is visible activity around you.

Mirror of Sorshen.name: Mirror of Sorshen
Mirror of Sorshen.description:
The silvery glass of this oval mirror displays alluring sights. Its dark wooden frame is studded with small green gems and is carved with the shapes of a male figure on one edge of the glass and a female figure on the other side.

The mirror can form a bond with a spellcaster who has legendary proficiency in Arcana or Occultism, who becomes the mirror's owner. Regardless of where the mirror is, as long as the bond remains, the owner is aware of everything the mirror is currently reflecting and can use the mirror's activations.

Whenever an intelligent creature looks in the mirror, they see an image of a person, creature, or item they find irresistible-most often one they find attractive. The specific image varies depending on the observer, even when more than one creature is looking into the mirror at the same time. Observers are fascinated by the images in the mirror unless they succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:35|traits:emotion,incapacitation,visual] save each round. On a failure, they stare blankly at the mirror for as long as it remains in view, and if it leaves their view, they stare toward the last place they saw the mirror for several minutes thereafter. This is an emotion, enchantment, incapacitation, and visual effect. Creatures that are fascinated by the mirror are so deeply entranced that they don't end their fascinated condition automatically even if a creature uses hostile actions against them or their allies; instead, they can attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:30|traits:emotion,incapacitation,visual] save to end the fascination. At the GM's discretion, a truly innocent creature or a creature that has renounced all worldly pleasures might be immune to the mirror's fascination.

Activate D envision (emotion, enchantment, incapacitation, visual)

Effect You force a creature looking at the mirror to attempt an additional Will save against the mirror's fascination effect, even if they succeeded at their save.

Activate T command (emotion, enchantment, incapacitation)

Requirements The target must be fascinated by the mirror

Effect You control the target for 30 days, with the effect of a critically failed saving throw against @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OsOhx3TGIZ7AhD0P]{Dominate}. If the victim sees the mirror again at any point before this duration expires, the control extends for an additional 30 days from the moment it looked at the mirror again. While there is no initial saving throw, the DC to break free due to commands against the creature's nature is 35.

Destruction The Mirror of Sorshen shatters into a thousand pieces if an intelligent but completely innocent creature resists the mirror's attraction and then accidentally drops it.

Mirror-Ball Snare.name: Mirror-Ball Snare
Mirror-Ball Snare.description: A mixture of metal shavings and flash powder inside this small, mirrored sphere ignites when disturbed, causing the ball to flash and spin. When a creature enters the square, the ball pops into the air, and all creatures within 10 feet who can see the mirror ball must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22|traits:uncommon|showDC:all] save or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round. On a critical failure, affected creatures are instead dazzled for 1 minute.

Misdirecting Haversack.name: Misdirecting Haversack
Misdirecting Haversack.description:
This brown leather satchel is made from a heavily oiled and rustic leather. The satchel is large enough to hold up to 1 Bulk worth of items.

Activate 1 minute (envision, Interact)

Effect Documents inside the haversack become magically disguised as documents of a similar type but with misleading information. Anyone inspecting a document notices the disguise with a successful @Check[type:perception|dc:20|name:Determine Documents are Misleading|showDC:all] check, but determining the actual text requires a successful @Check[type:society|dc:20|name:Decipher Writing|traits:action:decipher-writing|showDC:all] check to Decipher Writing. This lasts until you use this activation again, which ends the effect for all previously disguised documents; until you use the second activation to end the effect for a single document; or until a document in the haversack remains outside the haversack for at least 1 hour, ending the effect for that document.

Activate 1 command

Effect You revert one of the documents back to its original state.

Mistform Elixir (Greater).name: 高等雾化灵药 Mistform Elixir (Greater)
Mistform Elixir (Greater).description:
启动 A 交互

一阵模糊的雾气从你的皮肤中散发，使你在5分钟内变得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。

当你的位置仍然显而易见时，就像普通的隐蔽一样，你不能使用这种隐蔽状态来进行 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{躲藏 Hide} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{潜行 Sneak}。

Mistform Elixir (Lesser).name: 次等雾化灵药 Mistform Elixir (Lesser)
Mistform Elixir (Lesser).description:
启动 A 交互

一阵模糊的雾气从你的皮肤中散发，使你在3轮内变得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。

当你的位置仍然显而易见时，就像普通的隐蔽一样，你不能使用这种隐蔽状态来进行 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{躲藏 Hide} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{潜行 Sneak}。

Mistform Elixir (Moderate).name: 中等雾化灵药 Mistform Elixir (Moderate)
Mistform Elixir (Moderate).description:
启动 A 交互

一阵模糊的雾气从你的皮肤中散发，使你在1分钟内变得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。

当你的位置仍然显而易见时，就像普通的隐蔽一样，你不能使用这种隐蔽状态来进行 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{躲藏 Hide} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{潜行 Sneak}。

Miter of Communion.name: Miter of Communion
Miter of Communion.description:
This ornate headgear comes in many different shapes and sizes, though most are elaborately decorated with motifs of the deity whose honor in which it was made. The miter brings you spiritually closer to your deity's servitors, granting you a +2 item bonus to Religion checks.

Activate 1 minute (command)

Frequency once per week

Effect You chant for a minute about a task at hand for the coming week to cast a 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.pkcOby5prOausy1k]{Read Omens} spell that grants you cryptic but useful advice.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to Religion checks

Mithral Buckler (High-Grade).name: Mithral Buckler (High-Grade)
Mithral Buckler (High-Grade).description:
Mithral shields are 1 Bulk lighter than normal (or light Bulk if their normal Bulk is 1, with no effect on a shield that normally has light Bulk). When used for a shield bash, they are treated as silver weapons.

The shield has Hardness 6, HP 24, and BT 12.

Craft Requirements mithral worth at least 4,000 gp

Mithral Buckler (Standard-Grade).name: Mithral Buckler (Standard-Grade)
Mithral Buckler (Standard-Grade).description:
Mithral shields are 1 Bulk lighter than normal (or light Bulk if their normal Bulk is 1, with no effect on a shield that normally has light Bulk). When used for a shield bash, they are treated as silver weapons.

The shield has Hardness 3, HP 12, and BT 6.

Craft Requirements mithral worth at least 50 gp

Mithral Chunk.name: Mithral Chunk
Mithral Chunk.description:
Mithral is renowned for its lightness, durability, and effectiveness against a range of creatures including devils and lycanthropes. It has the same sheen as silver but a slightly lighter hue. Mithral weapons and armor are treated as if they were silver for the purpose of damaging creatures with weakness to silver. A metal item made of mithral is lighter than one made of iron or steel: the item's Bulk is reduced by 1 (reduced to light Bulk if its normal Bulk is 1, with no effect on an item that normally has light Bulk). The Price of an item made of this material is based on the item's normal Bulk, not its reduced Bulk for being made of mithral, but reduce the Bulk before making any further Bulk adjustments for the size of the item.

Mithral Items

Mithral Items Hardness HP BT
Thin Items
Standard-grade 5 20 10
High-grade 8 32 16
Items
Standard-grade

 9 36 18
High-grade

 12 48 24
Structure
Standard-grade

 18 72 36
High-grade

 24 96 48

Mithral Ingot.name: Mithral Ingot
Mithral Ingot.description:
Mithral is renowned for its lightness, durability, and effectiveness against a range of creatures including devils and lycanthropes. It has the same sheen as silver but a slightly lighter hue. Mithral weapons and armor are treated as if they were silver for the purpose of damaging creatures with weakness to silver. A metal item made of mithral is lighter than one made of iron or steel: the item's Bulk is reduced by 1 (reduced to light Bulk if its normal Bulk is 1, with no effect on an item that normally has light Bulk). The Price of an item made of this material is based on the item's normal Bulk, not its reduced Bulk for being made of mithral, but reduce the Bulk before making any further Bulk adjustments for the size of the item.

Mithral Items

High-grade 8 32 16

Mithral Shield (High-Grade).name: Mithral Shield (High-Grade)
Mithral Shield (High-Grade).description:
Mithral shields are 1 Bulk lighter than normal (or light Bulk if their normal Bulk is 1, with no effect on a shield that normally has light Bulk). When used for a shield bash, they are treated as silver weapons.

The shield has Hardness 8, HP 32, and BT 16.

Craft Requirements at least 4,400 gp of mithral

Mithral Shield (Standard-Grade).name: Mithral Shield (Standard-Grade)
Mithral Shield (Standard-Grade).description:
Mithral shields are 1 Bulk lighter than normal (or light Bulk if their normal Bulk is 1, with no effect on a shield that normally has light Bulk). When used for a shield bash, they are treated as silver weapons.

The shield has Hardness 5, HP 20, BT 10.

Craft Requirements mithral worth at least 55 gp

Mithral Tree.name: Mithral Tree
Mithral Tree.description: Neither mithral nor a tree, this long gun takes its name from the legends of the elves of Jinin and is most commonly found within the nation. An elegant weapon, a mithral tree does somewhat resemble a tree; its fanned stock and long, sweeping barrel reinforced with metal rings enable a wielder to parry melee attacks while moving back into safe firing range.

Mnemonic Acid.name: Mnemonic Acid
Mnemonic Acid.description:
Activate1Interact

This translucent yellow-green liquid has a sharp, tangy odor and an oily sheen. It's mildly acidic and can cause a minor rash after prolonged contact with skin. To unlock its true potential, you must submerge a piece of an intelligent creature's brain matter in the acid and allow the material to completely dissolve. This takes [[/r 2d10 #minutes]]{2d10 minutes}, during which time the mnemonic acid bubbles and steams eagerly.

Once the brain matter fully dissolves, you can consume the acid as an Interact action to experience a powerful vision and relive one of the memories of the creature whose brain matter was dissolved. You have no control over which memory you experience, although such visions are almost always of memories that were meaningful to the owner of the dissolved brain matter. The memory might be of a single event or a series of related and interconnected events; the memory lasts no longer than 10 minutes, and you're @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blind} to the world around you for the duration.

Each dose of mnemonic acid requires roughly 10% of the brain matter of the creature whose visions are to be experienced, meaning that up to 10 different memories from the same creature can be experienced, each with a different dose of mnemonic acid, before the brain matter is exhausted.

Monkey Pin.name: 猿猴徽章 Monkey Pin
Monkey Pin.description:
启动 A 攀爬Climb

需求 你在运动Athletics中受训

这枚黄铜小徽章的形状是一只在爬树的猴子。当你启动这枚护符，进行一个攀爬Climb动作。如果你成功了，则在攀爬中以你完整的速度Speed移动。如果你投出了大失败，则改为失败。

Monkey's Fist.name: Monkey's Fist
Monkey's Fist.description: Also called a "slungshot", the monkey's fist is a short length of rope ending in a thick knot wrapped around a metal weight. You can tie the loose end of a monkey's fist to your wrist; if you are Disarmed, the weapon remains secured to your wrist rather than falling to the ground, though you must use an Interact action to grip it before using it again. A monkey's fist is a martial melee weapon.

Monkey's Paw.name: Monkey's Paw
Monkey's Paw.description:
This dried, gnarled hand is clenched in a fist, waiting for a creature to pick it up. When you pick up the monkey's paw, the hand opens, revealing three withered fingers. The monkey's paw grants you three wishes, curling one finger after every one. Once you pick up the monkey's paw, you cannot discard the hand until it returns to a clenched fist by casting its three wishes. Any attempts to discard the hand, even with the effects of a miracle or wish spell, are unsuccessful as the monkey's paw reappears among your possessions within [[/br 1d4 #hours]]{1d4 hours}; it doesn't work for any other creature in the intervening time. The hand returns even if another creature steals it from you. Once you make all three wishes, the monkey's paw uses plane shift to travel to a random point in the multiverse.

Whenever the monkey's paw hears you utter a statement that sounds like a wish, even if you don't use the words "I wish", it activates and grants a twisted, horrifying version of your wish, producing any effect within the possibility of alter reality, miracle, primal phenomenon, or wish, and potentially a greater effect at the GM's discretion.

Moonlit Chain.name: 月耀链衫 Moonlit Chain
Moonlit Chain.description:
这件+1银制链甲衫特别制作了一个绣有月相的衣领。你可在月光环境中如同有低光视觉一般视物。

启动 A 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 触摸护甲衣领上的新月图案以压制自己所受的目眩状态1分钟。

制造需求 原材料中必须包含33gp的银。

Moonstone Diadem.name: Moonstone Diadem
Moonstone Diadem.description:
This delicate and elegant diadem is woven of intricate silver wires set with three tear-shaped pearlescent moonstones. You gain a +1 item bonus to Religion checks.

Activate T focus

Frequency once per hour

Requirements You are within 10 feet of a moonstone pool

Effect You peer into the moonstone pool and gain access to all the visual history recorded within the receptacle by concentrating on the specific subject you wish to see. Conversely, you can choose to deposit your own memories into the pool by concentrating for 1 hour on the information you wish to impart.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Religion checks

Morningstar.name: 钉头锤 Morningstar
Morningstar.description: 这种武器有短柄顶端是带着尖刺的金属球。

Mortar of Hidden Meaning.name: Mortar of Hidden Meaning
Mortar of Hidden Meaning.description:
This matching mortar and pestle are made from immaculate darkwood that looks nearly olive in the right light.

Activate 1 minute (Interact)

Frequency once per hour

Effect You use the mortar of hidden meaning to grind tea leaves (or another suitable substance for making a hot beverage). While grinding the tea leaves, which takes no less than 1 minute, you can speak a message into the mortar. After the leaves are steeped in hot water, the first person who drinks from the resulting brew hears the message whispered in their ear.

Mountain to the Sky.name: Mountain to the Sky
Mountain to the Sky.description:
Activate 1 minute (Interact)

This tiny, carved walnut shell contains a sacred mountain within. You can only activate mountain to the sky on an unoccupied patch of earth or soil. When activated, the walnut transforms into an impossibly steep mountain, 5,000 feet tall and 100 feet wide at the base. Climbing the mountain requires 8 hours and a successful DC 35 Athletics check. After activating it, if you climb to the top of the mountain without any assistance from flight or magic, the mountain plane shifts you to Heaven when you reach the summit. You can return the mountain to the sky into the shape of a walnut shell as a 1-minute activity, which has the concentrate and manipulate traits, so long as no living creatures are present on the mountain.

Mountebank's Passage.name: Mountebank's Passage
Mountebank's Passage.description:
This +2 greater striking flintlock pistol has the odd construction of possessing two triggers, one of soapstone and one of onyx, clearly separated with individual trigger guards. Originally created by a student at Blythir College in Alkenstar, the mountebank's passage has the ability to create temporary linked portals on existing surfaces. The weapon disappeared shortly after its invention, but rumors have circulated that it now belongs to a group of thieves who use it to commit impossible robberies.

Activate 1 Interact

Requirements the mountebank's passage isn't loaded

Effect You pull the soapstone trigger. Choose a vertical surface within 120 feet. A beam of white energy crackles to the vertical surface and creates a white portal on that surface. Any creature who moves through the white portal comes out through the mountebank's passage's black portal, if one exists on the same plane. Using this activation causes any previous white portal to disappear, even if you don't create a new portal; otherwise, the portal lasts until your next daily preparations.

Activate 1 Interact

Requirements the mountebank's passage isn't loaded

Effect You pull the onyx trigger. Choose a vertical surface within 120 feet. A beam of black energy crackles to the vertical surface and creates a black portal on that surface. Any creature who moves through the black portal comes out through the mountebank's passage's white portal, if one exists on the same plane. Using this activation causes any previous black portal to disappear; even if you don't create a new portal; otherwise, the portal lasts until your next daily preparations.

Mudrock Snare.name: Mudrock Snare
Mudrock Snare.description:
Fired clay covers a pit of thin mud interspersed with fragile vials of blue dragon blood. The first creature to step into the square breaks through the clay and sinks into the pit, fracturing the vials and rapidly hardening the mud as it touches the blue dragon blood. That creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:29|traits:bkobold] save as the mud hardens over its legs.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes a -5-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed for 1 minute or until it Escapes (DC 27).

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.6p2Sjl7XxCc55ft4]{Effect: Mudrock Snare (Success)}

Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2}, and it takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed for 1 minute or until it Escapes (DC 27).

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.UTtX0xLGYci6P43I]{Effect: Mudrock Snare (Failure)}

Critical Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3}, and it's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 minute or until it Escapes (DC 27).

Craft Requirements Supply 75 gp worth of refined blue dragon blood.

Mummified Bat.name: 木乃伊蝙蝠 Mummified Bat
Mummified Bat.description:
启动 A 命令

需求 你在察觉Perception上达到大师

这个护符是一个经过魔法处理的微型蝙蝠残骸，并包在了莎草纸里面。当你启动这只蝙蝠，附着的武器会侦测到附近的颤动，并指引你的感官。你获得战士职业专长 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.y2XeMe1F18lIyo59]{盲斗 Blind-Fight} 的效果，持续1分钟。

如果你拥有盲斗Blind-Fight专长，你获得距离30尺的模糊回声定位能力，持续1分钟。这能让因为你无法看见而获得无踪Undetected状态的生物改为获得藏匿Hidden状态。

Murderer's Knot.name: 杀手绳结 Murderer's Knot
Murderer's Knot.description:
启动 F 命令

触发 你用附着的武器进行的打击Strike伤害了一个措手不及Flat-footed的生物

需求 你在附着的武器上达到专家

这卷黑色的皮绳系在一起，在附着的武器收起来的时候看起来就像和平结一样，但不会影响你拔出武器的动作。当你启动这个绳结，你伤害的生物受到 [[/r {1d6}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续流血伤害}。

如果你拥有 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5Jc2ySGLVi053qpz]{扭转刀刃 Twist the Knife} 专长，这个护符造成的持续流血伤害等同于你的偷袭攻击伤害。

Musical Instrument (Handheld).name: 乐器(手持) Musical Instrument (Handheld)
Musical Instrument (Handheld).description: 手持乐器包括风笛、小套编钟、小鼓、小提琴和弦乐器、长笛和龠、小竖琴、琵琶、小号和类似大小的乐器。GM可能会裁定一个特别大的手持仪器（如大号）具有更大的负载。诸如大鼓、全套编钟和键盘乐器之类的大型乐器不太方便携带，并且通常在演奏时需要静止。

Musical Instrument (Heavy).name: 乐器(大型) Musical Instrument (Heavy)
Musical Instrument (Heavy).description: 手持乐器包括风笛、小套编钟、小鼓、小提琴和弦乐器、长笛和龠、小竖琴、琵琶、小号和类似大小的乐器。GM可能会裁定一个特别大的手持仪器（如大号）具有更大的负载。诸如大鼓、全套编钟和键盘乐器之类的大型乐器不太方便携带，并且通常在演奏时需要静止。

Musical Instrument (Virtuoso handheld).name: 专家级乐器(手持) Musical Instrument (Virtuoso handheld)
Musical Instrument (Virtuoso handheld).description:
手持乐器包括风笛、小套编钟、小鼓、小提琴和弦乐器、长笛和龠、小竖琴、琵琶、小号和类似大小的乐器。GM可能会裁定一个特别大的手持仪器（如大号）具有更大的负载。诸如大鼓、全套编钟和键盘乐器之类的大型乐器不太方便携带，并且通常在演奏时需要静止。使用专家级乐器为表演检定提供+1物品加值。

自动生效:

  • 使用乐器进行表演检定时+1物品加值

Musical Instrument (Virtuoso heavy).name: 专家级乐器(大型) Musical Instrument (Virtuoso heavy)
Musical Instrument (Virtuoso heavy).description:
手持乐器包括风笛、小套编钟、小鼓、小提琴和弦乐器、长笛和龠、小竖琴、琵琶、小号和类似大小的乐器。GM可能会裁定一个特别大的手持仪器（如大号）具有更大的负载。诸如大鼓、全套编钟和键盘乐器之类的大型乐器不太方便携带，并且通常在演奏时需要静止。使用专家级乐器为表演检定提供+1物品加值。

自动生效:

  • 使用乐器进行表演检定时+1物品加值

Naginata.name: Naginata
Naginata.description: This 6-foot staff has a 2-foot-long, slightly curved, swordlike blade attached at one end. The long pole helps keep the wielder out of reach of swords and shorter weapons.

Nauseating Snare.name: Nauseating Snare
Nauseating Snare.description:
You position particularly foul substances to splash over a creature. The first creature to enter the square must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20] saving throw.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}.

Failure The creature becomes sickened 2.

Critical Failure The creature becomes sickened 3.

Necklace of Fireballs I.name: I型火球项链 Necklace of Fireballs I
Necklace of Fireballs I.description:
这条项链像是大麻茎上挂着光滑的，大小不一的红色小珠子一样。启动后，它会瞬间变回自己真实的模样：一根黄金链上精巧地串着黄金球体。火球项链有许多不同类型。每种都有着不同的反射Reflex豁免DC，并包含了一组能造成不同数量伤害的球体。

这串项链上有一颗 [[/r {6d6}[fire]]]{6d6 火焰伤害} 和两颗 [[/r {4d6}[fire]]]{4d6 火焰伤害}，豁免为@Check[type:reflex|dc:21|traits:damaging-effect|showDC:all] 当所有珠子都被用掉，项链就会变成失去魔法的大麻茎。

启动 A 交互

效果 你取下项链上的一颗珠子，让它发出橙色的光芒。你启动一颗珠子之后，你或其他人将它丢出去（这是一个具有远程Ranged特征的交互Interact动作），它在落地时会像火球术Fireball一样爆炸。你的投掷可以将火球的中心置于70尺内的任意位置，但如果这次投掷的难度较高，GM也可能认为你需要投一个攻击骰。如果在你的下一回合开始前没有人投掷这颗珠子，它会变成失去魔法效果的红色珠子。

Necklace of Fireballs II.name: II型火球项链 Necklace of Fireballs II
Necklace of Fireballs II.description:
这条项链像是大麻茎上挂着光滑的，大小不一的红色小珠子一样。启动后，它会瞬间变回自己真实的模样：一根黄金链上精巧地串着黄金球体。火球项链有许多不同类型。每种都有着不同的反射Reflex豁免DC，并包含了一组能造成不同数量伤害的球体。

这串项链上有一颗 [[/r {8d6}[fire]]]{8d6 火焰伤害}，一颗 [[/r {6d6}[fire]]]{6d6 火焰伤害} 和两颗 [[/r {4d6}[fire]]]{4d6 火焰伤害}，豁免为@Check[type:reflex|dc:25|traits:damaging-effect|showDC:all] 当所有珠子都被用掉，项链就会变成失去魔法的大麻茎。

启动 A 交互

效果 你取下项链上的一颗珠子，让它发出橙色的光芒。你启动一颗珠子之后，你或其他人将它丢出去（这是一个具有远程Ranged特征的交互Interact动作），它在落地时会像火球术Fireball一样爆炸。你的投掷可以将火球的中心置于70尺内的任意位置，但如果这次投掷的难度较高，GM也可能认为你需要投一个攻击骰。如果在你的下一回合开始前没有人投掷这颗珠子，它会变成失去魔法效果的红色珠子。
