Failure The target dies and its essence is trapped within the Radiant Spark. It can be brought back to life only with powerful magic such as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YfJTXyVGzLhM6V8U]{Miracle}.

Critical Failure As failure, and the target can't be brought back to life until the Radiant Spark is destroyed.

Destruction An archfiend or evil demigod must willingly swap their essence with that of a celestial dominated or bound by the artifact, then critically fail the saving throw against having their essence consumed. This permanently destroys both the artifact and the fiend or demigod.

Raining Knives Snare.name: Raining Knives Snare
Raining Knives Snare.description: As soon as a creature enters the snare's square, it unleashes a barrage of knives at the creature from all directions, dealing [[/r {11d8}[piercing]]]{11d8 piercing damage} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true|traits:uncommon|showDC:all]).

Rampart Shield.name: Rampart Shield
Rampart Shield.description:
This massive tower shield is painted a cool cyan green and is decorated with an image of Absalom's mother-sphinx emerging from a cresting wave.

Hardness HP BT
10 60 30

Activate 2 Command

Frequency once per day

Effect You transform the shield into a 1-foot-thick, 10-foot-by-10-foot stone rampart topped with a battlement and adorned with the flags of Absalom. If any part of the rampart would pass through any creatures or objects, the activation fails. At the center of each 5-foot length of the rampart is an arrow slit. The rampart has AC 10, Hardness 15, and 30 Hit Points. The rampart is immune to critical hits and precision damage. Attacks that would destroy the rampart cause it to instead revert back to its shield form and drop to the ground in an open space below the rampart. When this happens, the shield loses 30 Hit Points. You can Dismiss the activation, causing the wall to revert back to its shield form. The shield then returns secured to your arm if you are adjacent to the rampart, or drops to the ground in an open space if you're not adjacent to the rampart. If neither destroyed nor Dismissed, the rampart reverts back to a shield automatically after 1 hour.

Ranseur.name: 刺叉 Ranseur
Ranseur.description: 这种长兵是一种更长的三叉戟，中间的叉比两侧的叉更长。

Rapier.name: 细剑 Rapier
Rapier.description: 细剑有着细长的剑刃和笼手，它被许多人视为决斗武器。

Rapier Pistol.name: Rapier Pistol
Rapier Pistol.description: This elegant weapon is shaped similarly to a rapier with a pistol down the length of the blade.

Rat-Catcher Trident.name: Rat-Catcher Trident
Rat-Catcher Trident.description:
The haft of this +2 striking trident is carved with intricate designs of swarming rodents sacred to Hanspur, the drowned god of the Sellen River.

When used against a swarm, it ignores the swarm's resistance to piercing damage, if any.

Activate A Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect While floating down a river on a raft or boat, you plunge the rat-catcher trident into the water. The trident casts a 5th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zfn5RqAdF63neqpP]{Control Water} spell on the body of water.

Ration Tonic.name: Ration Tonic
Ration Tonic.description:
Activate 1 Interact

This slender vial appears to hold clean, clear water with a faintly fruity scent. Drinking a ration tonic magically nourishes you with the equivalent of a day's worth of food and water. The tonic has a subtle, pleasant taste, its particulars chosen when the potion is crafted.

Ration Tonic (Greater).name: Ration Tonic (Greater)
Ration Tonic (Greater).description:
Activate 1 Interact

This slender vial appears to hold clean, clear water with a faintly fruity scent. Drinking a ration tonic magically nourishes you with the equivalent of a week's worth of food and water, distributing the nourishment in a constant and healthy flow across the week. The tonic has a subtle, pleasant taste, its particulars chosen when the potion is crafted.

Razmiri Wayfinder.name: Razmiri Wayfinder
Razmiri Wayfinder.description:
Worn on a chain around the neck, a Razmiri wayfinder functions as a compass and provides its wearer a +1 item bonus to Deception checks to Lie or Impersonate. Razmiri wayfinders can also be used to grant temporary healing, making it easier for the wearer to impersonate a divine spellcaster.

Activate 1 envision

Frequency three times per day

Effect You touch an adjacent creature, granting them [[/r {3d8}[healing] #Temporary Hit Points]]{3d8 temporary Hit Points} for 1 hour.

Activate 1 manipulate

Frequency once per day

Effect You touch an adjacent creature and attempt a counteract check against one poison or disease afflicting the creature. On a success, you halt the effects of the poison or disease for 1 day, rather than removing it. This temporarily relieves any penalties imposed by the affliction but doesn't cure the effect or count against its duration; the poison or disease is merely halted for a time, and it resumes where it left off once this effect ends.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Deception checks to Lie or Impersonate

Reading Ring.name: Reading Ring
Reading Ring.description: A reading ring is personalized to its user and capable of reading only languages in which the user is fluent. Each ring is unique and can't be used by anyone other than its specific bonded user. A reading ring is bonded to its user in a process that taps into the user's inner potential, similar to an invested item, except the process takes 10 minutes, is permanent, and doesn't count toward your number of invested items. You can wear the ring in various ways, often either on a finger or a chain worn about your person if you can't have it on a digit. You can use the reading ring to read text by taking an Interact action, and you read with the ring at roughly the same rate as a visual reader. There is no limit to how often you can use the ring to read in this manner.

Reading Ring (Greater).name: Reading Ring (Greater)
Reading Ring (Greater).description: A greater reading ring is personalized to its user and capable of reading any written language and enable the wearer to comprehend what it reads. Each ring is unique and can't be used by anyone other than its specific bonded user. A greater reading ring is bonded to its user in a process that taps into the user's inner potential, similar to an invested item, except the process takes 10 minutes, is permanent, and doesn't count toward your number of invested items. You can wear the ring in various ways, often either on a finger or a chain worn about your person if you can't have it on a digit. You can use the greater reading ring to read text by taking an Interact action, and you read with the ring at roughly the same rate as a visual reader. There is no limit to how often you can use the ring to read in this manner.

Ready.name: Ready
Ready.description: A ready rune draws component pieces of a suit of armor toward one another, making it easier and faster to get into. You can don light armor with this rune as a 3-action activity or medium or heavy armor with this rune in 1 minute.

Ready (Greater).name: Ready (Greater)
Ready (Greater).description: A greater ready rune draws component pieces of a suit of armor toward one another, making it easier and faster to get into. You can don light armor with this rune as a single action activity or medium or heavy armor with this rune with a 3-action activity.

Reaper's Grasp.name: Reaper's Grasp
Reaper's Grasp.description:
This +2 striking arquebus has an ashwood stock plated with worked silver, featuring a mosaic of agonized skulls carved into the metal. The mere mention of Galt's infamous final blades is enough to make any mortal creature shudder. Used to execute political opponents in the nation's constant civil war, these guillotines hold the souls of those they execute, preventing them from reaching a natural afterlife. When one of the final blades was destroyed in 4710, some of the metal from its remains made its way to Alkenstar and was reforged into a deadly firearm that retained the guillotine's soul-stealing properties.

Whenever the reaper's grasp kills a sapient living or undead creature, a portion of that creature's soul is drawn inexorably into the weapon, and another skull is added to the mosaic as if scrawled by an invisible hand, to a maximum of 10 souls. Creatures whose souls are protected by outside forces, such as a lich's soul cage, are immune to this effect, though the process, while painful, does not prevent the soul from going to the afterlife or being resurrected.

Whenever the reaper's grasp kills a sapient living or undead creature, a portion of that creature's soul is drawn inexorably into the weapon, and another skull is added to the mosaic as if scrawled by an @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} hand, to a maximum of 10 souls. Creatures whose souls are protected by outside forces, such as a lich's soul cage, are immune to this effect, though the process, while painful, does not prevent the soul from going to the afterlife or being resurrected.

Keep track of the level of each creature whose souls are stored in the reaper's grasp.

Activate 1 envision (evil)

Requirements There's at least one soul stored in the reaper's grasp

Effect You channel the necromantic energy of a soul stored in the weapon into your next attack, increasing the attack's destructive power. Choose a soul stored in the weapon. The next Strike you make with the reaper's grasp before the end of your turn deals an additional negative damage equal to twice the level of the creature whose soul you chose. Using this ability releases the chosen soul, and a skull on the mosaic fades away.

Activate 1 envision (evil)

Requirements There's at least one soul stored in the reaper's grasp

Effect You channel the necromantic energy of a soul stored in the weapon into a mantle around you, protecting you from harm. Choose a soul stored in the weapon. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to three times the level of the creature whose soul you chose, which last until the end of your next turn. Using this ability releases the chosen soul, and a skull on the mosaic fades away.

Reaper's Lancet.name: Reaper's Lancet
Reaper's Lancet.description:
Hendrid Pratchett himself designed this custom skull-topped +1 striking exquisite sword cane and had it gilded in high-quality gold. Its first victim was the very smith whom Pratchett commissioned to craft the weapon, so the means of its construction are a secret known only to Pratchett. The magic of the Reaper's Lancet applies to both the blade and the sheath, making them each effectively a +1 striking weapon, but only if both are wielded by the same creature-if the two components are shared between creatures, only the blade retains the rune's magic.

Reaper's Lancet has a hidden reservoir inside the skull that automatically applies a new dose of poison to the blade after the previous dose was expended with a successful Strike. The reservoir must be filled manually (a process requiring 1 minute) and is large enough to hold only 3 doses at a time. Any sort of injury-delivered poison can be placed in it, though all doses must be of the same poison. The Price of the poison is not reflected in this weapon's listed Price.

Activate R Interact

Trigger You damage a creature with Reaper's Lancet

Effect You poison the creature you hit with the poison currently in the reservoir.

Rebound Fulu.name: Rebound Fulu
Rebound Fulu.description:
Activate f envision

Trigger You use the Shield Block reaction with the shield to which this fulu is affixed.

The bronze-colored ink on this pale, silvery talisman sharply reflects light, enough that it seems to glow. When you activate the fulu, it reflects your foe's violence back against them. The foe that triggered the Shield Block reaction takes damage equal to your shield's Hardness or the damage they would have dealt before the Shield Block reaction, whichever is less.

Rebounding Breastplate.name: Rebounding Breastplate
Rebounding Breastplate.description:
This +3 greater resilient greater fortification breastplate absorbs impacts for later release. While wearing the armor, you gain resistance 5 to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage and resistance 10 to force damage. Keep track of how much damage the armor prevents from enemy attacks, as the armor absorbs that damage.

After 1 minute, the absorbed damage disperses harmlessly and resets to 0. Only damage caused by foes or hazards powers the armor, not damage you take from yourself, allies, or the environment.

Activate 1 Interact

Requirements Your armor has absorbed at least 30 damage

Effect The absorbed energy explodes from your armor in a pulse of force. Creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] take [[/r {10d6}[force]]]{10d6 force damage} with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:43|basic:true|name:Rebounding Breastplaye Force Damage|showDC:all] save. On a failure, they're pushed 10 feet away from you, and on a critical failure, they're pushed 20 feet away from you and fall @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. The armor's absorbed damage resets to 0.

Recording Rod (Basic).name: Recording Rod (Basic)
Recording Rod (Basic).description:
This smooth metal bar is short enough to fit in one hand. It has several inset gemstone buttons on one end and a small lens on the other. Popular with law enforcement and blackmailers alike, recording rods allow users to capture and replay incriminating scenes and are often concealed and triggered covertly to avoid raising the subject's suspicion.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect When activated, the rod records anything it sees and hears for 1 minute. Its lens acts as both eye and ear with precise vision and imprecise hearing. This recorded sequence can then be played back as many times as desired, the sights and sounds communicated telepathically to the rod's holder. The rod's recording sequence can be triggered manually by a person holding it, or it can be programmed to begin recording automatically in response to a specified stimulus, such as nearby movement or a specific trigger word spoken in its vicinity.

Once activated, the rod records for 1 minute, after which it loses its recording ability but can replay that same scene over and over.

Recording Rod (Reusable).name: Recording Rod (Reusable)
Recording Rod (Reusable).description:
This smooth metal bar is short enough to fit in one hand. It has several inset gemstone buttons on one end and a small lens on the other. Popular with law enforcement and blackmailers alike, recording rods allow users to capture and replay incriminating scenes and are often concealed and triggered covertly to avoid raising the subject's suspicion.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect When activated, the rod records anything it sees and hears for 1 minute. Its lens acts as both eye and ear with precise vision and imprecise hearing. This recorded sequence can then be played back as many times as desired, the sights and sounds communicated telepathically to the rod's holder. The rod's recording sequence can be triggered manually by a person holding it, or it can be programmed to begin recording automatically in response to a specified stimulus, such as nearby movement or a specific trigger word spoken in its vicinity.

Once activated, the rod records for 1 minute. The recording function can be enabled a second time by permanently erasing the memory currently stored on the rod.

Recovery Bladder.name: Recovery Bladder
Recovery Bladder.description:
Bulk L (8 if inflated)

Activate 1 Interact

Tattletail developed this tether-covered bladder to help divers in Anuli's Crater Lake recover heavy salvage or escape dangerous underwater beasts. Pulling the ripcord causes a small, pressurized air tank to instantly inflate the bladder to the size of a rowboat, forcing up to 16 Bulk of attached items or creatures to jet to the surface of the water at a rate of 60 feet per round. Pulling the ripcord, or removing or affixing something to one of the many tethers on the recovery bladder, takes an Interact action. A recovery bladder can only be used once, as the quick inflation permanently stretches the bladder, and only a few tinkerers have the skills and equipment to refill a pressurized air tank.

Red Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult).name: 成年红龙龙息药水 Red Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult)
Red Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult).description:
这种液体包含了红龙的血。你饮下这瓶调和物之后的一小时内，你可以喷出红龙的吐息武器。吐息的效力基于药水的类型，是根据提供龙血的龙的年龄来决定的。药水拥有和吐息武器伤害类型一致的特征。

释放龙息要花费一个动作。你喷出范围为 @Template[type:cone|distance:15] 的火焰龙息，造成 [[/r {6d6}[fire]]]{6d6 火焰伤害}。每个区域内的生物都必须尝试一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true|name:Adult Red Dragon's Breath Potion] 豁免检定。

使用了一次吐息武器之后，你在 [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 轮}内无法再次使用。

Red Dragon's Breath Potion (Wyrm).name: 古红龙龙息药水 Red Dragon's Breath Potion (Wyrm)
Red Dragon's Breath Potion (Wyrm).description:
这种液体包含了红龙的血。你饮下这瓶调和物之后的一小时内，你可以喷出红龙的吐息武器。吐息的效力基于药水的类型，是根据提供龙血的龙的年龄来决定的。药水拥有和吐息武器伤害类型一致的特征。

释放龙息要花费一个动作。你喷出范围为 @Template[type:cone|distance:15] 的火焰龙息，造成 [[/r {10d6}[fire]]]{10d6 火焰伤害}。每个区域内的生物都必须尝试一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:37|basic:true|name:Wyrm Red Dragon's Breath Potion] 豁免检定。

使用了一次吐息武器之后，你在 [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 轮}内无法再次使用。

Red Dragon's Breath Potion (Young).name: 青年红龙龙息药水 Red Dragon's Breath Potion (Young)
Red Dragon's Breath Potion (Young).description:
这种液体包含了红龙的血。你饮下这瓶调和物之后的一小时内，你可以喷出红龙的吐息武器。吐息的效力基于药水的类型，是根据提供龙血的龙的年龄来决定的。药水拥有和吐息武器伤害类型一致的特征。

释放龙息要花费一个动作。你喷出范围为 @Template[type:cone|distance:15] 的火焰龙息，造成 [[/r {4d6}[fire]]]{4d6 火焰伤害}。每个区域内的生物都必须尝试一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:23|basic:true|name:Young Red Dragon's Breath Potion] 豁免检定。

使用了一次吐息武器之后，你在 [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 轮}内无法再次使用。

Red-Rib Gill Mask (Greater).name: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Greater)
Red-Rib Gill Mask (Greater).description:
Activate 1 Interact

This mask is made from the gills of the red-rib salamander, an amphibious creature unique to Terwa Lake.

Once activated, the mask intensifies the odors of gaseous toxins, allowing you to automatically detect toxic fumes within 30 feet and their approximate source (making the source undetected instead of unnoticed).

You can't wear other masks while you're wearing a red-rib gill mask.

After Activating the mask, you also gain the listed item bonus to Fortitude saves against inhaled effects; this bonus is increased against the deadly volcanic gas known around Terwa Lake as Dead Man's Breath, and possibly against other similar volcanic gases at the GM's discretion.

Type: Greater

The item bonus is +3, or +4 against Dead Man's Breath, and the duration is 8 hours.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.QrsPKOFuo3qzgxw5]{Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Greater)}

Red-Rib Gill Mask (Lesser).name: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Lesser)
Red-Rib Gill Mask (Lesser).description:
Activate 1 Interact

This mask is made from the gills of the red-rib salamander, an amphibious creature unique to Terwa Lake.

Once activated, the mask intensifies the odors of gaseous toxins, allowing you to automatically detect toxic fumes within 30 feet and their approximate source (making the source undetected instead of unnoticed).

You can't wear other masks while you're wearing a red-rib gill mask.

After Activating the mask, you also gain the listed item bonus to Fortitude saves against inhaled effects; this bonus is increased against the deadly volcanic gas known around Terwa Lake as Dead Man's Breath, and possibly against other similar volcanic gases at the GM's discretion.

Type: Lesser

The item bonus is +1, or +2 against Dead Man's Breath, and the duration is 10 minutes.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.UDfVCATxdLdSzJYJ]{Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Lesser)}

Red-Rib Gill Mask (Moderate).name: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Moderate)
Red-Rib Gill Mask (Moderate).description:
Activate 1 Interact

This mask is made from the gills of the red-rib salamander, an amphibious creature unique to Terwa Lake.

Once activated, the mask intensifies the odors of gaseous toxins, allowing you to automatically detect toxic fumes within 30 feet and their approximate source (making the source undetected instead of unnoticed).

You can't wear other masks while you're wearing a red-rib gill mask.

After Activating the mask, you also gain the listed item bonus to Fortitude saves against inhaled effects; this bonus is increased against the deadly volcanic gas known around Terwa Lake as Dead Man's Breath, and possibly against other similar volcanic gases at the GM's discretion.

Type: Moderate

The item bonus is +2, or +3 against Dead Man's Breath, and the duration is 1 hour.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.2iR5uP6vgPzgKKNO]{Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Moderate)}

Redpitch Bomb (Greater).name: Redpitch Bomb (Greater)
Redpitch Bomb (Greater).description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate1 Strike

Sap from redpitch pines, if properly distilled into a gummy, incendiary mass, ignites when exposed to the air. A redpitch bomb deals the listed fire damage, persistent fire damage, and splash damage. Many types grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

You gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls. The bomb deals 3 fire damage, 3d4 persistent fire damage, and 3 fire splash damage. On a critical hit, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} until the start of your next turn.

Redpitch Bomb (Major).name: Redpitch Bomb (Major)
Redpitch Bomb (Major).description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate1 Strike

Sap from redpitch pines, if properly distilled into a gummy, incendiary mass, ignites when exposed to the air. A redpitch bomb deals the listed fire damage, persistent fire damage, and splash damage. Many types grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

You gain a +3 bonus on attack rolls. The bomb deals 4 fire damage, 4d4 persistent fire damage, and 4 fire splash damage. On a critical hit, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 3} until the start of your next turn.

Redpitch Bomb (Moderate).name: Redpitch Bomb (Moderate)
Redpitch Bomb (Moderate).description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate1 Strike

Sap from redpitch pines, if properly distilled into a gummy, incendiary mass, ignites when exposed to the air. A redpitch bomb deals the listed fire damage, persistent fire damage, and splash damage. Many types grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 2 fire damage, 2d4 persistent fire damage, and 2 fire splash damage. On a critical hit, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until the start of your next turn.

Redpitch Bomb (lesser).name: Redpitch Bomb (lesser)
Redpitch Bomb (lesser).description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate1 Strike

Sap from redpitch pines, if properly distilled into a gummy, incendiary mass, ignites when exposed to the air. A redpitch bomb deals the listed fire damage, persistent fire damage, and splash damage. Many types grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

The bomb deals 1 fire damage, 1d4 persistent fire damage, and 1 fire splash damage. On a critical hit, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until the start of your next turn.

Refined Pesh.name: Refined Pesh
Refined Pesh.description:
When eaten or smoked, pesh gives users a sense of well-being, sometimes with hallucinations, aggression, and exhaustion.

Activate A Interact (Ingested, Inhaled)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:12]

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 6 hours

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} and a +2 item bonus to saves versus fear effects (1 minute)

Stage 2 1 temporary Hit Point per level (first time you reach this stage only), +2 item bonus to saves versus fear effects, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, and stupefied 1 (1 minute)

Stage 3 clumsy 2 and stupefied 2 (1 hour)

Reflecting Shield.name: 反射盾 Reflecting Shield
Reflecting Shield.description:
这面高纯度银制小圆盾（硬度6，HP24，BT12）涂出了银制镜面。它可如同护法盾一般使用，更能反射法术。

启动 R 命令

频率 每天一次

触发 你成为了一个法术的目标

需求 你已举起反射盾

效果 你尝试将法术反射回施法者，如同反制调整值为[[/r 1d20+40]]的9环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OOELvfkTedBMlWtq]{法术反转 Spell Turning} 一样。

制造需求 提供一次法术反转施法，原材料必须包含2750gp的银。

Reflexive Tattoo.name: Reflexive Tattoo
Reflexive Tattoo.description:
This subtle pattern of complex dots, sunbursts, and lines is difficult to make out, as it's a near match for the wearer's skin tone. Serving as a barrier facing inward, this tattoo prevents ostentatious expressions of spells that are internal to you, making them easier to hide.

Activate 1 Interact (concentrate, manipulate, metamagic)

Frequency once per day

Effect If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell of 2nd level or lower that affects or targets only you, you can hide that you're casting it. This has the same effect as the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sIeuPW0j39fTZm08]{Conceal Spell} feat.

Reforging Shield.name: Reforging Shield
Reforging Shield.description: This steel shield contains a smoldering core of magma that never cools. Whenever the reforging shield's current Hit Points are below its Break Threshold, the shield recovers 5 Hit Points at the start of its wielder's turn each round until it is no longer broken. Each time a character Repairs the shield, the shield recovers double the number of Hit Points. The shield has Hardness 15, HP 120, and BT 60.

Reinforced Stock.name: Reinforced Stock
Reinforced Stock.description: A reinforced stock is a weighted crossbow, firearm haft, or grip customized for striking in melee.

Reinforced Surcoat.name: Reinforced Surcoat
Reinforced Surcoat.description: This surcoat is made of thick fabric and light chain, designed to protect vital areas. When you are critically hit by an attack, you gain physical resistance equal to 2 + the value of the armor's potency rune against the attack's damage. If the armor is in the chain armor group and you have its armor specialization effect, you instead increase the physical resistance from the chain armor specialization by 2. This can't reduce the damage to less than the damage rolled for the hit before doubling for a critical hit. However, the reinforced surcoat increases the Speed penalty of your armor by 5 feet.

Religious Symbol (Silver).name: 圣徽(银制) Religious Symbol (Silver)
Religious Symbol (Silver).description: 这个银质的小片上印有代表神灵的图画。一些神术施法者，如牧师，可以使用圣徽作为神力的焦点来使用某些能力并施放一些法术。必须用一只手握住圣徽才能使用它。

Religious Symbol (Wooden).name: 圣徽(木制) Religious Symbol (Wooden)
Religious Symbol (Wooden).description: 这个木质的小片上印有代表神灵的图画。一些神术施法者，如牧师，可以使用圣徽作为神力的焦点来使用某些能力并施放一些法术。必须用一只手握住圣徽才能使用它。

Religious Text.name: 教典 Religious Text
Religious Text.description: 这份小册子包含特定宗教的经文。一些神术施法者，如牧师，可以使用教典作为神力的焦点来使用某些能力并施放一些法术。必须用一只手握住教典才能使用它。

Rending Snare.name: Rending Snare
Rending Snare.description:
Sharp metal jaws wind tightly into the pressure plate mechanism of this snare. When triggered, the jaws clamp shut and spin, damaging limbs in the process. The snare deals [[/r {10d8}[piercing]]]{10d8 piercing damage} to the first creature to enter the square; that creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:33|showDC:all] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until the end of its next turn.

Failure The creature takes full damage plus [[/r {2d6}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}, and it becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage plus [[/r {4d6}[persistent,bleed]]] persistent bleed damage, and it becomes clumsy 2 for 1 minute.

Repair Kit.name: 修理工具包 Repair Kit
Repair Kit.description: 维修工具包可让你在旅行时进行简单的维修。它包含便携式铁砧、钳子、木工工具、磨刀石和用于调理皮革和木材的油。你可以用修理工具包使用手艺技能修复物品。

Repair Kit (Superb).name: 修理工具包(专家) Repair Kit (Superb)
Repair Kit (Superb).description: 维修工具包可让你在旅行时进行简单的维修。它包含便携式铁砧、钳子、木工工具、磨刀石和用于调理皮革和木材的油。你可以用修理工具包使用手艺技能修复物品。专家级修理工具包为你提供+1物品加值。

Repeating Crossbow.name: Repeating Crossbow
Repeating Crossbow.description: This crossbow has an internal chamber that can be loaded with up to five bolts. An automated catch mechanism at the top of the flight groove, just in front of the latch, locks the bowstring and launches bolts with the pull of a trigger.

Repeating Hand Crossbow.name: Repeating Hand Crossbow
Repeating Hand Crossbow.description: This handheld crossbow features an ingeniously designed catch mechanism at the top of the flight groove, just in front of the latch, which automatically loads a bolt from a magazine and resets the string each time the weapon is fired. A typical repeating hand crossbow magazine holds five bolts.

Repeating Heavy Crossbow.name: Repeating Heavy Crossbow
Repeating Heavy Crossbow.description: This large crossbow has an internal chamber that can be loaded with up to five bolts. While it uses the same automated catch mechanism as other repeating crossbows, a repeating heavy crossbow's design has significant trade-offs. It has increased range and damage and is easier to learn how to use, but requires a small amount of effort to reload.

Replacement Filter (Level 1).name: Replacement Filter (Level 1)
Replacement Filter (Level 1).description: A replacement filter for a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.kDrlBnkDMVxPrahI]{Water Purifier}. The counteract modifier using this filter is +5.

Replacement Filter (Level 10).name: Replacement Filter (Level 10)
Replacement Filter (Level 10).description: A replacement filter for a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.kDrlBnkDMVxPrahI]{Water Purifier}. The counteract modifier using this filter is +17.

Replacement Filter (Level 5).name: Replacement Filter (Level 5)
Replacement Filter (Level 5).description: A replacement filter for a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.kDrlBnkDMVxPrahI]{Water Purifier}. The counteract modifier using this filter is +9.

Repulsion Resin.name: Repulsion Resin
Repulsion Resin.description:
Activate 1 Interact

This clear, tasteless tar causes the victim to emit waves of harmful mental energy that repel other creatures. Desperate users might consume this poison to keep enemies at bay despite the poison's debilitating effects. While you're @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} from this poison, a creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of you or approaches within 10 feet of you must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:35] saving throw. On a failure, the creature can't voluntarily move closer to you; this is a mental effect. Once the approaching creature has attempted to save, it uses the same result for all saves from that dose of repulsion resin.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38]

Onset 10 minutes

Maximum Duration 6 minutes

Stage 1 [[/r {12d6}[mental]]]{12d6 mental damage} and stupefied 1 (1 minute)

Stage 2 [[/r {16d6}[poison]]]{16d6 poison damage} and stupefied 1 (1 minute)

Stage 3 [[/r {20d6}[poison]]]{20d6 poison damage} and stupefied 2 (1 minute)

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yrZA4k2VAqEP8xx7]{Repulsion}.

Resilient.name: 抗力 Resilient
Resilient.description:
抗力符文为护甲提供额外的防护力。穿戴者的豁免骰获得+1物品加值。

你可以将护甲上已蚀刻的抗力符文升级为更强的版本，效果也会提升成新符文的数值。你必须有更强符文的配方才能如此做，且升级的价格是两枚符文之间价格的差额。

Resilient (Greater).name: 高等抗力 Resilient (Greater)
Resilient (Greater).description:
抗力符文为护甲提供额外的防护力。穿戴者的豁免骰获得+2物品加值。

你可以将护甲上已蚀刻的抗力符文升级为更强的版本，效果也会提升成新符文的数值。你必须有更强符文的配方才能如此做，且升级的价格是两枚符文之间价格的差额。

Resilient (Major).name: 上等抗力 Resilient (Major)
Resilient (Major).description:
抗力符文为护甲提供额外的防护力。穿戴者的豁免骰获得+3物品加值。

你可以将护甲上已蚀刻的抗力符文升级为更强的版本，效果也会提升成新符文的数值。你必须有更强符文的配方才能如此做，且升级的价格是两枚符文之间价格的差额。

Resonating Ammunition (Arrow).name: Resonating Ammunition (Arrow)
Resonating Ammunition (Arrow).description:
Activate 1 Interact

The end of this ammunition is a metallic tuning fork with magical etchings. When an activated resonating arrow hits its target, the tuning fork resonates with residual energy from the shot, transforming it into dangerous sound waves. This deals [[/r {5d10}[sonic]]]{5d10 sonic damage} to the target and each creature within 10 feet of it with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|basic:true|name:Resonating Ammunition|showDC:all] save.

Resonating Ammunition (Bolt).name: Resonating Ammunition (Bolt)
Resonating Ammunition (Bolt).description:
Activate 1 Interact

The end of this ammunition is a metallic tuning fork with magical etchings. When an activated resonating bolt hits its target, the tuning fork resonates with residual energy from the shot, transforming it into dangerous sound waves. This deals [[/r {5d10}[sonic]]]{5d10 sonic damage} to the target and each creature within 10 feet of it with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|basic:true|name:Resonating Ammunition|showDC:all] save.

Restful Sleep Fulu.name: Restful Sleep Fulu
Restful Sleep Fulu.description:
Usage affixed to a creature

Activate f envision

Duration 1 hour

This fulu depicts the five-spoke wheel of Qi Zhong, god of magic and medicine, and burns away slowly, like incense. If you fall asleep within the fulu's duration, you regain double the amount of Hit Points you usually gain from resting. You also gain a +2 status bonus to saves against mental effects that occur in your dreams, such as the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Uqj344bezBq3ESdq]{Nightmare} spell.

Restful Tent.name: Restful Tent
Restful Tent.description: This four-person tent provides several benefits for those who rest within. The climate inside the tent is comfortable and allows creatures inside it to withstand most hostile weather conditions, but incredible heat or cold, powerful storms, and winds of hurricane force or greater can still damage or destroy the tent. Mundane pests such as solitary ordinary insects avoid the tent, though swarms and giant insects can attack the tent as normal. Once you pitch the tent, only you can easily move it; any other creatures must succeed at a @Check[type:athletics|dc:20|name:Move Tent|showDC:all] check to do so. Finally, the tent automatically camouflages with its surroundings, requiring a Searching creature to succeed at a @Check[type:perception|dc:22|name:Spot Camouflaged Tent|showDC:all] check to notice it.

Retribution Axe.name: 复仇斧 Retribution Axe
Retribution Axe.description:
这柄+1巨斧的斧面上有着人类骷髅图案。

当某生物在一次攻击中伤害了你，这个骷髅就会变化出那生物的面貌。你在自己下一回合结束前的下一次对该生物的伤害骰获得+2环境加值。

因你只要被伤害，骷髅面容就会变化，所以你只对最近伤害过你的生物能获得该额外伤害。

自动生效:

  • 你的下回合结束前的下一次对最近伤害过你的生物的伤害骰获得+2环境加值。

Retrieval Prism.name: Retrieval Prism
Retrieval Prism.description:
Activate f command

Requirements You have a free hand.

This triangular prism showing swirling black patterns inside constantly moves around on your armor, no matter where you affix it. As part of the process of Affixing this Talisman, you attune it to a single item of 1 Bulk or less. When you activate this talisman, the attuned item immediately teleports into your hand.

The retrieval prism can't retrieve an item that's not on your plane, including one that's in an extradimensional space like a bag of holding. If you haven't expended the talisman, you can attune it to a different item by Affixing the Talisman again.

Retrieval Prism (Greater).name: Retrieval Prism (Greater)
Retrieval Prism (Greater).description:
Activate f command

Requirements You have a free hand.

This triangular prism showing swirling black patterns inside constantly moves around on your armor, no matter where you affix it. When you activate this talisman, any item in your possession of 1 bulk or less, chosen when you activate the prism, immediately teleports into your hand.

The retrieval prism can't retrieve an item that's not on your plane, including one that's in an extradimensional space like a bag of holding. If you haven't expended the talisman, you can attune it to a different item by Affixing the Talisman again.

You don't need to attune the prism. It can retrieve any item in your possession of 1 Bulk or less, chosen when you activate the prism.

Returning.name: 回力 Returning
Returning.description: 当你用该武器进行投掷打击时，打击动作完成后它即会飞回你的手中。若武器飞回时你的手全被占满，该武器会在你所在的位置掉落于地。

Rhino Hide.name: 犀牛革甲 Rhino Hide
Rhino Hide.description:
这件+1抗力革甲用犀牛皮制成。它的护甲检定减值为-1而非-3。

当你穿戴该护甲使用迅猛冲锋（Sunden Charge）专长时，你该次打击额外造成1d8点伤害。

制造需求 原材料中必须包含320gp的犀牛皮革（一种常见材料）。

自动生效:

  • 迅猛冲锋额外造成1d8点伤害

Rhino Hide Brooch.name: Rhino Hide Brooch
Rhino Hide Brooch.description:
Activate r envision

Trigger You would take physical damage.

This thick brooch is carved from a single piece of rhino hide. It's lacquered and covered in a thin layer of silver dust. When activated, the talisman grants you resistance 5 to physical damage until the end of the current creature's turn. This resistance applies to the triggering attack.

Rhino Shot.name: Rhino Shot
Rhino Shot.description:
Ammunition Any

Activate 1 Interact

This arrow is made of polished animal horn, with the head of a rhinoceros carved in place of a traditional arrowhead. When an activated rhino shot is fired, the ethereal form of a large rhinoceros takes shape around the projectile. On a successful Strike, the attack deals an additional 2d6 force damage, and the target must succeed at a DC 19 Fortitude save or be knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. If the hit with the rhino shot was a critical success, the target is knocked prone unless it critically succeeds at its save.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.lgvjbbQiHBGKR3C6]{Effect: Rhino Shot}

Rhinoceros Mask.name: Rhinoceros Mask
Rhinoceros Mask.description: Covered with thick armor and bearing a thicker horn, this face mask grants you increased momentum. If you Stride at least 10 feet, your next melee Strike before the end of your turn ignores the Hardness of objects with a Hardness of 5 or less. If the object has more than Hardness 5, the mask grants no benefit.

Rhinoceros Mask (Greater).name: Rhinoceros Mask (Greater)
Rhinoceros Mask (Greater).description: Covered with thick armor and bearing a thicker horn, this face mask grants you increased momentum. If you Stride at least 10 feet, your next melee Strike before the end of your turn ignores the Hardness of objects with a Hardness of 10 or less. If the object has more than Hardness 10, the mask grants no benefit.

Rhoka Sword.name: Rhoka Sword
Rhoka Sword.description: The rhoka sword is the preferred weapon of urdefhan soldiers, though all urdefhans know how to wield these instruments of war.

Rhythm Bone.name: Rhythm Bone
Rhythm Bone.description:
This small, enchanted bone (most often a jaw) is usually capped with metal at its ends. It's activated by striking it against a hard surface.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect The bone begins recording the next 1 minute of ambient sounds (including speech) that require a DC 15 or lower Perception check to hear. The bone's recording doesn't copy magical auditory effects, such as those of spellcasting, a harpy's song, or a banshee's wail. Once the rhythm bone has been activated in this way, it retains the recorded sound for the rest of its existence and can't be activated this way again.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect The bone replays its recorded sounds.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.atlgGNI1E1Ox3O3a]{Ghost Sound}.

Rhythm Bone (Greater).name: Rhythm Bone (Greater)
Rhythm Bone (Greater).description:
This small, enchanted bone (most often a jaw) is usually capped with metal at its ends. It's activated by striking it against a hard surface.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect The bone begins recording the next 10 minutes of ambient sounds (including speech) that require a DC 20 or lower Perception check to hear. The bone's recording doesn't copy magical auditory effects, such as those of spellcasting, a harpy's song, or a banshee's wail. Once the rhythm bone has been activated in this way, it retains the recorded sound for the rest of its existence and can't be activated this way again.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect The bone replays its recorded sounds.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.atlgGNI1E1Ox3O3a]{Ghost Sound}.

Ridill.name: Ridill
Ridill.description:
This 12-foot sword was made by a cyclops in the ancient past. It might be the greatest dragon-killing weapon ever made, and Fafnheir justly fears it, which is why he keeps it hidden in his hoard. Runes of dragon slaying are written down its blade. Ridill is a +3 major striking dragon bane speed adamantine greatsword. While wielding Ridill, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against fear. This increases to +4 if the effect is from a dragon. If you have an ability that depends on Large weapons (such as barbarian giant instinct), it works with Ridill.

Ridill is always considered to have the appropriate material or damage type necessary to deactivate a dragon's regeneration or cause the dragon's weakness to apply. For example, Ridill is considered to be cold iron when attacking a linnorm, while it would be treated as having dealt cold damage when attacking a red dragon. If the dragon has more than one weakness, only the highest value applies.

Destruction If you boil Ridill in the blood of 10 different types of dragon (blue dragon, red dragon, etc.) and drop the eye of a cyclops seer into the brew, Ridill melts away into nothingness.

Right of Retribution.name: Right of Retribution
Right of Retribution.description:
Devil @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.ETNlci6VnSthx5V6]{Erinys}

Decipher Writing Nature, Religion

Profane powers of vengeance are yours to inflict.

Benefit When a creature deals damage to you, you can call out for retribution as a reaction. Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls against that creature.

Payment If you wound a creature, it is your duty to kill it. If a creature survives for 24 hours after you deal it damage, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1}. If you already have the doomed condition, it increases by 1.

Hidden Condition No more than once per year, the erinys can compel you to attack a creature of the erinys's choice that you can see. You are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled} by the erinys and must fight the chosen creature for 1 minute.

Termination Clause The contract demands that you enact bloody vengeance against anyone who has ever wronged you, but the nature of the vengeance is vague. You can end the contract by creating effigies of everyone you believe has ever wronged you, bleeding upon them all at once (at least 1 Hit Point per effigy), and destroying them.

Ring Of Recalcitrant Wishes.name: Ring Of Recalcitrant Wishes
Ring Of Recalcitrant Wishes.description:
This band of interwoven gold and copper, traced with Aklo symbols, is topped with a gleaming, luminescent opal gently bleeding wisps of shadowstuff.

Activate 3 command

Effect You attempt to make the ring cast an arcane @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish} spell. However, if the ring doesn't deem the wish to be sufficiently selfless, the wish isn't cast and the ring can't be activated for 24 hours.

You are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3}, whether or not the ring refuses the wish.

Once the wish is cast, the Ring of Recalcitrant Wishes has no powers, though it is rumored that the wearer's death in an act of profound self-sacrifice restores the wish to the ring.

Ring of Climbing.name: 攀爬戒指 Ring of Climbing
Ring of Climbing.description:
戒指厚重的金边上有着爪子一样的叉齿，能够在你攀爬Climbing时深深钻入陡峭的表面。这枚戒指为你提供等同于陆地速度Speed一半的攀爬速度Speed。你的速度Speed上的罚值（包括来自盔甲的罚值）会在减半之前计算。

自动生效:

  • 获得等同于陆地速度Speed一半的攀爬速度

Ring of Counterspells.name: 法术反制戒指 Ring of Counterspells
Ring of Counterspells.description:
这枚华美的银戒上展示着两组相冲的几何设计，光彩动人的宝石以一种极其冲突的形式镶嵌在上面。只要戒指内尚未储存任何法术，一个施法者可以施展一个法术保存进去，需要花费通常的时间、消耗来施法Cast a Spell。法术的效果不会发生；法术的能量则保存在了戒指之中。

当你绑定一枚法术反制戒指，如果里面有法术的话，你便能立刻知道里面储存的法术名字和环级。作为宝物发现时，一枚法术反制戒指有50%的概率已经保存了一个法术。GM决定是什么法术。

启动 R 想象

触发 戒指所储存的法术以你为目标，或你位于其生效区域中。

效果 你可以尝试反制触发的法术，使用戒指中储存的法术，反制调整值为 [[/r 1d20+19]]。一旦你这么做，戒指中储存的法术能量便被消耗，戒指被清空。

启动 A 命令

效果 你无害地花费掉储存的法术，不会产生任何效果，但戒指被清空了，因此可以被存入其他的法术。

Ring of Discretion.name: Ring of Discretion
Ring of Discretion.description: This ring magically conceals any armor and sheathed weapons you're wearing by either turning them invisible or creating the illusion of ordinary clothes. The ring doesn't change your appearance beyond concealing weapons and armor. As soon as you wield a weapon, the weapon becomes obvious to onlookers and is no longer affected by the ring until you sheathe the weapon for at least 1 minute. A creature can disbelieve this illusion by Seeking or any time it hits you with an attack.

Ring of Energy Resistance.name: 能量抗力戒指 Ring of Energy Resistance
Ring of Energy Resistance.description: 戒指给予你针对某种能量伤害类型的5点抗力：强酸、寒冷、电击、火焰或音波。每一枚戒指都是制作来抵抗一种特定的能量伤害，其设计也通常都以某种形式表现所针对的能量类型。例如，一枚火焰抗力戒指Ring of Fire Resilience可能镶嵌着红宝石，而寒冷抗力戒指Ring of Cold Resilience可能镶嵌着蓝宝石。

Ring of Energy Resistance (Greater).name: 高等能量抗力戒指 Ring of Energy Resistance (Greater)
Ring of Energy Resistance (Greater).description: 戒指给予你针对某种能量伤害类型的10点抗力：强酸、寒冷、电击、火焰或音波。每一枚戒指都是制作来抵抗一种特定的能量伤害，其设计也通常都以某种形式表现所针对的能量类型。例如，一枚火焰抗力戒指Ring of Fire Resilience可能镶嵌着红宝石，而寒冷抗力戒指Ring of Cold Resilience可能镶嵌着蓝宝石。

Ring of Energy Resistance (Major).name: 上等能量抗力戒指 Ring of Energy Resistance (Major)
Ring of Energy Resistance (Major).description: 戒指给予你针对某种能量伤害类型的15点抗力：强酸、寒冷、电击、火焰或音波。每一枚戒指都是制作来抵抗一种特定的能量伤害，其设计也通常都以某种形式表现所针对的能量类型。例如，一枚火焰抗力戒指Ring of Fire Resilience可能镶嵌着红宝石，而寒冷抗力戒指Ring of Cold Resilience可能镶嵌着蓝宝石。

Ring of Lies.name: 谎言戒指 Ring of Lies
Ring of Lies.description:
这枚平滑的银戒有着油腻的光泽。穿戴这枚戒指时，你在欺骗Deception检定上获得+2物品加值。

启动 D 交互

效果 用你戴着戒指的手打一个响指以施展 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.JyxTmqjYYn63V5LY]{舌灿莲花 Glibness}，法术施展时不会有视觉上的表现。

自动生效:

  • 欺骗Deception检定获得+2物品加值

Ring of Maniacal Devices.name: 狂野装置戒指 Ring of Maniacal Devices
Ring of Maniacal Devices.description:
这枚戒指像是失去光泽的黄铜，但能强化你对所有类型的陷阱以及装置的好奇心。

你可以使用交互Interact动作从戒指中取出一套盗贼工具。工具会出现在你的手上，并在将离开你的掌握时被收回去。

这为你在用来解除装置Disable a Device和开锁Pick a Lock的贼活Thievery检定上提供+2物品加值，而且戒指还能为你在制作Craft和修理Repair圈套以及陷阱的手艺Crafting检定上提供相同的加值。

启动 10 分钟 (交互)

频率 每天一次

效果 你创造一个4环的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.o0l57UfBm9ScEUMW]{守卫刻文 Glyph of Warding}，其中包含一个@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{火球术 Fireball}。

你只能同时拥有一个来自狂野装置戒指Ring of Maniacal Devices的守卫刻文Glyph of Warding，即使你有多个戒指。如果你不再绑定这枚戒指，则该法术终止。

自动生效:

  • 解除装置Disable a Device和开锁Pick a Lock的贼活Thievery检定获得+2物品加值
  • 制作Craft和修理Repair圈套以及陷阱的手艺Crafting检定获得+2物品加值

Ring of Maniacal Devices (Greater).name: 高等狂野装置戒指 Ring of Maniacal Devices (Greater)
Ring of Maniacal Devices (Greater).description:
这枚戒指像是失去光泽的黄铜，但能强化你对所有类型的陷阱以及装置的好奇心。

你可以使用交互Interact动作从戒指中取出一套盗贼工具。工具会出现在你的手上，并在将离开你的掌握时被收回去。

这为你在用来解除装置Disable a Device和开锁Pick a Lock的贼活Thievery检定上提供+3物品加值，而且戒指还能为你在制作Craft和修理Repair圈套以及陷阱的手艺Crafting检定上提供相同的加值。

启动 10 分钟 (交互)

频率 每天一次

效果 你创造一个8环的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.o0l57UfBm9ScEUMW]{守卫刻文 Glyph of Warding}，其中包含着@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.d6o52BnjViNz7Gub]{虹光喷射 Prismatic Spray}或7环的@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{火球术 Fireball}，由你选择。

你只能同时拥有一个来自狂野装置戒指Ring of Maniacal Devices的守卫刻文Glyph of Warding，即使你有多个戒指。如果你不再绑定这枚戒指，则该法术终止。

自动生效:

  • 解除装置Disable a Device和开锁Pick a Lock的贼活Thievery检定获得+3物品加值
  • 制作Craft和修理Repair圈套以及陷阱的手艺Crafting检定获得+3物品加值

Ring of Minor Arcana.name: Ring of Minor Arcana
Ring of Minor Arcana.description: This rose-gold ring is adorned in the center by a somewhat ominous-looking horned skull. This ring gives you the power to cast the following innate arcane cantrips any number of times each day: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.pwzdSlJgYqN7bs2w]{Mage Hand}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Qw3fnUlaUbnn7ipC]{Prestidigitation}. Each is cast as a 1st-level spell. If you are an arcane spellcaster, these can instead be heightened to the level of your cantrips.

Ring of Spell Turning.name: 法术反转戒指 Ring of Spell Turning
Ring of Spell Turning.description:
这枚金戒指的表面上镶嵌了3颗钻石。

启动 R 想象

触发 一个法术以你为目标

效果 这枚戒指复制了8环法术 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OOELvfkTedBMlWtq]{法术反转 Spell Turning}的效果，法术反制调整值为 [[/r 1d20+35]]，能够将触发的法术反射到其施法者身上。

这枚戒指每天可以反射总环级不超过9的法术。如果你启动了戒指，但反射的法术会超过总限制，那么启动失败，然而这次失败的启动不会算进每日限制之中。

Ring of Stoneshifting.name: Ring of Stoneshifting
Ring of Stoneshifting.description:
This simple iron ring is faceted with a bulbous geode lined with bright purple crystals. A ring of stoneshifting grants you the ability to ignore difficult terrain caused by rubble or uneven ground made of stone and earth.

Activate 1 minute

Frequency three times per day

Requirements You are standing on at least 5 feet of earthen material (such as stone, soil, clay, or sand)

Effect You sink into the ground and emerge at another location within 100 miles. This location must have an earthen surface at least 5 feet deep and you must be able to identify the location precisely by both its position relative to your starting position and its appearance or other identifying features. You can't carry extradimensional spaces with you to the destination, and if you attempt to do so, the activation fails.

Ring of Sustenance.name: 维生戒指 Ring of Sustenance
Ring of Sustenance.description: 这枚抛光过的木戒指不断更新你的身体和精神状态。在穿戴它时，你不需要吃或喝，而且你每天只需要2小时的睡眠就可以获得通常8小时睡眠带来的好处。你必须持续穿戴和绑定维生戒指Ring of Sustenance一周才能得到它带来的好处，如果拿开接着则重置这段时间。

Ring of Swimming.name: 游泳戒指 Ring of Swimming
Ring of Swimming.description:
这枚蓝色的金属戒指为你提供等同于你陆地速度Speed一半的游泳速度Speed。你在速度Speed上的罚值（包括来自盔甲的罚值）将在减半之前计算。

自动生效:

  • 获得陆地速度Speed一半的游泳速度Speed

Ring of Truth.name: Ring of Truth
Ring of Truth.description: This ring appears to be a ring of lies, but when invested, close investigation reveals angelic wings and divine creatures hidden on the face of the ring. When you invest the ring, you are rendered unable to tell a deliberate lie, in either speech or writing. If you attempt to omit the truth or phrase things truthfully but deceptively, roll a DC 11 flat check; on a failure, the ring itself blurts out the entire truth (as you believe it) as an answer. Keeping silent does not activate the ring's curse. Once the curse has activated for the first time, the ring fuses to you.

Ring of Wizardry (Type I).name: I型巫术戒指 Ring of Wizardry (Type I)
Ring of Wizardry (Type I).description:
这枚戒指是由最纯净的白金制成，上面描绘着一些深奥的奥术记号。这枚戒指只有在你拥有来自奥术根源的施法职业特性的时候才会生效。当你穿戴着巫术戒指，你在奥法Arcana检定上获得+1物品加值，并且每天都能获得两个额外的1环法术位。你可以在这些法术位上准备法术或者自发地从这些法术位上施法，就如同你正常施展你的法术一样。

如果你因为任何原因摘下了这枚戒指，你失去额外的法术位。你每天无法从超过一枚巫术戒指上获得法术位，也不能让一枚巫术戒指提供多次法术位。

如果你可以以多种形式施展奥术（例如你是一个龙血术士，并兼职了法师），你可以任意将法术位分配给你的每一个奥术来源。

制造需求 你必须拥有来自奥术根源的施法职业特性

自动生效:

  • 奥法Arcana检定获得+1物品加值

Ring of Wizardry (Type II).name: II型巫术戒指 Ring of Wizardry (Type II)
Ring of Wizardry (Type II).description:
这枚戒指是由最纯净的白金制成，上面描绘着一些深奥的奥术记号。这枚戒指只有在你拥有来自奥术根源的施法职业特性的时候才会生效。当你穿戴着巫术戒指，你在奥法Arcana检定上获得+2物品加值，并且每天都能获得两个额外的2环法术位以及一个1环法术位。你可以在这些法术位上准备法术或者自发地从这些法术位上施法，就如同你正常施展你的法术一样。

如果你因为任何原因摘下了这枚戒指，你失去额外的法术位。你每天无法从超过一枚巫术戒指上获得法术位，也不能让一枚巫术戒指提供多次法术位。

制造需求 你必须拥有来自奥术根源的施法职业特性

自动生效:

  • 奥法Arcana检定获得+2物品加值

Ring of Wizardry (Type III).name: III型巫术戒指 Ring of Wizardry (Type III)
Ring of Wizardry (Type III).description:
这枚戒指是由最纯净的白金制成，上面描绘着一些深奥的奥术记号。这枚戒指只有在你拥有来自奥术根源的施法职业特性的时候才会生效。当你穿戴着巫术戒指，你在奥法Arcana检定上获得+2物品加值，并且每天都能获得两个额外的3环法术位以及一个2环法术位。你可以在这些法术位上准备法术或者自发地从这些法术位上施法，就如同你正常施展你的法术一样。

如果你因为任何原因摘下了这枚戒指，你失去额外的法术位。你每天无法从超过一枚巫术戒指上获得法术位，也不能让一枚巫术戒指提供多次法术位。

制造需求 你必须拥有来自奥术根源的施法职业特性

自动生效:

  • 奥法Arcana检定获得+2物品加值

Ring of the Ram.name: 公羊戒指 Ring of the Ram
Ring of the Ram.description:
这枚沉重的铁戒指长得像一颗公羊头，有着一对卷曲的羊角。

启动 A 或更多 (交互)

频率 每分钟一次

效果 公羊形状的力场冲击波撞向一个在你60尺范围内的可视敌人。你在启动物品Activate this Item时所花费的动作数量（从1到3）决定了力场的强度。

你每花费一个动作，冲击便会造成2d6点力场伤害并将目标击退5尺。目标必须进行一次 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22] 豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响

成功 目标受到一半伤害并被击退一半的距离

失败 目标受到完整伤害并被击退完整的距离

大失败 目标受到双倍伤害并被击退双倍的距离

Ring of the Ram (Greater).name: 高等公羊戒指 Ring of the Ram (Greater)
Ring of the Ram (Greater).description:
这枚沉重的铁戒指长得像一颗公羊头，有着一对卷曲的羊角。

启动 A 或更多 (交互)

频率 每分钟一次

效果 公羊形状的力场冲击波撞向一个在你60尺范围内的可视敌人。你在启动物品Activate this Item时所花费的动作数量（从1到3）决定了力场的强度。

每个动作能造成3d6点力场伤害，豁免为 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:32|name:Greater Ring of the Ram] 。

当你以3动作启动这枚戒指，你可以将力场分裂成多个魔法公羊，以 @Template[type:cone|distance:30] 内的所有生物为目标，而非60尺内的单个敌人。

大成功 目标不受影响

成功 目标受到一半伤害并被击退一半的距离

失败 目标受到完整伤害并被击退完整的距离

大失败 目标受到双倍伤害并被击退双倍的距离

Ring of the Weary Traveler.name: Ring of the Weary Traveler
Ring of the Weary Traveler.description:
This fanciful golden ring has an ornate band cast with delicate, swirling decorations and is inlaid with three bright-green emeralds. While wearing this ring, you gain a +10-foot item bonus to your Speed, but only when determining your overland movement per hour.

Activate T envision, interact

Effect You refresh yourself from fatigue. For 10 minutes, you can ignore the penalties from the fatigued condition. This does not remove the condition, it merely suppresses the penalties and drawbacks of having the condition. If something would cause you to become fatigued again while the ring's power is in effect, the suppression ends, and you immediately take the penalties again.

Ringmaster's Staff.name: Ringmaster's Staff
Ringmaster's Staff.description:
This highly polished black wooden staff resembles an aristocrat's oversized walking cane, complete with a silver head shaped like a large circus animal such as a horse or elephant. Ringmasters or announcers use ringmaster's staves to draw attention from their audiences or to salvage acts that fall flat mid-performance.

While wielding a ringmaster's staff, your normal voice can be clearly heard by all creatures within 300 feet regardless of intervening barriers or ambient noise, although your voice can't penetrate magical silence and you can't use this to extend an auditory or sonic effect through barriers that would otherwise block it.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

  • Cantrip s @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kl2q6JvBZwed4B6v]{Dancing Lights}
  • 1st @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{Feather Fall}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.LvezN4a3kYf1OHMg]{Floating Disk}
  • 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.0qaqksrGGDj74HXE]{Glitterdust}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.f8SBoXiXQjlCKqly]{Illusory Creature}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Obscuring Mist}

Ringmaster's Staff (Greater).name: Ringmaster's Staff (Greater)
Ringmaster's Staff (Greater).description:
This highly polished black wooden staff resembles an aristocrat's oversized walking cane, complete with a silver head shaped like a large circus animal such as a horse or elephant. Ringmasters or announcers use ringmaster's staves to draw attention from their audiences or to salvage acts that fall flat mid-performance.

While wielding a ringmaster's staff, your normal voice can be clearly heard by all creatures within 300 feet regardless of intervening barriers or ambient noise, although your voice can't penetrate magical silence and you can't use this to extend an auditory or sonic effect through barriers that would otherwise block it.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

  • Cantrip s @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kl2q6JvBZwed4B6v]{Dancing Lights}
  • 1st @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{Feather Fall}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.LvezN4a3kYf1OHMg]{Floating Disk}
  • 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.0qaqksrGGDj74HXE]{Glitterdust}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.f8SBoXiXQjlCKqly]{Illusory Creature}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Obscuring Mist}
  • 3rd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IihxWhRfpsBgQ5jS]{Enthrall}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TUbXnR4RAuYzRx1u]{Pyrotechnics}
  • 4th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Freedom of Movement}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4YnON9JHYqtLzccu]{Summon Animal}
  • 5th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TCk2MDwf5L5OYjFC]{Cloak of Colors}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aIHY2DArKFweIrpf]{Command}

Rite of Reinforcement Exoskeleton.name: Rite of Reinforcement Exoskeleton
Rite of Reinforcement Exoskeleton.description:
Note Conrasu Rite of Reinforcement Heritage Only

Your woven exoskeleton rivals the hardest armors that can be found. Your exoskeleton is medium armor in the plate armor group that grants a +4 item bonus to AC, a Dex cap of +1, a check penalty of -2, a speed penalty of -5 feet, and a Strength value of 16, and has the comfort trait. You can never wear other armor or remove your exoskeleton. You can etch armor runes onto your exoskeleton as normal.

Robe of Eyes.name: 百眼长袍 Robe of Eyes
Robe of Eyes.description:
这件外套在穿上之前都像是一件普通的长袍，但穿上之后无数奇特怪异、形态颜色多变的眼睛从衣服表面张开并眨眼。穿戴这件长袍时，你在察觉Perception检定上获得+3物品加值，并且你持续性获得2环法术 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{识破隐形 See Invisibility} 的效果。

你也可以看到强烈的魔法灵光。在30尺内最高等级的魔法灵光会向你闪烁着代表着学派的颜色，让你知道效果的源头在哪里。你可以将圆点定位到5尺方格内，但不能进一步地精确定位。

穿戴百眼长袍Robe of Eyes也存在着危险。在穿戴长袍时，如果任何带有光亮Light特征的法术对你或你所处的方格施展，你会陷入目盲Blinded，持续的轮数等同于法术环级，除非你成功通过一次对抗法术DC的强韧Fortitude豁免。

启动 A 交互

效果 你摘掉长跑上的一颗眼睛并扔向空中，眼睛会隐形Invisible并飘向你所指定的一个位置，如同5环法术 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Ek5XI0aEdZhBgm21]{窥视之眼 Prying Eye}。你可以维持启动Sustain the Activation，就如同你可以维持法术Sustain the Spell一样。

自动生效:

  • 察觉Perception检定获得+3物品加值

Robe of the Archmagi.name: 大法师长袍 Robe of the Archmagi
Robe of the Archmagi.description:
这些长袍上用银线绣着深奥的奥术图纹，并根据关联的阵营分为三个颜色。善良长袍是白色的，中立是灰色，而邪恶长袍是黑色。一件善良或邪恶的长袍会得到对应的特征。只有能够施展奥术，且善恶阵营与长袍匹配的玩家才能从中获得好处。如果你的阵营与长袍不匹配，或者你不是一个奥术施法者，则你在穿戴大法师长袍Robe of Archmagi时陷入呆滞Stupefied 2。在你脱下长袍之前，这个状态无法以任何方式被移除。

长袍是+2高等抗力探险者服装Greater Resilient Explorer's Clothing，并能在对抗奥术法术的豁免骰上提供+1环境加值，以及在对抗奥术法术的伤害上提供5点抗力。

启动 R 命令

频率 每天一次

触发 你尝试一次针对奥术法术的豁免骰，但尚未开始投骰

效果 你在针对触发的奥术法术的豁免骰上自动成功。

制造需求 你是一位奥术施法者。

自动生效:

  • 对抗奥术法术的豁免骰获得+1环境加值

Robe of the Archmagi (Greater).name: 高等大法师长袍 Robe of the Archmagi (Greater)
Robe of the Archmagi (Greater).description:
这些长袍上用银线绣着深奥的奥术图纹，并根据关联的阵营分为三个颜色。善良长袍是白色的，中立是灰色，而邪恶长袍是黑色。一件善良或邪恶的长袍会得到对应的特征。只有能够施展奥术，且善恶阵营与长袍匹配的玩家才能从中获得好处。如果你的阵营与长袍不匹配，或者你不是一个奥术施法者，则你在穿戴大法师长袍Robe of Archmagi时陷入呆滞Stupefied 2。在你脱下长袍之前，这个状态无法以任何方式被移除。

长袍是+2高等抗力探险者服装Greater Resilient Explorer's Clothing，并能在对抗奥术法术的豁免骰上提供+1环境加值，以及在对抗奥术法术的伤害上提供10点抗力。

启动 R 命令

频率 每天一次

触发 当你或30尺内的盟友尝试一次针对奥术法术的豁免骰，但尚未开始投骰

效果 你或你的盟友的豁免骰自动成功

制造需求 你是一位奥术施法者。

自动生效:

  • 对抗奥术法术的豁免骰获得+1环境加值

Rock Ripper Snare.name: Rock Ripper Snare
Rock Ripper Snare.description:
You weave plant matter among loose stones in an area with trees or a ceiling overhead. When a creature enters the square, the snare's square and each adjacent square becomes difficult terrain, and the triggering creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:19|traits:uncommon|showDC:all] saving throw.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target takes [[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6 bludgeoning damage}.

Critical Failure The target takes [[/r {2d6}[bludgeoning]]]{2d6 bludgeoning damage}.

Rock-Braced.name: Rock-Braced
Rock-Braced.description: Rock-braced armor makes you as hard to move as a boulder. Whenever another creature attempts to forcibly move you from your space, you gain a +4 item bonus to your Fortitude DC against the check to move you. If the creature would not normally need to attempt a check to move you, then the creature must succeed at an Athletics check against your Fortitude DC (including the +4 item bonus) or you are unmoved.

Rod of Cancellation.name: Rod of Cancellation
Rod of Cancellation.description:
This powerful magic rod is inimical to all magic.

Activate 2 Interact

Effect You touch the rod to a magical effect or magic item and attempt to counteract the effect or item. Regardless of the result, the rod of cancellation can't be activated again for [[/r 2d6]] hours.

On a success, the effect or item is deactivated for the same amount of time, and its duration, if any, continues to expire during that time. If you choose, you can instead completely drain the rod of cancellation's magic on a success in order to completely drain the magic from the effect or item. If you do, both become completely non-magical and their magic can't be recovered, even by the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dMKP4fkWx8V2cqAy]{Remake} spell.

The rod of cancellation automatically fails to counteract most artifacts and similarly powerful items, but it reacts explosively when activated against a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.B4DnQNcGl6nFVKHl]{Sphere of Annihilation} without a counteract check.

Rod of Negation.name: 否决权杖 Rod of Negation
Rod of Negation.description:
这根朴实无华的细铅杆能够扰乱魔法。

启动 D 交互

效果 这根权杖射出一道能够无效化法术或是魔法物品的细小灰色光束用，施放出一个6环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}，反制调整值为[[/r 1d20+23]]。权杖在被启动后的[[/r 2d6]]小时内无法被再次启动。

Rod of Wonder.name: 惊异权杖 Rod of Wonder
Rod of Wonder.description:
这奇特的权杖是如此的异乎寻常而又变幻莫测。每次被启动时，它都会众多形形色色的效果中随机产生一个。

启动 D 命令, 交互

效果 选择一个60尺内的生物，投掷百分骰，依照@Compendium[pf2e.rollable-tables.uYDzWM5ji52r4mSD]{惊异权杖结果表}来确定权杖的效果。如果条目中仅列出了一个法术名称，那么权杖会施法此法术的最低环位版本。除非另有说明，否则你都可以自由决定所施法的那个法术，然而法术必须以你选择的生物为目标，或是对于仅能取范围的法术你所选的目标必须位于法术范围的中心。如果法术的距离低于60尺，那么将其增加至60尺。

所有法术的DC都为27，法术攻击骰为+17。如果用权杖对你自己施法，你不会获得豁免骰或是别的方法来抵御此法术。

权杖在被启动后的[[/r 1d4]] 小时内无法被再次启动。

Rope of Climbing (Greater).name: Rope of Climbing (Greater)
Rope of Climbing (Greater).description:
This silk rope measures 50 feet long and is capable of holding up to 3,000 pounds. If the rope is ever cut, only the longest remaining portion retains its magic.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect You hold one end of the rope and point to a destination. The rope animates for 1 minute, moving 10 feet per round until it reaches the destination or runs out of length. The rope can move across any non-damaging horizontal or vertical surface, but it can't extend upward without a surface to support it. At any point while the rope is animated, you can use an Interact action to wiggle the rope, giving it one of the following commands: stop in place, fasten securely to the nearest available object, detach from an object, or knot or unknot itself.

Rope of Climbing (Lesser).name: Rope of Climbing (Lesser)

Frequency once per hour

Rounds (Arquebus).name: Rounds (Arquebus)
Rounds (Arquebus).description: Firearms require ammunition consisting of a projectile and black powder. A round of ammo can vary in its composition but is typically either a prepackaged paper cartridge, including wadding, bullet, and black powder, or loose shot packed in manually. Some weapons, like hand cannons and blunderbusses, can fire other materials, but their ammunition has the same Price due to the cost of the black powder. Because making rounds of firearm ammunition requires creating black powder, you need the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Alchemical Crafting} skill feat to make them. Firearm rounds are a valid option for magical ammunition, just like arrows or bolts. Crafting magical firearm ammunition requires you to be able to craft both alchemical and magical items.
