Firearm rounds are a valid option for magical ammunition, just like arrows or bolts. Crafting magical firearm ammunition requires you to be able to craft both alchemical and magical items.

Rounds (Slide Pistol).name: Rounds (Slide Pistol)
Rounds (Slide Pistol).description: Firearms require ammunition consisting of a projectile and black powder. A round of ammo can vary in its composition but is typically either a prepackaged paper cartridge, including wadding, bullet, and black powder, or loose shot packed in manually. Some weapons, like hand cannons and blunderbusses, can fire other materials, but their ammunition has the same Price due to the cost of the black powder. Because making rounds of firearm ammunition requires creating black powder, you need the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Alchemical Crafting} skill feat to make them. Firearm rounds are a valid option for magical ammunition, just like arrows or bolts. Crafting magical firearm ammunition requires you to be able to craft both alchemical and magical items.

Rounds (Spoon Gun).name: Rounds (Spoon Gun)
Rounds (Spoon Gun).description: Firearms require ammunition consisting of a projectile and black powder. A round of ammo can vary in its composition but is typically either a prepackaged paper cartridge, including wadding, bullet, and black powder, or loose shot packed in manually. Some weapons, like hand cannons and blunderbusses, can fire other materials, but their ammunition has the same Price due to the cost of the black powder. Because making rounds of firearm ammunition requires creating black powder, you need the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Alchemical Crafting} skill feat to make them. Firearm rounds are a valid option for magical ammunition, just like arrows or bolts. Crafting magical firearm ammunition requires you to be able to craft both alchemical and magical items.

Rounds (Three Peaked Tree).name: Rounds (Three Peaked Tree)
Rounds (Three Peaked Tree).description: Firearms require ammunition consisting of a projectile and black powder. A round of ammo can vary in its composition but is typically either a prepackaged paper cartridge, including wadding, bullet, and black powder, or loose shot packed in manually. Some weapons, like hand cannons and blunderbusses, can fire other materials, but their ammunition has the same Price due to the cost of the black powder. Because making rounds of firearm ammunition requires creating black powder, you need the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Alchemical Crafting} skill feat to make them. Firearm rounds are a valid option for magical ammunition, just like arrows or bolts. Crafting magical firearm ammunition requires you to be able to craft both alchemical and magical items.

Rowan Rifle.name: Rowan Rifle
Rowan Rifle.description:
In a dense forest within Arcadia, djezet fell from the sky millennia ago, even before Earthfall. While this metal was poisonous to most of the plant life growing nearby, one stubborn rowan tree refused to die, its roots slowly absorbing djezet in small particles from the ground until the entire plant was suffused with it. Fey bowyers discovered the remarkable plant and coaxed it into growing into a very particular shape, its branching trunks woven together into a tightly twisted and naturally rifled barrel.

One of the legendary star guns, Arcadia's greatest treasures, the Rowan Rifle is a +2 greater fearsome speed greater striking advanced firearm with a range of increment of 300 feet. It deals [[/r {1d8}[fire]]]{1d8 fire damage} and has the backstabber, concussive, and fatal d12 traits. As a star gun, the Rowan Rifle runs on magic, and doesn't use ammunition or black powder.

As a weapon forged to protect the fey peoples of Arcadia, the Rowan Rifle's enchantments prevent it from ever causing harm to a creature with the fey trait; any attempt to shoot a fey with it results in an automatic misfire. This legendary star gun is as much a badge of office as a weapon, as it denotes dominion over all Briarbough. If the Rowan Rifle's wielder is fey, or if they were specifically given the Rowan Rifle by a fey creature who recognized them as a worthy champion, they can use the following activations.

Activate 1 envision

Effect You will the Rowan Rifle to change the energy it fires from the white-hot energy of summer that glows like a star to the shivering chill of winter, the crackling electricity of the storm, or even the sonic vibrations of a roar. The Rowan Rifle's damage type changes from its current damage type to cold, electricity, fire, or sonic. On the next sunrise, the Rowan Rifle returns to dealing fire damage.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.1tweTwYQuQUV45wJ]{Effect: Rowan Rifle (Cold)}

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.9kOgG7BPEfIyWyqm]{Effect: Rowan Rifle (Electricity)}

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.KiurLemTV8GV7OyM]{Effect: Rowan Rifle (Sonic)}

Activate 1 command, Interact

Effect The Rowan Rifle fires a @Template[type:line|distance:60] of liquid djezet that wraps around all creatures in the affected area before hardening, which impedes them with metallic vines unless the affected creature succeeds at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:35|name:Rowan Rifle Vines|traits:enchantment,magical,primal] save. A creature who fails the save takes a -15-foot circumstance penalty to their Speeds, and a creature who critically fails is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}. A creature who succeeds at a DC 35 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} check ends this effect. Otherwise, the djezet vines last for 10 minutes before crumbling away.

Activate command, envision, Interact (1 minute)

Frequency once per 10 minutes

Effect You hold aloft the Rowan Rifle and step into a tree in Briarbough, and you tree stride to another tree in Briarbough.

Rubbing Set.name: Rubbing Set
Rubbing Set.description: By using a rubbing set, you can quickly make a copy of carvings or etchings you find during your explorations, making them easier to accurately reproduce. This kit consists of a roll of thin onion-skin paper in a waterproof leather case, several thick wax crayons, and a bar of sealing wax that can be melted and used to temporarily hold the paper in place while you take the rubbing. Using the kit consumes the materials and provides a +1 item bonus on checks to document or reproduce artwork or writing that has been carved, etched, or otherwise physically added to a surface.

Ruby String.name: Ruby String
Ruby String.description:
The frayed threads from the rips and tears in Hao Jin's Tapestry still contain traces of the Ruby Phoenix's magic. Hao Jin has collected most of these loose strings, but others occasionally find these potent silk strands in unexpected places. A ruby string can fulfill the cost requirement for an 8th-level create demiplane ritual. When used in this way, the ruby string negates the need for secondary casters, and you get a success for all secondary checks. Alternatively, you can activate it to create a smaller demiplane without requiring the ritual.

Activate 8 hours (envision, Interact)

Effect You spin the thread to form a demiplane with the effects of a successful 8th-level create demiplane, but the space is a single 10-foot cube.

Ruler.name: Ruler
Ruler.description: A ruler is a straight-edged object used for measuring small distances accurately and drawing straight lines.

Rune of Sin.name: Rune of Sin
Rune of Sin.description: This jagged glyph, one of the Thassilonian runes of sin, reacts to magic of a particular school (there's no rune for divination, as it was considered lesser within sin magic). When you Cast a Spell of the school matching the sin, you gain resistance 5 to damage from spells until the start of your next turn. This resistance is increased to 7 against spells of the matching school. This tattoo has the school trait matching the rune: abjuration for envy, necromancy for gluttony, transmutation for greed, enchantment for lust, illusion for pride, conjuration for sloth, and evocation for wrath.

Rune of Sin (Envy).name: Rune of Sin (Envy)
Rune of Sin (Envy).description: This jagged glyph, the envy Thassilonian rune of sin, reacts to abjuration magic. When you Cast an abjuration Spell, you gain resistance 5 to damage from spells until the start of your next turn. This resistance is increased to 7 against abjuration spells.

Rune of Sin (Gluttony).name: Rune of Sin (Gluttony)
Rune of Sin (Gluttony).description: This jagged glyph, the gluttony Thassilonian rune of sin, reacts to necromancy magic. When you Cast a necromancy Spell, you gain resistance 5 to damage from spells until the start of your next turn. This resistance is increased to 7 against necromancy spells.

Rune of Sin (Greed).name: Rune of Sin (Greed)
Rune of Sin (Greed).description: This jagged glyph, the greed Thassilonian rune of sin, reacts to transmutation magic. When you Cast a transmutation Spell, you gain resistance 5 to damage from spells until the start of your next turn. This resistance is increased to 7 against transmutation spells.

Rune of Sin (Lust).name: Rune of Sin (Lust)
Rune of Sin (Lust).description: This jagged glyph, the lust Thassilonian rune of sin, reacts to enchantment magic. When you Cast an enchantment Spell, you gain resistance 5 to damage from spells until the start of your next turn. This resistance is increased to 7 against enchantment spells.

Rune of Sin (Pride).name: Rune of Sin (Pride)
Rune of Sin (Pride).description: This jagged glyph, the pride Thassilonian rune of sin, reacts to illusion magic. When you Cast an illusion Spell, you gain resistance 5 to damage from spells until the start of your next turn. This resistance is increased to 7 against illusion spells.

Rune of Sin (Sloth).name: Rune of Sin (Sloth)
Rune of Sin (Sloth).description: This jagged glyph, the sloth Thassilonian rune of sin, reacts to conjuration magic. When you Cast a conjuration Spell, you gain resistance 5 to damage from spells until the start of your next turn. This resistance is increased to 7 against conjuration spells.

Rune of Sin (Wrath).name: Rune of Sin (Wrath)
Rune of Sin (Wrath).description: This jagged glyph, the wrath Thassilonian rune of sin, reacts to evocation magic. When you Cast an evocation Spell, you gain resistance 5 to damage from spells until the start of your next turn. This resistance is increased to 7 against evocation spells.

Runestone.name: 符文石 Runestone
Runestone.description: 这块平坦坚硬的石头能用来蚀刻魔法基础符文或性能符文的。你只能在上面蚀刻一个符文。一旦石头被蚀刻了，它获得所刻符文所具有的的魔法学派特征。当一个符文从符文石上转移到其他物品上，符文石碎裂并被摧毁。上面列出的价格是空白符文石的；保存了符文的符文石应该将符文的价格加上去。

Rungu.name: Rungu
Rungu.description: This specialized club is designed for throwing and is useful for both combat and hunting. Rungus were invented by Zenj humans of the Mwangi Expanse and are most common among their tribes, though gripplis have also adopted rungus for hunting creatures that hide high in treetops.

Rusting Snare.name: Rusting Snare
Rusting Snare.description:
This snare emits puffs of oxidizing chemicals that rapidly degrade metal items; skymetals and most precious metals are immune. The chemicals affect a non-magical metal item of up to 1 Bulk that the triggering creature is holding or openly wearing (determined randomly if the creature is holding or wearing more than one). The triggering creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:25] saving throw. The snare deals [[/r 2d6]]{2d6 damage} to the item; this damage ignores the item's Hardness and might deal persistent damage on a failed Reflex save. The creature, or an adjacent creature, can attempt to scrape off the chemicals as an Interact action to prevent the persistent damage; doing so reduces the DC of the flat check to end persistent damage to 10 and grants an immediate flat check. Thin iron or steel items, such as weapons, typically have 20 HP and a Broken Threshold of 10, and thicker iron or steel items, such as most suits of armor, typically have 36 HP and a Broken Threshold of 18. Other materials' statistics can be found on pages 577-579 of the Core Rulebook.

Critical Success The object is unaffected.

Success The object takes full damage.

Failure The object takes full damage as well as [[/r {1d6}[persistent]]]{1d6 persistent damage}.

Critical Failure The object takes double damage as well as [[/r {2d6}[persistent]]]{2d6 persistent damage}.

Sack.name: 袋子 Sack
Sack.description: 一个袋子最多可容纳8B物品。一个容纳2B或更少物品的袋子可以带在身上，通常挂在腰带上。你可以单手携带袋子，但必须用两只手将物品放入和取出。

Saddlebags.name: 鞍囊 Saddlebags
Saddlebags.description: 鞍囊成对出现。每个最多可以容纳3B物品。给出的负载值适用于被坐骑所携带的鞍囊。如果你抓着鞍囊，它们将被视1B而不是L。

Sage's Lash.name: Sage's Lash
Sage's Lash.description:
The thin, glittering strands of rope that comprise this thick belt appear to be spun gold. Strung along the front of the belt are a collection of four multicolored, perfectly spherical beads: jade, turquoise, quartz, and amethyst. While wearing the lash, you gain a +3 item bonus to Religion.

When you invest the belt, you either increase your Wisdom score by 2 or to 18, whichever would give you a higher score.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.K21XQMoDVSPqzRla]{Equipment Effect: Sage's Lash (Turquoise)}

Activate 2 command, Interact

Effect You touch one of the jewels affixed to the sage's lash and speak a command word. Depending on the jewel, a different effect is produced that affects you and all living creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]. After the effect occurs, all four jewels disappear from the lash, reappearing at the next dawn.

  • Jade (healing, positive) Speak “purity” to produce a wave of green light that ends any sickened condition and any ongoing poison damage affecting creatures in the emanation.
  • Turquoise Speak “clarity” to grant all affected a +2 status bonus to their next Will save for 1 minute.
  • Quartz (healing, positive) Speak “lenity” to have each creature regain 30 Hit Points.
  • Amethyst (divination, light, revelation) Speak “verity” to emit a magical trail of light from the lash that reveals the location of each creature in the emanation. For 1 round, if they would be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, they become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} instead, and if they would be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9evPzg9E6muFcoSk]{Unnoticed} by a creature, they're @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} instead. A creature can attempt a @Check[type:stealth|dc:43|name:Avoid Sage's Lash Detection|traits:divination,light,revelation] check to avoid the lash's detection.

Sai.name: 十手 Sai
Sai.description: 这种穿刺匕首，中间和两侧都有尖刺，可以用来卡住敌人的武器。

Saints' Balm.name: Saints' Balm
Saints' Balm.description:
This luminescent paste is made from the powdered bones of a long-forgotten saint, mixed with herbs and blessed by a priest. It typically comes in a tightly sealed, palm-sized dish etched with holy symbols. Applying saints' balm to yourself or a creature within reach restores 3d8+10 Hit Points to the creature to which it's applied.

Activate A Interact

Salamander Elixir (Greater).name: 高等火蜥蜴灵药 Salamander Elixir (Greater)
Salamander Elixir (Greater).description:
启动 A 交互

这瓶灵药由能够抵抗火焰的火蜥蜴鳞屑制成。饮用后24小时内，你免受严重高温（severe heat）的影响。你也会免受极端和超常高温（incredible heat）的影响。

Salamander Elixir (Lesser).name: 次等火蜥蜴灵药 Salamander Elixir (Lesser)
Salamander Elixir (Lesser).description:
启动 A 交互

这瓶灵药由能够抵抗火焰的火蜥蜴鳞屑制成。饮用后24小时内，你免受严重高温（severe heat）的影响。

Salamander Elixir (Moderate).name: 中等火蜥蜴灵药 Salamander Elixir (Moderate)
Salamander Elixir (Moderate).description:
启动 A 交互

这瓶灵药由能够抵抗火焰的火蜥蜴鳞屑制成。饮用后24小时内，你免受严重高温（severe heat）的影响。你也会免受极端高温（extreme heat）的影响。

Salve of Antiparalysis.name: 抗麻痹软膏 Salve of Antiparalysis
Salve of Antiparalysis.description:
将这种透明的软膏涂在生物身上可以帮助其克服魔法麻痹的效果。该生物恢复正常，如同接受了一次3环的移除麻痹Remove Paralysis。

启动 A 交互

Salve of Antiparalysis (Greater).name: 高等抗麻痹软膏 Salve of Antiparalysis (Greater)
Salve of Antiparalysis (Greater).description:
将这种透明的软膏涂在生物身上可以帮助其克服魔法麻痹的效果。该生物恢复正常，如同接受了一次6环的移除麻痹Remove Paralysis。高等抗麻痹软膏也能移除石化。生物如同接受了一次6环的解除石化Stone to Flesh。

启动 A 交互

Salve of Slipperiness.name: 滑溜软膏 Salve of Slipperiness
Salve of Slipperiness.description:
启动 A 交互

这种浅绿色的黏连油脂可以涂在盔甲上，让其在8小时内变得无比滑溜，这为穿戴者在用来逃脱Escape和挤入空间Squeeze的特技Acrobatics检定中获得+2物品加值。

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.MCny5ohCGf09a7Wl]{效果：滑溜软膏}

Sandstorm Top.name: Sandstorm Top
Sandstorm Top.description:
On Tekritanin holidays, children reenacted legendary battles of deities by playing with magical tops. Though the paint on this wooden top has long since faded, its magical runes once gleamed yellow-gold and fiery orange, evoking the color of the sky during a sandstorm. To set the top in motion, wind a string around its bottom and upward along its body, and then throw it while gripping the string.

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You throw the sandstorm top 10 feet away from you. For 1 minute, as it spins, the top generates a magical sandstorm in a 5-foot radius. Any creature that starts its turn in the area or moves into the area takes [[/r {4d6}[slashing]]]{4d6 slashing damage} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true] save). Additionally, a creature within the sandstorm must hold its breath or begin suffocating.

Sap.name: 闷棍 Sap
Sap.description: 闷棍用柔软的皮包裹着紧实的核心，通常是用皮革包裹铅块。它的头部比握把更宽，以分散打击的力量，因为武器的目的是击倒受害者，而不是放血。

Sarkorian God-Caller Garb.name: Sarkorian God-Caller Garb
Sarkorian God-Caller Garb.description:
Each Sarkorian god-caller garb is emblazoned with a unique sigil of a particular Sarkorian deity and adorned with symbols sacred to Sarkorian god callers, the summoners and religious leaders of Sarkoris. These +1 explorer's clothing outfits look as if they were stitched together from multiple types of animals, featuring feathers, fur, leather, and scales.

When you cast a 3-action summoning spell while wearing this armor, the summoned creature gains a magical sigil that matches the one on the armor. As long as it is within 30 feet of you, the summoned creature gains a +1 status bonus to AC. If it ever moves farther than 30 feet from you, the sigil fades and the creature loses the status bonus to AC, even if it later comes within 30 feet of you again.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.CIfqUEC0mITBjwmL]{Effect: Sarkorian God-Caller Garb}

Savior Spike.name: 救主之钉 Savior Spike
Savior Spike.description:
这个金字塔形状的钉子附着在盔甲胸部。当你启动钉子，它会发射出一条力场来帮助你抓牢。如果你在触发的动作中投出了成功，则改成大成功；如果你投出了大失败，则改成失败。

启动 F 命令

触发 你进行一次抓住边缘Grab an Edge，但尚未投掷结果

需求 你在反射Reflex中达到专家

Sawtooth Saber.name: 锯齿剑 Sawtooth Saber
Sawtooth Saber.description: 红螳螂刺客的标志性武器，这种刀刃弯曲的利器很像锯齿，因此得名。

Scale Mail.name: 鳞甲 Scale Mail
Scale Mail.description: 鳞甲由许多缝制在加固皮背衬上的金属鳞片组成，通常以长衫的形式保护你的躯干、臂和腿。

Scarab Cuirass.name: Scarab Cuirass
Scarab Cuirass.description:
The cuirass of this +1 deathless resilient leather armor, stitched to resemble an Osiriani scarab beetle, feels strangely chitinous. You gain resistance 5 to negative damage.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Effect You cast a 1st-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Pest Form}. You can only become a scarab beetle.

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of pest form.

Scholarly Journal.name: 学术期刊 Scholarly Journal
Scholarly Journal.description: 学术期刊不常见。每本学术期刊都是一个非常具体的主题的对开本，例如吸血鬼或一个城镇或城市社区的历史。如果您在尝试技能检定之前花费1分钟参考学术期刊来回忆关于该主题的知识，那么您将获得+1物品加值。期刊集花费的时间是单本期刊的五倍，并且需要双手使用; 每种期刊集都包含数本期刊，并在更广泛的范围上提供加值，例如所有不死生物或整个城市。GM有权力决定在任何地点能够提供哪些学术期刊。

Scholarly Journal Compendium.name: 学术期刊(期刊集) Scholarly Journal Compendium
Scholarly Journal Compendium.description: 学术期刊不常见。每本学术期刊都是一个非常具体的主题的对开本，例如吸血鬼或一个城镇或城市社区的历史。如果您在尝试技能检定之前花费1分钟参考学术期刊来回忆关于该主题的知识，那么您将获得+1物品加值。期刊集花费的时间是单本期刊的五倍，并且需要双手使用; 每种期刊集都包含数本期刊，并在更广泛的范围上提供加值，例如所有不死生物或整个城市。GM有权力决定在任何地点能够提供哪些学术期刊。

Scope of Limning.name: Scope of Limning
Scope of Limning.description:
The dwarven gunsmiths of Dongun Hold originally created these scopes to help them clear out vermin in underground areas. This scope captures the sound that echoes off a creature hit by the firearm and transforms it into light, illuminating the target for all to see.

Activate 1 Interact (auditory, light, transmutation)

Effect If your next Strike from the weapon to which the scope is attached hits a creature, the sound of the impact transforms into light, causing the creature to glow until the end of your next turn. A visible creature can't be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} while they glow. If a creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, they're concealed while glowing, rather than being undetected. Because the effect requires a solid impact, incorporeal creatures are unaffected unless the bullet can deal force damage or has the effects of the ghost touch property rune.

Scope of Truth.name: Scope of Truth
Scope of Truth.description:
The scope of truth is a bit bigger than most to accommodate larger lenses, which have been magically prepared with tiny shards from crystal balls to reveal the truth. The scope grants you a +2 item bonus to Perception checks made to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} in areas you can see through the scope.

Activate 2 Interact

Frequency Once per day

Effect For the next 10 minutes, you can see things through the scope as they actually are. The GM rolls a secret counteract check with a [[/br +20 #counteract]]{+20} counteract modifier and a counteract level of 7 against any illusion or transmutation in the area, but only for the purpose of determining whether you see through it, not to end the spell or effect. For instance, if the check succeeds against a polymorph spell, you can see the creature's true form, but you don't end the spell.

Scorpion Whip.name: Scorpion Whip
Scorpion Whip.description: A scorpion whip has a series of razor-sharp blades set along its tip. Unlike ordinary whips, a scorpion whip doesn't have the nonlethal trait, making it deadlier in combat but less effective when the wielder seeks to bring in foes alive.

Scour.name: Scour
Scour.description:
This gritty powder improves responsiveness but suppresses thoughts and leaves you weakened. The saving throw for addiction to scour is DC 30, and the addiction is virulent.

Activate A Interact (Ingested, Inhaled)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25]

Onset 1 hour

Maximum Duration 6 hours

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} and +2 item bonus to Reflex saves and Dexterity-based skill checks (1 hour)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} (1 hour)

Stage 3 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} and fatigued (1 hour)

Scourge.name: Scourge
Scourge.description: A scourge-also known as a cat-o'-nine-tails-is a set of several knotted cords made from cotton or leather and attached to a handle. While most scourges are more suitable for torture than combat, the weapons used by the Order of the Scourge have metal barbs woven in to pierce clothing and armor. The scourge is a martial melee weapon.

Screech Shooter.name: Screech Shooter
Screech Shooter.description:
Built from the larynx of an owlbear, terror shrike, or similar animal that possesses a frightening screech or similar special ability, a screech shooter is a special +1 striking harmona gun designed to fire terrifying blasts of sound. A screech shooter deals sonic damage but can otherwise be used like a normal harmona gun.

Activate 1 Interact (emotion, enchantment, fear, magical, mental)

Frequency once per hour

Effect The screech shooter unleashes a frightening wail. All creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] from you must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:25|traits:emotion,enchantment,fear,mental|showDC:all] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for 1 round.

Craft Requirements The initial raw materials must include the larynx of a creature with a frightening screech.

Scroll of 10th-level Spell.name: 10环法术卷轴 Scroll of 10th-level Spell
Scroll of 10th-level Spell.description:
从卷轴中施法要求你用一只手持握卷轴，并进行一次施法Cast a Spell行动，花费法术正常情况下所需要的动作来启动它。

想要从一张卷轴中施法Cast a Spell，该法术必须出现在你的法术表中。因为是你在施法Cast a Spell，使用你的法术攻击骰和法术DC。该法术也获得与你的魔法根源相关联的特征（奥术Arcane，神术Divine，异能Occult，原能Primal）

所有物质上的材料成分和花费都在卷轴被创造时提供了，因此你在使用卷轴施法Cast a Spell时不需要再次提供。你必须将法术的任何材料成分替换为一个姿势成分。如果该法术需要一个器材，你必须拥有这个器材才能从卷轴施展这个法术。

备注：如果想要创建一个特定法术的卷轴或魔杖，把该法术从合集包里拖到一个PC，NPC，Loot表的背包里即可。

Scrollstaff.name: Scrollstaff
Scrollstaff.description:
A band of pliant wood encircles the head of this slender mahogany staff. The Magaambya created the first scrollstaves millennia ago, and even the few scrollstaves found beyond the organization often incorporate Magaambyan iconography as an homage to their source.

A scrollstaff serves as a weapon just like an ordinary staff and can be improved via runes like any other staff. In addition, if you are capable of creating magical scrolls, you can inscribe a single scroll onto the staff's head for the same cost as normal for Crafting the scroll. If necessary, you can embed a required material focus into the staff as part of the same Craft activity. As long as you are holding the staff, you can cast the spell from the staff's head. Casting the written spell works just like casting from a scroll, but you can perform the necessary material component with the staff, even if you don't have a free hand. Once you cast the inscribed spell, any material focus remains embedded in the staff until removed as an Interact action.

The staff can hold only a single scroll at a time. If you inscribe a new scroll before casting the previous spell, you replace the existing spell and remove any previous material focus as part of the Craft activity to write the new scroll.

Scythe.name: 巨镰 Scythe
Scythe.description: 这种武器源自一种用来收割谷物的农具，它有一根长木柄和突出的手把，顶端是呈直角弯曲的刀刃。

Scything Blade Snare.name: Scything Blade Snare
Scything Blade Snare.description: This snare sends a powerful series of scything blades to slice through a creature entering the snare's square, dealing 14d8 slashing damage (DC 31 basic Reflex).

Sea Touch Elixir (Greater).name: 高等海洋之触灵药 Sea Touch Elixir (Greater)
Sea Touch Elixir (Greater).description:
启动 A 交互

这瓶带有咸味的混合物能够改变你手脚的皮肤。你手指和脚趾之间的空隙会长出蹼，在24小时内给予你20尺的游泳速度，并且你能够在水中呼吸。

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.RRusoN3HEGnDO1Dg]{Effect: Sea Touch Elixir (Greater)}

Sea Touch Elixir (Lesser).name: 次等海洋之触灵药 Sea Touch Elixir (Lesser)
Sea Touch Elixir (Lesser).description:
启动 A 交互

这瓶带有咸味的混合物能够改变你手脚的皮肤。你手指和脚趾之间的空隙会长出蹼，在10分钟内给予你20尺的游泳速度。

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.thOpQunbQr77XWdF]{Effect: Sea Touch Elixir (Lesser)}

Sea Touch Elixir (Moderate).name: 中等海洋之触灵药 Sea Touch Elixir (Moderate)
Sea Touch Elixir (Moderate).description:
启动 A 交互

这瓶带有咸味的混合物能够改变你手脚的皮肤。你手指和脚趾之间的空隙会长出蹼，在1小时内给予你20尺的游泳速度，并且你能够在水中呼吸。

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.9keegq0GdS1eSrNr]{Effect: Sea Touch Elixir (Moderate)}

Sealing Chest (Greater).name: Sealing Chest (Greater)
Sealing Chest (Greater).description:
Vigilant Seal members use these containers when transporting samples and relics.

The containers are soundproof, airtight, and studded with lead sheets, mistletoe, and other materials that block magical auras. Up to 1 Bulk of objects can be placed inside a sealing chest; the magic auras and curses of any objects placed within the chest cannot extend beyond the box unless they are of a greater level than the chest. Artifacts and similarly powerful items are unaffected regardless of level. Many cursed items prevent their bearer from removing them, but a successful remove curse gives enough time to stash the item in the chest.

Sealing Chest (Lesser).description:

Secret-Keeper's Mask (Blackfingers).name: Secret-Keeper's Mask (Blackfingers)
Secret-Keeper's Mask (Blackfingers).description:
Each of these full-face masks is made of stitched materials — often including humanoid skin — and has a single, bulbous eye. While wearing the mask, you gain a +1 item bonus to Deception checks to Lie and the mask doesn't impair your vision. The mask can also be activated, with an ability based on its type.

This featureless mask is made of thin, papery skin. Its single eye is a fragile bubble of venom-filled glass.

Activate 2 Interact (divination)

Frequency once per day

Effect You twist the mask's eye and peer at an object. You know whether the object is poison or has been poisoned, but you don't learn the number or type of poisons present in the object.

Secret-Keeper's Mask (Father Skinsaw).name: Secret-Keeper's Mask (Father Skinsaw)
Secret-Keeper's Mask (Father Skinsaw).description:
Each of these full-face masks is made of stitched materials — often including humanoid skin — and has a single, bulbous eye. While wearing the mask, you gain a +1 item bonus to Deception checks to Lie and the mask doesn't impair your vision. The mask can also be activated, with an ability based on its type.

This mask is a patchwork of tanned skins, each with a distinctive scar. It is contorted into a caricature of a face with a leering eye.

Activate r Interact

Trigger You deal persistent bleed damage to a creature

Frequency once per day

Effect The bleeding wound you cause is particularly mutilating. The DC of flat checks to recover from the persistent bleed damage is increased by 2, and the target creature has a -2 status penalty to Deception, Diplomacy, and Performance checks while it is bleeding and for 1 minute after it ceases bleeding.

Secret-Keeper's Mask (Gray Master).name: Secret-Keeper's Mask (Gray Master)
Secret-Keeper's Mask (Gray Master).description:
Each of these full-face masks is made of stitched materials — often including humanoid skin — and has a single, bulbous eye. While wearing the mask, you gain a +1 item bonus to Deception checks to Lie and the mask doesn't impair your vision. The mask can also be activated, with an ability based on its type.

This monochrome mask is made of tattered rags of gray and black cloth and bleached fragments of skin.

Activate r Interact (illusion, visual)

Trigger You succeed on a Thievery check to Steal an item of negligible Bulk

Frequency once per day

Effect You create an illusory duplicate of the item you just stole. This duplicate has the appropriate appearance and weight, but it doesn't make sounds or generate smells. The illusion vanishes after 10 minutes, or earlier if anyone examines or manipulates the illusory duplicate (such as to try to use it).

Secret-Keeper's Mask (Reaper of Reputati.name: Secret-Keeper's Mask (Reaper of Reputation)
Secret-Keeper's Mask (Reaper of Reputati.description:
Each of these full-face masks is made of stitched materials — often including humanoid skin — and has a single, bulbous eye. While wearing the mask, you gain a +1 item bonus to Deception checks to Lie and the mask doesn't impair your vision. The mask can also be activated, with an ability based on its type.

This mask is made of gray and black tiles sewn together. It has a messy, inky spiral over the mouth.

Activate 1 Interact (auditory, linguistic)

Frequency once per day

Effect You touch the mask's spiral and identify a target creature within 30 feet. For the next 10 minutes, any normal speech you utter can, at your discretion, be inaudible to all creatures except the target creature, who can hear you clearly regardless of ambient sound so long as it is within 1 mile. This ability doesn't silence magical words, such as the verbal component of spellcasting or commands to activate magic items.

Seeking Bracelets.name: Seeking Bracelets
Seeking Bracelets.description:
Activate 2 envision, Interact

Both beaded bracelets in this pair have an even larger bead in their center. The bracelets are magically linked and only interact with their counterpart from the same pair.

When you crush the largest bead to activate the bracelet, it creates a mental alert in the mind of the wearer of the paired bracelet. This alert works at any distance as long as both bracelets are on the same plane.

Serene Mutagen (Greater).name: 高等宁静突变药剂 Serene Mutagen (Greater)
Serene Mutagen (Greater).description:
启动 A 交互

你获得了内心的安宁，能够专注于细微的事物并冷静地应对心智攻击，但你会意识到暴力令人生厌。

好处 你在意志豁免和察觉（Perception）、医疗（Medicine）、自然（Natue）、宗教（Religion）和生存（Survival）检定上获得+3物品加值。当你尝试以意志豁免对抗心智效果时，这个加值会提升至+4。当你在对抗心智效果的意志豁免上取得成功时，你可以将其替换为大成功，并且你可以将对抗心智效果的意志豁免上取得的大失败视作失败。

缺陷 你在攻击骰和进攻性法术的豁免DC上承受-1的减值，并且在所有武器、无武装攻击和法术伤害的每个伤害骰上承受-1的减值。

持续时间 1 小时

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.jw6Tr9FbErjLAFLQ]{效果：高等宁静突变药剂}

Serene Mutagen (Lesser).name: 次等宁静突变药剂 Serene Mutagen (Lesser)
Serene Mutagen (Lesser).description:
启动 A 交互

你获得了内心的安宁，能够专注于细微的事物并冷静地应对心智攻击，但你会意识到暴力令人生厌。

好处 你在意志豁免和察觉（Perception）、医疗（Medicine）、自然（Natue）、宗教（Religion）和生存（Survival）检定上获得+1物品加值。当你尝试以意志豁免对抗心智效果时，这个加值会提升至+2。

缺陷 你在攻击骰和进攻性法术的豁免DC上承受-1的减值，并且在所有武器、无武装攻击和法术伤害的每个伤害骰上承受-1的减值。

持续时间 1 分钟

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.5xgapIXn5DwbXHKh]{效果：次等宁静突变药剂}

Serene Mutagen (Major).name: 上等宁静突变药剂 Serene Mutagen (Major)
Serene Mutagen (Major).description:
启动 A 交互

你获得了内心的安宁，能够专注于细微的事物并冷静地应对心智攻击，但你会意识到暴力令人生厌。

好处 你在意志豁免和察觉（Perception）、医疗（Medicine）、自然（Natue）、宗教（Religion）和生存（Survival）检定上获得+4物品加值。当你在对抗心智效果的意志豁免上取得成功时，你可以将其替换为大成功，并且你可以将对抗心智效果的意志豁免上取得的大失败视作失败。

缺陷 你在攻击骰和进攻性法术的豁免DC上承受-1的减值，并且在所有武器、无武装攻击和法术伤害的每个伤害骰上承受-1的减值。

持续时间 1 小时

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.t7VUJHSUT6bkVUjg]{效果：上等宁静突变药剂}

Serene Mutagen (Moderate).name: 中等宁静突变药剂 Serene Mutagen (Moderate)
Serene Mutagen (Moderate).description:
启动 A 交互

你获得了内心的安宁，能够专注于细微的事物并冷静地应对心智攻击，但你会意识到暴力令人生厌。

好处 你在意志豁免和察觉（Perception）、医疗（Medicine）、自然（Natue）、宗教（Religion）和生存（Survival）检定上获得+2物品加值。当你尝试以意志豁免对抗心智效果时，这个加值会提升至+3。

缺陷 你在攻击骰和进攻性法术的豁免DC上承受-1的减值，并且在所有武器、无武装攻击和法术伤害的每个伤害骰上承受-1的减值。

持续时间 10 分钟

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.yrbz0rZzp8aZEqbv]{效果：中等宁静突变药剂}

Serithtial.name: Serithtial
Serithtial.description:
Perception +28; normal vision and hearing within 60 feet

Communication empathy (partner only)

Skills Iomedae Lore +29, Religion +26, Zon-Kuthon Lore +29

Int +2, Wis +1, Cha +2

Will +30

The legendary blade Serithtial is said to have been forged by Iomedae, goddess of honor, justice, and valor. She is an intelligent +4 major striking @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.DH0kB9Wbr5pDeunX]{Holy} bastard sword. Although the sword is made of steel, Serithtial is also treated as cold iron and silver, allowing her to deal more damage to certain supernatural creatures. She glows as bright as a torch, but you or Serithtial can suppress or resume this glow as a single action, which has the concentrate trait. In addition, Strikes with Serithtial deal an additional 2d6 damage against creatures that are worshippers of Zon-Kuthon, and while wielding Serithtial, you constantly benefit from death ward and freedom of movement spells that function only against effects created by followers of Zon-Kuthon.

Serithtial was forged as a bastard sword, and she reverts to this shape when no one wields her, but she can also detect what sort of blade her current wielder prefers and transform into it (choosing from dagger, shortsword, longsword, scimitar, falchion, greatsword, rapier, or bastard sword) using an action, which she does when first held. The wielder can empathically tell Serithtial to transform at any time by using a single action, which has the concentrate trait, after which Serithtial uses an action to transform.

Serithtial is willing to work with a partner of almost any alignment as long as they are dedicated to defeating the great wyrm Kazavon and the forces of Zon-Kuthon. If you ignore those threats and pursue your own agenda instead, before long Serithtial attempts to seize control of your body (DC 45 Will save to resist her control), though she typically remains in control for only long enough to find a more worthy partner. You can attempt a new Will save each day to retake control of your body.

Activate envision

Frequency once per hour

Effect Serithtial spends the appropriate number of actions and casts a 9th level heal or zone of truth spell (DC 45 for either of the two spells).

Destruction If Kazavon or a great wyrm shadow dragon who is a worshipper of Zon-Kuthon uses its breath weapon on Serithtial while she is unattended, the sword melts into a pool of mundane iron.

Serrating.name: Serrating
Serrating.description:
A serrating weapon's bladed edge separates into jagged, swirling shards that spin along the blade. When dealing slashing damage, the weapon deals an additional 1d4 damage.

Activate A Interact

Effect You brandish the weapon and focus its power, causing the serrated shards to buzz as they spin at a dizzying speed. On your next hit with the weapon this turn that deals slashing damage, the serrating rune adds an additional 1d12 damage instead of the additional 1d4 damage, and then the shards return to their usual speed.

Serum of Sex Shift.name: 性转血清 Serum of Sex Shift
Serum of Sex Shift.description:
喝下这瓶药水后，你的身体立刻发生变化，呈现出你自选的一组性征，你的外貌和生理机能也随之发生改变。你可以轻微调整变化的细节，但你总是与原来的形态有着强烈的 "亲族相似" 。

这个魔法立刻生效并且无法被反制。你新的身体结构与你原来的身体同样健康和实用，而且可能让你能够繁殖（根据你所属族裔的生态）。喝下另一瓶性转血清可以让你选择变回原来的形态，或者选择接受其他的性征。如果你怀孕了，或者你属于一种没有性别区别的族裔，则该药水不会生效。大多数族裔都有广泛的性别差异，有些差异很常见，而另一些则十分稀有。

Server's Stew.name: Server's Stew
Server's Stew.description:
Activate 1 Interact

The type of animal tongue used in this tomato-based stew shifts from region to region, but it's always cooked with spirit of wine and seasoned with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Vy3z2cIQ8uJRUMYw]{Refined Pesh}. Eating this restaurant-staff favorite empowers you to speak and understand a single language for 1 hour. This must be a language the stew's cook could speak and understand, chosen at the time of the stew's creation. It also helps your words land smoothly, granting you a +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks made in that language for the same duration. It doesn't allow you to read the newly acquired language in its written form.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.ehYmO1rFBt35zoOw]{Effect: Server's Stew}

Shade Hat.name: Shade Hat
Shade Hat.description: This comfortable and stylish wide-brimmed hat magically protects you from the worst of the heat in hot areas, even when the heat doesn't come from the sun. While wearing the shade hat, you are protected from mild and severe heat (but not extreme heat).

Shadow.name: 暗影 Shadow
Shadow.description: 蚀刻该符文的护甲变城朦胧的黑色。穿戴者的潜行检定获得+1物品加值。

Shadow (Greater).name: 高等暗影 Shadow (Greater)
Shadow (Greater).description: 蚀刻该符文的护甲变城朦胧的黑色。穿戴者的潜行检定获得+2物品加值。

Shadow (Major).name: 上等暗影 Shadow (Major)
Shadow (Major).description: 蚀刻该符文的护甲变城朦胧的黑色。穿戴者的潜行检定获得+3物品加值。

Shadow Essence.name: 阴影精华 Shadow Essence
Shadow Essence.description:
这种由阴影位面蒸馏而来的油状物质能将晦暗之力施加于受害者。来自阴影精华的力竭（enfeebled）状态持续24小时。

启动 D 交互 (受伤)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:29]

最大持续时间 6 轮

阶段 1 [[/r {3d6}[negative]]]{3d6 负能量伤害} 和 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6 毒素伤害} (1 轮)

阶段 2 [[/r {3d6}[negative]]]{3d6 负能量伤害}, [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6 毒素伤害}, 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1 轮)

阶段 3 [[/r {3d6}[negative]]]{3d6 负能量伤害}, [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6 毒素伤害}, 和 力竭enfeebled 2 (1 轮)

Shadow Signet.name: Shadow Signet
Shadow Signet.description:
This obsidian ring allows you to partially warp your spells through the Shadow Plane, allowing them to strike directly at a target's body.

Activate f command (metamagic)

Effect If your next action is to Cast a Spell that requires a spell attack roll against Armor Class, choose Fortitude DC or Reflex DC. You make your spell attack roll against that defense instead of AC. If the spell has multiple targets, the choice of DC applies to all of them.

Shapespeak Mask.name: Shapespeak Mask
Shapespeak Mask.description: This simple wooden mask is carved into the shape of an animal, usually tailored to a species of beast that the user favors. While wearing this mask, you can speak even when polymorphed into an animal. The shapespeak mask does not otherwise remove any limitations, such as the inability to cast spells when transformed.

Shark Tooth Charm.name: 鲨齿咒符 Shark Tooth Charm
Shark Tooth Charm.description:
这条干枯海草编成的项链上挂着形状像是小型鲨鱼牙齿的坠饰。当你启动项链，如果你在触发的检定中投出了成功，则改为大成功；如果你投出了大失败，则改为失败。如果你在对抗一个正在擒抱你的生物的特技Acrobatics检定中失败了，鲨鱼牙齿也会突然从你皮肤上钻出，令该生物要么以一个自由动作释放你，要么承受2d8点穿刺伤害。

启动 F 命令

触发 你用特技Acrobatics进行一次逃脱Escape，但尚未投掷结果

需求 你在特技Acrobatics上达到专家

Shauth Blade.name: Shauth Blade
Shauth Blade.description: These strange curved blades are jagged and deadly weapons made from the alchemically strengthened teeth of dead urdefhans. Each weapon is typically named for the urdefhan whose teeth were forged into the weapon, which are often carried (and revered) by that urdefhan's descendants. Magical shauth blades allow an urdefhan wielder to channel their Wicked Bite ability through shauth blade Strikes.

Shauth Lash.name: Shauth Lash
Shauth Lash.description: This metal chain bears hook-like barbs made of alchemically strengthened urdefhan teeth. Magical shauth lashes have the same ability to channel an urdefhan wielder's Wicked Bite as magical shauth blades, and urdefhans hold these weapons with the same reverence as they do shauth blades.

Shield Augmentation.name: Shield Augmentation
Shield Augmentation.description:
There are numerous methods to modify shields-snarling rods to catch weapons, bladed edges, padding for nonlethal strikes, and so on-but all share basic functionality. A shield augmentation can be etched with weapon runes, much like a shield boss or shield spikes, but doesn't otherwise alter your shield's statistics. A shield bearing an augmentation can't be combined with an attached weapon, like shield spikes.

A shield augmentation grants your shield one or more weapon traits, chosen when the augmentation is created. You can either choose to add the backswing or forceful trait, or you can choose two of the following weapon traits: disarm, nonlethal, shove, thrown 10 feet, trip, or versatile S.

Shield Bash.name: 盾击 Shield Bash
Shield Bash.description: 盾击实际上不是一种武器，而是描述一种挥舞你的盾牌猛击你的敌人的动作。

Shield Boss.name: 盾凸 Shield Boss
Shield Boss.description: 通常是一块圆形、凸形或圆锥形的厚金属片，附着在盾牌的中心，盾凸会增加盾击的钝击伤害。

Shield Sconce.name: Shield Sconce
Shield Sconce.description: This carefully balanced metal bracket can be attached to the front or top of a shield or tower shield (but not a buckler), allowing you to carry a torch without giving up your shield or holding it in your other hand. While carrying a torch in this way, you must attempt a DC 11 flat check every time you use the Shield Block reaction; on a failure, the torch is extinguished.

Shield Spikes.name: 盾刺 Shield Spikes
Shield Spikes.description: 这些金属刺战略性地安置在盾牌的防御侧，让盾击造成穿刺伤害。

Shield of the Unified Legion.name: Shield of the Unified Legion
Shield of the Unified Legion.description:
This high-grade orichalcum shield (Hardness 16, HP 64, and BT 32) bears a +3 major striking shield boss that cannot be removed.

It gleams brightly in any light, drawing attention at all times.

When you Raise this Shield, ephemeral reflections of it appear in front of each of your allies within 30 feet, granting them its +2 circumstance bonus to AC for as long as they are within 30 feet of you and your shield is raised. @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.ah41XCrV4LFsVyzl]{Effect: Shield of the Unified Legion}

Activate (2 actions) Interact (force)

Frequency once per minute

Effect You heft the shield and thrust it forward, causing ephemeral reflections of the shield to surround you and then rush outward in a @Template[type:line|distance:90] or @Template[type:cone|distance:60] (your choice).

Make a shield bash Strike against each enemy within the area, except that the damage dealt is force damage. Each target you hit is moved 10 feet away from you (each target you critically hit is also knocked prone). This is forced movement. These shield bashes count against your multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after you have made all these attacks.

Shielding Salve.name: Shielding Salve
Shielding Salve.description:
Activate 1 Interact

This shimmering paste has many properties of a shield spell. When you slather it onto a creature or object, the target gains a +1 circumstance bonus to AC for 1 round.

The first time a physical attack or a magic missile hits the target during that round, the oil prevents 5 damage from that attack or spell, and then the oil's effect ends.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.16tOZk4qy329s2aK]{Effect: Shielding Salve}

Shifter Prosthesis.name: Shifter Prosthesis
Shifter Prosthesis.description:
This prosthetic arm is imbued with transmutation magic that can transform it into a weapon.

Activate 3 command, Interact

Requirements You are holding a one-handed weapon

Effect The prosthesis engulfs the weapon and absorbs it entirely. The weapon is unavailable until you use this Activation to release it from the prosthesis. The prosthesis can hold up to two items at a time.

Activate F envision

Frequency once per minute

Effect The prosthesis reshapes into the form of a weapon it has absorbed. The prosthesis has all of the statistics of the weapon, including the effects of any etched runes. The prosthesis remains in this weapon's form until you use this Activation again to revert it back to a prosthesis.

Shifting.name: 变型 Shifting
Shifting.description:
随着一阵操作，你将该武器变型为类似形态的另一种武器。

启动 A 交互

效果 武器变型成另一种需要同样手来持握的近战武器。武器符文和任何珍贵材料效果都在新武器形态上有效。但若性能符文不适合新武器形态，则该符文效果被压制，直到它变型成的新形态能适合该符文为止。

Shimmering Dust.name: Shimmering Dust
Shimmering Dust.description:
Activate Cast a Spell

This luminous mica dust fluoresces for a short time after being exposed to significant amounts of magical energy. When a creature fails its save against a cloud of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.0qaqksrGGDj74HXE]{Glitterdust} created using this catalyst, glowing grains stick to them, causing them to shed dim light in a 20-foot radius for as long as their invisibility is negated by the spell as well as causing them to take a -2 circumstance penalty to Stealth for that duration.

Shining Ammunition.name: 闪光弹药 Shining Ammunition
Shining Ammunition.description: 一支闪光弹药闪着暗淡的光。发射后，该弹药会发出明亮的光芒，使半径20尺范围内成为明亮照明（并使更远的20尺范围内成为昏暗照明），持续10分钟。如果它命中了一个目标，它会固定在目标身上，使目标发出同样的光芒。一个生物可以用一个交互Interact动作移除弹药，但弹药仍然会持续照明，直到持续时间结束或被摧毁。

Shining Wayfinder.name: Shining Wayfinder
Shining Wayfinder.description:
A shining wayfinder is a polished silver compass blessed by the power of benevolent deities. It has the usual functions of a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder}, except instead of an activation to cast light, the shining wayfinder has the following two activations.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Effect You hold the wayfinder and ask for guidance. The wayfinder casts @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance} on you.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You call upon the wayfinder's divine blessings for yourself and your allies. The wayfinder casts @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{Bless}, with an emanation centered on itself. Once per turn, you can use a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to increase the emanation's radius by 5 feet.

Shiver.name: Shiver
Shiver.description:
A compound produced from the hallucinogenic venom of certain spiders, shiver is common in black markets. The addiction to shiver has the virulent trait.

Activate A Interact (Ingested)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]

Maximum Duration 4 hours

Stage 1 whenever you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened}, reduce that condition's value by 1 (10 minutes)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} (1 hour)

Stage 3 asleep (1 hour)

Shobhad Longrifle.name: Shobhad Longrifle
Shobhad Longrifle.description:
The shobhad longrifle is a firearm with a long, rifled barrel. Often mounted with a multi-lensed scope for targeting at an array of ranges and a chambering mechanism that can adjust the speed and penetrating power of each shot, it's the preferred weapon of many shobhad warriors.

Shobhad longrifles are equipped with a built-in @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.0BEbpOMBo7ET8NsR]{Silencer} so they make no more noise than a crossbow when fired.

A shobhad longrifle is a martial weapon.

Shock.name: 电击 Shock
Shock.description: 电弧在武器周身穿梭，用其命中额外造成1d6点电击伤害。若重击，电弧对目标10尺内另外最多2个你所选的目标造成等量的电击伤害。

Shock (Greater).name: 高等电击 Shock (Greater)
Shock (Greater).description:
电弧在武器周身穿梭，用其命中额外造成1d6点电击伤害。若重击，电弧对目标10尺内另外最多2个你所选的目标造成等量的电击伤害。

该武器造成的电击伤害忽略目标的电击抗力（包括重击时对另外生物造成的电击伤害）。

Shockguard Coil.name: Shockguard Coil
Shockguard Coil.description:
Activate F Interact

Trigger You Shield Block a foe's melee unarmed attack or melee attack with the affixed shield.

This miniature Stasian coil talisman emits small sparks when jostled. It uses a combination of Stasian technology and evocation magic to erupt in electricity when discharged. When you activate the coil, the foe takes [[/r {2d12}[electricity]]]{2d12 Electricity Damage} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:27|basic:true] save). On a failed save, the foe is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until the start of its next turn

Shoony Shovel.name: Shoony Shovel
Shoony Shovel.description:
This ornate, compact shovel has a golden handle wrapped with beautiful crimson bulette leather. Its silver head never gets dirty or worn no matter how much you use it. Its true magic, however, is in its ability to dig on its own.

Activate D command, envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You place the shovel in a starting position and specify the dimensions and direction to dig (such as "Dig down 8 feet in a rectangle sized 30 feet by 40 feet" or "Dig straight ahead for 30 feet"). The shovel then animates and digs on its own at a rate of one 5-foot cube per 10 minutes until the task is complete or it is picked up. It can dig through dirt, gravel, sand, snow, or similar loose material, but the shovel stops digging (or digs around, if commanded) if it strikes stone or another solid material. A shoony shovel can sense if its digging path will cause a building to collapse, harm a creature, or otherwise create significant problems, in which case it automatically stops digging.

Shootist Bandolier.name: Shootist Bandolier
Shootist Bandolier.description: This leather bandolier holds up to three repeating hand crossbow @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.9w8MrBhFtvM7RrYN]{Magazine with 5 Bolts} in leather pockets that pop open with the quick flick of a thumb. You reduce the reload time for a repeating hand crossbow magazine from the bandolier by 1, to a total of 2 actions. You can wear only one shootist bandolier at a time.

Shortbow.name: 短弓 Shortbow
Shortbow.description: 这种小型弓由单独一块木头做成，受到散兵和骑兵的青睐。

Shortbread Spy.name: Shortbread Spy
Shortbread Spy.description:
Activate 1 minute (Interact)

Though this item looks like a simple cookie in the shape of a humanoid, it springs to life once decorated with icing or other edible substances. The cookie then scrambles away at a Speed of 15 feet, returning to the same spot about 1 hour later, which gives it enough time to travel roughly a half-mile away and then return along the same path. The cookie spy is oblivious to your instructions and can't be given directions, instead following a path of its own choosing. Upon its return, it falls to the ground, never to move again.

As long as you decorated the shortbread spy with eyes, it gains normal vision, which it uses to see and magically record the sights along its path. Any creature that eats the cookie once it returns can then see what the spy saw. The images are relatively clear, but the passage of time is a bit muddied, so it might be difficult to tell when the cookie witnessed a given sight.

Shortsword.name: 短剑 Shortsword
Shortsword.description: 这种利器有多种形状和风格，但通常2英尺长。

Shot of the First Vault.name: Shot of the First Vault
Shot of the First Vault.description:
Legends claim that some long-forgotten god stole the original bundle of shots of the First Vault from Abadar's repository. Since then, individual pieces have turned up throughout the multiverse. When you pick up a shot of the First Vault, it immediately reshapes itself to function with any ranged weapon and establishes you as its owner until another creature picks it up. As its owner, you can use the shot's single-action activation after shooting it.

Instead of rolling weapon damage dice, a shot of the First Vault deals 25 damage plus any bonuses or additional damage as if 25 were the result of the weapon's damage dice; the damage type matches that normally dealt by the weapon. Upon damaging a creature, the shot of the First Vault shatters, and the fragments ricochet to hit any other enemies within 30 feet, making attack rolls with the same attack bonus. The shattered fragments remain lodged in the creatures they damage; the creatures are clumsy 2 while the fragments remain in place. A total of 3 actions, which have the manipulate trait, are required to remove the fragments from yourself or an adjacent creature; alternatively, a single action and a successful DC 30 Medicine check can be used. A critical failure on this Medicine check deals [[/r {10}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} to the creature with the embedded fragment.

Activate A command

Effect You recall the shot of the First Vault, which automatically reloads itself into your weapon. If the shot had fragmented, the fragments violently dislodge themselves, dealing [[/r 15 #persistent bleed]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} to each creature in which they were embedded. The fragments then unite to re-form the shot of the First Vault, which automatically reloads itself into your weapon.

Activate T Interact

Requirements The shot is loaded in your ranged weapon, or at hand if your ranged weapon has a reload of 0

Effect You line up a perfectly aimed attack directly toward the First Vault. You Strike a creature, then the shot of the First Vault attempts to bring your target with it as it returns to the First Vault. Unless your attack roll is a critical failure, the creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:45] save; this effect has the incapacitation trait. Regardless, the shot of the First Vault returns to the First Vault.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is moved 1d20×50 feet in the direction you fired. If this causes it to hit a solid object, it takes 50 bludgeoning damage.

Failure The creature is transported to a random location on the plane of Axis.

Critical Failure The creature is transported to the First Vault. Unless it is capable of eluding Abadar's precautions, it is likely unable to escape the Vault on its own.

Destruction If 10 shots of the First Vault are all fired at the same group of keketar or izfiitar proteans within 1 minute of each other, each shot was a hit, and the shots are then recalled, the shots collide as they attempt to re-form and crumble to dust.

Shrapnel Snare.name: Shrapnel Snare
Shrapnel Snare.description:
This snare uses tightly wound springs, clockwork, and shrapnel to cause devastating damage. When a creature enters the snare's square, the trap releases, dealing [[/r {12d6}[piercing]]]{12d6 piercing damage} in a deafening explosion. Everyone in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10‑foot radius} of the snare's square must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:31] save.

Critical Success The creature in unaffected,

Success The creature takes half damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 round.

Failure The creature takes full damage, [[/r {2d6}[persistent, piercing]]]{2d6 persistent piercing damage}@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Piercing Damage}, and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage, [[/r {4d6}[persistent, piercing]]]{4d6 persistent piercing damage}@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Piercing Damage}, and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 minute.

Shrieking Skull.name: Shrieking Skull
Shrieking Skull.description:
Activate a envision

Requirements You're an expert in Intimidation and the affixed weapon is loaded.

This dried skull of a snake is mounted atop the firearm's barrel or affixed to a crossbow's stock. When activated, the skull crawls onto the ammunition loaded in the affixed weapon. If you Strike with the weapon before the end of your turn, the skull lets out a bloodcurdling scream as the ammunition approaches its target. Regardless of whether the Strike is a success, the screaming skull allows you to attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} the target as well as each enemy within 30 feet of the target.

Shrinking Potion.name: 标准缩小药水 Shrinking Potion
Shrinking Potion.description:
这瓶霉味药水能提供 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.PjhUmyKnq6K5uDby]{缩小术 Shrink} 的效果，让你和你身上的所有装备变小。在潜伏期过后，你在10分钟内都维持变化后的体型。

潜伏期 1 分钟

Shrinking Potion (Greater).name: 高等缩小药水 Shrinking Potion (Greater)
Shrinking Potion (Greater).description:
这瓶霉味药水能提供缩小术Shrink的效果，让你和你身上的所有装备变小。药水没有潜伏期，持续1小时，提供4环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.PjhUmyKnq6K5uDby]{缩小术 Shrink} 的效果。另外，你在缩小时进行的隐匿Stealth检定上获得+2物品加值。

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.zd85Ny1RS46OL0TD]{效果：高等缩小药水}

Shuriken.name: 手里剑 Shuriken
Shuriken.description: 这种 "投掷的星星" 是一块刀刃锋利的扁平金属，设计通过抖腕或弹指投掷出去。

Siccatite Buckler (High Grade).name: Siccatite Buckler (High Grade)
Siccatite Buckler (High Grade).description:
Siccatite shields radiate extreme temperatures that protect them from energy damage. A protective coating on the wielder's side of the shield protects them from siccatite's radiant heat or cold but makes the shields bulkier than average.

High‑grade siccatite shields have resistance 20 to the corresponding energy type: fire damage for a hot siccatite shield or cold damage for a cold siccatite shield, as it takes even more extreme temperatures to affect them. They also provide some resistance to opposing temperatures because of their own extreme temperature, which extends to you when you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise the Shield}. The shield has resistance 10 to the opposing damage type (cold damage for a hot siccatite shield or fire damage for a cold siccatite shield), and while you have a siccatite shield Raised, you gain that resistance to the opposing damage type as well.

Craft Requirements siccatite worth at least 4,000 gp

Siccatite Buckler (Standard Grade).name: Siccatite Buckler (Standard Grade)
Siccatite Buckler (Standard Grade).description:
Siccatite shields radiate extreme temperatures that protect them from energy damage. A protective coating on the wielder's side of the shield protects them from siccatite's radiant heat or cold but makes the shields bulkier than average.

Standard‑grade siccatite shields have resistance 10 to the corresponding energy type: fire damage for a hot siccatite shield or cold damage for a cold siccatite shield, as it takes even more extreme temperatures to affect them. They also provide some resistance to opposing temperatures because of their own extreme temperature, which extends to you when you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise the Shield}. The shield has resistance 5 to the opposing damage type (cold damage for a hot siccatite shield or fire damage for a cold siccatite shield), and while you have a siccatite shield Raised, you gain that resistance to the opposing damage type as well.

Craft Requirements siccatite worth at least 50 gp

Siccatite Chunk.name: Siccatite Chunk
Siccatite Chunk.description:
In its raw state, this silvery ore is either scalding hot or freezing cold. Metallurgists disagree over whether siccatite is two related substances or one substance that determines its temperature output via some unknown process. Whatever the reason, the extreme temperature of the material means it must be handled carefully. Hot siccatite can easily ignite flammables such as paper and dry brush, and cold siccatite left in moist areas quickly surrounds itself with a thick layer of ice.

A creature that comes into physical contact with a significant amount of siccatite takes 1 energy damage for each round of continued contact (either fire or cold damage, for hot and cold siccatite respectively).

Siccatite Items

Siccatite Items Hardness HP BT
Thin Items
Standard-grade 6 24 12
High-grade 10 40 20
Items
Standard-grade 10 40 20
High-grade 13 52 26
Structures
Standard-grade 20 80 40
High-grade 26 104 52

Standard‑grade siccatite shields have resistance 10 to the corresponding energy type: fire damage for a hot siccatite shield or cold damage for a cold siccatite shield, as it takes even more extreme temperatures to affect them. Craft Requirements siccatite worth at least 55 gp

Sickle.name: 镰刀 Sickle
Sickle.description: 最初是用来收割谷物的农具，这种单手武器有一个短木柄，顶端是弯曲的刀刃，有时两面都开封。

Sickle-saber.name: Sickle-saber
Sickle-saber.description: A classical weapon of Irrisenis who lacked magical talent, the sickle-saber has seen a resurgence since the coronation of Queen Anastasia. The queen was fascinated with the sickle-sabers in the palace treasury, and now the unusual blades are carried by her honor guard and Irriseni diplomats alike. The sickle‑saber's blade curves multiple times along its 4‑foot length, and its hilt is similarly curved. A small, secondary grip on the blade lets the wielder rapidly and unpredictably twist the cutting edges. Characters from Irrisen have access to the sickle-saber.

Sight-Theft Grit.name: Sight-Theft Grit
Sight-Theft Grit.description:
Activate 1 Interact

This blackish grit seems to absorb light and resembles particularly dark flakes of black pepper. Infused with the blindness spell, sight-theft grit causes the victim's sight to dim and then depart altogether. The @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} condition from this poison lasts for an additional 24 hours once the poison has run its course.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28]

Onset 10 minutes

Maximum Duration 14 hours

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} and a -2 status penalty to visual Perception checks (1 hour)

Stage 2 dazzled and a -4 status penalty to visual Perception checks (1 hour)

Stage 3 blinded ([[/r 2d6 #hours]]{2d6 hours})

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VosLNn2M8S7JH67D]{Blindness}.

Signal Whistle.name: 信号哨 Signal Whistle
Signal Whistle.description: 当被吹响时，在开阔的乡田野可以清楚地听到半英里外的信号哨声。

Signaling Snare.name: 信号圈套 Signaling Snare
Signaling Snare.description: 这个巧妙的圈套是用来打猎或追踪的，通常是由精心准备的泥土、砂石和植物堆等等组成。当一个生物进入信号圈套的格子，该生物身上不会发生任何事，但这会导致地表上产生一种微小的，不易察觉的紊乱，能让圈套的制造者或其他知道信号形式的生物判断是否有一个大小合适的生物进入了圈套格子。

Silencer.name: Silencer
Silencer.description: One of the more prolifically used devices developed in the infamous Alkenstar Gunworks, these small firearm components are capable of muffling most of the weapons' explosive sound when fired. Without a silencer, a firearm's shot makes a loud and distinctive bang, which can easily be heard through doors and thin walls, but firearms equipped with silencers only make a quiet noise when fired. Due to engineering constraints, a silencer can't be attached to any firearm with the scatter trait. Attaching a silencer to a firearm takes 1 minute, and the silencer is consumed the first time a shot is fired through it.

Silencing Ammunition.name: Silencing Ammunition
Silencing Ammunition.description:
Ammunition arrow, bolt

Activate 1 Interact

Silencing ammunition is particularly dense and seems to dampen sounds around it. On a successful Strike, an activated piece of silencing ammunition creates a 2nd-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gIdDLrbswTV3OBJy]{Silence} effect on the target. The target can resist the effects of the ammunition with a successful @Check[type:will|dc:25|name:Remove or Resist Silence Effect] save, though it takes a -2 circumstance penalty if the Strike was a critical hit. While the effect is active, the target can use an Interact action to try to tug out the arrow or bolt and end the effect early; this requires a successful DC 25 Will save.

Silencing Shot.name: Silencing Shot
Silencing Shot.description:
Ammunition any

Activate 1 envision

This shimmering, golden-hued ammunition never makes any sound. A creature hit by a silencing shot is subject to the effects of a 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gIdDLrbswTV3OBJy]{Silence} spell (DC 25).

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of silence at 4th level.

Silhouette Cloak.name: Silhouette Cloak
Silhouette Cloak.description:
In bright light, this dark cloak shimmers with patches of color that shift and move even when the cloth is still. In dim light or darkness, the cloak seems to blend into your surroundings and grants you a +3 item bonus to Stealth checks.

Activate Interact (1 minute)

Effect You and objects you wear or carry fall into your shadow, becoming a twodimensional silhouette. In this form you aren't incorporeal, but you also don't have a solid form and don't occupy your space, allowing other creatures to pass through or end their turn there. You gain resistance 20 to all damage except force damage, damage from effects with the light trait, and damage from Strikes with the ghost touch property rune. This increases to resistance 40 against nonmagical damage. Other creatures can't attempt Strength-based skill checks against you.

Your land and climb Speeds both become 40 feet. You can't use actions except Climb, Step, or Stride actions using the granted Speeds or an Interact activation to return to your normal form. If your current space doesn't have sufficient room for you to return to your normal form, you return to your normal form in the nearest open space.

Activate r Interact

Frequency once per day

Trigger You take damage

Effect You fold the cloak over yourself and vanish into your shadow for a moment, gaining the benefits of the first activation until the end of the current creature's turn. The damage resistance applies to the triggering damage.

Silkspinner's Shield.name: Silkspinner's Shield
Silkspinner's Shield.description:
This oddly fuzzy buckler resembles the abdomen of a spider. Its defensive side is covered in fine hairs, and two small spinnerets protrude from the bottom of its rim. The spinnerets serve as +2 greater striking shield spikes.

Activate 1 Command

Frequency once per day

Effect You animate the silkspinner's shield. Eight spider legs sprout from the shield's rim, granting you a climb Speed of 25 feet until the end of your next turn. Additionally, the spinnerets animate and produce silk for 1 minute. Successful shield bash Strikes made with the silkspinner's shield during this time entangle the target in silk. The target takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. If your Strike was a critical hit, the target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 round instead. Regardless, the target can attempt to Escape (DC 30) to end the effect early.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.dchlrZqQ2oEmgNlN]{Effect: Silkspinner's Shield (Animated Strike)}

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.SbYcOry1cxbndSve]{Effect: Silkspinner's Shield (Climb)}

Hardness HP BT
10 60 30

Silver Buckler (High-Grade).name: Silver Buckler (High-Grade)
Silver Buckler (High-Grade).description:
Silver shields don't typically have an additional effect, though when used for a shield bash, they are silver weapons.

The shield has Hardness 6, HP 24, and BT 12.

Craft Requirements silver worth at least 2,500 gp

Silver Buckler (Low-Grade).name: Silver Buckler (Low-Grade)
Silver Buckler (Low-Grade).description:
Silver shields don't typically have an additional effect, though when used for a shield bash, they are silver weapons.

The shield has Hardness 1, HP 4, and BT 2.

Craft Requirements silver worth at least 15 sp

Silver Buckler (Standard-Grade).name: Silver Buckler (Standard-Grade)
Silver Buckler (Standard-Grade).description:
Silver shields don't typically have an additional effect, though when used for a shield bash, they are silver weapons.

The shield has Hardness 3, HP 12, BT 6.

Craft Requirements silver worth at least 375 sp

Silver Chunk.name: Silver Chunk
Silver Chunk.description:
Silver weapons are a bane to creatures ranging from devils to werewolves. Silver items are less durable than steel items, and low-grade silver items are usually merely silver-plated.

Silver Items

 5 20 10

 7 28 14

 10 40 20

Silver Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult).name: 成年银龙龙息药水 Silver Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult)
Silver Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult).description:
这种液体包含了银龙的血。你饮下这瓶调和物之后的一小时内，你可以喷出银龙的吐息武器。吐息的效力基于药水的类型，是根据提供龙血的龙的年龄来决定的。药水拥有和吐息武器伤害类型一致的特征。

释放龙息要花费一个动作。你喷出范围为 @Template[type:cone|distance:15] 的寒冰龙息，造成 [[/r {6d6}[cold]]]{6d6 寒冷伤害}。每个区域内的生物都必须尝试一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true|name:Adult Silver Dragon's Breath Potion] 豁免检定。

使用了一次吐息武器之后，你在 [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 轮}内无法再次使用。

Silver Dragon's Breath Potion (Wyrm).name: 古银龙龙息药水 Silver Dragon's Breath Potion (Wyrm)
Silver Dragon's Breath Potion (Wyrm).description:
这种液体包含了银龙的血。你饮下这瓶调和物之后的一小时内，你可以喷出银龙的吐息武器。吐息的效力基于药水的类型，是根据提供龙血的龙的年龄来决定的。药水拥有和吐息武器伤害类型一致的特征。

释放龙息要花费一个动作。你喷出范围为 @Template[type:cone|distance:15] 的寒冰龙息，造成 [[/r {10d6}[cold]]]{10d6 寒冷伤害}。每个区域内的生物都必须尝试一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:37|basic:true|name:Wyrm Silver Dragon's Breath Potion] 豁免检定。

使用了一次吐息武器之后，你在 [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 轮}内无法再次使用。

Silver Dragon's Breath Potion (Young).name: 青年银龙龙息药水 Silver Dragon's Breath Potion (Young)
Silver Dragon's Breath Potion (Young).description:
这种液体包含了银龙的血。你饮下这瓶调和物之后的一小时内，你可以喷出银龙的吐息武器。吐息的效力基于药水的类型，是根据提供龙血的龙的年龄来决定的。药水拥有和吐息武器伤害类型一致的特征。

释放龙息要花费一个动作。你喷出范围为 @Template[type:cone|distance:15] 的寒冰龙息，造成 [[/r {4d6}[cold]]]{4d6 寒冷伤害}。每个区域内的生物都必须尝试一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:23|basic:true|name:Young Silver Dragon's Breath Potion] 豁免检定。

使用了一次吐息武器之后，你在 [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 轮}内无法再次使用。

Silver Shield (High-Grade).name: Silver Shield (High-Grade)
Silver Shield (High-Grade).description:
Silver shields don't typically have an additional effect, though when used for a shield bash, they are silver weapons.

The shield has Hardness 8 HP 32, and BT 16.

Craft Requirements silver worth at least 2,750 gp

Silver Shield (Low-Grade).name: Silver Shield (Low-Grade)
Silver Shield (Low-Grade).description:
Silver shields don't typically have an additional effect, though when used for a shield bash, they are silver weapons.

The shield has Hardness 3, HP 12, and BT 6.

Craft Requirements silver worth at least 17 sp

Silver Shield (Standard-Grade).name: Silver Shield (Standard-Grade)
Silver Shield (Standard-Grade).description:
Silver shields don't typically have an additional effect, though when used for a shield bash, they are silver weapons.

The shield has Hardness 5, HP 20, and BT 10.

Craft Requirements silver worth at least 425 sp

Silver Tripod.name: Silver Tripod
Silver Tripod.description:
Activate a envision

This tiny, silver facsimile of a weapon tripod is usually attached to the underside of the affixed weapon's barrel. When activated, it creates an invisible construct of magical force that attaches to the weapon and automatically stabilizes it in any location, even in midair. The effect lasts for 1 minute or until you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} it. The effect also ends immediately if you let go of the affixed weapon. The affixed weapon cannot be moved while this effect is active.

Silversheen.name: 银辉 Silversheen
Silversheen.description:
启动 A 交互 Interact

你能够将这种银色的浆糊涂抹到一把近战武器、一把投掷武器或10份弹药上。银辉变质得很快，所以一旦你打开容器，你就必须立即将它全部用完，不能留到以后再用。

在接下来的一个小时中，被涂抹的武器或弹药在考虑它造成的武器伤害时视作银制而不是原本的特殊材料（例如寒铁）。

Silvertongue Mutagen (Greater).name: 高等巧舌突变药剂 Silvertongue Mutagen (Greater)
Silvertongue Mutagen (Greater).description:
启动 A 交互

你的容貌变得引人注目，你的嗓音悦耳且令人动容，然而你眼中的现实和数理都变得模糊不清，起伏的情绪遮蔽了你理性思考的能力。

好处 你在交涉（Deception）、欺骗（Diplomacy）、威吓（Intimidation）和表演（Performance）检定上获得+3物品加值。你在这些技能上取得的大失败被替换为失败。

缺陷 你在奥法（Arcana）、手艺（Crafting）、学识（Lore）、神秘学（Occultism）和社科（Society）检定上承受-2的减值。选择一个你已受训的技能；在持续时间内，你在这个技能上变得未受训。所有你用于 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{回想知识 Recall Knowledge} 的检定上取得的失败都变为大失败。

持续时间 1 小时

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.oAewXfq9c0ecaSfw]{效果：高等巧舌突变药剂}

Silvertongue Mutagen (Lesser).name: 次等巧舌突变药剂 Silvertongue Mutagen (Lesser)
Silvertongue Mutagen (Lesser).description:
启动 A 交互

你的容貌变得引人注目，你的嗓音悦耳且令人动容，然而你眼中的现实和数理都变得模糊不清，起伏的情绪遮蔽了你理性思考的能力。

好处 你在交涉（Deception）、欺骗（Diplomacy）、威吓（Intimidation）和表演（Performance）检定上获得+1物品加值。你在这些技能上取得的大失败被替换为失败。

缺陷 你在奥法（Arcana）、手艺（Crafting）、学识（Lore）、神秘学（Occultism）和社科（Society）检定上承受-2的减值。选择一个你已受训的技能；在持续时间内，你在这个技能上变得未受训。所有你用于 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{回想知识 Recall Knowledge} 的检定上取得的失败都变为大失败。
