Sinew-Shock Serum (Greater).name: Sinew-Shock Serum (Greater)
Sinew-Shock Serum (Greater).description:
Activate A Interact

This serum jolts the body to help shake off physical debilitations. When you drink this elixir, it attempts a counteract check with a [[/r 1d20+19 #Counteract]]{1d20+19 Counteract Modifier} to remove the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition from a single source, using the source of that condition to determine the counteract level and DC.

Sinew-Shock Serum (Lesser).name: Sinew-Shock Serum (Lesser)
Sinew-Shock Serum (Lesser).description:
Activate A Interact

This serum jolts the body to help shake off physical debilitations. When you drink this elixir, it attempts a counteract check with a [[/r 1d20+6 #Counteract]]{1d20+6 Counteract Modifier} to remove the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition from a single source, using the source of that condition to determine the counteract level and DC.

Sinew-Shock Serum (Major).name: Sinew-Shock Serum (Major)
Sinew-Shock Serum (Major).description:
Activate A Interact

This serum jolts the body to help shake off physical debilitations. When you drink this elixir, it attempts a counteract check with a [[/r 1d20+28 #Counteract]]{1d20+28 Counteract Modifier} to remove the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition from a single source, using the source of that condition to determine the counteract level and DC.

Sinew-Shock Serum (Moderate).name: Sinew-Shock Serum (Moderate)
Sinew-Shock Serum (Moderate).description:
Activate A Interact

This serum jolts the body to help shake off physical debilitations. When you drink this elixir, it attempts a counteract check with a [[/r 1d20+8 #Counteract]]{1d20+8 Counteract Modifier} to remove the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition from a single source, using the source of that condition to determine the counteract level and DC.

Singing Bowl of the Versatile Stance.name: Singing Bowl of the Versatile Stance
Singing Bowl of the Versatile Stance.description:
In true Iroran form, the simplicity of this small, inverted copper bell belies its flawlessness. When struck with a mallet (included with the singing bowl), it emits a harmonious tone that inspires bodily perfection in those who know how to hear it.

Activate A Interact (auditory)

Effect While holding the singing bowl of the versatile stance with one hand, you strike the lip of it with a mallet held in the other. Anyone within 60 feet currently in a stance can spend a reaction to use one of their stance actions in order to change to a different stance.

Singing Muse.name: Singing Muse
Singing Muse.description:
Activate r envision

Trigger You attempt a Performance check.

This small figurine is carved from a single piece of silvery, spiky stone and resembles a beautiful dryad pouring water into a small pool. When you activate the muse, you are momentarily enlightened with inspiration that bolsters your performance. If you roll a success on your triggering check, you get a critical success instead.

Singing Shortbow.name: Singing Shortbow
Singing Shortbow.description:
Rather than a normal bowstring, this +2 greater striking thundering composite shortbow has a string made of animal gut, much like a musical instrument's. When you shoot the bow, it releases a soft musical note: sonorous if your aim is true and discordant if your shot goes off-target.

Activate 2 command (auditory)

Frequency once per hour

Effect You sing, hum, or whistle a note, and your bow provides appropriate accompaniment. Make a Strike with the bow. If it hits, the bow generates a magical effect determined by the note you sung, which has the traits indicated in parentheses. This affects every creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] from the creature you hit. As normal for an emanation, you choose whether the creature you hit is affected.

  • Song of Soothing (emotion, enchantment, healing, mental) Each creature regains [[/r {3d10}[healing]]]{3d10 Hit Points} and gains a +1 status bonus to saves against mental effects for 1 minute.
  • Song of Suffering (evocation, sonic) Each creature takes [[/r {3d10}[sonic]]]{3d10 sonic damage} with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:31|basic:true|name:Song of Suffering|traits:evocation,sonic] save.

Singing Shortbow (Greater).name: Singing Shortbow (Greater)
Singing Shortbow (Greater).description:
Rather than a normal bowstring, this +3 greater striking greater thundering composite shortbow has a string made of animal gut, much like a musical instrument's. When you shoot the bow, it releases a soft musical note: sonorous if your aim is true and discordant if your shot goes off-target.

Activate 2 command (auditory)

Frequency once per hour

Effect You sing, hum, or whistle a note, and your bow provides appropriate accompaniment. Make a Strike with the bow. If it hits, the bow generates a magical effect determined by the note you sung, which has the traits indicated in parentheses. This affects every creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] from the creature you hit. As normal for an emanation, you choose whether the creature you hit is affected.

  • Song of Soothing (emotion, enchantment, healing, mental) Each creature regains [[/r {5d10}[healing]]]{5d10 Hit Points} and gains a +1 status bonus to saves against mental effects for 1 minute.
  • Song of Suffering (evocation, sonic) Each creature takes [[/r {5d10}[sonic]]]{5d10 sonic damage} with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38|basic:true|name:Song of Suffering|traits:evocation,sonic] save.

Singing Sword.name: Singing Sword
Singing Sword.description:
Perception +11; precise vision 30 feet, imprecise hearing 30 feet

Communication speech (Common and four other common languages)

Skills Performance +15

Int +2, Wis +2, Cha +4

Will +13 (+17 against attempts to quiet its singing)

A singing sword is a +1 striking longsword imbued with the consciousness of a boisterous bard, and therefore constantly sings at all times. A singing sword can't stop singing and in fact communicates in no way other than by singing. A successful Diplomacy or Intimidation check against its Will DC can convince it to quiet its singing to a whisper for 10 minutes, or 20 minutes on a critical success, though it quickly grows displeased at anyone who attempts this repeatedly. The singing sword can spend its actions to attack on its own, with the effects of a dancing weapon's activation, except that its attack modifier is +12. Additionally, it can perform the following activations; each casts a composition spell and follows all the usual rules for compositions.

Activate A command

Frequency once per minute

Effect The singing sword casts inspire courage.

Activate A command

Frequency once per minute

Effect The singing sword casts inspire defense.

Activate R command

Frequency once per hour

Trigger You or an ally within 60 feet rolls a saving throw against an auditory effect

Effect The singing sword casts counter performance.

Singularity Ammunition.name: Singularity Ammunition
Singularity Ammunition.description:
Ammunition Any

Activate 1 Interact

Singularity ammunition seems to pull in the light around it, swirling along the surface in a misty pattern. An activated singularity arrow creates a strong gravitational force, centered on the creature hit. All creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] from the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30|name:Resist Singularity Ammunition Pull|traits:uncommon] save or be pulled 5 feet closer to the target. The singularity then explodes, dealing [[/r {7d12}[bludgeoning]]]{7d12 bludgeoning damage} to the original target and all creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true|name:Resist Singularity Ammunition Pull|traits:uncommon]).

Sinister Knight.name: Sinister Knight
Sinister Knight.description:
Sinister knight armor shrouds the wearer's identity in secrecy, allowing Crimson Reclaimers to pass among foes without being immediately unmasked. The wearer gains a +1 item bonus to Deception checks.

Activate A envision

Effect With a thought, the wearer activates a disguise. While the sinister knight armor's disguise is active, any identifying insignia or aesthetic of the armor is replaced by generic malevolent aesthetics such as spikes or demonic faces. While in the disguise, the wearer is always considered to be taking precautions against lifesense, and even a creature that successfully notices the wearer with its lifesense mistakes the wearer for an undead unless it critically succeeds at its Perception check or the wearer critically fails a Deception or Stealth check. Finally, while in the disguise, the rune attempts to counteract any effects that would reveal your alignment; on a successful counteract check, rather than negate the effect, the rune causes the effect to perceive your alignment as evil (maintaining any lawful or chaotic component of your alignment).

The wearer can Dismiss the disguise, and if the wearer's armor is removed, the disguise deactivates automatically.

Sixfingers Elixir (Greater).name: Sixfingers Elixir (Greater)
Sixfingers Elixir (Greater).description:
Activation 1 Interact

This gritty, spicy fluid causes you to grow a sixth finger on each hand and gives you a spiderlike grip.

You gain a +2 item bonus to your Reflex DC to keep from being @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarmed} and a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb} Speed of 20 feet for the listed duration.

Duration 8 hours.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.TkRuKKYyPHTGPfgf]{Effect: Sixfingers Elixir (Greater)}

Sixfingers Elixir (Lesser).name: Sixfingers Elixir (Lesser)
Sixfingers Elixir (Lesser).description:
Activation 1 Interact

This gritty, spicy fluid causes you to grow a sixth finger on each hand and gives you a spiderlike grip.

You gain a +2 item bonus to your Reflex DC to keep from being @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarmed} and a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb} Speed of 20 feet for the listed duration.

Duration 10 minutes.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.XrlChFETfe8avLsX]{Effect: Sixfingers Elixir (Lesser)}

Sixfingers Elixir (Moderate).name: Sixfingers Elixir (Moderate)
Sixfingers Elixir (Moderate).description:
Activation 1 Interact

This gritty, spicy fluid causes you to grow a sixth finger on each hand and gives you a spiderlike grip.

You gain a +2 item bonus to your Reflex DC to keep from being @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarmed} and a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb} Speed of 20 feet for the listed duration.

Duration 1 hour.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.qzRcSQ0HTTp58hV2]{Effect: Sixfingers Elixir (Moderate)}

Skarja's Heartstone.name: Skarja's Heartstone
Skarja's Heartstone.description:
This pale gemstone grants its wearer a +2 item bonus to saving throws and the ability to discern a target's alignment (as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.QnTtGCAvdWRU4spv]{Detect Alignment}, but can detect chaotic, evil, good, and lawful auras simultaneously) at will by peering through the gemstone.

Like all hag heartstones, this gemstone is powered by Skarja's spirit. Skarja does not need to wear her heartstone to benefit from its powers, but she cannot use them if she hasn't touched her heartstone in the past 7 days. If Skarja's heartstone is separated from her for more than 7 days (or if she's been dead for 7 days), it becomes a non-magical gemstone.

Skarja's heartstone allows her to use additional occult innate spells: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.D2nPKbIS67m9199U]{Ethereal Jaunt} (9th level) and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GYmXvS9NJ7QwfWGg]{Bind Soul} at will, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IqJ9URobmJ9L9UBG]{Shadow Blast} (6th level) twice per day, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.PHVHBbdHeQRfjLmE]{Spirit Blast} once per day.

Activate Acommand

Requirements You must be touching the heartstone.

Effect The heartstone attempts to counteract one disease affecting you (counteract level 7, counteract modifier [[/r 1d20+23]]).

Craft Requirements You must be a night hag.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to saving throws

Skeleton Key.name: 万能钥匙 Skeleton Key
Skeleton Key.description:
这把魔法钥匙的顶端有着一只狰狞的头骨。这把钥匙可以在尝试开锁的时候代替盗贼工具，并且在贼活检定上提供+1物品加值。

如果万能钥匙因为检定大失败而变成破损状态，那么直到被修复之前它都无法提供加值，并且只能如同普通的盗贼工具一般被使用。

启动 F 交互

频率 每天一次

触发 你尝试开锁，但还未投骰

效果 钥匙对你尝试要打开的锁施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.6Ot4N22t5tPD51BO]{敲击术 Knock} 。

自动生效:

  • 开锁时的贼活检定获得+1物品加值

Skeleton Key (Greater).name: 高等万能钥匙 Skeleton Key (Greater)
Skeleton Key (Greater).description:
这把魔法钥匙的顶端有着一只狰狞的头骨。这把钥匙可以在尝试开锁的时候代替盗贼工具，并且在贼活检定上提供+2物品加值。

如果万能钥匙因为检定大失败而变成破损状态，那么直到被修复之前它都无法提供加值，并且只能如同普通的盗贼工具一般被使用。

启动 F 交互

频率 每小时一次

触发 你尝试开锁，但还未投骰

效果 钥匙对你尝试要打开的锁施放 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.6Ot4N22t5tPD51BO]{敲击术 Knock} 。

自动生效:

  • 开锁时的贼活检定获得+2物品加值

Skeptic's Elixir (Greater).name: Skeptic's Elixir (Greater)
Skeptic's Elixir (Greater).description:
Duration 1 hour

Activate 1 Interact

This elixir sharpens your mind and allows you to see through lies, falsehoods, and magical trickery. You gain a +3 item bonus to Perception checks and Perception DCs to notice falsehoods, whether they're spoken lies or written deceit. You gain this same item bonus to Will saves.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.TsWUTODTVi487SEz]{Effect: Skeptic's Elixir (Greater)}

Skeptic's Elixir (Lesser).name: Skeptic's Elixir (Lesser)
Skeptic's Elixir (Lesser).description:
Duration 1 minute

Activate 1 Interact

This elixir sharpens your mind and allows you to see through lies, falsehoods, and magical trickery. You gain a +1 item bonus to Perception checks and Perception DCs to notice falsehoods, whether they're spoken lies or written deceit. You gain this same item bonus to Will saves.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.5Gof60StUppR2Xn9]{Effect: Skeptic's Elixir (Lesser)}

Skeptic's Elixir (Moderate).name: Skeptic's Elixir (Moderate)
Skeptic's Elixir (Moderate).description:
Duration 10 minute

Activate 1 Interact

This elixir sharpens your mind and allows you to see through lies, falsehoods, and magical trickery. You gain a +2 item bonus to Perception checks and Perception DCs to notice falsehoods, whether they're spoken lies or written deceit. You gain this same item bonus to Will saves.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.mG6S6zm6hxaF7Tla]{Effect: Skeptic's Elixir (Moderate)}

Skinsaw Mask.name: Skinsaw Mask
Skinsaw Mask.description:
A patchwork of humanoid flesh makes up this grotesque mask stitched together with black silk or wire. It is distinctive for its bulbous orange eye- crafted from a magical glass bauble-and wide row of teeth.

When worn, the mask amplifies your ability to sense fear in other creatures.

You automatically know the value of the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition of any @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.1wQY3JYyhMYeeV2G]{Observed} creature, and you gain a +1 item bonus to Perception checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} frightened creatures. Whenever you deal precision damage to a frightened creature, you deal 1 additional precision damage.

If you are not evil, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} while wearing theSkinsaw mask.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Perception checks to Seek frightened creatures

Skinstitch Salve.name: Skinstitch Salve
Skinstitch Salve.description:
This sticky salve stubbornly holds wounds closed and encourages swift natural healing. You can activate the salve in either of the following ways.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.MHLuKy4nQO2Z4Am1]{Administer First Aid} without requiring @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.s1vB3HdXjMigYAnY]{Healer's Tools}. You either gain a +2 item bonus to the Medicine check, or you can use the skinstitch salve's Medicine modifier of [[/r 1d20+13]] instead of your own.

Activate F Interact

Trigger You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds} or use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{Battle Medicine}

Effect You gain a +2 item bonus to the triggering Medicine check. If you roll a success on the Medicine check, you get a critical success instead.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.zlSNbMDIlTOpcO8R]{Effect: Skinstitch Salve}

Skittering Mask.name: Skittering Mask
Skittering Mask.description:
This carved wooden full-head mask sports several holes along each side of the face. The first time each day that you begin your turn unconscious and within 25 feet of an enemy, metallic insect legs emerge from the holes in the mask and Step 5 feet away from the nearest enemy, dragging your body along with the mask.

If more than one enemy is equidistant, the mask Steps away from one of them at random. The mask possesses no special senses and does not react to @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} enemies, nor can it distinguish that a creature not acting openly hostile is an enemy.

Skittering Mask (Greater).name: Skittering Mask (Greater)
Skittering Mask (Greater).description:
This carved wooden full-head mask sports several holes along each side of the face. The first time each day that you begin your turn unconscious and within 25 feet of an enemy, metallic insect legs emerge from the holes in the mask and Step 15 feet away from the nearest enemy, dragging your body along with the mask. For 1 minute, each time you begin your turn unconscious and within 25 feet of an enemy, the mask Steps 15 feet away from the nearest enemy again. An ally can signal the mask with a single action, which has the auditory and concentrate traits. If the mask hears the signal, it attempts to move you towards that ally when it Steps away from the nearest enemy.

If more than one enemy is equidistant, the mask Steps away from one of them at random. The mask possesses no special senses and does not react to @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} enemies, nor can it distinguish that a creature not acting openly hostile is an enemy.

Sky Hammer.name: 天空之锤 Sky Hammer
Sky Hammer.description:
这柄+3上等强击 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.XszNvxnymWYRaoTp]{炽焰 Flaming} @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.NVst7e69agGG9Qwd]{电击 Shock} 山铜战锤的硬头部如同闪耀的彗星一般。

启动 R 命令

触发 你用天空之锤的攻击造成重击成功；

效果 制造出6环奥术 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{火球术 Fireball}的效果，以天空之锤为中心。法术DC为45。你免疫该火球术的效果，但你的盟友不会。

制造需求 提供一次6环火球术的施法，原材料中必须包含12375gp的山铜。

Sky Serpent Bolt.name: Sky Serpent Bolt
Sky Serpent Bolt.description:
Activate 1 or 2 Interact

This azure bolt is carved in the shape of an undulating snake, its bared fangs framing the point of its head. When an activated sky serpent bolt successfully hits a target, the bolt takes the form of a snake made of pure lightning, dealing [[/r {2d12}[electricity]]]{2d12 electricity damage} to all creatures in a @Template[type:line|distance:30] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:19|basic:true] save) starting from the target. If you spent 2 actions to activate the sky serpent bolt, then the line is 60 feet long, and at a single point in the line, you can change the remainder of the line's path by up to a 90-degree angle.

Sky-Piercing Bow.name: Sky-Piercing Bow
Sky-Piercing Bow.description:
This shortbow is made from horn, wood, and sinew laminated together to increase the power of its pull and the force of its projectile. Its compact size and power make it a favorite of mounted archers. Any time an ability is specifically restricted to a shortbow, it also applies to composite shortbows unless otherwise stated.

Large turquoise gems stud the outer edge of this sturdy +3 greater striking ghost touch composite shortbow. Arrows shot from the bow are unimpaired by wind and air effects.

Activate 2 Interact (conjuration, teleportation)

Frequency once per day

Effect You shoot an arrow at an open space on a surface within 500 feet and momentarily vanish into a wind that carries the arrow. You teleport to that location.

Activate 2 command, Interact (electricity)

Frequency once per hour

Effect You shoot an arrow at the sky and it tears an extraplanar rift that resembles a storm cloud in a @Template[type:burst|distance:30] centered on a point within 200 feet. A torrent of rain pours down from the rift for 1 minute or until you Dismiss the effect. The area within the torrent becomes difficult terrain for all movement (including Flying). As an Interact action, you can fire an arrow into the rift to cause a bolt of lightning to strike a creature in the area. The creature takes [[/r {5d12}[electricity]]]{5d12 Electricity Damage} and must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:41|basic:true|name:Sky Piercing Bow|traits:damage-dealing,electricity|showDC:owner] save.

Activate 10 minutes (command, envision, Interact)

Frequency once per week

Effect You fire a volley of arrows into the sky. You create the effects of a successful @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XkDCzMIyc0YOjw05]{Control Weather} ritual.

Skyrider Sword.name: Skyrider Sword
Skyrider Sword.description:
This +2 greater striking shock greatsword has a broad, flat blade that can support the weight of a Medium-sized or smaller wielder. Magic allows the weapon to soar through the air, carrying its wielder along with it.

Activate 1 command

Frequency once per day

Requirements You're holding the sword in at least one hand

Effect You leap upon your sword as it soars through the air for up to 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed of 25 feet or your land Speed, whichever is slower, but you can't Strike with your weapon except via the weapon's other activation (see below). You can Dismiss the activation, and it ends automatically if you cease holding the weapon with at least one hand.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.Nbgf8zvHimdQqIu6]{Effect: Skyrider Sword}

Activate 2 Interact

Requirements You are riding on your weapon

Effect You ride your weapon into a foe, attacking it as you fly past. You Fly, making a melee Strike with the weapon once at any point during your movement.

Skyrider Sword (Greater).name: Skyrider Sword (Greater)
Skyrider Sword (Greater).description:
This +3 greater striking greater shock greatsword has a broad, flat blade that can support the weight of a Medium-sized or smaller wielder. Magic allows the weapon to soar through the air, carrying its wielder along with it.

Activate 1 command

Requirements You're holding the sword in at least one hand

Effect You leap upon your sword as it soars through the air. You gain a fly Speed of 25 feet or your land Speed, whichever is slower, but you can't Strike with your weapon except via the weapon's other activation (see below). You can Dismiss the activation, and it ends automatically if you cease holding the weapon with at least one hand.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.vOgD9wfStLX1utte]{Effect: Skyrider Sword (Greater)}

Activate 2 Interact

Requirements You are riding on your weapon

Effect You ride your weapon into a foe, attacking it as you fly past. You Fly, making a melee Strike with the weapon once at any point during your movement.

Slates of Distant Letters.name: Slates of Distant Letters
Slates of Distant Letters.description:
This matched pair of slates, roughly one handspan wide and tall, have identical ornate frames. Slates are crafted in pairs, and each works with only the other of its pair. If one slate of a pair is ever broken, the other shatters into non-magical shards. The listed price is for a pair of slates.

Activate 2 Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect You use a piece of chalk to write up to 25 words on a slate. As you write, the writing also appears on the other slate in its matched pair, no matter how far away it is, as long as it is on the same plane. Wiping one slate clean erases the writing from both slates. Each slate can be activated once per hour.

Sleep Arrow.name: 睡眠箭 Sleep Arrow
Sleep Arrow.description:
启动 A 交互

睡眠箭常常有着深蓝色或黑色的箭杆，而且箭羽格外地蓬松柔软。一支启动的睡眠箭不会造成任何伤害，但被击中的活物需要承受一个 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.o4lRVTwSxnOOn5vl]{睡眠术 Sleep} 的效果（DC 17）。

制作条件： 提供一次睡眠术Sleep施法。

Sleeves of Storage.name: Sleeves of Storage
Sleeves of Storage.description:
This loose robe has wide, voluminous sleeves that each contain an extradimensional space. These spaces each function as a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.jaEEvuQ32GjAa8jy]{Bag of Holding} that can hold up to 5 Bulk of items (for a total of 10 Bulk), though no individual item can be of more than 1 Bulk; the sleeves grow slightly heavy as you reach maximum capacity. You can add or remove an item from a sleeve with a single hand free as an Interact action.

If a sleeve is completely empty, you can place your own familiar into that extradimensional space. It can survive comfortably in your sleeve for up to 1 hour, after which it begins to suffocate. While in your sleeve, it can't be affected or targeted by any effects, but you don't benefit from any master abilities. A familiar can exit the sleeve of its own volition with a single action that has the manipulate and move traits. You can't place any other creature into your sleeves, nor can you place your familiar in a sleeve if it's larger than Tiny. If your familiar is in your sleeve, you can't place any items in the sleeve.

Sleeves of Storage (Greater).name: Sleeves of Storage (Greater)
Sleeves of Storage (Greater).description:
This loose robe has wide, voluminous sleeves that each contain an extradimensional space. These spaces each function as a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.jaEEvuQ32GjAa8jy]{Bag of Holding} that can hold up to 20 Bulk of items (for a total of 40 Bulk), though no individual item can be of more than 1 Bulk; the sleeves grow slightly heavy as you reach maximum capacity. You can add or remove an item from a sleeve with a single hand free as an Interact action.

If a sleeve is completely empty, you can place your own familiar into that extradimensional space. It can survive comfortably in your sleeve for up to 4 hours, after which it begins to suffocate. While in your sleeve, it can't be affected or targeted by any effects, but you don't benefit from any master abilities. A familiar can exit the sleeve of its own volition with a single action that has the manipulate and move traits. You can't place any other creature into your sleeves, nor can you place your familiar in a sleeve if it's larger than Tiny. If your familiar is in your sleeve, you can't place any items in the sleeve.

Slick.name: 滑溜 Slick
Slick.description: 该性能让护甲变得更滑溜，如同复盖了一层油膜一样。你在逃脱（Escape）和挤压（Squeeze）的特技检定上获得+1物品加值。

Slick (Greater).name: 高等滑溜 Slick (Greater)
Slick (Greater).description: 该性能让护甲变得更滑溜，如同复盖了一层油膜一样。你在逃脱（Escape）和挤压（Squeeze）的特技检定上获得+2物品加值。

Slick (Major).name: 上等滑溜 Slick (Major)
Slick (Major).description: 该性能让护甲变得更滑溜，如同复盖了一层油膜一样。你在逃脱（Escape）和挤压（Squeeze）的特技检定上获得+3物品加值。

Slide Pistol.name: Slide Pistol
Slide Pistol.description: Also known as a harmonica gun, this weapon is essentially a stock, trigger, and firing mechanism attached to a sliding brace of barrels that can each hold a round of ammunition.

Slime Whip.name: Slime Whip
Slime Whip.description:
This thick, greasy +1 striking shifting whip is made from a slimy pseudopod. You don't take the usual -2 circumstance penalty to your attack rolls when using the slime whip to make a lethal attack. The whip's form can be changed just like any weapon with the shifting rune, but it reverts to its original form as soon as it isn't wielded. When in its whip form, you can use the following action.

Activate 1 command, Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect For 1 round, the slime whip deals acid damage rather than slashing damage. If the attack deals persistent damage, the persistent damage is also acid damage instead of its usual type.

Sling.name: 投石索 Sling
Sling.description: 仅仅是一块皮革附着在一根带子上，投石索可以在远程用来投掷光滑的石头或者投石索弹丸。

Sling Bullets.name: 投石索弹丸 Sling Bullets
Sling Bullets.description: 这些小金属球，通常是铁球或铅球，设计作为投石索的弹药。

Slippers of Spider Climbing.name: 蛛行便鞋 Slippers of Spider Climbing
Slippers of Spider Climbing.description:
这双柔软的便鞋是由精细的灰丝制成的。如果便鞋被其拥有者放在一边，过一段时间后很有可能吸引蜘蛛在里面筑巢。

启动 A 命令

频率 每小时一次

效果 细小的，如毛发一样的卷须从鞋底冒出来，让你可以在陡峭的平面上行走；你甚至也可以在天花板上倒立行走。

你获得20尺攀爬速度Speed，持续1分钟，而且你不需要用你的手来攀爬Climb。然而这双便鞋需要良好的受力点才能支撑你在墙面上行走，因此在油腻或结冰的墙面上无法生效。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.W3BCLbX6j1IqL0uB]{效果：蛛行便鞋}

Slippery Ribbon.name: Slippery Ribbon
Slippery Ribbon.description:
Usage affixed to armor

Activation F envision

Trigger You succeed at an Acrobatics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through}, but you don't have enough Speed to move all the way through the enemy's space

Requirements You are an expert in Acrobatics.

This ribbon is constantly greasy to the touch and stains the armor it's affixed to. When you activate the slippery ribbon, your Speed increases by an amount necessary for you to move all the way through the enemy's space.

Sloughing Toxin.name: Sloughing Toxin
Sloughing Toxin.description:
Activate 2 Interact

This complex toxin makes the muscles beneath a creature's skin loose and malleable, which fleshwarpers find useful in their work. Rough or jerky movements the victim performs concentrate the toxin in subdermal muscles and eventually cause skin and muscle to slough away.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25]

Onset 1 round

Maximum Duration 1 hour

Stage 1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 poison damage} for each action with the attack or move trait the victim uses (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 poison damage} and [[/r {1d6}[slashing]]]{1d6 slashing damage} for each action with the attack, manipulate, or move trait the victim uses (1 round)

Stage 3 as Stage 2, but [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 poison damage} and [[/r {2d6}[slashing]]]{2d6 slashing damage}, and forced movement also causes damage (1 hour)

Slumber Wine.name: 沉眠佳酿 Slumber Wine
Slumber Wine.description:
沉眠佳酿或许会在阴谋游戏中发挥最大的效用，在那里，一次缺席远比一场袭击更具毁灭性。 因为沉眠佳酿而失去意识（unconscious）的角色无法在这种毒素的持续时间内被任何手段唤醒，以这种方式失去意识的角色不需要进食或饮水，并呈现出新近死亡的状态，如果检查者在一个DC40的医疗（Medicine）检定上取得成功就可以发现这名角色并未死亡。

启动 A 交互 (摄入)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:32]

潜伏期 1 小时

最大持续时间 7 天

阶段 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious} (1 天)

阶段 2 失去意识unconscious (2 天)

阶段 3 失去意识unconscious (3 天)

Small cold iron cauldron with onyx.name: Small cold iron cauldron with onyx

Smoke Fan.name: Smoke Fan
Smoke Fan.description:
Activate a Interact

When you Activate a smoke fan, it creates a cloud of colored smoke. The creator chooses the smoke's color when creating the smoke fan. Creatures within the smoke's area are concealed, and all other creatures are concealed to them. The smoke lasts for 1 minute or until dissipated by a strong wind.

The smoke fills a @Template[type:burst|distance:5]{5-foot radius}.

Smoke Fan (Greater).name: Smoke Fan (Greater)
Smoke Fan (Greater).description:
Activate a Interact

When you Activate a smoke fan, it creates a cloud of colored smoke. The creator chooses the smoke's color when creating the smoke fan. Creatures within the smoke's area are concealed, and all other creatures are concealed to them. The smoke lasts for 1 minute or until dissipated by a strong wind.

The smoke's radius is @Template[type:burst|distance:20]{20-foot radius}, and the creator can choose for the smoke to be a mixture of colors.

Smoked Goggles.name: Smoked Goggles
Smoked Goggles.description:
These goggles use lenses made out of smoked glass to protect against creatures with gaze attacks. While wearing smoked goggles, you're always considered to be @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UWdRX1VelipCzrCg]{Averting Your Gaze}, but all creatures have @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealment} from you.

The fact that the goggles conceal creatures is part of what grants the wearer the item's benefits. If you have a way to negate the concealment from the smoked goggles, you no longer gain the benefit, either.

Smokestick (Greater).name: 高等发烟棒 Smokestick (Greater)
Smokestick (Greater).description:
启动 A 交互 Interact

快速地扭动这个物品，你能立即创造出一片不透明的厚重烟幕，它以你所在空间的一角为源点爆发。所有身处这块区域内的生物都视作隐蔽（concealed），并且所有其他生物对他们来说也视作隐蔽。这团烟幕持续1分钟或直到一阵强风将其吹散。

烟幕的爆发半径为20尺。

Smokestick (Lesser).name: 次等发烟棒 Smokestick (Lesser)
Smokestick (Lesser).description:
启动 A 交互 Interact

快速地扭动这个物品，你能立即创造出一片不透明的厚重烟幕，它以你所在空间的一角为源点爆发。所有身处这块区域内的生物都视作隐蔽（concealed），并且所有其他生物对他们来说也视作隐蔽。这团烟幕持续1分钟或直到一阵强风将其吹散。

烟幕的爆发半径为5尺。

Smoking Sword.name: Smoking Sword
Smoking Sword.description:
Smoke constantly belches from this +1 magic longsword. Any hit with this sword deals 1 extra fire damage. You can use a special action while holding the sword to command the blade's edges to light on fire.

Stoke Flames A (concentrate)

Until the end of your turn, the blade deals 1d6 extra fire damage instead of just 1. After you use this action, you can't use it again for 10 minutes.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 fire damage, and ability to activate Stoke Flames

Snagging.name: Snagging
Snagging.description: This animated item attempts to catch you when you fall. You can attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]{Grab an Edge}, even if your hands are tied behind your back or otherwise @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}, so long as there's a solid edge within 10 feet. If you roll a success, you can Grab the Edge even if you don't have a hand free.

Snagging Hook Snare.name: Snagging Hook Snare
Snagging Hook Snare.description:
This snare snags a creature with its wicked metal hooks. The first creature to enter the square takes [[/r {5d8}[piercing]]]{5d8 piercing damage} and [[/r {5d8}[slashing]]]{5d8 slashing damage}, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:27|basic:true] save.

On a critical failure, the hooks piercing its flesh make the creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it successfully @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes} (DC 27).

Snake Oil.name: 蛇油 Snake Oil
Snake Oil.description:
启动 A 交互 Interact

你能够将蛇油涂抹在伤口或苦难（affliction）与疾病造成的其他外部症状上（例如疾病产生的溃疡或是毒素产生的色块）。在接下来一个小时，症状会消失，受伤或承受苦难的生物也不会感觉到伤口和苦难的存在，但仍旧承受这些效果的影响。一名成功通过DC17的察觉检定的生物能够揭露这种诡计，但只有在它使用搜寻（Seek）动作来专门检查蛇油的效果时才有效。

Snapleaf.name: Snapleaf
Snapleaf.description:
Activate R Interact

Trigger You begin to fall

This small, crystalline carving takes the shape of a tree leaf and attaches to armor or clothing with a simple strap.

When you activate the snapleaf, you gain the benefits of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{Feather Fall} and a 2nd-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility} spell for 1 minute or until you stop falling, whichever comes first.

Snare Kit.name: 陷阱工具包 Snare Kit
Snare Kit.description: 该工具包包含用于创建陷阱的工具和材料。陷阱工具包允许你使用手艺技能制作陷阱。

Snare Kit (Specialist).name: 陷阱工具包(专家) Snare Kit (Specialist)
Snare Kit (Specialist).description:
该工具包包含用于创建陷阱的工具和材料。陷阱工具包允许你使用手艺技能制作陷阱。专家级陷阱工具包为你提供+1物品加值。

自动生效:

  • 制作陷阱时的手艺检定+1物品加值

Sneaky Key.name: 鬼祟钥匙 Sneaky Key
Sneaky Key.description:
启动 A 交互

需求 你在贼活Thievery中达到专家

这把银色骷髅钥匙可以被贴在盔甲或袖子上。你可以转动这把钥匙来启动它，之后1分钟内无论何时你进行的开锁Pick a Lock检定结果是大失败，你都能将其改为失败。

Sneezing Powder.name: Sneezing Powder
Sneezing Powder.description: You can toss sneezing powder at an adjacent creature as an Interact action. The target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:15] save to avoid sneezing. On a failed save, the creature sneezes uncontrollably, becoming @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round. On a critical failure, the creature is instead slowed 1 for 3 rounds.

Sniper's Bead.name: Sniper's Bead
Sniper's Bead.description:
Activate f envision

Trigger You attempt a ranged Strike with the affixed weapon before rolling.

Requirements You're a master with the affixed weapon.

This plain wooden bead dangles from a string attached to the stock of the affixed weapon. When you activate the bead, its magic greatly lessens the effect of distance on your triggering attack.

You take no range increment penalty on your attack, as long as the attack is against a target within the affixed weapon's first two range increments.

Sniper's Bead (Greater).name: Sniper's Bead (Greater)
Sniper's Bead (Greater).description:
Activate f envision

Trigger You attempt a ranged Strike with the affixed weapon before rolling.

Requirements You're a master with the affixed weapon.

This plain wooden bead dangles from a string attached to the stock of the affixed weapon. When you activate the bead, its magic greatly lessens the effect of distance on your triggering attack.

You take no range increment penalty on your attack, as long as the attack is against a target within the affixed weapon's first four range increments.

Sniper's Bead (Major).name: Sniper's Bead (Major)
Sniper's Bead (Major).description:
Activate f envision

Trigger You attempt a ranged Strike with the affixed weapon before rolling.

Requirements You're a master with the affixed weapon.

This plain wooden bead dangles from a string attached to the stock of the affixed weapon. When you activate the bead, its magic greatly lessens the effect of distance on your triggering attack.

You take no range increment penalty on your attack, even if the target is all the way out to the weapon's sixth range increment. As normal, you still can't hit a target more than six range increments away.

Snowshoes.name: Snowshoes
Snowshoes.description:
These specialized pieces of footwear are designed to distribute the wearer's weight over a larger area to prevent them from sinking while walking on snow. They are typically made with a wood frame and rawhide lacings that are tied over the wearer's other footwear.

While wearing snowshoes, you ignore the effects of non-magical difficult terrain caused by snow (reducing greater difficult terrain from snow to ordinary difficult terrain).

You take a -10-foot item penalty to your Speed if wearing snowshoes while walking on any surface other than snow.

Snowshoes of the Long Trek.name: Snowshoes of the Long Trek
Snowshoes of the Long Trek.description:
These magically enhanced snowshoes are practically a necessity when traversing the gelid tundra and snow-drenched taiga of the Saga Lands.

The snowshoes of the long trek allow their wearer to walk across ice and snow with the same surety as dry earth, ignoring the uneven ground and difficult terrain caused by ice and the difficult terrain caused by snow (reducing greater difficult terrain from ice or snow to ordinary difficult terrain).

In addition, a character wearing snowshoes of the long trek gains a +5-foot status bonus to their Speed while moving across snow or ice and is never at risk of breaking through naturally-occurring loose or soft snow.

Soaring.name: Soaring
Soaring.description:
A set of soaring armor helps you fly faster and protects you and nearby allies from falling. While wearing soaring armor, you gain a +10-foot item bonus to your fly Speed, if you have one. As normal, if your fly Speed is based on your land Speed and you already have an item bonus to your land Speed, these bonuses aren't cumulative.

Activate R command

Trigger You or a creature within 60 feet of you is falling

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{Feather Fall} on the triggering creature.

Soft-Landing.name: Soft-Landing
Soft-Landing.description:
This item creates a small cushion of air that catches you when you fall. You treat falls as 10 feet shorter.

Activate r envision

Frequency once per day

Trigger You begin to fall

Effect You gain the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{Feather Fall} for 1 minute or until you stop falling, whichever comes first.

Sonic Tuning Mace.name: Sonic Tuning Mace
Sonic Tuning Mace.description:
This +1 striking thundering light mace has twin tips, perfectly spaced to resonate when striking foes.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You tap the tuning mace against a nearby surface to cast 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzLkNU3AAqOSKFPR]{Sound Burst} with a DC of 25.

Sonic Tuning Mace (Greater).name: Sonic Tuning Mace (Greater)
Sonic Tuning Mace (Greater).description:
This +2 greater striking thundering light mace has twin tips, perfectly spaced to resonate when striking foes.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You tap the tuning mace against a nearby surface to cast 6th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzLkNU3AAqOSKFPR]{Sound Burst} with a DC of 30.

Soothing Scents.name: Soothing Scents
Soothing Scents.description:
Activate Cast a Spell (add 1 action)

Performers popularized these bundles of aromatic herbs to calm the mind and ward off misfortune before a big show, though soldier bards have found them especially useful for clearing fear during particularly tumultuous battles. Adding this catalyst to a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.szIyEsvihc5e1w8n]{Soothe} spell also causes the spell to reduce the target's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition value by 1.

South Wind's Scorch Song.name: South Wind's Scorch Song
South Wind's Scorch Song.description:
This +1 striking flaming scimitar is always warm to the touch, nearly unbearably so. Lines of crackling flame radiate from carnelians affixed to its curved and blackened blade, and its pommel ends in a brilliant tassel of phoenix feathers. While you have a status bonus to at least one of your Speeds, your Strikes with this scimitar that deal fire damage gain a +2 status bonus to their fire damage. The status bonus increases to +3 if the weapon has a greater striking rune and +4 for major striking.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.hy6LAC13QIJNDYXm]{Equipment Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Damage)}

Activate f command (evocation, fire, magical)

Trigger Your spell deals fire damage to a creature

Effect You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed until the end of your next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.eQqi3tWSHwV4SHqK]{Equipment Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Speed Boost)}

Sovereign Glue.name: Sovereign Glue
Sovereign Glue.description:
Activate 1 minute (Interact)

This peculiar amber glue bonds two surfaces together almost inseparably. A single flask covers an area up to 1 square foot and must be used all at once to form a single bond between two surfaces. If the activation is interrupted, the bond fails and the glue is wasted. Once two surfaces are joined with sovereign glue, they can be separated only with a successful DC 50 Athletics check. The adhered objects tend to break before the glue does unless they're particularly durable, though a creature determined to separate the objects can break off the parts connected by the sovereign glue and later @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.bT3skovyLUtP22ME]{Repair} the objects.

Sovereign glue can affect creatures only if they are willing, and its bond can be harmlessly broken by carefully exfoliating the outermost layer of skin or waiting a short while for the skin to shed.

Sovereign Steel Chunk.name: Sovereign Steel Chunk
Sovereign Steel Chunk.description:
Created by Black Sovereign Kevoth-Kul, this unique alloy of cold iron and the skymetal noqual can provide protection from magical assault. The process of cold-forging the two materials together is quite complicated and precise. Characters in search of sovereign steel weapons and armor will almost assuredly have to travel to Starfall to procure gear made from this rare alloy. While some believe it possible to craft shields of sovereign steel as well, in one of his fits, Kevoth-Kul yelled that he had no use for them and banned anyone from making such a thing. So far, his smiths have been too afraid to confirm whether or not it was a joke. All sovereign steel items (including weapon and armor below) have a +4 circumstance bonus on saves against magic that the item makes, and grant their bonus to saves the owner makes specifically to protect the item from magic (such as against the rusting grasp spell).

Sovereign Steel Ingot.name: Sovereign Steel Ingot
Sovereign Steel Ingot.description:
Created by Black Sovereign Kevoth-Kul, this unique alloy of cold iron and the skymetal noqual can provide protection from magical assault. The process of cold-forging the two materials together is quite complicated and precise. Characters in search of sovereign steel weapons and armor will almost assuredly have to travel to Starfall to procure gear made from this rare alloy. While some believe it possible to craft shields of sovereign steel as well, in one of his fits, Kevoth-Kul yelled that he had no use for them and banned anyone from making such a thing. So far, his smiths have been too afraid to confirm whether or not it was a joke. All sovereign steel items (including weapon and armor below) have a +4 circumstance bonus on saves against magic that the item makes, and grant their bonus to saves the owner makes specifically to protect the item from magic (such as against the rusting grasp spell).

Sovereign Steel Items

Spangled Rider's Suit.name: Spangled Rider's Suit
Spangled Rider's Suit.description:
This +1 resilient studded leather is adorned with colorful sequins that sparkle in even the faintest light.

While wearing the spangled rider's suit, you gain a +2 item bonus to Command an Animal you are riding.

Any animal you ride automatically knows the Drop Prone and Step basic actions, in addition to any other basic actions it knows (normally only Leap, Seek, Stand, Stride, and Strike).

Activate R (move)

Trigger You take damage while mounted or your mount Drops Prone

Effect You dismount, moving off your mount into a space adjacent to it.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to Command an Animal you are riding

Spare Wax Cylinder.name: Spare Wax Cylinder
Spare Wax Cylinder.description: A spare recording cylinder for the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.NLC3c1mudubNNekY]{Clockwork Recorder}.

Sparkblade.name: Sparkblade
Sparkblade.description:
Faint, delicate etchings of lightning trace across the blade of this +1 cold iron shortsword. Cold iron is made from particularly pure sources of iron and shaped with little to no heat, resulting in weapons deadly to demons and fey alike.

Activate A Interact

Once per day, you can spend 1 action to point the sparkblade at a foe within 30 feet of you and shoot an arc of lightning from the blade. This lightning can leap from your chosen foe to another creature you choose within 30 feet, dealing [[/r 2d4+4]] electricity damage to each creature (DC 19 basic Reflex save).

Spear.name: 矛 Spear
Spear.description: 长长的金属柄顶端有金属刺，矛可以作为近战武器单手使用或者用来投掷。

Spear Frog Poison.name: Spear Frog Poison
Spear Frog Poison.description:
A single spear frog yields enough toxin to Craft 1 dose of spear frog poison.

Activate D Interact (Injury)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:15]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r {1d4}[poison]]]{1d4 poison damage} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 poison damage} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (1 round)

Spear of the Destroyer's Flame.name: Spear of the Destroyer's Flame
Spear of the Destroyer's Flame.description:
The tip of this +3 major striking greater flaming returning speed longspear is edged with several razor-sharp obsidian blades. The spear has the thrown 30 feet weapon trait, in addition to the normal weapon traits for a longspear.

While the Spear of the Destroyer's Flame is in your possession, you gain fire resistance 20. When you critically hit a creature with the spear, the creature's blood begins to boil, unleashing blasts of heat from the wound. The creature takes [[/r {2d8}[persistent,fire]]]{2d8} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent fire Damage}, in addition to the persistent fire damage from the greater flaming rune; all creatures adjacent to the creature when it takes the persistent fire damage take an equal amount of fire damage. Like the fire damage from the greater flaming rune, this fire damage ignores a creature's fire resistance, though it doesn't ignore fire immunity.

In addition to its deadliness as a weapon, the Spear of the Destroyer's Flame gives its wielder full control over the Army of Fire, though the orders of the Commander of Flame supersede the orders of anyone wielding the spear, as noted on page 17. While the spear is in your possession, you're aware of the location of the Army of Fire and the army's distance from you. In addition, you can give orders to the Army of Fire, and the army's members will understand and obey you, regardless of what language you speak. If you're within 1 mile of the Army of Fire, the army and its members gain a +10 circumstance bonus to their Speeds. Any members of the Army of Fire within 100 feet of you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} and can use the additional action to Step, Stride, or Strike. The army remains quickened for 1 minute after moving further than 100 feet from you.

The Army of Fire has unwavering loyalty to the Commander of Flame, an individual who has completed a special activation that ties their soul to the spear. As long as the Army of Fire can see and hear the Commander of Flame, the army will follow the Commander's orders. The Commander of Flame can sense the presence of the Army of Fire and issue orders, regardless of language, with the same effects as for someone in possession of the spear. The Commander of Flame still needs the spear in hand to muster the Army of Fire, however.

If the Commander of Flame doesn't hold the Spear of the Destroyer's Flame for 1 week, it returns to Cuetzmonquali's gut, instantly teleporting to the creature's location. If Cuetzmonquali is dead at this time, the spear also resurrects the creature, using the effects of a critical success on a 10th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kqhPt9344UkcGVYO]{Resurrect} ritual.

Activate 1 minute (envision, Interact)

Frequency once per day

Effect You attempt to tie your soul to the spear. If the current Commander of Flame still lives, you must attempt either a Will save, Diplomacy check, Intimidation check, or Warfare Lore check. The DC of this check is equal to the current Commander's Will DC, Diplomacy DC, Intimidation DC, or Warfare Lore DC, whichever is highest. On a success, you become the Commander of Flame. On a failure, the current Commander knows your name and appearance and is aware of your exact location for 24 hours. Activate 1 hour (envision, Interact)

Frequency once per week

Effect You use the spear's power to muster the Army of Fire. You can choose to either call the Army of Fire to your location or move yourself to the army's location. When calling the army, you select an area you can see within 500 feet. The army is instantly teleported to the location you select, spreading out as necessary to arrive safely. When moving yourself, you instantly teleport yourself to a location within 500 feet of the army. The army is composed of souls given form as burning humanoids, elementals, spirits, and undead.

Destruction If the entire Army of Fire is destroyed and the Commander of Flame is slain with the Spear of the Destroyer's Flame, the spear shatters into a massive explosion of flame, dealing [[/r {20d10}[fire]]]{20d10 fire damage} in a @Template[type:burst|distance:30] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:43|basic:true|name:Spear of the Destroyer's Flame Destruction|traits:evocation,magical,fire] save). In addition, the Commander's soul burns away to nothing, destroying the Commander forever and releasing the bound souls of the Army of Fire to the River of Souls.

Specialist's Ring.name: Specialist's Ring
Specialist's Ring.description:
Each specialist's ring is dedicated to a single school of magic, and the ring is covered in symbols and glyphs related to that school according to the creator's arcane studies. A specialist's ring has the trait corresponding to its school of magic. You gain a +2 item bonus to Arcana checks, and a +1 circumstance bonus to recognize magical effects and items of the specific school of magic.

Activate f envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain 1 Focus Point, which you can use only to cast a wizard school spell of the corresponding school. If not used by the end of your turn, this Focus Point is lost.

Specialist's Ring (Abjuration).name: Specialist's Ring (Abjuration)
Specialist's Ring (Abjuration).description:
This specialist's ring is dedicated to the abjuration school of magic, and the ring is covered in symbols and glyphs related to the abjuration school according to the creator's arcane studies. You gain a +2 item bonus to Arcana checks, and a +1 circumstance bonus to recognize magical effects and items of the abjuration school of magic.

Activate f envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain 1 Focus Point, which you can use only to cast a wizard school spell of the abjuration school. If not used by the end of your turn, this Focus Point is lost.

Specialist's Ring (Conjuration).name: Specialist's Ring (Conjuration)
Specialist's Ring (Conjuration).description:
This specialist's ring is dedicated to the conjuration school of magic, and the ring is covered in symbols and glyphs related to the conjuration school according to the creator's arcane studies. You gain a +2 item bonus to Arcana checks, and a +1 circumstance bonus to recognize magical effects and items of the conjuration school of magic.

Activate f envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain 1 Focus Point, which you can use only to cast a wizard school spell of the conjuration school. If not used by the end of your turn, this Focus Point is lost.

Specialist's Ring (Divination).name: Specialist's Ring (Divination)
Specialist's Ring (Divination).description:
This specialist's ring is dedicated to the divination school of magic, and the ring is covered in symbols and glyphs related to the divination school according to the creator's arcane studies. You gain a +2 item bonus to Arcana checks, and a +1 circumstance bonus to recognize magical effects and items of the divination school of magic.

Activate f envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain 1 Focus Point, which you can use only to cast a wizard school spell of the divination school. If not used by the end of your turn, this Focus Point is lost.

Specialist's Ring (Enchantment).name: Specialist's Ring (Enchantment)
Specialist's Ring (Enchantment).description:
This specialist's ring is dedicated to the enchantment school of magic, and the ring is covered in symbols and glyphs related to the enchantment school according to the creator's arcane studies. You gain a +2 item bonus to Arcana checks, and a +1 circumstance bonus to recognize magical effects and items of the enchantment school of magic.

Activate f envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain 1 Focus Point, which you can use only to cast a wizard school spell of the enchantment school. If not used by the end of your turn, this Focus Point is lost.

Specialist's Ring (Evocation).name: Specialist's Ring (Evocation)
Specialist's Ring (Evocation).description:
This specialist's ring is dedicated to the evocation school of magic, and the ring is covered in symbols and glyphs related to the evocation school according to the creator's arcane studies. You gain a +2 item bonus to Arcana checks, and a +1 circumstance bonus to recognize magical effects and items of the evocation school of magic.

Activate f envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain 1 Focus Point, which you can use only to cast a wizard school spell of the evocation school. If not used by the end of your turn, this Focus Point is lost.

Specialist's Ring (Illusion).name: Specialist's Ring (Illusion)
Specialist's Ring (Illusion).description:
This specialist's ring is dedicated to the illusion school of magic, and the ring is covered in symbols and glyphs related to the illusion school according to the creator's arcane studies. You gain a +2 item bonus to Arcana checks, and a +1 circumstance bonus to recognize magical effects and items of the illusion school of magic.

Activate f envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain 1 Focus Point, which you can use only to cast a wizard school spell of the illusion school. If not used by the end of your turn, this Focus Point is lost.

Specialist's Ring (Necromancy).name: Specialist's Ring (Necromancy)
Specialist's Ring (Necromancy).description:
This specialist's ring is dedicated to the necromancy school of magic, and the ring is covered in symbols and glyphs related to the necromancy school according to the creator's arcane studies. You gain a +2 item bonus to Arcana checks, and a +1 circumstance bonus to recognize magical effects and items of the necromancy school of magic.

Activate f envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain 1 Focus Point, which you can use only to cast a wizard school spell of the necromancy school. If not used by the end of your turn, this Focus Point is lost.

Specialist's Ring (Transmutation).name: Specialist's Ring (Transmutation)
Specialist's Ring (Transmutation).description:
This specialist's ring is dedicated to the transmutation school of magic, and the ring is covered in symbols and glyphs related to the transmutation school according to the creator's arcane studies. You gain a +2 item bonus to Arcana checks, and a +1 circumstance bonus to recognize magical effects and items of the transmutation school of magic.

Activate f envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain 1 Focus Point, which you can use only to cast a wizard school spell of the transmutation school. If not used by the end of your turn, this Focus Point is lost.

Spectacles of Understanding.name: Spectacles of Understanding
Spectacles of Understanding.description:
These folding, wood-framed spectacles hold flat discs of cut crystal as lenses and are held in place with thin cords that wrap around each ear, with another strap holding them around the neck while not in use. While you are wearing the spectacles, you gain a +1 item bonus to checks to Decipher Writing.

Activate A Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect Unfolding the spectacles onto the bridge of the nose, you gain the effects of 2nd-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vTQvfYu2llKQedmY]{Comprehend Language} for one hour except that it applies to all languages you see rather than a single language, and it does not apply to language you hear.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to checks to Decipher Writing

Spectacles of Understanding (Greater).name: Spectacles of Understanding (Greater)
Spectacles of Understanding (Greater).description:
These folding, wood-framed spectacles hold flat discs of cut crystal as lenses and are held in place with thin cords that wrap around each ear, with another strap holding them around the neck while not in use. While you are wearing the spectacles, you gain a +2 item bonus to checks to Decipher Writing.

Activate A Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect Unfolding the spectacles onto the bridge of the nose, you gain the effects of 2nd-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vTQvfYu2llKQedmY]{Comprehend Language} until you fold up the spectacles or the item is no longer invested by you, whichever comes first, except that it applies to all languages you see rather than a single language, and it does not apply to language you hear.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to checks to Decipher Writing

Spectral Nightshade.name: Spectral Nightshade
Spectral Nightshade.description:
Activate 1 Interact

Belladonna cultivated in planes hazardous to living visitors, such as the Shadow Plane or the Boneyard, grow with a strange, skeletal look to their branches. The leaves and berries of these extraplanar plants are partly incorporeal and significantly more toxic than belladonna grown on the Material Plane. When imbued with spirit-twisting magic, spectral nightshade quickly drains away the victim's vitality and makes colors painfully bright and bewildering. Spectral nightshade doesn't affect creatures that have no spirit; if a possessing spirit inhabits a body that takes poison damage from spectral nightshade, the possessor takes an equal amount of force damage, even if the possessor can't be affected directly by poisons.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:33]

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 6 minutes

Stage 1 [[/r {10d6}[poison]]]{10d6 poison damage} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled}(1 minute)

Stage 2 [[/r {13d6}[poison]]]{13d6 poison damage} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 minute)

Stage 3 [[/r {15d6}[poison]]]{15d6 poison damage}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused}, and drained 2 (1 minute)

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.PHVHBbdHeQRfjLmE]{Spirit Blast}.

Speed.name: 加速 Speed
Speed.description: 用加速武器进行的攻击极为迅速。当持握加速武器时，你获得迅捷quickened状态，但你只能用这个额外的动作使用该武器进行打击动作。

Spell Bastion.name: Spell Bastion
Spell Bastion.description:
A spell-bastion rune creates a reservoir of eldritch energy within the shield. A spellcaster can spend 1 minute to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} of 3rd level or lower into the shield. The spell must take 2 actions or fewer to cast and must be able to target a creature other than the caster. The spell has no immediate effect-it's instead stored for later. When you invest a spell-bastion shield, you immediately know the name and level of the stored spell. A spell-bastion shield found as treasure has a 50% chance of having a spell of the GM's choice stored in it.

Activate 1 envision

Requirements Your spell-bastion shield is storing a spell, and you have your shield raised

Effect You prepare to unleash the stored spell on any foe that hits you until your next turn.

Activate f command

Requirements You have a spell stored in your spell-bastion shield, and you've activated the shield since your last turn in preparation for unleashing the spell

Trigger You use the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction against a foe that the stored spell can target

Effect You unleash the stored spell, which uses the target of the triggering attack as the target of the spell. This empties the spell from the shield and allows a spell to be cast into it again.

Activate 1 command

Effect You harmlessly expend the stored spell. This frees the shield to have a new spell cast into it.

Spell-Eating Pitch.name: Spell-Eating Pitch
Spell-Eating Pitch.description:
Activate 2 Interact

This gummy resin contains sparkling motes of magical energy that dramatically impair your cognitive functions and dispel spells as you cast them. Spell energy manifests but then sputters out, as though drained away by the sparkling motes. While you're @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} by this poison, the DC of flat checks to avoid disruption from the stupefied condition when you Cast a Spell is 5 + twice the stupefied value, rather than 5 + the stupefied value.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:31]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r {5d6}[poison]]]{5d6 poison damage} and stupefied 1 (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r {6d6}[poison]]]{6d6 poison damage} and stupefied 3 (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r {7d6}[poison]]]{7d6 poison damage} and stupefied 4 (1 round)

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of 6th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic}.

Spell-Storing.name: 储法 Spell-Storing
Spell-Storing.description:
储法符文在武器上创造出一个奥术能量储存库。施法者能够花1分钟施放一个至多为3环的法术到武器上。该法术必须最多为2动作施放的法术且必须能指定非施法者的目标。该法术不会立刻生效——它被储存起来以待后用。当你持握触发武器时，你会立刻知晓储存其中的法术名字和环级。冒险宝藏中发现的触发武器有50%几率已储存一个GM选择的法术。

启动 A 命令

需求 在你本回合的上一个动作中，你用该武器命中且伤害了一名生物

效果 你释放出被储存的法术，将要求中的生物作为法术的目标。此举清空武器内储存的法术，使得可以储存另一个法术与其中。若法术需要法术攻击骰，用你使用该武器时的攻击骰来决定法术的成功度，若法术需要目标通过豁免，豁免DC为30。

启动 A 命令

效果 无害消耗掉储存的法术。这能清空武器使得可以储存另一个法术于其中。

Spellbook (Blank).name: 法术书 Spellbook (Blank)
Spellbook (Blank).description: 法术书包含学习和准备各种法术所必需的书面知识，这是法师的必需品（通常会免费获得一本）和寻求学习额外法术的其他施法者的有用奢侈品。每本法术书最多可以容纳100个法术。此处列出的是一本空白的法术书的价格。

Spellbook of Redundant Enchantment.name: Spellbook of Redundant Enchantment
Spellbook of Redundant Enchantment.description:
When opening the book, whispers can be heard on the wind, or laughter rings in the distance.

Activate f envision

Frequency once per day

Trigger You cast an enchantment spell prepared from this grimoire that has no effect because all targets critically succeeded on their saving throws

Effect You quickly divert the failed enchantment energy into yourself to retain your favored spell in place of another. You lose another spell you prepared of an equal or higher level to the triggering enchantment spell but retain the ability to cast the enchantment spell again.

Spellcutter.name: Spellcutter
Spellcutter.description:
The blade of this +2 greater striking adamantine longsword seems to absorb light from the air around it, giving the impression the wielder is standing in the shadow of a much larger creature.

While Spellcutter is a potent weapon for battling undead and constructs, an ancient restriction on the blade prevents it from harming living creatures; attacks against living beings deal no damage. This restriction doesn't apply to dhampirs or creatures with the @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.TTCw5NusiSSkJU1x]{Negative Healing} ability who are otherwise living; the magic of the blade can't distinguish between such beings and undead.

Activate R envision

Trigger You're targeted by a spell while wielding Spellcutter

Effect Spellcutter attempts to absorb the magic of the triggering spell, giving you a +4 status bonus to your AC and saves against the effect.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect Touching Spellcutter to any light source of 12th level or lower (including 6th-level spells with the light trait) instantly extinguishes the effect. If the source of the light is a large flame, such as a forest fire or bonfire, it only extinguishes the light source in a 5-foot radius burst from the point of contact.

Spellender.name: Spellender
Spellender.description:
This knife is a +1 striking returning dagger with a wide blade and thick wooden handle. A prayer for protection from evil magic is carved into the handle in tiny script, running around the handle in a spiral. The grooves of the carved prayer provide a good grip on the knife and make it easy to catch when it returns to your hand.

Activate r envision

Frequency once per day

Trigger You critically hit with the weapon

Effect The dagger casts a 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} targeting the most powerful spell effect affecting the creature you critically hit. The counteract check is +15.

Spellguard Blade.name: Spellguard Blade
Spellguard Blade.description:
The guard of this +1 striking main-gauche is inscribed with eldritch glyphs that guard against magic.

When you are benefiting from the +1 circumstance bonus to AC from this weapon's parry trait, you also apply that circumstance bonus to your saving throws against spells that target you.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.zqKzWGLODgIvtiKf]{Effect: Spellguard Blade}

Spellguard Shield.name: 护法盾 Spellguard Shield
Spellguard Shield.description: 这面盾牌上的奥术符印可以抵抗魔法。当你举起这面铁盾（硬度6，HP24，BT12）时，其给与AC的环境加值同样作为环境加值添加到你对抗法术的豁免骰上。

Spellstrike Ammunition (Type I).name: I型法袭弹药 Spellstrike Ammunition (Type I)
Spellstrike Ammunition (Type I).description:
神秘的图纹让这发弹药成为了储存魔法的容器。你通过对法袭弹药进行施法Cast a Spell来启动它。该法术的等级必须是弹药可以容纳的，法术也必须能以施法者以外的一个生物为目标。被启动的法袭弹药命中的生物会成为法术的目标。如果该生物不能成为该法术的目标，则法术丢失。

该弹药只能影响被命中的生物，即使法术正常情况下能够影响多个生物。如果法术需要一个法术攻击骰，使用发射该弹药的远程攻击骰结果来决定成功度。如果法术需要一个豁免骰，目标需要通过一个豁免，对抗你的法术DC。

该弹药能容纳的法术最高环级取决于其等级与价格。

启动 D 施法

最高法术环级 1环

Spellstrike Ammunition (Type II).name: II型法袭弹药 Spellstrike Ammunition (Type II)
Spellstrike Ammunition (Type II).description:
神秘的图纹让这发弹药成为了储存魔法的容器。你通过对法袭弹药进行施法Cast a Spell来启动它。该法术的等级必须是弹药可以容纳的，法术也必须能以施法者以外的一个生物为目标。被启动的法袭弹药命中的生物会成为法术的目标。如果该生物不能成为该法术的目标，则法术丢失。

该弹药只能影响被命中的生物，即使法术正常情况下能够影响多个生物。如果法术需要一个法术攻击骰，使用发射该弹药的远程攻击骰结果来决定成功度。如果法术需要一个豁免骰，目标需要通过一个豁免，对抗你的法术DC。

该弹药能容纳的法术最高环级取决于其等级与价格。

启动 D 施法

最高法术环级 2环

Spellstrike Ammunition (Type III).name: III型法袭弹药 Spellstrike Ammunition (Type III)
Spellstrike Ammunition (Type III).description:
神秘的图纹让这发弹药成为了储存魔法的容器。你通过对法袭弹药进行施法Cast a Spell来启动它。该法术的等级必须是弹药可以容纳的，法术也必须能以施法者以外的一个生物为目标。被启动的法袭弹药命中的生物会成为法术的目标。如果该生物不能成为该法术的目标，则法术丢失。

该弹药只能影响被命中的生物，即使法术正常情况下能够影响多个生物。如果法术需要一个法术攻击骰，使用发射该弹药的远程攻击骰结果来决定成功度。如果法术需要一个豁免骰，目标需要通过一个豁免，对抗你的法术DC。

该弹药能容纳的法术最高环级取决于其等级与价格。
