启动 D 施法

最高法术环级 8环

Sphere of Annihilation.name: Sphere of Annihilation
Sphere of Annihilation.description:
A sphere of annihilation is a floating black sphere that pulls any matter that comes into contact with it into a void, destroying it utterly. Anything or anyone destroyed by the sphere can be brought back only by a deity's direct intervention. The sphere can't be counteracted by dispel magic or similar effects.

The sphere stays entirely still until caused to move by a creature controlling it. Taking control of the sphere requires succeeding at an attempt to activate it. A talisman of the sphere makes it easier to control the sphere.

Activate A command

Requirements You are within 40 feet of the sphere

Effect You attempt a DC 30 Arcana or Occultism check to take control of the sphere. If someone else already controls the sphere, this check uses their Will DC if higher. If you succeed, you take control of the sphere. If you fail, the sphere moves 10 feet closer to you (or 20 feet on a critical failure). You keep control as long as you remain within 80 feet of the sphere and Sustain the Activation each round. When you Sustain the Activation, you must attempt a DC 30 Arcana or Occultism check. If you succeed, you direct the sphere to move up to 10 feet in a straight line (or up to 20 feet on a critical success). On a failure, you lose control of the sphere, and it moves 10 feet closer to you in a straight line (or 20 feet on a critical failure).

Destruction When a gate spell is cast such that its rift overlaps a sphere of annihilation, roll d%. On a result of 1-50, the sphere is destroyed; on a 51-85, the spell is disrupted; and on a 86-100, everything within an @Template[type:emanation|distance:180] of the sphere is pulled to another plane through a tear in the spatial fabric. If a rod of cancellation touches the sphere, both items explode, dealing 14d6 bludgeoning damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:35|basic:true] save) to everything in a @Template[type:burst|distance:60] from the point of their destruction.

Spider Chair.name: Spider Chair
Spider Chair.description:
This clockwork traveler's chair has spinnerets and spider legs that allow it to roll up walls, fire web lines to pull you to a location, and obstruct foes with webs. While using the chair, you gain a climb Speed equal to your Speed.

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency Once per minute

Effect The chair shoots a web line at a solid wall, floor, or ceiling up to 60 feet away and then pulls itself and you to that location.

Activate3 Interact

Frequency Once per hour

Effect You cause the chair to launch an enormous web to hinder your foes, with the effects of a 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9s5tqqXNzcoKamWx]{Web} spell.

Spider Gun.name: Spider Gun
Spider Gun.description:
A spider gun is a +1 striking weapon. It's a distinct type of martial firearm made from the fangs and spinneret of a Large spider. It deals [[/r {1d10}[poison]]]{1d10 poison damage} with a range increment of 30 feet and reload 1. On a critical hit, the venom clings to the target and they take @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Poison Damage} equal to [[/r {1d4+1+@item.data.data.runes.striking}[persistent,poison]]]{1d4 + the number of weapon damage dice}. A spider gun does not add critical specialization effects. The gun can be activated to fire webbing that hampers other creatures.

Activate 1 Interact (conjuration, magical)

Frequency once per round

Effect You fire a mass of webbing at a square within 30 feet. That square becomes covered in webbing for 1 minute. A square covered with the webbing from a spider gun can be cleared by a single attack or effect that deals at least 5 slashing damage} or 1 fire damage. A square has AC 5, and it automatically fails its saving throws. The first time each turn a creature in the webbing begins to use a move action or enters the webbing during a move action, it must attempt an @Check[type:athletics|dc:20|name:Spider Gun Athletics|traits:conjuration] check or @Check[type:reflex|dc:20|name:Spider Gun Reflex|traits:conjuration] save against DC 20. On a success, it moves normally through the webbing and clears away the webbing from any squares it enters this turn. On a failure, it treats squares of webbing as difficult terrain this turn, and on a critical failure, it's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 round or until it @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes} (DC 20) or destroys the webbing.

Craft Requirements The initial raw materials for the spider gun must include the fangs and spinneret of a giant spider or other Large spider.

Spider Gun (Greater).name: Spider Gun (Greater)
Spider Gun (Greater).description:
A greater spider gun is a +1 striking weapon. It's a distinct type of martial firearm made from the fangs and spinneret of a Large spider. It deals [[/r {1d10}[poison]]]{1d10 poison damage} with a range increment of 30 feet and reload 1. On a critical hit, the venom clings to the target and they take @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Poison Damage} equal to [[/r {1d4+1+@item.data.data.runes.striking}[persistent,poison]]]{1d4 + the number of weapon damage dice}. A spider gun does not add critical specialization effects. The gun can be activated to fire webbing that hampers other creatures.

Activate 1 Interact (conjuration, magical)

Frequency once per round

Effect You fire a mass of webbing at a square within 30 feet. That square becomes covered in webbing for 1 minute. A square covered with the webbing from a spider gun can be cleared by a single attack or effect that deals at least 15 slashing damage or 5 fire damage. A square has AC 5, and it automatically fails its saving throws. The first time each turn a creature in the webbing begins to use a move action or enters the webbing during a move action, it must attempt an @Check[type:athletics|dc:25|name:Spider Gun Athletics|traits:conjuration] check or @Check[type:reflex|dc:25|name:Spider Gun Reflex|traits:conjuration] save against DC 25. On a success, it moves normally through the webbing and clears away the webbing from any squares it enters this turn. On a failure, it treats squares of webbing as difficult terrain this turn, and on a critical failure, it's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 round or until it @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes} (DC 25) or destroys the webbing.

Craft Requirements The initial raw materials for the spider gun must include the fangs and spinneret of a giant spider or other Large spider.

Spider Gun (Major).name: Spider Gun (Major)
Spider Gun (Major).description:
A major spider gun is a +2 greater striking weapon. It's a distinct type of martial firearm made from the fangs and spinneret of a Large spider. It deals [[/r {1d10}[poison]]]{1d10 poison damage} with a range increment of 30 feet and reload 1. On a critical hit, the venom clings to the target and they take @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Poison Damage} equal to [[/r {1d4+1+@item.data.data.runes.striking}[persistent,poison]]]{1d4 + the number of weapon damage dice}. A spider gun does not add critical specialization effects. The gun can be activated to fire webbing that hampers other creatures.

Activate 1 Interact (conjuration, magical)

Frequency once per round

Effect You fire a mass of webbing at a square within 30 feet. That square becomes covered in webbing for 1 minute. A square covered with the webbing from a spider gun can be cleared by a single attack or effect that deals at least 25 slashing damage or 15 fire damage. A square has AC 5, and it automatically fails its saving throws. The first time each turn a creature in the webbing begins to use a move action or enters the webbing during a move action, it must attempt an @Check[type:athletics|dc:34|name:Spider Gun Athletics|traits:conjuration] check or @Check[type:reflex|dc:34|name:Spider Gun Reflex|traits:conjuration] save against DC 34. On a success, it moves normally through the webbing and clears away the webbing from any squares it enters this turn. On a failure, it treats squares of webbing as difficult terrain this turn, and on a critical failure, it's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 round or until it @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes} (DC 34) or destroys the webbing.

Craft Requirements The initial raw materials for the spider gun must include the fangs and spinneret of a giant spider or other Large spider.

Spider Mold.name: Spider Mold
Spider Mold.description:
This gray mold can be found growing on the remains of venomous arachnids - particularly, giant spiders. Its lack of color and faint taste make it particularly suited for mixing into meals meant to poison an unwary feaster.

Activate t Interact

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20|basic:true]

Onset 10 minutes

Maximum Duration 8 hours

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} and Stupefied 1 (1 round)

Stage 4 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} with no Perception check to wake up ([[/r 1d4 #hours]]{1d4 hours}).

Spider Root.name: 蜘丝根 Spider Root
Spider Root.description:
将某种爬藤细小的丝状根部研磨成糊后制成的蛛丝根能让受害者变得笨拙又愚钝。

启动 A 交互 (接触)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28]

潜伏期 1 分钟

最大持续时间 6 分钟

阶段 1 [[/r {8d6}[poison]]]{8d6 毒素伤害} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1 分钟)

阶段 2 [[/r {9d6}[poison]]]{9d6 毒素伤害} 和 笨拙clumsy 2 (1 分钟)

阶段 3 [[/r {10d6}[poison]]]{10d6 毒素伤害} 和 笨拙clumsy 3 (1 分钟)

Spiderfoot Brew (Greater).name: Spiderfoot Brew (Greater)
Spiderfoot Brew (Greater).description:
Activate 1 Interact

This gelatinous, sticky fluid is made from the silk glands of giant spiders. When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed of 20 feet and a +2 item bonus to athletics checks made to climb for 10 minutes.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.YI7QQqXO6nosaAKr]{Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Greater)}

Spiderfoot Brew (Lesser).name: Spiderfoot Brew (Lesser)
Spiderfoot Brew (Lesser).description:
Activate 1 Interact

This gelatinous, sticky fluid is made from the silk glands of giant spiders. When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed of 15 feet and a +1 item bonus to athletics checks made to climb for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.wNCxSxruzLVGtLE4]{Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Lesser)}

Spiderfoot Brew (Major).name: Spiderfoot Brew (Major)
Spiderfoot Brew (Major).description:
Activate 1 Interact

This gelatinous, sticky fluid is made from the silk glands of giant spiders. When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed of 25 feet and a +3 item bonus to athletics checks made to climb for 1 hour.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.4JULykNCgQoypsu8]{Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Major)}

Spike Launcher.name: Spike Launcher
Spike Launcher.description:
Built from the spiked tail of a manticore, a spike launcher is designed to launch large, spear-like projectiles. A spike launcher is a +1 striking weapon. It's a distinct type of martial firearm that deals [[/r {1d8}[piercing]]]{1d8 piercing damage}. It has the backstabber, fatal aim d12, and kickback traits with a range increment of 120 feet and reload 2. It uses the critical specialization of the bow weapon group, rather than the firearm critical specialization.

Activate 3 Interact (evocation, magical)

Frequency once per day

Requirements The spike launcher is loaded

Effect The spike launcher fires a volley of smaller spikes in a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] centered anywhere within its range. Make a Strike with the spike launcher against each creature in the area. On a success, the spike causes the creature to take a -5-foot status penalty to their Speed. On a critical success, the creature becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} instead. In either case, the creature, or an adjacent creature, can use an Interact action to remove the spike and end the penalty or immobilized condition.

Craft Requirements The initial raw materials must include the tail of a manticore.

Spike Snare.name: 尖刺圈套 Spike Snare
Spike Snare.description: 这个基础圈套由隐藏的尖刺组成，一个生物进入圈套格时带来的冲力会导致尖刺割裂，甚至刺透该生物的身体，造成2d8点穿刺伤害。该生物必须进行一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:17|basic:true] 豁免。

Spiked Chain.name: 刺链 Spiked Chain
Spiked Chain.description: 这种4英尺的链条附着倒钩，一端或两段都有尖刺。有些会配置金属环作为握把。

Spiked Gauntlet.name: 带刺铁手套 Spiked Gauntlet
Spiked Gauntlet.description: 提供和标准铁手套一样的防御功能，但这种铁手套关节上还突出了一组尖刺让拳击造成穿刺伤害。

Spined Shield.name: 尖刺盾 Spined Shield
Spined Shield.description:
五根锯齿尖刺从铁盾（硬度6，HP24，BT12）面伸出展开保护。尖刺作为+1强击盾刺使用。

当你用该盾做出盾牌格挡反应动作时，尖刺会先于盾牌受到伤害。盾牌受到伤害时（应用硬度后），每根尖刺都能承受6点伤害，以减少6点对盾牌本体的伤害。在此之后盾牌本体才会受到剩下的伤害。若无尖刺参与，盾牌正常受到伤害。

当所有尖刺消耗后，直到下一天尖刺复原为止，你失去用尖刺攻击的能力。

启动 A 交互

效果 你用一根尖刺射击一个目标。射击出的尖刺使用尖刺数据，作为射程增量120尺的军用远程武器使用。

Spiral rapier.name: Spiral rapier
Spiral rapier.description: An old Taldan dueling weapon from the empire's height, this rapier has a thicker blade than normal, which is shaped into a corkscrew-like spiral well suited to catching enemy weapons. Characters from Taldor have access to the spiral rapier.

Spirit Snare.name: Spirit Snare
Spirit Snare.description: This complicated snare is affixed with various crystals and Stasian coils attached to strange electrical relays, working on the same principles as etheric spirit singers. When an incorporeal creature enters its square, the device lets loose an ectoplasmic web that lashes around the creature's spectral form. The creature must succeed a @Check[type:reflex|dc:26]saving throw or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 round. On a critical failure, the creature becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 minute. In either case, the incorporeal creature can attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} (DC 26).

Spirit-Sealing Fulu.name: Spirit-Sealing Fulu
Spirit-Sealing Fulu.description:
Usage affixed to one undead creature

Duration 1 round

This classic fulu seals the negative energy within an undead, freezing it in its tracks. Upon affixing, the target undead must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:17|name:spirit-sealing fulu|showDC:all] save or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round.

Spirit-Sealing Fulu (Greater).name: Spirit-Sealing Fulu (Greater)
Spirit-Sealing Fulu (Greater).description:
Usage affixed to one undead creature

Duration 1 round or 4 rounds

This classic fulu seals the negative energy within an undead, freezing it in its tracks. Upon affixing, the target undead must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:27|name:spirit-sealing fulu|showDC:all] save or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round. On a critical failure, the undead is paralyzed for 4 rounds. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt a new Will save to reduce the remaining duration by 1 round, or end it entirely on a critical success.

Spirit-Singer.name: Spirit-Singer
Spirit-Singer.description: Etheric spirit-singers create an eerie spectral sound based on the presence of spiritual essence and other ethereal energies. All spirit-singers can be used as musical instruments by manipulating the sensitivity to ethereal energies. However, they have an even greater benefit in areas heavy with spiritual essence. When played in the presence of a significant spiritual disturbance, such as a haunt or an incorporeal undead, a spirit‑singer grants you a +1 item bonus to Performance checks. While playing a spirit-singer, you also gain a +1 item bonus to checks to detect a haunt or incorporeal undead, and you can roll a check to notice a haunt even if you aren't actively Searching for it, due to the distortions of the spirit-singer's music. A haunt or incorporeal undead that is intelligent enough to notice the effects it is having on the spirit-singer's music and that can't otherwise communicate with the living might choose to use the spirit-singer to do so if it wishes. For instance, it could try to guide the spirit-singer player towards a location by creating distortions in that direction or, if it understands language, it could try to answer questions by creating one distortion for yes and two distortions for no. Unless stated otherwise in its usage entry, a spirit-singer functions like a heavy musical instrument; rather than carrying it, the musician places the spirit‑singer in a particular position and uses both hands to play.

Spirit-Singer (Handheld).name: Spirit-Singer (Handheld)
Spirit-Singer (Handheld).description: Etheric spirit-singers create an eerie spectral sound based on the presence of spiritual essence and other ethereal energies. All spirit-singers can be used as musical instruments by manipulating the sensitivity to ethereal energies. However, they have an even greater benefit in areas heavy with spiritual essence. When played in the presence of a significant spiritual disturbance, such as a haunt or an incorporeal undead, a spirit‑singer grants you a +1 item bonus to Performance checks. While playing a spirit-singer, you also gain a +1 item bonus to checks to detect a haunt or incorporeal undead, and you can roll a check to notice a haunt even if you aren't actively Searching for it, due to the distortions of the spirit-singer's music. A haunt or incorporeal undead that is intelligent enough to notice the effects it is having on the spirit-singer's music and that can't otherwise communicate with the living might choose to use the spirit-singer to do so if it wishes. For instance, it could try to guide the spirit-singer player towards a location by creating distortions in that direction or, if it understands language, it could try to answer questions by creating one distortion for yes and two distortions for no. Unless stated otherwise in its usage entry, a spirit-singer functions like a heavy musical instrument; rather than carrying it, the musician places the spirit‑singer in a particular position and uses both hands to play.

Spirit-Singer (Incredible Handheld).name: Spirit-Singer (Incredible Handheld)
Spirit-Singer (Incredible Handheld).description:
Etheric spirit-singers create an eerie spectral sound based on the presence of spiritual essence and other ethereal energies. All spirit-singers can be used as musical instruments by manipulating the sensitivity to ethereal energies. However, they have an even greater benefit in areas heavy with spiritual essence. When played in the presence of a significant spiritual disturbance, such as a haunt or an incorporeal undead, a spirit‑singer grants you a +1 item bonus to Performance checks. While playing a spirit-singer, you also gain a +1 item bonus to checks to detect a haunt or incorporeal undead, and you can roll a check to notice a haunt even if you aren't actively Searching for it, due to the distortions of the spirit-singer's music. A haunt or incorporeal undead that is intelligent enough to notice the effects it is having on the spirit-singer's music and that can't otherwise communicate with the living might choose to use the spirit-singer to do so if it wishes. For instance, it could try to guide the spirit-singer player towards a location by creating distortions in that direction or, if it understands language, it could try to answer questions by creating one distortion for yes and two distortions for no. Unless stated otherwise in its usage entry, a spirit-singer functions like a heavy musical instrument; rather than carrying it, the musician places the spirit‑singer in a particular position and uses both hands to play.

This spirit-singer is fine-tuned to the point that you can analyze its song more intricately. Increase the item bonus to Performance checks near spiritual disturbances, and the item bonus to detecting haunts and incorporeal undead to +2. While playing the spirit-singer, you can notice haunts that normally require you to have a master proficiency in Perception to detect.

This spirit-singer functions just like an incredible spirit-singer, except for its Usage and Bulk.

Spirit-Singer (Incredible).description:

Increase the item bonus to Performance checks near spiritual disturbances, and the item bonus to detecting haunts and incorporeal undead to +2. While playing the spirit-singer, you can notice haunts that normally require you to have a master proficiency in Perception to detect.

Spiritsight Crossbow.name: Spiritsight Crossbow
Spiritsight Crossbow.description:
This +1 striking @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} crossbow has an array of crystalline lenses and silver fittings along the stock and feels strangely light.

Activate 1 envision

Frequency once per minute

Effect You aim through the crossbow's crystalline lenses, gaining imprecise vision onto the Ethereal Plane with a range of 60 feet in addition to your normal senses for the rest of your turn. While this effect lasts, your next Strike with the spiritsight crossbow can also affect targets on the Ethereal Plane during the first 60 feet of its flight.

Splendid Skull Mask.name: Splendid Skull Mask
Splendid Skull Mask.description:
Prerequisite: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.VV7vbDzcO8vdD3OO]{Skull Creeper}.

The mask grants you a +1 item bonus to Intimidation.

Splint.name: Splint
Splint.description: Splints can be applied to the following joints: finger, hand, wrist, elbow, knee, and shin. They are strapped to the desired area but are more rigid in structure than supports and braces, with metal or wooden bars pulled firmly against the bone structure to provide constant support (ring splints only attach to a single digit). They are a little less flexible, but you still have full use of your limbs and fingers when using one. You still have full mobility of the limb when not wearing it, but the limb becomes painful and feels less secure without the extra support it normally has, which might present physical symptoms.

Splint Mail.name: 板条甲 Splint Mail
Splint Mail.description: 这种盔甲在链甲上灵活加固并连锁金属板件，通常位于穿戴者的躯干、上臂和腿上。这种盔甲包含一套内衬的布甲和一双手套

Spoon Gun.name: Spoon Gun
Spoon Gun.description:
No one's entirely certain who developed the spoon gun, but all authorities agree that it was probably a goblin. Essentially a terrible idea in firearm form, the spoon gun is a spring-powered @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.4LJEpZ2HkCu9BvHI]{Hand Cannon} with a modified grip that uses miscellaneous knives, forks, chopsticks, and spoons as ammunition. Users typically upend the entire contents of their cutlery drawer into the gun, aim it in the general direction of the foe, and hope it hits something.

This hand cannon is a martial weapon, instead of a simple weapon. It has the scatter (5 feet) trait and uses cutlery or similar-sized objects as ammunition instead of bullets (enough cheap cutlery to fire ten shots costs 1 sp).

Spore Sap.name: Spore Sap
Spore Sap.description:
This flexible +2 striking sap is crafted from the stalks of cave fungi and bound around a mesh of spore-infused gills. Demon-worshipping xulgaths use spore saps to capture spellcasters alive for later sacrifice.

Activate R Interact (poison)

Frequency three times per day

Trigger You successfully Strike a creature with the spore sap

Effect The spore sap releases a puff of stupefying fungal spores. The target must succeed at a DC 28 Fortitude save or become stupefied 1 for 1 minute (stupefied 2 on a critical failure).

Spring-Loaded Net Launcher.name: Spring-Loaded Net Launcher
Spring-Loaded Net Launcher.description:
Activate 1 Interact

This small bronze cylinder is about the size of a potion bottle. When you activate the launcher, it fires an unattached net requiring only a single hand, and at a greater distance. As normal, you make a ranged attack roll against a Medium or smaller creature, but you can target a creature up to 60 feet away, instead of only 20 feet away. The net trap otherwise functions as an unattached @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.T8EopYZLT137CsdW]{Net}.

Spyglass.name: 望远镜 Spyglass
Spyglass.description: 典型的望远镜让你可以看到比正常远八倍的物体。

Spyglass (Fine).name: 望远镜(优质) Spyglass (Fine)
Spyglass (Fine).description:
典型的望远镜让你可以看到比正常远八倍的物体。优质望远镜为看清远处细节的察觉检定提供+1物品加值。

自动生效:

  • 看清远处细节的察觉检定+1物品加值

St. Alkitarem's Eye.name: St. Alkitarem's Eye
St. Alkitarem's Eye.description: St. Alkitarem's Eye is a simple silver chain bearing a brass housing with tiny brass wings. At the center of the housing is a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.M2CPAgSAoEL4oawq]{Clear Spindle Aeon Stone}, positioned so it resembles an open eye. This is necklace is known as St. Alkitarem's Eye. The housing can bear a single aeon stone in the same manner as a wayfinder, allowing the necklace's wearer to benefit from the aeon stone just as though it were orbiting their head. The necklace can bear only a clear spindle aeon stone, not other types of aeon stones. It allows the bearer to use the aeon stone's resonant power and doesn't restrict the wearer from investing other aeon stones (even those slotted in a wayfinder). St. Alkitarem's Eye otherwise has the same statistics (including Price) as a wayfinder.

Staff.name: 木杖 Staff
Staff.description: 这根长木头能够帮助人行走，也能给予人沉重的打击。

Staff of Abjuration.name: 防护法杖 Staff of Abjuration
Staff of Abjuration.description:
这把雕刻精美的木杖握上去十分温暖，手心仿佛感受到跃动的能量。持握该法杖时，你在鉴别防护系法术的检定上获得+2环境加值。

启动 施放法术

效果 你消耗一定充能从法杖法术列表中施放法术。

  • 戏法 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{护盾术 Shield}
  • 1环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4WAib3GichxLjp5p]{警报术 Alarm}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{羽落术 Feather Fall}
  • 2环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5esP2GVzvxWsMgaX]{忍受环境 Endure Elements}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Fr58LDSrbndgld9n]{抵抗能量伤害 Resist Energy}

Staff of Final Rest.name: Staff of Final Rest
Staff of Final Rest.description:
This white marble staff is carved into the figure of an abstract knight, its shield bearing the symbol of Lastwall, with a wickedly pointed sword made of dark wood raised high above its head. When you wield it as a weapon, it gains the versatile P trait and functions as a wooden stake, allowing you to use it to stake vampires, and your Strikes with the staff gain a +1 circumstance bonus to damage rolls against undead.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kcelf6IHl3L9VXXg]{Disrupt Undead}
  • 1st @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2iQKhCQBijhj5Rf3]{Disrupting Weapons}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal}
  • 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.xRgU9rrhmGAgG4Rc]{Gentle Repose}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

Staff of Healing.name: 治疗法杖 Staff of Healing
Staff of Healing.description:
用光洁的白木制作，这根法杖两段各有一个金色十字架，上面装饰有许多红宝石。当你使用自己的法术位或法杖充能施放治疗术（heal）时，你将治疗法杖的物品加值添加到治疗术恢复的HP上。

启动 施放法术

效果 你消耗一定充能从法杖法术列表中施放法术。

制造需求 为列表上所有法术提供1次对应环级的施法。

给治疗术的物品加值为+1。

  • 戏法 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SnjhtQYexDtNDdEg]{稳定伤势 Stabilize}
  • 1st @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{治疗术 Heal}

Staff of Illumination.name: 照明法杖 Staff of Illumination
Staff of Illumination.description:
这根铁法杖顶部是一个切割过的明亮宝石。

启动 交互

效果 顶部的宝石如同火炬一样发光，散发出半径20尺的明亮光（和接下来20尺的暗淡光），持续10分钟。

启动 施放法术

效果 你消耗一定充能从法杖法术列表中施放法术。

  • 戏法 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{光亮术 Light}
  • 2环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ynm8JIU3sc3qUMpa]{不灭明焰 Continual Flame}

制造需求 为列表上所有法术提供1次对应环级的施法。

Staff of Illusion.name: 幻象法杖 Staff of Illusion
Staff of Illusion.description:
这根精心设计的金属法杖上镶嵌着珍贵的黄金。当你从法杖施法时，你需要的幻象会从法杖表面浮现。持握它时，你在鉴别幻术系法术的检定上获得+2环境加值。

启动 施放法术

效果 你消耗一定充能从法杖法术列表中施放法术。

  • 2环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.f8SBoXiXQjlCKqly]{幻象生物 Illusory Creature}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4ZGte0i9YbLh4dRi]{伪装物件 Item Facade}

Staff of Impossible Visions.name: Staff of Impossible Visions
Staff of Impossible Visions.description:
This bizarre staff is made from oak, capped with a cluster of eye-shaped gemstones that seem to move and undulate at the corner of your vision. While wielding the staff, you can peer through the eyes, using your normal visual senses (including any benefits of spells affecting your vision, like see invisibility). You can maneuver the staff to see things around corners, at higher elevations, or in places where the staff can fit but your head can't. This doesn't provide sufficient line of effect to target creatures around corners. The eyes are as vulnerable as your eyes and can be affected by anything that alters your vision, such as a blinding flash of light.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

  • Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4gBIw4IDrSfFHik4]{Daze}
  • 1st @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4koZzrnMXhhosn0D]{Fear}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.R8bqnYiThB6MYTxD]{Phantom Pain}
  • 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{Augury}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Mkbq9xlAUxHUHyR2]{Paranoia}

Staff of Nature's Cunning.name: Staff of Nature's Cunning
Staff of Nature's Cunning.description:
Moss and winding vines give this gnarled staff of wild wood a vibrant green tinge. You created this staff to aid you in speaking to the plants you met on your adventure and beseeching them to come to your aid.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

Staff of Nature's Cunning (Greater).name: Staff of Nature's Cunning (Greater)
Staff of Nature's Cunning (Greater).description:
Moss and winding vines give this gnarled staff of wild wood a vibrant green tinge. You created this staff to aid you in speaking to the plants you met on your adventure and beseeching them to come to your aid.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]{Tanglefoot}
  • 1st protector tree , @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.s3abwDbTV43pGFFW]{Shillelagh}
  • 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.J6vNvrUT3b1hx2iA]{Entangle}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.CXICME10TkEJxz0P]{Shape Wood}
  • 3rd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{Tree Shape}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KsWhliKfUs3IpW3c]{Wall of Thorns}
  • 4th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YWrfKetOqDwVFut7]{Barkskin}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qvwIwJ9QBihy8R0t]{Speak with Plants}
    Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

Staff of Necromancy.name: 死灵法杖 Staff of Necromancy
Staff of Necromancy.description:
这根冰冷扭曲的法杖上雕刻着骷髅头和骨骼的图案。持握它时，你在鉴别死灵系法术的检定上获得+2环境加值。

启动 施放法术

效果 你消耗一定充能从法杖法术列表中施放法术。

  • 戏法 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.mAMEt4FFbdqoRnkN]{恐吓之触 Chill Touch}
  • 1环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.k34hDOfIIMAxNL4a]{邪影触须 Grim Tendrils}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.J7Y7tl0bbdz7TcCc]{衰弱射线 Ray of Enfeeblement}
  • 2环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.fZPCv2VHuM2yPbC8]{耳聋术 Deafness}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.xRgU9rrhmGAgG4Rc]{遗体防腐 Gentle Repose}

制造需求 为列表上所有法术提供1次对应环级的施法

自动生效:

  • 鉴别死灵系法术的检定上获得+2环境加值

Staff of Power.name: 威力法杖 Staff of Power
Staff of Power.description:
这根用魔法硬化过的法杖顶部有一个雕刻了魔法符文的银色雕像。若将其用作武器，威力法杖可作为+2高等强击木杖使用。

主动摧毁威力法杖会释放出巨大的能量。持握它时，你可用交互动作破坏它。这会以法杖为中心引发半径30尺的魔力爆炸。法杖内每剩下1点充能，该爆炸就能造成 [[/r 2d8]] 点力场伤害（DC40基础反射豁免）。你在该豁免中自动大失败。因该爆炸HP归0的生物立刻死亡；这是一个死亡效果。

启动 施放法术

效果 你消耗一定充能从法杖法术列表中施放法术。

  • 1环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.J7Y7tl0bbdz7TcCc]{衰弱射线 Ray of Enfeeblement}
  • 2环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ynm8JIU3sc3qUMpa]{不灭明焰 Continual Flame}
  • 3环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.fI20AVwOzJMHXRdo]{浮空术 Levitate}
  • 4环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.JOdOpbPDl7nqvJUm]{法术无效结界 Globe of Invulnerability}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.DCQHaLrYXMI37dvW]{麻痹术 Paralyze}
  • 5环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{魔法飞弹 Magic Missile}
  • 6环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.7Iela4GgVeO3LfAo]{力墙术 Wall of Force}
  • 7环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.3puDanGfpEt6jK5k]{寒冰锥 Cone of Cold}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{火球术 Fireball}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{闪电束 Lightning Bolt}

制造需求 为列表上所有法术提供1次对应环级的施法。

Staff of Providence.name: Staff of Providence
Staff of Providence.description:
A large, stylized symbol of an eye adorns the top of this wooden staff, representing the watchful eye of the divine powers. The bearer of the staff can guide and protect, seeing bounties and tragedies that could befall them in the future.

When wielding this staff, you gain a +1 item bonus on Survival checks to Sense Direction or Subsist, and to Religion checks to Recall Knowledge.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light}
  • 1st @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{Bless}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WzLKjSw6hsBhuklC]{Create Water}
  • 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{Augury}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Mt6ZzkVX8Q4xigFq]{Create Food}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See Invisibility}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.HTou8cG05yuSkesj]{Status}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Survival checks to Sense Direction or Subsist,
  • +1 item bonus to Religion checks to Recall Knowledge

Staff of Sieges.name: Staff of Sieges
Staff of Sieges.description:

Staff of the Black Desert.name: Staff of the Black Desert
Staff of the Black Desert.description:
This rough metal staff is pitted and sandblasted, with thousands of nigh-imperceptible sand crystals embedded in its surface.

While carrying the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Occultism checks to identify aberrations and oozes native to the Darklands.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

Staff of the Desert Winds.name: Staff of the Desert Winds
Staff of the Desert Winds.description:
This crooked staff is made from twisting acacia wood and has a sphere of rough sandstone embedded in the top, to channel the magic of the desert. When wielding this staff in deserts, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Survival checks to Subsist, Track, and Cover Tracks.

Staff of the Dreamlands.name: Staff of the Dreamlands
Staff of the Dreamlands.description:
The carved night hag's hand at the end of this sandalwood staff clutches a rough gem. The staff of the Dreamlands makes it easier to navigate and survive in the Dreamlands and recognize its denizens. When wielding the staff, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Survival checks while in the Dreamlands and to checks to Recall Knowledge about creatures with the dream trait.

  • 8th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rwCh2qTYPA44KEoK]{Dream Council}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Oj1PJBMQD9vuwCv7]{Maze}, visions of danger

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

Staff of the Magi.name: 大法师法杖 Staff of the Magi
Staff of the Magi.description:
古代密印和符文形成强大的魔法，环绕在这根长木法杖的头部周围。大法师法杖是+3上等强击木杖，持握它时，你对法术的豁免获得+1环境加值。

主动摧毁大法师法杖会释放出毁灭性的奥术能量波，随距离衰减。持握它时，你可用交互动作破坏它。这会以法杖为中心引发半径30尺的魔力爆炸。法杖内每剩下1点充能，该爆炸就能造成 [[/r 2d10]] 点力场伤害（DC40基础反射豁免）。你在该豁免中自动大失败。在最初爆发区域外，这股爆炸会持续产生余波，半径30尺到半径60尺中间的生物受到一半伤害。因该爆炸HP归0的生物立刻死亡；这是一个死亡效果。

启动 施放法术

效果 你消耗一定充能从法杖法术列表中施放法术

  • 戏法 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{侦测魔法 Detect Magic}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{光亮术 Light}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.pwzdSlJgYqN7bs2w]{法师之手 Mage Hand}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.60sgbuMWN0268dB7]{念动射弹 Telekinetic Projectile}
  • 1环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Azoh0BSoCASrA1lr]{固锁术 Lock}
  • 2环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{变巨术 Enlarge}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.0qaqksrGGDj74HXE]{闪光尘 Glitterdust}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{隐形术 Invisibility}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.6Ot4N22t5tPD51BO]{敲击术 Knock}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.mrDi3v933gsmnw25]{念动战技 Telekinetic Maneuver}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9s5tqqXNzcoKamWx]{蛛网术 Web}
  • 3环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{火球术 Fireball}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{闪电束 Lightning Bolt}
  • 4环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{隐形术 Invisibility}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{变巨术 Enlarge}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{火球术 Fireball}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IarZrgCeaiUqOuRu]{火墙术 Wall of Fire}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9s5tqqXNzcoKamWx]{蛛网术 Web}
  • 5环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.3puDanGfpEt6jK5k]{寒冰锥 Cone of Cold}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.115Xp9E38CJENhNS]{穿墙术 Passwall}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tpLTLbJUrYcMWGld]{念动拖曳 Telekinetic Haul}
  • 6环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{解离术 Disintegrate}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{火球术 Fireball}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{闪电束 Lightning Bolt}
  • 7环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.3puDanGfpEt6jK5k]{寒冰锥 Cone of Cold}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.115Xp9E38CJENhNS]{穿墙术 Passwall}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{异界传送 Plane Shift}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IarZrgCeaiUqOuRu]{火墙术 Wall of Fire}
  • 8环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{火球术 Fireball}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aAbfKn8maGjJjk2W]{法师护甲 Mage Armor}
  • 9环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jrBa9deU2ULFWvSl]{流星爆 Meteor Swarm}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kghwmH3tQjMIhdH1]{召唤龙族 Summon Dragon}

制造需求 为列表上所有法术提供1次对应环级的施法。

自动生效:

你对法术的豁免获得+1环境加值

Staff-Storing Shield.name: Staff-Storing Shield
Staff-Storing Shield.description:
This magically reinforced wooden shield normally has a blank face. It can absorb a staff and transform between a shield and staff. When you prepare a staff, you can hold it up to the shield, at which point the items will merge, and the shield's face becomes an image corresponding to the type of magic, such as a skull for a staff of necromancy.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect You change the staff-storing shield from its shield form into the stored staff, which has an image of the shield on it, or change it from the stored staff back into a shield.

Hardness HP BT
6 36 18

Stalker Bane Snare.name: 破隐圈套 Stalker Bane Snare
Stalker Bane Snare.description:
当一个生物进入这个圈套格时，该圈套会炸出一阵黏腻的粉末，缠在该生物身上。进入破隐圈套的生物必须进行一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:20] 豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响

成功 粉末粘在目标身上，让它会留下暴露位置的脚印。如果该生物进入隐形Invisible状态，对于本来能够看到它的其他生物来说，该生物获得藏匿Hidden状态，而非无踪Undetected状态。

失败 粉末裹在目标身上并不断脱落。如果该生物进入隐形Invisible状态，对于本来能看到它的其他生物来说，该生物获得隐蔽Concealed状态，而非藏匿Hidden或无踪Undetected状态。

大失败 同失败，该生物同时陷入目盲Blinded，直到它的下一回合结束。

Stalwart's Ring.name: Stalwart's Ring
Stalwart's Ring.description:
This fairly simple ring has no gemstone inlaid, but the band is cast to resembled a fanged wolf's head.

Once per day, during your daily preparations, you can meditate on this ring to grant yourself 5 temporary Hit Points. These last until your next daily preparation, as long as you are wearing the ring.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.5uK3fmGlfJrbWQz4]{Effect: Stalwart's Ring}

Stampede Medallion.name: Stampede Medallion
Stampede Medallion.description:
When you invest this medallion for your eidolon, it changes shape to appear as a tiny bejeweled facsimile of the eidolon, magically attached just over your eidolon's heart. While your eidolon wears the medallion, they gain a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks to Shove or Trip.

Activate 2 envision

Frequency once per day

Effect Your eidolon Concentrates on the medallion and their connection to you, allowing them to momentarily manifest into a stampede of dozens of copies of themself. The stampede rampages out in every direction, swerving around your allies while trampling any foe on the ground in an emanation around your eidolon with a radius equal to your eidolon's Speed. Each of these foes takes [[/r {8d6}[bludgeoning]]]{8d6 bludgeoning damage}, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true|name:Eidolon Stampede] save. On a critical failure, the foe is also knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. After dealing damage, the stampede of eidolons vanishes as quickly as it appeared.

Stampede Medallion (Greater).name: Stampede Medallion (Greater)
Stampede Medallion (Greater).description:
When you invest this medallion for your eidolon, it changes shape to appear as a tiny bejeweled facsimile of the eidolon, magically attached just over your eidolon's heart. While your eidolon wears the medallion, they gain a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks to Shove or Trip.

Activate 2 envision

Frequency once per day

Effect Your eidolon Concentrates on the medallion and their connection to you, allowing them to momentarily manifest into a stampede of dozens of copies of themself. The stampede rampages out in every direction, swerving around your allies while trampling any foe on the ground in an emanation around your eidolon with a radius equal to your eidolon's Speed. Each of these foes takes [[/r {12d6}[bludgeoning]]]{12d6 bludgeoning damage}, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:34|basic:true|name:Eidolon Stampede] save. On a critical failure, the foe is also knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. After dealing damage, the stampede of eidolons vanishes as quickly as it appeared.

Stampede Medallion (Major).name: Stampede Medallion (Major)
Stampede Medallion (Major).description:
When you invest this medallion for your eidolon, it changes shape to appear as a tiny bejeweled facsimile of the eidolon, magically attached just over your eidolon's heart. While your eidolon wears the medallion, they gain a +3 item bonus to Athletics checks to Shove or Trip.

Activate 2 envision

Frequency once per day

Effect Your eidolon Concentrates on the medallion and their connection to you, allowing them to momentarily manifest into a stampede of dozens of copies of themself. The stampede rampages out in every direction, swerving around your allies while trampling any foe on the ground in an emanation around your eidolon with a radius equal to your eidolon's Speed. Each of these foes takes [[/r {14d6}[bludgeoning]]]{14d6 bludgeoning damage}, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:38|basic:true|name:Eidolon Stampede] save. On a critical failure, the foe is also knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. After dealing damage, the stampede of eidolons vanishes as quickly as it appeared.

Stanching.name: Stanching
Stanching.description: These symbols close bloody wounds. Armor with this rune reduces the DC of the flat check to end persistent bleed damage from 15 to 12 (7 with particularly effective assistance).

Stanching (Greater).name: Stanching (Greater)
Stanching (Greater).description: These symbols close bloody wounds. Armor with this rune reduces the DC of the flat check to end persistent bleed damage from 15 to 10 (5 with particularly effective assistance).

Stanching (Major).name: Stanching (Major)
Stanching (Major).description: These symbols close bloody wounds. Armor with this rune reduces the DC of the flat check to end persistent bleed damage from 15 to 8 (3 with particularly effective assistance).

Stanching (True).name: Stanching (True)
Stanching (True).description: These symbols close bloody wounds. Armor with this rune reduces the DC of the flat check to end persistent bleed damage from 15 to 5 (particularly effective assistance automatically removes persistent bleed damage).

Standard Astrolabe.name: Standard Astrolabe
Standard Astrolabe.description:
Activate 1 minute (Interact)

Astrolabes can be used for navigation in unfamiliar or featureless locations.

To use an astrolabe, the holder must be trained in Survival.

By spending 1 minute to measure the height of the stars and planets, a holder who knows the time and date can determine the latitude, and a holder who knows their latitude can determine the date and time.

An astrolabe also grants a +1 item bonus on checks to identify celestial bodies.

A standard astrolabe only functions on steady ground.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus on checks to identify celestial bodies.

Standard Book of Translation (Tien).name: Standard Book of Translation (Tien)
Standard Book of Translation (Tien).description: The book is leather-bound and decorated with the symbol of the Lantern Lodge. Red and gold cords wrap around the book and tie to keep it shut. Each volume offers translation for a different language. When working with a book of translation, you can attempt Diplomacy checks to Gather Information or to Make an Impression with creatures that speak the language featured in the book, even if you do not speak the language. Such checks take 10 times longer to complete and you take a -2 circumstance penalty to the check due to your limited communication capabilities.

Star Chart Tattoo.name: Star Chart Tattoo
Star Chart Tattoo.description:
This tattoo consists of numerous asterisks at regular intervals along the fingers of one hand, perfect for measuring stars against the horizon. When used against a clear night sky, the tattoo grants a +2 circumstance bonus to Survival checks to Sense Direction and counts as a compass for the purpose of that action.

Activate 1 Interact (divination, metamagic)

Frequency once per day

Effect The dots of the tattoo turn to points of light and fly above the head of a creature within 30 feet, where they form a three-star constellation that guides your spells further than they could normally travel. The constellation sheds dim light and remains visible even if the creature hides, aiding in locating it. Furthermore, while the constellation lasts, if you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} that has a range and that spell would affect only the marked creature, the spell's range is increased by 30 feet. As is standard for increasing spell ranges, if the spell normally has a range of touch, you extend its range to 30 feet. Each time you use this benefit, one of the stars above the creature's head winks out; when all three have winked out or after 1 minute has passed, the effect ends.

Starknife.name: 星刃 Starknife
Starknife.description: 中间是金属环，四片逐渐变细的刀刃像指南针上的指针一样延伸。当从中间抓住星刃时，使用者可以将它作为近战武器使用。它也可以在短距离内作为投掷武器使用。

Starless Scope.name: Starless Scope
Starless Scope.description:
Even during the time of Thassilon, when the Order of the Starless Night still existed, starless scopes were uncommon. Today, this final scope might well be the last one to survive the passage of time.

A starless scope is a handheld telescope crafted of silver and fine wood. When one peers at the sky through a starless scope, one always views the sky as if during a clear night. A starless scope adds a +2 item bonus to Astronomy Lore and Perception checks made to observe the skies, as it causes all celestial objects to dim when not directly observed, allowing its user to more easily observe their intended subject. It also grants a +2 item bonus to all Occultism checks made to Identify Magic.

A starless scope also functions as a divine focus for worshipers of Desna. The magic of a starless scope requires a specially prepared lens to function, and it's possible to shatter the lens if you roll poorly when activating the starless scope.

Without a functional lens, a starless scope doesn't function. You can replace a shattered lens with a functional lens by taking a two-action activity with the manipulate trait. If you know the formula for the starless scope, you can Craft a new lens with a DC 25 Crafting (master) check.

Activate R Interact

Frequency once per day

Requirement you worship Desna

Trigger you use the starless scope as a divine focus

Effect You attempt to enhance the effects of a spell as you cast it by attempting a Religion check against the spell's DC (DC set by level and rarity).

Critical Success Any attack rolls you make with the spell gain a +2 status bonus, and any saving throw a foe makes against the spell takes a -2 status penalty. If you would normally cast the spell from a spell slot, and the spell is 5th level or lower, you don't spend the spell slot and cast the spell from the starless scope instead.

Success Any attack rolls you make with the spell gain a +1 status bonus, and any saving throw a foe makes against the spell takes a -1 status penalty.

Failure The spell is cast normally. Attempt a [[/r 1d20]]{DC 11 flat check}. On a failure, the starless scope's lens shatters.

Critical Failure The spell is disrupted and the starless scope's lens shatters.

Activate 2 (abjuration, divine) Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect You raise the scope to your eye and observe a creature within 30 feet. You can attempt to identify the creature by Recalling Knowledge. The starless scope adds a +2 item bonus to this check. If the creature is associated with the Dominion of the Black or the Elder Mythos, or is a creature whose actions have blasphemed against Desna, the creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:27|name:Starless Scope Recall Knowledge|traits:abjuration] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected, and the starless scope's lens shatters.

Success The creature shines with starlight for 1 round. During this time, the creature can't be concealed if it is visible. If it's invisible, it's concealed rather than being undetected. The creature takes a -1 status penalty to saving throws against divine effects while it shimmers with starlight.

Failure As success, but the creature also suffers an additional effect. An incorporeal creature loses its incorporeal trait as long as it shines with starlight. Any other creature becomes slowed 1 as long as it shines with starlight.

Critical Failure As failure, but the duration of the starlight is 1 minute, and the status penalty to saving throws against divine effects increases to -2.

Starless Scope Lens.name: Starless Scope Lens
Starless Scope Lens.description:
A replacement lens for a Starless Scope. If you know the formula for the starless scope, you can Craft a new lens with a DC 25 Crafting (master) check.

Activate 2 Interact (Manipulate); You can replace a broken lens in a starless scope with an undamaged one.

Starshot Arrow (Greater).name: Starshot Arrow (Greater)
Starshot Arrow (Greater).description:
The metal of these arrows is said to have come from a star that ventured too close to Golarion and was shot down by a moonlit archer. When you activate and shoot a starshot arrow, you take no range penalties against any target that you can personally detect. There must be a line of effect between you and the target.

You can fire at any creature you can detect, regardless of range. The arrow travels instantly, hitting your target as soon as you fire the arrow. This is a teleportation effect.

Starshot Arrow (Lesser).name: Starshot Arrow (Lesser)
Starshot Arrow (Lesser).description:
The metal of these arrows is said to have come from a star that ventured too close to Golarion and was shot down by a moonlit archer. When you activate and shoot a starshot arrow, you take no range penalties against any target that you can personally detect. There must be a line of effect between you and the target.

The target must be within the maximum range of your weapon.

Static Snare.name: Static Snare
Static Snare.description:
You hide insulating crystals or other material that releases a strong static charge when the first creature enters the snare's square. That creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:18|traits:uncommon|showDC:all] saving throw.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target takes [[/r {1}[persistent,electricity] #persistent electricity damage]]{1} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Electricity Damage}} and takes a -1 circumstance penalty to saving throws against electricity effects for as long as the persistent electricity damage lasts.

Critical Failure As failure, and the target attracts nearby dirt and dust. If the target is or becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, it's merely @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to creatures that have sight as a precise sense. This effect lasts as long as the persistent electricity damage does.

Steam Winch.name: Steam Winch
Steam Winch.description:
This hefty winch is powered by a small steam engine and includes a 100 ft. length of steel cable, which enables you to haul a heavier load than you could with a hand cranked winch or @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.4QufuSeCbjDD2hMa]{Comealong}. A steam winch allows you to slowly pull a heavy load (usually up to 50 Bulk) along a flat surface or up and down a vertical expanse.

Attaching a steam winch to a device takes three Interact actions, while starting the winch (and getting it warm enough to operate) takes 10 minutes. Once in operation, a steam winch requires regular maintenance to function. Every twenty minutes, the boiler must be refilled and heat levels maintained

Steamflight Pack.name: Steamflight Pack
Steamflight Pack.description:
Activate1 Interact

The steamflight pack allows its user to fly without using magic or wings. Each steamflight pack looks like a large brass backpack with two large nozzles mounted on the sides pointing downward. It also features metal arms reaching around the front that terminate in handles with activation buttons on them. When the user holds down an activation button, a complex series of mechanisms pumps water from the large tank in the backpack and releases it through the nozzles as powerful jets of steam, enabling the user to fly short distances. Tilting the handle adjusts the nozzles' angles, allowing the user to control the direction of their flight.

When active, the steamflight pack gives the user a fly Speed of 20 feet. It carries enough water for 20 minutes of operation and can be refilled in five minutes with a supply of normal water and a funnel.

Activate2 Interact

Effect You turn the steamflight pack on or off.

Steel Shield.name: 钢盾 Steel Shield
Steel Shield.description:
如同木盾，钢盾也有多种形状和尺寸。虽然比木盾昂贵，但也更加耐用。

硬度 HP BT
5 20 10

Stepping Stone Shot.name: Stepping Stone Shot
Stepping Stone Shot.description:
Ammunition round

Activate 1 envision, Interact

A series of small stone discs pressed into a single round make up this ammunition. When you fire an activated stepping stone shot, whether you hit or miss your target, the shot creates a series of supports in a line that creatures can walk on as if solid ground. The line can ascend or descend at a 45-degree angle. The discs support any amount of weight, but don't otherwise pose any sort of obstacle; creatures and attacks can move through them if they wish. They crumble to dust if anything attempts to move or otherwise manipulate them. A creature can use a two-action activity, which has the manipulate trait, to Stride up to its speed on the stones while causing them to crumble behind it. This ammunition does not work in firearms with the scatter trait.

The stones reach up to 100 feet, and they last up to the end of your next turn if no one collapses them. However, the line also can't extend beyond the maximum distance for a Strike from your firearm (usually six times the firearm's range increment).

Stepping Stone Shot (Greater).name: Stepping Stone Shot (Greater)
Stepping Stone Shot (Greater).description:
Ammunition round

Activate 1 envision, Interact

A series of small stone discs pressed into a single round make up this ammunition. When you fire an activated stepping stone shot, whether you hit or miss your target, the shot creates a series of supports in a line that creatures can walk on as if solid ground. The line can ascend or descend at a 45-degree angle. The discs support any amount of weight, but don't otherwise pose any sort of obstacle; creatures and attacks can move through them if they wish. They crumble to dust if anything attempts to move or otherwise manipulate them. A creature can use a two-action activity, which has the manipulate trait, to Stride up to its speed on the stones while causing them to crumble behind it. This ammunition does not work in firearms with the scatter trait.

The stones reach up to 250 feet, and they last up to 1 minute if no one collapses them. However, the line also can't extend beyond the maximum distance for a Strike from your firearm (usually six times the firearm's range increment).

Stiletto Pen.name: Stiletto Pen
Stiletto Pen.description: This weapon is a fully functional, lavish ink pen with a clip that can be attached to a pocket or bandoleer and easily retrieved as a free action. Using an action to Interact with the pen allows its wielder to disengage a stiletto blade that slides free of the upper body or reattach the previously removed blade.

Stole of Civility.name: Stole of Civility
Stole of Civility.description:
Woven from swaths of rich brocade silk and embroidered with ancient Azlanti script in golden thread, this stole imparts a noble appearance to even the homeliest of individuals when draped over the shoulders.

While wearing a stole of civility, you receive a +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to Make an Impression with humans or Make a Request of humans, and a +2 item bonus to Intimidation checks against humans.

The stole also grants you full understanding of the Azlanti language.

Activate A envision

Frequency once per day

Requirements you are a human

Effect You gain 10 temporary Hit Points, which last for 10 minutes.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.i0tm2ZHekp7rGGR3]{Effect: Stole of Civility}

Automatically applied effects:

  • a +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to Make an Impression with humans or Make a Request of humans
  • a +2 item bonus to Intimidation checks against humans.

Stone Body Mutagen (Greater).name: Stone Body Mutagen (Greater)
Stone Body Mutagen (Greater).description:
Activate A Interact

This mutagen calcifies your body making it as hard as stone.

Benefit You gain resistance 10 to physical damage (except bludgeoning).

Drawback Your speeds are reduced by 10 feet (minimum 5 feet) and you take a -2 penalty to Reflex saves.

Duration 1 hour.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.b9DTIJyBT8kvIBpj]{Effect: Stone Body Mutagen (Greater)}

Stone Body Mutagen (Lesser).name: Stone Body Mutagen (Lesser)
Stone Body Mutagen (Lesser).description:
Activate A Interact

This mutagen calcifies your body making it as hard as stone.

Benefit You gain resistance 5 to physical damage (except bludgeoning).

Drawback Your speeds are reduced by 10 feet (minimum 5 feet) and you take a -2 penalty to Reflex saves.

Duration 10 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.PEPOd38VfVzQMKG5]{Effect: Stone Body Mutagen (Lesser)}

Stone Body Mutagen (Moderate).name: Stone Body Mutagen (Moderate)
Stone Body Mutagen (Moderate).description:
Activate A Interact

This mutagen calcifies your body making it as hard as stone.

Benefit You gain resistance 5 to physical damage (except bludgeoning).

Drawback Your speeds are reduced by 10 feet (minimum 5 feet) and you take a -2 penalty to Reflex saves.

Duration 1 hour.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.1xHHvQlW4pRR89qj]{Effect: Stone Body Mutagen (Moderate)}

Stone Bullet.name: 石化弹丸 Stone Bullet
Stone Bullet.description:
启动 A 交互

这颗投石索弹丸像是惊恐的蛇眼。被启动的石化弹丸命中的生物同时受到一个6环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.znv4ECL7ZtuiagtA]{石化术 Flesh to Stone} 的效果（DC 34）。

制作条件： 提供一次石化术Flesh to Stone施法。

Stone Circle.name: Stone Circle
Stone Circle.description:
A stone circle appears to be a thumb-sized rectangular gray stone until activated.

Activate (1 minute) envision, Interact

Frequency once per week

Effect When the circle is stood on the ground and activated, the stone grows into a massive stone pillar 13 feet high, 7 feet across, and weighing 25 tons. Identical pillars rise up from the ground marking a circle 100 feet across, with capstones connecting the pillars. There must be enough space to deploy the circle or it won't activate. During the activation, you align the stone circle to face a single astronomical feature, such as the sun, the moon, or a constellation. You can revert the stone circle back to its original state by using an Interact action to push over the original stone pillar. Once you do, the rest of the stone circle collapses in a dramatic fashion, the stones falling, cracking, and disintegrating into dust. If you don't begin a ritual inside of the stone circle within 1 day of its activation, it reverts back to its original state.

When you cast a ritual of 5th level or lower within the stone circle, the first failure on a secondary check is improved by one degree of success (a critical failure becomes a failure and a failure becomes a success). Once you complete a ritual within the stone circle, regardless of the result, the stones collapse and it reverts back to its original form.

Stone Circle (Greater).name: Stone Circle (Greater)
Stone Circle (Greater).description:
A stone circle appears to be a thumb-sized rectangular gray stone until activated.

Activate (1 minute) envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect When the circle is stood on the ground and activated, the stone grows into a massive stone pillar 13 feet high, 7 feet across, and weighing 25 tons. Identical pillars rise up from the ground marking a circle 100 feet across, with capstones connecting the pillars. There must be enough space to deploy the circle or it won't activate. During the activation, you align the stone circle to face a single astronomical feature, such as the sun, the moon, or a constellation. You can revert the stone circle back to its original state by using an Interact action to push over the original stone pillar. Once you do, the rest of the stone circle collapses in a dramatic fashion, the stones falling, cracking, and disintegrating into dust. If you don't begin a ritual inside of the stone circle within 1 day of its activation, it reverts back to its original state.

When you cast any ritual within the stone circle, the secondary check with the worst degree of success is improved by one degree of success, even if that secondary check succeeded. Once you complete a ritual within the stone circle, regardless of the result, the stones collapse and it reverts back to its original form.

Stone Fist Elixir.name: 石拳灵药 Stone Fist Elixir
Stone Fist Elixir.description:
启动 A 交互 Interact

你的双拳变得如同石头一般坚硬。1小时内，你的拳头造成1d6点钝击伤害，并且失去非致命特征。

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.AMhUb42NAJ1aisZp]{效果：石拳灵药}

Stone of Weight.name: Stone of Weight
Stone of Weight.description: Also known as a loadstone, this small stone appears nonmagical and has a lovely sheen, giving the impression that it could be a valuable or a notable item or a magic stone of some kind. When you've carried the stone on your person for 1 minute, its curse activates: the stone's size does not change, but it suddenly increases in weight to 5 Bulk. This additional weight does not cause the stone to deal more damage if thrown or used as a weapon. It reappears in your possessions within 1 minute if you discard it, and can't be destroyed or thrown away permanently, or even placed in a container that would reduce or negate its Bulk (like a bag of holding), until it is subject to a remove curse spell or similar magic effect. Once the curse has activated for the first time, the stone fuses to you.

Stoneraiser Javelin.name: Stoneraiser Javelin
Stoneraiser Javelin.description:
This stone-headed +2 striking returning javelin draws forth the power of the earth itself to strike at enemies.

Activate A Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You hurl the stoneraiser javelin at an unoccupied space within 30 feet.

The javelin's power flows into the ground, which erupts in a 5-foot-radius burst of razor-sharp stalagmites. The stalagmites are 10 feet tall.

Everything on each side of the stalagmites has cover from creatures on the opposite side, and the stalagmites' spaces are difficult terrain. A creature takes [[/r 4d4]] piercing damage for every move action it takes that enters at least one of the affected spaces.

Each 5-foot-by-5-foot section has AC 10, Hardness 14, and 30 Hit Points. It's immune to critical hits and precision damage. A destroyed section can be moved through freely. The stalagmites crumble to dust after 1 minute.

Any creature in the area when the stalagmites appear is pushed to the nearest unoccupied space of its choice; this movement is forced movement. Pushed creatures must attempt a DC 28 Reflex saving throw or take [[/r 4d4]] piercing damage.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is knocked prone.

Stonethroat Ammunition.name: Stonethroat Ammunition
Stonethroat Ammunition.description:
Ammunition arrow, bolt

Activate 1 Interact

Each piece of stonethroat ammunition is tipped with an unusual yellow stone. When an activated piece of stonethroat ammunition hits a target, the target must attempt a DC 30 Fortitude save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The ammunition lodges itself loosely into the target's throat. For 1 round, the target takes a -2 status penalty to attack rolls with its jaws or fangs, and to Athletics checks.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.AJx8i8QX35vsG5Q4]{Effect: Stonethroat Ammunition (Success)}

Failure The ammunition embeds itself deep in the target's throat. The target can't use its jaws or fangs Strike (if it has one) or the Swallow Whole ability until the end of its next turn.

Critical Failure As failure, and the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} for 1 round.

Storm Arrow.name: 风暴箭 Storm Arrow
Storm Arrow.description:
启动 A 交互

这支箭的箭头是用闪烁着的铜制成的。当一支启动的风暴箭命中目标，目标会被狂风袭扰并受到能造成 [[/r 3d12]] 电击伤害的闪电矢的打击，另外目标还需要通过一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:25] 的反射豁免。

如果这支箭是由一把具有电击Shock性能符文的武器射出，则豁免DC提升至27，但本次攻击并不会从电击Shock性能符文本身得到好处。

大成功 目标不受影响

成功 目标承受一半的伤害，并不受狂风的影响

失败 目标承受完整的伤害，并受到狂风袭扰，在远程攻击骰中承受-2环境罚值并在飞行速度Speed中承受-10尺环境罚值，持续1轮。

大失败 如失败，但目标承受双倍的伤害。

Storm Chair.name: Storm Chair
Storm Chair.description:
This traveler's chair uses magic and Stasian technology, storing up power in its Stasian coils to arc lightning through your foes and grant brief spurts of flight.

Activate 2 Interact (electricity, evocation, magical)

Frequency Once per hour

Effect You create a ball of electricity around the chair, surrounding it in a damaging aura of electricity and using electromagnetism to briefly levitate. For 1 minute, you gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed and adjacent creatures that hit you with a melee attack, as well as creatures that touch or hit you with an unarmed attack, take [[/r 2d6 #electricity]] damage each time. As normal, this applies to creatures who choose to touch you, not when you touch or attack another creature.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.uC6KjfiWrTBXYtP8]{Effect: Storm Chair}

Storm Flash.name: 雷闪 Storm Flash
Storm Flash.description:
这把+2高等强击电击细剑有着金色的剑刃，在持握它时，细小的电弧会在护手到剑尖之前闪过。若在开阔天空下将其抽出剑鞘，这把剑会缓慢聚集来雨云。

启动 D 命令, 想象

频率 每天一次

效果 你施放6环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{闪电束 Lightning Bolt} DC33）。

启动 R 命令

频率 每10分钟一次

触发 一个电击效果的目标为你或目标为离你10尺内的一个生物，或你或离你10尺内的一个生物在一个电击效果的范围内；

效果 尝试将引离电击，用雷闪将其吸收。选择一个符合条件的生物进行保护并骰一次近战攻击骰，与电击效果DC比较。若你成功，被选生物不会因触发效果而受到电击伤害。

Storm Flash (Greater).name: 高等雷闪 Storm Flash (Greater)
Storm Flash (Greater).description:
这把+3高等强击高等电击细剑有着金色的剑刃，在持握它时，细小的电弧会在护手到剑尖之前闪过。若在开阔天空下将其抽出剑鞘，这把剑会缓慢聚集来雨云。

启动 D 命令, 想象

频率 每天一次

效果 你施放8环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{闪电束 Lightning Bolt}（DC38）。

启动 R 命令

频率 每10分钟一次

触发 一个电击效果的目标为你或目标为离你10尺内的一个生物，或你或离你10尺内的一个生物在一个电击效果的范围内；

效果 尝试将引离电击，用雷闪将其吸收。选择一个符合条件的生物进行保护并骰一次近战攻击骰，与电击效果DC比较。若你成功，被选生物不会因触发效果而受到电击伤害。

Storm Hammer.name: Storm Hammer
Storm Hammer.description:
Sparks of crackling electricity arc from this +1 magic warhammer, and the head thrums with distant thunder. Any hit with this hammer deals [[/r {1}[electricity]]]{1 extra electricity damage}. You can use a special action while holding the hammer to transform the sparks into lightning bolts.

Electrify A (concentrate) Until the end of your turn, the hammer deals [[/r {1d6}[electricity]]]{1d6 extra electricity damage} instead of just 1. After you use this action, you can't use it again for 10 minutes.

Stormbreaker Fulu.name: Stormbreaker Fulu
Stormbreaker Fulu.description:
Activate f command

Trigger You would be forced to move, you would be teleported, or you would take cold, electricity, or sonic damage.

This unassuming paper tag is inscribed with magical symbols. When you activate the fulu, it vanishes in a wisp of cloud, and you gain resistance 15 to cold, electricity, and sonic damage until the end of your next turn. For that duration, you ignore difficult terrain from wind and weather, and you can't be forcibly moved or teleported unless the effect counteracts the fulu (DC 40). These protections apply against the triggering effect.

Stormfeather.name: Stormfeather
Stormfeather.description:
Activate 1 Interact

Requirements You're an expert in Acrobatics.

Even while affixed, this electric blue feather sways lightly in the air, as if always accompanied by a breeze. When activated, the talisman casts fly on you, though the duration is 1 minute. You can Dismiss this activation. If you do, you're affected by @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{Feather Fall}.

Storyteller's Opus.name: Storyteller's Opus
Storyteller's Opus.description:
This green spellbook with gold trim contains a cautionary story about a boy who was eaten by a wolf after he previously lied about wolf attacks. When opened, the engravings on the front seem to move in a loop, enacting this story.

Activate r envision

Frequency once per day

Trigger A creature succeeds, but doesn't critically succeed, at a Perception check to disbelieve an illusion spell you prepared from this grimoire

Effect You quickly tell a fib to try to smooth over the inconsistencies in your illusion. Attempt a Deception check against the triggering creature's Perception DC. If you succeed, the creature doesn't disbelieve the illusion.

Striking.name: 强击 Striking
Striking.description:
强击符文为武器提供破坏性魔力，将武器伤害骰增加为2个替代初始的1个。例如，+1强击匕首造成2d4点伤害而非1d4。

你可以将武器上已蚀刻的强击符文升级为更强的版本，效果也会提升成新符文的数值。你必须有更强符文的配方才能如此做，且升级的价格是两枚符文之间价格的差额。

Striking (Greater).name: 高等强击 Striking (Greater)
Striking (Greater).description:
高等强击符文为武器提供破坏性魔力，将武器伤害骰增加为3个替代初始的1个。例如，+1强击匕首造成2d4点伤害而非1d4。

你可以将武器上已蚀刻的强击符文升级为更强的版本，效果也会提升成新符文的数值。你必须有更强符文的配方才能如此做，且升级的价格是两枚符文之间价格的差额。

Striking (Major).name: 上等强击 Striking (Major)
Striking (Major).description:
上等强击符文为武器提供破坏性魔力，将武器伤害骰增加为4个替代初始的1个。例如，+1强击匕首造成2d4点伤害而非1d4。

你可以将武器上已蚀刻的强击符文升级为更强的版本，效果也会提升成新符文的数值。你必须有更强符文的配方才能如此做，且升级的价格是两枚符文之间价格的差额。

Striking Snare.name: 打击圈套 Striking Snare
Striking Snare.description: 你将绊绳或其他触发器附着到一组石头或木刺上，以对进入圈套格内的生物进行攻击。生物必须进行一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:26|basic:true] 豁免。如果你选择石头，圈套造成9d8点钝击伤害；如果你选择木刺，造成9d8点穿刺伤害。

Studded Leather Armor.name: 镶嵌皮甲 Studded Leather Armor
Studded Leather Armor.description: 这种皮甲用金属铆钉加固，有时也用小金属板加固，使皮甲保留大部分的柔韧性的同时得到更有力的保护。

Stunning Snare.name: 震撼圈套 Stunning Snare
Stunning Snare.description:
这个圈套会突然发动猛击以击晕一个生物，令它难以进一步保护自己。这个陷阱对第一个进入方格的生物造成6d6点钝击伤害；该生物必须进行一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:31] 豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响

成功 该生物承受一半的伤害，并陷入持续1轮的措手不及Flat-footed以及震慑Stunned 1

失败 该生物承受完整的伤害，并陷入持续1轮的措手不及Flat-footed以及震慑Stunned 2

大失败 该生物承受两倍伤害，并陷入持续1分钟的措手不及Flat-footed以及震慑Stunned 4

Stupor Poison.name: Stupor Poison
Stupor Poison.description:
Activate 2 Interact

Stupor poison is a more potent distillation of @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zo0ophqfKunJFxZN]{Lethargy Poison}. Further exposure to stupor poison doesn't require the target to attempt additional saving throws; only failing a saving throw against an ongoing exposure can progress its stage.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20]

Maximum Duration 6 hours

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} and flat-footed (1 round)

Stage 3 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} with no Perception check to wake up (1 round)

Stage 4 unconscious with no Perception check to wake up ([[/r 1d6 #hours]]{1d6 hours})

Sturdy Satchel.name: Sturdy Satchel
Sturdy Satchel.description:
This heavy backpack of alchemically treated cloth layered over a metal mesh protects its contents from water damage and other harmful effects.

It holds up to 4 Bulk of items, and the first 2 Bulk contained within the sturdy satchel do not count against your Bulk limits.

The bag has Hardness 5 and 20 Hit Points. As long as the bag remains closed and is not broken, water and other liquids can't seep into it.

Sturdy Shield (Greater).name: 高等百炼盾 Sturdy Shield (Greater)
Sturdy Shield (Greater).description:
通过特别的设计和精良的手艺，这种铁盾比非魔法版有着更高的硬度，让其更难被击破和摧毁。

该盾牌拥有硬度15，HP120，BT60。

Sturdy Shield (Lesser).name: 次等百炼盾 Sturdy Shield (Lesser)
Sturdy Shield (Lesser).description:
通过特别的设计和精良的手艺，这种铁盾比非魔法版有着更高的硬度，让其更难被击破和摧毁。

该盾牌拥有硬度10，HP80，BT40。

Sturdy Shield (Major).name: 上等百炼盾 Sturdy Shield (Major)
Sturdy Shield (Major).description:
通过特别的设计和精良的手艺，这种铁盾比非魔法版有着更高的硬度，让其更难被击破和摧毁。

该盾牌拥有硬度17，HP136，BT68。

Sturdy Shield (Minor).name: 下等百炼盾 Sturdy Shield (Minor)
Sturdy Shield (Minor).description:
通过特别的设计和精良的手艺，这种铁盾比非魔法版有着更高的硬度，让其更难被击破和摧毁。

该盾牌拥有硬度8，HP64，BT32。

Sturdy Shield (Moderate).name: 中等百炼盾 Sturdy Shield (Moderate)
Sturdy Shield (Moderate).description:
通过特别的设计和精良的手艺，这种铁盾比非魔法版有着更高的硬度，让其更难被击破和摧毁。

该盾牌拥有硬度13，HP104，BT52。

Sturdy Shield (Supreme).name: 超等百炼盾 Sturdy Shield (Supreme)
Sturdy Shield (Supreme).description:
通过特别的设计和精良的手艺，这种铁盾比非魔法版有着更高的硬度，让其更难被击破和摧毁。

该盾牌拥有硬度20，HP160，BT80。

Succubus Kiss.name: Succubus Kiss
Succubus Kiss.description:
Activate 1 Interact

The save for addiction to succubus kiss is @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|name:Succubus Kiss Addiction|traits:virulent|showDC:owner], and the addiction has the virulent trait.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24|showDC:owner]

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 8 hours

Stage 1 +2 item bonus to initiative checks (10 minutes) and to all saving throws against emotion and mental effects

Stage 2 as stage 1 plus @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 hour)

Stage 3 as stage 2 plus blindness or deafness (1 hour)

Stage 4 blindness and deafness (1 hour)

Stage 5 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}

Sulfur Bomb (Greater).name: Sulfur Bomb (Greater)
Sulfur Bomb (Greater).description:
Activate 1 Strike

A thick, sulfurous, irritating gas fills this golden‑yellow flask. You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals [[/r {3d4}[acid]]]{3d4 acid damage} and [[/r {3}[acid]]]{3 acid damage}. On a hit, the target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and attack rolls until the end of its next turn, or becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} on a critical hit. Creatures hit with this bomb are temporarily immune to the effects of the bomb for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.fuQVJiPPUsvL6fi5]{Effect: Sulfur Bomb (Failure)}

Sulfur Bomb (Lesser).name: Sulfur Bomb (Lesser)
Sulfur Bomb (Lesser).description:
Activate 1 Strike

A thick, sulfurous, irritating gas fills this golden‑yellow flask. The bomb deals [[/r {1d4}[acid]]]{1d4 acid damage} and [[/r {1}[acid]]]{1 acid damage}. On a hit, the target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and attack rolls until the end of its next turn, or becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} on a critical hit. Creatures hit with this bomb are temporarily immune to the effects of the bomb for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.fuQVJiPPUsvL6fi5]{Effect: Sulfur Bomb (Failure)}

Sulfur Bomb (Major).name: Sulfur Bomb (Major)
Sulfur Bomb (Major).description:
Activate 1 Strike

A thick, sulfurous, irritating gas fills this golden‑yellow flask. You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals [[/r {4d4}[acid]]]{4d4 acid damage} and [[/r {4}[acid]]]{4 acid damage}. On a hit, the target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and attack rolls until the end of its next turn, or becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} on a critical hit. Creatures hit with this bomb are temporarily immune to the effects of the bomb for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.fuQVJiPPUsvL6fi5]{Effect: Sulfur Bomb (Failure)}

Sulfur Bomb (Moderate).name: Sulfur Bomb (Moderate)
Sulfur Bomb (Moderate).description:
Activate 1 Strike

A thick, sulfurous, irritating gas fills this golden‑yellow flask. You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals [[/r {2d4}[acid]]]{2d4 acid damage} and [[/r {2}[acid]]]{2 acid damage}. On a hit, the target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and attack rolls until the end of its next turn, or becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} on a critical hit. Creatures hit with this bomb are temporarily immune to the effects of the bomb for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.fuQVJiPPUsvL6fi5]{Effect: Sulfur Bomb (Failure)}

Summoning Handscroll.name: Summoning Handscroll
Summoning Handscroll.description:
Classic summoning circles are engraved into the batons of this massive papyrus scroll.

Activate f envision (metamagic)

Frequency once per day

Effect If your next action is to cast a conjuration spell prepared from this spellbook that summons one or more creatures, you infuse one of the summoned creatures with the spell's energies, causing it to arrive with 10 temporary Hit Points that last for up to 1 minute.

Sun Orchid Elixir.name: Sun Orchid Elixir
Sun Orchid Elixir.description:
Activate A Interact

When you drink this elixir, you physically become as you were in whatever phase of your youth you desire. Your new body begins in peak health, regardless of what your actual condition was at that age. Any physical or mental imperfections- including scars, lost limbs, and curses, diseases, poisons of 20th level or lower- are removed, and you regain your full Hit Points. You immediately begin to age normally again, with your natural lifespan extended as if you had never aged past your new apparent age. You retain all your memories.

Unlike Crafting most items, brewing the sun orchid elixir takes 1 month's time. While an individual vial of sun orchid elixir isn't unique, the formula is unique, and it's known only to Artokus Kirran of Thuvia.

Sun Orchid Poultice.name: Sun Orchid Poultice
Sun Orchid Poultice.description:
Activate 1 Interact

The process of creating the sun orchid elixir leaves behind a large amount of thick paste with its own healing properties. Artokus commonly sells this paste to Thuvian natives who can't purchase the elixir proper and uses the income to support his alchemy students.

When you apply the sun orchid poultice, it reduces your clumsy, drained, and enfeebled condition values by 2.

In addition, the poultice provides a youthful burst of energy, granting you a +3 item bonus to saves and 20 temporary Hit Points for 1 hour.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.kwOtHtmlH69ctK0O]{Effect: Sun Orchid Poultice}

Sun Shot.name: Sun Shot
