Sun Shot.description: Sun slings use small metal bullets covered in sharp spikes known as sun shots. A bundle of 10 sun shots has light bulk and costs 1 sp.

Sun Sling.name: Sun Sling
Sun Sling.description:
A sun sling is a small staff with a head of woven netting. The staff is small enough to hold in a single hand, making it useful for hit-and-run tactics, but once loaded with ammunition, it requires two hands to properly swing and fire. This is a martial ranged weapon.

Sun slings use small metal bullets covered in sharp spikes known as @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.DKsfWwWZ23PHPIa1]{Sun Shots}. A bundle of 10 sun shots has light bulk and costs 1 sp.

Sun Wheel.name: Sun Wheel
Sun Wheel.description:
Created by the priests of a Qadiran sect of Sarenites, the sun wheels were designed to protect the Dawnflower's followers in their quest to hunt down a dangerous cult trying to raise a spawn of the evil god Rovagug. Once they completed their crusade, these priests disbanded and went on to minister other congregations. They each took their sun wheels with them, handing them down to the next generations.

This copper medallion is etched with a stylized sun, its rays shaped like the spokes of a wagon wheel. It tends to glint brightly when exposed to sunlight. While wearing this pendant, you gain a +1 item bonus to Religion checks. You must be good-aligned to use the sun wheel's true power: the following activation, which provides you a shield of burning force.

Activate A Concentrate

The sun wheel casts a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield} spell benefiting you.

When you use the spell to prevent damage, you prevent 10 damage instead of 5. If the attacker is adjacent to you, you can choose to deal [[/roll 2d6]] fire damage to it, which it gets a @Check[type:reflex|dc:21|basic:true|traits:consumable,talisman] save to resist.

If you choose to deal the fire damage, you can't Activate the sun wheel again until the next morning. If you prevent damage but don't deal the fire damage, you can use it again in 10 minutes, as normal for shield

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Religion checks

Sunken Pistol.name: Sunken Pistol
Sunken Pistol.description:
Perception +12; precise vision 30 feet, imprecise hearing 30 feet

Communication speech (Common) Skills Intimidation +19, Navigation Lore +14, Sailing Lore +14

Int +0, Wis +2, Cha +4

Will +16

A sunken pistol is imbued with the unfulfilled desires and insatiable greed of its previous wielder, a notorious pirate drowned at sea. Once a beautiful and artistically wrought weapon, a sunken pistol is coated in a fine layer of dried salt and encrusted with barnacles. Each shot fired from this +1 striking dragon mouth pistol is now coated in a layer of salty ectoplasm and has the effects of a ghost touch rune. You can shoot the sunken pistol underwater, even when using black powder ammunition.

A sunken pistol urges you to amass a horde of treasure even a dragon would be proud of. The methods used to acquire these riches matter not to the greedy pirate pistol, so long as you amass and hoard excessive wealth. Above all else, a sunken pistol desires the return of its own treasure, which might rest in the wreck of its sunken ship's hold or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} on a dangerous island.

In pursuit of treasure, a sunken pistol offers nautical and navigation advice to you, though it refuses such aid during less lucrative ventures. If you prove a profitable partner, the sunken pistol aids you in combat by Demoralizing your opponents (see the first Activation below). If you prove charitable or unwilling to retrieve its treasure, the sunken pistol turns its ire on you, Demoralizing you during combat until you relent. If you repeatedly refuse the sunken pistol, it would be wise to not accept water breathing from it, as it might attempt to drown you to allow a more suitable wielder to acquire it from your corpse. The sunken pistol can use the following activations.

Activate 1 command

Frequency once per minute

Effect The sunken pistol curses and insults a creature it can see, attempting an Intimidation check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} that creature.

Activate 3 command

Frequency once per day

Effect The sunken pistol casts water breathing on you as a 3rd-level arcane spell. The sunken pistol can Dismiss this spell, so be sure to keep the gun happy if you're relying on its good graces to breathe!

Sunrod.name: 日光杖 Sunrod
Sunrod.description:
启动 A 交互 Interact

这个1尺长，顶端镶金的短杖会在撞击坚硬表面后发光。在接下来的6个小时里，它会在半径20尺的范围内散发出明亮光线（bright light）（并在范围之外的40尺散发出昏暗光线（dim light））。

Support.name: Support
Support.description: Supports, also commonly known as braces, can be applied to any of the following major joints: wrist, elbow, knee, and ankle. They typically strap around the desired area and provide not only support but warmth that soothes aches and pains. You can still use your limb or joint even if you're not wearing your support, but you might feel aches and pains that are worse than usual and may manifest into physical symptoms.

Survey Map.name: 导航地图 Survey Map
Survey Map.description:
导航地图并不常见。您可以使用的大多数地图都很简单且功能齐全。而导航地图则详细列出了具体的位置。

如果检定与得到地图上详细说明的位置相关，一张这样的地图会为您在生存（Survival）检定以及回忆知识（Recall Knowledge）的任何技能检定上提供+1物品加值。

GM有权力决定在任何地点能够提供哪些地图。

自动生效:

  • 地图区域生存检定+1物品加值
  • 地图区域的回忆知识检定+1物品加值

Survey Map (Atlas).name: 导航地图(地图集) Survey Map (Atlas)
Survey Map (Atlas).description:
导航地图并不常见。您可以使用的大多数地图都很简单且功能齐全。而导航地图则详细列出了具体的位置。

如果检定与得到地图上详细说明的位置相关，一张这样的地图会为您在生存（Survival）检定以及回忆知识（Recall Knowledge）的任何技能检定上提供+1物品加值。

地图有时会出现在地图集中，其中包含许多相同质量的地图，并且通常是类似的主题。阅读地图集的时间是单张地图的五倍，并且需要双手使用。

GM有权力决定在任何地点能够提供哪些地图。

自动生效:

  • 地图区域生存检定+1物品加值
  • 地图区域的回忆知识检定+1物品加值

Swamp Lily Quilt.name: Swamp Lily Quilt
Swamp Lily Quilt.description:
Activate 2 Interact

This quilt is defined by its green lily-pad pattern, which is rare in Bellflower communications. The quilt is 10 feet square and infused with a reagent that activates when the quilt is laid out across soil or earth. One round after you lay out the quilt, the ground beneath it becomes soft and muddy, creating difficult terrain in the area where the quilt was. You can leave the quilt to maintain the difficult terrain indefinitely, but the affected ground begins to dry once you remove the quilt with an Interact action. The ground dries over the span of 1 hour, after which the ground returns to normal terrain. Placing the quilt on the ground uses up its infused reagents, and it becomes an ordinary quilt once removed from the ground.

Swarmeater's Clasp.name: Swarmeater's Clasp
Swarmeater's Clasp.description:
These small brooches usually feature carved reliefs of verminous, swarming creatures. When you wear the clasp, you gain resistance 10 to physical damage from swarm creatures.

Activate2 Interact, manipulate

Frequency once per day

Requirements a swarm creature is within your reach

Effect You thrust your hand into the swarm, draw forth a squirming mass of vermin, and devour it. You recover [[/r 3d10+8]] Hit Points and deal the same amount of bludgeoning damage to the swarm. The Hit Point recovery is a positive healing effect.

Swarmform Collar.name: Swarmform Collar
Swarmform Collar.description:
This sturdy leather collar is imprinted with tessellated animal shapes. When invested, the animal shapes change to match that of your companion.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You touch the collar and your companion splits into a swarm of hundreds of identical Tiny versions of itself for 1 minute. Its space becomes Large, it gains the weaknesses and resistances of a @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.KpxhSWRIhG7ns5NA]{Spider Swarm}, and the swarm trait, though it doesn't gain swarm mind, as it's controlled by a single mind. Its unarmed attacks are replaced with a single-action swarming attack that deals 1d8 damage of the type normally inflicted by the companion's unarmed attacks to any foe in its space, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:23|basic:true|name:Swarm Attack|showDC:all] save. While in swarm form, your companion can take the Support action but can't perform its advanced maneuver. Its other statistics don't change. If the companion is reduced to 0 Hit Points while in swarm form, the companion immediately recombines into its original form in an available space, in addition to the usual effects of being reduced to 0 Hit Points.

Swarmsuit.name: Swarmsuit
Swarmsuit.description: These thick, overlapping layers of clothing are coupled with a matching hat, outfitted with mesh netting around its wide brim to keep you safe from insects. You gain resistance 3 to physical damage from swarms. Explorer's clothing altered in this way has a Dexterity cap of +2, check penalty of -1, and Speed penalty of -5 feet regardless of your Strength.

Swarmsuit (Impenetrable).name: Swarmsuit (Impenetrable)
Swarmsuit (Impenetrable).description: An impenetrable swarmsuit is made of expensive, finely crafted mesh designed to completely prevent swarms from getting inside. You gain resistance 10 to physical damage from swarms. Explorer's clothing altered in this way has a Dexterity cap of +2, check penalty of -1, and Speed penalty of -5 feet regardless of your Strength.

Swift Block Cabochon.name: 疾盾宝石 Swift Block Cabochon
Swift Block Cabochon.description:
启动 F 想象

触发 你在未举起附着的盾牌时承受了一次物理攻击伤害

这颗透明石英制成的凸圆形宝石附着在盾牌的中央位置。

当你启动这颗宝石，你可以使用盾牌格挡Shield Block反应，即使你未举起附着的盾牌（甚至即使在你正常情况下没有这个反应也能使用）。

Swim Fins.name: Swim Fins
Swim Fins.description: These flippers attach to your feet like tight shoes-donning or removing them requires three Interact actions. While worn, you gain a +5-foot item bonus to the distance you move when rolling Athletics to Swim, not when using a swim Speed, and you take a -10-foot item penalty to your Speed.

Sword Cane.name: Sword Cane
Sword Cane.description: This slender, rapier-like sword is concealed within a wooden or metal cane that serves as a sheath, making it an inconspicuous weapon easy to slip past inspections or into high-society events. A sword cane is typically 4 feet long when sheathed, and its hilt is usually capped with a wooden or metal decoration.

Sylvan Wineskin.name: Sylvan Wineskin
Sylvan Wineskin.description:
A satyr's wineskin magically enchants any alcohol inside.

With an Interact action, a living creature can imbibe the alcohol and gain a +1 item bonus to Will saves and a +3 item bonus to Will saves against fear effects for the following hour. When the wineskin is removed from a satyr's person, the magic remains only until the wine spoils. The wineskin holds up to eight drafts of wine.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.ImgHXPEbN1mPyNTu]{Effect: Sylvan Wine}

Tack.name: 鞍子 Tack
Tack.description: 鞍子包括配备骑乘动物所需的所有装备，包括座鞍、嚼头和缰绳，以及必要时的脚镫。特别指出的是大型或奇形怪状的动物可能需要特殊的鞍子。根据GM的裁定，这些可能更昂贵或难以找到。给出的负载值是佩戴时的负载。如果你要携带它，负载增加到2B。

Talisman Cord.name: Talisman Cord
Talisman Cord.description:
This thin leather cord bears delicate runic markings and threads through an item that can bear affixed talismans.

When you Affix a Talisman to that item, you can thread the talisman onto the cord, activating the cord's preserving effects. The cord is attuned to two particular schools of magic, chosen when the cord was created. It gains the corresponding trait for that school. When you activate a talisman threaded through a cord with the same magic school trait that's also the cord's level or lower, attempt a DC 16 flat check. On a success, that talisman is not consumed and can be used again.

Talisman Cord (Greater).name: Talisman Cord (Greater)
Talisman Cord (Greater).description:
This thin leather cord bears delicate runic markings and threads through an item that can bear affixed talismans.

When you Affix a Talisman to that item, you can thread the talisman onto the cord, activating the cord's preserving effects. The cord is attuned to three particular schools of magic, chosen when the cord was created. It gains the corresponding trait for that school. When you activate a talisman threaded through a cord with the same magic school trait that's also the cord's level or lower, attempt a DC 16 flat check. On a success, that talisman is not consumed and can be used again.

Talisman Cord (Lesser).name: Talisman Cord (Lesser)
Talisman Cord (Lesser).description:
This thin leather cord bears delicate runic markings and threads through an item that can bear affixed talismans.

When you Affix a Talisman to that item, you can thread the talisman onto the cord, activating the cord's preserving effects. The cord is attuned to a particular school of magic, chosen when the cord was created. It gains the corresponding trait for that school. When you activate a talisman threaded through a cord with the same magic school trait that's also the cord's level or lower, attempt a DC 16 flat check. On a success, that talisman is not consumed and can be used again.

Talisman of the Sphere.name: Talisman of the Sphere
Talisman of the Sphere.description:
This loop of adamantine can be slung on a chain to be worn as a necklace, but must be held to convey its benefits. A creature that can't cast either arcane or occult spells takes 8d6 mental damage just from picking up the item, and they take that damage again at the start of each of their turns if they continue to hold it.

If the wielder can cast arcane or occult spells, they can use the talisman of the sphere to more easily control a sphere of annihilation. This reduces the DC of the check to control the sphere or Sustain the Activation by 10.

Destruction The talisman of the sphere is destroyed if touched by a sphere of annihilation.

Taljjae's Mask (The Beast).name: Taljjae's Mask (The Beast)
Taljjae's Mask (The Beast).description:
Those who gain one of Taljjae's masks, either by defeating Taljjae or some other means, are known as its understudies and gain a fraction of its power. Each of Taljjae's masks is an 18th-level unique item with the invested and magical traits; if broken, they're automatically repaired to full HP when invested during daily preparations. The effect of a mask on a PC is noted in the mask's Understudy entry. Wearing one of Taljjae's masks also imposes Taljjae's jelly sense and jelly gluttony on the creature as long as it wears the mask.

The Beast brings out its wearer's feral nature, granting it a claw melee unarmed attack that deals 1d4 slashing damage and has the agile trait, or increasing the damage die of their claw unarmed attack from 1d4 to 1d6 damage if they have a claw unarmed attack that deals 1d4 damage.

Taljjae's Mask (The General).name: Taljjae's Mask (The General)
Taljjae's Mask (The General).description:
Those who gain one of Taljjae's masks, either by defeating Taljjae or some other means, are known as its understudies and gain a fraction of its power. Each of Taljjae's masks is an 18th-level unique item with the invested and magical traits; if broken, they're automatically repaired to full HP when invested during daily preparations. The effect of a mask on a PC is noted in the mask's Understudy entry. Wearing one of Taljjae's masks also imposes Taljjae's jelly sense and jelly gluttony on the creature as long as it wears the mask.

Activate 1

Frequency once per day

Effect The General grants its wearer a +3 status bonus to attack rolls with polearms for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.X2ZZgTqanpoCMDmd]{Effect: Taljjae's Mask (The General)}

Taljjae's Mask (The Grandmother).name: Taljjae's Mask (The Grandmother)
Taljjae's Mask (The Grandmother).description:
Those who gain one of Taljjae's masks, either by defeating Taljjae or some other means, are known as its understudies and gain a fraction of its power. Each of Taljjae's masks is an 18th-level unique item with the invested and magical traits; if broken, they're automatically repaired to full HP when invested during daily preparations. The effect of a mask on a PC is noted in the mask's Understudy entry. Wearing one of Taljjae's masks also imposes Taljjae's jelly sense and jelly gluttony on the creature as long as it wears the mask.

The Grandmother allows its wearer to cast 8th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} and 7th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Hnc7eGi7vyZenAIm]{Breath of Life}, each as a divine innate spell, once per day.

Taljjae's Mask (The Hermit).name: Taljjae's Mask (The Hermit)
Taljjae's Mask (The Hermit).description:
Those who gain one of Taljjae's masks, either by defeating Taljjae or some other means, are known as its understudies and gain a fraction of its power. Each of Taljjae's masks is an 18th-level unique item with the invested and magical traits; if broken, they're automatically repaired to full HP when invested during daily preparations. The effect of a mask on a PC is noted in the mask's Understudy entry. Wearing one of Taljjae's masks also imposes Taljjae's jelly sense and jelly gluttony on the creature as long as it wears the mask.

The Hermit allows its wearer to cast 8th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.PHVHBbdHeQRfjLmE]{Spirit Blast} and 7th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.E3X2RbzWHCdz7gsk]{Flame Strike}, each as a divine innate spell, once per day.

Taljjae's Mask (The Hero).name: Taljjae's Mask (The Hero)
Taljjae's Mask (The Hero).description:
Those who gain one of Taljjae's masks, either by defeating Taljjae or some other means, are known as its understudies and gain a fraction of its power. Each of Taljjae's masks is an 18th-level unique item with the invested and magical traits; if broken, they're automatically repaired to full HP when invested during daily preparations. The effect of a mask on a PC is noted in the mask's Understudy entry. Wearing one of Taljjae's masks also imposes Taljjae's jelly sense and jelly gluttony on the creature as long as it wears the mask.

Activate 1

Frequency once per day;

Effect The Hero grants its wearer a +3 status bonus to attack rolls with bows for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.fYe48HmFgfmcqbvL]{Effect: Taljjae's Mask (The Hero)}

Taljjae's Mask (The Nobleman).name: Taljjae's Mask (The Nobleman)
Taljjae's Mask (The Nobleman).description:
Those who gain one of Taljjae's masks, either by defeating Taljjae or some other means, are known as its understudies and gain a fraction of its power. Each of Taljjae's masks is an 18th-level unique item with the invested and magical traits; if broken, they're automatically repaired to full HP when invested during daily preparations. The effect of a mask on a PC is noted in the mask's Understudy entry. Wearing one of Taljjae's masks also imposes Taljjae's jelly sense and jelly gluttony on the creature as long as it wears the mask.

Activate 2

Frequency once per 10 minutes

Effect You hold out a hand and attempt to take something that doesn't belong to you. You telekinetically attracts an unattended, unsecured object of up to 5 Bulk within 100 feet. If the object is in a creature's possession, you must critically succeed at an attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} that creature, but you can't critically fail.

Taljjae's Mask (The Wanderer).name: Taljjae's Mask (The Wanderer)
Taljjae's Mask (The Wanderer).description:
Those who gain one of Taljjae's masks, either by defeating Taljjae or some other means, are known as its understudies and gain a fraction of its power. Each of Taljjae's masks is an 18th-level unique item with the invested and magical traits; if broken, they're automatically repaired to full HP when invested during daily preparations. The effect of a mask on a PC is noted in the mask's Understudy entry. Wearing one of Taljjae's masks also imposes Taljjae's jelly sense and jelly gluttony on the creature as long as it wears the mask.

The Wanderer allows its wearer to cast 7th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.b5sGjGlBf58f8jn0]{Air Walk} and 8th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Freedom of Movement}, each as a divine innate spell, once per day.

Tamchal Chakram.name: Tamchal Chakram
Tamchal Chakram.description: These circular weapons are among the many strange weapons used by urdefhans. The sharp metal circle contains numerous protruding blades, while an angled central handle provides a decent grip that spins the weapon as it's thrown.

Tanglefoot Bag (Greater).name: 高等绊足包 Tanglefoot Bag (Greater)
Tanglefoot Bag (Greater).description:
绊足包里装满了黏性物质。你在攻击骰上获得+2的物品加值。当你用绊足包命中一名生物时，目标承受-15尺的减值，逃脱的DC为28。

一旦攻击造成重击，与固体表面接触的目标生物将会被定在表面上并陷入持续1分钟的 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} 状态，如果是通过翅膀飞行的生物则会被缠住翅膀，导致它安全地落在地上并且1轮内不能再度起飞。绊足包对那些身处水中的生物没有效果。

目标能够通过逃脱（Escaping）或花费3个交互（Interact）动作来小心地移除黏性物质，从而结束绊足包的效果。这些交互动作不必是连续的，其他生物也能提供这些交互动作。

Tanglefoot Bag (Lesser).name: 次等绊足包 Tanglefoot Bag (Lesser)
Tanglefoot Bag (Lesser).description:
绊足包里装满了黏性物质。当你用绊足包命中一名生物时，目标承受-10尺的减值，逃脱（Escape）的DC为17。

一旦攻击造成重击，与固体表面接触的目标生物将会被定在表面上并陷入持续1分钟的 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} 状态，如果是通过翅膀飞行的生物则会被缠住翅膀，导致它安全地落在地上并且1轮内不能再度起飞。绊足包对那些身处水中的生物没有效果。

目标能够通过逃脱（Escaping）或花费3个交互（Interact）动作来小心地移除黏性物质，从而结束绊足包的效果。这些交互动作不必是连续的，其他生物也能提供这些交互动作。

Tanglefoot Bag (Major).name: 上等绊足包 Tanglefoot Bag (Major)
Tanglefoot Bag (Major).description:
绊足包里装满了黏性物质。你在攻击骰上获得+3的物品加值。当你用绊足包命中一名生物时，目标承受-20尺的减值，逃脱的DC为37。

一旦攻击造成重击，与固体表面接触的目标生物将会被定在表面上并陷入持续1分钟的 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} 状态，如果是通过翅膀飞行的生物则会被缠住翅膀，导致它安全地落在地上并且1轮内不能再度起飞。绊足包对那些身处水中的生物没有效果。

目标能够通过逃脱（Escaping）或花费3个交互（Interact）动作来小心地移除黏性物质，从而结束绊足包的效果。这些交互动作不必是连续的，其他生物也能提供这些交互动作。

Tanglefoot Bag (Moderate).name: 中等绊足包 Tanglefoot Bag (Moderate)
Tanglefoot Bag (Moderate).description:
绊足包里装满了黏性物质。你在攻击骰上获得+1的物品加值。当你用绊足包命中一名生物时，目标承受-15尺的减值，逃脱的DC为19。

一旦攻击造成重击，与固体表面接触的目标生物将会被定在表面上并陷入持续1分钟的 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} 状态，如果是通过翅膀飞行的生物则会被缠住翅膀，导致它安全地落在地上并且1轮内不能再度起飞。绊足包对那些身处水中的生物没有效果。

目标能够通过逃脱（Escaping）或花费3个交互（Interact）动作来小心地移除黏性物质，从而结束绊足包的效果。这些交互动作不必是连续的，其他生物也能提供这些交互动作。

Tar Rocket Snare.name: Tar Rocket Snare
Tar Rocket Snare.description:
You coat a small firework with a thick layer of resin and tar, so it sticks firmly onto a target. When a creature enters the square, the rocket launches at the creature and potentially sticks to it. You determine the direction the rocket faces when crafting the snare. The triggering creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:20|traits:uncommon|showDC:all] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is dealt a glancing blow by the rocket and becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until the start of its next turn.

Failure The rocket's coating of tar and resin sticks to the creature, and it can't be shaken loose. The creature becomes flat-footed for 1 round, and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 minute or until it Escapes (DC 20).

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature takes a direct hit. It takes [[/r {2d6}[bludgeoning]]]{2d6 bludgeoning damage} and is pushed 10 feet in the direction the rocket faces.

Taw Launcher.name: Taw Launcher
Taw Launcher.description: Designed by conrasu warriors, this complex device is a crossbow and fires small wooden bullets known as taws. A system of blades within the launcher can rapidly reshape a taw as it's loaded, allowing the launcher to fire taws of different shapes, such as fléchettes.

Tear-Away Clothing.name: Tear-Away Clothing
Tear-Away Clothing.description:
Usage modifies existing clothing.

Performers and criminals are both known to use disposable clothing designed to be torn off the body quickly and easily. This garment is loose enough to be worn over another outfit, including light armor. You can remove tear-away clothing with an Interact action. The price for tear-away clothing is to modify an existing outfit. If purchasing a new outfit, add the tear-away clothing's price to the outfit to modify it as part of the purchase.

Tears of Death.name: 死之泪 Tears of Death
Tears of Death.description:
死之泪是最强大的炼金毒素之一，使用其他五种致命毒素以正确的比例蒸馏而成。

启动 A 交互 (接触)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:46]

潜伏期 1 分钟

最大持续时间 10 分钟

阶段 1 [[/r {18d6}[poison]]]{18d6 毒素伤害} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} (1 轮)

阶段 2 [[/r {25d6}[poison]]]{25d6 毒素伤害} 和 麻痹paralyzed (1 分钟)

阶段 3 [[/r {30d6}[poison]]]{30d6 毒素伤害} 和 麻痹paralyzed (1 分钟)

Tears of the Last Azlanti.name: Tears of the Last Azlanti
Tears of the Last Azlanti.description:
This gold necklace sports six bails, each with a different aeon stone. The backside of each bail is engraved with a single ancient Azlanti rune: Patience, Remembrance, Resilience, Tenacity, Wisdom, Invention.

While a bail is active, you recall pieces of childhood memories, brief stories and lessons spoken to you by Aroden. The knowledge imparted by each bail carries a specific power but also allows you to access the invested and resonant powers of theaeon stonein the active bail's slot as though the stone orbited your head. Each day at dawn, a new bail becomes active; roll 1d6 to determine which bail is active, determined by the table below. Only one bail can be active at any time.

Once per day, you can attempt to exchange the aeon stone in a given bail for another aeon stone with a successful DC 35 Arcana check.

1D6 Bail Default Aeon Stone
1 Patience Gold nodule
Active Power Telepathy with a range of 100 feet
2 Rememberance Tourmaline sphere
Active Power Cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ZYoC630tNGutgbE0]{Hypercognition} at will
3 Resilience Clear spindle
Active Power Worn armor gains the antimagic property rune
4 Tenacity Pink rhomboid
Active Power Wielded weapons gain the vorpal property rune
5 Wisdom Orange prism
Active Power Skill checks for downtime activities or to Recall Knowledge are one degree of success higher
6 Invention Lavender and green ellipsoid
Active Power You can craft items up to 5 levels higher than your actual level

Destruction The memories and lessons that echo through the Tears of the Last Azlanti give clues about steps needed to destroy the artifact. After you have gained the power of each of the six aeon stones at least once, you are granted visions of six locations across Golarion. At each of these locations, you must replace one of the necklace's aeon stones with a dull gray aeon stone. Once the final stone is replaced, the powers of the necklace are drawn into its new stones. These stones become pieces of throneglass, and the chain and bails disintegrate.

Tekko-kagi.name: Tekko-kagi
Tekko-kagi.description: Four curved blades attached to a sturdy handlebar give the wielder of this close-combat weapon the illusion of having claws that extend from their fist. Adherents of @Compendium[pf2e.deities.zRmAXj7FSlrMfDeA]{Bastet } favor the tekko-kagi for catching their foes off guard.

Temple Sword.name: 仪剑 Temple Sword
Temple Sword.description: 这把沉重的剑受到宗教场所护卫的偏爱。它有着独特的新月形刀刃，似乎是镰刀和剑的混合体。通常会在剑刃或剑柄上钻孔，以便将铃铛或其他神圣的物品附着在武器上，以帮助祈祷或仲裁。

Ten-Foot Pole.name: 十尺长杆 Ten-Foot Pole
Ten-Foot Pole.description: 挥动这个长杆时，你可以使用【搜寻（Seek）】来搜索10尺内的一个方格。长杆不够坚固，无法被用作武器。

Tengu Feather Fan.name: Tengu Feather Fan
Tengu Feather Fan.description:
You've learned to bind some of your feathers together into a fan to focus your ancestral magic. You (and only you) can use the tengu feather fan to cast tengu magic. If your fan is lost or destroyed, you can create a replacement during your daily preparations; if you do so, your previous fan falls apart into mundane feathers. Further feats might grant you additional activations of your tengu feather fan, but you can never have more than three activations per day, no matter how many such feats you have. The DC for spells you cast with your tengu feather fan is your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

You can cast the 1st-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.g8QqHpv2CWDwmIm1]{Gust of Wind} spell by activating your tengu feather fan.

Activate Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast one of the spells contained in your tengu feather fan. Activating the fan takes the spell's normal number of actions. You can also Activate the fan to cast a cantrip you've gained from a heritage or ancestry feat; this activation doesn't count against the fan's uses per day.

Tengu Gale Blade.name: Tengu Gale Blade
Tengu Gale Blade.description: This fan-shaped sword, designed by members of the tengu ancestry, has five broad blades that join at its hilt. Tengu sailors also use gale blades as makeshift weather vanes, as the sword spins to show the wind's direction when loosely held aloft.

Tentacle Cannon.name: Tentacle Cannon
Tentacle Cannon.description:
A tentacle cannon is a +1 striking weapon, built using components from squids, krakens, and sometimes even stranger tentacled creatures like alghollthu. It's a distinct type of martial firearm that deals [[/r {1d8}[piercing]]]{1d8 piercing damage}. It has the capacity 5, concussive, and fatal d12 traits, a range increment of 30 feet, and reload 2. The weapon itself resembles a five-barreled handheld cannon with each barrel made from a hollowed out tentacle.

Activate 1 Interact (magical, transmutation)

Effect You cause one of the tentacles forming the weapon's five barrels to stretch out and attempt to pull and grab a creature within 15 feet. The tentacle attempts to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} with a [[/r 1d20+13 #grapple check]]{+13} bonus. It can attempt to Grapple any creature, regardless of size. On a success, the tentacle pulls the creature up to 10 feet directly towards you, until it's in a square adjacent to you.

Activate 1 Interact

Requirements The tentacle cannon has a creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}

Effect You continue to keep the tentacle cannon's hold on one creature it has grabbed. Attempt another check to Grapple the creature with a [[/r 1d20+13 #grapple check]]{+13} bonus.

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect The cannon fires a spray of ink in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15]. Creatures in the area must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:23|name:Tentacle Cannon Ink Spray] save. On a failure, the creature is covered in ink and becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 minute or until it removes the ink. On a critical failure, the creature becomes blinded and dazzled; both conditions last for 1 minute or until it removes the ink. The creature, or an adjacent creature, can use an Interact action to remove the ink from its eyes to remove the blinded and dazzled conditions.

Craft Requirements The initial raw materials must include the tentacles and ink glands of a creature with a tentacle Strike and ink.

Tentacle Cannon (Greater).name: Tentacle Cannon (Greater)
Tentacle Cannon (Greater).description:
A greater tentacle cannon is a +2 greater striking weapon, built using components from squids, krakens, and sometimes even stranger tentacled creatures like alghollthu. It's a distinct type of martial firearm that deals [[/r {1d8}[piercing]]]{1d8 piercing damage}. It has the capacity 5, concussive, and fatal d12 traits, a range increment of 30 feet, and reload 2. The weapon itself resembles a five-barreled handheld cannon with each barrel made from a hollowed out tentacle.

Activate 1 Interact (magical, transmutation)

Effect You cause one of the tentacles forming the weapon's five barrels to stretch out and attempt to pull and grab a creature within 15 feet. The tentacle attempts to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} with a [[/r 1d20+20 #grapple check]]{+20} bonus. It can attempt to Grapple any creature, regardless of size. On a success, the tentacle pulls the creature up to 10 feet directly towards you, until it's in a square adjacent to you.

Activate 1 Interact

Requirements The tentacle cannon has a creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}

Effect You continue to keep the tentacle cannon's hold on one creature it has grabbed. Attempt another check to Grapple the creature with a [[/r 1d20+20 #grapple check]]{+20} bonus.

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect The cannon fires a spray of ink in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15]. Creatures in the area must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:30|name:Tentacle Cannon Ink Spray] save. On a failure, the creature is covered in ink and becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 minute or until it removes the ink. On a critical failure, the creature becomes blinded and dazzled; both conditions last for 1 minute or until it removes the ink. The creature, or an adjacent creature, can use an Interact action to remove the ink from its eyes to remove the blinded and dazzled conditions.

Craft Requirements The initial raw materials must include the tentacles and ink glands of a creature with a tentacle Strike and ink.

Tentacle Cannon (Major).name: Tentacle Cannon (Major)
Tentacle Cannon (Major).description:
A major tentacle cannon is a +3 greater striking weapon, built using components from squids, krakens, and sometimes even stranger tentacled creatures like alghollthu. It's a distinct type of martial firearm that deals [[/r {1d8}[piercing]]]{1d8 piercing damage}. It has the capacity 5, concussive, and fatal d12 traits, a range increment of 30 feet, and reload 2. The weapon itself resembles a five-barreled handheld cannon with each barrel made from a hollowed out tentacle.

Activate 1 Interact (magical, transmutation)

Effect You cause one of the tentacles forming the weapon's five barrels to stretch out and attempt to pull and grab a creature within 15 feet. The tentacle attempts to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} with a [[/r 1d20+27 #grapple check]]{+27} bonus. It can attempt to Grapple any creature, regardless of size. On a success, the tentacle pulls the creature up to 10 feet directly towards you, until it's in a square adjacent to you.

Activate 1 Interact

Requirements The tentacle cannon has a creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}

Effect You continue to keep the tentacle cannon's hold on one creature it has grabbed. Attempt another check to Grapple the creature with a [[/r 1d20+27 #grapple check]]{+27} bonus.

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect The cannon fires a spray of ink in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15]. Creatures in the area must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:37|name:Tentacle Cannon Ink Spray] save. On a failure, the creature is covered in ink and becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 minute or until it removes the ink. On a critical failure, the creature becomes blinded and dazzled; both conditions last for 1 minute or until it removes the ink. The creature, or an adjacent creature, can use an Interact action to remove the ink from its eyes to remove the blinded and dazzled conditions.

Craft Requirements The initial raw materials must include the tentacles and ink glands of a creature with a tentacle Strike and ink.

Terrifying Ammunition.name: Terrifying Ammunition
Terrifying Ammunition.description:
Activate 1 Interact

This black-and-gray ammunition is etched with occult symbols and tiny, grinning skulls. When activated terrifying ammunition damages a creature, it fills the creature's mind with visions of their own failures, tragedies, and eventually, their own death. The creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:20] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is frightened 1.

Failure The creature is frightened 1 and can't reduce its frightened value below 1 until it spends an action, which has the concentrate trait, to calm itself down.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature is frightened 2.

The Whispering Reeds.name: The Whispering Reeds
The Whispering Reeds.description:
This hefty tome was compiled centuries ago by an anonymous author who sought to collect all parables, myths, stories, and encounters with the Outer Goddess Nhimbaloth. According to the introduction, the author's original intent was to create a work that foes of the Empty Death could use to fight against her influence, but as one reads through the book, it becomes apparent that the opposite effect has been achieved—by compiling these stories, the author inadvertently generated a work that made it easier for Nhimbaloth to influence the world. Those who venerate the Empty Death seek copies of this book to use as a guide and religious text, while those who don't know better and peruse the book as though it were merely an anthology of stories find themselves unwittingly falling prey to Nhimbaloth's cult or agents of the entity herself. Those who study from The Whispering Reeds for too long are often cursed to rise as ghosts after death— though their existence never lasts for long, as they are inevitably consumed by Nhimbaloth.

If a character understands the dangers of this book, however, moderated use can stall or even prevent such a fate from befalling them. If a character takes special care, they can even potentially use The Whispering Reeds for its original purpose—as a weapon against the cult of Nhimbaloth. Using the text too often or leveraging some of its more powerful effects, however, causes the user to feel an ominous chill. In these cases, the user is exposed to the tome's curse, Empty Death.

The anonymous compiler wanted to produce an enormous print run of The Whispering Reeds, but after the initial run they realized the danger and scuttled those plans, instead attempting to destroy those copies already created. This crusade caught the attention of Nhimbaloth's cult, who swiftly assassinated the compiler. Fewer than two dozen copies of this rare tome are believed to still exist. The book's sinister nature causes all attempts to transcribe it to fail, resulting in bodies of gibberish, nonsense text.

The Whispering Reeds provides several abilities, but you can't activate any of them while you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} unless you are a follower of Nhimbaloth.

Activate 10 minutes (Investigate)

Effect You gain a +2 item bonus to skill checks to Recall Knowledge about Nhimbaloth, her faith, or creatures associated with her (such as incorporeal undead, vampiric mists, wisps, and other incorporeal creatures associated with death). Each time you use this ability after the first in a 24-hour period, you are exposed to the Empty Death.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect You read aloud a phrase from the book and target a single incorporeal undead creature within 30 feet. That undead creature takes 5d6 positive damage (@Check[type:will|dc:27|basic:true] save) as portions of their incorporeal being are consumed in patches of seven equally spaced holes. Each time you use this ability after the first in a 24-hour period, you are exposed to the Empty Death.

Activate 1 command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You invoke a tale from The Whispering Reeds that parallels the situation, environment, or creatures nearby. Eerie mists and indistinct whispers rise in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] around you, and clusters of seven perfectly spaced divots manifest in the ground, vegetation, and flesh of creatures in the emanation other than yourself and up to three creatures you designate at the time of activation. Creatures afflicted with these divots suffer from agonizing mental anguish in the form of crippling despair and take 4d6 mental damage (@Check[type:will|dc:27|basic:true] save). The mists, whispers, and strange divots fade away at the end of the round, but any creature that takes mental damage from the effect also takes a -1 penalty to saving throws against effects with the emotion trait for 1 minute. You are exposed to the Empty Death each time you use this ability.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency three times per day

Effect You cast one of the following spells at the lowest level possible (unless otherwise specified): @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GaRQlC9Yw1BGKHfN]{Crushing Despair} (one target within 30 feet only), @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4koZzrnMXhhosn0D]{Fear} (3rd), @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Mkbq9xlAUxHUHyR2]{Paranoia}, or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tlcrVRqW1MSKJ5IC]{Phantasmal Killer}. You are exposed to the Empty Death each time you use this ability.

Empty Death (curse, necromancy, occult)

Saving Throw @Check[type:will|dc:27|traits:curse,necromancy]

Effect If you activate The Whispering Reeds and are not a worshipper of Nhimbaloth, you become stupefied 2 for 24 hours as your thoughts fill with paranoia that something is watching you from the other side of death. If you die while affected by the Empty Death, you immediately become a chaotic evil ghost. Every 7 days that pass after you become a ghost, you must succeed at a DC 2 flat check— failure indicates that you are consumed by Nhimbaloth. A creature whose ghost is consumed in this way does not travel to the River of Souls and is utterly annihilated; this creature can only be restored to life via a 10th-level spell effect or ritual like @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish}.

Destruction Copies of The Whispering Reeds have no special protections and can be destroyed like any regular book, but doing so exposes the one who destroyed the book to the Empty Death.

Thieves' Tools.name: 盗贼工具包 Thieves' Tools
Thieves' Tools.description:
你需要盗贼工具包来使用贼活技能开锁锁或解除某些类型的装置。

如果你的盗贼工具损坏了，你可以用换上新的适合你工具的 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Sw7MBLASN3xK4Y44]{开锁器 Replacement Picks}的方式来修理它们。这不需要使用修复操作。

Thieves' Tools (Concealable Picks).name: 盗贼工具包(隐蔽替换品) Thieves' Tools (Concealable Picks)
Thieves' Tools (Concealable Picks).description: 这是一些 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Ejmv9IHGp9Ad9dgu]{盗贼工具包(隐蔽) Thieves' Tools (Concealable)}的替换品。

Thieves' Tools (Concealable).name: 盗贼工具包(隐蔽) Thieves' Tools (Concealable)
Thieves' Tools (Concealable).description:
你需要盗贼工具包来使用贼活技能开锁锁或解除某些类型的装置。 专家级盗贼工具包提供你在开锁(Pick Locks)和解除装置(Disable Devices)的检定+1物品加值。

小巧的结构和结实的材料使得这套盗贼工具包更容易贴身携带而不被发现。你使用隐藏物件(Conceal an Object)隐藏这套盗贼工具包时获得+1物品加值

如果你的盗贼工具损坏了，你可以用换上新的适合你工具的 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.TxMFNfkoccirCitP]{开锁器 Replacement Picks}的方式来修理它们。这不需要使用修复操作。

自动生效:

  • 开锁(Pick Locks)和解除装置(Disable Devices)的检定+1物品加值
  • 隐藏物件(Conceal an Object)隐藏这套盗贼工具包时获得+1物品加值

Thieves' Tools (Infiltrator Picks).name: 盗贼工具包(专家替换品)Thieves' Tools (Infiltrator Picks)
Thieves' Tools (Infiltrator Picks).description: 这是一些 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.6nrCxNQFycUVFOV2]{盗贼工具包(专家) Thieves' Tools (Infiltrator)}的替换品。

Thieves' Tools (Infiltrator).name: 盗贼工具包(专家) Thieves' Tools (Infiltrator)
Thieves' Tools (Infiltrator).description:
你需要盗贼工具包来使用贼活技能开锁锁或解除某些类型的装置。 专家级盗贼工具包提供你在开锁(Pick Locks)和解除装置(Disable Devices)的检定+1物品加值。

如果你的盗贼工具损坏了，你可以用换上新的适合你工具的 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.BznmPaRjI4Orb0IH]{开锁器 Replacement Picks}的方式来修理它们。这不需要使用修复操作。

自动生效:

  • 开锁(Pick Locks)和解除装置(Disable Devices)的检定+1物品加值

Thieves' Tools (Replacement Picks).name: 盗贼工具包(替换品) Thieves' Tools (Replacement Picks)
Thieves' Tools (Replacement Picks).description: 这是一些 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zvLyCVD8g2PdHJAc]{盗贼工具包 Thieves' Tools}的替换备件。

Third Eye.name: 第三只眼 Third Eye
Third Eye.description:
绑定后，这顶华丽的冠冕以及上面闪耀的宝石会融入你的头内，变成纹身的模样。这为你提供超凡的视力，并允许你阅读灵光。当你绑定第三只眼时，只有你可以操作它。你强化后的感官以及能够感知到情感灵光的能力为你在察觉Perception检定上提供+3物品加值。

你持续性地观察到魔法灵光，如果一个9环的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{侦测魔法 Detect Magic} ，除了你能看到30尺内的所有灵光的位置，而并非只有最强的灵光。如果你使用一个搜索Seek动作来研究一个你可以看到的生物，你可以观察到表现了那个生物健康状态的灵光，包含了它身上的所有状态Condition和苦难Affliction，以及他残留生命值的百分比。

启动 D 想象, 命令

频率 每天一次

效果 你得到8环法术 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{真知术 True Seeing}的效果。

自动生效:

  • 察觉Perception检定获得+3物品加值

Thousand-Blade Thesis.name: Thousand-Blade Thesis
Thousand-Blade Thesis.description:
This collection of lacquered rice paper scrolls mounted on flexible bamboo contains a wealth of calligraphic essays and paintings on the art of war, specifically focused on the use of various weapons in warfare and how to tactically deploy warriors using those weapons to the best possible advantage. Consulting the thesis grants a +2 item bonus to Warfare Lore checks. Like most scholarly compendiums, this usage requires holding the thesis in one hand.

The thesis also serves as an extradimensional armory for weapons and ammunition. The thesis has a capacity of 5 Bulk, and only weapons and ammunition can be stored within it. You and others can Interact with the thesis to store or retrieve a weapon or piece of ammunition in it, like a mundane container.

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect The thousand-blade thesis dramatically unfurls, and the weapons contained within it spring forth and array themselves impressively in the air, floating within easy reach. For 1 minute, you can use a free action to Interact to draw one of the floating weapons. Others can attempt to nab them out of the air, but to do so they must critically succeed at a Disarm check. You can't place weapons back into the thesis until the minute elapses.

Three Peaked Tree.name: Three Peaked Tree
Three Peaked Tree.description: A recently developed weapon created for an elven champion from Jinin, the three-peaked tree can be used as both a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FJrsDoaIXksVjld9]{Trident} and a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.qRqGIxcadjjxcij3]{Mithral Tree}. A three-peaked tree has a length of silken rope attached to the butt of its haft, allowing it to be quickly retrieved after thrown.

Thresholds of Truth.name: Thresholds of Truth
Thresholds of Truth.description:
Zarmavdian's spellbook, Thresholds of Truth, was once a straightforward treatise on arcane and occult lore containing several useful spells. It's been so heavily annotated, however, that the original text is hard to read. It's clear that Zarmavdian wanted to prevent eldritch creatures from manipulating innocent minds, but his spellbook is a treasure trove for those seeking dangerous or inscrutable lore. The bookseller Morlibint currently keeps this book in his collection at Odd Stories.

Thresholds of Truth provides access to the @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.IdhIKSuKueYt6RsQ]{Eldritch Researcher} archetype and contains the following spells:

Cantrips

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.mAMEt4FFbdqoRnkN]{Chill Touch}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kl2q6JvBZwed4B6v]{Dancing Lights}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4gBIw4IDrSfFHik4]{Daze}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kBhaPuzLUSwS6vVf]{Electric Arc}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.atlgGNI1E1Ox3O3a]{Ghost Sound}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.pwzdSlJgYqN7bs2w]{Mage Hand}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Qw3fnUlaUbnn7ipC]{Prestidigitation}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OhD2Z6rIGGD5ocZA]{Read Aura}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield}

1st Level

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4WAib3GichxLjp5p]{Alarm}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{Charm}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.UKsIOWmMx4hSpafl]{Color Spray}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aAbfKn8maGjJjk2W]{Mage Armor}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Magic Missile}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{True Strike}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.xqmHD8JIjak15lRk]{Unseen Servant}

2nd Level

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vTQvfYu2llKQedmY]{Comprehend Language}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8ViwItUgwT4lOvvb]{False Life}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.0qaqksrGGDj74HXE]{Glitterdust}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9s5tqqXNzcoKamWx]{Web}

3rd Level

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{Haste}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{Lightning Bolt}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.LQzlKbYjZSMFQawP]{Locate}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.DCQHaLrYXMI37dvW]{Paralyze}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WsUwpfmhKrKwoIe3]{Slow}

4th Level

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zvKWclOZ7A53DObE]{Clairvoyance}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dARE6VfJ3Uoq5M53]{Daydreamer's Curse}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qJQADktwD0x8kLAy]{Resilient Sphere}

Thrice-Fried Mudwings.name: Thrice-Fried Mudwings
Thrice-Fried Mudwings.description:
Activate 1 Interact

Frying mudwings-the remains of magical winged creatures found in blighted swamps-is a delicate balance. Cooked for too long and they lose their potency; cooked too briefly and the toxins in their system could end up harming whoever eats them. When you consume a perfectly cooked tapas, you grow two sets of mudwings that grant you a fly Speed of 30 feet or your Speed, whichever is lower, for 10 minutes. You can also use the following Activation.

Activate r Interact

Trigger You would take damage from a physical attack

Effect You intercept the attack with a pair of your wings. You gain resistance 15 against physical damage for the triggering attack only, shattering one set of your wings in the process. The first time you use this Activation, your fly Speed becomes 15 feet, or half your Speed, whichever is lower, for the duration. After the second time, your mudwings are shattered entirely, ending the effect.

Throwing Knife.name: Throwing Knife
Throwing Knife.description: This light knife is optimally balanced to be thrown accurately at a greater distance than a common dagger. While this comes at the cost of a significant cutting edge, the difference is worth it for throwing specialists.

Throwing Knife (Extinction Curse).name: Throwing Knife (Extinction Curse)
Throwing Knife (Extinction Curse).description: This light knife is optimally balanced to be thrown accurately at a greater distance than a common dagger. While this comes at the cost of a significant cutting edge, the difference is worth it for characters focused on thrown weapons.

Thunder Sling.name: Thunder Sling
Thunder Sling.description: Tengu use these specialized slings to fire darts further and with greater force than when thrown by hand, which is particularly effective when attacking from great heights. A thunder sling uses darts as ammunition. It can also hurl blowgun darts as ammunition but deals 1d4 piercing damage instead of 1d6 when used this way.

Thunder Snare.name: Thunder Snare
Thunder Snare.description:
The snare makes a thunderous noise when a creature enters the snare's square, which can be heard up to 1,000 feet away. The creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18] saving throw.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is deafened until the end of its next turn.

Failure As success, and the target also takes 1 sonic damage.

Critical Failure As success, and the target also takes 1d4 sonic damage.

Craft Requirements 1 lesser thunderstone

Thunderbird Tuft (Greater).name: Thunderbird Tuft (Greater)
Thunderbird Tuft (Greater).description:
Activate Cast a Spell (add 1 action)

This carved chunk of amber contains a single tuft of gray feathers, which spark with electricity to create an odd jittery sensation in anyone holding the amber for long. When used as part of a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]{Shocking Grasp} spell, thunderbird tuft funnels electricity back into the spellcaster in a defensive nimbus. For 1 minute, any creature that touches you or that hits you with a melee unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon attack takes [[/r {2d4}[electricity]]]{2d4 electricity damage}([[/r {2d6}[electricity]]]{2d6 electricity damage} if the creature is using a metal weapon).

Thunderbird Tuft (Lesser).name: Thunderbird Tuft (Lesser)
Thunderbird Tuft (Lesser).description:
Activate Cast a Spell (add 1 action)

This carved chunk of amber contains a single tuft of gray feathers, which spark with electricity to create an odd jittery sensation in anyone holding the amber for long. When used as part of a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]{Shocking Grasp} spell, thunderbird tuft funnels electricity back into the spellcaster in a defensive nimbus. For 1 round, any creature that touches you or that hits you with a melee unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon attack takes [[/r {1d4}[electricity]]]{1d4 electricity damage}([[/r {1d6}[electricity]]]{1d6 electricity damage} if the creature is using a metal weapon, but the nimbus only lasts 1 round, rather than the full minute.

Thunderbird Tuft (Major).name: Thunderbird Tuft (Major)
Thunderbird Tuft (Major).description:
Activate Cast a Spell (add 1 action)

This carved chunk of amber contains a single tuft of gray feathers, which spark with electricity to create an odd jittery sensation in anyone holding the amber for long. When used as part of a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]{Shocking Grasp} spell, thunderbird tuft funnels electricity back into the spellcaster in a defensive nimbus. For 1 minute, any creature that touches you or that hits you with a melee unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon attack takes [[/r {3d4}[electricity]]]{3d4 electricity damage}([[/r {3d6}[electricity]]]{3d6 electricity damage} if the creature is using a metal weapon).

Thunderbird Tuft (Moderate).name: Thunderbird Tuft (Moderate)
Thunderbird Tuft (Moderate).description:
Activate Cast a Spell (add 1 action)

This carved chunk of amber contains a single tuft of gray feathers, which spark with electricity to create an odd jittery sensation in anyone holding the amber for long. When used as part of a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]{Shocking Grasp} spell, thunderbird tuft funnels electricity back into the spellcaster in a defensive nimbus. For 1 minute, any creature that touches you or that hits you with a melee unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon attack takes [[/r {1d4}[electricity]]]{1d4 electricity damage}([[/r {1d6}[electricity]]]{1d6 electricity damage} if the creature is using a metal weapon).

Thundering.name: 雷鸣 Thundering
Thundering.description: 该武器命中时爆发出雷鸣之声，成功的打击会造成额外1d6点音波伤害。若重击，目标必须通过 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24] 豁免检定，否则耳聋1分钟（大失败则为1小时）。

Thundering (Greater).name: 高等雷鸣 Thundering (Greater)
Thundering (Greater).description: 该武器命中时爆发出雷鸣之声，成功的打击会造成额外1d6点音波伤害。若重击，目标必须通过 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34] 豁免检定，否则永久耳聋。该武器造成的音波伤害忽视音波抗力。

Thundermace.name: Thundermace
Thundermace.description: This deceptively dangerous weapon is essentially a mace with a longer haft and larger, often flanged head.

Thunderstone (Greater).name: 高等暴雷石 Thunderstone (Greater)
Thunderstone (Greater).description: 当这枚石头命中一个生物或一个坚硬表面时，它会爆发出震耳欲聋的巨响。你在攻击骰上获得+2的物品加值。暴雷石造成3d4点音波伤害和3点音波溅射伤害，在暴雷石爆发的空间周围10尺内的所有生物必须进行一次 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|name:Greater Thunderstone|showDC:all] 豁免检定，否则直到它的下一轮结束位置都陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened}。

Thunderstone (Lesser).name: 次等暴雷石 Thunderstone (Lesser)
Thunderstone (Lesser).description: 当这枚石头命中一个生物或一个坚硬表面时，它会爆发出震耳欲聋的巨响。 暴雷石造成1d4点音波伤害和1点音波溅射伤害，在暴雷石爆发的空间周围10尺内的所有生物必须在一次 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17|name:Lesser Thunderstone|showDC:all] 豁免检定，否则直到它的下一轮结束位置都陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened} 。

Thunderstone (Major).name: 上等暴雷石 Thunderstone (Major)
Thunderstone (Major).description: 当这枚石头命中一个生物或一个坚硬表面时，它会爆发出震耳欲聋的巨响。 你在攻击骰上获得+3的物品加值。暴雷石造成4d4点音波伤害和4点音波溅射伤害，在暴雷石爆发的空间周围10尺内的所有生物必须在一次 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:36|name:Major Thunderstone|showDC:all] 豁免检定，否则直到它的下一轮结束位置都陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened} 。

Thunderstone (Moderate).name: 中等暴雷石 Thunderstone (Moderate)
Thunderstone (Moderate).description: 当这枚石头命中一个生物或一个坚硬表面时，它会爆发出震耳欲聋的巨响。 你在攻击骰上获得+1的物品加值。暴雷石造成2d4点音波伤害和2点音波溅射伤害，在暴雷石爆发的空间周围10尺内的所有生物必须在一次 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20|name:Moderate Thunderstone|showDC:all] 豁免检定，否则直到它的下一轮结束位置都陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened} 。

Thurible of Revelation (Greater).name: 高等揭示香炉 Thurible of Revelation (Greater)
Thurible of Revelation (Greater).description:
这只铜炉被挂在一根链子上。大部分启示香炉都饰有旋转着的天界语文字，不过仍有一些地狱语或深渊语版本的铁制香炉存在。

启动 D 交互

消耗 价值至少5gp的熏香

效果 你点燃香炉中的熏香，它能够燃烧1小时。在这段时间内，只要你持握着香炉，你在宗教检定上就可获得+3物品加值，并且当你在用解读文书理解宗教内容时投出的大失败都改为失败。

每日一次，当你启动香炉时，你能够增强它的揭示效果。在启动期间，你能够以一个交互动作将香炉举到你的眼前，透过香炉中升起的烟雾，你在一轮之中获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{识破隐形 See Invisibility} 和 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{真知术 True Seeing} 的效果。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.QapoFh0tbUgMwSIB]{效果：高等揭示香炉}

Thurible of Revelation (Lesser).name: 次等揭示香炉 Thurible of Revelation (Lesser)
Thurible of Revelation (Lesser).description:
这只铜炉被挂在一根链子上。大部分启示香炉都饰有旋转着的天界语文字，不过仍有一些地狱语或深渊语版本的铁制香炉存在。

启动 D 交互

消耗 价值至少5gp的熏香

效果 你点燃香炉中的熏香，它能够燃烧1小时。在这段时间内，只要你持握着香炉，你在宗教检定上就可获得+1物品加值，并且当你在用解读文书理解宗教内容时投出的大失败都改为失败。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.lO95TwgihBdTilAB]{效果：次等揭示香炉}

Thurible of Revelation (Moderate).name: 中等揭示香炉 Thurible of Revelation (Moderate)
Thurible of Revelation (Moderate).description:
这只铜炉被挂在一根链子上。大部分启示香炉都饰有旋转着的天界语文字，不过仍有一些地狱语或深渊语版本的铁制香炉存在。

启动 D 交互

消耗 价值至少5gp的熏香

效果 你点燃香炉中的熏香，它能够燃烧1小时。在这段时间内，只要你持握着香炉，你在宗教检定上就可获得+2物品加值，并且当你在用解读文书理解宗教内容时投出的大失败都改为失败。

每日一次，当你启动香炉时，你能够增强它的揭示效果。在启动期间，你能够以一个交互动作将香炉举到你的眼前，透过香炉中升起的烟雾，你在一轮之中获得@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{识破隐形 See Invisibility} 的效果。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.UlalLihKzDxcOdXL]{效果：中等揭示香炉}

Tidal Fishhook.name: Tidal Fishhook
Tidal Fishhook.description:
This +2 greater striking returning @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.3T3ayvgw9HDn05Mz]{Combat Grapnel} takes the form of a fishhook made of scavenged bones and stone with a cord of braided water. Attacks with a tidal fishhook don't take any of the normal penalties for fighting underwater. A broken (but not destroyed) tidal fishhook can be fully repaired by submerging it in an ocean for 1 minute.

Activation 2 Interact (teleportation, water)

Frequency once per hour

Effect A tidal fishhook can travel between bodies of water to strike distant foes. You throw the fishhook into a 5-foot square that's fully covered with water, and it emerges to Strike or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} a target from another such square within 60 feet; the squares can be part of the same body of water or different ones. The distance between the bodies of water doesn't count toward the fishhook's range increment. If you successfully Grapple the target as part of this Strike, you can pull yourself along the fishhook's line, teleporting to the secondary body of water.

Tiger Menuki.name: 虎目贯 Tiger Menuki
Tiger Menuki.description:
启动 F 想象

触发 你使用附着的武器进行一次打击

这只白锡老虎在你武器的握把上凶狠地低吼。当你启动这只老虎，附着的武器在触发的攻击以及1分钟内的所有其他攻击上都获得横扫特征。

Tiger's Claw.name: Tiger's Claw
Tiger's Claw.description:
This +2 striking fearsome dueling pistol is made from fine tigerwood, with the head of a tiger as the muzzle. Beneath the tiger head is a claw shaped bayonet. One of a set of four guns crafted as a gift to a Zenj family for delivery of rare healing and disease- abating herbs during an outbreak of a deadly disease in the Grand Duchy of Alkenstar, these firearms are now passed down to those who have done brave acts in service to the Zenj people. The flintlock sparks thrown by this weapon take the shape of pouncing tigers and the firearm's report sounds like a tiger's growl. Clever wielders use the firearm's report to panic their prey into mistakes and then pounce for the kill.

This firearm's bullets deal slashing damage instead of piercing and add an additional [[/r {1d6}[persistent,bleed]]]{1d6} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} on a critical hit. This persistent bleed damage causes tiger-claw-shaped wounds to appear on the target.

Activate 1 envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You capitalize on the fears your firearm engenders, terrifying your foes. Make a ranged Strike with this firearm against a target. If you successfully deal damage to your target, the target is also affected by a 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tlcrVRqW1MSKJ5IC]{Phantasmal Killer} with a spell DC of 28 (@Check[type:will|dc:28|showDC:all]). While phantasmal killer typically takes the shape of the target's worst fear, this effect always appears to the target in the form of a majestic and ferocious tiger.

Time Shield Potion.name: Time Shield Potion
Time Shield Potion.description:
Activate 1 Interact

This purple potion has a bitter taste and seems to blur with motion. When you drink a time shield potion, you are frozen in time for [[/r 2d4 #rounds]]{2d4 rounds}. You can't act or be targeted, you become immune to all effects, and you vanish from your space; as far as the universe is concerned, you simply don't exist as long as the potion lasts. The durations of any effects targeting you when you drink the potion are suspended until it wears off.

Once the potion's duration expires, you return to the normal flow of time and your former space; if that space is now occupied, you get shunted to the nearest unoccupied space. Effects with durations immediately resume affecting you, elapsing as though no time has passed. If you are within the area of an effect created while you were outside of time, you immediately take those effects upon returning. The GM might determine that other changes that occurred while you were outside of time (such as the ground beneath you crumbling) also affect you upon your return.

Timeless Salts.name: Timeless Salts
Timeless Salts.description:
Activate 1 Interact

You sprinkle these salts onto a single object up to 10 cubic feet in volume and no more than 40 Bulk to preserve it for 1 week. The object doesn't decay, and effects that require the object to be fresh don't count the time passing during this duration as having elapsed. When sprinkled on a corpse, this extends the period in which a creature can be revived by magic, as well as the wait time required before a corpse can be targeted again with @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.FM3SmEW8N1FCRjqt]{Talking Corpse}. The salts prevent ordinary pests from consuming the target (such as maggots for a corpse or moths for a piece of clothing). Any creature can use an Interact action to disperse the salts from an unattended object and end this effect.

Timepiece (Desktop Clock).name: Timepiece (Desktop Clock)
Timepiece (Desktop Clock).description:
Clockwork timepieces come in a variety of sizes and aesthetic styles, but they're all designed to display the accurate time of day down to the second.

Clockwork timepieces have a 24-hour activation cycle, after which they must wound in a process that takes 1 minute to complete.

Desktop clocks have been designed to be small enough to only take up a quarter of a typical writing desk's surface area, but they're still too bulky and heavy to be lugged around casually.

Timepiece (Grand Clock).name: Timepiece (Grand Clock)
Timepiece (Grand Clock).description:
Clockwork timepieces come in a variety of sizes and aesthetic styles, but they're all designed to display the accurate time of day down to the second.

Clockwork timepieces have a 24-hour activation cycle, after which they must wound in a process that takes 1 minute to complete.

These towering, ten-foot-tall clocks have been painstakingly handcrafted by skilled artisans and feature loud chimes that can be heard hourly throughout a manor. Owners of grand clocks usually tend to display them prominently in a study, lounge area, or foyer.

Tin Cobra.name: Tin Cobra
Tin Cobra.description:
This clockwork cobra activates when a creature enters its square, at which point it lashes out and spits venom, dealing [[/r {3d6}[poison]]]{3d6 poison damage}. The target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:21|traits:poison] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} 1.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} 2.

Tindertwig.name: 火柴 Tindertwig
Tindertwig.description:
启动 A 交互 Interact

一种撞击粗糙表面时便会燃烧的炼金物质包裹在这根细小木棍一端。用火柴生火远比使用燧石和铁片要快得多。你能够点燃火柴，并作为同一个交互动作的一部分用燃烧的火柴接触一堆易燃物。

Titan's Grasp.name: Titan's Grasp
Titan's Grasp.description:
These bronze gauntlets each have a small red gem embedded in the wrist. You gain a +3 item bonus to Athletics checks and a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to Grapple. If you successfully Grapple an enemy that's at least one size category larger than you, the gauntlets dig into it, dealing bludgeoning damage equal to your Strength modifier, plus an additional [[/r {2d6}[bludgeoning]]]{2d6 bludgeoning damage} on a critical success.

When you invest the gloves, you either increase your Strength score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever would give you a higher score.

Activate 1 Interact (sonic)

Frequency once per day

Requirements You have two hands free

Effect You clap the gauntlets together with a thunderous crack that deals [[/r {6d10}[sonic]]]{6d10 sonic damage} in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]. Each creature in the area must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:35|name:Titan's Grasp Sonic Clap|traits:sonic|showDC:all] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage, is deafened for 1 minute, and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Tlil Mask.name: Tlil Mask
Tlil Mask.description:
Colorful, beaded tlil masks are most commonly found on the distant continent of Arcadia, but trade between the two regions means that they can be found in the Mwangi Expanse as curiosities. These masks usually bear floral patterns and attune your senses to plants of all varieties.

Activate 1 envision

Frequency once per day

Effect Your vision up to 60 feet sees through small amounts of living plant matter as though it were transparent. While this effect is active, creatures can't be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from you due to living plants, such as small trees, vines, and grass. This also prevents them from Hiding or Sneaking past you using only living plants for concealment or cover. Other than the inability to use the cover to Hide or Sneak, this ability doesn't prevent plants from providing cover to creatures or blocking line of effect. It also doesn't allow you to see through dead plant matter, such as the wooden walls of a building, or thick plant matter, such as the walls of a dungeon built entirely inside an enormous living tree.

The effect lasts for 1 minute.

Tlil Mask (Greater).name: Tlil Mask (Greater)
Tlil Mask (Greater).description:
Colorful, beaded till masks are most commonly found on the distant continent of Arcadia, but trade between the two regions means that they can be found in the Mwangi Expanse as curiosities. These masks usually bear floral patterns and attune your senses to plants of all varieties.

Activate 1 envision

Frequency once per day

Effect Your vision up to 60 feet sees through small amounts of living plant matter as though it were transparent. While this effect is active, creatures can't be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from you due to living plants, such as small trees, vines, and grass. This also prevents them from Hiding or Sneaking past you using only living plants for concealment or cover. Other than the inability to use the cover to Hide or Sneak, this ability doesn't prevent plants from providing cover to creatures or blocking line of effect. It also doesn't allow you to see through dead plant matter, such as the wooden walls of a building, or thick plant matter, such as the walls of a dungeon built entirely inside an enormous living tree.

The effect lasts for 10 minutes.

Toad Tears.name: Toad Tears
Toad Tears.description:
Toad tears can be mixed with any other foodstuff or drink, but the poison can also be ingested as is. The process of refining giant toad poison lessens its deadly qualities, and as a result, toad tears are rarely directly fatal. Yet those who are exposed to toad tears often lose control of their actions, making it a dangerous poison nevertheless.

Activate A Interact (Ingested)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]

Onset 5 minutes

Maximum Duration 30 minutes

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (10 minutes)

Stage 2 stupefied 1 and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} (1 minute)

Toadskin Salve.name: Toadskin Salve
Toadskin Salve.description:
This thick, oily salve reacts with the air to exude a toxic mucus when applied to skin. Once it's applied, you can activate the salve in one of the two ways detailed below. After either reaction has been used, the remaining mucus loses its reactive properties and falls away as the effect ends. You can only have one dose applied at a time. If you don't use either reaction, after 10 minutes, the mucus flakes away and the effect ends.

Activate r Interact

Trigger You hit a creature with a melee Strike

Effect You fling mucus on the creature, dealing [[/r {1d4}[persistent,poison]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Poison Damage}.

Activate r Interact

Trigger You are hit with a melee attack that deals physical damage

Effect The mucus dulls the blow, granting you resistance 3 to physical damage against the triggering attack.

Toadskin Salve (Greater).name: Toadskin Salve (Greater)
Toadskin Salve (Greater).description:
This thick, oily salve reacts with the air to exude a toxic mucus when applied to skin. Once it's applied, you can activate the salve in one of the two ways detailed below. After either reaction has been used, the remaining mucus loses its reactive properties and falls away as the effect ends. You can only have one dose applied at a time. If you don't use either reaction, after 10 minutes, the mucus flakes away and the effect ends.

Activate r Interact

Trigger You hit a creature with a melee Strike

Effect You fling mucus on the creature, dealing [[/r {2d4}[persistent,poison]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Poison Damage}.

Activate r Interact

Trigger You are hit with a melee attack that deals physical damage

Effect The mucus dulls the blow, granting you resistance 5 to physical damage against the triggering attack.

Toadskin Salve (Major).name: Toadskin Salve (Major)
Toadskin Salve (Major).description:
This thick, oily salve reacts with the air to exude a toxic mucus when applied to skin. Once it's applied, you can activate the salve in one of the two ways detailed below. After either reaction has been used, the remaining mucus loses its reactive properties and falls away as the effect ends. You can only have one dose applied at a time. If you don't use either reaction, after 1 hour, the mucus flakes away and the effect ends.

Activate r Interact

Trigger You hit a creature with a melee Strike

Effect You fling mucus on the creature, dealing [[/r {3d4}[persistent,poison]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Poison Damage}.

Activate r Interact

Trigger You are hit with a melee attack that deals physical damage

Effect The mucus dulls the blow, granting you resistance 8 to physical damage against the triggering attack.

Tonfa.name: Tonfa
Tonfa.description: These L-shaped fighting batons are good for striking and blocking. The wielder holds the handle and either spins the stick or strikes with the stick covering the forearm.

Tool (Long).name: 工具(长) Tool (Long)
Tool (Long).description: 不是为冒险而设计的一般工具。锄头、铲子或大锤属于长工具，手钻、冰钩或抹子属于短工具。工具通常可被用作临时武器，短工具造成1d4伤害，长工具造成1d6伤害。由GM来决定合适的伤害类型并在需要的时候调整伤害。

Tool (Short).name: 工具(短) Tool (Short)
Tool (Short).description: 不是为冒险而设计的一般工具。锄头、铲子或大锤属于长工具，手钻、冰钩或抹子属于短工具。工具通常可被用作临时武器，短工具造成1d4伤害，长工具造成1d6伤害。由GM来决定合适的伤害类型并在需要的时候调整伤害。

Topology Protoplasm.name: Topology Protoplasm
Topology Protoplasm.description:
Activate 1 Interact

This slimy gel wriggles to the touch, as if covered by a multitude of imperceptible cilia. If applied to a creature or object no larger than 7 feet in any dimension, the protoplasm shifts it into an ooze-like state for 1 minute, allowing the subject to squash and stretch harmlessly. In this state, a creature that attempts a check to Squeeze uses the outcome one degree of success better than it rolls and can move its full Speed while Squeezing, and an object can fit through a space 2 feet across. One vial can cover a creature or object of up to Large size, but as each vial is made from a specific ooze, multiple vials can't be combined together to cover a larger object, as the two gels simply negate each other.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.vZPyQAt5T2L0Dfmq]{Equipment Effect: Topology Protoplasm}

Torag's Silver Anvil.name: Torag's Silver Anvil
Torag's Silver Anvil.description:
This portable silver anvil has a narrow hoop on one end, through which a long, sturdy chain has been strung. Torag's Silver Anvil can be wielded as a +3 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.DH0kB9Wbr5pDeunX]{Holy} @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.RSZwUlCzUX7Nb4UA]{Greater Flaming} greater striking silver meteor hammer.

Outside of combat, the anvil can be used with a hammer as an incredibly effective portable forge, heating up the metal to be forged without a furnace and granting a +3 item bonus to Crafting checks involving metalworking.

When you use the anvil to successfully Repair a metal item, the item recovers an additional 10 Hit Points (or an additional 20 on a critical success).

Automatically applied effects:

  • +3 item bonus to Crafting checks involving metalworking

Torch.name: 火把 Torch
Torch.description: 火把在20尺半径范围内散发出明亮的光芒（昏暗的光线照射到接下来的20尺）。它可以被用作临时武器，造成1d4钝击伤害加1点火焰伤害。

Torrent Snare.name: Torrent Snare
Torrent Snare.description:
You pile waterlogged plants or access a nearby source of water to rain down on a Medium or smaller creature that enters the snare's square. When a creature enters the square, the snare's square and all adjacent squares become slippery difficult terrain, and the triggering creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:19] saving throw, with the following effects.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target falls prone.

Critical Failure The target falls prone and is forced into one of the other squares soaked by the snare.

Tower Shield.name: 塔盾 Tower Shield
Tower Shield.description:
这种巨大的盾牌几乎可以复盖整个身体。由于尺寸因素，通常用金属加固的木材制成。

硬度 HP BT
5 20 10

Toy Carriage.name: Toy Carriage
Toy Carriage.description:
A miniature toy carriage is carved from wood and has fully functioning wheels. It can vary in size from 2 to 8 inches long, too small for even Tiny creatures to ride. If pushed or propelled, obstacles and terrain might slow, stop, tip, or divert the carriage's course.

If pushed and released as an Interact action, a toy carriage rolls along the ground up to 20 feet.

Toy Carriage (Windup).name: Toy Carriage (Windup)
Toy Carriage (Windup).description:
A miniature toy carriage is carved from wood and has fully functioning wheels. It can vary in size from 2 to 8 inches long, too small for even Tiny creatures to ride. If pushed or propelled, obstacles and terrain might slow, stop, tip, or divert the carriage's course.

A tiny crank protrudes from the side of this carriage. If the crank is wound and the carriage is released on the ground, the carriage propels in a straight line at a Speed of 10 feet. Each Interact action spent winding the crank propels the carriage for 1 round. A windup toy carriage can be wound for a maximum of 9 actions total, at which point it's too tight to wind further.

Tracker's Goggles.name: 追踪护目镜 Tracker's Goggles
Tracker's Goggles.description:
这对森绿色的目镜被装在用麻绳简单绑住的粗糙皮带上。

穿戴护目镜时，你在用来辨别方向Sense Direction以及追踪Track的生存Survival检定上获得+1加值。

如果你的一次追踪Track检定失败，你只需要等30分钟就可以重新尝试，而非1个小时。

自动生效:

  • 用来辨别方向Sense Direction以及追踪Track的生存Survival检定获得+1加值

Tracker's Goggles (Greater).name: 高等追踪护目镜 Tracker's Goggles (Greater)
Tracker's Goggles (Greater).description:
这对森绿色的目镜被装在用麻绳简单绑住的粗糙皮带上。

穿戴护目镜时，你在用来辨别方向Sense Direction以及追踪Track的生存Survival检定上获得+2加值。

如果你的一次追踪Track检定失败，你只需要等15分钟就可以重新尝试，而非1个小时。

自动生效:

  • 用来辨别方向Sense Direction以及追踪Track的生存Survival检定获得+2加值

Tracking Fulu.name: Tracking Fulu
Tracking Fulu.description:
Usage affixed to creature or object

Activate f envision

Used covertly by assassins and spies, this pair of fulus stick to one another when created but can be easily separated. Affix one fulu to a target before activating its pair. When activated, the unaffixed fulu flutters toward the affixed one at a speed of 30 feet per round, traveling for up to 1 hour and fluttering more rapidly the closer it comes to its pair. The unaffixed fulu always moves in a straight line towards the affixed fulu; it can't solve mazes or find its way through winding paths

Transposition Ammunition.name: Transposition Ammunition
Transposition Ammunition.description:
Ammunition any

Activate 2 Interact

Transposition ammunition has a milky-white cast and will sometimes shift position subtly of its own accord. When you activate the ammunition, instead of making your Strike against a foe, you fire transposition ammunition at any unoccupied square you can see within your weapon's first range increment and succeed without making an attack roll. You pull yourself through the Astral Plane, teleporting along with any items you are holding into the square where you shot the ammunition. If this would carry along any other creature (even one in an extradimensional space), the activation fails.

Transposition Ammunition (Greater).name: Transposition Ammunition (Greater)
Transposition Ammunition (Greater).description:
Ammunition any

Activate 2 Interact

Transposition ammunition has a milky-white cast and will sometimes shift position subtly of its own accord. When you activate the ammunition, instead of making your Strike against a foe, you fire transposition ammunition at any unoccupied square you can see within your weapon's first range increment and succeed without making an attack roll. You pull yourself through the Astral Plane, teleporting along with any items you are holding into the square where you shot the ammunition. When you teleport, you can take along up to two willing adjacent creatures. These creatures must each arrive in unoccupied squares adjacent to the transposition ammunition; if there's not enough space for both of them, you choose which one is teleported.

Traveler's Any-Tool.name: 旅者万用工具 Traveler's Any-Tool
Traveler's Any-Tool.description:
在启动之前，这玩意看起来就是一根两头包铁的烧火棍。

启动 D 交互, 想象

效果 万用工具变成了一件你所想象的特定的简易工具。（通常来说你可以从第六章的工具表中进行选择）。棍子的木头部分会变成工具的柄和握把，金属部分变成铲子、锤头或是别的类似的玩意。它能变成绝大多数的基本工具，但是无法变出任何更复杂的玩意。你可以通过一个交互动作将工具变回原来的棍子。

Traveler's Chair.name: Traveler's Chair
Traveler's Chair.description: This wheelchair is tailored for frequent adventures and travels. The design is sleek and fashionable to provide excellent comfort and support. A traveler's chair has small mechanisms, either made from interlocking wood pieces, clockwork, or other devices, that allow the chair to traverse up or down stairs without any additional difficulty (moving up stairs is still difficult terrain, just like for other characters), and move through other common adventuring terrain without any additional difficulty, such as ladders and uneven ground.

Tri-bladed Katar.name: Tri-bladed Katar
Tri-bladed Katar.description: This punching dagger resembles the standard katar, save that a pair of blades can be folded out from the center blade, transforming the weapon into a starburst shape well suited to catching foes' weapons.

Tricky Pick.name: Tricky Pick
