Tricky Pick.description: This ingenious kobold pick conceals several hidden traps, which the wielder can activate to trick and befuddle foes with a variety of damaging blades and bludgeoning surfaces.

Trident.name: 三叉戟 Trident
Trident.description: 这种三股矛状的武器，通常有4英尺长的柄。像矛一样，它可以单手持用也可以用来投掷。

Trinity Geode.name: Trinity Geode
Trinity Geode.description:
The crystal chamber within this split geode is divided into three lobes of equal size. The spell DC of any spell cast by Activating this item is 17.

  • Armor After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, you gain resistance 1 to physical damage (except adamantine) until the end of your next turn, or double the resistance for a non-cantrip spell.
  • Weapon After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d4 bludgeoning damage until the end of your next turn.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zA0jNIBRgLsyTpbm]{Scatter Scree}.

Trinity Geode (Greater).name: Trinity Geode (Greater)
Trinity Geode (Greater).description:
The crystal chamber within this split geode is divided into three lobes of equal size. The spell DC of any spell cast by Activating this item is 24.

  • Armor After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, you gain resistance 3 to physical damage (except adamantine) until the end of your next turn, or double the resistance for a non-cantrip spell.
  • Weapon After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d6 bludgeoning damage until the end of your next turn.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zA0jNIBRgLsyTpbm]{Scatter Scree}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vh1RpbWfqdNC4L3P]{Meld into Stone}.

Trinity Geode (Major).name: Trinity Geode (Major)
Trinity Geode (Major).description:
The crystal chamber within this split geode is divided into three lobes of equal size. The spell DC of any spell cast by Activating this item is 29.

  • Armor After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, you gain resistance 5 to physical damage (except adamantine) until the end of your next turn, or double the resistance for a non-cantrip spell.
  • Weapon After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d8 bludgeoning damage until the end of your next turn.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zA0jNIBRgLsyTpbm]{Scatter Scree}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vh1RpbWfqdNC4L3P]{Meld into Stone}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.3xD8DYrr8YDVYGg7]{Spike Stones}.

Trip Snare.name: 绊足圈套 Trip Snare
Trip Snare.description:
你设置一根巧妙的钢丝以摔绊一个生物。一个进入方格的中型或更小的生物必须进行一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:20] 豁免。

如果你想要创造一个能够摔绊更大生物的绊足圈套，你必须创造一组连续的圈套，其总长度等于该生物占据方格的边长，而且该生物必须完全进入整个圈套。例如，15尺长的三个绊足圈套可以摔绊从走廊经过圈套线上的第一个巨型Huge生物。

大成功 该生物不受影响

成功 该生物陷入措手不及Flat-footed，直到它的下一个回合开始

失败 该生物倒地Prone

大失败 该生物倒地Prone并受到1d6点钝击伤害

Tripod.name: Tripod
Tripod.description: Tripods are designed for use with kickback weapons, as a way for gunslingers with lower strength to accurately use these more powerful weapons by sacrificing mobility instead. They can be set up and attached to a firearm with a single Interact action using one hand, setting the tripod in your square. While this sturdy piece of engineering is in use, you don't take the -2 penalty for firing a kickback weapon, even if your Strength isn't high enough to avoid the penalty. However, you must retrieve the tripod with a single Interact action before you can move the firearm to a different position. Normally, when you're @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}, you become observed if you do anything except @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}, or Step. However, deploying or retrieving a tripod with an Interact action doesn't automatically make you observed, so long as you don't set up or remove the tripod when it's in a spot where creatures can see the tripod itself.

Triton's Conch.name: 海神螺 Triton's Conch
Triton's Conch.description:
如果你将这只巨大的、变幻色彩的海螺壳放在耳朵旁，你便能听见大海的怒涛撞击在海岸上的声音。

启动 A 交互 (听觉)

效果 你将海螺举到嘴边往里吹气，发出一阵悠长的隆隆声。在接下来一分钟内，你和启动海螺时距你30尺内的所有盟友在游泳的运动检定中获得+2物品加值，并且可以在水下呼吸。

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.9PASRixhNM0ogqmG]{效果：海神螺}

True Name Amulet (Greater).name: True Name Amulet (Greater)
True Name Amulet (Greater).description:
This amulet bears the true name of a single creature with a level no higher than the item's level. These amulets are typically made of gold and engraved, but could be made of anything, including simple clay. The name is clearly visible, though only to you, and only while you have the amulet invested.

If you can read the language in which the name is written, that creature always takes the effects of invoke true name against your spells (with a spell level equal to half the item's level, rounded up). In addition, when the creature uses any magical effect against you, you can immediately attempt to counteract it using Arcana, Nature, Occult, or Religion for the counteract check and the true name amulet's level to determine the counteract level. Legendary amulets bearing the true names of creatures of level 21+ may exist.

True Name Amulet (Lesser).name: True Name Amulet (Lesser)
True Name Amulet (Lesser).description:
This amulet bears the true name of a single creature with a level no higher than the item's level. These amulets are typically made of gold and engraved, but could be made of anything, including simple clay. The name is clearly visible, though only to you, and only while you have the amulet invested.

If you can read the language in which the name is written, that creature always takes the effects of invoke true name against your spells (with a spell level equal to half the item's level, rounded up). In addition, when the creature uses any magical effect against you, you can immediately attempt to counteract it using Arcana, Nature, Occult, or Religion for the counteract check and the true name amulet's level to determine the counteract level. Legendary amulets bearing the true names of creatures of level 21+ may exist.

True Name Amulet (Major).name: True Name Amulet (Major)
True Name Amulet (Major).description:
This amulet bears the true name of a single creature with a level no higher than the item's level. These amulets are typically made of gold and engraved, but could be made of anything, including simple clay. The name is clearly visible, though only to you, and only while you have the amulet invested.

If you can read the language in which the name is written, that creature always takes the effects of invoke true name against your spells (with a spell level equal to half the item's level, rounded up). In addition, when the creature uses any magical effect against you, you can immediately attempt to counteract it using Arcana, Nature, Occult, or Religion for the counteract check and the true name amulet's level to determine the counteract level. Legendary amulets bearing the true names of creatures of level 21+ may exist.

True Name Amulet (Moderate).name: True Name Amulet (Moderate)
True Name Amulet (Moderate).description:
This amulet bears the true name of a single creature with a level no higher than the item's level. These amulets are typically made of gold and engraved, but could be made of anything, including simple clay. The name is clearly visible, though only to you, and only while you have the amulet invested.

If you can read the language in which the name is written, that creature always takes the effects of invoke true name against your spells (with a spell level equal to half the item's level, rounded up). In addition, when the creature uses any magical effect against you, you can immediately attempt to counteract it using Arcana, Nature, Occult, or Religion for the counteract check and the true name amulet's level to determine the counteract level. Legendary amulets bearing the true names of creatures of level 21+ may exist.

Truesight Potion.name: 真视药水 Truesight Potion
Truesight Potion.description: 喝下这瓶清澈干净的药水后，你可以看到事物真实的模样。你获得7环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{真知术 True Seeing} 的效果，反制值为 [[/r 1d20+25]]。

Trustworthy Round.name: Trustworthy Round
Trustworthy Round.description:
Ammunition any

Activate 1 command

This ammunition was developed in Dongun Hold to minimize casualties to friendly fire, and is always marked by a burnished copper head or tip so it can be easily identified. Before you can fire a trustworthy round, you must call out a target. You don't need to specify a name; the target could be "The angry tiger attacking our group on the left." The round will only hit the specified target and will turn to gossamer dust midair if it misses the intended target or comes into contact with anything else; this also prevents abilities that redirect attacks. The round doesn't have any capabilities beyond your own to determine whether someone is who you think they are, so you can't use it to determine a disguised creature's identity. If you specify a target of "Seltyiel" and shoot someone disguised as Seltyiel who you thought was Seltyiel, the attack will still hit, whereas if you were about to hit a disguised Seltyiel who you didn't recognize to be Seltyiel, the round would dissolve.

Truth Potion.name: 真实药水 Truth Potion
Truth Potion.description:
喝下这瓶辛辣药水后的10分钟内，你不能故意说谎，并可能被强制说出事实。在喝下药水的时候，尝试一次 @Check[type:will|dc:19] 豁免。你可以自愿达成失败或者大失败。

成功 药水不对你产生影响

失败 当你说话时，你必须说实话

大失败 如同失败，但一旦有人询问你一个问题，你必须进行一次 @Check[type:will|dc:19] 豁免。如果你豁免失败，只要你能，你必须如实回答问题；如果豁免成功，你在药水持续时间内能暂时免疫相同的问题。

Tusk and Fang Chain.name: Tusk and Fang Chain
Tusk and Fang Chain.description:
Activate f command

Trigger You Grab or restrain a creature or become grabbed or restrained by a creature

This length of silver chain has a tiger's fang on one end and the tip of a dire boar's tusk on the other. When you activate the chain, an ephemeral chain encircles the target creature's head and a cacophony of animal sounds clouds its mind. It must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:35|showDC:owner] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} on its next action.

Failure The creature is confused for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature is confused for 1 minute and the creature doesn't receive a flat check to end its confusion if it takes damage. At the end of each of its turns, it attempts a new Will save, ending the effect on a success.

Twilight Lantern (Greater).name: Twilight Lantern (Greater)
Twilight Lantern (Greater).description:
This elegant hooded lantern is made from onyx-black metal. In dim light, flecks of white metal speckled within the lantern's housing resemble stars in a night sky. The lantern uses oil as a standard hooded lantern, except that any light the lantern emits is converted into magical light similar to moonlight. This magical moonlight is always dim light.

Activate 1 envision

Effect You concentrate on the lantern's light and reduce or increase its radius. The light can have a minimum radius of 5 feet and a maximum radius equal to triple the light's standard radius.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You raise the lantern and unleash a beam of powerful moonlight, targeting a darkness effect within 60 feet. The lantern attempts to counteract the effect with a counteract modifier of [[/r {1d20+21} #Twilight Lantern (Greater)]]{+21}.

Twilight Lantern (Lesser).name: Twilight Lantern (Lesser)
Twilight Lantern (Lesser).description:
This elegant hooded lantern is made from onyx-black metal. In dim light, flecks of white metal speckled within the lantern's housing resemble stars in a night sky. The lantern uses oil as a standard hooded lantern, except that any light the lantern emits is converted into magical light similar to moonlight. This magical moonlight is always dim light.

Activate 1 envision

Effect You concentrate on the lantern's light and reduce or increase its radius. The light can have a minimum radius of 5 feet and a maximum radius equal to double the light's standard radius.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You raise the lantern and unleash a beam of powerful moonlight, targeting a darkness effect within 60 feet. The lantern attempts to counteract the effect with a counteract modifier of [[/r {1d20+10} #Twilight Lantern (Lesser)]]{+10}.

Twilight Lantern (Major).name: Twilight Lantern (Major)
Twilight Lantern (Major).description:
This elegant hooded lantern is made from onyx-black metal. In dim light, flecks of white metal speckled within the lantern's housing resemble stars in a night sky. The lantern uses oil as a standard hooded lantern, except that any light the lantern emits is converted into magical light similar to moonlight. This magical moonlight is always dim light.

Activate 1 envision

Effect You concentrate on the lantern's light and reduce or increase its radius. The light can have a minimum radius of 5 feet and a maximum radius equal to quadruple the light's standard radius.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You raise the lantern and unleash a beam of powerful moonlight, targeting a darkness effect within 60 feet. The lantern attempts to counteract the effect with a counteract modifier of [[/r {1d20+28} #Twilight Lantern (Major)]]{+28}.

Twilight Lantern (Moderate).name: Twilight Lantern (Moderate)
Twilight Lantern (Moderate).description:
This elegant hooded lantern is made from onyx-black metal. In dim light, flecks of white metal speckled within the lantern's housing resemble stars in a night sky. The lantern uses oil as a standard hooded lantern, except that any light the lantern emits is converted into magical light similar to moonlight. This magical moonlight is always dim light.

Activate 1 envision

Effect You concentrate on the lantern's light and reduce or increase its radius. The light can have a minimum radius of 5 feet and a maximum radius equal to triple the light's standard radius.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You raise the lantern and unleash a beam of powerful moonlight, targeting a darkness effect within 60 feet. The lantern attempts to counteract the effect with a counteract modifier of [[/r {1d20+17} #Twilight Lantern (Moderate)]]{+17}.

Twining Chains.name: Twining Chains
Twining Chains.description:
This set of chains is completely covered with spikes and sharp blades. Not balanced for weapon use, twining chains are instead wrapped around a user's body as a deterrent to attackers-and, for some, a fashion statement. While wearing twining chains, you gain the Thorns reaction. In addition to their dangers, twining chains' weight also increases your armor's Bulk by 1, Strength entry value by 2, and check penalty by 2.

Thorns r

Trigger You are hit by an unarmed attack

Effect You twist to harm your attacker with your chains' spikes and blades. Make an attack roll against the triggering attacker using your unarmed attack modifier. On a hit, the attacking creature takes [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 piercing damage}. This damage increases to [[/r {2d6}[piercing]]]{2d6 piercing damage} if the armor has a +1 potency rune, [[/r {3d6}[piercing]]]{3d6 piercing damage} if the armor has a +2 potency rune, or [[/r {4d6}[piercing]]]{4d6 piercing damage} if the armor has a +3 potency rune. However, whether you hit or miss, you take piercing damage equal to the number of d6s of piercing damage you would deal your attacker.

Twining Staff.name: 双缠杖 Twining Staff
Twining Staff.description:
它看起来只手细树藤绕起来的圆盘，但它可以生长或收缩。

启动 A 交互

效果 你让树藤迅速生长或缠绕，变成+1强击木杖、+1强击长棒或圆盘形态。在圆盘形态，它的负载可忽略不计，但必须至少用一只手持才能启动。在其它形态，它有着和对应武器类型相同的负载。作为启动动作的一部分你可以改变其持握方法。

当你让其生长时，可利用其生长之力进行跳高动作或通过将圆盘放在门缝后启动来破拆一扇门。如此做的双缠杖的运动检定调整值为[[/r 1d20+15]]。

Umbrella Injector.name: Umbrella Injector
Umbrella Injector.description: This umbrella's ferrule is a hollow-tipped blade three to four inches in length and often overlooked as decorative. A receptacle inside the umbrella's shaft can be loaded with a single dose of injury poison and injected into a damaged target with the pull of a sliding trigger. Reinforced ribs enable you to parry and deflect blows with the umbrella's tear-resistant canopy.

Underwater firing Mechanism.name: Underwater firing Mechanism
Underwater firing Mechanism.description: This device replaces the attached firearm's normal firing mechanism (normally, most guns use a flintlock or matchlock firing mechanism). When the firearm's wielder fires the weapon, a small rune etched on a piece of stone affixed inside the mechanism releases a magical spark that's propelled through the firing mechanism and into the firearm, launching its bullet. An underwater firing mechanism allows the attached firearm to be fired underwater or in other conditions that would normally prevent the ignition of black powder. Attaching an underwater firing mechanism to a firearm takes 1 hour, though this time can overlap with the standard time required to maintain and clean your firearm to prevent misfires.

Unending Youth.name: Unending Youth
Unending Youth.description:
You cease aging, and if you were older than young adult in age, you become a young adult again. You gain a +4 status bonus to saves against death effects and resistance to negative damage equal to half your level.

Once per day, from any distance, Abrogail Thrune II can recite a mandatory appearance clause in your Thrune contract as a 3-action activity to summon you to her side, where you are controlled by Abrogail for 1 minute before you return.

Activate 2 Command

Frequency once per day

Effect You recite a hold harmless provision from your Thrune contract. Reduce your doomed value to 0. Abrogail Thrune II is immediately made aware that you have used this ability.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +4 status bonus to saves against death effects

Unholy.name: 邪恶 Unholy
Unholy.description:
邪恶符文将炼狱之力赋予给武器。拥有该符文的武器对善良目标额外造成1d6点邪恶伤害。若你为善良阵营，你在携带或持握该武器时获得力竭2（enfeebled）。

启动 R 命令

频率 每天一次

触发 你用该武器对一善良生物重击成功

效果 符文蚀刻的武器每有1个武器伤害骰，目标就受到1d点 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续流血伤害}。

Unholy Water.name: 邪水 Unholy Water
Unholy Water.description:
启动 A 打击 Strike

一名邪恶神祗的恶意流淌在这瓶水中。你用打击Strike将这瓶邪水扔出去。它视为一个射程增量20尺的简易投掷武器。不像炼金炸弹，它不会将操作特征添加到动作中。

邪水 造成 1d6 邪恶伤害和 1点 邪恶溅射伤害。它只会对天使和其他弱点为负能量的生物造成伤害。

Universal Solvent (Greater).name: Universal Solvent (Greater)
Universal Solvent (Greater).description:
Activate 1 Interact

Originally formulated as a means of dissolving @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7IrQPyMm76nLVoXx]{Soverign Glue}, this powerful solvent can break almost any adhesive's grip. As universal solvent is particularly effective against sovereign glue, it automatically dissolves sovereign glue. It attempts to counteract any other adhesives, such as @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.T6Appwwl6nUl56Xj]{Tanglefoot Bags}, with a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+19 #Counteract]]{1d20+19}.

Universal Solvent (Major).name: Universal Solvent (Major)
Universal Solvent (Major).description:
Activate 1 Interact

Originally formulated as a means of dissolving @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7IrQPyMm76nLVoXx]{Soverign Glue}, this powerful solvent can break almost any adhesive's grip. As universal solvent is particularly effective against sovereign glue, it automatically dissolves sovereign glue. It attempts to counteract any other adhesives, such as @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.T6Appwwl6nUl56Xj]{Tanglefoot Bags}, with a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+28 #Counteract]]{1d20+28}.

Universal Solvent (Moderate).name: Universal Solvent (Moderate)
Universal Solvent (Moderate).description:
Activate 1 Interact

Originally formulated as a means of dissolving @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7IrQPyMm76nLVoXx]{Soverign Glue}, this powerful solvent can break almost any adhesive's grip. As universal solvent is particularly effective against sovereign glue, it automatically dissolves sovereign glue. It attempts to counteract any other adhesives, such as @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.T6Appwwl6nUl56Xj]{Tanglefoot Bags}, with a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+9]].

Unmemorable Mantle.name: Unmemorable Mantle
Unmemorable Mantle.description:
This long, shoddy cloak bears a hood and a simple brass clasp. While wearing the cloak, you gain a +1 item bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate an individual and to Lie while in character as that individual.

Activate 1 minute (envision, Interact)

Frequency once per day

Requirements You are Impersonating someone else

Effect While conversing or otherwise casually interacting with other creatures, you can adjust the mantle's clasp to modify those creatures' recollections of the last 5 minutes of their interaction with you. Each creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:25] save.

Critical Success The creature recalls the interaction clearly and realizes you were trying to alter their memory.

Success The creature recalls the interaction clearly.

Failure You decide whether or not the creature recalls the interaction. You can also alter minor details the creature recalls about the interaction, such as the time, place, and whether the interaction was favorable, as determined by the GM.

Critical Failure You decide whether or not the creature recalls the interaction. You can also alter major details the creature recalls about the interaction, such as believing you to be another individual or that the creature agreed to a favor, as determined by the GM.

Automatically applied effects:

  • a +1 item bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate an individual and to Lie while in character as that individual.

Unmemorable Mantle (Greater).name: Unmemorable Mantle (Greater)
Unmemorable Mantle (Greater).description:
This long, shoddy cloak bears a hood and a simple brass clasp. While wearing the cloak, you gain a +2 item bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate an individual and to Lie while in character as that individual.

Activate 1 minute (envision, Interact)

Frequency once per day

Requirements You are Impersonating someone else

Effect While conversing or otherwise casually interacting with other creatures, you can adjust the mantle's clasp to modify those creatures' recollections of the last 5 minutes of their interaction with you. Each creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:28|name:Greater Unmemorable Mantle] save.

Critical Success The creature recalls the interaction clearly and realizes you were trying to alter their memory.

Success The creature recalls the interaction clearly.

Failure You decide whether or not the creature recalls the interaction. You can also alter minor details the creature recalls about the interaction, such as the time, place, and whether the interaction was favorable, as determined by the GM.

Critical Failure You decide whether or not the creature recalls the interaction. You can also alter major details the creature recalls about the interaction, such as believing you to be another individual or that the creature agreed to a favor, as determined by the GM.

Automatically applied effects:

  • a +2 item bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate an individual and to Lie while in character as that individual.

Unmemorable Mantle (Major).name: Unmemorable Mantle (Major)
Unmemorable Mantle (Major).description:
This long, shoddy cloak bears a hood and a simple brass clasp. While wearing the cloak, you gain a +3 item bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate an individual and to Lie while in character as that individual.

Activate 1 minute (envision, Interact)

Frequency once every 10 minutes

Requirements You are Impersonating someone else

Effect While conversing or otherwise casually interacting with other creatures, you can adjust the mantle's clasp to modify those creatures' recollections of the last 5 minutes of their interaction with you. Each creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:38|name:Major Unmemorable Mantle] save.

Critical Success The creature recalls the interaction clearly and realizes you were trying to alter their memory.

Success The creature recalls the interaction clearly.

Failure You decide whether or not the creature recalls the interaction. You can also alter minor details the creature recalls about the interaction, such as the time, place, and whether the interaction was favorable, as determined by the GM.

Critical Failure You decide whether or not the creature recalls the interaction. You can also alter major details the creature recalls about the interaction, such as believing you to be another individual or that the creature agreed to a favor, as determined by the GM.

Automatically applied effects:

  • a +3 item bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate an individual and to Lie while in character as that individual.

Urn of Ashes.name: Urn of Ashes
Urn of Ashes.description:
This sealed pewter urn contains the ashes of a benevolent ancestor, with a sliver of lingering spirit that strives to protect you.

Activate R envision

Trigger You would become doomed or your doomed value would increase

Requirements The ashes aren't doomed

Effect The ashes in the urn intervene, taking the doomed condition in your place, and you don't gain or increase the value of your own doomed condition. Each night when you get a full night's rest, you can reduce your own doomed condition or that of the urn, but not both.

Activate 1envision, interact (attack)

Frequency once per round

Effect The urn shoots a bolt of negative energy at a foe within 30 feet.

Attempt a spell attack roll against the target's AC, using a modifier of [[/r 1d20+15]] or your own spell attack roll modifier, whichever is higher. On a success, the bolt deals [[/r 4d4]] negative damage (doubled on a critical success).

Urumi.name: Urumi
Urumi.description: A bouquet of whiplike blades extends from the hilt of this sword.

Vaccine (Greater).name: Vaccine (Greater)
Vaccine (Greater).description:
Activate 1 Interact

A vaccine grants a creature immunity to a specific strain of disease of a level equal to or less than the vaccine's level, and a +2 item bonus on all saving throws against other strains of the same disease. For example, a vaccine could grant immunity to filth fever inflicted by otyughs, but would only grant a +2 saving throw bonus against filth fever inflicted by a giant rat.

Craft Requirements Creating a vaccine requires a sample of the disease in question.

Duration 1 year.

Vaccine (Lesser).name: Vaccine (Lesser)
Vaccine (Lesser).description:
Activate 1 Interact

A vaccine grants a creature immunity to a specific strain of disease of a level equal to or less than the vaccine's level, and a +2 item bonus on all saving throws against other strains of the same disease. For example, a vaccine could grant immunity to filth fever inflicted by otyughs, but would only grant a +2 saving throw bonus against filth fever inflicted by a giant rat.

Craft Requirements Creating a vaccine requires a sample of the disease in question.

Duration 24 hours.

Vaccine (Major).name: Vaccine (Major)
Vaccine (Major).description:
Activate 1 Interact

A vaccine grants a creature immunity to a specific strain of disease of a level equal to or less than the vaccine's level, and a +2 item bonus on all saving throws against other strains of the same disease. For example, a vaccine could grant immunity to filth fever inflicted by otyughs, but would only grant a +2 saving throw bonus against filth fever inflicted by a giant rat.

Craft Requirements Creating a vaccine requires a sample of the disease in question.

Duration Permanent.

Vaccine (Minor).name: Vaccine (Minor)
Vaccine (Minor).description:
Activate 1 Interact

A vaccine grants a creature immunity to a specific strain of disease of a level equal to or less than the vaccine's level, and a +2 item bonus on all saving throws against other strains of the same disease. For example, a vaccine could grant immunity to filth fever inflicted by otyughs, but would only grant a +2 saving throw bonus against filth fever inflicted by a giant rat.

Craft Requirements Creating a vaccine requires a sample of the disease in question.

Duration 1 hour.

Vaccine (Moderate).name: Vaccine (Moderate)
Vaccine (Moderate).description:
Activate 1 Interact

A vaccine grants a creature immunity to a specific strain of disease of a level equal to or less than the vaccine's level, and a +2 item bonus on all saving throws against other strains of the same disease. For example, a vaccine could grant immunity to filth fever inflicted by otyughs, but would only grant a +2 saving throw bonus against filth fever inflicted by a giant rat.

Craft Requirements Creating a vaccine requires a sample of the disease in question.

Duration 1 week.

Vampiric Scythe.name: Vampiric Scythe
Vampiric Scythe.description:
The blade of this +2 greater striking wounding scythe is sharp enough to produce a whistling sound when swung through the air. The shaft is made of ebony wood with a sickly shine to it, much like the shine of infected wounds and contaminated water.

Activate r command

Trigger An enemy critically succeeds at an attempt to Disarm you

Effect As the scythe leaves your hand, it drinks the triggering creature's blood. The creature must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30|name:Vampiric Scythe Disarm|traits:uncommon] save or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} (@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3} on a critical failure). If the triggering creature becomes drained, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to the triggering creature's level. You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

Activate r command

Frequency once per hour

Trigger You critically succeed at a Strike against a living opponent

Effect The scythe drains life essence from your opponent into you. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half the slashing damage the scythe dealt to the foe. You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

Vanishing Coin.name: 消失钱币 Vanishing Coin
Vanishing Coin.description:
启动 F 想象

触发 你用隐秘Stealth来进行先攻检定，但尚未投掷结果

需求 你在隐秘Stealth中达到大师

这枚铜币悬挂在一条皮带上，皮带穿过了铜币中央的一个小孔。启动之前，这枚铜币每几分钟都会随机消失几秒。

当你启动它时，它会对你施展一次2环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{隐形术 Invisibility}，持续到你的下一个回合结束。

Vanishing Wayfinder.name: Vanishing Wayfinder
Vanishing Wayfinder.description:
A vanishing wayfinder is crafted of ivory chased with gold and silver. It has the usual functions of a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder} and the following additional activation.

Activate D command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You turn the wayfinder in a circle while invoking its command word, gaining the effects of a 2nd-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility} spell for 5 minutes.

Vapor Sphere.name: Vapor Sphere
Vapor Sphere.description:
Activate r envision

Trigger You trigger a trap's reaction or an enemy that was undetected by you makes an attack against you

Requirements You're an expert in the affixed armor and an expert in Reflex saves.

Within this strange glass sphere swirls a cloud of smoke that occasionally appears as if it's trying to escape. You react to a surprise encounter with haste, activating this talisman and causing your body to momentarily become like vapor. Against the trap's reaction or the attack, you gain resistance 25 to physical damage and are immune to precision damage. This effect also prevents the reaction or attack from physically moving you (such as falling down a pit or being knocked prone), and after the reaction or attack, you can Fly 5 feet. When you end this flight, you leave your vaporous state and are exposed to any danger still at your location.

Vaultbreaker's Harness.name: Vaultbreaker's Harness
Vaultbreaker's Harness.description:
This bulky leather harness has four pockets across the chest. The pockets contain a set of @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.6nrCxNQFycUVFOV2]{Thieves' Tools (Infiltrator)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.BznmPaRjI4Orb0IH]{Thieves' Tools (Infiltrator Picks)}, a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.4kz3vhkKPUuXBpxk]{Crowbar (Levered)}, and a glass cutter. These items are magically bound to the harness; if they are more than 1 foot away from you, they disappear, then reappear in the harness at the next sunset. Broken or destroyed items similarly reappear, restored, in their proper pockets at sunset.

Activate2 Interact

Effect You cinch the harness to prepare for mischief. You gain a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks and a +10-foot item bonus to your Speed for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.7MgpgF8tOXOiDEwv]{Effect: Vaultbreaker's Harness}

Venomous Cure Fulu.name: Venomous Cure Fulu
Venomous Cure Fulu.description:
Activate f envision

Trigger You attempt a saving throw against an injected poison.

This green fulu depicts venomous creatures and vermin. When activated, the venom from the fulu fights against the venom in your system, granting you a +2 status bonus to the triggering saving throw.

Ventriloquist's Ring.name: 腹语师之戒 Ventriloquist's Ring
Ventriloquist's Ring.description:
这枚优雅的铜戒上刻着鸣禽的图像。你在欺骗Deception检定上获得+1物品加值。

启动 D 交互

频率 每天一次

效果 绕着手指转一下戒指能让你魔法般地发声，你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yV7Ouzaoe7DHLESI]{腹语术 Ventriloquism}的效果（DC19）。

自动生效:

  • 欺骗Deception检定获得+1物品加值

Ventriloquist's Ring (Greater).name: 高等腹语师之戒 Ventriloquist's Ring (Greater)
Ventriloquist's Ring (Greater).description:
这枚优雅的铜戒上刻着鸣禽的图像。你在欺骗Deception检定上获得+2物品加值。

启动 D 交互

频率 每天任意次

效果 绕着手指转一下戒指能让你魔法般地发声，你获得2环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yV7Ouzaoe7DHLESI]{腹语术 Ventriloquism}的效果（DC27）。

自动生效:

  • 欺骗Deception检定获得+2物品加值

Verdant Staff.name: 翠绿法杖 Verdant Staff
Verdant Staff.description:
这根橡木杖春天会长出新芽，秋天变色冬天落下。持握它时，你在鉴别植物的自然检定上获得+2环境加值。

启动 施放法术

效果 你消耗一定充能从法杖法术列表中施放法术。

  • 戏法 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]{绊足术 Tanglefoot}
  • 1环级 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.s3abwDbTV43pGFFW]{橡棍术 Shillelagh} (目标可为该法杖)
  • 2环级 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YWrfKetOqDwVFut7]{树肤术 Barkskin}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.J6vNvrUT3b1hx2iA]{纠缠术 Entangle}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.CXICME10TkEJxz0P]{塑木术 Shape Wood}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{树化术 Tree Shape}

制造需求 为列表上所有法术提供1次对应环级的施法

自动生效:

  • 鉴别植物的自然检定上获得+2环境加值

Verdant Staff (Greater).name: 高等翠绿法杖 Verdant Staff (Greater)
Verdant Staff (Greater).description:
这根橡木杖春天会长出新芽，秋天变色冬天落下。持握它时，你在鉴别植物的自然检定上获得+2环境加值。

启动 施放法术

效果 你消耗一定充能从法杖法术列表中施放法术。

  • 戏法 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]{绊足术 Tanglefoot}
  • 1环级 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.s3abwDbTV43pGFFW]{橡棍术 Shillelagh} (目标可为该法杖)
  • 2环级 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YWrfKetOqDwVFut7]{树肤术 Barkskin}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.J6vNvrUT3b1hx2iA]{纠缠术 Entangle}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.CXICME10TkEJxz0P]{塑木术 Shape Wood}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{树化术 Tree Shape}
  • 3环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KsWhliKfUs3IpW3c]{棘墙术 Wall of Thorns}
  • 4环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YWrfKetOqDwVFut7]{树肤术 Barkskin}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qvwIwJ9QBihy8R0t]{植物交谈 Speak with Plants}
  • 5环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{植物形态 Plant Form}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KsWhliKfUs3IpW3c]{棘墙术 Wall of Thorns}

制造需求 为列表上所有法术提供1次对应环级的施法

自动生效:

  • 鉴别植物的自然检定上获得+2环境加值

Vermin Repellent Agent (Greater).name: Vermin Repellent Agent (Greater)
Vermin Repellent Agent (Greater).description:
Activate 3 Interact

This specialized cream serves as a repellent to stave off insects.

The repellent also binds with a number of common insect venoms, dulling the potency and giving the wearer's immune system a boost to resist venoms.

Once applied to your skin, the repellent grants you a +3 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons for 4 hours.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.VrYfR2WuyA15zFhq]{Effect: Vermin Repellent Agent (Greater)}

In addition, any arthropods (insects, spiders, scorpions, crabs, and similar invertebrate animals) must attempt a Will save (DC 29) when attempting to attack you with a melee Strike, or with a swarm attack such as the spider swarm's swarming bites. The arthropod then becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Critical Success The creature can act normally.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is frightened 2.

Critical Failure The creature is frightened 2 and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing}.

Vermin Repellent Agent (Lesser).name: Vermin Repellent Agent (Lesser)
Vermin Repellent Agent (Lesser).description:
Activate 3 Interact

The repellent also binds with a number of common insect venoms, dulling the potency and giving the wearer's immune system a boost to resist venoms.

Once applied to your skin, the repellent grants you a +1 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons for 4 hours.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.OAN5Fj21PJPhIqRU]{Effect: Vermin Repellent Agent (Lesser)}

In addition, any arthropods (insects, spiders, scorpions, crabs, and similar invertebrate animals) must attempt a Will save (DC 17) when attempting to attack you with a melee Strike, or with a swarm attack such as the spider swarm's swarming bites. The arthropod then becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Critical Success The creature can act normally.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is frightened 2.

Critical Failure The creature is frightened 2 and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing}.

Vermin Repellent Agent (Major).description:

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.e6dXfbKzv5sNr1zh]{Effect: Vermin Repellent Agent (Major)}

In addition, any arthropods (insects, spiders, scorpions, crabs, and similar invertebrate animals) must attempt a Will save (DC 35) when attempting to attack you with a melee Strike, or with a swarm attack such as the spider swarm's swarming bites. The arthropod then becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Critical Success The creature can act normally.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is frightened 2.

Critical Failure The creature is frightened 2 and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing}.

Vermin Repellent Agent (Moderate).name: Vermin Repellent Agent (Moderate)
Vermin Repellent Agent (Moderate).description:
Activate 3 Interact

This specialized cream serves as a repellent to stave off insects.

The repellent also binds with a number of common insect venoms, dulling the potency and giving the wearer's immune system a boost to resist venoms.

Once applied to your skin, the repellent grants you a +2 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons for 4 hours.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.Hnt3Trd7TiFICB06]{Effect: Vermin Repellent Agent (Moderate)}

In addition, any arthropods (insects, spiders, scorpions, crabs, and similar invertebrate animals) must attempt a Will save (DC 24) when attempting to attack you with a melee Strike, or with a swarm attack such as the spider swarm's swarming bites. The arthropod then becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Critical Success The creature can act normally.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is frightened 2.

Critical Failure The creature is frightened 2 and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing}.

Vestige Lenses.name: Vestige Lenses
Vestige Lenses.description:
These simple lenses are alchemically treated to detect the faint smoke trail from a piece of specially formulated sandalwood incense.

This incense has an odor undetectable by most people and a long burn time, making it perfect for discreetly tracking individuals. A stick of this incense costs 1 sp and can safely burn for up to 8 hours.

While wearing the lenses, you see alchemical fumes in a distinct green tint, granting you a +1 item bonus to Survival checks to Track a creature marked with the incense and to Perception checks to Seek any alchemical vapors.

If the smoke is fresh, Tracking via the incense's fumes might use a lower DC than normal for tracking a creature walking on firm surfaces.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Survival checks to Track a creature marked with the incense
  • +1 item bonus to Perception checks to Seek alchemical vapors

Vexing Vapor (Greater).name: Vexing Vapor (Greater)
Vexing Vapor (Greater).description:
Activate 1 Strike

This flask contains a fine red powder made from toxic berries. You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls. A greater vexing vapor bomb deals [[/r {3d6}[mental]]]{3d6 mental damage} and [[/r {3}[splash,mental]]]{3 mental splash damage}. On a hit, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] check before taking actions with the concentrate trait. This lasts until the end of its next turn (1 minute on a critical hit).

Vexing Vapor (Lesser).name: Vexing Vapor (Lesser)
Vexing Vapor (Lesser).description:
Activate 1 Strike

This flask contains a fine red powder made from toxic berries. A lesser vexing vapor bomb deals [[/r {1d6}[mental]]]{1d6 mental damage} and [[/r {1}[splash,mental]]]{1 mental splash damage}. On a hit, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] check before taking actions with the concentrate trait. This lasts until the end of its next turn (1 minute on a critical hit).

Vexing Vapor (Major).name: Vexing Vapor (Major)
Vexing Vapor (Major).description:
Activate 1 Strike

This flask contains a fine red powder made from toxic berries. You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls. A major vexing vapor bomb deals [[/r {4d6}[mental]]]{4d6 mental damage} and [[/r {4}[splash,mental]]]{4 mental splash damage}e. On a hit, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] check before taking actions with the concentrate trait. This lasts until the end of its next turn (1 minute on a critical hit).

Vexing Vapor (Moderate).name: Vexing Vapor (Moderate)
Vexing Vapor (Moderate).description:
Activate 1 Strike

This flask contains a fine red powder made from toxic berries. You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls. A moderate vexing vapor bomb deals [[/r {2d6}[mental]]]{2d6 mental damage} and [[/r {2}[splash,mental]]]{2 mental splash damage}. On a hit, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] check before taking actions with the concentrate trait. This lasts until the end of its next turn (1 minute on a critical hit).

Victory Plate.name: Victory Plate
Victory Plate.description:
The metal plates of this +1 resilient full plate are covered by a bright tabard featuring a distinctive coat of arms divided into four fields. This insignia magically records your recent victories, displaying one triumph in each field of the coat of arms, allowing you to call upon those victories for aid in future battles.

Activate R envision

Trigger You kill or destroy a creature of a level equal to or greater than your victory plate (adjusted as usual if you add fundamental runes to victory plate). This creature must have one of the traits listed in the second activation

Effect You direct the armor to commemorate your victory. The coat of arms on the armor's tabard shifts to incorporate heraldry related to the slain creature, and the victory is recorded within the tabard. If you have already recorded four victories, choose one to replace with the new victory.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect You touch one of the tabard's four fields representing one of your victories and recall your triumph over that creature. That creature vanishes from the tabard, and for 1 minute, you gain resistance 5 to a damage type based on the creature's trait (you gain resistance to only one type, even if the creature has more than one trait that could apply):

  • Aberration or Fey mental
  • Celestial good
  • Construct poison
  • Dragon or Elemental: one energy type that matches one of the dragon's or elemental's traits
  • Fiend evil
  • Ooze precision, and the resistance is 10
  • Undead negative

Victory Plate (Greater).name: Victory Plate (Greater)
Victory Plate (Greater).description:
The metal plates of this +2 resilient full plate are covered by a bright tabard featuring a distinctive coat of arms divided into four fields. This insignia magically records your recent victories, displaying one triumph in each field of the coat of arms, allowing you to call upon those victories for aid in future battles.

Activate R envision

Trigger You kill or destroy a creature of a level equal to or greater than your victory plate (adjusted as usual if you add fundamental runes to victory plate). This creature must have one of the traits listed in the second activation

Effect You direct the armor to commemorate your victory. The coat of arms on the armor's tabard shifts to incorporate heraldry related to the slain creature, and the victory is recorded within the tabard. If you have already recorded four victories, choose one to replace with the new victory.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per minute

Effect You touch one of the tabard's four fields representing one of your victories and recall your triumph over that creature. That creature vanishes from the tabard, and for 1 minute, you gain resistance 10 to a damage type based on the creature's trait (you gain resistance to only one type, even if the creature has more than one trait that could apply):

  • Aberration or Fey mental
  • Celestial good
  • Construct poison
  • Dragon or Elemental: one energy type that matches one of the dragon's or elemental's traits
  • Fiend evil
  • Ooze precision, and the resistance is 20
  • Undead negative

Vine Arrow.name: 藤蔓箭 Vine Arrow
Vine Arrow.description:
启动 A 命令

这支质朴的箭的箭杆上长出了带叶的茎。当一支启动的藤蔓箭命中了一个目标，箭的杆部分散并开始生长，用藤蔓缠住目标。

目标在他的速度Speed上承受-10尺环境罚值，持续 [[/r 2d4]] 轮，或直到目标成功通过了一个DC为19的逃脱Escape检定。在重击时，目标在逃脱Escape之前也会陷入禁足Immobilized。

Vine of Roses.name: Vine of Roses
Vine of Roses.description:
This +1 striking disrupting spiked chain comes in a rich, green color with rose petals painted on the handle in varying shades of red and pink. The chain seems to banish nearby shadows.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect You hold the chain out before you, and the weapon glows as bright as a torch. You can suppress this light by Activating the weapon again.

Activate R envision

Frequency once per day

Trigger You critically succeed at a Strike against a fiend or undead

Effect The weapon unleashes its light in an attempt to destroy the target. The vine of roses casts a 3rd-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.DyiD239dNS7RIxZE]{Searing Light} spell with the triggering creature as the target. In place of a spell attack roll, make a weapon attack roll with the vine of roses using the same multiple attack penalty as the triggering Strike.

Violet Ray.name: Violet Ray
Violet Ray.description:
One of the many wondrous devices brought into the world by Stasian technology is the seemingly miraculous violet ray. Physicians claim it anything from headaches to heartburn, or nausea to deafness, all with an easy and painless treatment. The device is a glass vacuum with an insulated handle connected to a small Stasian coil. When powered, the glass tube fills with purple light and becomes warm to the touch. Pressing the tube to one's body is said to increase blood flow, eliminate toxins, and many other beneficial effects. A violet ray functions as a set of healer's tools and provides a +2 item bonus to Medicine checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.MHLuKy4nQO2Z4Am1]{Administer First Aid}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.TC7OcDa7JlWbqMaN]{Treat Disease}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.KjoCEEmPGTeFE4hh]{Treat Poison}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds}.

Activate 3 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You apply the violet ray to an adjacent creature and attempt to counteract the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} condition with a counteract level of 6 and a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+22 #counteract]]{+22}, using the source of the condition to determine the condition's counteract level and DC. If the condition was caused by an ongoing effect and you don't remove that effect, the condition returns after 1 minute. Each use of this ability can only counteract a single condition.

Violet Venom.name: Violet Venom
Violet Venom.description:
The delicate process of extracting violet venom from a violet fungus leaves it diluted at the best of times. Alchemists are still on the hunt for a truly pure, unadulterated version of this highly toxic poison.

Activate A Interact (Contact)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17]

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 poison damage} plus @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 poison damage} plus @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6 poison damage} plus enfeebled 1 (1 round)

Viper Arrow.name: 蝰蛇箭 Viper Arrow
Viper Arrow.description:
启动 A 命令

这支箭的箭杆被精细的绿色鳞片包裹，它的铁质箭头形状也像是尖牙一样。

当一支启动的蝰蛇箭命中一个目标，这支箭变形成一只 @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.lFlXmieuHTBIonhj]{蝰蛇 Viper}。目标受到蝰蛇的毒液效果，如同已经被咬了一样。这只蝰蛇接着会落在邻接目标的空格子中。

这只蝰蛇有着召唤Summon特征，在你回合结束时行动，即使你没有使用维持法术Sustain a Spell动作。它受到GM的控制，但它通常会去攻击箭所命中的目标。蝰蛇在1分钟后，或被杀死时消失。

制作条件： 提供一次 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4YnON9JHYqtLzccu]{召唤动物 Summon Animal}施法

Viper's Fang.name: 蝰蛇之牙 Viper's Fang
Viper's Fang.description:
启动 R 想象

触发 你触及范围内的一个生物使用了一个操作Manipulate或移动Move动作、进行了一次远程攻击、或这在一次移动动作中离开了一个格子

需求 你在附着的武器上达到大师

当你启动了这根用树脂强化过的蝰蛇头骨，你对触发的生物进行一次借机攻击Attack of Opportunity。

如果你有借机攻击Attack of Opportunity，你可以以自由动作启动蝰蛇之牙。

Void Mirror.name: Void Mirror
Void Mirror.description:
Usage Mounted in frame

The Void Mirror was created on a distant planet by a now‑extinct alien cult to aid in unlocking the secrets of the Dark Tapestry. It appears as a 5-foot-tall, 2-footwide mirror of dark glass. As long as it's unmounted in a frame, the Void Mirror functions only as a mirror, save that it always reflects the sky as if it were night, regardless of the time of day. When the Void Mirror is mounted in a frame, it instead serves as a window into space, displaying a star field in its glass rather than a reflection. This frame can be of any quality, but stouter frames help to prevent the frame's destruction and thus help to keep the Void Mirror functional.

The view presented by the Void Mirror is any view of the night sky possible from its current physical location, regardless of time of day. Observations of the sky in this way add a +3 item bonus to Astronomy Lore or Perception checks made while using the mirror. The point of view can be shifted through hand gestures, causing the scene within the mirror to reorient in any direction desired.

A character who peers into the starscape within the Void Mirror must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:41] save. On a failure, the character feels something looking back at them from the dark places between the stars. On a critical failure, this sensation causes the character to become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}. The character is then temporarily immune to this effect for 24 hours.

By placing the Void Mirror in a specially-constructed frame, it can halt the ongoing transformation of a creature that has performed the apotheosis activation. Building such a frame is beyond the skill of low-level characters, as it requires an artisan with legendary proficiency in Crafting.

The Void Mirror can be utilized in other ways, but before a character can activate these effects the occult methods to access these ritual-like effects must be Researched separately. Since the specific methods for these activations vary slightly from person to person, these methods can't be taught; each person who seeks to activate the Void Mirror in one of the following ways must complete their own research to unlock the artifact's secrets. Each requires a separate number of Occultism checks to Research, as detailed below for each activation.

Activate 1 hour (Interact)

Research Accumulate 12 RP by making DC 20 Occultism (expert) checks when Researching (1 week per attempt)

Frequency once per month

Effect The first activation ritual is known as "Speak to the Void" and allows the user to contact an intelligence in a distant part of the universe, provided the mirror shows that location (regardless of distance). This alien intelligence infuses the user's mind with answers, allowing the user to Recall Knowledge using Nature or Occultism as if they were legendary proficiency with the skill (including the +8 proficiency bonus). If this check fails, the character takes [[/r {10d6}[mental]]]{10d6 mental damage} (100 mental damage on a critical failure) as the imparted knowledge does more harm than good.

Activate 1 hour (Interact)

Research Accumulate 12 RP by making DC 30 Occultism (master) checks when Researching (1 month per attempt)

Frequency once per year

Effect The second activation ritual is known as "Call from the Void." The user performs a 1-hour-long rite before the Void Mirror, during which they indicate a type of aberration, beast, fungus, ooze, or plant creature that's an alien life form from the planet the user is currently located on. The target creature must be a level equal to or less than the user's level +4. As the rite ends, the user attempts an Occultism check against the target creature's Will DC.

Critical Success The creature is drawn across the universe to appear in a space adjacent to the Void Mirror. The creature's initial attitude toward the user is helpful, but this attitude can shift quickly if the creature realizes its goals and personality differs dramatically from the user's, or if the user makes a request of the creature that's against its nature. As long both the creature and the user are within 30 feet of the Void Mirror, the user can return the creature to its original location by Dismissing this activation. The creature can attempt a Will save against the user's Occultism DC to resist being returned; if it succeeds, it's temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Success As critical success, but the creature is indifferent upon arrival.

Failure As critical success, but the creature is hostile upon arrival.

Critical Failure As failure, but magical feedback from the failed activation causes the user to become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3}.

Activate 7 days (Interact)

Research Accumulate 12 RP by making DC 40 Occultism (legendary) checks when Researching (1 year per attempt)

Frequency once per century

Effect The third activation ritual is known as "Become the Void" and requires the user to continue performing the rite for 7 consecutive days (as if they were performing a multi-day ritual). If the user fails to perform this rite for one of these 7 consecutive days, they immediately suffer the critical failure effect below.

Critical Success The user's body, mind, and soul are infused with alien energies drawn from the Dark Tapestry, which transforms the user into an aberration of a level no higher than their current level +4. This new form could be an existing aberration or a unique one of the GM's creation. The user retains their memories and spellcasting ability (including any rituals they know) but becomes chaotic evil and loses all other abilities they possessed in their previous form.

Success As critical success, but the aberration the user transforms into can be of a level no higher than half the user's current level.

Failure The user's attempt to change is a painful mistake that deals [[/r {10d6+40}[bludgeoning]]]{10d6+40 bludgeoning damage} as their body twists, bends and breaks. Ultimately, they are not transformed.

Critical Failure The user is slain, but their body shifts and transforms into a brand new creature as the bodiless alien intelligence Tchekuth incubates within the user's flesh, mind and soul. This transformation takes another 7 days to complete but can be halted indefinitely if the Void Mirror is placed in a specially constructed frame aimed at the body's location (regardless of any solid object between the mirror and the body). Slowing or stopping this transformation via other means requires complex rituals or divine intervention, subject to the GM's whim. After 7 days, the body completes its transformation and Tchekuth rises once more as a physical threat.

Destruction A creature that completes the apotheosis of Becoming the Void can destroy the Void Mirror by smashing it, though doing so also destroys the creature performing this action in a violent burst of occult energy.

Vorpal.name: 斩首 Vorpal
Vorpal.description:
最初创造这种符文是用来斩杀传奇怪物炸脖龙的，斩首武器对任何有头的生物都非常有效。

启动 R 想象 (死亡, 失能)

触发 你用该武器的打击动作骰出天然20、重击成功且造成了挥砍伤害，目标必须有头

效果 目标必须通过 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:37] 豁免检定，否则被斩首。除非目标失去这个头部也能活，否则会击杀它。对于有多个头部的生物，通常只在砍掉其最后一个头部时才会立刻击杀它。

Voyager's Pack.name: 远行者背包 Voyager's Pack
Voyager's Pack.description:
这个皮革旅行包有着许多烙印在其上的图标，而且每当这背包到达一个它从未去过的位面，其表面上就会烙上一个新的图标，代表着新的位面。

这背包为你在生存Survival检定上提供+3加值。

它也能让你看到生物通过时留下的魔法痕迹，让你可以追踪Track一个传送离开的生物。GM决定这次检定的DC，通常使用等级以及传送法术的DC。这让你可以找到生物目的地的位置，并且你在施展@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.69L70wKfGDY66Mk9]{传送术 Teleport} 或启动背包时都可以使用这个位置，即使你并不知道这个位置是什么样的。

这背包包含了一个异次元空间，如 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JBMBaN9dZLytfFLQ]{II型次元袋 Bag of Holding (Type II)}一样。

这个空间包含了一组 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.9UJbMaglf35GVzaZ]{攀爬者工具 Climbing Kit}。如果工具组的任何一部分被取走而且未能归还，它们会在每天凌晨自动归位。

启动 10 分钟 (命令, 想象, 交互)

效果 你启动背包时，你可以把四个自愿生物绑到背包的绳子上。在启动背包结束时，背包会施展一次7环的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{异界传送 Plane Shift} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.69L70wKfGDY66Mk9]{传送术 Teleport} ，将你和所有绑在背包上的人传送走。你需要尝试一次DC为45的生存Survival检定。如果成功，异界传送会让你出现在距离目标位置25英里外的地方，而传送术将会使这段距离减半。如果大成功，你会精确出现在目标位置。

自动生效:

  • 生存Survival检定获得+3加值

Waffle Iron.name: Waffle Iron
Waffle Iron.description: This set of hinged metal plates features studs on the inside of each plate to provide a texture for the pastry cakes you cook with it. You pour batter on the plates, close the device, and place it on a fire or stove to cook.

Waffle Iron (High-grade Mithral).name: Waffle Iron (High-grade Mithral)
Waffle Iron (High-grade Mithral).description:
This set of hinged metal plates features studs on the inside of each plate to provide a texture for the pastry cakes you cook with it. You pour batter on the plates, close the device, and place it on a fire or stove to cook.

Truly fit for emperors and demigods, this waffle iron is made of high-grade mithral. Although most metallurgists are certain that the much more affordable standard-grade mithral waffle iron maintains mithral's full non-stick properties, the super elite insist that only waffles made from high-grade mithral waffle irons conform to the most perfect shape and texture.

Nadian has one high-grade mithral waffle iron for sale emblazoned with an archaic symbol associated with Milani from before she became a deity, supposedly used to make Milani herself waffles during her mortal life. As it's made of mithral, this is an uncommon item.

Waffle Iron (Imprint).name: Waffle Iron (Imprint)
Waffle Iron (Imprint).description:
This set of hinged metal plates features studs on the inside of each plate to provide a texture for the pastry cakes you cook with it. You pour batter on the plates, close the device, and place it on a fire or stove to cook.

The plates of this waffle iron feature a noble insignia, a religious symbol, or other design to imprint onto the pastry.

Waffle Iron (Mithral).name: Waffle Iron (Mithral)
Waffle Iron (Mithral).description:
This set of hinged metal plates features studs on the inside of each plate to provide a texture for the pastry cakes you cook with it. You pour batter on the plates, close the device, and place it on a fire or stove to cook.

The plates of this waffle iron are made of standard-grade mithral rather than iron and might bear an imprint on the plates. As with other mithral cookware, food rarely sticks to a mithral waffle iron. As it's made of mithral, this is an uncommon item.

Wakizashi.name: Wakizashi
Wakizashi.description: This short-bladed, single-edged sword is typically carried as part of a pair alongside a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Y1dkRsRd1Z7Jf2y6]{Katana}.

Walking Cauldron.name: Walking Cauldron
Walking Cauldron.description:
This iron cauldron stands upon sturdy iron crow's feet. A walking cauldron has a land Speed of 25 feet and can be used as a suitable tool to Craft potions, oils, or other liquids.

As a single action, which has the auditory and concentrate traits, you can command the cauldron to either follow you or to stand in place. When following you, the cauldron does its best to remain within 30 feet of you, but its ungainly movements are too imprecise to predictably direct in a combat encounter or other situation where seconds and precise locations count. It can carry up to 2 Bulk of ingredients for potions or other liquids inside of itself while following you, but if overloaded or if you put anything else inside it, it stands in place and refuses to move until 10 minutes after you remove the excess.

Wand of Caustic Effluence.name: Wand of Caustic Effluence
Wand of Caustic Effluence.description:
This dirty metal wand is covered in an oily acrid smelling film.

Activate @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell}

Frequency once per day, plus overcharge

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Wu0xFpewMKRK3HG8]{Grease}, but the grease is caustic. If you cast this spell on an area, any creature that fails their Reflex save and falls @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}, or that begins their turn prone, takes [[/r {1d6}[acid]]]{1d6 acid damage}. If you cast this spell on an unattended object, the first creature to pick up the object during the duration takes [[/r {1d6}[persistent,acid]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Acid Damage}. If you cast this spell on an attended object and the holder or wielder fails their Acrobatics or Reflex save, the holder or wielder takes [[/r {1d6}[persistent,acid]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Acid Damage}. If you cast this spell on a worn object, any creature who @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}s or Grabs the wearer takes [[/r {1d6}[acid]]]{1d6 acid damage}.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of grease

Wand of Continuation (1st-Level Spell).name: 1环法术延续魔杖 Wand of Continuation (1st-Level Spell)
Wand of Continuation (1st-Level Spell).description:
该魔杖会延迟法术的持续时间。黄色的火光会在魔杖表面盘旋，直到法术终止。

启动 施放法术; 若法术通常需要1，启动该魔杖则需要2。若法术通常需要2,则启动该魔杖需要3。

频率 每天一次，加上超载

效果 你施放对应法术，其持续时间增加一半。

制造需求 提供1次对应环级的该法术施法。该法术施法时间必须为 1 或 2 ，且持续时间不能少于10分钟不能超过1小时。

Wand of Crackling Lightning (3rd-Level S.name: Wand of Crackling Lightning (3rd-Level Spell)
Wand of Crackling Lightning (3rd-Level S.description:
This wand is made of two copper plates separated by a ceramic center.

Activate Cast a spell

Frequency Once per day, plus overcharge

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{Lightning Bolt} at 3rd level, but the spell's area is twice as wide (two adjacent and parallel @Template[type:line|distance:120]s) and creatures that fail their save are flat-footed for 1 round.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of lightning bolt at 3rd-level.

Wand of Fey Flames.name: Wand of Fey Flames
Wand of Fey Flames.description:
This red maple wand carved into a tongue of flame feels warm in your hand.

Activate @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell}

Frequency once per day, plus overcharge

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.HRb2doyaLtaoCfi3]{Faerie Fire}. For the duration of the spell, you can use the limning flames as a source for your magic. Creatures affected by your faerie fire must succeed at a Will save against your spell DC or take a - 2 status penalty to their Will saves against enchantment and illusions spells as long as they are affected by faerie fire. You can cast an enchantment or illusion spell on such a creature up to a distance twice the spell's normal range. If the spell has a range of touch, or doesn't have a range, it is unaffected by the increase in range from the faerie fire.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.VIzeuA9tQEQ7V1Ib]{Effect: Wand of Fey Flames}

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of faerie fire.

Wand of Hopeless Night (2nd-Level Spell).name: Wand of Hopeless Night (2nd-Level Spell)
Wand of Hopeless Night (2nd-Level Spell).description:
This wand is a length of wrought black iron.

Activate Cast a spell

Frequency Once per day, plus overcharge

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4GE2ZdODgIQtg51c]{Darkness} at 2nd level. Each creature that ends its turn within the spell's area must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:20] save or become frightened 1 (frightened 2 on a critical failure).

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of darkness at 2nd-level.

Wand of Manifold Missiles (1st-Level Spe.name: 1环连发飞弹魔杖 Wand of Manifold Missiles (1st-Level Spell)
Wand of Manifold Missiles (1st-Level Spe.description:
这根魔杖的顶端是一个雕刻好的龙头，中间是一个抛光的金属球安在龙口。

启动 施放法术

频率 每天一次，加上超载

效果 你施放1环级的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{魔法飞弹 Magic Missile}法术。

施法之后你每回合开始，1个或多个魔法飞弹继续从魔杖中飞射而出，就如同你施放了1个单动作版本的魔法飞弹法术一样。每次你都需要选择目标。这种持续飞弹最多持续1分钟，或直到你不再持握魔杖，或直到你尝试再次启动魔杖。

Wand of Noisome Acid (2nd-Level Spell).description:
This greasy stick emits a stomach-churning scent when held in a hand.

Activate @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell}

Frequency once per day, plus overcharge

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.f8hRqLJaxBVhF1u0]{Acid Arrow} at 2nd level. A creature that takes acid damage from this spell must succeed at a Fortitude save against your spell DC or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of Acid Arrow at 2nd level

Wand of Overflowing Life (3rd-Level Spel.name: Wand of Overflowing Life (3rd-Level Spell)
Wand of Overflowing Life (3rd-Level Spel.description:
This alabaster wand has a clear crystal at the tip.

Activate Cast a spell

Frequency Once per day, plus overcharge

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} at 3rd level.

After you cast the spell, at the start of your next turn, excess healing magic wells up from the wand and heals you, as though you cast the 1-action version of heal on yourself at 3rd-level. You gain this benefit only once, even if you cast multiple heal spells from wands of overflowing life in the same turn.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of heal at 3rd-level.

After you cast the spell, at the start of your next turn, excess healing magic wells up from the wand and heals you, as though you cast the 1-action version of heal on yourself at 3rd-level. You gain this benefit only once, even if you cast multiple heal spells from wands of overflowing life in the same turn.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of heal at 8th-level.

Wand of Slaying (7th-Level Spell).description:
这根锃亮的黑色魔杖顶端有一颗绿色宝石，任何人凝视宝石的人，只会看到一个咧嘴大笑的头骨，而不是他们的脸。

频率 每天一次，加上超载

Wand of Spiritual Warfare (2nd-Level Spe.name: Wand of Spiritual Warfare (2nd-Level Spell)
Wand of Spiritual Warfare (2nd-Level Spe.description:
This wand juts from an ornate hilt like a short, wooden dagger blade.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day, plus overcharge

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Fq9yCbqI2RDt6Orw]{Spiritual Weapon} at 2nd-level. When you critically hit, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect. In addition, you can etch one of the following property runes onto the wand: corrosive, flaming, frost, shock, thundering, or their respective greater versions. The spiritual weapon's Strikes gain the effects of this rune.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of spiritual weapon of 2nd-level.

Wand of Teeming Ghosts (2nd-Level Spell).name: Wand of Teeming Ghosts (2nd-Level Spell)
Wand of Teeming Ghosts (2nd-Level Spell).description:
This pale wooden wand is carved to resemble a thigh bone with metal caps at each end. Ghostly tendrils seem to swirl around it every so often.

Activate @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell}

Frequency once per day, plus overcharge

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8ViwItUgwT4lOvvb]{False Life} at 2nd level. During the duration of the spell, wisps that resemble spirits flit around you as long as you have any temporary Hit Points from false life, and you can use the following action.

Activation F envision

Trigger You successfully impart the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1} condition to a creature

Requirements You have temporary Hit Points

Effect You end false life and increase the creature's frightened condition value to 2.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of False Life at 2nd level

Wand of Thundering Echoes (3rd-Level Spe.name: Wand of Thundering Echoes (3rd-Level Spell)
Wand of Thundering Echoes (3rd-Level Spe.description:
A forked, lightning-like crack runs down the length of this ornate stone wand, which rumbles slightly with the peals of distant thunder.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day, plus overcharge

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzLkNU3AAqOSKFPR]{Sound Burst} of the indicated level. After you Cast the Spell, at the start of each of your turns, the sound echoes in the same area as if you had cast it again, though it deals one fewer d10. This effect lasts until the damage is reduced to below 2d10. The echoes don't affect structures or other items.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of sound burst of the appropriate level.

Wand of Widening (1st-Level Spell).name: 1环法术扩展魔杖 Wand of Widening (1st-Level Spell)
Wand of Widening (1st-Level Spell).description:
这根魔杖尾部是分叉状而非锥形底。

启动 施放法术; 若法术通常需要1，启动该魔杖则需要2。若法术通常需要2，启动该魔杖则需要3。

频率 每天一次，加上超载

效果 你施放对应法术，其范围增加。至少是爆发半径10尺的法术，其爆发半径增加5尺；通常为15尺或更小的锥形/直线法术，增加5尺，更大的锥形/直线法术则增加10尺。

制造需求 提供1次对应环级的该法术施法。该法术施法时间必须为1或2，不能有持续时间，范围必须是爆发（10尺或更多）、锥形或直线。

Wand of Widening (4th-Level Spell).name: 4环法术扩展魔杖 Wand of Widening (4th-Level Spell)
Wand of Widening (4th-Level Spell).description:
这根魔杖尾部是分叉状而非锥形底。

启动 施放法术; 若法术通常需要1，启动该魔杖则需要2。若法术通常需要2，启动该魔杖则需要3。

频率 每天一次，加上超载

效果 你施放对应法术，其范围增加。至少是爆发半径10尺的法术，其爆发半径增加5尺；通常为15尺或更小的锥形/直线法术，增加5尺，更大的锥形/直线法术则增加10尺。
